description.zh-cn: 文化大革命（简称文革）是1966年5月16日至1976年10月6日由毛泽东发动并领导、发生在中国大陆的重大政治运动，对社会造成深远影响。期间，中央书记处等职务被撤销，国务院法制机构被取消，大量人物（如巴金及其家人）遭受迫害，地方机构瘫痪，高考中断，教育与文化遗产遭严重破坏。文革被后世负面评价为“十年内乱”，官方定性为“由领导者错误发动的内乱”，并全面否定其理论与实践。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution (Wen Ge), a major political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, took place in mainland China from May 16, 1966, to October 6, 1976, profoundly impacting society. During this period, positions such as the Central Secretariat were abolished, the State Council's legislative affairs body was canceled, numerous figures (including Ba Jin and his family) suffered persecution, local institutions were paralyzed, Gaokao was suspended, and education and cultural heritage were severely damaged. Later generations negatively evaluated the Cultural Revolution as 'ten years of civil strife,' and it was officially defined as 'internal turmoil erroneously initiated by the leadership,' with its theory and practice completely negated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他是中国革命家、政治家、理论家，是杨昌济的学生和女婿。曾任中华苏维埃共和国中央执行委员会主席。在国共内战中是共产党最高指挥官，遵义会议后确立红军领导地位。执政期间，推行“一边倒”外交，促进中苏、中日建交及中美关系正常化。他领导了反右、大跃进（据称因阅读钱学森文章而相信“亩产万斤”）和文化大革命等运动，对“文革”左倾错误负主要责任，但官方评价功绩第一，错误第二。
description.en: The principal founder and first paramount leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. He was a Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and theorist, a student and son-in-law of Yang Changji. He served as Chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Chinese Soviet Republic. During the Chinese Civil War, he was the supreme commander of the Communist side, establishing his leadership over the Red Army after the Zunyi Conference. During his rule, he pursued a 'Lean to One Side' foreign policy, facilitating diplomatic relations with the Soviet Union and Japan, and promoting the normalization of Sino-American relations. He led movements such as the Anti-Rightist Movement, the Great Leap Forward (reportedly coming to believe in '10,000 jin per mu' after reading an article by Qian Xuesen), and the Cultural Revolution, bearing primary responsibility for the leftist errors of the Cultural Revolution, but officially, his merits are considered primary, and his mistakes secondary.

birth_place.zh-cn: 长沙府宁乡县花明楼镇炭子冲村

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾领导安源路矿罢工。他是一位杰出的政治家和马克思主义理论家，曾任中华人民共和国第二任主席、中共中央委员会副主席，并被推选为中华全国总工会名誉主席。他早期在湖北省总工会工作，支持土地改革并推动中国人民大学建立。在1961年广州中央工作会议期间主持三北会议。七千人大会上，他批评大跃进，指出大饥荒成因，与毛泽东产生分歧。曾率中共代表团出席苏共十九大。文化大革命初期，他曾批准成立工作组，后被打倒并被迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who led the Anyuan Road and Mining Strike. He was a prominent statesman and Marxist theorist, serving as the second Chairman of the PRC and Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and was elected Honorary Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions. Early in his career, he worked at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, supported land reform, and promoted the establishment of Renmin University of China. During the 1961 Guangzhou Central Work Conference, he presided over the Sanbei (Three-North) meeting. At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, he criticized the Great Leap Forward, pointing out the causes of the Great Famine, which led to disagreements with Mao Zedong. He led a CPC delegation to attend the 19th Congress of the CPSU. In the early stage of the Cultural Revolution, he approved the establishment of work groups, was later purged and persecuted to death.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省广安市广安区协兴镇牌坊村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的核心领导人、改革开放总设计师，第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。早年曾与孙冶方在莫斯科中山大学同学。他曾任中共中央副主席、书记处总书记、中央军委主席，中华人民共和国最高领导人（1978-1989）及副总理。他领导拨乱反正、平反冤假错案、恢复高考，推动十一届三中全会确立改革开放，提出“一国两制”，并主导废除干部终身制。他曾支持并提拔胡锦涛。晚年对八六学潮立场强硬，是六四戒严及清场主要决策者。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, core leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, chief architect of Reform and Opening-up, and the core figure of the second generation of central leadership. Early in his life, he was a classmate of Sun Yefang at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University. He served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, China's paramount leader (1978-1989), and Vice Premier. He led the rectification of errors, rehabilitation of unjust cases, and restoration of Gaokao; promoted the establishment of reform and opening-up at the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, proposed 'One Country, Two Systems,' and abolished lifelong tenure for cadres. He supported and promoted Hu Jintao. In his later years, he held a hardline stance on the 1986 student protests and was a key decision-maker for the June Fourth crackdown and clearance.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖北省黄州府黄冈县回龙山镇林家大湾村

death_place.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国肯特省巴特瑙劳布县苏布拉嘎盆地

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的现代政治人物、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军将领。曾长期担任红一军团军团长。曾任国防部部长、中共中央副主席、国务院副总理。在第二次国共内战东北战场任东北民主联军总司令。七千人大会上他公开支持毛泽东，私下对大跃进不满。毛泽东在中共九大确立其为接班人，但庐山会议后分歧加剧。文革期间，他曾迫害贺龙。最终在九一三事件中坠机身亡，后被认定为“林彪反革命集团”首领。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military strategist, Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and a general of the People's Liberation Army. He long served as the commander of the Red First Army Group. He served as Minister of National Defense, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Premier of the State Council. In the Northeast battlefield of the Chinese Civil War, he commanded the Northeast Democratic United Army. At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, he publicly supported Mao Zedong but privately expressed dissatisfaction with the Great Leap Forward. Mao Zedong designated him as his successor at the Ninth National Congress of the CPC, but disagreements intensified after the Lushan Conference. During the Cultural Revolution, he persecuted He Long. He eventually died in a plane crash during the September 13th Incident and was later identified as the leader of the 'Lin Biao Counter-revolutionary Clique'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝江苏省淮安府山阳县驸马巷

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、革命家、军事家、外交家，中共、新中国及解放军主要领导人之一。向忠发任中共名义领袖期间系实际负责人，南昌起义任中共中央前委书记。长征初期为“三人团”成员，遵义会议后与毛泽东、王稼祥组成新“三人团”，成主要军事指挥者。曾任中华人民共和国首任国务院总理兼外交部长、全国政协主席。他主管经济，促成《中苏友好同盟互助条约》；曾亲自说服梁思成，要求国徽图案中包含天安门；委托钱学森起草导弹研制方案。文革中，他努力维持国家运转，保护故宫、钱学森等，组建523项目，并报告“六十一人案”中央知晓。
description.en: A Chinese politician, revolutionary, military leader, and diplomat, and one of the principal leaders and founders of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), the People's Republic of China (PRC), and the People's Liberation Army (PLA). During Xiang Zhongfa's nominal leadership of the CCP, he was an actual leading figure, and served as Secretary of the CCP Front Committee in the Nanchang Uprising. During the early Long March, he was a member of the 'Trio'; after the Zunyi Conference, he formed a new 'Trio' with Mao Zedong and Wang Jiaxiang, becoming a key military commander. He served as the first Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee. He oversaw economic affairs, facilitated important treaties like the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance, and personally persuaded Liang Sicheng that the national emblem design must include Tiananmen. He also commissioned Qian Xuesen to draft a missile development plan. During the Cultural Revolution, he worked to maintain state operations, protected the Forbidden City, Qian Xuesen, and others, established Project 523, and reported the 'Case of the 61' as known to the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛泽东的第四任妻子、毛岸青的继母。她曾是中国政治人物、演员、文艺理论家，原国家级副职领导人，曾任中央文化革命小组副组长，是其核心成员之一。作为文化大革命期间中国共产党的主要领导人之一，她位列“四人帮”之首。她曾公开批评宋任穷及其女儿宋彬彬，魏京生在文革期间曾对其产生怀疑。
description.en: Jiang Qing was Mao Zedong's fourth wife and the stepmother of Mao Anqing. She was a Chinese politician, actress, literary theorist, and a former national-level deputy leader, serving as deputy head and a core member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. As one of the main leaders of the Chinese Communist Party during the Cultural Revolution, she was the head of the 'Gang of Four'. She publicly criticized Song Renqiong and his daughter Song Binbin, and Wei Jingsheng became suspicious of her during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中华人民共和国的重要政治人物，中国共产党高级领导人。作为“四人帮”核心成员，曾任上海市革委会主任、中央文革小组副组长、中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。被《“571工程”纪要》视为林彪的主要政治对手。在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: An important political figure and a high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China during the Cultural Revolution. As a core member of the 'Gang of Four', he served as Director of the Shanghai Revolutionary Committee, Deputy Head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, Standing Committee Member of the CPC Central Committee Political Bureau, and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was also considered by the 'Project 571 Outline' as Lin Biao's main political rival. He was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省诸暨县直埠镇姚公埠村

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一。他曾任中央文革小组成员，是文革的理论旗手，并发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。与张春桥等人一同被《“571工程”纪要》称为“文人力量”。作为中国文化大革命时期的重要政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，他在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处有期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. He served as a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, was a theoretical standard-bearer of the Cultural Revolution, and published 'Critique of the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office''. Along with Zhang Chunqiao and others, he was referred to as the 'literati force' in the 'Project 571 Outline'. As an important political figure during China's Cultural Revolution and a former national deputy leader, he was sentenced to imprisonment in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 吉林省长春市绿园区西新镇开源村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市首都医科大学附属复兴医院

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，中国政治人物。曾任中共中央副主席、中共中央政治局常委等正国级领导职务。在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. He served as a national-level leader, including Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Standing Committee member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. He was sentenced to life imprisonment in the 'Lin Biao, Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques case'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东指定的接班人，在他逝世后，他与叶剑英、汪东兴等人联手策划并领导粉碎了“四人帮”，成为中华人民共和国最高领导人。作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，他在文化大革命结束后，曾兼任中共中央主席、国务院总理和中央军委主席，是至今唯一一位同时出任党政军三大最高领导职务的领导人。他提出了“两个凡是”的执政原则，后遭到胡耀邦等人的反对。在此期间，陈永贵曾劝说他不要让邓小平复出。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor. After Mao's death, he collaborated with Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing, and others to plan and lead the smashing of the 'Gang of Four', becoming the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. As a Chinese politician, after the Cultural Revolution, he simultaneously served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, making him the only leader to have held these three highest party, government, and military positions concurrently to date. He proposed the 'Two Whatevers' governing principle, which was later opposed by Hu Yaobang and others. During this period, Chen Yonggui once advised him not to allow Deng Xiaoping to return to power.

birth_place.zh-cn: 广东省嘉应直隶州雁洋

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元帅，中共元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创建者和缔造者之一。他曾与孙冶方在莫斯科中山大学同学。长征期间曾任红军前敌指挥部参谋长，在张国焘与毛泽东分裂时起关键作用。他曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央副主席、国防部部长等职。曾向中央和毛泽东呈交报告建议加强电子对抗工作，并成立总参四部。领导广东土改时因政策温和受毛泽东批评，其家族势力在广东曾有巨大影响。在“二月逆流”中对文化大革命进行抗争。在粉碎“四人帮”中起决定性作用，并提出设立台湾特别行政区的构想。他支持关于真理标准问题的讨论。他也是凌孜的父亲。
description.en: A Chinese politician, one of the founding marshals of the People's Republic of China, and a veteran of the Communist Party of China. He was a classmate of Sun Yefang at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University. During the Long March, he served as the Chief of Staff of the Red Army's Frontline Command and played a crucial role during the split between Zhang Guotao and Mao Zedong. He served as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and Minister of National Defense. He submitted a report to the Central Committee and Mao Zedong, proposing to strengthen electronic warfare capabilities and establish the Fourth Department of the General Staff. He was criticized by Mao Zedong for his moderate land reform policies in Guangdong, and his family's influence was significant in the region. He resisted the Cultural Revolution during the 'February Countercurrent'. He played a decisive role in the smashing of the Gang of Four, proposed establishing a special administrative region for Taiwan, and supported the discussion on the criterion of truth. He was also Ling Zi's father.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原正国级领导人，文化大革命时期重要人物。他曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中央警卫部队领导，直接参与并负责粉碎“四人帮”事件的具体执行，深度参与了怀仁堂事变。阎明复任中央办公厅翻译组组长后期，汪东兴是其直接上级。他也是“凡是派”的主要成员之一，支持“两个凡是”原则，并曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former state-level leader, and an important figure during the Cultural Revolution. He served as Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and led the Central Security Forces, directly participating in and responsible for the specific execution of smashing the 'Gang of Four' incident, including deep involvement in the Huairentang Incident. During the latter part of Yan Mingfu's tenure as head of the translation group of the General Office, Wang Dongxing was his direct superior. He was also one of the main members of the 'Whatever Faction', supporting the 'Two Whatevers' principle, and once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，也是一位书法家。曾任中共驻共产国际代表团副团长、中国共产党安全和情报部长、中共中央副主席、中央文革小组顾问。1949年2月山东军区重建后，担任政治委员。他是文化大革命的主要人物和关键支持者之一，四人帮集团主犯。他曾领导对陈独秀的攻击，并制造了“六十一人叛徒集团案”和“反党小说《刘志丹》案”。死后被认定为林彪、江青反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and also a calligrapher. He served as deputy head of the CCP delegation to the Comintern, Minister of Public Security, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group. After the re-establishment of the Shandong Military Region in February 1949, he served as its political commissar. He was a key figure and supporter of the Cultural Revolution and a principal culprit of the 'Gang of Four'. He led the smear campaign against Chen Duxiu and was a main fabricator of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades' and the 'Liu Zhidan Anti-Party Novel Case'. After his death, he was identified as one of the principal culprits of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques.

birth_place.zh-cn: 福建省泉州市惠安县洛阳镇梅岭村
birth_place.en: Meiling Village, Luoyang Town, Hui'an County, Quanzhou, Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前政治人物及理论家，原国家级正职领导人。曾长期担任毛泽东的政治秘书，并辅助陶铸起草《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》。在文化大革命期间，他担任中共中央政治局常委、中央文革小组组长，期间曾试图省略余秋里的名字但被毛泽东阻止。九届二中全会后被隔离审查，后被划入林彪反革命集团，也是四人帮主犯之一。
description.en: A former political figure and theorist of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level principal leader. He served as Mao Zedong's political secretary for a long time, and assisted Tao Zhu in drafting the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'. During the Cultural Revolution, he served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Politburo and Head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. At one point, he attempted to omit Yu Qiuli's name from a press release but was stopped by Mao Zedong. After the Second Plenary Session of the Ninth Central Committee, he was placed under isolation review and later classified as a member of the Lin Biao Counter-revolutionary Group and a principal offender of the Gang of Four.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 彭真，伟大的无产阶级革命家、政治家、杰出的国务活动家、坚定的马克思主义者，我国社会主义法制的主要奠基人，党和国家的卓越领导人之一，中共八大元老之一。曾任北京市委第一书记、文化革命五人小组组长。文化大革命初期被打倒，并在“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”中首当其冲。复出后，曾任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、宪法修改委员会副主任委员。阎明复任全国人大常委会副秘书长期间，彭真是其直接上级。
description.en: Peng Zhen was a great proletarian revolutionary, politician, outstanding statesman, staunch Marxist, and a principal founder of China's socialist legal system. He was one of the eminent leaders of the Party and state, and one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. He served as the First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee and head of the Five-Man Group for the Cultural Revolution. He was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, being the primary target in the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' case. After his rehabilitation, he served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Deputy Chairman of the Constitution Revision Committee. When Yan Mingfu served as Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee, Peng Zhen was his direct superior.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清四川省顺庆府南充县
birth_place.en: Nanchong County, Shunqing Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 西德巴登-符腾堡州海德堡

description.zh-cn: 无产阶级革命家、军事家、开国大将。曾任红一军团保卫局局长，中国共产党和中华人民共和国副国级领导人之一。历任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、中华人民共和国公安部首任部长、国防部副部长、解放军总参谋长等职。在文革初期被打倒，是“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”成员之一，被授予中国人民解放军大将军衔。
description.en: A proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and one of China's founding Generals, Luo Ruiqing was also a sub-national leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Director of the Security Bureau of the Red First Army Group, Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, the first Minister of Public Security of the PRC, Deputy Minister of National Defense, and Chief of the PLA General Staff, among other posts. He was purged in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution as a member of the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' and was awarded the rank of PLA General.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中宣部部长、国务院副总理。在文革初期被指控为“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”成员之一而被打倒。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was denounced as a member of the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' case during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清四川省潼川府遂宁县双江镇
birth_place.en: Shuangjiang Town, Suining County, Tongchuan Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Qing Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市中国人民解放军总医院
death_place.en: General Hospital of the People's Liberation Army, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、主要领导人之一、原国家级正职领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。他曾于1938年在延安与李富春等人合影，后接替其担任中共中央书记处办公厅主任，也曾任中共中央办公厅主任。文革初期被打倒。历任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军委副主席兼秘书长，是中共八大元老之一。他曾负责部署军队执行戒严；并以实际行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A Chinese politician, one of the paramount leaders, former national-level state leader, and high-ranking general of the People's Liberation Army. In 1938, he was photographed with Li Fuchun and others in Yan'an and later succeeded Li Fuchun as Director of the General Office of the Central Secretariat. He also served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution. His career also included serving as President of the People's Republic of China, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CPC. He was responsible for deploying troops for martial law and demonstrated support for abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝湖南省湘潭县石潭镇

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军创建者与领导者之一。早年与黄公略发动平江起义。历任红三军团长、八路军副总指挥、第一野战军司令员、国防部长，并作为中国人民志愿军首任司令员兼政委签署《朝鲜停战协定》。1959年庐山会议上因批评大跃进遭批判，文革中被迫害致死。其错误批判后被《历史决议》否定。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army. In his early years, he co-led the Pingjiang Uprising with Huang Gonglue. He successively served as commander of the 3rd Army Group of the Red Army, Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Eighth Route Army, Commander of the First Field Army, and Minister of National Defense. As the first Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, he signed the Korean Armistice Agreement. In 1959, he was criticized at the Lushan Conference for opposing the Great Leap Forward, and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution. The erroneous criticism against him was later negated by the 'Historical Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国工农红军与中国人民解放军的主要创始人之一。他领导了南昌起义，并担任起义军总指挥和第二十军军长。曾任红二方面军总指挥，是长征期间重要的军事领导人。建国后任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、中央军事委员会副主席，并主持修建了大田湾体育场。在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the principal founders of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the People's Liberation Army. He led the Nanchang Uprising, serving as the Commander-in-Chief of the insurgent forces and the Commander of the 20th Army. He also served as Commander-in-Chief of the Second Front Army, and was an important military leader during the Long March. After the founding of the PRC, he served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and presided over the construction of Datianwan Stadium. He was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委。他曾被毛泽东派往广东以激进方式推进土地改革，并在当地担任主要领导职务。后曾任中央文革小组顾问，并主持《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草工作。在文化大革命中被打倒并迫害致死。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. He was sent by Mao Zedong to Guangdong to radically advance land reform, holding major leadership positions there. Later, he served as an advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group and presided over the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'. He was overthrown and persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 明史学家、中国历史学家，因其剧作《海瑞罢官》在文革初期受到批判，被迫害致死。北京市副市长。
中国近现代小说家、散文家、剧作家，被广泛认为是中国近现代文学的代表人物。在文革初期因不堪迫害而投湖自尽。
中国著名翻译家，在文革初期与夫人一同自尽。

中国共产党和中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人之一，著名政治家。曾任中共中央主席，并于1982年恢复后首任中共中央总书记，也是胡锦涛的政治导师之一。文革后，他与邓小平主导“拨乱反正”，审定《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》，平反冤假错案，起草历史决议。他大力推动改革开放，支持废除干部终身制，曾批评陈永贵大寨模式“劳民伤财”。他邀请周扬在中央党校作报告，平息周扬因“异化论”受批判的风波。1986年因处理八六学潮被批评后辞职。其逝世是六四事件导火索，引发《世界经济导报》停刊事件。
description.en: One of the second generation of principal leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a prominent politician. He served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and was the first General Secretary after the post was reinstated in 1982, and was also one of Hu Jintao's political mentors. After the Cultural Revolution, he co-led the "Boluan Fanzheng" with Deng Xiaoping, approved "Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth," redressed unjust cases, and drafted the historical resolution. He vigorously promoted reform and opening up, supporting the abolition of lifelong tenure for cadres. He criticized Chen Yonggui's Dazhai model as "wasting manpower and resources." He invited Zhou Yang to give a report at the Central Party School and quelled the criticism against Zhou over the "alienation" issue. He resigned in 1986 after being criticized for handling the 1986 student demonstrations. His death was a catalyst for the Tiananmen Square protests, sparking the shutdown of the "World Economic Herald".

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人、政治人物，中国改革派领导人。曾任国务院总理（1980年9月接替华国锋）和中共中央总书记。早期被毛泽东派往广东参与土地改革，并参与起草《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》。在胡耀邦辞职后代理中共中央总书记，期间限制了“反对资产阶级自由化”运动。文革后支持改革开放。在六四事件中，因同情学生运动、反对戒严被免职并长期软禁。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang, a former major leader, political figure, and reformist leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He served as Premier of the State Council (succeeding Hua Guofeng in September 1980) and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. Early in his career, he participated in land reform in Guangdong and was involved in drafting the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'. After Hu Yaobang's resignation, he acted as General Secretary, limiting the 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign'. He supported reform and opening up after the Cultural Revolution. During the Tiananmen Square incident, he was dismissed and placed under long-term house arrest for sympathizing with student movements and opposing martial law.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中国共产党第五代中央领导集体核心，也是中华人民共和国最高领导人。他是习仲勋的次子，被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。自2012年起担任国家最高领导人，任内通过修宪取消国家主席任期限制，提出“一带一路”倡议，签署《香港国安法》，并推动反腐运动。何毅亭被视为其嫡系亲信和文胆之一。他曾是清华大学1979届工程化学系校友。
description.en: He is the current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, serving as the core figure of the fifth generation of central leadership and the supreme leader of the PRC. He is the second son of Xi Zhongxun and is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. Since 2012, he has been the paramount leader, overseeing a constitutional amendment that removed presidential term limits, proposing the 'Belt and Road' initiative, signing the Hong Kong National Security Law, and advancing an anti-corruption campaign. He Yiting is considered one of his trusted confidants and key advisors. He is an alumnus of Tsinghua University's Department of Chemical Engineering, class of 1979.

en: Member of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1921年由陈独秀、李大钊等人创立，以列宁主义为指导，领导无产阶级专政。作为中华苏维埃共和国的创建者及执政党，在国共内战胜利后建立了中华人民共和国。该党领导了南昌起义、长征、土地改革等重大历史事件，并促成西安事变后的第二次国共合作。在毛泽东领导下，曾因反对赫鲁晓夫报告导致中苏关系恶化。它是中华人民共和国的执政党，曾主导对法轮功的镇压，并曾将萧美琴列入“台独”份子制裁名单。钱学森于1959年正式加入该党，早期重要成员包括张太雷、李达、艾跃进、黄公略，孙冶方于1924年加入。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party, founded in 1921 by Chen Duxiu, Li Dazhao, and others, guides the dictatorship of the proletariat based on Leninism. As the founder and ruling party of the Chinese Soviet Republic, it established the People's Republic of China after its victory in the Chinese Civil War. The party led significant historical events such as the Nanchang Uprising, the Long March, and land reform, and facilitated the Second United Front after the Xi'an Incident. Under Mao Zedong's leadership, its opposition to Khrushchev's report led to a deterioration of Sino-Soviet relations. It is the ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, having spearheaded the suppression of Falun Gong and placed Hsiao Bi-khim on a sanctions list for 'Taiwan independence' elements. Qian Xuesen formally joined the party in 1959, and early key members included Zhang Tailei, Li Da, Ai Yuejin, Huang Gunglue, with Sun Yefang joining in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间由青年学生组成的大规模群众运动。

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区钓鱼台国宾馆

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，它是中国共产党的最高领导机构之一，也是文化大革命的实际指挥和最高权力机构。它取代了中央政治局和中央书记处的职能，并表态支持全国大串连。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, it served as one of the highest leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party, functioning as the actual command and supreme power institution of the movement. It effectively replaced the functions of the Politburo and the Secretariat, and publicly supported the Great Networking movement.

en: Three Years of Great Chinese Famine

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国于1959年至1961年间因三面红旗运动而发生全国性饥荒的一段时期，部分学者也将1958年、1962年划入饥荒时期。此次大饥荒共造成中国大陆（包括陕西省）1500万至5500万人的非正常死亡，被广泛视为人类历史上规模最大的饥荒之一，并导致毛泽东退居二线。此后，李富春提出了“八字方针”以调整国民经济。
description.en: Refers to a period of nationwide famine in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961, caused by the Three Red Banners movement. Some scholars also include the years 1958 and 1962 in this famine period. The Great Famine caused 15 to 55 million excess deaths in mainland China, including a significant number in Shaanxi province, and is widely regarded as one of the largest famines in human history. This famine also led to Mao Zedong's semi-retirement. Afterwards, Li Fuchun proposed the 'Eight-Character Policy' to adjust the national economy.

location.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国温都尔汗

description.zh-cn: 1971年9月13日，中共中央副主席林彪及其家人乘坐256号三叉戟飞机，从海航五师所辖的山海关机场强行起飞，意图叛逃苏联。飞机在蒙古温都尔汗坠毁，机上人员全部遇难，标志着林彪集团的覆灭。此次政治事件对中国政局产生深远影响，梁兴初等人因此受到牵连。
description.en: On September 13, 1971, Lin Biao, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and his family forcibly took off from Shanhaiguan Airport, which was under the jurisdiction of the Naval Aviation 5th Division, in a Trident jet (No. 256), attempting to defect to the Soviet Union. The plane crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, killing everyone on board, marking the demise of the Lin Biao group. This political event had a profound impact on Chinese politics and implicated figures such as Liang Xingchu.

description.zh-cn: 1976年清明节期间，在北京天安门广场发生的，以悼念周恩来、抗议“四人帮”为主题的大规模群众自发抗议运动，后被定性为反革命事件。
description.en: A large-scale spontaneous mass protest movement that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, during the Qingming Festival in 1976, centered on mourning Zhou Enlai and protesting the 'Gang of Four'. It was later characterized as a counter-revolutionary incident.

en: Arrest of the Gang of Four
Smashing of the Gang of Four

description.zh-cn: 1976年10月6日，由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋、中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人策划发动，在北京市中南海怀仁堂拘捕“四人帮”及其在北京的骨干成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event planned by Hua Guofeng, then First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Ye Jianying, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Wang Dongxing, Director of the CCP General Office, to arrest the Gang of Four and their associates.

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，由邓小平倡导并启动，中华人民共和国于1978年12月中共十一届三中全会起推行的一项以经济建设为中心，对内改革、对外开放的社会经济政策与运动。真理标准大讨论奠定了思想基础，带来了思想解放。习仲勋是其重要的开拓者之一。期间，中国人民银行的职能发生重大转变。此政策也为后来的八六学潮提供了宏观背景。
description.en: Following the Cultural Revolution, initiated and advocated by Deng Xiaoping, this socio-economic policy and movement, focused on economic development, internal reform, and external opening, was implemented by the People's Republic of China starting in December 1978 at the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP. The 'Discussion on the Criterion for Truth' laid its ideological groundwork, fostering intellectual liberation. Xi Zhongxun was an important pioneer of this policy. During this period, the functions of the People's Bank of China underwent significant changes. This policy also provided the macro context for the later 1986 student demonstrations.

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
最高人民法院特别法庭
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques
Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques
Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques
Special Court of the Supreme People's Court
Trial of the Gang of Four and the Lin Biao Counter-Revolutionary Clique
Trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques
Trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院专门设立特别法庭，对林彪、江青两个反革命集团案的10名主犯进行公开审判。林彪集团和四人帮是文化大革命后，中华人民共和国政府对该反革命集团的官方称谓。
description.en: The Special Tribunal of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China was specifically established for the public trial of the ten principal offenders from the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques. The Lin Biao clique and the Gang of Four was the official designation by the PRC government for this counter-revolutionary group after the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 民主柬埔寨（红色高棉）时期，由柬埔寨红色高棉政权进行的大规模屠杀事件，受中国文革影响。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会通知

description.zh-cn: 全称《中国共产党中央委员会通知》，是中共中央政治局扩大会议于1966年5月16日通过的纲领性文件，标志着文化大革命的全面发动。
description.en: Titled 'Circular of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China', this programmatic document was adopted by an enlarged meeting of the CPC Central Committee Political Bureau on May 16, 1966, marking the full-scale launch of the Cultural Revolution.

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China
Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1981年6月27日，由中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第六次全体会议通过的历史决议，是中共中央对中华人民共和国建国以来的若干重大历史问题（特别是文化大革命）及重要历史人物（如毛泽东）作出的官方定论文件和总结评价。该决议全面否定文化大革命，并对毛泽东的功过进行了评价，认定他在文革中犯有严重错误。该决议是“拨乱反正”运动的一部分，标志着中国共产党在指导思想上的“拨乱反正”的完成。
description.en: Passed on June 27, 1981, by the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th CPC Central Committee, this historical resolution is the official document from the CPC Central Committee that provides definitive conclusions and summary evaluations of major historical issues (especially the Cultural Revolution) and important historical figures (such as Mao Zedong) since the founding of the People's Republic of China. It fully repudiated the Cultural Revolution, evaluated Mao Zedong's merits and demerits, and concluded that he made serious errors during it. This resolution was part of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' movement, marking the completion of this process in terms of the Party's guiding ideology.

zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 苏联最高领导人，长期任苏共中央总书记和苏联部长会议主席。他强烈支持金日成成为朝鲜最高领导人。其领导共产国际的政策被陈独秀视为1927年中国大革命失败主因。二战时作为同盟国“三巨头”之一，承诺对日作战，苏联出兵对日本投降影响重大。为扩大东亚影响力，他与中国签订新同盟条约并助建人民大学。其主导政策被认为是乌克兰大饥荒的直接原因。他的著作《苏联社会主义经济问题》曾被孙冶方系统性质疑。赫鲁晓夫对其的全盘否定，是中苏论战及文革的重要背景。
description.en: Soviet supreme leader, who served for a long time as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Council of Ministers. He strongly supported Kim Il-sung to become the supreme leader of North Korea. His leadership and policies regarding the Comintern were considered by Chen Duxiu as a major cause for the failure of the 1927 Chinese Revolution. During World War II, as one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders, he promised to enter the war against Japan, and the Soviet intervention significantly impacted Japan's surrender. To expand influence in East Asia, he signed a new alliance treaty with China and helped establish Renmin University. His dominant policies are considered the direct cause of the Holodomor in Ukraine. His work 'Economic Problems of Socialism in the USSR' was systematically questioned by Sun Yefang. Khrushchev's complete repudiation of him was an important background for the Sino-Soviet split and the Cultural Revolution.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
中国共产党中央执行委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Central Executive Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会于1927年由中央执行委员会改组而来，是党的最高领导机构和中央权力机关。它通过全国代表大会选举产生中央政治局、常务委员会和总书记。该机构曾参与中日建交决策，发布大串连通知，于1947年批准公布《中国土地法大纲》，1979年为《刘志丹》案平反，2002年批准神舟五号飞行方案。此外，它还设立并管理中央外事小组及中央外事工作领导小组及其办公室。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, restructured in 1927 from the Central Executive Committee, serves as the Party's highest leading body and central authority. It elects the Political Bureau, its Standing Committee, and the General Secretary through the National Congress. This body has participated in decision-making for Japan-China relations, issued notices regarding the Great Networking movement, approved and promulgated the 'Outline Land Law of China' in 1947, rehabilitated the 'Liu Zhidan' case in 1979, and approved the flight plan for Shenzhou 5 in 2002. Furthermore, it established and manages the Central Foreign Affairs Small Group and the Central Leading Group for Foreign Affairs, along with their respective offices.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东领导的中国共产党在中华人民共和国发动的政治、经济及社会运动，旨在利用国家行政力量，通过农业和工业的平行增长，快速实现工业化和集体化，将国家从以农业为主的经济体转型成为一个现代化的共产主义社会，并试图实现超英赶美的目标。运动包括大炼钢铁、人民公社化等。期间，钱学森曾发表文章论证“亩产万斤”的可能性，对运动产生影响。然而，这场脱离现实的“跃进”最终导致了严重的经济困难、环境破坏和大饥荒，是三年困难时期的主要原因之一。
description.en: A political, economic, and social movement initiated by Mao Zedong and the Chinese Communist Party in the People's Republic of China. It aimed to rapidly industrialize and collectivize the country, transforming it from an agrarian economy into a modern communist society by utilizing state administrative power and achieving parallel growth in agriculture and industry, with the goal of surpassing the UK and US. Key components included the Great Steel Smelting and the People's Communes. During this period, Qian Xuesen published an article arguing for the possibility of '10,000 jin per mu' yields, which influenced the movement. However, this unrealistic 'Great Leap Forward' ultimately led to severe economic difficulties, environmental damage, and a great famine, being one of the main causes of the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: “走资本主义道路的当权派”的简称，是文革中用于攻击党政领导干部的罪名。

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代至1990年代间，在中国共产党第一代领导集体退下后，以邓小平为首，在中华人民共和国政治决策中拥有实际最高决策权并主导中国政治的一批中国共产党元老。这批人通常被认为是八位或更多位中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的元老。其中，许多人曾反对胡耀邦的改革，习仲勋也是其中之一。
description.en: Refers to a group of veteran members of the Communist Party of China who, led by Deng Xiaoping, held actual supreme decision-making power and dominated Chinese politics in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s, after the first generation of CPC leadership stepped down. This group is often referred to as eight or more veterans of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. Many among them opposed Hu Yaobang's reforms, and Xi Zhongxun was one of them.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东思想理论体系，以毛泽东的名字命名，是中国共产党的指导思想之一，也是由毛泽东发展的马克思列宁主义理论。它由以毛泽东为主要代表的中国共产党人，总结中国长期革命和建设实践经验而形成。其活的灵魂包括实事求是、群众路线、独立自主。马克龙曾在采访中自称为“毛泽东主义者”。
description.en: Mao Zedong Thought, named after Mao Zedong, is one of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, and a variant of Marxism–Leninism developed by Mao Zedong. It was formed by Chinese Communists, with Mao Zedong as their main representative, who summarized the experiences from China's long-term revolution and construction practices. Its living soul includes seeking truth from facts, the mass line, and independence. Macron described himself as a 'Maoist' in an interview.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在广西壮族自治区发生的一系列系统性大屠杀，并伴有食人事件。
description.en: A series of systematic massacres that occurred in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution, accompanied by incidents of cannibalism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，革命家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国开国元帅。他曾任红三军政治委员、新四军军长、山东军区司令员、在鲁南战役中任山东野战军司令员、华东军区及华东野战军司令员、上海市市长、国务院副总理兼外交部部长，并担任首任中央外事小组组长和国务院外事办公室主任。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地，在“二月逆流”中反对文革，并长期担任粟裕的直接领导和政治搭档。其担任外交部长期间，曾提出“核裤论”并引发《明报》批评。
description.en: Chen Yi was one of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a revolutionary, military strategist, and diplomat, and a founding Marshal of the PRC. He served as Political Commissar of the Third Red Army, Commander of the New Fourth Army, Commander of the Shandong Military Region, Commander of the Shandong Field Army during the Lunan Campaign, Commander of the East China Military Region and East China Field Army, Mayor of Shanghai, Vice Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs. He was also the first leader of the Central Foreign Affairs Small Group and Director of the State Council Foreign Affairs Office. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base, opposed the Cultural Revolution during the 'February Countercurrent', and was a long-term direct leader and political partner of Su Yu. During his tenure as Foreign Minister, his 'nuclear weapons over pants' theory drew criticism from Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家、高级领导人，中国人民解放军高级将领，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任红十二军政治委员、国务院副总理，并担任第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。他在“二月逆流”中反对文化大革命。
description.en: A Chinese Communist revolutionary and senior leader, a high-ranking general of the People's Liberation Army, and a politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Political Commissar of the Twelfth Red Army, a Vice Premier of the State Council, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He opposed the Cultural Revolution during the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1955年授予建国元勋的最高军衔。

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiang Village, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，开国元勋，原副国级领导人，邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一。他曾任国务院副总理、中央顾问委员会常务副主任（长期主持日常工作）、中央人民政府财政部部长等职务。作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一、二、三代主要领导人之一，他曾是“六十一人叛徒集团案”主要受害者，在文化大革命中被打倒监禁。他以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制，是薄熙来和薄小莹的父亲。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a founding father of the PRC, and a former deputy national leader. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's administration. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Executive Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission (presiding over its daily work for a long time), and Minister of Finance of the Central People's Government. As one of the main leaders of the first, second, and third generations of the CCP and PRC, he was a principal victim of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades' and was imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution. He supported the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement, and was the father of Bo Xilai and Bo Xiaoying.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国是自1949年起由中国共产党执政的东亚社会主义国家。建国初期参与朝鲜战争，1979年与美国建交。其历史在《历史决议》中总结，“文革”是严重挫折。此后实现载人航天，1997年恢复对香港主权，并成为金砖国家创始成员。在李登辉总统任内，曾在台湾海峡举行军事演习，试图影响台湾选举。它面临网络审查、支持俄罗斯、压制异见等争议；在黎笋执政期间，因其亲苏立场、排华政策与越南关系紧张，并将突厥斯坦伊斯兰党视为主要恐怖威胁。
description.en: The People's Republic of China is an East Asian socialist country governed by the Chinese Communist Party since 1949. In its early years, it participated in the Korean War and established diplomatic relations with the US in 1979. Its history, summarized in the 'Historical Resolution', identifies the 'Cultural Revolution' as a severe setback. Achievements include human spaceflight, the 1997 resumption of Hong Kong sovereignty, and becoming a founding member of BRICS. During Lee Teng-hui's presidency, it conducted military exercises in the Taiwan Strait to influence Taiwan's elections. It faces controversies such as internet censorship, support for Russia, and suppression of dissent; during Lê Duẩn's rule, its relationship with Vietnam was tense due to his pro-Soviet stance and anti-Chinese policies. It also considers the Turkistan Islamic Party a major terrorist threat.

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月中旬，由胡耀邦去世引发的、高校学生发起的民主示威运动持续近两个月，广义上波及中华人民共和国全境，狭义上特指发生在北京天安门广场的示威及随后于6月4日凌晨的武力清场。清华大学有大量学生参与，并有学生在事件中伤亡。这场政治风波导致时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳被撤职，第一代团派势力遭到清洗，并深刻影响了司徒华和陈子明等人的政治立场与个人命运。八六学潮被认为是其前奏。
description.en: Beginning in mid-April 1989, student-led pro-democracy demonstrations, triggered by the death of Hu Yaobang, lasted nearly two months. Broadly, these referred to protests across the People's Republic of China; more specifically, they denoted the demonstrations in Beijing's Tiananmen Square and the subsequent military crackdown on the morning of June 4. A large number of Tsinghua University students participated, with some killed or injured. This political turmoil led to the dismissal of then CPC General Secretary Zhao Ziyang and the purge of the first-generation Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), profoundly influencing the political stances and personal fates of figures like Szeto Wah and Chen Ziming. The 1986 student demonstrations are considered its precursor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，78级大学生，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。在中共二十届一中全会后成为排名第二的中共中央政治局常委。曾任中共上海市委书记、浙江省省长（蔡奇曾任其副手），以及中共江苏省委书记。吴政隆现任其国务院秘书长，此前曾任江苏省省长。据报道，他曾说服马云回国。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the Class of 1978, currently serving as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He became the second-ranked member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee after the First Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee. He previously served as Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, Governor of Zhejiang Province (where Cai Qi served as his deputy), and Party Secretary of Jiangsu Province. Wu Zhenglong now serves as his Secretary-General in the State Council, having previously served as Governor of Jiangsu. He reportedly persuaded Jack Ma to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党高级领导人。现任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、中共中央政治局常委，并与蔡奇同为中央国家安全委员会副主席。曾任中共中央纪委书记、中共中央组织部部长、中共青海省委书记、中共陕西省委书记等职。与弟弟赵乐秦并称“陕西二赵”。
description.en: Chinese politician and a high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China. He currently serves as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, and serves alongside Cai Qi as a Vice Chairman of the Central National Security Commission. His former roles include Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, Party Secretary of Qinghai Province, and Party Secretary of Shaanxi Province. He and his brother Zhao Leqin are known as the 'Two Zhaos of Shaanxi'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，中国共产党中央政治局常委。现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席（接替汪洋），曾任中央书记处第一书记（蔡奇的前任），并担任中共二十大秘书长。他也是一名78级研究生，与何毅亭、江金权并称为习近平的文胆。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the principal leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He is currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (succeeding Wang Yang). He previously served as First Secretary of the Central Secretariat (predecessor to Cai Qi) and Secretary-General of the 20th CPC National Congress. He was also a postgraduate student of the Class of 1978, and is known as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors, along with He Yiting and Jiang Jinquan.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区人民大会堂

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关和国家立法机关，负责选举和罢免最高人民法院院长。

1919年5月4日发生于中国北京的爱国运动，以青年学生为主体，广泛吸引了包括朱自清、张太雷在内的公民、市民和工商人士参与。这场反帝反封建运动，形式涵盖示威、请愿、罢课、罢工及暴力对抗政府。其爆发源于巴黎和会山东问题及北洋政府外交失败。学生们尤其针对章宗祥、曹汝霖、陆宗舆等亲日官员。运动最终迫使北洋政府拒签《凡尔赛条约》并罢免亲日官员，对中国近代史影响深远，推动了新文化运动，使西学思想深入，并影响了如柯仲平等人的早期思想。
description.en: A patriotic, anti-imperialist and anti-feudal movement that took place in Beijing, China, on May 4, 1919. Primarily led by young students, it also saw broad participation from citizens, merchants, and other social strata, including notably Zhu Ziqing and Zhang Tailei. The movement encompassed demonstrations, petitions, student and worker strikes, and violent confrontations with the government. It erupted due to the Shandong question at the Paris Peace Conference and the Beiyang government's diplomatic failure. Students specifically targeted pro-Japanese officials like Zhang Zongxiang, Cao Rulin, and Lu Zongyu. The movement ultimately compelled the Beiyang government to refuse to sign the Treaty of Versailles and dismiss these pro-Japanese officials, profoundly impacting modern Chinese history, advancing the New Culture Movement, deepening the reception of Western thought, and influencing the early ideas of figures like Ke Zhongping.

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃人民共和国
中华苏维埃共和国中央执行委员会
中华苏维埃共和国临时中央政府
en: Central Executive Committee of the Chinese Soviet Republic

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间，于其革命根据地建立的苏维埃政权。该政权在苏联和共产国际的支持下，主张推翻国民政府，实现社会主义和共产主义。向忠发曾提名毛泽东担任其临时中央政府主席。
description.en: A soviet regime established by the Chinese Communist Party in its revolutionary base areas during the First KMT-CCP Civil War. With the support of the Soviet Union and the Comintern, the regime advocated for overthrowing the Nationalist Government to achieve socialism and communism. Xiang Zhongfa once nominated Mao Zedong to serve as the chairman of its provisional central government.

zh-cn: 国家社会主义中华劳工党党卫队

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期的主要武装力量，由中国工农红军、八路军和新四军改编而来。后成为中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量，建军节定于8月1日以纪念南昌起义。该部队曾计划进攻台湾（后因朝鲜战争放弃），也曾执行六四戒严和清场任务。1998年洪灾期间，大批官兵被调动参与抗洪抢险，被官方誉为“九八抗洪”的中坚力量。倪匡年轻时曾加入其华东公安部队。
description.en: The main armed force of the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Chinese Civil War, reorganized from the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, Eighth Route Army, and New Fourth Army. It later became the primary national armed force of the People's Republic of China, with its Army Day set on August 1 to commemorate the Nanchang Uprising. This force had planned to attack Taiwan (later abandoned due to the Korean War) and also carried out martial law and clearing operations on June Fourth. During the 1998 floods, a large number of its officers and soldiers were mobilized to participate in flood fighting and rescue, hailed by the state as the backbone of the '98 flood fighting' campaign. Ni Kuang joined its East China Public Security Force in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的战争。它是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的军事冲突，一方为朝鲜、中国人民志愿军，另一方为韩国、美国领导的联合国军（含美国第七舰队）。此战作为冷战时期区域性冲突，导致美国介入台湾海峡阻止解放军攻台，并持续影响战后局势。战争最终以《朝鲜停战协定》签署告终，未签订和平条约。毛泽东认为，中国此战表现赢得了苏联信任，从而获得更多援助与合作。于永波曾作为中国人民志愿军一员参与此战。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953. It was a military conflict between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea. On one side were North Korea and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, and on the other were South Korea and a United Nations force led by the United States (including the U.S. Seventh Fleet). This conflict, a regional clash during the Cold War, led to U.S. intervention in the Taiwan Strait, preventing the PLA's plan to invade Taiwan, and continued to influence the region's post-war situation. The war ended with the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, but no peace treaty was signed. Mao Zedong believed that China's performance in this war won the trust of the Soviet Union, leading to more aid and cooperation. Yu Yongbo participated in this war as a member of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的全球性国际政府间组织，于二战后成立，旨在促进国际合作、防止未来冲突。加拿大是其创始国之一，美国总统罗斯福是其关键推动者。自1971年联合国大会第2758号决议通过后，由中华人民共和国政府代表“中国”席位。慕沙希淡曾担任马来西亚驻该组织的代表。其大会多次通过决议谴责俄罗斯的入侵行为。
description.en: A global international intergovernmental organization composed of sovereign states, founded after World War II, aiming to promote international cooperation and prevent future conflicts. Canada was one of its founding members, and U.S. President Roosevelt was a key proponent. Since the passage of UN General Assembly Resolution 2758 in 1971, the 'China' seat has been represented by the government of the People's Republic of China. Musa Hitam once served as Malaysia's representative to the organization. Its General Assembly has passed multiple resolutions condemning Russia's invasion.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民是中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，1989年至2002年中国的实际最高领导人，中共第三代中央领导集体核心。他曾任上海市委书记，六四后接任中共中央总书记、国家主席和中央军委主席，并曾担任中央国家安全工作领导小组组长。主政期间，他延续废除干部终身制，提出985工程，并在1998年特大洪水期间指挥抗洪救灾。他曾为中国科学技术大学四十周年校庆题词，并于1999年7月主导了对法轮功的全面镇压。卸任总书记和国家主席后，他仍任中央军委主席。
description.en: Jiang Zemin was a former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and China's paramount leader from 1989 to 2002, serving as the core figure of the CCP's third generation of central leadership. He served as Shanghai Party Secretary, and after the June Fourth incident, succeeded as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He also served as the leader of the Central Leading Group for National Security Affairs. During his tenure, he continued the abolition of lifelong tenure for cadres, proposed the '985 Project', and led flood relief efforts during the severe floods of 1998. He wrote an inscription for the 40th anniversary of the University of Science and Technology of China and in July 1999, he led a full-scale suppression of Falun Gong. After stepping down as General Secretary and President, he remained Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 负责监管国家之间贸易规则，并监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛，中国共产党第四代主要领导人、中央领导集体核心人物、第二代团派核心。他于2002年至2012年任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席，系习近平前任，清华大学1965届校友。任期内，他曾任命马凯为国家发改委主任，亲临神舟五号发射，颁布《治安管理处罚法》，主持调查陈良宇，为胡耀邦平反。何毅亭曾多次陪同其外出调研。2012年，胡锦涛卸任所有党政军职务，实现“裸退”，完善了废除干部领导职务终身制的实践。
description.en: Hu Jintao, the fourth-generation paramount leader of the Communist Party of China, a core figure of its central leadership, and the core of the second-generation Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). From 2002 to 2012, he served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He preceded Xi Jinping and is an alumnus of Tsinghua University's class of 1965. During his tenure, he appointed Ma Kai as the Director of the NDRC, personally attended the launch of Shenzhou 5, promulgated the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law,' presided over the investigation of Chen Liangyu, and rehabilitated Hu Yaobang. He Yiting accompanied him on several inspection tours. In 2012, Hu Jintao relinquished all party, government, and military positions in a 'naked retirement,' perfecting the practice of abolishing lifelong tenure for cadres.

birth_place.zh-cn: 天津市北辰区宜兴埠镇

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。1998年洪水期间任国家防汛抗旱总指挥部总指挥。后任国务院总理，领导抗洪与抗震救灾，并任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官。他曾是张庆伟和马凯等多位高级官员的上级。任内因宏观调控政策与陈良宇产生矛盾，并反对薄熙来晋升。温云松之父。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He served as a member of the CPC Central Committee Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. During the 1998 floods, he was Commander-in-Chief of the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters. He later became Premier of the State Council, leading flood and earthquake relief efforts, and appointed Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong. He was a superior to many senior officials, including Zhang Qingwei and Ma Kai. During his tenure, he had conflicts with then-Shanghai Party Secretary Chen Liangyu over macroeconomic control policies and opposed Bo Xilai's promotion. He is the father of Wen Yunsong.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市
birth_place.en: Hefei, Anhui, People's Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市浦东新区
death_place.en: Pudong, Shanghai, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 李克强，中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，团派主要成员。曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院总理，原正国级领导人。他被视为改革派学者型官员，其经济思想被称为“李克强经济学”。作为1977级大学生，曾任第十一届国务院副总理（与回良玉同任）。在国务院任职期间，曾是马凯上级并提名其为副总理。他在任总理期间推广“一带一路”倡议，被国际媒体评价为中国近代最弱势的总理之一。
description.en: Li Keqiang was a political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, a former national-level leader. Regarded as a reform-minded, scholar-type official, his economic philosophy was known as 'Likonomics'. A Class of 1977 university student, he also served as Vice Premier of the 11th State Council (alongside Hui Liangyu). During his tenure in the State Council, he was Ma Kai's superior and nominated him for Vice Premier. He promoted the 'Belt and Road' initiative during his premiership and was rated by international media as one of the weakest premiers in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府于2013年倡议并主导的国际经济合作倡议（由习近平提出），旨在加强区域互联互通，并形成跨国经济带。
description.en: An international economic cooperation initiative proposed and led by the People's Republic of China government in 2013 (initiated by Xi Jinping), aiming to strengthen regional connectivity and form transnational economic belts.

zh-cn: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国倡议设立的多边开发银行，为“一带一路”等亚洲基建项目提供资金。

zh-cn: 严重特殊传染性肺炎疫情

description.zh-cn: 由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）所引发的全球大流行疫情，被定性为全球性重大突发公共卫生事件。在此期间，中国地方政府曾引用《治安管理处罚法》中关于“紧急状态”的条款实施疫情防控措施，故宫也于2020年初一度关闭。此外，李洪志对此发表言论，称病毒是针对中共而来，并宣称中国已有数亿人因此死亡。
description.en: A global pandemic of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), designated as a major global public health emergency. During this period, local governments in China cited the 'state of emergency' clause in the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law' to implement pandemic control measures, and the Forbidden City was temporarily closed in early 2020. Additionally, Li Hongzhi commented on the pandemic, stating the virus targeted the CCP and claiming that hundreds of millions of people had died from it in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国为应对2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）大流行，由中国共产党主导实施了一系列严格的公共卫生防控政策。据披露的录音，电影导演王家卫对此政策持批评态度。
description.en: A series of strict public health prevention and control policies implemented by the People's Republic of China, led by the Communist Party of China, in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. According to a leaked recording, film director Wong Kar-wai was critical of this policy.

description.zh-cn: 由中国、俄罗斯等国发起的欧亚政治、经济和安全组织。
金砖国家合作机制由巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国、南非、埃及、埃塞俄比亚、伊朗和阿联酋等新兴市场国家组成，是世界经济增长的主要动力之一。
description.en: The BRICS cooperation mechanism, comprising emerging market countries such as Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa, Egypt, Ethiopia, Iran, and the United Arab Emirates, is one of the main drivers of global economic growth.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
en: 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China
Constitution of the People's Republic of China (1954)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一部宪法，该法案的通过使国务院取代了原政务院的行政职能。
description.en: The first constitution of the People's Republic of China. Its adoption led to the State Council replacing the Government Administration Council's administrative functions.

en: Constituent departments of the State Council
Constituent Department of the State Council
Constituent Departments of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 国务院组成部门是中华人民共和国国务院的组成机构类别，属于职能机构分类，承担国务院的基本行政管理职能。
description.en: The constituent departments of the State Council are a category of constituent bodies of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, belonging to a classification of functional bodies, and undertaking the basic administrative functions of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、前领导人，曾任国务院副总理，也是一位农业政策专家。他支持“三自一包”等农业改革政策，在1962年北戴河会议上受到毛泽东批判并被降职。他也是“五马进京”事件核心人物之一。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and was an agricultural policy expert. He supported agricultural reform policies such as 'Sanzi Yibao', which led to criticism and demotion by Mao Zedong at the 1962 Beidaihe Conference. He was also one of the core figures in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident.

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省归化城土默特塔布村
birth_place.en: Tabu Village, Guihuacheng Tumd, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫，蒙古族，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人、政治人物，原正国级领导人，有“蒙古王”之称。他曾任中国人民解放军开国上将、中华人民共和国副主席、全国人大常委会副委员长、国务院副总理、中共中央统战部部长等职。作为中华人民共和国历史上官阶最高的少数民族人士，他领导完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定，并曾在文革中被打倒。
description.en: Ulanhu, an ethnic Mongol, was a senior leader and politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, holding former national-level leadership positions and known as the 'Mongol King'. He was a founding General of the People's Liberation Army, serving as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Vice Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee. As the highest-ranking ethnic minority official in the history of the PRC, he led the formulation of the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy' and was purged during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原正国级领导人。他曾任国务院副总理、重工业部部长、中共中央办公厅主任，也是国家计划委员会主任（余秋里在该职位上的前任）和中共中央政治局常委。作为中国社会主义经济建设的奠基人之一，他因二月逆流事件在文化大革命期间受到迫害。
description.en: A politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level leader. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Heavy Industry, Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, and was also the Director of the State Planning Commission (Yu Qiuli's predecessor in this role) and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee. As one of the founders of China's socialist economic construction, he was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution for his involvement in the February Countercurrent.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原正国级领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席，并于1981年起担任恢复后的中央外事工作领导小组组长。他是中共八大元老之一，在文化大革命中受到冲击，曾与李富春等抗争。后参与策划粉碎四人帮事件，并支持真理标准讨论。阎明复任全国政协副主席期间，他曾是阎明复的直接上级。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China politician, former national-level leader, and senior general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the National People's Political Consultative Conference, and from 1981, he also served as the leader of the restored Central Leading Group for Foreign Affairs. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. He was purged during the Cultural Revolution and, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted it. He later participated in the planning to crush the Gang of Four and supported the discussion on the criterion of truth. He was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省江津县吴滩乡石院子

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的军事家、革命家和政治家，十大元帅之一。他曾长期担任红一军团政治委员，后任北京市市长、国务院副总理、第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。他还担任过粟裕的前任代总参谋长、兼平津卫戍司令。他曾在政治运动中批判粟裕，并与李富春等人在“二月逆流”事件中抗争文化大革命。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, a military strategist, revolutionary, and politician of the People's Liberation Army, and one of the Ten Marshals of the PRC. He served for a long period as the Political Commissar of the Red First Army Group, and later as Mayor of Beijing, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He also served as the predecessor of Su Yu as Acting Chief of the General Staff, concurrently as Commander of the Peiping-Tientsin Garrison Command. He criticized Su Yu during political movements and, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，曾任中共上海市委第一书记、上海市市长、国务院副总理。他曾向刘少奇建议将在押干部保释出狱。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China, he served as the First Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Mayor of Shanghai, and Vice Premier of the State Council. He once suggested to Liu Shaoqi to bail out imprisoned cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国高级领导人，中华人民共和国开国上将。文化大革命期间的重要人物，曾任北京市革委会主任、公安部部长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。活跃于“文化大革命”中后期及“后毛泽东时代”。曾任国务院副总理、中央政法小组组长等职。他因深受毛泽东赏识和培养，在文革中后期进入中央核心。曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。中共十一届三中全会后在政治上受到排挤，于1980年2月辞去所有职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former Vice-national level leader. He was active in the late stage of the Cultural Revolution and the post-Mao era. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, head of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Group, and other positions. Highly appreciated and cultivated by Mao Zedong, he entered the central core leadership in the late Cultural Revolution. He once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades. After the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC, he was politically marginalized and resigned from all his positions in February 1980.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国山西省武乡县
birth_place.en: Wuxiang County, Shanxi Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国农民及政治人物。在文化大革命期间受毛泽东提拔，成为“农业学大寨”运动的代表人物，并曾担任至中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理等副国级职务。改革开放后因其政治路线与邓小平等人的政策相抵触而被免职。
description.en: A Chinese farmer and politician. During the Cultural Revolution, he was promoted by Mao Zedong and became the representative figure of the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' movement. He held high-ranking positions such as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. After the Reform and Opening-up, he was dismissed from his posts due to his political line conflicting with the policies of Deng Xiaoping and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军开国上将，中共八大元老之一。曾担任中华人民共和国副主席，接替乌兰夫。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Ulanhu as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、革命家、政治家。曾任红四方面军总指挥，是长征期间重要的军事领导人。历任国防部部长、国务院副总理、第四届全国人大常委会副委员长等职，并与李富春等人在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, a military strategist, revolutionary, and politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Commander-in-Chief of the Fourth Front Army and was an important military leader during the Long March. He also held positions such as Minister of National Defense, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. Along with Li Fuchun and others, he resisted the Cultural Revolution during the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老，中华人民共和国政治家、外交家、军事家。曾任国务院副总理、国防部部长、中共中央军委秘书长、红一军团第一师参谋长，是习近平早期的上司。
description.en: A veteran of the CCP, and a politician, diplomat, and military strategist of the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Premier, Minister of National Defense, Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission, Chief of Staff of the First Division of the Red First Army Group, and was Xi Jinping's early superior.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、杰出的无产阶级革命家。他曾任中共中央政治局常委（包括第十三届）、国务院副总理、中共中央办公厅主任，长期担任党和国家财经工作领导职务，并继任余秋里担任国家计划委员会主任。作为原正国级党和国家领导人，他被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Yao Yilin was an early leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and an outstanding proletarian revolutionary. He served as a member of the Political Bureau Standing Committee (including the 13th), Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. He held leading positions in the Party and state's economic and financial work for a long time, succeeding Yu Qiuli as Director of the State Planning Commission. As a former national-level leader, he was considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长，代表中方签署《中日联合声明》。后任第四届全国人大常委会秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, signing the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué. Later, he served as Secretary-General of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，中共党内改革派代表人物。他在改革开放初期在安徽推行农村改革，曾任国务院副总理、第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长，并于1981年起担任恢复后的中央外事工作领导小组副组长。他以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A former top-level leader of the CPC and PRC, one of the Eight Elders, and a key reformist. He initiated rural reforms in Anhui during the early reform era, served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 7th National People's Congress. From 1981, he also served as the deputy leader of the restored Central Leading Group for Foreign Affairs. He supported the abolition of lifelong tenure through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国上将、政治人物。张灿明的兄长。曾任国防部部长、国务院副总理，并指挥一江山岛战役。他也是联名签署反对武力镇压学生示威抗议信的七名退役将军之一。此外，他曾在“批邓反击右倾翻案风”运动中被钱学森写大字报批判。
description.en: A founding general and politician of the People's Republic of China, and elder brother of Zhang Canming. He served as Minister of National Defense and Vice Premier of the State Council, commanding the Yijiangshan Islands Campaign. He was one of seven retired generals who jointly signed a letter opposing the use of force against student demonstrations. Additionally, he was criticized by Qian Xuesen in a big-character poster during the 'Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务委员
中华人民共和国国务院国务委员
en: State Councilor of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院及其常务会议的组成人员之一，地位仅次于总理和副总理。与副总理同为国家级副职公务员、党和国家领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and its standing committee, with a status second only to the Premier and Vice Premiers. They hold the rank of Deputy National Level public servant and are considered Party and State Leaders.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，周恩来义子。曾任国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长（在成克杰担任副委员长期间）。他在任总理期间宣布开发浦东，并在六四事件期间宣布戒严令，被认为是中共党内保守派的代表。他也是育才学校校友，是李小琳的父亲。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, foster son of Zhou Enlai. He served as Premier, member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (serving while Cheng Kejie was Vice Chairman). During his tenure as Premier, he announced the decision to develop Pudong and declared martial law during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, being considered a representative figure of the conservative faction within the CCP. He was also an alumnus of Yucai School, and is the father of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理，并担任全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。作为已退休的前全国人大常委会委员长，他曾于1998年发起并率团对法轮功进行独立调查，结论是“法轮功于国于民，有百利而无一害”。
description.en: Chinese politician, a former national leader at the top rank (Zhengguojie), served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. As a retired former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, he initiated and led an independent investigation into Falun Gong in 1998, concluding that 'Falun Gong brings hundreds of benefits to the Chinese people and China, and does not have a single bad effect.'

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。他曾任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央组织部部长、甘肃省委第一书记。作为中共元老，他发现并提拔了胡锦涛，其对胡的赏识是胡后来得以执掌大权的重要因素。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Minister of the CPC Central Organization Department, and First Secretary of the CCP Gansu Committee. As a veteran of the CPC, he discovered and promoted Hu Jintao, and his appreciation for Hu was a significant factor in Hu's later rise to supreme power.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国重要政治人物。他曾任国务院副总理，并兼任中国人民银行行长。随后晋升为国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委，被认为是前主要领导人之一。在上海市长、市委书记任上，他提出“开发浦东，振兴上海，服务全国，面向世界”方针。作为清华大学1951届校友，曾任经济管理学院首任院长。1998年洪水期间，他严厉斥责劣质水利工程为“豆腐渣工程”。在425上访事件中，他会见法轮功学员代表并下令释放被捕学员，事件曾暂时和平解决，但其温和立场遭江泽民拒绝。他还曾反对李长春作为其接班人。
description.en: An important political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, concurrently as Governor of the People's Bank of China, and later as Premier of the State Council and a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, considered one of the former paramount leaders. During his tenure as Mayor and Party Secretary of Shanghai, he proposed the policy of 'developing Pudong, revitalizing Shanghai, serving the whole country, and facing the world'. As an alumnus of Tsinghua University (class of 1951), he served as the founding dean of its School of Economics and Management. During the 1998 floods, he famously denounced substandard water conservancy projects as 'tofu-dreg projects'. In the April 25 Appeal, he met with Falun Gong representatives and ordered the release of arrested practitioners, leading to a temporary peaceful resolution, though his conciliatory stance was later rejected by Jiang Zemin. He also opposed Li Changchun as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 李维汉与金维映之子，中国政治人物。曾任全国人大常委会副委员长、国务委员兼国家经济体制改革委员会主任。
description.en: Son of Li Weihan and Jin Weiying, a Chinese politician. He served as Vice Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee, State Councilor and Minister in charge of the State Commission for Restructuring Economy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物、军事领导人，中国人民解放军上将（1988年授予），曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。秦天与秦卫江之父。
description.en: A political figure and military leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a General of the People's Liberation Army (awarded in 1988), former Minister of National Defense of the PRC. Father of Qin Tian and Qin Weijiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记，后因贪腐案被审查撤职。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Beijing, who was later investigated and removed from office for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、外交部长，并担任中央国家安全工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs, and also as the deputy leader of the Central Leading Group for National Security Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记、国务院秘书长。其在中央政法委书记任内，下令公安部对法轮功进行调查，并担任“中央处理法轮功问题领导小组”的历任组长之一，据称其背书了何祚庥批评法轮功的文章。此外，他于1989年在全国公安交通管理工作会议上发表讲话，并于1993年召集会议协调公安与交通部门的管理分工。
description.en: Chinese politician, and one of the former principal leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Central Political Bureau, Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and Secretary-General of the State Council. During his tenure as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, he ordered the Ministry of Public Security to investigate Falun Gong and served as one of the leaders of the 'Central Leading Group on Dealing with Falun Gong', reportedly endorsing He Zuoxiu's articles criticizing Falun Gong. Additionally, he spoke at the National Public Security Traffic Management Work Conference in 1989 and convened a meeting in 1993 to coordinate the division of management responsibilities between public security and transport departments.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、对外贸易经济合作部部长、天津市副市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former national-level principal leader, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and Vice Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人。曾任上海市委书记（在黄奇帆任职上海期间），中央书记处书记、国务院副总理。后升任中共中央政治局常委，并担任第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。据报道，他曾于2013年推醒在主席台上睡着的贾庆林；1992年曾因陈良宇冲撞邓小平警卫一事，在电话中训斥陈良宇。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China and a former national-level leader. He served as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee (during Huang Qifan's tenure in Shanghai), Secretary of the Central Secretariat, and Vice Premier. Later, he was promoted to a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress. Reports indicate he once woke up Jia Qinglin who had fallen asleep during a meeting in 2013, and in 1992, he reportedly reprimanded Chen Liangyu over the phone due to an incident involving Deng Xiaoping's security detail.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将。曾任国防部部长、解放军总参谋长，参与指挥戒严部队。在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A General of the People's Republic of China, he served as Minister of National Defense and Chief of the General Staff of the PLA, and participated in commanding martial law troops. He was appointed Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，有“中国铁娘子”之称。她曾接替李岚清任对外经济贸易部部长，并担任过国务院副总理（与回良玉同为第十届）、国务委员、卫生部部长等职。据报道，她与薄熙来交恶，并阻止其接任副总理职位。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Deputy State Leader, known as the "Iron Lady of China." She succeeded Li Lanqing as Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and also served as Vice Premier of the State Council (including the 10th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu), State Councilor, and Minister of Health. She reportedly had a poor relationship with Bo Xilai and blocked his succession to the Vice Premier position.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共第十四届中央委员会期间，曾任上海市市长、市委书记，并于1994年增选为中共中央政治局委员。后任第十届国务院副总理（与回良玉同任）、中共中央政治局常委。陈良宇曾担任其秘书。其因病去世后，客观上为中纪委调查上海社保案提供了契机。
description.en: A Chinese politician. During the 14th CPC Central Committee, he served as Mayor and Party Secretary of Shanghai, and was co-opted as a Politburo member in 1994. Later, he served as Vice Premier of the 10th State Council (alongside Hui Liangyu) and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo. Chen Liangyu once served as his secretary. His death due to illness objectively provided an opportunity for the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection to investigate the Shanghai social security case.

description.zh-cn: 回族，中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共安徽省委书记、两届国务院副总理。作为原副国级党和国家领导人，他长期在农业领域工作，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity and a former national leader at the vice-state level. He served as Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Party Committee and two terms as Vice Premier of the State Council. He worked extensively in the agricultural sector and was appointed as Vice Premier during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。他因腐败问题在反腐运动中落马，被判无期徒刑。任职期间，周本顺是其直接下属，冀文林曾长期担任其秘书。他曾作出批示要求正确引导舆论，被指意图掩盖政府干预司法。另据称，他与李长春共同主导了谷歌退出中国事件。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. He fell during the anti-corruption campaign due to corruption and was sentenced to life imprisonment. During his tenure, Zhou Benshun was his direct subordinate, and Ji Wenlin served as his long-term secretary. He issued an instruction to 'correctly guide public opinion,' which was seen as an attempt to cover up government interference in the judiciary. Additionally, he allegedly co-directed the Google withdrawal incident with Li Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国上将。曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长（梁光烈的前任）、中央军委副主席，在神舟五号飞行期间与航天员杨利伟进行了“天地对话”。
description.en: Chinese politician and General of the People's Liberation Army. He served as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China (predecessor to Liang Guanglie) and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. During the Shenzhou 5 mission, he conducted a 'space-to-ground call' with astronaut Yang Liwei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理（第十一届）。在薄熙来被免职后，接任中共重庆市委书记，与时任市长黄奇帆搭档，并公开否定“重庆模式”的存在。其后担任全国人大常委会委员长，并在中共十九届二中全会上就修宪建议草案作了说明。
