description.en: Chinese politician. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council (11th term). Following Bo Xilai's dismissal, he took over as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee, partnering with then-mayor Huang Qifan, and publicly denied the existence of the 'Chongqing Model'. Subsequently, he served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and explained the draft proposal for constitutional amendments at the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、北京市市长、中共中央纪律检查委员会书记。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间，他与回良玉一同担任国务院副总理。他还曾在李长春任中共广东省委书记期间担任常务副省长，并协助处理国企问题。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Mayor of Beijing, and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC. During the 11th National People's Congress, he served as Vice Premier of the State Council alongside Hui Liangyu. He also held the position of Executive Vice Governor during Li Changchun's tenure as Guangdong Provincial Party Secretary, assisting in handling state-owned enterprise issues.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，团派主要成员。曾任中共中央政治局委员、中华人民共和国国务院副总理，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: A female Chinese politician and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). She served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC and Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and was appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将，原副国级领导人。曾任国防部部长。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员和中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a general in the People's Liberation Army, and a former leader of vice-national level. He served as Minister of National Defense, and was appointed as a State Councilor and a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任中共上海市委副书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。此后，他接替周永康担任中共中央政法委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician. He formerly served as Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC and was appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress. Subsequently, he succeeded Zhou Yongkang as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人，曾任中共第十八届中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（并担任推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组首任组长），以及中共天津市委书记。在宋平顺自杀后，他向外界通报了其涉案情况。
description.en: Former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, served as a member of the 18th CPC Central Committee Political Bureau Standing Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council (and the first head of the Leading Group for Promoting the Belt and Road Initiative), and Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee. After Song Pingshun's suicide, he publicly announced details of Song's case.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，团派主要成员。他曾任中共中央政治局常委、第十三届全国政协主席、国务院副总理、中共广东省委书记、中共重庆市委书记，是薄熙来在重庆市委书记职务上的前任。他拥有中国科学技术大学在职研究生学历。
description.en: Chinese politician, a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), and a former top national leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC, Chairman of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC), Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, and Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee, preceding Bo Xilai in the latter role. He holds an in-service postgraduate degree from the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，蒙古族。曾任中共中央书记处书记，国家行政学院院长（陈希的前任），并接替马凯担任国务院秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure of Mongolian ethnicity. He served as Secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, President of the National Academy of Governance (predecessor to Chen Xi), and succeeded Ma Kai as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，中国政治人物。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员，并继任梁光烈担任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army and Chinese politician. Appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress, and succeeded Liang Guanglie as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、国务委员、中华人民共和国外交部部长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician of the Communist Party of China, who has served as a member of the Politburo, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, State Councilor, and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任中共中央政法委书记、中共十九届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记。他也是傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, a member of the Political Bureau, and a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee. He was also Fu Zhenghua's superior when Fu was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、代理市委书记（接替陈良宇），后任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（接替张高丽），现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理，中共十九届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the State Council and a member of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、副国级领导人。曾担任朱小丹担任广东省省长期间的中共广东省委书记。他曾是团派主要成员，一度被视为胡锦涛的隔代接班人，但在中共二十大上失势。现任第十四届全国政协副主席、党组副书记。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, holding a sub-national leadership position. He served as the Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP while Zhu Xiaodan was Governor of Guangdong. He was a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), once seen as Hu Jintao's designated successor, but lost power at the 20th CPC National Congress. He currently serves as the Vice Chairman and Deputy Party Secretary of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、经济学者，曾任第十九届中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、国务院金融稳定发展委员会主任。他是刘植岩之子，刘茶同父异母的兄长，也是习近平的童年朋友和亲密顾问，原国家级副职领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician and economist. He served as a member of the 19th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the State Council Financial Stability and Development Committee. He is the son of Liu Zhiyan and the half-brother of Liu Cha, and also a childhood friend and close advisor to Xi Jinping, a former national-level deputy leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任第二炮兵部队司令员、火箭军首任司令员，并担任国务委员、国防部部长。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, he served as Commander of the Second Artillery Force and the first Commander of the Rocket Force. He also held positions as State Councilor and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、高级外交官，副国级领导人，77级大学生。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共中央外事工作委员会办公室主任，曾任外交部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician and senior diplomat, a member of the Class of 1977 and a sub-national leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, having previously served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国公安部部长，国务委员，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（排名第一）、中央港澳工作领导小组组长。曾任中共中央办公厅主任（蔡奇的前任）。他也是一名78级大学生。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a national-level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, the First-ranked Vice Premier of the State Council, and leader of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs. He previously served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee (predecessor to Cai Qi). He is also a member of the Class of 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、中央财经委员会办公室主任、中央金融委员会办公室主任、中央金融工作委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Premier of the State Council.

birth_place.zh-cn: 河南省信阳专区罗山县
birth_place.en: Luoshan County, Xinyang Prefecture, Henan Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、国务院安全生产委员会主任。曾任重庆市市长，是黄奇帆的继任者、唐良智的前任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a sub-national level party and state leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the Work Safety Committee of the State Council. He previously served as Mayor of Chongqing, succeeding Huang Qifan and preceding Tang Liangzhi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee, and a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务委员、国防部部长，中央军委委员，中国人民解放军陆军上将。因卷入2023年中国火箭军腐败案落马，于2024年被开除党籍和军籍。
description.en: Former State Councilor and Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China, former member of the Central Military Commission, and former General of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force. He was dismissed in connection with the 2023 corruption case in the PLA Rocket Force and was expelled from the party and military in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任国务委员，中共中央书记处书记，副国级领导人。曾任傅政华的继任公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He is currently a State Councilor and a Secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee (a vice-national level leader). He previously served as Fu Zhenghua's successor as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中华人民共和国国务委员、国务院秘书长、国务院机关党组书记。曾任江苏省省长、中共江苏省委书记等职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, currently holding a vice-national level leadership position. He serves as a State Councilor, Secretary-General of the State Council, and Secretary of the Party Leadership Group of the State Council Organ. He previously served as Governor of Jiangsu and Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 白族
中国共产党、中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物。曾任外交部部长、国务委员，原副国级领导人。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责履行国防职能的组成部门，也是中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的军事工作机关之一。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national defense functions, and also one of the military working organs of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，现任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army Navy, currently the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部部长
en: Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部的首长职位。
description.en: The head position of the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party
en: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party
Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务，后被总书记职务取代。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982, later replaced by the post of General Secretary.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省顺庆府仪陇县马鞍镇

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的优秀党员、伟大的无产阶级革命家，党、国家和军队的卓越领导人之一，中国共产党、中华人民共和国及中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和创始人之一。他曾任中国工农红军总司令、红一军团总指挥，是长征期间重要的军事领导人。作为中华人民共和国元帅之首，他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地，并在南昌起义中担任第九军副军长。起义失败后，率领余部与毛泽东在井冈山会师。他还曾担任第四届全国人大常委会委员长。他曾称蔡锷影响其整个前半生。
description.en: An outstanding member of the Communist Party of China, a great proletarian revolutionary, and one of the eminent leaders of the Party, state, and military. He was one of the main founders and creators of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. He served as Commander-in-Chief of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and General Commander of the Red First Army Group, and was an important military leader during the Long March. As the foremost of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China, he participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base. He also served as Deputy Commander of the 9th Army during the Nanchang Uprising. After the uprising's failure, he led the remaining troops to join forces with Mao Zedong in the Jinggang Mountains. He also served as Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He stated that Cai E influenced the entire first half of his life.

zh-cn: 中共中央革命军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国人民革命军事委员会
中国共产党中央军事委员会
中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China
Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China
Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会，通称中央军事委员会，简称中央军委、军委，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量最高军事领导机构的总称。受中国共产党中央委员会和全国人民代表大会领导。在土地革命战争后期、抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，是中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。1982年12月4日，通过八二宪法，成立中华人民共和国中央军事委员会。此后，中共中央军委和国家中央军委组成人员基本相同，实际上是“一个机构两块牌子”。余秋里曾任副秘书长。
description.en: The Central Military Commission (CMC), a collective term for the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, is the supreme military leadership body of China's armed forces. It is led by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the National People's Congress. During the latter part of the Agrarian Revolutionary War, the Anti-Japanese War, and the Second Chinese Civil War, it served as the highest military leadership body of the CPC. On December 4, 1982, with the adoption of the 1982 Constitution, the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China was established. Since then, the composition of the CPC Central Military Commission and the State Central Military Commission has been largely identical, effectively operating as 'one institution, two names'. Yu Qiuli once served as Deputy Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事家，中国人民解放军大将。他曾任新四军第三师师长，抗战胜利后率领该师进入东北，与山东军区部队共同组建东北人民自治军。此外，他还担任过国防部副部长、总参谋长、中纪委常务书记、中共中央军委秘书长。他是洪学智的上级，也是余秋里在中国人民解放军总后方勤务部政治委员职位上的前任。在庐山会议中，他因支持彭德怀被错误地打成反党集团成员。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military strategist and a Senior General of the People's Liberation Army. He served as Commander of the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army, leading it into Northeast China after the victory of the Anti-Japanese War, where they jointly formed the Northeast People's Autonomous Army with troops from the Shandong Military Region. He also held positions such as Deputy Minister of National Defense, Chief of the General Staff of the PLA, Standing Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission. He was Hong Xuezhi's superior and Yu Qiuli's predecessor as Political Commissar of the PLA General Rear Services Department. During the Lushan Conference, he was wrongly labeled a member of an anti-Party clique for supporting Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海军大将，中国人民解放军海军首任司令员。曾任国防部副部长，并于1952年上报了组建海军航空兵飞行部队的请示报告。他还曾任第四届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: Grand General of the Navy of the People's Republic of China and the first commander of the PLA Navy. He also served as Vice Minister of National Defense and submitted a report in 1952 requesting the formation of naval aviation flight units. Additionally, he was a member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任国防部副部长。他曾与任弼时率领红六军团西征，并担任参谋长。
description.en: A founding general of the PLA. He, along with Ren Bishi, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, during which Li Da served as Chief of Staff.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
中国人民解放军总参谋长
en: Chief of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army
General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army
General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army
People's Liberation Army General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥机关，负责组织领导全国武装力量的军事建设和作战指挥。它原是中央军事委员会的军事工作机关和全军军事工作的领导机关。在2015年深化国防和军队改革中被撤销，并改组为中央军委联合参谋部。
description.en: Formerly the highest military command organ of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, responsible for organizing and leading the military construction and combat command of the national armed forces. It was originally the military affairs organ of the Central Military Commission and the leading organ for the military work of the entire army. It was abolished in the 2015 reform of national defense and the military, and reorganized into the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军和中国工农红军的最高政治工作领导机关，负责政治思想、组织和纪律工作，也是中央军事委员会主管全军党务和政治工作的最高统率机构。余秋里曾担任其主任。该机构于2016年军事改革中被撤销，后重组为中央军事委员会政治工作部。
description.en: Formerly the highest leading organ for political work in the People's Liberation Army and the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, responsible for political ideology, organization, and disciplinary work. It also served as the supreme command organ of the Central Military Commission for party and political affairs throughout the military. Yu Qiuli once served as its director. The organization was abolished during the 2016 military reforms and subsequently reorganized into the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要领导人之一、高级将领，无产阶级革命家、军事家。他是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的重要政治和军事人物，曾任副国级领导人，并担任第四届全国人大常委会委员。他曾指挥鲁南战役（时任华中野战军司令员），并在豫东战役和徐蚌会战中担任华东野战军主要指挥官。1955年被授予大将军衔，位列开国十位大将之首，曾担任总参谋长、国防部副部长。1958年，在军委扩大会议上受到彭德怀等人的批判。
description.en: One of the principal leaders and a senior general of the People's Liberation Army, a proletarian revolutionary and military strategist. He was an important political and military figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, having served as a vice-national leader and a Member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He commanded the Lunan Campaign (serving as commander of the Central China Field Army at the time), and was a key commander of the East China Field Army during the Eastern Henan and Huaihai Campaigns. In 1955, he was awarded the rank of Grand General, ranking first among the ten founding Grand Generals, and served as Chief of the General Staff and Vice Minister of National Defense. In 1958, he was criticized at an enlarged meeting of the Military Commission.

zh-cn: 彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党中央委员会在庐山召开中共中央政治局扩大会议和八届八中全会。会议后期，彭德怀等人因批评“大跃进”遭批判，并随后发起了“反右倾”斗争。中共八届八中全会通过决议，将彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟定性为“反党集团”，此事件被定性为一场政治案件。该决议后被《历史决议》否定。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo and the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee was held in Lushan in 1959. In its later stage, Peng Dehuai and others were criticized for their critique of the Great Leap Forward, leading to the 'Anti-Rightist' struggle. The 8th Plenary Session passed a resolution designating Peng Dehuai, Huang Kecheng, Zhang Wentian, and Zhou Xiaozhou as an 'Anti-Party Clique'. This incident was deemed a political case, and the resolution was later negated by the 'Historical Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是宋希濂的同乡和同学，并介绍宋希濂加入中国共产党。曾任红一师师长，国防部副部长，军事工程学院首任院长。此外，他还曾佐证康生叛变。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, a fellow townsman and classmate of Song Xilian, who introduced Song to the Chinese Communist Party. He served as Commander of the First Red Division, Vice Minister of National Defense, and the first president of the Military Engineering Academy. He also testified to Kang Sheng's defection.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将。曾任国防部副部长、南京军区司令员。在山东军区担任过胶东军区司令员，并先后任山东军区副司令员、司令员。原副国级领导人。
description.en: A founding General of the People's Liberation Army. He served as Deputy Minister of National Defense and Commander of the Nanjing Military Region. Within the Shandong Military Region, he held positions as Commander of the Jiaodong Military Region, and later as Deputy Commander and Commander of the Shandong Military Region. He was formerly a national leader at the vice-state level.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将、首任空军司令员。曾任红一军团第二师政治委员、国防部副部长。
description.en: Founding General of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and the first Commander of the Air Force. He also served as Political Commissar of the Second Division of the Red First Army Group and Deputy Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，无产阶级革命家、军事家，中国人民解放军开国上将。他曾任北京军区首任司令员、代总参谋长，并主持总参谋部工作，推动了总参四部的组建，还担任过全国政协副主席等职。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, a proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and a founding general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as the first commander of the Beijing Military Region, acting Chief of the General Staff, presided over the work of the General Staff Department, and promoted the establishment of its Fourth Department. He also served as Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中华人民共和国国防部副部长、红二师师长、八路军685团团长、昆明军区司令员。他与杨成武、杨勇并称“三杨”。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army. He served as Vice Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China, Commander of the Second Red Division, Commander of the 685th Regiment of the Eighth Route Army, and Commander of the Kunming Military Region. He was known as one of the 'Three Yangs' along with Yang Chengwu and Yang Yong.

description.zh-cn: 1979年中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发了一场短暂的边境战争，其起因是越南入侵柬埔寨及边境争端。此后，中越边境冲突持续至1990年，期间王西欣等将领曾参与相关军事行动。
description.en: A brief border war broke out in 1979 between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, sparked by Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes. Sino-Vietnamese border conflicts then continued until 1990, with generals like Wang Xixin participating in related military operations.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的机关第一级职能部门，为全军作战指挥机关，前身为中国人民解放军总参谋部。于2015年11月在深化国防和军队改革中改组成立。
description.en: A first-level functional department of the Central Military Commission, serving as the operational command headquarters for the entire military. Its predecessor was the General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army. It was reorganized and established in November 2015 during the reform of national defense and the military.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会政治工作部
en: Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的政治工作机关

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式，也是中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商的重要机构。钱学森曾任其副主席。其成员包括曾任第七、八届委员的徐发淦、第八、九届委员的张汉夫、曾任主席的贾庆林，以及第十一、十二届委员李小琳和第十一届委员刘梦熊等。
description.en: The National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) is the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation led by the Communist Party of China. Qian Xuesen once served as its Vice Chairman. Its members include Xu Fagan, who served on its 7th and 8th committees; Zhang Hanfu, who served on its 8th and 9th committees; Jia Qinglin, who served as its chairman; Li Xiaolin, a member of its 11th and 12th committees; and Lew Mon-hung, a member of its 11th committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现有的八个民主党派之一，简称“民盟”，在国共内战后期与中国共产党合作。
description.en: One of the eight existing democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, abbreviated as 'CDL', which cooperated with the Communist Party of China in the late stage of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国除中国共产党以外的八个参政党的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China other than the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主党派，中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。

zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会
中国国民党临时行动委员会
en: Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 该政党由国民党左派邓演达于1930年发起，最初名为中国国民党临时行动委员会。1931年更名为中华民族解放行动委员会。1947年，正式更名为中国农工民主党。作为中华人民共和国的民主党派之一，其接受中国共产党的政治领导。
description.en: This political party was initiated by the Nationalist left-wing figure Deng Yanda in 1930, initially named the Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang. In 1931, it was renamed the Chinese National Liberation Action Committee. In 1947, it was officially renamed the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party. As one of the democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, it accepts the political leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，是中国革命统一战线的一员。该党派由华侨社团发起，主要由归国华侨和侨眷组成。罗豪才曾任其中央委员会主席。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, and a member of China's revolutionary united front. It was founded by overseas Chinese communities and is mainly composed of returned overseas Chinese and their relatives. Luo Haocai served as the chairman of its central committee.

location.zh-cn: 北京市复兴门外大街10号

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会是中国共产党领导的、中华人民共和国境内唯一的全国性工会联合会，负责领导中国大陆所有地方总工会和产业工会，并作为人民团体之一参加中国人民政治协商会议。
description.en: The All-China Federation of Trade Unions is the sole national trade union federation in the People's Republic of China, led by the Chinese Communist Party. It leads all local and industrial trade unions in mainland China and participates in the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference as one of the people's organizations.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国农工民主党创始人和领导人之一。曾任中华人民共和国交通部长，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the founders and leaders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party. He served as the Minister of Transport of the People's Republic of China and was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学家、历史学家、古文字学家、考古学家、社会活动家、政治人物。曾任中国科学院院长、中国科学技术大学首任校长、中国史学会主席、第四届全国人大常委会副委员长，并为电子科技大学前身“成都电讯工程学院”题写校名。他曾在育才学校讲学，并在文革初期曾赞扬江青，后又批判。
description.en: Chinese writer, historian, paleographer, archaeologist, social activist, and political figure. He served as President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, first President of the University of Science and Technology of China, Chairman of the Chinese Historical Association, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He also lectured at Yucai School and inscribed the name for Chengdu Institute of Radio Engineering. During the early Cultural Revolution, he initially praised Jiang Qing but later criticized her.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，中华民国和中华人民共和国政治人物。他曾在向忠发担任总书记期间掌握中国共产党实权，推行了激进的“立三路线”，并一度是中共建政前实际最高领导人。1948年，他当选为中华全国总工会副主席，并主持总工会工作。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China and a political figure of both the Republic of China and the People's Republic of China. He held effective power within the Communist Party of China during Xiang Zhongfa's tenure as General Secretary, promoting the radical 'Lisan Line', and was once the de facto supreme leader before the establishment of the PRC. In 1948, he was elected as Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, overseeing its work.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华民国时期军事将领。曾任国民革命军第十九路军将领，并指挥了著名的上海“一·二八”淞沪抗战。他参与领导了福建事变。在南昌起义期间，他曾担任第十一军副军长兼第十师师长，并在起义部队南下途中率部脱离。中华人民共和国成立后，他成为政治人物，曾担任副国级领导人。
description.en: A Chinese militarist and politician, a military general during the Republic of China era. He once served as a general of the National Revolutionary Army's 19th Route Army and commanded the famous Shanghai 'January 28' Incident defense. He was involved in leading the Fujian Incident. During the Nanchang Uprising, he served as Deputy Commander of the 11th Army and Commander of the 10th Division, leading his troops to desert during the insurgent forces' southward march. After the founding of the People's Republic of China, he became a political figure and served as a national-level deputy leader.

description.zh-cn: 著名华侨实业家、慈善家、教育家、社会活动家。他是一名马来亚爱国华侨，创立了厦门大学，并组织南侨机工支援抗战。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、重要政治人物，曾任副国级领导人。他曾主管民族工作，并就民族区域自治制度向毛泽东提供咨询。此外，他也是勤工俭学运动的参与者，与李富春共同将勤工俭学励进会改名为工学世界社。
description.en: An early leader and important political figure of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, he served as a vice-national level leader. He was in charge of ethnic affairs and advised Mao Zedong on the system of ethnic regional autonomy. He was also a participant in the Diligent Work-Frugal Study movement and, together with Li Fuchun, renamed the Diligent Work-Frugal Study Encouragement Society to the Work-Study World Society.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国庆节
en: National Day of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国庆日。
中华民国军事家、政治家，新桂系首领。曾任中华民国副总统及代总统，指挥台儿庄战役，并作为反蒋联军的副总司令之一。后被监察院弹劾。鲁涤平、刘振东曾是其麾下将领。
description.en: A Chinese military general and politician, leader of the New Guangxi clique. He served as Vice President and acting President of the Republic of China, commanded the Battle of Taierzhuang, and was one of the deputy commanders-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition. He was later impeached by the Control Yuan. Lu Diping and Liu Zhendong were among his generals.

description.zh-cn: 1947年2月底，台湾爆发大规模官民冲突事件，亦称反政府暴动。起因于圆环缉烟事件引发的民怨，事件迅速演变为全岛性的反抗政府运动，最终遭到国民政府武力镇压，造成大量民众死伤。中共台湾省工委部分成员参与武装反抗。此事件及其后续的清乡运动对台湾社会影响深远，促使国民政府将台湾省行政长官公署改制为台湾省政府。
description.en: In late February 1947, a large-scale conflict between officials and civilians erupted in Taiwan, also known as an anti-government uprising. Triggered by public discontent over the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, it quickly escalated into an island-wide anti-government movement. The Nationalist government ultimately suppressed it with force, resulting in numerous civilian casualties. Some members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee participated in armed resistance. This incident and the subsequent Village-Cleaning Campaign had a profound impact on Taiwanese society, prompting the Nationalist Government to reorganize the Taiwan Provincial Administrative Executive Office into the Taiwan Provincial Government.

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
全国人大常委会委员长
en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会（中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关常设机关）的领导职务。
description.en: The leader of the permanent body of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
中华人民共和国宪法修正案
中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）
en: 2018 amendment to the Constitution of China
2018 Amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China
2018 Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China
Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China (2018)

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月11日，第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议以2958票赞成、2票反对、3票弃权表决通过《宪法修正案》。该修正案取消了《中华人民共和国宪法》中关于国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定，并将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: This constitutional amendment removed the provision from the Constitution of the People's Republic of China that the President and Vice President 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms', and also wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现有的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国新民主主义青年团
旅欧中国共产主义青年团
en: New Democratic Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织，全称中国共产主义青年团。其历史可追溯至前身，张太雷曾于1924年担任其前身机构的中央书记。它是中国共产党领导的先进青年的群众组织，被视为党的助手和后备军，也是团派官员的主要来源。李克强曾于1993年至1998年担任其最高领导人（中央书记处第一书记），李富春也曾担任其旅欧执行委员会委员长等职。
description.en: The Communist Youth League of China is the youth organization of the Communist Party of China. Its history is traceable to its predecessor, where Zhang Tailei served as its Central Secretary in 1924. It is a mass organization for advanced youth led by the CPC, considered its assistant and reserve force, and a primary source of officials for the Youth League Faction. Li Keqiang served as its top leader (First Secretary of the Central Secretariat) from 1993 to 1998. Li Fuchun also served as chairman of its European Executive Committee.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army
Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年期间（土地革命战争时期，又称第二次国内革命战争时期）领导的武装力量，是中国人民解放军的前身。该武装力量参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。在此期间，东北军曾被调往陕甘一带围剿红军，并遭受重大损失。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937, during the Agrarian Revolutionary War (also known as the Second Revolutionary Civil War). They were the predecessors of the People's Liberation Army and participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base. During this period, the Northeastern Army was once deployed to the Shaanxi-Gansu area to suppress the Red Army and suffered heavy losses.

location.zh-cn: 北京市石景山区高井甲32号

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战军种，是中华人民共和国的陆上武装力量，也是中国人民解放军的第一军种和主体力量。
description.en: The land-based service branch of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, it is the terrestrial armed force of the People's Republic of China, and the largest, oldest, and main force of the entire Chinese armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的海上作战军种
description.en: The naval branch of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的空中作战军种，也是中华人民共和国的正规空中武装力量和中国人民解放军的第三军种。杨利伟曾在此服役担任歼击机飞行员。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army. Yang Liwei served as a fighter pilot in this force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军
中国人民解放军第二炮兵
中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队
en: People's Liberation Army Second Artillery Corps

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区清河街道

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战略导弹部队，其前身为战略性独立兵种，是第四军种。该部队由中央军事委员会直接领导指挥，担负常规导弹目标打击、核打击及核子反击导弹战略作战等任务。吴烈曾担任其政治委员。
description.en: The strategic missile force of the People's Liberation Army. It was formerly an independent strategic branch and is the fourth service branch. Directly led and commanded by the Central Military Commission, it undertakes tasks such as conventional missile target strikes, nuclear strikes, and nuclear counter-missile strategic operations. Wu Lie served as its political commissar.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队
中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事航天部队，由原战略支援部队的航天系统部改设而成，现为独立兵种。
description.en: A military aerospace force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, reorganized as an independent service arm from the former Aerospace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队
中国人民解放军总参谋部技术侦察部
中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗、雷达部
中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部
en: Electronic Countermeasure Department of the PLA General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的网络空间部队，作为一个独立兵种，于2024年4月19日重组改设。其基础单位来自原战略支援部队网络系统部。追溯其前身之一，可至原中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的部门，该部门在1977年4月至2016年间负责电子对抗与雷达事务，是战略支援部队的早期组成部分。
description.en: The Cyberspace Force of the People's Liberation Army, an independent branch, was reorganized and re-established on April 19, 2024. Its foundational units came from the former Network Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force. Tracing its lineage, one of its predecessors was a department under the former PLA General Staff Department, which was responsible for electronic countermeasures and radar affairs from April 1977 to 2016, and was an early component of the Strategic Support Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Information Support Force

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区安贞街道黄寺大街9号
location.en: No. 9 Huangsi Street, Anzhen Sub-district, Chaoyang District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的信息支援部队，是一个独立兵种，由中央军事委员会直接领导，为副战区级单位。
description.en: The Information Support Force of the People's Liberation Army is an independent service arm, directly led by the Central Military Commission, and holds a deputy theater command level.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队
中央军委联勤保障部队
en: People's Liberation Army Joint Logistics Support Force
Joint Logistic Support Force of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队，王抗平于2024年10月起担任司令员。
description.en: The Joint Logistics Support Force of the People's Liberation Army, with Wang Kangping serving as its commander since October 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中央军事委员会副主席，副国级领导人。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a General of the People's Liberation Army, a member of the Political Bureau of the 20th CPC Central Committee, and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He holds a national-level leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中共上海市委常委，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
中国人民解放军陆军上将，中央军委委员，现任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, member of the Central Military Commission, and current Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委委员、中央军委纪律检查委员会书记、中央军委监察委员会主任。
description.en: An Admiral in the People's Liberation Army, who formerly served as a Member of the Central Military Commission, Secretary of the CMC Commission for Discipline Inspection, and Director of the CMC Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 越南战争，发生在1955年至1975年间，是越南民主共和国（北越）与越南共和国（南越）及其盟友之间的一场长期战争。这场战争也波及到老挝和柬埔寨，美国第七舰队参与其中。期间，北越军队曾因疟疾问题向中国求助，促成了523项目的启动。美国军方在此次战争中大量使用了由孟山都等公司生产的落叶剂橙剂，并引发了伯克利学生的大规模反战运动。
description.en: The Vietnam War, occurring between 1955 and 1975, was a prolonged conflict between the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) and the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam) and their allies. This war also extended to Laos and Cambodia, with the U.S. Seventh Fleet participating. During this period, North Vietnamese forces sought Chinese assistance for malaria issues, leading to the initiation of Project 523. The U.S. military extensively used the defoliant Agent Orange, produced by companies including Monsanto, which also triggered large-scale anti-war movements by Berkeley students.

en: Second Taiwan Strait Crisis artillery duel

description.zh-cn: 1958年至1979年间，中国人民解放军与中华民国国军在台湾海峡发生的军事冲突，主要战术行动为隔海炮击。其中，1958年8月23日至10月5日的炮战是第二次台湾海峡危机的主要军事行动，解放军对金门进行了大规模炮击，美国第七舰队曾为中华民国海军补给船队提供护航。在1958年的金门战役中，赵家骧殉职。
description.en: A military conflict in the Taiwan Strait between the People's Liberation Army and the Republic of China Armed Forces from 1958 to 1979, primarily characterized by artillery duels across the strait. The shelling from August 23 to October 5, 1958, was the main military action of the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, during which the PLA conducted a massive artillery bombardment of Kinmen, and the U.S. Seventh Fleet provided escorts for the supply convoys of the Republic of China Navy. During the 1958 Kinmen conflict, Zhao Jiaxiang was killed in action.

zh-cn: 国民革命军新编第四军
国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 新四军是中国共产党领导的武装力量之一，由南方八省红军和游击队改编而成。其活跃于抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，是重要的主要武装力量。战后，其部队成为华东野战军（第三野战军）和东北野战军（第四野战军）的重要组成部分。该部队的番号于1947年2月撤销。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was one of the armed forces led by the Communist Party of China, formed by the Red Army and guerrilla units from eight southern provinces. It was active during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War. After the war, its units became important components of the East China Field Army (Third Field Army) and the Northeast Field Army (Fourth Field Army). Its designation was abolished in February 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国东北地区创建的抗日武装
1936年12月12日，张学良、杨虎城在西安发动“兵谏”，扣留了蒋中正，要求停止内战、一致抗日。此次事件的和平解决，促成了第二次国共合作和抗日民族统一战线，结束了第一次国共内战，并间接导致了政治犯（包括陈独秀）获释。事件解决后，张学良被长期扣押，东北军被分化。
description.en: On December 12, 1936, Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng launched a 'remonstrance by military force' in Xi'an, detaining Chiang Kai-shek and demanding an end to the civil war and united resistance against Japan. The peaceful resolution of this incident facilitated the Second United Front and a united front against Japan, ended the First Chinese Civil War, and indirectly led to the release of political prisoners, including Chen Duxiu. After the incident was resolved, Zhang Xueliang was detained for a long time, and the Northeastern Army was disintegrated.

description.zh-cn: 指1960年至1989年间，中华人民共和国与苏联之间发生的一系列政治、意识形态和军事上的疏远与对峙冲突。分歧同时覆盖国家利益和意识形态层面。大跃进是导致关系恶化的重要因素之一。期间，苏联政府撕毁合同、撤走专家，加剧了中国三年困难时期。这一状况最终导致两国关系破裂，且《中苏友好同盟互助条约》在1980年期满后未再续约。此紧张关系也是促使中国寻求与日本建交的背景之一，并导致了中国的战备疏散政策。
description.en: Refers to a series of political, ideological, and military estrangement and confrontation conflicts between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union from 1960 to 1989. Differences covered both national interests and ideological levels. The Great Leap Forward was one of the important factors leading to the deterioration of relations. During this period, the Soviet government's tearing up of contracts and withdrawal of experts exacerbated China's Three Years of Difficult Period. This situation ultimately led to the breakdown of relations between the two countries, and the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance was not renewed after its expiration in 1980. This tense relationship also served as one of the background factors that prompted China to seek the establishment of diplomatic relations with Japan, and it led to China's policy of strategic relocation of key facilities.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的战略性兵种，负责太空、网络和电子战，已于2024年撤销番号。其力量被重组为信息支援部队、军事航天部队和网络空间部队等。
description.en: A former strategic service branch of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for space, cyber, and electronic warfare. Its designation was abolished in 2024, and its components were reorganized into the Information Support Force, Aerospace Force, and Cyberspace Force.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁主义是对马克思主义和列宁主义的统称，是由列宁和斯大林发展的马克思主义理论。它是中国共产党的第一个官方意识形态和指导思想之一，也是20世纪多数社会主义国家的官方意识形态。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism is a general term for the theories of Marxism and Leninism, and a Marxist theory developed by Vladimir Lenin and Joseph Stalin. It served as the Chinese Communist Party's first official ideology and a guiding thought, and was also the official ideology of most socialist states in the 20th century.

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央总书记习近平提出并创立的中国特色社会主义理论，是中国共产党的指导思想之一。其核心内容概括为“十个明确”、“十四个坚持”和“十三个方面成就”。该理论于2017年中共十九大写入党章，2018年写入中华人民共和国宪法。何毅亭曾撰文称其为“21世纪的马克思主义”。
description.en: The theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, primarily founded by Xi Jinping (then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), serves as one of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China. Its core content is summarized as 'Ten Clarifications,' 'Fourteen Adherences,' and 'Thirteen Aspects of Achievements'. It was written into the Party Constitution at the 19th Party Congress in 2017 and into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China in 2018. He Yiting once described it in an article as 'Marxism of the 21st century'.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区
en: Eastern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一，由原南京军区辖区组成，负责东部方向的军事行动。王抗平曾在此担任副司令员。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, formed from the former Nanjing Military Region, responsible for military operations in the eastern direction. Wang Kangping served as deputy commander here.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区
en: Southern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五大战区之一，设立于中国南部。
description.en: A theater command of the People's Liberation Army of China established in the southern part of the country.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军西部战区
en: Western Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区
en: Northern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五大战区之一，王西欣曾任该战区副司令员兼参谋长。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Xixin served as Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区
en: Central Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五个战区之一，主要负责领导和指挥北京、天津、河北、河南、山西、陕西、湖北等地的所属武装力量。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for leading and commanding the armed forces in areas including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Henan, Shanxi, Shaanxi, and Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，首任中国人民解放军陆军司令员。曾任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, who served as its First Commander and later as Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军驻吉布提保障基地
en: People's Liberation Army Support Base in Djibouti

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在海外的第一个军事基地

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届最高国家权力机关。其第一次会议批准了2023年《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: The 14th highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China. Its first session approved the 2023 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan'.

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关，通过了《香港国安法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China, which passed the Hong Kong National Security Law.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，全国人大常委会副委员长，副国级党和国家领导人。
中国当代作家、政治人物。曾担任中国作家协会主席（接替巴金），并任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A contemporary Chinese writer and politician. She served as the Chairwoman of the China Writers Association (succeeding Ba Jin) and was a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，副国级领导人。出身航天科技集团。曾任国防科学技术工业委员会主任、中国商用飞机有限责任公司董事长、河北省省长（在周本顺担任中共河北省委书记期间作为其副手）、中共黑龙江省委书记、中共湖南省委书记等职务。现任第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a national-level deputy leader. He comes from an aerospace science and technology background. He has served as Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, Chairman of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Governor of Hebei (acting as deputy to Zhou Benshun when the latter was Party Secretary of Hebei), Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, and Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee. He is currently a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中央统战部部长。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（接替陈吉宁）、中共中央组织部部长（继任陈希）、山东省省长（接替龚正）。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a national-level leader. Currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Political Bureau, Secretary of the Central Secretariat, and Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee. Previously served as Minister of Ecology and Environment of the People's Republic of China (succeeding Chen Jining), Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee (succeeding Chen Xi), and Governor of Shandong Province (succeeding Gong Zheng).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会会议的年度例行统称。例如，《穹顶之下》在2015年两会前夕发布，引发了与会代表和委员的热议；此外，2016年两会期间，要求习近平辞职的公开信发表，被视为敏感事件。
description.en: The collective term for the annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) of the People's Republic of China. For instance, 'Under the Dome' was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions, sparking heated discussions among delegates and members; additionally, the open letter demanding Xi Jinping's resignation was published during the 2016 Two Sessions, making it a sensitive event.

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街街道

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市西城区西长安街街道，中南海内，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国国务院所在地，中共中央政治局的办公地点之一。这里是中华人民共和国国务院、中共中央书记处和中共中央办公厅等重要机关的办公所在地，亦是中国部分党和国家领导人的居所。此外，这里也是光绪帝被长期软禁并最终逝世的地点。
description.en: Located on Xichang'an Street, Xicheng District, Beijing, China, within Zhongnanhai, it serves as the headquarters for the Communist Party of China and the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and one of the offices for the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. It is the office location for important organs such as the State Council, the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, and the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, and also the residence for some party and state leaders. Furthermore, it is the place where Emperor Guangxu was long-term confined and eventually passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创始人和早期领导人之一，中华人民共和国开国元勋。他曾担任中国共产党和中华人民共和国的法官及政治人物，历任中华人民共和国代主席、国家副主席（与宋庆龄共同）、中央人民政府政务院副总理及第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。他被誉为“延安五老”之一，并于1947年提议建立统一的中国人民银行。他是董良翚之父，许涤新曾协助其工作。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman, one of the founders and early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a founding father of the PRC. He served as a judge and political figure for the CPC and PRC, having held positions such as acting chairman of the PRC, co-vice chairman with Song Qingling, Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He was known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an' and proposed the establishment of a unified People's Bank of China in 1947. He was the father of Dong Lianghui, and Xu Dixin once assisted him.

birth_place.zh-cn: 上海公共租界东有恒路628号C

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、社会活动家、孙中山遗孀。曾任第四届全国人大常委会副委员长，后获任中华人民共和国名誉主席。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, social activist, and widow of Sun Yat-sen. She served as Vice Chairwoman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and later became Honorary Chairwoman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 他是一位中国共产党内的马克思主义理论家和政治家，曾任毛泽东秘书、中共中央政治局委员、中国社会科学院院长。他负责起草了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》，并参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的修改工作。他还曾反对周扬提出的“人道主义”和“异化”观点，并起草报告进行批判。
description.en: He was a Chinese politician and Marxist theorist within the Communist Party of China, who served as Mao Zedong's secretary, a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and President of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences. He was responsible for drafting the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' and participated in the revision of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'. He also opposed Zhou Yang's views on 'humanitarianism' and 'alienation', drafting reports to criticize them.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2012年11月8日至14日在北京召开的第十八次全国代表大会。
description.en: The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, held in Beijing from November 8 to 14, 2012.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
中华人民共和国国家监察机关
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关，在中共十九届二中全会后被写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: The highest state supervisory body of the People's Republic of China, which was written into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China after the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，负责审理“陕西千亿矿权案”的二审和终审，罗豪才曾任副院长。该机关还参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China. It is responsible for the second instance and final adjudication of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case', where Luo Haocai once served as Vice President. Additionally, it participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北河沿大街147号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高检察机关和最高法律监督机关。设有中共中央纪委、国家监委派驻的纪检监察机构，曾依法决定逮捕成克杰，并参与联合颁布《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。近期，负责核准了对邯郸初中生杀人案中三名未满14周岁嫌疑人追诉刑事责任的决定。
description.en: The highest procuratorial and legal supervision organ of the People's Republic of China. It houses disciplinary inspection and supervision agencies dispatched by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission. It once legally decided to arrest Cheng Kejie and participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'. Recently, it approved the decision to prosecute three suspects under the age of 14 in the Handan junior high school student murder case.

zh-cn: Chairman of the People's Republic of China
en: Chairman of the People's Republic of China
President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆政治及国际关系学者、网络名人、电视人。现任复旦大学中国研究院院长、特聘教授，国家高端智库理事会理事，上海春秋发展战略研究院高级研究员。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and international relations scholar, internet celebrity, and television personality. He is the Director of the China Institute of Fudan University and a distinguished professor, a council member of the national high-end think tanks, and a senior research fellow at the Shanghai Chunqiu Institute for Development and Strategic Studies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国共产党与中国工农红军主要领导者之一，中共五大书记之一。他曾任红二方面军政治委员，是长征期间重要的政治领导人。他与萧克率领红六军团西征，李达时任参谋长。作为中国共产党早期领导人，他于1948年发表文章纠正土改运动中的“左”倾偏向。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China, one of the primary leaders of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, and one of the 'Five Secretaries' of the CPC. He served as Political Commissar of the Second Front Army and was an important political leader during the Long March. Along with Xiao Ke, he led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, with Li Da serving as Chief of Staff. As an early leader of the CPC, he published an article in 1948 to correct 'leftist' deviations in the Land Reform Movement.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常委会
中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导机构，也是中国共产党的最高权力常设机关。它作为中央委员会的核心领导层、中央政治局的常设机构，实际是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导及决策机构。其通常由7名成员组成。李克强（2007-2022）、贾庆林（第十六届、第十七届）、李富春等曾担任该机构成员。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the permanent body of the CPC's highest authority. As the core leadership of the Central Committee and the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau, it de facto serves as the top leadership and decision-making body for both the CPC and the PRC. It typically consists of 7 members. Li Keqiang (2007-2022), Jia Qinglin (16th and 17th committees), Li Fuchun, and others have served as members of this body.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清安徽省安庆府怀宁县十里铺
birth_place.en: Shilipu, Huaining County, Anqing Prefecture, Anhui Province, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国四川省江津县
death_place.en: Jiangjin County, Sichuan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代思想家、政治家、革命家，新文化运动的主要开创者、倡导者和领袖之一，曾担任《新青年》杂志主编。他也是中国共产主义同盟的创始人及首任书记，中国共产党的主要创始人、早期领导人、首任总书记，东京振武学校校友，是陈延年和陈乔年的父亲。民国初年，他反对将孔教立为国教。五四运动后，他思想转向马克思主义。在其任期内，于四一二事件中被国民政府通缉。张太雷曾在八七会议上与其路线进行斗争。后因反对中共在中东路事件中“武装保卫苏联”的口号，被开除党籍。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker, politician, and revolutionary, he was a key initiator, advocate, and leader of the New Culture Movement, and served as editor-in-chief of 'New Youth' magazine. He was also the founder and first secretary of the Communist League of China, a main founder and early leader of the Communist Party of China, and its first General Secretary. An alumnus of the Tokyo Shinbu Gakkō, he was also the father of Chen Yannian and Chen Qiaonian. In the early Republic of China, he opposed establishing Confucianism as the state religion. After the May Fourth Movement, his ideology shifted towards Marxism. During his tenure, he was listed as a wanted criminal by the Nationalist Government after the April 12th Incident. Zhang Tailei opposed his political line at the 7 August Conference. He was later expelled from the Party for opposing the CCP's slogan of 'Arming to defend the Soviet Union' during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军创始人之一，中国共产党早期主要领导人。在南昌起义前夕作为中央代表抵达南昌，以共产国际指示为由，一度试图阻止起义。他曾反对共产国际任命其担任苏区中央局书记。作为红四方面军主要领导人，在与红一方面军会师后，因路线分歧另立中央，后被迫取消。在长征期间，其南下路线遭到李富春的反对。最终，他脱党并因与中央分裂而被开除党籍。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Liberation Army, and an early leader of the CCP. On the eve of the Nanchang Uprising, he arrived as a central representative and, citing Comintern instructions, briefly attempted to prevent the uprising. He had previously opposed the Comintern's appointment of him as the secretary of the Soviet Area Central Bureau. As a key leader of the Fourth Front Army, after joining forces with the First Front Army, he established a separate party central committee due to strategic disagreements, which was later forced to be dissolved. During the Long March, his proposed southern route was opposed by Li Fuchun. Ultimately, he left the party and was expelled due to a split with the central committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Chinese Communist Party
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CCP
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构，同时也是中国共产党的中央机构之一。李富春、余秋里曾任其书记。该机构还直接领导中国科学技术协会。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China, and one of its central bodies. Li Fuchun and Yu Qiuli both served as secretaries. The body also directly leads the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一。他由张太雷介绍加入中国共产党，曾两度担任中国共产党实际最高领导人，并在向忠发之前担任中共最高领导人，后被派回国纠正李立三路线。他也是一位社会主义革命家、作家、诗人、翻译家、文学评论家。1935年被国民党逮捕后，在福建长汀被宋希濂奉命枪决。
description.en: An early principal leader of the Chinese Communist Party. He was introduced to join the CPC by Zhang Tailei and served as the actual highest leader twice, including before Xiang Zhongfa, later being sent back to China to correct the Lisan Line. He was also a socialist revolutionary, writer, poet, translator, and literary critic. In 1935, he was arrested by the KMT and subsequently executed by order in Changting, Fujian, by Song Xilian's troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、政治人物。他曾任国家级副职领导人，是对外工作的开拓者之一。在遵义会议上，他支持毛泽东，并与毛泽东、周恩来组成了新的“三人团”。
description.en: An early leader and political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a former state-level deputy leader and was one of the pioneers in foreign affairs. He supported Mao Zedong at the Zunyi Conference and later formed the new 'Trio' with Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai.

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的伟大无产阶级革命家、军事家、政治家。他是中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，中国人民解放军的创始人和缔造者之一。他曾是南昌起义的主要领导人之一，担任中共前敌委员会参谋团参谋长，并任中国工农红军总参谋长。长征期间，他与彝族首领小叶丹结盟，确保红军顺利通过彝族区。在战争时期，他长期与邓小平搭档，并曾任中央军委战略小组组长。曾率部队俘虏孙殿英。在政治生涯后期，他担任第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A great proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He was one of the Ten Marshals of the PRC, and one of the founders and creators of the People's Liberation Army. He was one of the main leaders of the Nanchang Uprising, serving as Chief of Staff of the CCP Front Committee's staff group, and also as Chief of the General Staff of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. During the Long March, he formed an alliance with the Yi leader Xiao Yedan, ensuring the Red Army's safe passage through the Yi region. During wartime, he was a long-term partner of Deng Xiaoping and once served as the head of the Central Military Commission's strategic group. His troops once captured Sun Dianying. In his later political career, he served as the Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西北军将领，与张学良共同发动西安事变。
description.en: Leader of the Northwestern Army and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期“三大战役”之一，由中国人民解放军华东野战军、中原野战军在以徐州为中心，东起海州，西至商丘，北起临城，南达淮河的广大地区，对中华民国国军发动的战略性进攻战役。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the second Chinese Civil War, a strategic offensive launched by the People's Liberation Army's East China Field Army and Central Plains Field Army against the Republic of China Army.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党第十九届中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee
Politburo of the CPC Central Committee
Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Politburo of the Communist Party of China
Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee
Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，是其中央委员会的常设机构。在全体会议闭会期间行使中央委员会职权，其组成人员是党和国家领导人。向忠发曾任主席，李富春、陈永贵、余秋里、马凯曾是其成员；陈延年曾任第五届候补委员。该机构曾作出对陈良宇立案调查的决定。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party, and a standing institution of its Central Committee. It exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when its plenary session is not in session. Its members are party and state leaders. Xiang Zhongfa once served as its chairman, and Li Fuchun, Chen Yonggui, Yu Qiuli, and Ma Kai were members; Chen Yannian served as an alternate member of the 5th Politburo. This body also made the decision to investigate Chen Liangyu.

en: West Route Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 1936年10月，中国工农红军红四方面军主力约2.18万人，在甘肃靖远西渡黄河后，改称西路军（初称河西部队）。该部队奉命执行宁夏战役计划，但在河西走廊几乎全军覆没。
description.en: Formed in October 1936, the Western Route Army (initially known as the Hexi Force) consisted of the main force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army's Fourth Front Army (approximately 21,800 troops) after crossing the Yellow River in Jingyuan, Gansu. Tasked with executing the Ningxia Campaign Plan and establishing a base in Hexi to open a route to the Soviet Union, the force was nearly annihilated in the Hexi Corridor.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期四川地方军队的称谓，朱德曾在此进行动员工作

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝河南省陈州府项城县袁张营
birth_place.en: Yuanzhangying, Xiangcheng, Chenzhou, Henan, Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯是清末民初的军事家、政治家，北洋军的创始者与领导者，也是北洋军阀的奠基人。在戊戌政变中向荣禄告密，导致维新派失败。晚清重臣，曾任山东巡抚，镇压义和团，创办山东大学堂；后任直隶总督，选派留学生。他逼迫清帝溥仪退位，后任中华民国临时大总统及第一任正式大总统，曾称帝建立中华帝国但未能成功登基。他被认为是刺杀宋教仁的幕后主使，其称帝获章宗祥支持，陈独秀则参与反对他的“二次革命”。
description.en: Yuan Shikai was a military and politician during the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China, and the founder and leader of the Beiyang Army, laying the groundwork for the Beiyang warlords. During the Wuxu Coup, he informed Ronglu, leading to the reformists' failure. As an influential official in the late Qing, he served as Governor of Shandong, suppressing the Boxer Rebellion and establishing Shandong University; later as Viceroy of Zhili, he sent students abroad. He forced Emperor Puyi's abdication, subsequently serving as the Provisional and first Formal President of the Republic of China, and attempted to establish the Empire of China but failed to formally ascend the throne. He was considered the mastermind behind Song Jiaoren's assassination; his imperial ambitions were supported by Zhang Zongxiang, while Chen Duxiu participated in the 'Second Revolution' against him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，北洋军阀直系首领之一及代表人物。以其军事才能闻名，是直系军阀的实际军事领导者。在第二次直奉战争失败后发动反奉战争，后与张作霖联合讨伐冯玉祥。他是北伐战争的讨伐对象。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China, one of the leaders and a representative figure of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang Warlords. Known for his military skills, he was the de facto military leader of the clique. After being defeated in the Second Zhili-Fengtian War, he initiated the Anti-Fengtian War and later allied with Zhang Zuolin to attack Feng Yuxiang. He was an object of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将和政治人物，奉系军阀领袖张作霖长子，东北军将领，西安事变发动者之一。在其父死后，他继承父业统治东北，并宣布东北易帜归顺国民政府。他曾指挥东北军在中东路事件中与苏联作战，并在中原大战后期通电拥蒋，率军入关，影响了战局。因与杨宇霆、常荫槐权力斗争及积怨，下令将其二人处决。他还曾收编孙殿英部，在热河战役时命其驰援。他与堂兄张学成一同就读奉天讲武堂，后因张学成投靠日本而下令将其剿杀。
description.en: A prominent military and political figure of the Republic of China, the first son of warlord Zhang Zuolin, a leader of the Northeastern Army, and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. After his father's death, he inherited the rule of Northeast China and declared allegiance to the Nationalist Government. He commanded the Northeastern Army against the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929, and in the later stages of the Central Plains War, he publicly endorsed Chiang Kai-shek, leading his forces into Shanhaiguan and influencing the outcome. Due to a power struggle and accumulated resentment with Yang Yuting and Chang Yinhuai, he ordered their execution. He also incorporated Sun Dianying's forces and ordered them to reinforce Rehe during the Battle of Rehe. He attended the Fengtian Military Academy with his cousin Zhang Xuecheng, whom he later ordered killed for collaborating with the Japanese.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，二十八个半布尔什维克成员。他曾任张闻天的前任（中共中央总书记），并在向忠发死后接任中共中央总负责人。在第五次反围剿战争中，他与李德共同担任实际领导者，并为战争的失败负主要责任，最终在遵义会议上被剥夺最高军事指挥权。他最终在黑茶山空难中遇难。
description.en: One of the early key leaders of the Communist Party of China and a member of the '28 Bolsheviks'. He served as Zhang Wentian's predecessor (General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), and took over as the head of the CCP after Xiang Zhongfa's death. During the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign, he, along with Li De, served as one of the actual leaders and was held primarily responsible for its failure, ultimately being stripped of supreme military command at the Zunyi Conference. He later died in the Heichashan air crash.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派往中国的苏联军事顾问。曾在中国工农红军中担任指挥职务，但因不了解中国战场特点，其军事指挥导致第五次反围剿战争失败，后在遵义会议上被剥夺军事指挥权。
description.en: A Soviet military advisor sent by the Comintern to China. He held command positions in the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, but due to his lack of understanding of the Chinese battlefield, his military command led to the failure of the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign, and he was later stripped of military command at the Zunyi Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治家，晋系军阀的创始人和最高领导人，亦是反蒋联军的“中华民国陆海空军总司令”。他长期统治山西，被称为“山西王”。美国《时代杂志》在1930年称其为“模范督军”，并认为他为山西带来了繁荣。中原大战期间，军阀孙殿英曾依附于他，其部队后被他收编。此外，他还是东京振武学校的校友。
description.en: A military strategist and politician of the Republic of China, founder and supreme leader of the Jin clique, and also the commander-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition forces. He ruled Shanxi for a long period and was known as the "King of Shanxi". In 1930, Time Magazine called him a "model governor" who brought prosperity to Shanxi. During the Central Plains War, warlord Sun Dianying was aligned with him, and his troops were later absorbed by him. He was also an alumnus of the Tokyo Shinbu Gakkō.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，新桂系核心代表人物。曾任中华民国首任国防部部长、华中剿匪总司令、淞沪戒严司令部司令，是四一二事件的主要执行者之一。他曾与杨宇霆在冀东会晤，引发其意图取代张学良并对抗蒋介石的谣言，并于事件后奉命来台宣慰。他是白先勇之父。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army and a representative figure of the New Guangxi clique. He served as the first Minister of National Defense of the Republic of China, Commander-in-Chief of Bandits Suppression in Central China, and commander of the Shanghai Martial Law Command, being one of the main executors of the April 12th Incident. He met with Yang Yuting in eastern Hebei, sparking rumors of their intention to replace Zhang Xueliang and oppose Chiang Kai-shek, and was later ordered to Taiwan for appeasement. He is the father of Bai Xianyong.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争中八路军发动的一次大规模战役
1962年10月至11月发生在中华人民共和国和印度共和国之间的一场边境战争。
中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，正国级领导人。曾任东北民主联军副政委、中央人民政府副主席、国家计划委员会主席。作为中华人民共和国早期主要领导人之一，他是“五马进京”事件核心人物之一，后因“高岗饶漱石事件”被打为反党集团首领并倒台，最终自杀。小说《刘志丹》被指控为高岗翻案，是其主要罪名之一。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a state-level leader. He served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Northeast Democratic United Army, Vice Chairman of the Central People's Government, and Chairman of the State Planning Commission. As one of the early main leaders of the PRC, he was one of the core figures in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident, later labeled the leader of an anti-Party clique due to the 'Gao Gang-Rao Shushi Incident', eventually falling from power and committing suicide. One of the main accusations against the novel 'Liu Zhidan' was that it was an attempt to reverse the verdict on Gao Gang.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇的第六任妻子，曾任中华人民共和国第一夫人、物理学家、全国政协常委。
抗日战争期间，国民革命军与新四军之间发生的军事冲突，属于国共摩擦范畴。此次事件中，国民党军队袭击新四军，其军部遭到围攻。
中国共产党早期领导人、中华人民共和国政治人物。曾担任新四军与山东军区合并后的政治委员。他曾任副国级领导人及中共华东局第一书记，是“五马进京”事件核心人物之一，后因“高饶反党联盟”事件倒台并被打倒。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a political figure of the People's Republic of China. He served as the political commissar after the merger of the New Fourth Army and the Shandong Military Region in 1946. He later served as a vice-national level leader and the First Secretary of the CPC East China Bureau, and was one of the core figures in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident. He was subsequently purged due to the 'Gao-Rao Anti-Party Alliance' incident.

description.zh-cn: 他是一位杰出的无产阶级革命家和理论家、忠诚的马克思主义者，中国共产党早期及长征时期的重要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记、中央政治局常委和中华人民共和国外交部副部长。遵义会议后，他接替博古负总责。他曾批准刘少奇保释干部，后因在庐山会议支持彭德怀而被定为反党集团成员。1964年，他因《生产价格论》一文与孙冶方一同被打成“张孙反党联盟”。
description.en: He was an outstanding proletarian revolutionary and theorist, a loyal Marxist, and an important leader of the Chinese Communist Party during its early period and the Long March. He served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, and Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China. After the Zunyi Conference, he succeeded Bo Gu in taking overall responsibility. He approved Liu Shaoqi's decision to bail out cadres but was later labeled a member of an anti-Party group for supporting Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference. In 1964, due to his article 'On the Price of Production', he was further labeled, along with Sun Yefang, as part of the 'Zhang-Sun anti-Party clique'.

description.zh-cn: 中国杂交水稻育种专家，中国工程院院士，美国国家科学院外籍院士。因其在20世纪60-70年代对杂交水稻品种的研究，显著提高了中国及世界各地的粮食产量，被誉为“杂交水稻之父”。
description.en: A Chinese agronomist, member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, and foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences. He is renowned as the "Father of Hybrid Rice" for his research on hybrid rice varieties in the 1960s and 1970s, which significantly increased food production in China and around the world.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗巴列维王朝的末代国王，在1979年伊朗伊斯兰革命中被推翻。
description.en: The last Shah of the Pahlavi dynasty in Iran, overthrown in the 1979 Iranian Revolution.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门，是中华人民共和国人民警察的最高领导和指挥机关，也是中国的国家警察机关。它负责起草《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。该机构曾于1999年7月29日对李洪志发布全国通缉令，此前与其保持正面关系。2003年，还公布了首批“东突”恐怖组织名单，包括“东伊运”。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security is a component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, serving as the supreme leading and command organ of the People's Police and China's national police agency. It is responsible for drafting the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China'. The agency issued a nationwide wanted notice for Li Hongzhi on July 29, 1999, having previously maintained positive relations with him. In 2003, it also announced the first list of 'East Turkestan' terrorist organizations, including ETIM.

description.zh-cn: "凡是派"是中华人民共和国在文化大革命结束后，由时任中共中央主席华国锋等人提出的政治原则和执政指导思想。它主张绝对遵循毛泽东的一切决策和指示，即“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”。该方针旨在维持毛泽东时代的政策和思想路线，并因此成为真理标准大讨论中被批判的核心观点。
description.en: "Whateverism" (Two Whatevers) was a political principle and governing guiding ideology proposed by Hua Guofeng and others, then Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, after the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China. It advocated for absolute adherence to Mao Zedong's decisions and instructions, stating: 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave.' This principle aimed to maintain the policies and ideological line of the Mao Zedong era and became the central point of criticism in the Truth Criterion Discussion.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国死亡人数最多的一次地震。
叶剑英与冯华的长子，叶选宁之兄，中国政治人物。曾任广东省省长、全国政协常务副主席。
description.en: The eldest son of Ye Jianying and Feng Hua, older brother of Ye Xuaning, a Chinese politician. He served as the Governor of Guangdong Province and Executive Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治与军事人物，中国共产党党员，中国人民解放军少将。他是叶剑英与曾宪植之子，被称为“独臂将军”。曾任总政联络部部长，在中共第二代高干子弟中具影响力，有“太子党的精神领袖”之称。
description.en: A political and military figure of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a major general in the People's Liberation Army. He was the son of Ye Jianying and Zeng Xianzhi, known as the 'one-armed general'. He served as the head of the Liaison Department of the General Political Department, was influential among the second generation of high-ranking cadres' children, and was sometimes referred to as the 'spiritual leader of the princelings'.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英的三子，中国人民解放军少将，叶选宁之弟。
description.en: The third son of Ye Jianying, a major general in the People's Liberation Army, and younger brother of Ye Xuaning.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期军事及政治人物，粤系军阀的代表人物。他曾炮轰总统府，也曾与孙中山合作但之后反目。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China era, representative of the Yue clique. He once cooperated with Sun Yat-sen but later became his opponent.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领袖、革命家，曾任黄埔军校党代表。
description.en: A revolutionary of the Kuomintang, served as the Party Representative of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党早期领导人之一，中华民国大陆时期政要、诗人。他早年是革命者，曾策划暗杀摄政王载沣被捕，后因章宗祥干预免死。他曾任武汉国民政府主席，是国民党左派领袖，与蒋介石在分共方式上存在分歧导致宁汉分裂。在四一二政变后曾与陈独秀发表联合宣言，但不久后便发动七一五事变与共产党决裂。最终成为汪精卫政权的首脑。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Kuomintang, a prominent politician and poet during the Republic of China era on the mainland. In his early years, he was a revolutionary who plotted the assassination of Prince-Regent Zaifeng and was subsequently arrested, later saved from the death penalty due to Zhang Zongxiang's intervention. He served as chairman of the Wuhan Nationalist Government and was a leader of the Kuomintang's left wing. His disagreements with Chiang Kai-shek over the method of purging communists led to the Nanjing-Wuhan split. After the April 12 Purge, he issued a joint declaration with Chen Duxiu, but soon launched the July 15 Incident to break with the communists. Ultimately, he became the head of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，北伐名将，中国人民解放军创建者之一。曾任新四军军长。在南昌起义中担任前敌总指挥兼第十一军军长，是起义的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Chinese military strategist, a famous general of the Northern Expedition, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army. He served as the commander of the New Fourth Army, and during the Nanchang Uprising, he was the Frontline Commander-in-Chief and Commander of the 11th Army, being one of the main leaders of the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物、建筑师，曾任第64、65任内阁总理大臣。因平民出身被称为“庶民宰相”，但也因洛克希德事件等丑闻备受争议。他曾代表日方签署《中日联合声明》，也是石破二朗的朋友，曾劝说石破茂进入政界。
description.en: Japanese politician and architect who served as the 64th and 65th Prime Minister of Japan. Known as the 'commoner prime minister' for his humble origins, he was also controversial due to scandals like the Lockheed affair. He signed the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué on behalf of Japan, and was a friend of Jirō Ishiba who persuaded Shigeru Ishiba to enter politics.

birth_place.en: Futada Village, Kariwa District, Niigata Prefecture

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英的养女，中国作家、记者，曾与李泽厚一同参与六四事件期间的呼吁。
description.en: Adopted daughter of Ye Jianying, a Chinese author and journalist who joined Li Zehou in an appeal during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，晋系重要将领，曾任晋绥军将领。历任国民党华北剿匪总司令，在平津战役中率部和平改编，促成北平解放，并于第二次国共内战末期投向中国共产党。他是一位中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国水利部、水利电力部部长。其军事生涯中曾攻击并缴械孙殿英的部队。
description.en: General (Second Class) of the Republic of China Army and an important general of the Jin clique, also serving as a general of the Jinsui Army. He was the former Commander-in-Chief of the Kuomintang's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters. During the Pingjin Campaign, he led his troops to accept peaceful reorganization, facilitating the liberation of Beiping, and later defected to the Chinese Communist Party at the end of the Chinese Civil War. A Chinese military strategist and politician, he served as Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China. Notably, he once attacked and disarmed Sun Dianying's troops during his military career.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来妻子，中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一。她曾任全国政协主席，并担任第四届全国人大常委会委员，后补选为副委员长。
description.en: Wife of Zhou Enlai, a political figure of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level leader. She was one of the 'Eight Immortals' of the CCP, served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, and was a member and later elected Vice Chairwoman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学，位于中国天津市，是一所著名综合性研究型大学，由教育家严修、张伯苓创办。周恩来、姚依林、孟凡利、艾跃进等曾就读于此，艾跃进亦曾在此长期任教。抗战期间，曾与北大、清华合并组建国立西南联合大学。
description.en: Nankai University, located in Tianjin, China, is a renowned comprehensive research university founded by educators Yan Xiu and Zhang Boling.
