Zhou Enlai, Yao Yilin, Meng Fanli, Ai Yuejin, and others studied there, with Ai Yuejin also serving as a long-term faculty member. During the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, it merged with Peking University and Tsinghua University to form the National Southwest Associated University.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
中央纪委国家监委驻外交部纪检监察组
中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻外交部纪检监察组
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区朝阳门南大街2号
location.en: No. 2, Chaoyangmen South Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管外交事务的组成部门。它多次就香港民主派初选案等事件表态，支持香港警方的行动并反对外国干涉。该机构内部设有中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会和中华人民共和国国家监察委员会派驻的纪检监察机构，负责对其进行纪律检查和监督。
description.en: The component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs. It has repeatedly commented on incidents such as the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries case, supporting the actions of the Hong Kong police and opposing foreign interference. Within the department, there is a disciplinary and supervisory agency dispatched by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC and the National Supervisory Commission of the PRC, responsible for its discipline inspection and oversight.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林立果、林立衡之母，曾任中共第九届中央政治局委员，林彪反革命集团案主犯之一，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao, mother of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任空军司令员。林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: An Air Force General of the People's Liberation Army, once served as Commander of the Air Force. One of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，林彪反革命集团主要成员之一，曾任海军政治委员。
description.en: A Navy Vice Admiral of the People's Liberation Army, one of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将。作为林彪集团主要成员，他曾任总后勤部部长，并是林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army. As a key member of the Lin Biao group, he once served as the Minister of the General Logistics Department and was one of the principal culprits of the Lin Biao anti-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中共中央政治局主席、中共中央总书记。因出身工人阶级而被共产国际提拔，但实际领导权多由周恩来、李立三等人掌握。1931年在上海被国民政府逮捕后迅速叛变并被处决。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), serving as Chairman of the CCP Central Politburo and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He was promoted by the Comintern due to his working-class background, but actual leadership was often held by others like Zhou Enlai and Li Lisan. After his arrest by the Nationalist government in Shanghai in 1931, he quickly defected and was executed.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人。他曾任中共驻共产国际代表团团长，后被共产国际派遣回国，逐渐取代向忠发成为中共实际领导人，并在向忠发死后代理总书记。他被认为是“左”倾教条主义的代表，国际派人物，二十八个半布尔什维克之一，也是瞿秋白的政治对手。其宗派主义和肃反扩大化错误导致孙冶方受到处分。1938年，他与康生等人领导了对陈独秀的抹黑攻击，指控其为“汉奸”。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party. He served as the head of the CCP delegation to the Comintern, and after being sent back to China by the Comintern, he gradually replaced Xiang Zhongfa as the de facto leader of the CCP, and later served as acting General Secretary after Xiang's death. He was considered a representative of 'left' dogmatism, a figure of the International Faction, one of the '28 and a half Bolsheviks', and a political opponent of Qu Qiubai. His factionalism and expansion of purges led to Sun Yefang being disciplined. In 1938, he, along with Kang Sheng and others, led the smear campaign against Chen Duxiu, accusing him of being a 'traitor'.

zh-cn: 理查德·米尔豪斯·尼克松

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国副总统，并在1960年总统选举中作为共和党候选人与肯尼迪竞争，后成为美国第37任总统。他于1972年访华，与毛泽东会晤，推动了中美关系正常化，并为中日建交创造了条件。此次访问导致中阿关系破裂，并于1973年在白宫会见了田中角荣。
description.en: American politician, served as Vice President, and competed with Kennedy as a Republican candidate in the 1960 presidential election, later becoming the 37th President of the United States. His 1972 visit to China, including a meeting with Mao Zedong, promoted the normalization of Sino-US relations and created conditions for the establishment of Sino-Japanese diplomatic relations. This visit led to the breakdown of Sino-Albanian relations, and in 1973, he met with Kakuei Tanaka at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交家、政治家及国际关系专家，曾任美国国家安全顾问和国务卿。他亦曾对薄熙来主政时期的重庆发展持正面评价，并拜访过少林寺。
description.en: An American diplomat, political scientist, and international relations expert, who served as United States National Security Advisor and Secretary of State. He once held a positive view of Chongqing's development during Bo Xilai's era and visited the Shaolin Temple.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣并支援朝鲜的武装力量。以“志愿”军队名义参战，并是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the armed force dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War to aid North Korea. It participated under the guise of a 'volunteer' army and was a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀的第二任妻子。
湘军，是晚清时期由曾国藩组建的湖南地方武装，其活动延续至民国初年，是清朝镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。黄公略曾于1916年加入此部队。
description.en: The Xiang Army was a regional army from Hunan organized by Zeng Guofan during the late Qing Dynasty. Its operations extended into the early Republic of China period, serving as the primary military force for the Qing dynasty in suppressing the Taiping Rebellion. Huang Gonglue joined this force in 1916.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，鲁涤平在湖南省政府主席职位上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese military figure, predecessor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Hunan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，红十五军团的指挥官。
description.en: A Senior General of the People's Liberation Army and commander of the 15th Army Group of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，长期负责中共情报保卫和特务工作，曾任中共中央社会部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Communist Party, long responsible for intelligence and secret service work, who served as the head of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军和八路军高级将领。曾任红一军团参谋长、代理军团长，后任八路军副参谋长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the Eighth Route Army. He served as Chief of Staff and acting Commander of the Red First Army Group, and later as Deputy Chief of Staff of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将、国民革命军将领，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是蒋介石最信任的将领之一。曾参与东征、北伐、长征期间对红军的围堵、抗日战争和国共内战，号称“西北王”。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army and National Revolutionary Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, and one of Chiang Kai-shek's most trusted generals. He participated in the Eastern Expedition, Northern Expedition, the encirclement and blocking of the Red Army during the Long March, the Second Sino-Japanese War, and the Chinese Civil War, known as the 'King of the Northwest'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清浙江省宁波府镇海县
birth_place.en: Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市
death_place.en: Taipei, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，青海王。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军新疆军区

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将、菲律宾陆军元帅，曾任美国陆军参谋长、联合国军总司令、驻日盟军总司令，代表同盟国接受日本投降并主导了战后对日本的占领。在莱特湾海战期间，第七舰队归其指挥的西南太平洋方面军管辖。1949年曾邀请孙立人至东京会谈，表示美国将支持其防卫台湾。
description.en: An American five-star general and Field Marshal of the Philippine Army, who was Chief of Staff of the United States Army, Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command, and Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers. He accepted Japan's surrender on behalf of the Allies and led the post-war occupation of Japan. During the Battle of Leyte Gulf, the Seventh Fleet was under the command of his Southwest Pacific Area. In 1949, he invited Sun Li-jen to Tokyo for talks, stating that the United States would support him in defending Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的长子，毛岸青之兄，任彭德怀秘书，在朝鲜战争中阵亡。
description.en: The eldest son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui, older brother of Mao Anqing, and secretary to Peng Dehuai, who was killed in action during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创立者和首任最高领导人，被尊为“共和国永远的主席”，曾任朝鲜总理。他曾是游击队派首领。在朝鲜战争期间，他担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，并签署了《朝鲜停战协定》。1950年代，他在国内对延安派以及“去斯大林化”的支持者进行了政治清洗。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, honored as the 'Eternal President of the Republic', and also served as Premier of North Korea. He was a leader of the Guerrilla faction. During the Korean War, he served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army and signed the Korean Armistice Agreement. In the 1950s, he conducted political purges domestically against the Yan'an faction and supporters of de-Stalinization.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军元帅、中华人民共和国元帅、中国共产党军事家、政治家，中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的创建者与领导人之一。他曾任红一军团政治部主任、中国人民解放军总政治部主任、中央人民政府最高人民检察署检察长。在抗日战争和第二次国共内战期间，他组建并领导山东军区，对中共在山东乃至全国的军事胜利起到了关键作用。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China, a Chinese Communist military leader and politician, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China. He served as Director of the Political Department of the Red First Army Group, Director of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army, and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the Central People's Government. During the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War, he founded and led the Shandong Military Region, playing a crucial role in the CCP's military victories in Shandong and across the country.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥，中华民国军事将领及政治人物，西北军领袖，民国军阀。早年曾是直系将领，在第二次直奉战争中接受奉系贿赂，倒戈发动甲子政变（即北京政变），导致直系战败并将溥仪逐出紫禁城。因其部队被称为“基督将军”。他曾创办西北军第二军官学校，并作为反蒋联军副总司令之一，在中原大战中与阎锡山联合反蒋。其部下石友三曾火烧少林寺。孙殿英曾依附于其名下。
description.en: Feng Yuxiang, a military general and political figure in the Republic of China, leader of the Guominjun (Northwest Army), and a warlord. Early in his career, he was a general of the Zhili clique. During the Second Zhili-Fengtian War, he accepted a heavy bribe from the Fengtian clique, defected, and launched the Beijing Coup, leading to the Zhili clique's defeat and the expulsion of Puyi from the Forbidden City. He was known as the 'Christian General' for his troops. He founded the Northwest Army Second Military Officers' School and served as one of the deputy commanders-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition, allying with Yan Xishan against Chiang Kai-shek in the Central Plains War. His subordinate Shi Yousan once set fire to the Shaolin Temple. Sun Dianying briefly aligned with him.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军政治委员，西路军政委，同时也是长征期间重要的政治领导人之一。
description.en: Political Commissar of the Fourth Front Army and the Western Route Army, and an important political leader during the Long March.

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·奥古斯特·哥廷根大学

description.zh-cn: 位于德国哥廷根的公立研究型大学，朱德曾在此留学。
description.en: A public research university in Göttingen, Germany.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
中共中央纪律检查委员会
十三届中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关。该机构负责对薄熙来、陈良宇、周本顺、成克杰等事件立案调查，并据报道是推动香港修订《逃犯条例》的真正倡议者。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China. It is responsible for investigating incidents involving figures like Bo Xilai, Chen Liangyu, Zhou Benshun, and Cheng Kejie, and was reportedly the true initiator behind Hong Kong's push to amend the extradition law.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命是一场全国性资产阶级民主革命，推翻了清朝统治，建立了中华民国。革命始于1911年武昌起义，促使清宣统帝退位。北洋军阀袁世凯利用军事实力攫取革命果实，摄政王载沣顺应潮流辞职。此次革命由邵玉轩斥巨资资助，鲁涤平也曾参与其中。革命后，梁思成随家人从日本回国。
description.en: The Xinhai Revolution was a nationwide bourgeois democratic revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China. It began with the Wuchang Uprising in 1911, leading to the abdication of Emperor Xuantong. Warlord Yuan Shikai exploited his military power to seize the revolution's fruits, and Prince-Regent Zaifeng resigned in response to the changing times. The revolution received significant funding from Shao Yuxuan, and Lu Diping also participated. After the revolution, Liang Sicheng returned to China from Japan with his family.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物、军阀，曾为冯玉祥部下，国民革命军将领。1928年，他曾纵火焚烧少林寺，造成严重破坏。张作霖死后，张学成曾投靠于他。在中原大战中，他加入反蒋联军并任第四方面军指挥官，后在该战役中失败。
description.en: A military figure and warlord of the Republic of China, formerly a subordinate of Feng Yuxiang and a general of the National Revolutionary Army. In 1928, he set fire to the Shaolin Temple, causing severe damage. After Zhang Zuolin's death, Zhang Xuecheng once defected to him. During the Central Plains War, he joined the anti-Chiang coalition as the commander of the 4th Front Army and was later defeated in the war.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军二级上将，中华民国军事将领。赵家骧曾在其麾下任职。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, holding the rank of Second-rank General in the National Revolutionary Army. Zhao Jiaxiang served under him.

birth_place.en: Wugang Prefecture, Baoqing Fu, Hunan Province

description.zh-cn: 清末民初著名政治家、军事家，东京振武学校校友。他曾是梁启超在时务学堂的学生，也是护国运动（护国战争）的主要组织者和领导者，发动战争反对袁世凯称帝。他被誉为“护国大将军”，并曾遭遇袁世凯派遣的刺客暗杀但幸免于难。
description.en: A famous politician and military strategist of the late Qing and early Republic of China periods, and an alumnus of the Tokyo Shinbu Gakkō. He was a student of Liang Qichao at the Academy of Current Affairs, and a key organizer and leader of the National Protection War, which he launched against Yuan Shikai's attempt to restore monarchy. Hailed as the 'Great General of National Protection', he also survived an assassination attempt by assassins sent by Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群之子，中华人民共和国文化大革命时期政治人物。曾任解放军空军司令部办公室副主任兼作战部副部长，是《“571工程”纪要》的主要策划者。
description.en: Son of Lin Biao and Ye Qun, a political figure during China's Cultural Revolution. He served as Deputy Director of the Air Force Command Headquarters Office and Deputy Minister of the Combat Department, and was the main planner of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林彪与叶群之女，林立果的姐姐，《空军报》副总编。
description.en: Chinese political figure, daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的女儿。
越南民主共和国国防部长。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由东北野战军改称。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, renamed from the Northeast Field Army.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟（苏联）是列宁和布尔什维克党建立的联邦制社会主义国家，存在于1922年至1991年，地处欧亚大陆北部。作为20世纪的共产主义超级大国，它是联合国创始会员国及安理会常任理事国。苏联领导社会主义阵营，在冷战时期与美国对峙。它对早期中国共产党及国共关系有重要影响，曾支持中国共产党建立中华苏维埃共和国，并在二战中作为同盟国对中国提供援助、对日宣战。国共内战后，与中华人民共和国结盟，但中苏交恶。苏联是首个实现载人航天的国家，切尔诺贝利核事故发生时，乌克兰是其加盟共和国之一。黎笋执政期间，它是越南战争中北越的主要支持者。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) was a federal socialist state established by Lenin and the Bolshevik Party, existing from 1922 to 1991 in Northern Eurasia. As a 20th-century communist superpower, it was a founding member of the United Nations and a permanent member of the Security Council. The USSR led the socialist bloc, confronting the United States during the Cold War. It significantly influenced the early Communist Party of China and KMT-CPC relations, supported the establishment of the Chinese Soviet Republic, and as an Allied member during WWII, aided China and declared war on Japan. After the Chinese Civil War, it allied with the People's Republic of China, but the Sino-Soviet split occurred. The USSR was the first country to achieve human spaceflight, and Ukraine was one of its constituent republics at the time of the Chernobyl disaster. During Lê Duẩn's rule, it was a key supporter of North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的女儿，毛泽东的第一任妻子，毛岸英、毛岸青、毛岸龙的母亲，毛新宇的祖母。
description.en: Daughter of Yang Changji, the first wife of Mao Zedong, mother of Mao Anying, Mao Anqing, and Mao Anlong, and grandmother of Mao Xinyu.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第三任妻子，曾任第五届全国政协委员。
description.en: The third wife of Mao Zedong, who served as a member of the Fifth National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东和毛泽民的父亲，与毛宁之父毛贻发同属贻字辈。
description.en: Father of Mao Zedong and Mao Zemin, and belongs to the same 'Yi' generation as Mao Ning's father, Mao Yifa.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的次子，中国共产党党员，毛新宇之父。他曾任中共中央宣传部马列著作编译室俄文翻译，翻译出版了多部马列著作及政治理论书籍。晚年患有精神疾病。
description.en: Second son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui, a member of the Chinese Communist Party, and father of Mao Xinyu. He served as a Russian translator in the Compilation and Translation Bureau of Marxist-Leninist Works of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee, translating and publishing multiple works of Marxism-Leninism and political theory books. He suffered from mental illness in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧三子，毛岸青之弟。
description.en: The third son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui, and younger brother of Mao Anqing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与贺子珍的女儿，江青继女，李讷的姐姐。
中国文化大革命时期政治人物，毛泽东与江青的女儿，毛岸青的异母姊妹。
中国共产党财经干部、政治人物，毛泽东之弟、毛远新之父。他曾化名周彬在新疆工作，后被新疆军阀盛世才杀害。
description.en: A financial cadre of the Communist Party of China and a politician. He was the younger brother of Mao Zedong and the father of Mao Yuanxin. He worked in Xinjiang under the alias Zhou Bin and was later killed by the Xinjiang warlord Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东和毛泽民的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义的先驱，中国共产党的主要创始人之一、早期主要领导人。他曾安排毛泽东在北京大学图书馆工作，并于北京发起中国共产党早期组织，张太雷于1920年10月加入该组织。1927年4月28日在北京被张作霖下令绞刑处决。
description.en: A pioneer of Chinese communism and one of the main founders and early key leaders of the Chinese Communist Party. He arranged for Mao Zedong to work at the Peking University Library and initiated the early CPC organization in Beijing, which Zhang Tailei joined in October 1920. He was executed by hanging in Beijing on April 28, 1927, under the orders of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人。他曾任新四军副军长兼政委、中共苏区中央分局书记，是新四军的创建人和主要领导人之一。早期曾在湖北省总工会担任向忠发的副手。他还曾安排护送瞿秋白转移，并在战略问题上与叶挺存在分歧。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party. He served as the Deputy Commander and Political Commissar of the New Fourth Army, and Secretary of the CPC Central Bureau in Soviet Areas, being one of the founders and principal leaders of the New Fourth Army. Earlier, he served as Xiang Zhongfa's deputy at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union. He also arranged the transfer of Qu Qiubai and had disagreements with Ye Ting on strategic issues.

description.zh-cn: 印度首任总理。
位于西北欧的联邦君主立宪制国家，欧盟和北约的创始成员国之一，也是协约国成员国之一。该国是富通集团总部所在地。
description.en: A federal constitutional monarchy in Northwest Europe, it is one of the founding members of the EU and NATO, and also a member state of the Entente Powers. It is also home to the Fortis Group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾任中央政治局常委，后被向忠发和李立三排挤出中央领导核心。他也是杨昌济的学生。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee before being pushed out of the central leadership by Xiang Zhongfa and Li Lisan. He was also a student of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，时任关东军高级参谋，甲级战犯。他是九一八事变和建立满洲国的主要策划者之一。
description.en: A general in the Imperial Japanese Army, Senior Staff Officer of the Kwantung Army, and a Class A war criminal. He was one of the chief masterminds of the Mukden Incident and the establishment of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国上将，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的卓越领导人、政治人物，中共八大元老之一。他曾任中共中央组织部部长、中顾委副主任、中共安徽省委书记、安徽省政府主席，并率部进入云南。他是宋彬彬之父。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army, an outstanding leader and political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. He served as Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee, Vice Director of the Central Advisory Commission, Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee, and Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Government, and also led troops into Yunnan. He was the father of Song Binbin.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森是中国杰出的空气动力学家、系统科学家，工程控制论创始人之一。他曾是美国空军上校，为中美两国的火箭、导弹和航天计划都做出了重大贡献。作为中国载人航天奠基人、“两弹一星”功勋奖章获得者，他被誉为“中国航天之父”和“火箭之王”。钱学森还是中国科学院及中国工程院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第三届主席、中国科学技术大学创办人之一，并担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。张纯如曾为其撰写传记《中国导弹之父——钱学森之谜》。
description.en: Qian Xuesen was a distinguished Chinese aerodynamicist and systems scientist, and one of the founders of engineering cybernetics. He once served as a colonel in the U.S. Army Air Forces, making significant contributions to the rocket, missile, and space programs of both China and the United States. As a foundational figure of China's manned space program and a recipient of the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' Meritorious Award, he is celebrated as the 'Father of Chinese Aerospace' and the 'King of Rocketry'. Qian was also an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Chinese Academy of Engineering, served as the third chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology, was one of the founders of the University of Science and Technology of China, and held the position of Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Iris Chang wrote his biography 'Thread of the Silkworm'.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共北京市委第一书记
清末由孙中山在日本东京成立的革命政党，由华兴会等多个革命团体合并而成，是中国近代第一个全国性的革命政党。邵玉轩是其会员之一。在保路运动中，同盟会采取“借保路之名，行革命之实”的策略，暗中推动运动向武装起义发展。
description.en: A revolutionary party founded by Sun Yat-sen in Tokyo, Japan, in the late Qing dynasty. It was formed by the merger of several revolutionary groups, including the Huaxinghui, and was the first national revolutionary party in modern China. Shao Yuxuan was one of its members. During the Railway Protection Movement, the Tongmenghui adopted a strategy of 'using the cause of railway protection to advance the reality of revolution,' secretly pushing the movement towards armed uprising.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会党校
en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Party School of the Communist Party of China
Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训学校，是中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。薄一波曾在此学习，何毅亭曾任常务副校长。2018年改革后，该校加挂国家行政学院牌子。
description.en: A cadre training school directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, serving as the highest academy for training high- and middle-ranking party officials and Marxist theorists. Bo Yibo once studied here, and He Yiting served as Executive Vice President. After the 2018 reform, it also adopted the nameplate of the Chinese Academy of Governance.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。1936年4月战斗牺牲。小说《刘志丹》即是为纪念他而创作。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base. The novel 'Liu Zhidan' was written in his memory.

death_place.en: Sanjiao Town, Zhongyang County, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之弟，中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家。曾任财政部长，创建了税警总团。他非常赏识孙立人，孙的军旅生涯即从税警总团起步。
description.en: Brother of Soong Ching-ling, a Chinese statesman, diplomat, and financier. He served as Minister of Finance, founded the Salt Revenue Police, and greatly appreciated Sun Li-jen, whose military career began in this unit.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期湖南军政人物，鲁涤平曾追随他加入孙中山阵营。
description.en: A military and political figure in Hunan during the Republican era, whom Lu Diping followed to join Sun Yat-sen's camp.

description.zh-cn: 中国乒乓球运动员、教练员。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
十三届中央顾问委员会
en: Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1982年至1992年设立的中央组织机构，是一个过渡性特殊机构。其宗旨是解决中央领导机构新老交替、安置年事已高的中央领导干部，并推动废除领导干部职务终身制。该机构也承担对党中央的政治辅助和咨询职责。期间，薄一波曾任常务副主任，余秋里曾任常务委员，孙冶方曾任委员。
description.en: Established by the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992, this central organizational body served as a transitional special institution. Its primary purpose was to manage the succession of leadership, accommodate senior cadres, and promote the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading officials. It also provided political auxiliary and advisory functions to the Party Central Committee. During its operation, Bo Yibo served as Executive Deputy Director, Yu Qiuli as a standing committee member, and Sun Yefang as a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，曾为邓小平（第二任妻子）、李维汉的妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的长子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国政协副主席，残疾人权益倡导者。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次女。陈希的前任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的三女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's third daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second son.

zh-cn: 废除干部领导职务终身制
en: Abolition of the lifetime tenure system for leading cadres
Abolition of lifelong tenure for leading cadres

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国于1980年代推行的一项政治制度改革，旨在终结领导干部职务终身制，建立任期制和退休制度。为实现这一目标，还设立了中央顾问委员会作为过渡性机构，以取代事实上的终身任职。
description.en: A political system reform initiated by the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China in the 1980s. It aimed to end the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres and establish term limits and a retirement system. To achieve this goal, the Central Advisory Commission was also established as a transitional body to replace de facto lifelong tenure.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平为解决香港、澳门及台湾问题提出的构想，后成为中华人民共和国处理香港和澳门问题的基本国策。倪匡曾表示从不相信此政策。
description.en: A concept proposed by Deng Xiaoping to resolve the issues of Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan, which later became the basic state policy of the People's Republic of China for Hong Kong and Macau. Ni Kuang once stated that he never believed in this policy.

description.zh-cn: 深圳是中华人民共和国广东省的计划单列市（副省级市），中国四大一线城市之一、粤港澳大湾区的中心城市之一，也是中国首个经济特区和改革开放的窗口。它现已成为全国性经济中心、国际科技创新中心和对外开放门户，同时也是华商银行的注册地。该市政府部门已将DeepSeek接入政务服务系统。
description.en: Shenzhen is a sub-provincial city with separate planning status in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, and is one of China's four first-tier cities, a central city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. It is also China's first special economic zone and a window for reform and opening up. Shenzhen has become a national economic center, an international technology and innovation hub, and a gateway for foreign relations. It is also the place of registration for Hua Shang Bank, and its government departments have integrated DeepSeek into their public service systems.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省
location.en: Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，第39任美国总统。在其任内，发生了伊朗人质危机，并宣布与中华人民共和国建交。
description.en: American politician, the 39th President of the United States. During his term, the Iran hostage crisis occurred, and he announced the establishment of diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，美国第38任总统，是美国历史上唯一没有经过选举而产生的总统。
description.en: American politician, the 38th President of the United States, and the only person to have served as president without being elected.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡建国总理、政治家。他曾建议中共停止对外输出革命，并在新加坡与马来西亚合并及分离时期担任关键政治角色。在1997年大选后，他控告邓亮洪诽谤。他是李显龙的父亲。
description.en: Founding Prime Minister and politician of Singapore. He advised the CCP to stop exporting revolution and played a key political role during Singapore's merger with and separation from Malaysia. After the 1997 general election, he sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation. He is also known as the father of Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 法国汽车制造商，邓小平早年曾在此做工。
陈云长子，中国政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任中国人民银行副行长、党组副书记，长期担任国家开发银行行长及董事长，并曾任第十二届全国政协副主席。
description.en: The eldest son of Chen Yun, a Chinese politician and former national-deputy level leader. He served as Vice Governor and Deputy Party Secretary of the People's Bank of China, later as the long-term President and Chairman of China Development Bank, and also a Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，曾任国民革命军第五军军长、陆军第二兵团司令、徐州剿匪总司令部副总司令，在淮海战役中被俘。他与赵家骧关系甚好。在缅甸战役撤退和东北剿共期间，他与孙立人因战略意见不合而产生矛盾，最终导致孙被调离东北战场。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army. He served as the commander of the 5th Corps, the 2nd Army Group, and the deputy commander of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters, and was captured during the Huaihai Campaign. He had a good relationship with Zhao Jiaxiang. During the retreat in the Burma Campaign and the campaign against Communists in the Northeast, he had conflicts with Sun Li-jen over strategic differences, which ultimately led to Sun's transfer from the Northeast battlefield.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名作家、思想家、设计师、革命家，新文化运动领袖之一。他曾任职于教育部，提议将《永乐大典》残本交由京师图书馆收藏以加强保护。在文学创作方面，陈独秀曾多次催促他在《新青年》上发表小说，对其起到重要推动作用。他也是瞿秋白在左翼文化运动中的战友，并在“两个口号”论争中与周扬等人对立，称其为“工头”、“奴隶总管”。
description.en: A renowned modern Chinese writer, thinker, designer, and revolutionary, and one of the leaders of the New Culture Movement. He served at the Ministry of Education and proposed transferring the remaining volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia to the Capital Library for better preservation. In his literary creation, Chen Duxiu repeatedly urged him to publish novels in 'New Youth', playing a crucial role in its promotion. He was also a comrade-in-arms of Qu Qiubai in the left-wing cultural movement and opposed Zhou Yang and others in the "Two Slogans" debate, calling them "foremen" and "slave masters".

description.zh-cn: 陈毅元帅之子。
description.en: Son of Marshal Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 壮族政治人物，中国人民解放军上将。他曾任广西自治区主席、广西壮族自治区革命委员会主任、第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。同时，他被认为是广西大屠杀的主要组织者，并曾是余秋里在中国人民解放军总政治部主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A Zhuang ethnic politician and a general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as Chairman of the Guangxi Autonomous Region, Director of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Revolutionary Committee, and Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He was considered a primary organizer of the Guangxi Massacre and was Yu Qiuli's predecessor as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级理论家，曾任中央文革小组成员。
由中华人民共和国公安部管理的监狱，位于北京市昌平区，主要关押最高级别政治犯。著名经济学家孙冶方曾在文革期间在此被囚禁7年。
description.en: A maximum-security prison located in Changping District, Beijing, managed by the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China. It primarily detains high-ranking political prisoners. Economist Sun Yefang was imprisoned here for 7 years during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，他曾是清华大学的学生领袖，担任清华大学井冈山兵团的第一把手，也是北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, he was a student leader at Tsinghua University, served as the head of the Tsinghua University Jinggangshan Corps, and was also one of the "Five Great Leaders" of Beijing Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 一所以人文社会科学为主的综合性研究型全国重点大学，直属于中华人民共和国教育部。位于中国北京，马凯曾在此获得经济学硕士学位。
description.en: A comprehensive research-oriented national key university, primarily focused on humanities and social sciences, directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. Located in Beijing, China, it is a renowned institution where Ma Kai obtained his Master's degree in Economics.

description.zh-cn: 中国左翼作家、政治人物，长期负责中共情报工作，中华人民共和国成立后曾任上海市副市长。1955年因内奸罪被捕，1982年获得平反。
description.en: Chinese left-wing writer and politician who was in charge of the CCP's intelligence work for a long time. He served as the deputy mayor of Shanghai after the founding of the People's Republic of China. He was arrested in 1955 on charges of being a traitor and was rehabilitated in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任毛泽东的秘书。参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草，并起草了《关于改变农村人民公社基本核算单位问题的指示》。
description.en: Chinese politician, former secretary to Mao Zedong. Participated in the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes' and drafted the 'Directive on Changing the Basic Accounting Unit of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面的最高学术机构，同时是全国自然科学与高新技术综合研究发展中心，以及中国科学技术大学的创办及主管单位。该院原有的地震研究部门在国家地震局组建时曾进行调整。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology of the People's Republic of China, serving as the national comprehensive research and development center for natural sciences and high technology, and also the founder and governing body of the University of Science and Technology of China. When the National Earthquake Administration was formed, earthquake research departments formerly under this academy were reorganized.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期滇系军阀领导人、滇军将领，长期主政云南，曾任云南省政府主席，有“云南王”之称。汪精卫曾试图寻求其支持但未获成功。
description.en: A leader of the Yunnan clique and a military general during the mainland period of the Republic of China, he governed Yunnan for a long time, served as its provincial government chairman, and was known as the 'King of Yunnan'. Wang Jingwei unsuccessfully sought his support.

description.zh-cn: 中国藏族政治人物。曾任第四届全国人大常委会副委员长，并领导完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: A Chinese Tibetan politician. He served as Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and led the formulation of the Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，张又侠之父。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国正国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处排名第一的书记、中央办公厅主任、中央和国家机关工委书记。他被认为是闽江新军的主要成员和习近平的重要亲信。曾任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: A national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He currently serves as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, First Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, and Secretary of the Central and State Organs Work Committee. He is considered a key member of the Minjiang New Army and a close confidant of Xi Jinping. He previously served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。曾任中共广东省委书记、中共十九届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician. Currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. He previously served as Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, a member of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee, and head of the Organization Department of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

zh-cn: 中国特色社会主义理论体系
有中国特色的社会主义
en: Theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党根据本国国情，将马克思主义基本原理与中国具体实际相结合而形成的政治经济理论，也是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的官方意识形态及国策。
description.en: A political and economic theory formulated by the Communist Party of China by adapting the basic principles of Marxism to the specific conditions of China.

zh-cn: 俄国共产党（布尔什维克）
en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟（苏联）的执政党，将列宁主义纳入其官方学说。赫鲁晓夫曾在该党第二十次代表大会上发表秘密报告。
description.en: The ruling political party of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (Soviet Union), which incorporated Leninism into its official doctrine. Khrushchev delivered his Secret Speech at its 20th Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。该报在大跃进期间进行了大量宣传报道，并曾发表社论支持红卫兵的串连活动。1977年10月22日，它发表文章正式向全国宣布恢复高考。此外，该报还刊发了周扬关于“人道主义”和“异化”问题的报告，引发巨大争议。钦本立曾于1951年至1956年在此任职。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It extensively reported during the Great Leap Forward and published editorials supporting the networking activities of the Red Guards. On October 22, 1977, it published an article formally announcing the restoration of the Gaokao to the nation. Additionally, it published Zhou Yang's report on "humanitarianism" and "alienation," which sparked significant controversy. Qin Benli worked at this newspaper from 1951 to 1956.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，曾任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。此外，他还曾担任吴政隆的前任江苏省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, member of the 20th Central Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China, and formerly served as the Communist Party Secretary of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region. Additionally, he was the predecessor of Wu Zhenglong as Governor of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。曾担任中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长，接替何毅亭。现任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a national-level leader. He formerly served as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance), succeeding He Yiting. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, and the head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中央政法委书记。曾任中央国安办常务副主任、国家安全部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, formerly served as Executive Deputy Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission and Minister of State Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央书记处书记，中华人民共和国国家监察委员会主任，中华人民共和国总监察官。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Chinese Communist Party
General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的综合办事机构，负责日常文书、会务、安保、机要、通讯等工作，并为中共中央和中央直属机关提供服务。李富春曾任其主任，何毅亭曾在此工作。
description.en: The working body of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for daily clerical work, meeting arrangements, security, confidential matters, communications, etc. Li Fuchun once served as its director, and He Yiting also worked there.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party
Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee
Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee
Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门，负责党组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。在抗日战争时期，李富春曾任其副部长。该部门于1979年为小说《刘志丹》案平反。自2018年起，统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室与公务员工作。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for party organization building, cadre team development, and talent work. Li Fuchun served as its deputy head during the Second Sino-Japanese War. In 1979, the department rehabilitated the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case. Since 2018, it has centrally managed the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission and civil service affairs.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
中国共产党中央宣传部
en: Publicity Department of the Chinese Communist Party
Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门，也是中国共产党的宣传与意识形态管理机构。该部门加挂国务院新闻办公室牌子。它曾指示工人出版社创作一部关于刘志丹的小说，并据报道在《穹顶之下》发布数日后下令全面封杀该片。
description.en: The comprehensive functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in charge of ideological and propaganda work, which also carries the nameplate of the State Council Information Office. It instructed the Workers' Publishing House to create a novel about Liu Zhidan, and reportedly ordered a complete ban on 'Under the Dome' several days after its release.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部
中共中央统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee
United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会政法委员会
中国共产党中央政法委员会
en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission
Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，负责领导和管理全国政法工作。该机构曾牵头成立联合调查组，对陕西千亿矿权案卷宗丢失等问题进行调查；佘孟孝曾在此任副秘书长。
description.en: An agency directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for leading and managing political and legal affairs nationwide. It once led a joint investigation team to investigate issues like the missing case files in the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'; She Mengxiao also served as its Deputy Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记、天津市市长。在六四事件中，他因反对实施戒严并支持赵紫阳而被免职。复出后曾任电子工业部部长、全国政协副主席等职务。他曾赏识李瑞环。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC. He was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting Zhao Ziyang during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. After his political comeback, he served as Minister of Electronics Industry and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长和会议秘书长，并曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the sessions of the 11th National People's Congress, and also served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央统战部部长、全国政协副主席等职。因在六四事件中的表现被撤职，后复出任民政部副部长，并长期从事慈善事业。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a former deputy state leader. He served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC and head of the United Front Work Department. He was dismissed for his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, later returned to politics as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs, and was long involved in philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、第八届和第九届全国政协主席、天津市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former paramount-level Party and state leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Chairman of the 8th and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC, and Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，中国政治人物。曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长，长期负责意识形态工作，并是李长春的前任中央精神文明建设指导委员会主任。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a Chinese politician. He served as a member of the Politburo, a secretary of the Secretariat, and head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee, with long-term responsibility for ideological work. He was also Li Changchun's predecessor as Director of the Central Guidance Commission on Building Spiritual Civilization.

description.zh-cn: 他是杨尚昆的胞弟，中国人民解放军上将。作为一位中国政治人物，他曾任中共中央军委秘书长兼总政治部主任。他接替余秋里任总政治部主任，后由于永波继任。他还是中共第十四届中央政治局委员。在任总政治部主任期间，他曾参与指挥戒严部队。
description.en: He was the younger brother of Yang Shangkun, a general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army, and a Chinese politician. He served as Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission and Director of the General Political Department. He succeeded Yu Qiuli as Director of the General Political Department and was later succeeded by Yu Yongbo. He was also a member of the 14th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee. During his tenure as Director of the General Political Department, he participated in commanding the martial law troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪律检查委员会书记、中组部副部长，以及中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: A political figure of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and a former state-level top leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Deputy Head of the Organization Department, and Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was appointed Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席（胡锦涛任内），并兼任中共中央党校校长。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee, Vice President of the People's Republic of China (during Hu Jintao's tenure), and concurrently as President of the Central Party School of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中央书记处书记、中共中央党校校长（陈希的前任）。他曾是李长春在中央精神文明建设指导委员会的副手，后接替其主任职务。据称他也是向谷歌施压的主要协调人。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former national-level Party and state leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Secretary of the Central Secretariat and President of the Central Party School of the CPC (predecessor to Chen Xi). He was also Li Changchun's deputy on the Central Guidance Commission on Building Spiritual Civilization and later succeeded him as director. He was allegedly the main coordinator of pressure on Google.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，第十七届中共中央政治局常委，曾任中央纪委书记。

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 徐才厚，中国人民解放军上将，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席（于第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命）。他曾是中国人民解放军前主要领导人之一，原副国级领导人，并接替于永波担任总政治部主任。后因严重违纪违法问题被调查，2014年被开除军籍，在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: Xu Caihou, a general of the People's Liberation Army, served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission (appointed during the 11th National People's Congress). He was one of the former key leaders of the PLA, a former vice-national level leader, and succeeded Yu Yongbo as the Director of the General Political Department. Later, he was investigated for serious violations of discipline and law, had his military rank revoked in 2014, and fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任江苏省委书记（回良玉的继任者），团派主要成员。后任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局委员，为原副国级领导人。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Jiangsu Provincial Party Secretary (succeeding Hui Liangyu) and was a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). Later, he served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Politburo of the CPC, holding a former vice-national level leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共中央书记处书记、全国政协副主席、中央统战部部长，是胡锦涛的首席助理。作为令狐路线的弟弟，他在反腐运动中落马，并被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一。
description.en: Former Chinese political figure, who served as Director of the CCP General Office and a chief aide to Hu Jintao. As the younger brother of Linghu Luxian, he fell during the anti-corruption campaign and was also implicated in the downfall of Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 原中央宣传部部长
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共十九届中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长、中央办公厅主任、中央国家安全委员会办公室主任。其职业生涯中，曾涉及胡锦涛二十大离场事件。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, and Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission. He was involved in the incident where Hu Jintao was escorted out of the 20th National Congress.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
中共二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区府右街12号
location.en: No. 12 Fuyou Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，是中国共产党在2022年至2027年的最高领导机关，王抗平为候补委员。
description.en: The central leadership body elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, serving as the highest leading body from 2022 to 2027. Wang Kangping serves as an alternate member of this committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、力学工程师及航天领域专家。他曾任中国航天科技集团公司总经理、广东省人民政府省长（接替朱小丹），现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委书记，是出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一。
description.en: A politician, mechanical engineer, and aerospace expert of the People's Republic of China. He previously served as General Manager of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation and Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government (succeeding Zhu Xiaodan). He is currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Political Bureau and Party Secretary of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, and is one of the provincial Party secretaries who originated from the aerospace technology group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物及环境科学家。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（在《穹顶之下》发布后曾对其公开表示赞赏）、北京市市长。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician and environmental scientist. He served as Minister of Environmental Protection (publicly praising 'Under the Dome' upon its release) and Mayor of Beijing. He is currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Politburo and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任中共第十九届中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，其为袁家军的前任。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、天津市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as a member of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee and as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee. During Tang Liangzhi's tenure as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was the predecessor of Yuan Jiajun. He is currently a member of the Political Bureau of the 20th CPC Central Committee and the Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物及空间技术专家，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记，曾任浙江省人大常委会主任，并曾担任神舟五号任务载人飞船系统总指挥。
description.en: Chinese politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a space technology expert, holding a vice-national level leadership position. Currently a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing Municipality, and formerly Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress. He also served as Commander-in-Chief of the manned spacecraft system for the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中国共产党广东省委员会书记。曾任中共十九届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记，中共中央宣传部部长，以及杭州市委书记（在蔡奇任市长期间，也是龚正的前任）。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Guangdong Province. He previously served as a member of the Political Bureau and a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee, Minister of the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee, and Party Secretary of Hangzhou (during Cai Qi's tenure as mayor, and as Gong Zheng's predecessor).

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记一职，其职能与权力在不同历史时期有所演变。该职务最早设立于1925年，作为党的最高领导人，负责召集政治局会议并主持中央书记处工作，直至1945年被中央委员会主席取代。1982年恢复设立后，总书记再次成为中国共产党最高领导人。然而，在1956年至1966年及1980年至1982年间，中央书记处曾设立同名领导职务，其主要职责是处理中央书记处日常运作，并非党的最高负责人，与恢复后的最高领导人职务性质不同。
description.en: The role and power of the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China have evolved across different historical periods. First established in 1925, this position served as the Party's supreme leader, responsible for convening Politburo meetings and presiding over the Central Secretariat, until it was replaced by the Chairman of the Central Committee in 1945. Re-established in 1982, the General Secretary again became the supreme leader of the CPC. However, between 1956-1966 and 1980-1982, a similarly titled leadership position existed within the Central Secretariat, primarily responsible for managing its daily operations. This role was not the Party's top leader and differed in nature from the supreme leader position re-established later.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，北京市委书记，接替蔡奇担任此职。
description.en: Chinese politician, Member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Political Bureau, and Party Secretary of Beijing, succeeding Cai Qi in this post.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, Vice Chairman of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原副国级领导人，曾任中共第十六届中央政治局委员、上海市委书记、上海市市长。他主政上海期间推动了多项重大工程建设和经济发展。2006年因涉及上海社保基金案（即陈良宇事件）被免职，2008年被判处有期徒刑18年。
description.en: Chinese politician and former state-level vice leader. He served as a member of the 16th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee, and Mayor of Shanghai. During his tenure in Shanghai, he promoted several major engineering projects and economic development. He was dismissed in 2006 for his involvement in the Shanghai social security fund case (also known as the Chen Liangyu incident) and was sentenced to 18 years in prison in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二子，77级大学生。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任大连市市长、辽宁省省长、商务部部长、中共重庆市委书记、中共中央政治局委员。他被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，亦是习近平的政治对手。在重庆任市委书记期间，黄奇帆曾任市长。2013年，因受贿、贪污、滥用职权罪被判处无期徒刑。他曾是谷开来之夫，其前妻为李雪峰之女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second son, a member of the Class of 1977. A former Chinese politician, he served as Mayor of Dalian, Governor of Liaoning, Minister of Commerce, Party Secretary of Chongqing, and a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party. He was implicated in the downfall of Chen Liangyu and considered a political rival of Xi Jinping. During his tenure as Party Secretary of Chongqing, Huang Qifan served as mayor. In 2013, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, corruption, and abuse of power. He was the husband of Gu Kailai, and his ex-wife is the daughter of Li Xuefeng.

zh-cn: 薄熙来受贿、贪污、滥用职权案

description.zh-cn: 因王立军事件引发的，导致原中共中央政治局委员薄熙来被免职、调查、判刑等一系列政治事件。
中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记。在黄奇帆任市长期间，他担任中共重庆市委书记，是原国家级副职领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing. He served as the Party Secretary of Chongqing during Huang Qifan's tenure as mayor, and was a former national-level deputy leader.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2022年10月召开的全国代表大会。大会选举产生了第二十届中央委员会和中央纪律检查委员会，会后多位团派高层未进入新一届中央委员会，显示团派政治影响力下降。大会闭幕会上，胡锦涛被意外带离会场。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China, held in October 2022, elected the 20th Central Committee and the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. Subsequently, several high-level Tuanpai leaders did not enter the new Central Committee, indicating a decline in the faction's political influence. During the closing ceremony, Hu Jintao was unexpectedly escorted out of the hall.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物，原正国级领导人，中国人民解放军高级将领，上将军衔。他曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央军委副主席、中央军委副秘书长，参与指挥戒严部队，并参与编写《三大纪律八项注意》歌词。他是刘超英的父亲。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, formerly a national-level leader and a senior general in the People's Liberation Army, holding the rank of general. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Chairman, and Deputy Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission. He participated in commanding martial law troops and in writing the lyrics for the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'. He is the father of Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央纪委书记，接替尉健行。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。他曾任北京市市长、市委书记，并担任第十、十一届全国政协主席，以及第十六、十七届中共中央政治局常委。他曾代表中共中央为巴金送别。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former state-level leader. He served as Mayor and Party Secretary of Beijing, Chairman of the 10th and 11th National Committees of the CPPCC, and a member of the 16th and 17th Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP. He also paid final respects to Ba Jin on behalf of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央文明委主任，主管意识形态工作。他在主政河南期间，因推行“血浆经济”而导致艾滋病大规模爆发而备受争议。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee and director of the Central Spiritual Civilization Development Commission, in charge of ideology. He is controversial for the large-scale AIDS outbreak caused by the promotion of a 'plasma economy' during his tenure in Henan.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的三子，俞强声之弟，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人。曾任中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委，以及中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席（继任贾庆林），中共上海市委书记、中共湖北省委书记、建设部部长等职务。
description.en: Third son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng, and a former national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a member of the 18th CPC Politburo Standing Committee, Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (succeeding Jia Qinglin), Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, Secretary of the CPC Hubei Provincial Committee, and Minister of Construction.

description.zh-cn: 时任抗日军政大学校长。中国政治家，曾任中央人民政府重工业部副部长、代部长。
description.en: Served as President of the Anti-Japanese Military and Political University. Chinese politician, formerly Vice Minister and Acting Minister of the Ministry of Heavy Industry of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家、政治家、社会活动家、画家，中国国民党左派的杰出代表，妇女运动的领袖。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, social activist, and artist, an outstanding representative of the left wing of the Kuomintang, and a leader of the women's movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代女作家。在由周扬领导的“丁玲、陈企霞反党小集团案”中被打倒。
description.en: A modern Chinese female writer. She was purged in the "Ding Ling and Chen Qixia anti-Party clique case", which was led by Zhou Yang.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人，艾未未的父亲，曾担任育才学校文学组组长。
description.en: Chinese poet, the father of Ai Weiwei, and who served as the head of the literature group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中共上海市委办公厅管理的半月刊。
中国近代作家、出版家、翻译家、无政府主义者。曾任全国政协副主席、中国作家协会主席。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, publisher, translator, and anarchist. He served as Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC and Chairman of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之父，原名韩教准。
宋庆龄之弟。
中国国民党于1927年4月12日由蒋介石发动的一场政治清洗运动，持续至1928年。旨在清除其党内中国共产党党员及左派势力，并最终导致第一次国共合作破裂，以及陈独秀的下台。
description.en: A political purge initiated by the Kuomintang on April 12, 1927, led by Chiang Kai-shek, and extending through 1928. It aimed at eliminating Chinese Communist Party members and left-wing elements, resulting in the breakdown of the First United Front and the downfall of Chen Duxiu.

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会 (南昌起义)
中国国民党革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang
Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang (Nanchang Uprising)

description.zh-cn: 南昌起义当天，以国民党左派名义在南昌成立的革命政权机构。
description.en: A revolutionary government body established in Nanchang on the day of the Nanchang Uprising, under the name of the Kuomintang's left wing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和国家领导人、社会活动家，曾任第四届全国人大常委会委员。他长期负责中共的对外联络、统战、侨务、港澳等工作，是对外工作领导人之一。曾任新华社主管，其批评使得左派报章停止了对《明报》的论战。他在被提名为国家副主席候选人后突然逝世。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the state, and a social activist. He served as a Member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He was long responsible for the CPC's external liaison, united front work, overseas Chinese affairs, and Hong Kong and Macao affairs, and was a prominent leader in foreign affairs. He also served as the head of Xinhua News Agency, and his criticism led leftist newspapers to cease their polemics against Ming Pao. He died suddenly after being nominated as a candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家、政治家、教育家、翻译家。曾任中华民国首任教育总长、北京大学校长、中央研究院首任院长等职。他革新北大，倡导“思想自由，兼容并包”，开“学术”与“自由”之风，聘请陈独秀为文科学长，并曾邀请杨昌济到校任教。他作为新文化运动的重要领导者之一，为五四运动培养了思想动力，期间私下支持学生并以辞职抗议政府镇压。他被毛泽东誉为“学界泰斗、人世楷模”，并曾提议将国立山东大学设于青岛。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary, politician, educator, and translator. He served as the first Minister of Education of the Republic of China, President of Peking University, and the first President of Academia Sinica. He reformed Peking University, advocating for 'freedom of thought and inclusiveness,' fostering a spirit of 'academics' and 'freedom,' appointed Chen Duxiu as Dean of the School of Letters, and also invited Yang Changji to teach at the university. As a key leader of the New Culture Movement, he cultivated intellectual momentum for the May Fourth Movement, privately supporting students and resigning in protest against government suppression during the period. He was praised by Mao Zedong as a 'titan of the academic world and a model for all,' and also proposed the establishment of National Shandong University in Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党和越南民主共和国的缔造者和主要领导人，曾任越南劳动党中央委员会主席。黎笋在其之下担任第二位领导人。
description.en: Founder and key leader of the Communist Party of Vietnam and the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam. Lê Duẩn served as the second-in-command under him.

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中国共产党上海市第十一届委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。陈良宇曾在此长期担任副书记及书记职务。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai. Chen Liangyu served here for a long time as Deputy Secretary and Secretary.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管国家财政收支、财税政策等事务。在文化大革命期间曾与中国人民银行合并，同时也是国家开发银行的创始机构及主要股东之一。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and taxation policies, etc. It was merged with the People's Bank of China during the Cultural Revolution, and is also one of the founding institutions and major shareholders of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员。系李先念女婿，李小林之夫。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, writer, and former Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University. He is also the son-in-law of Li Xiannian and husband of Li Xiaolin.

en: People's Liberation Army at the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and massacre

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治风波。其中，1989年6月3日晚至4日凌晨，中国人民解放军对天安门广场的示威学生进行了武力清场行动。
description.en: Political turmoil occurred in Beijing, China in 1989. This included the military operation by the People's Liberation Army to violently suppress and clear demonstrating students from Tiananmen Square on the night of June 3rd to the early morning of June 4th, 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国剧作家，曾帮助过江青。
中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，毛泽民与朱旦华之子。在毛泽东晚年期间曾任中共中央政治局联络员，是文化大革命时期的重要人物，曾作为江青的政治盟友和四人帮的支持者，后一同被捕。
description.en: Chinese politician, Mao Zedong's nephew, and son of Mao Zemin and Zhu Danhua. He served as a liaison for the CPC Central Committee Political Bureau during Mao Zedong's later years. A key figure during the Cultural Revolution, he was an ally of Jiang Qing and a supporter of the Gang of Four, and was later arrested with them.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任上海市革命委员会副主任、中共上海市委书记。文革期间是王洪文的政治盟友，文革后被判刑。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Revolutionary Committee and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He was a political ally of Wang Hongwen during the Cultural Revolution and was sentenced after its end.

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国国民革命军第八路军的简称。它是抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的主要武装力量之一，由中国工农红军主力改编而成。该部曾与孙殿英部保持良好关系，余秋里等重要人物也曾在此担任多个政治职务。
description.en: Abbreviated as the Eighth Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army, it was one of the main armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, formed from the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. The unit maintained a good relationship with Sun Dianying's troops, and important figures like Yu Qiuli held various political positions within it.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆、彭德怀逝世的地点。
中国人民解放军上将。他曾任中央军事委员会副主席、中国人民解放军国防大学校长、政治委员，并是洪学智在总后勤部部长的职位上的前任。他是张海阳的父亲。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China. He served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and President and Political Commissar of the PLA National Defense University, and was the predecessor to Hong Xuezhi as head of the General Logistics Department. He is the father of Zhang Haiyang.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在长沙批评“四人帮”的一系列谈话。

en: War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争是20世纪30至40年代，中华民国抵抗大日本帝国全面侵略的战争。九一八事变被视为其开端，全面爆发始于1937年，持续至1945年，是第二次世界大战的重要组成部分。这场战争也是日本放弃1940年东京奥运会主办权的主要原因。战争期间，国民政府迁都重庆，成为中国的战时首都，清华大学南迁与北大、南开组成西南联合大学，陕甘边根据地是其出发地之一。
description.en: The Sino-Japanese War was a full-scale conflict in the 1930s and 1940s, where the Republic of China resisted a comprehensive invasion by the Empire of Japan. The Mukden Incident is considered its beginning, with the war fully erupting in 1937 and lasting until 1945, forming a crucial part of World War II. It was also the primary reason Japan relinquished its right to host the 1940 Tokyo Olympics. During the war, the Nationalist Government moved its capital to Chongqing, making it China's wartime capital. Tsinghua University moved south and, with Peking University and Nankai University, formed the National Southwestern Associated University, and the Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area was one of its starting points.

description.zh-cn: 对缺乏实际权力的立法机关的贬称
乌兰夫长子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长、内蒙古自治区主席。
description.en: Eldest son of Ulanhu, former Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的孙女，布赫之女，曾任内蒙古自治区政府主席。
description.en: Ulanhu's granddaughter, Buhe's daughter, former Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Government.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋的第一任妻子。
description.en: Ex-wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中共元老习仲勋的第二任妻子，中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平的生母，习明泽的祖母。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, the second wife of the CCP elder Xi Zhongxun, the biological mother of Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, and the grandmother of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 她是中共元老习仲勋与齐心的长女，中共中央总书记习近平的姐姐。她是一位企业家，曾任北京中民信房地产开发有限公司董事长，也是邓家贵的妻子。她拥有香港身份证和加拿大永久居留权。
description.en: She is the eldest daughter of CCP elder Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin, and the elder sister of CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping. She is a businesswoman, formerly chairperson of Beijing Zhongminxin Real Estate Development Co., Ltd., and wife of Deng Jiagui. She holds a Hong Kong identity card and permanent residency in Canada.

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

en: Leader of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在特定历史时期的最高领导人职务称谓，特指中国共产党中央委员会的最高领导人。1956-1967年及1980-1982年的中央委员会总书记不属于此范畴。
description.en: The title of the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China during a specific historical period, specifically referring to the supreme leader of its Central Committee. The General Secretary of the Central Committee during 1956-1967 and 1980-1982 did not fall into this category.

zh-cn: 二十八个半布尔什维克

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪20年代后期在苏联莫斯科中山大学学习并深受王明“左”倾思想影响的中共留苏学生群体。该群体是该校的一个政治派别，也是一个中共党内团体。王稼祥是其中之一。

en: People's commune movement in rural areas

description.zh-cn: 人民公社是大跃进时期（1958-1983年）在中国农村推行的一种政社合一的社会基层组织形式。它是1958年将农业生产合作社合并而成的运动，作为农业集体化的高级阶段和社会改造运动，是“三面红旗”之一。其建立进一步剥夺了农民对土地的权利；同时，公共食堂制度的推行导致粮食浪费，平均主义的分配方式打击了农民的生产积极性，成为三年困难时期的重要成因。该社会运动《历史决议》对其作出了否定性评价。
description.en: The People's Commune was a grassroots social organization that integrated government administration and economic management, implemented in rural China during the Great Leap Forward (1958-1983). It was a movement initiated in 1958 to merge agricultural producers' cooperatives, serving as an advanced stage of agricultural collectivization and a social transformation movement, identified as one of the 'Three Red Flags'. Its establishment further deprived peasants of their rights to the land; meanwhile, the implementation of the public canteen system led to food waste, and the egalitarian distribution method dampened farmers' production enthusiasm, becoming a significant cause of the Three Years of Great Famine. This social movement was negatively assessed by the 'Historical Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 作为1949年中华人民共和国成立前北平市的行政管理机关，此后成为中华人民共和国北京市的省级行政机关及最高地方国家行政机关。北京体育大学曾由其与国家体委双重领导，贾庆林也曾担任其市长。
description.en: Serving as the administrative body of Beiping City before the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, it subsequently became the provincial-level administrative body and highest local state administrative organ for Beijing, People's Republic of China. Beijing Sport University was once under its dual leadership with the State Sports Commission, and Jia Qinglin also served as its mayor.

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
中共北平临时工作委员会
中共北平临时市委员会
中共北平市工作委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关，由中国共产党北京市代表大会选举产生，并在代表大会闭会期间，执行中国共产党中央委员会的指示和北京市代表大会的决议，领导北京市的党务工作。其前身可追溯至1921年设立的中共北京地方委员会，历史上曾多次更名和改组，文化大革命期间曾被北京市革命委员会取代。北京体育大学的党组织关系隶属于该委员会，贾庆林曾任其书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Beijing, elected by the Beijing Municipal Congress of the CPC. During the recess of the Congress, it implements the directives of the CPC Central Committee and the resolutions of the Beijing Municipal Congress, and leads the party's work in Beijing. Its predecessor can be traced back to the CPC Beijing Local Committee established in 1921, and it has been renamed and reorganized multiple times throughout history, having been replaced by the Beijing Revolutionary Committee during the Cultural Revolution. The party organization of Beijing Sport University is affiliated with this committee, and Jia Qinglin served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期，由光绪帝领导，康有为、梁启超等维新派人士推动的政治改革运动（史称戊戌变法），旨在学习西方，推动清朝政治、经济、军事的现代化改革。此运动于1898年9月21日被慈禧太后发动的戊戌政变终止，光绪帝亦因此被软禁，并导致维新派转向更激进的武装斗争。
description.en: A political reform movement initiated in the late Qing dynasty by the Guangxu Emperor and reform-minded figures like Kang Youwei and Liang Qichao. It aimed to modernize China by learning from the West and reforming its political, economic, and military systems. The movement was terminated on September 21, 1898, by the Wuxu Coup launched by Empress Dowager Cixi, leading to the emperor's house arrest and pushing the reformists towards more radical armed struggle.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，华兴会会长，宋教仁的挚友。曾任军政府战时总司令、陆军总长。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, president of the Huaxinghui, and a close friend of Song Jiaoren. He served as wartime commander-in-chief and Minister of War for the military government.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省常德府桃源县仙瑞乡上坊村湘冲
birth_place.en: Xiangchong, Shangfang Village, Xianrui Township, Taoyuan County, Changde Prefecture, Hunan Province

death_place.zh-cn: 江苏省沪海道上海县闸北区沪宁铁路医院
death_place.en: Huning Railway Hospital, Zhabei District, Shanghai County, Huhai Dao, Jiangsu Province

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国初期首位倡导责任内阁制的政治家，华兴会和同盟会主要领导人，国民党主要筹建人及代理理事长，华中师范大学校友。1913年3月20日，他在上海北站遇刺，并于22日逝世。此事件即著名的“宋教仁遇刺案”，被视为二次革命的直接导火索。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, the first politician to advocate for a cabinet responsibility system in the early Republic of China, a key leader of the Huaxinghui and the Tongmenghui, a principal founder and acting chairman of the Kuomintang, and an alumnus of Central China Normal University. On March 20, 1913, he was assassinated at Shanghai North Railway Station and died on the 22nd. This incident, known as the 'Song Jiaoren Assassination Case', was the direct trigger for the Second Revolution.

zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国建国初期，以京兆地方（北京）为首都的中央政府。始于1912年袁世凯就任临时大总统。在袁世凯去世后，该政府实际由北洋军阀各派系所控制，因大总统和国务总理主要由北洋军阀出身而得名。其作为协约国成员之一，于1914年设立了绥远特别区。五四运动期间，其在巴黎和会上的外交失败和对内镇压学生的做法引发了全国性的抗议。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China in its early days, with its capital in Jingzhao (Beijing). It began with Yuan Shikai's inauguration as Provisional President in 1912. After Yuan Shikai's death, it was effectively controlled by various factions of the Beiyang Warlords, who predominantly held the positions of President and Premier. As a member of the Entente Powers, it established the Suiyuan Special Administrative Region in 1914. During the May Fourth Movement, its diplomatic failure at the Paris Peace Conference and its suppression of students sparked nationwide protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内政部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军高级将领，济南战役中被俘。

death_place.zh-cn: 河南省永城市陈官庄乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，抗战期间曾任新编第二十二师师长与第五军军长，参与昆仑关战役与滇西缅北战役。国共内战期间任第二兵团司令，在徐蚌会战中阵亡。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, posthumously promoted to General. He served as the commander of the New 22nd Division and the 5th Corps during the Second Sino-Japanese War, participating in the Battle of Kunlun Pass and the Battle of Northern Burma and Western Yunnan. During the Chinese Civil War, he commanded the 2nd Army Group and was killed in action during the Huaihai Campaign.

en: Party and State Leaders of the People's Republic of China
Party and state leaders of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，指在中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军以及中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会中，担任特定领导职务及级别的高级领导人的统称。这些职务通常分为国家级正职和国家级副职。成克杰和巴金（曾任全国政协副主席）都曾位列其中。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China, referring to high-level leaders holding specific leadership positions and ranks within the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. These positions are usually divided into national-level full and deputy ranks. Cheng Kejie and Ba Jin (who served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee) were both once among them.

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度
en: Collective leadership system of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的组织原则和领导制度，旨在防止个人专断。
description.en: An organizational and leadership principle of the CPC aimed at preventing personal autocracy.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的长子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底，中国各地高校学生发起了一系列大规模示威游行，旨在争取民主选举、新闻自由等权利。运动始于中国科学技术大学学生对人大代表选举的抗议，是中华人民共和国民主运动的一部分，对后续政治事件产生了深远影响，并成为导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: At the end of 1986, university students across mainland China initiated a series of large-scale demonstrations, aiming to demand rights such as democratic elections and freedom of the press. The movement began with protests by students at the University of Science and Technology of China regarding local People's Congress elections, was part of the Chinese democracy movement, had a profound impact on subsequent political events, and became the catalyst for Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，一二·九运动的领导者和发动人之一，谷开来之父。
description.en: A major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the initiators of the December 9th Movement, and the father of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与第一任妻子李丹宇之子，商人。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Li Danyu, a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与薄谷开来之子，薄一波之孙，投资人、律师。他曾与陈晓丹交往。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Bo Gu Kailai, grandson of Bo Yibo. He is an investor and lawyer, and once dated Chen Xiaodan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省。其部分区域由中华民国实际控制。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China. Parts of its territory are actually controlled by the Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，中国科学院院士，中国解析数论、矩阵几何学、典型群、自守函数论与多元复变函数论等多方面研究的创始人和开拓者，中国科学技术大学的创办人之一。曾任第四届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: A Chinese mathematician and academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He was a pioneer and founder in various research areas, including analytic number theory, matrix geometry, classical groups, theory of automorphic functions, and functions of several complex variables in China. He was also one of the founders of the University of Science and Technology of China and served as a Member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高学术研究机关。
description.en: The national academy of the Republic of China.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市
location.en: Hefei, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术大学，简称中国科大，是隶属于中国科学院的一所公立研究型大学，位于安徽省合肥市。该校是“双一流A类”和原“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学，理工科实力位居全国前列。学校于1958年在北京创办，后于文革期间迁至合肥。科大曾是1986年学生游行抗议地方人大代表选举问题的策源地，陈子明曾在此就读研究生。此外，科大讯飞由与该校相关的“讯飞信息科技有限公司”整体变更设立。
description.en: University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), a public research university affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS), is located in Hefei, Anhui Province. It is designated as a Double First Class University (Class A) and a former Project 985 and Project 211 key university, ranking among the top in science and engineering nationwide. The university was founded in Beijing in 1958 and later relocated to Hefei during the Cultural Revolution. USTC was the origin of the 1986 student demonstrations protesting local People's Congress deputy elections. Chen Ziming pursued his postgraduate studies here. Additionally, iFlytek was established through the overall transformation of 'Xunfei Information Technology Co., Ltd.', a company with ties to the university.

description.zh-cn: 中国唐代伟大的浪漫主义诗人、官员，被后人誉为“诗仙”，与杜甫并称“李杜”。他曾与高适、杜甫等友人同游。
description.en: Li Bai was a great romantic poet and official of the Tang dynasty in China, revered as the 'Immortal Poet' (Shixian) and known with Du Fu as 'Li Du'. He once traveled with friends such as Gao Shi and Du Fu.

description.zh-cn: 唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，世称“诗圣”、“诗史”。他与李白齐名，并称为“李杜”，也与高适是好友。其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang Dynasty, known as the 'Poet-Sage' and 'Poet-Historian'. He was renowned for his friendship with Li Bai, together they were called 'Li Du', and was also a good friend of Gao Shi. His works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 壮族，中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。曾任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席、全国人大常委会副委员长。2000年因受贿罪被判处并执行死刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Zhuang ethnicity, and a former deputy national-level party and state leader. He served as the Chairman of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. In 2000, he was sentenced to death and executed for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央委员，曾任赵紫阳的政治秘书（兼中共中央政治体制改革研究室主任）。六四事件后被判刑，是中国异见人士，《零八宪章》的首批签署者之一。
description.en: Former member of the CPC Central Committee, political secretary to Zhao Ziyang (also serving as Director of the CPC Central Research Office for Political System Reform).
