Sentenced after the Tiananmen Square incident, he was a Chinese dissident and one of the first signatories of Charter 08.

zh-cn: 列昂尼德·伊里奇·勃列日涅夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，1964年发动政变推翻赫鲁晓夫，成为苏联最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。其统治时期终止了“去斯大林化”，并部分恢复了对斯大林的正面评价。执政后期苏联经济陷入停滞，被毛泽东和霍查认为是“没有赫鲁晓夫的赫鲁晓夫主义”。
description.en: A Soviet politician who overthrew Khrushchev in a 1964 coup to become the paramount leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the CPSU. His rule terminated de-Stalinization and partially restored a positive assessment of Stalin. The Soviet economy stagnated in its later period, and his rule was considered 'Khrushchevism without Khrushchev' by Mao Zedong and Enver Hoxha.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳次子。
description.en: Second son of Zhao Ziyang.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的首长，是中国的政府首脑。它负责领导中华人民共和国国务院，作为中央人民政府的最高领导人。李克强曾于2013年至2023年担任此职务。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China, serving as China's head of government. It is responsible for leading the State Council and acts as the highest leader of the Central People's Government. Li Keqiang held this position from 2013 to 2023.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairperson of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Vice Chairperson of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席，属国家级副职党和国家领导人。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, a state-level deputy leader position.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council
Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理，是国务院的副首长、副职负责人之一，亦是最高行政首长之一。其职责是协助总理工作，位列党和国家领导人，职务为国家级副职公务员。作为国务院常务会议的重要组成人员，这是国务院的领导职位之一。例如，李克强曾于2008年至2013年担任排名第一的副总理，余秋里和薄一波都曾担任此职。
description.en: The Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China is one of the deputy heads and chief officials of the State Council, and among the highest administrative leaders. Their responsibilities include assisting the Premier and serving as an important member of the State Council's executive meetings. Ranked among Party and state leaders, they hold the position of a national deputy-level civil servant. It is a leading position within the State Council. For example, Li Keqiang served as the first-ranking Vice Premier from 2008 to 2013, and Yu Qiuli and Bo Yibo also held this position.

en: History of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 政治体制改革，1980年代由邓小平、胡耀邦、赵紫阳等人推动的政治改革尝试。

zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联末任最高领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记。其推行的“经济改革”和“开放政策”最终导致冷战结束和苏联解体。他在切尔诺贝利事故后领导了苏联的应对工作，并曾表示这次事故可能是导致苏联解体的真正原因。在其“开放政策”时期，于1989年首次在苏联国内公开发表了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的全文。他曾于六四事件期间访华。
description.en: The last supreme leader of the Soviet Union and General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. His policies of 'economic reform' and 'openness' ultimately led to the end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet Union. He led the Soviet response to the Chernobyl disaster, later stating that the accident might have been the true cause of the dissolution. During his 'openness' period, he first publicly released the full text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech within the USSR in 1989. He also visited China during the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国南部沿海的省级行政区，其部分区域由中华民国实际控制。习仲勋曾在此主政期间创建经济特区。它是徐发淦的籍贯地，河源市位于其境内；同时，也是杨竞衡的出生地。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division located on the southern coast of the People's Republic of China, with parts of its territory actually controlled by the Republic of China. Xi Zhongxun once governed here and established special economic zones. It is Xu Fagan's ancestral home, with Heyuan City situated within its borders; it is also the birthplace of Yang Jingheng.

description.zh-cn: 日本第125代天皇，现为上皇。德仁天皇的父亲。
description.en: The 125th Emperor of Japan, currently the Emperor Emeritus. Father of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 指中共十四大前，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指意图夺取军权，最终被邓小平解除军权的政治事件。
description.en: Refers to the political incident before the 14th National Congress of the CPC, where brothers Yang Shangkun and Yang Baibing were accused of attempting to seize military power, ultimately leading to their removal from military authority by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦长子，曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
1989年4月15日，前中共中央总书记胡耀邦因心脏病逝世，引发了大规模的公众悼念活动。这些活动最终演变为1989年天安门广场抗议（六四事件的导火索）。
description.en: On April 15, 1989, Hu Yaobang, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, passed away due to heart disease, sparking large-scale public mourning activities. These activities ultimately evolved into the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests (the fuse of the June Fourth Incident).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，蒋介石嫡系重要将领，抗日名将，黄埔军校第一期毕业。曾任第十一集团军总司令等职。他曾是瞿秋白在上海大学的学生，后负责羁押并执行对瞿秋白的枪决。1949年在国共内战中被俘，1959年获特赦。晚年移居美国，致力于中国和平统一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek, a famous anti-Japanese war hero, and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. He served as the commander of the 11th Army Group. He was a student of Qu Qiubai at Shanghai University and later responsible for detaining and executing Qu Qiubai. He was captured in the Chinese Civil War in 1949 and was granted amnesty in 1959. In his later years, he moved to the United States and dedicated himself to the peaceful reunification of China.

description.zh-cn: 日本东京的顶尖私立大学，由大隈重信创立。包括宋教仁、陈独秀在内的诸多著名人物曾在此留学。
description.en: A top private university in Tokyo, Japan, founded by Ōkuma Shigenobu. Many famous figures, including Song Jiaoren and Chen Duxiu, studied here.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学是中国近代第一所国立综合性大学，也是中国顶尖的综合性高等学府。其在中华民国时期具有重要地位，位于北京市，是新文化运动和五四运动的中心。陈独秀曾任文科学长，杨昌济曾担任伦理学教授。1917年，接收了北洋大学法科。李克强、林立果、徐旭生、罗豪才、黄立众、张文勋、朱自清、李泽厚、项子明等诸多知名人士曾在此就读、学习或长期担任领导职务。
description.en: Peking University was the first national comprehensive university in modern China and a top comprehensive institution of higher learning. It held significant status during the Republic of China period, located in Beijing, and was the center of the New Culture Movement and the May Fourth Movement. Chen Duxiu served as Dean of its School of Letters, and Yang Changji served as a professor of ethics. In 1917, it absorbed the law department of Peiyang University. Many notable figures, including Li Keqiang, Lin Liguo, Xu Xusheng, Luo Haocai, Huang Lizhong, Zhang Wenxun, Zhu Ziqing, Li Zehou, and Xiang Ziming, studied or held long-term leadership positions here.

description.zh-cn: 由列夫·托洛茨基发展的一种马克思主义理论，与斯大林主义对立。陈独秀在被开除出中共后接受了此思想。
description.en: A Marxist theory developed by Leon Trotsky, opposed to Stalinism. Chen Duxiu embraced this ideology after being expelled from the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际，即第三国际，是一个由弗拉基米尔·列宁于1919年3月创立，总部设于苏联莫斯科的国际共产主义组织。它是一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合体，旨在推动世界革命。该组织对中国共产党早期活动有巨大影响，曾提供支援和指导，支持向忠发成为中共最高领导人，并就南昌起义发出指示。张太雷曾担任其东方局中国科书记。它还支持中国共产党建立中华苏维埃共和国，其在华活动被国民党右派视为苏联赤化中国的证据。共产国际于1943年6月10日解散。
description.en: The Communist International (Comintern), also known as the Third International, was an international communist organization and a federation of communist parties. Founded in March 1919 under Vladimir Lenin's leadership, it was headquartered in Moscow, Soviet Union, and aimed to promote world revolution. Comintern significantly influenced the early Chinese Communist Party, offering support and guidance, backing Xiang Zhongfa as a top leader, and issuing directives for the Nanchang Uprising. Zhang Tailei served as the secretary of its China Section of the Far Eastern Bureau. It also supported the establishment of the Chinese Soviet Republic, and its activities in China were seen by the KMT right-wing as evidence of a Soviet plot. The organization was dissolved on June 10, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、文学理论家、评论家、诗人、翻译家、思想家，鲁迅的胞弟，曾高度评价朱自清的散文。在文革“破四旧”期间遭到批斗和抄家。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist, literary theorist, critic, poet, translator, and thinker; the younger brother of Lu Xun. He highly praised Zhu Ziqing's prose. During the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement of the Cultural Revolution, he was persecuted and his house was raided.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所综合性大学，也是同济大学及华中科技大学同济医学院的源头。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Shanghai, China, and the origin of Tongji University and Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会
en: Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在天津市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Tianjin.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省郑州市登封市嵩山

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省嵩山的一座佛教寺庙，是汉传佛教的禅宗祖庭，因其历代武僧研创的少林功夫而闻名于世。现为世界文化遗产、国家5A级旅游景区。
description.en: A Buddhist monastery in Mount Song, Henan Province, China. It is the main temple of the Zen school of Chinese Buddhism and is world-renowned for its connection to Shaolin Kung Fu. It is a World Heritage Site and a National 5A-level tourist attraction.

zh-cn: 中国共产党江苏省委员会
en: Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的地方组织及领导机关。陈延年曾任书记。
description.en: The local organization and leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jiangsu Province. Chen Yannian served as secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社，也是法定新闻监管机构。该机构曾在1979年发表文章批判魏京生。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China, and also a statutory news regulation body. It published an article criticizing Wei Jingsheng in 1979.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管铁路运输的组成部门，负责管理中国铁路事务。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing its railway transportation affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，李鹏长子，李小琳的兄长。曾任山西省省长，现任中华人民共和国交通运输部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, the eldest son of Li Peng, and elder brother of Li Xiaolin. He previously served as Governor of Shanxi and is currently the Minister of Transport of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国女企业家，为中国前国务院总理李鹏之女。曾任中国大唐集团副总经理、中国电力国际发展有限公司董事长等职，被称为中国“电力一姐”。她亦曾任第十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Chinese businesswoman and the daughter of former Chinese Premier Li Peng. She has served as Deputy General Manager of China Datang Corporation and Chairman of China Power International Development, and is known as the 'First Sister of Chinese Power'. She also served as a member of the 11th and 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏次子，李小琳的弟弟，现居新加坡。
description.en: Li Peng's second son, younger brother of Li Xiaolin, currently residing in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期农民运动领导人。
王震之子。
中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区的一个特殊社会组织，实行党政军企合一体制。它是一个准军事化组织，负责新疆地区的屯垦戍边。该组织与新疆生产建设兵团是同一机构，实行“兵团、企业合一”的管理体制，在经济建设领域使用此名称，并加挂“中国新建集团公司”牌子，享有计划单列地位。
description.en: A special social organization in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China, implementing an integrated system of party, government, military, and enterprise. It is a quasi-military organization responsible for economic development and border defense in Xinjiang. This organization is the same entity as the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, operating under a 'corps-enterprise unified' management system, using this name in the field of economic construction. It also carries the nameplate of 'China Xinjian Group Corporation' and has separate planning status.

description.zh-cn: 一部电视纪录片。
中国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、山西省省长、第十二届全国政协社会和法制委员会主任。因2003年SARS疫情处理不力被胡锦涛免职。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Beijing, former Governor of Shanxi, and former Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 12th CPPCC National Committee. He was dismissed by Hu Jintao for his handling of the 2003 SARS outbreak.

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省衢州府江山县保安乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府情报首长、秘密警察首长，军事委员会调查统计局负责人。
description.en: Head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Commission of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者
中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、海峡两岸关系协会会长，多次举荐江泽民。
美国政治人物，曾任第42任美国总统，是乔治·沃克·布什的前任，也是美国历史上第二位被众议院弹劾的总统。他曾在金泳三执政期间就第一次朝核危机与金泳三合作，并在1996年台湾海峡导弹危机期间下令第七舰队航母战斗群进入台湾附近海域。1998年访华前，中国政府曾将魏京生流放到美国。刘超英曾由钟育瀚介绍与其会面。
description.en: American politician and the 42nd President of the United States, a predecessor to George W. Bush, and the second president in U.S. history to be impeached by the House of Representatives. He collaborated with Kim Young-sam on issues such as the First North Korean nuclear crisis during Kim's presidency, and during the 1996 Taiwan Strait missile crisis, he ordered Seventh Fleet carrier strike groups into the waters near Taiwan. Before his 1998 visit to China, the Chinese government exiled Wei Jingsheng to the U.S. Liu Chaoying was introduced to him by Johnny Chung.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦首任总统，在八月政变中领导反抗，并在苏联解体过程中扮演了关键角色。
description.en: The first President of the Russian Federation, who led the resistance during the August Coup and played a key role in the dissolution of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民的生父。
前中共中央总书记江泽民的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，中国科学院前副院长，上海科技大学校务委员会主任，江泽民长子。
中华人民共和国前最高领导人江泽民的次子。曾任上海市建设和管理委员会巡视员、上海城市发展信息研究中心主任、上海市城乡建设和交通委员会巡视员。
description.en: The second son of former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, Jiang Zemin. He has served as an inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Construction and Management Commission, director of the Shanghai Urban Development Information Research Center, and an inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Urban-Rural Construction and Transportation Commission.

description.zh-cn: 由李洪志于1992年在中国吉林省传出的一种精神修炼系统及气功修炼法，以“真、善、忍”为核心原则。它是一个身心修炼及信仰体系，并作为一个气功修炼团体，在1990年代于中国广泛传播。自1999年7月起，在中国大陆遭到中华人民共和国政府的镇压和取缔。
description.en: A spiritual practice and qigong cultivation method, founded by Li Hongzhi in Jilin Province, China, in May 1992. It is based on the core principles of 'Truthfulness, Compassion, Forbearance' and functions as a mind-body cultivation system and a qigong practice group. The practice spread widely in China in the 1990s but has been suppressed and outlawed by the Government of the People's Republic of China since July 1999.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部原为建设若干所世界一流大学和一批国际知名高水平研究型大学而实施的教育计划。
中国共产党元老宋任穷之女，文化大革命期间北京师范大学女附中的红卫兵领袖。她因给毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章并被赐名“要武”而闻名全国，也因其所在学校副校长卞仲耘在“红八月”期间被打死而引发关注。后移居美国成为地质学者，晚年就文革行为道歉但引发争议。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese Communist Party veteran Song Renqiong, and a prominent Red Guard leader at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School during the Cultural Revolution. She became nationally famous for putting a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong and being given the name 'Yaowu', and was also known for the death of the school's vice-principal Bian Zhongyun during Beijing's 'Red August'. She later moved to the United States, becoming a geologist, and in her later years apologized for her Cultural Revolution actions, sparking controversy.

description.zh-cn: 由德国思想家卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯共同创立的社会、政治和经济理论体系。它涵盖哲学、政治经济学和社会主义等领域，以历史唯物主义、辩证法和对资本主义的批判为核心。巴枯宁是马克思主义及其无产阶级专政思想的著名批评者之一。陈延年于1921年后转向信奉此主义。
description.en: A social, political, and economic theoretical system co-founded by German thinkers Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels. It covers philosophy, political economy, and socialism, centered on historical materialism, dialectics, and a critique of capitalism. Bakunin was a prominent critic of Marxism and its idea of the dictatorship of the proletariat. Chen Yannian turned to this ideology after 1921.

description.zh-cn: 邓子恢的夫人。维基百科源码链接存在错误，指向东汉时期同名人物。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省厦门市

description.zh-cn: 中国近代教育史上第一所华侨创办的大学，中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。一项研究结果显示，1977、1978年级的学生中，知识分子家庭出身的比例达到历史最高水平。
description.en: The first university founded by overseas Chinese in modern Chinese education history, a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, and a comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China. A research finding from the university indicated that the proportion of students from intellectual families in the Classes of 1977 and 1978 reached a historical high.

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的地方委员会，是该市党的领导机关和领导核心。
description.en: The local committee of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen, serving as the Party's leadership body and core in the city.

description.zh-cn: 中国已退役职业网球运动员。
description.en: Retired Chinese professional tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 张高丽养女婿
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，曾任中共浙江省委书记。现任中央港澳工作领导小组常务副组长、中共中央港澳工作办公室主任、国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former deputy national leader, currently serving as the executive deputy head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee, and Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 浙江大学，中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性研究型大学，位于中国浙江省杭州市。该校于1998年由原浙江大学、浙江医科大学、浙江农业大学、杭州大学合并组建。作为一所顶尖公立研究型大学，其知名校友包括习明泽；幻方量化的创始成员亦多毕业于此。
description.en: Zhejiang University is a comprehensive research university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China. It was formed in 1998 by the merger of the former Zhejiang University, Zhejiang Medical University, Zhejiang Agricultural University, and Hangzhou University. As a top public research university, its notable alumni include Xi Mingze; many founding members of High-Flyer Quant also graduated from here.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省杭州市
location.en: Hangzhou, Zhejiang, People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会
en: National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是综合研究拟订经济和社会发展政策，进行总量平衡，指导总体经济体制改革的宏观调控部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which is a macro-control department that comprehensively studies and formulates economic and social development policies, conducts aggregate balance, and guides the overall economic system reform.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任南投县县长。他曾与吴敦义夫妇同游峇里岛；蔡奇在2012年访问台湾时曾与其会面，并称其为“老朋友”。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Nantou County. He traveled to Bali with Wu Den-yih and his wife; Cai Qi also met with him during a visit to Taiwan in 2012 and referred to him as an 'old friend'.

en: National Security Commission of the Chinese Communist Party
National Security Commission of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会下属的决策和议事协调机构，负责协调和领导国家安全事务。该机构于2014年成立，成立后，中央国家安全工作领导小组的名义不再保留。
description.en: A decision-making and deliberative coordination body under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, responsible for coordinating and leading national security affairs. Established in 2014, its formation led to the disuse of the title 'Central Leading Group for National Security Affairs'.

description.zh-cn: 朱镕基的儿子。
明朝开国皇帝，明太祖，年号洪武。他设立锦衣卫，废除丞相制度，通过胡惟庸案等政治清洗大大加强皇权，并推行海禁政策。其建立的分封藩王制度，虽旨在巩固朱氏统治，却为靖难之役埋下伏笔。他娶孝慈高皇后马氏，并在其去世后誓言不再立后。他是朱镕基的祖先，明宣宗的曾祖父，朱高煦的祖父。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, known as Emperor Taizu, with the reign title Hongwu. He established the Jinyiwei, abolished the chancellery system, and significantly strengthened imperial power through political purges like the Hu Weiyong case. He also implemented the Haijin policy. The system of enfeoffing princes he established, though intended to consolidate the Zhu family's rule, inadvertently set the stage for the later Jingnan Campaign. He married Empress Ma, Empress Xiaocigao, and vowed not to establish another empress after her death. He was an ancestor of Zhu Rongji, the great-grandfather of Emperor Xuande, and the grandfather of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行，也是国务院组成部门。主要职责是拟订金融业改革和发展战略规划、制定和执行货币政策、汇率政策，承担最后贷款人的责任，并对国家外汇管理局进行管理等。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China and a constituent department of the State Council. Its main responsibilities include drafting financial industry reform and development strategies, formulating and implementing monetary and exchange rate policies, acting as the lender of last resort, and managing the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物和经济学家，曾任国家外汇管理局局长、中国证券监督管理委员会主席及中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Chinese economist and politician, former Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, and Governor of the People's Bank of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 美国投资银行，其经济学家吉姆·奥尼尔提出了“金砖四国”概念。
李克强的妻子，首都经济贸易大学英语教授。
description.en: Li Keqiang's wife, a professor of English at the Capital University of Economics and Business.

description.zh-cn: 李克强的弟弟，曾任国有重点大型企业监事会主席。
description.en: Li Keqiang's younger brother, who served as the Chairman of the Board of Supervisors for Key Large State-Owned Enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 中国医生、学者、艾滋病防治活动家，河南血祸的揭露者之一。
description.en: A Chinese gynecologist, academic, and AIDS activist.

zh-cn: 中央处理法轮功问题领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 中共中央领导小组办公室，为处理法轮功问题而成立。该机构由江泽民下令设立，是一个法外机构，专门负责协调各机关镇压法轮功。其任务随后扩大，涵盖对其他被中共视为异端的宗教和气功团体的镇压。
description.en: The Central Leading Group for Handling Falun Gong Office, established to address the Falun Gong issue. This extralegal agency was set up by order of Jiang Zemin, specifically tasked with coordinating various government bodies in the suppression of Falun Gong. Its mission later expanded to cover the suppression of other religious and qigong groups deemed heterodox by the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名高等学府，1951年由大夏大学和光华大学合并改制而成。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 联合国秘书长。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部
en: Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管社会行政事务的组成部门，主要负责民政事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for social administrative affairs, primarily civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾实行的一种行政处罚制度，于2013年被废除。
中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记。曾任中共上海市委常委，中国纪检监察学院院长，前中华人民共和国国家监察委员会主任，首位拥有总监察官头衔的国家监察委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Political Bureau and a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee. He also previously served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision, and former Director of the National Supervisory Commission, being the first to hold the title of Chief Supervisor for the National Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记。
中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心。许涤新曾任副院长，孙冶方曾任其顾问。
description.en: The highest academic institution and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China. Xu Dixin served as its vice president, and Sun Yefang served as a consultant.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将。曾任中共中央政治局委员，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。后在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He was a former Politburo member and was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress. He later fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共青海、甘肃、江西三省省委书记，第十二届全国政协副主席。2017年，因犯受贿罪、滥用职权罪、巨额财产来源不明罪，被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former deputy national leader. He served as the Party Committee Secretary of Qinghai, Gansu, and Jiangxi provinces, and as a Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC. In 2017, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, abuse of power, and possessing a huge amount of property from unknown sources.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆企业家，阿里巴巴集团、淘宝网、支付宝的创始人，蚂蚁集团实际控制人
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，第20任大韩民国总统。他于2024年12月3日宣布全国戒严，引发政治危机，最终遭国会弹劾下台并被逮捕。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as the 20th President of the Republic of Korea. He declared martial law on December 3, 2024, sparking a political crisis that led to his impeachment and arrest.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，大韩民国第19任总统。他曾在2017年共同民主党总统初选中击败李在明，并于2018年与金正恩共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as the 19th President of the Republic of Korea. He defeated Lee Jae-myung in the 2017 Democratic Party presidential primary and co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Kim Jong-un in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾总统
中国传媒工作者、前中国中央电视台主持人，于2018年底曝光陕西千亿矿权案二审卷宗在最高人民法院丢失，引发舆论风暴。
description.en: A Chinese media worker and former host of China Central Television who, in late 2018, exposed the disappearance of the second-instance case files of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' from the Supreme People's Court, sparking a public outcry.

description.zh-cn: 以色列总理
中华人民共和国女高音歌唱家、歌剧表演艺术家、国家一级歌唱演员，金铁霖的学生，也是中国培养的第一位民族声乐硕士研究生。她曾任全国政协委员、解放军艺术学院院长，是中共中央总书记习近平的妻子。
description.en: Chinese soprano, folk singer, opera performing artist, and national first-class singer. She was a student of Jin Tielin and the first person in China to receive a master's degree in ethnic vocal music. She served as a member of the National Committee of the CPPCC and the president of the PLA Academy of Art. She is also the wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国前驻英国大使柯华之女，习近平的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平与歌唱家彭丽媛的独生女，同时也是齐桥桥的侄女。
description.en: The only daughter of Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and his wife, singer Peng Liyuan. She is also the niece of Qi Qiaoqiao.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省福州市
birth_place.en: Fuzhou, Fujian, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共河北省委书记。
中国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长、中国科学技术协会党组书记，中共十九届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记，原副国级党和国家领导人，习近平在清华大学的室友。
description.en: A Chinese politician, formerly served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee, the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology, a member of the Political Bureau and a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee. He was a former state leader at vice-national level and Xi Jinping's roommate at Tsinghua University.

zh-cn: 小约瑟夫·罗比内特·拜登

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任暨现任美国总统。他在2020年总统选举中击败唐纳德·特朗普。
description.en: American politician, the 46th and current President of the United States, who defeated Donald Trump in the 2020 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中国共产党中央委员会总书记胡锦涛的夫人，曾任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Hu Jintao, and former deputy director of the Beijing Municipal Commission of Urban Planning.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记胡锦涛与刘永清之子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Son of former CCP General Secretary Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, currently serving as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 胡锦涛领导下的自由主义黄金时代

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记、温家宝担任国务院总理时期的中华人民共和国中央领导集体。该届政府被认为需要打击削弱江泽民派系。
description.en: Refers to the central leadership of the People's Republic of China during the period when Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council. This administration was seen as needing to weaken the Jiang Zemin faction.

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生于中国四川省的特大地震，是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。此次地震对都江堰及二王庙造成损害，绵阳市是重灾区之一。大量校舍倒塌引发社会广泛质疑，促使艾未未发起公民调查。习明泽曾前往灾区担任志愿者。地震后，香港理工大学与四川大学共建了灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake occurred in Sichuan Province, China, on May 12, 2008. It was the most destructive and casualty-ridden earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake and the founding of the People's Republic of China. The event caused damage to Dujiangyan and the Erwang Temple, with Mianyang being one of the hardest-hit areas. The collapse of numerous school buildings led to widespread public questioning, prompting Ai Weiwei to initiate a citizens' investigation. Xi Mingze served as a volunteer in the disaster area. After the earthquake, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Sichuan University jointly established the Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党创党主席及现任党主席，曾任台湾省省长。他毕业于伯克利大学。2000年因未获国民党提名，脱党参选总统选举，导致泛蓝选票分裂。他曾与李登辉一同提拔吴敦义，后在2012年总统选举中成为吴敦义的竞争对手。在《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“钟主谕”，剧中描述其与“陆中华”（原型连战）不和。
description.en: A Republic of China politician, founding and current chairman of the People First Party, and former governor of Taiwan Province. He graduated from Berkeley University. In 2000, after failing to secure the KMT's nomination, he ran as an independent in the presidential election, which led to a split in the pan-blue vote. He once promoted Wu Den-yih alongside Lee Teng-hui, later becoming Wu's rival in the 2012 presidential election. In the TV series 'Island Nation 2', his prototype character is 'Zhong Zhu-yu', depicted as being at odds with 'Lu Zhong-hua' (prototype Lien Chan).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部主张并推动改革开放的政治派别，其主张包括深化市场化和政治体制改革。
中华人民共和国国务院前总理温家宝之子，中国商人和企业家，曾创立优创科技有限公司和新天域资本公司，并曾担任中国卫星通信集团董事长。
description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝与张培莉之女，温云松之妹。曾在雷曼兄弟公司和瑞士信贷第一波士顿银行任职。
description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年2月6日至7日，时任重庆市副市长兼公安局局长王立军私自进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留。该事件引发了一系列政治风波，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台和重庆模式的终结。
description.en: Refers to the incident on February 6-7, 2012, when then Vice Mayor of Chongqing and police chief Wang Lijun secretly entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu. This event triggered a series of political turmoil, directly leading to the downfall of Bo Xilai and the end of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 现任俄罗斯联邦总统，曾任俄罗斯总理。他批准并签署了接纳克里米亚加入俄罗斯的条约，并在顿巴斯战争及2022年2月24日对乌克兰发动的全面入侵（亦称“特别军事行动”）中扮演关键决策角色。他是首位拜访少林寺的外国元首。在任期间，安倍晋三曾多次与其会面，试图解决南千岛群岛（日称北方四岛）领土争议并签订和平条约，两人建立了深厚的个人情谊。此外，他还公开表达对唐纳德·特朗普的支持，魏京生赞同其“为保护本民族不再遭受种族清洗”的说法。
description.en: Current President of the Russian Federation and former Prime Minister of Russia. He approved and signed the treaty to admit Crimea into Russia, and played a key decision-making role in the War in Donbas and the full-scale invasion of Ukraine on February 24, 2022 (also known as a 'special military operation'). He was the first foreign head of state to visit the Shaolin Temple. During his tenure, Shinzo Abe met with him multiple times in an attempt to resolve the Southern Kuril Islands territorial dispute and sign a peace treaty, developing a strong personal rapport. Furthermore, he has also publicly expressed support for Donald Trump, and Wei Jingsheng agreed with his justification of 'protecting his people from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的长子，俞正声的大哥，原中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长，1986年叛逃美国。
description.en: Eldest son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin. He was the eldest brother of Yu Zhengsheng, and formerly served as the Director of the North American Intelligence Division of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, defecting to the United States in 1986.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学
中国人民解放军军事工程学院
中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学
中国人民解放军第四政治干部学校
解放军第四政治干部学校

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学，一所中央军事委员会直属的综合性大学，位于中国湖南省长沙市。其前身是中国人民解放军军事工程学院（简称“哈军工”），始建于1953年，早期位于哈尔滨（1953-1966），后于1970年主体内迁长沙并更名。作为解放军唯一一所“985工程”和“211工程”重点建设的顶尖军事院校，毛远新曾在此就读；刘超英曾学习电子计算机软件专业；于永波则在其前身解放军第四政治干部学校学习。
description.en: The National University of Defense Technology of the People's Liberation Army is a comprehensive university directly under the Central Military Commission, located in Changsha, Hunan, China. Its predecessor was the PLA Military Institute of Engineering (commonly known as 'Harbin Military Engineering Institute'), founded in 1953, initially located in Harbin (1953-1966). Its main body relocated to Changsha and was renamed in 1970. As the only top military academy of the PLA designated under Project 985 and Project 211, Mao Yuanxin once studied here; Liu Chaoying studied computer software; and Yu Yongbo studied at its predecessor, the 4th PLA Political Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
越南华裔女商人，因与包括杜世成在内的多名高官有染并涉及腐败案件而知名。
description.en: A Vietnamese-born Chinese businesswoman known for her involvement in corruption cases and relationships with several high-ranking officials, including Du Shicheng.

description.zh-cn: 德国总理

zh-cn: 艾曼纽·尚-米歇尔·弗雷德里克·马克宏

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，现任法国总统和安道尔大公。曾任法国经济、产业更新和信息技术部长。他于2016年成立“共和国前进！”政党，并在2017年和2022年连续两次赢得总统选举。任职总统期间，他曾任命塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼为总理。
description.en: French politician, the current President of France and Co-Prince of Andorra. He previously served as Minister of the Economy, Industry and Digital Affairs. He founded the political party La République En Marche! in 2016 and won the presidential elections in both 2017 and 2022. During his presidency, he appointed Sébastien Lecornu as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正的母亲。
蒋中正的原配夫人，蒋经国的生母，蒋方良的婆婆。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek's original wife, Chiang Ching-kuo's biological mother, and Jiang Fangliang's mother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正的妾，蒋纬国养母。

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，也是美国历史上唯一连任超过两届的总统。他在大萧条期间推行罗斯福新政，领导国家走出困境。在第二次世界大战期间，他作为同盟国的关键领导人，于珍珠港事件后发表《国耻演说》，领导美国对日宣战。他与西奥多·罗斯福是堂兄弟。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, and the only president to serve more than two terms. He implemented the New Deal during the Great Depression, leading the country out of its difficulties. During World War II, as a key leader of the Allies, he delivered the famous "Day of Infamy" speech after the Pearl Harbor attack and led the U.S. to declare war on Japan. He was a fifth cousin of Theodore Roosevelt.

death_place.zh-cn: 沃姆斯普林斯 (佐治亚州)

zh-cn: 温斯顿·雷欧纳德·斯宾塞·邱吉尔

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家、演说家、军官、历史学家、作家与画家，曾两度担任英国首相，领导英国赢得第二次世界大战。在二战期间，他曾与斯大林讨论过教宗的立场。
description.en: British statesman, orator, officer, historian, writer, and artist who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom twice, leading Britain to victory in the Second World War. During World War II, he also discussed the Pope's position with Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党史专家，毛泽东前政治秘书，中共党内自由派的代表人物。
description.en: An expert on the history of the Communist Party of China, a former political secretary to Mao Zedong, and a representative of the liberal faction within the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 周永康长子。
周永康次子。
中国共产党内的一个非正式政治派系，以江泽民为核心。其成员多与前中共中央总书记江泽民有直接或间接的联系，主要从上海市的领导岗位提升至中央高层。陈良宇被视为该派系的重要成员。据博讯新闻称，该派系曾与温家宝存在权力斗争。
description.en: An informal political faction within the Communist Party of China, with Jiang Zemin as its core. Its members often have direct or indirect ties to former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin and were frequently promoted to central leadership from positions in Shanghai. Chen Liangyu was considered a key member of this faction. According to Boxun News, it was engaged in a power struggle with Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代民族工商业者的杰出代表，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，并担任第四届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: An outstanding representative of modern national industrialists and businessmen in China, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and was a member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任广东省省长和深圳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，现任中共中央政策研究室主任。他与何毅亭、王沪宁一同被视为习近平的文胆。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as the Director of the Policy Research Office of the CPC Central Committee. He is regarded as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors, alongside He Yiting and Wang Huning.

description.zh-cn: 原中共河北省委书记。
位于中国哈尔滨市的著名理工科大学，是中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，为C9联盟成员。它是李长春的母校。在1970年至1973年间，其部分专业曾与哈军工二系合并搬迁至重庆，建立了临时教学单位。
description.en: A renowned university of science and engineering located in Harbin, China, it is one of China's top universities, affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, and a member of the C9 League. It is the alma mater of Li Changchun. From 1970 to 1973, some of its departments merged with the second department of Harbin Military Engineering Institute and relocated to Chongqing, establishing a temporary teaching unit.

description.zh-cn: 原陕西省省长、省委书记，被赵发琦实名举报深度介入陕西千亿矿权案，干预司法，后于2019年1月被查。
description.en: Former Governor and Party Secretary of Shaanxi Province. He was publicly reported by Zhao Faqi for deep involvement and judicial interference in the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' and was subsequently investigated in January 2019.

description.zh-cn: 原中共青海省委书记、中共云南省委书记，后被查处。
中华人民共和国高级警官和政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长、公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长等职。后因参加孙力军政治团伙，并涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处，被判处死刑，缓期二年执行；并被指主导了对艾未未的迫害。
description.en: A senior police officer and politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Justice, Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He was later investigated for participating in Sun Lijun's political clique and serious violations of discipline and law, and was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve; he was also allegedly behind the persecution of Ai Weiwei.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，新党共同创始人之一，曾任新党主席。作为新党籍政治人物，他曾出席蒋方良告别式并致意。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, one of the co-founders of the New Party and its former chairman. As a New Party politician, he attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国家安全部副部长。

zh-cn: 中国移动通信有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信运营商，同时也是联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。2007年，它与谷歌达成合作，在其WAP门户“移动梦网”中引入了谷歌的移动搜索技术。
description.en: A Chinese mobile communications operator and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay. In 2007, it partnered with Google to integrate Google's mobile search technology into its WAP portal 'Monternet'.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的女儿，习仲勋外孙女，习近平外甥女。
description.en: Daughter of Qi Qiaoqiao, granddaughter of Xi Zhongxun, and niece of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军特级飞行员，空军上将。原副国级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军事委员会副主席（与张又侠同任）。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间，他曾被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A special-grade pilot and Air Force General of the People's Liberation Army. A former national leader at vice-state level, he served as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC Central Committee (co-served with Zhang Youxia). During the 11th National People's Congress, he was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的小学，习明泽曾就读于此。
description.en: A primary school located in Beijing, which Xi Mingze once attended.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的一所著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in England.

death_place.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切。在海伍德死亡案中，他被薄谷开来与张晓军合谋毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman with close ties to the Bo Xilai family. He was poisoned by Bo Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun in the Death of Neil Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 大连实德集团创始人，薄熙来案中的主要行贿人。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长，是‘重庆打黑’行动的主要执行者。其进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件作为王立军事件的核心，直接引发了薄熙来下台。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing, and was the main executor of the 'Chongqing Strike Black' campaign. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, a core event of the Wang Lijun incident, directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 陈云的孙女，陈元之女。曾就读于杜克大学和哈佛大学商学院。
description.en: Granddaughter of Chen Yun, daughter of Chen Yuan. She studied at Duke University and Harvard Business School.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日治朝鲜庆尚南道巨济市
birth_place.en: Geoje, South Gyeongsang Province, Korea under Japanese rule

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔特别市首尔大学校病院
death_place.en: Seoul National University Hospital, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖、政治家，韩国第14任总统，也是韩国民主化后的首位文人总统。他曾是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。在执政期间致力于消除腐败，并将两位前总统推上法庭，但其任期后期因亚洲金融危机和亲属腐败丑聞而备受争议。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and politician, the 14th President of South Korea, and the first civilian president after democratization. He was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly and the youngest member ever elected. During his tenure, he focused on eradicating corruption and brought two former presidents to justice, but his later term was marred by the Asian financial crisis and family corruption scandals.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军
中国人民解放军海军北海舰队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军北部战区海军，亦称“中国人民解放军海军北海舰队”。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Northern Theater Command Navy, also referred to as the North Sea Fleet of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国最早实行对外开放政策的经济特区之一，也是林向荣的本籍地。
description.en: One of the first Special Economic Zones in China to implement the policy of opening up to the outside world, and also the native place of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 艾未未曾于1978年入读的中国高等艺术教育院校。
description.en: An institution of higher art education in China where Ai Weiwei enrolled in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，北洋军阀奉系首领。曾任中华民国陆海军大元帅、北洋政府末任国家元首。他与蒋介石协议驱逐共产国际势力，搜查苏联使馆并处决李大钊等共产党人。他非常信任和重用杨宇霆。作为张学良之父、张作孚之兄，他曾抚养并提拔侄子张学成。后在皇姑屯事件中被日军刺杀身亡。
description.en: A prominent military and political figure of the Republic of China and a leader of the Fengtian clique of the Beiyang Warlords. He served as Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Republic of China and was the last head of state of the Beiyang Government. He agreed with Chiang Kai-shek to expel Comintern influence, raided the Soviet embassy, and executed Li Dazhao and other communists. He highly trusted and valued Yang Yuting. As the father of Zhang Xueliang and elder brother of Zhang Zuofu, he also raised and promoted his nephew Zhang Xuecheng. He was later assassinated by the Japanese army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国富商于文斗之女，张学良的原配妻子。在张学良的人生中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese businessman Yu Wendou and the original wife of Zhang Xueliang. She played a significant role in Zhang Xueliang's life.

description.zh-cn: 奉系将领，张学良的恩师与挚友。1925年11月，因遭杨宇霆排挤等原因，在冯玉祥支持下起兵反奉，反对张作霖。兵败后被处决。
description.en: A Fengtian clique general, and a mentor and close friend of Zhang Xueliang. In November 1925, due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, he launched a rebellion against the Fengtian clique and Zhang Zuolin with Feng Yuxiang's support. He was defeated and executed.

death_place.zh-cn: 奉天省奉天市 (中华民国)
death_place.en: Fengtian City, Fengtian Province (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀执政时期奉系军阀重要将领，有“智囊”、“小诸葛”之称。曾任奉军总参谋长、江苏省督办等职，且是东京振武学校校友。后因权力斗争，被奉系领袖张学良处决。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang government era of the Republic of China, known as the 'mastermind' and 'little Zhuge'. He served as Chief of Staff of the Fengtian Army and Governor of Jiangsu Province, and was an alumnus of the Tokyo Shinbu Gakkō. He was later executed by Fengtian clique leader Zhang Xueliang due to a power struggle.

description.zh-cn: 该部队是大日本帝国陆军的一支重要部队，于1919年至1945年驻扎在中国东北地区（满洲）。它策划并执行了皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，扶植满洲国。其下属包括臭名昭著的731部队（防疫给水部）。该部队最终在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下投降。
description.en: A major army group of the Imperial Japanese Army, stationed in Northeast China (Manchuria) from 1919 to 1945. It planned and executed the Huanggutun Incident and the Mukden Incident, and established the puppet state of Manchukuo. The infamous Unit 731 (Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department) was one of its subordinate units. The army ultimately surrendered following the Soviet 'August Storm' offensive.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀是民国军阀时期的主要派系，属于北洋军阀系统。该集团以奉天省为中心，先后由张作霖及其子张学良领导，杨宇霆是其重要将领。他们长期控制中国东北地区，并曾受日本支持。1928年东北易帜后，该派系改称东北军。
description.en: The Fengtian warlord clique was a major faction during the Warlord Era of the Republic of China, belonging to the Beiyang warlord system. This group was centered in Fengtian Province and was successively led by Zhang Zuolin and his son Zhang Xueliang, with Yang Yuting being a key general. They long controlled Northeast China and were supported by Japan. After the Northeast Flag Replacement in 1928, this faction was renamed the Northeastern Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队政治委员、成都军区政治委员等职。其父为原中央军委副主席张震上将。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China, who served as Political Commissar of the PLA Second Artillery Force and the Chengdu Military Region. His father is Zhang Zhen, a former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖地级市，范丞丞的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Fan Chengcheng.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于香港的华语电视台。曾专访贾庆林的妻子林幼芳，她在采访中否认了与远华案的关联。
description.en: A Chinese-language television network headquartered in Hong Kong. It conducted an exclusive interview with Jia Qinglin's wife, Lin Youfang, in which she denied any connection to the Yuanhua case.

description.zh-cn: 王健林的妻子，林氏投资集团董事长。
description.en: Wife of Wang Jianlin, chairman of Lin's Investment Group.

zh-cn: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由王健林创立的中国跨国企业集团，总部位于北京。业务涵盖商业地产、文化、金融和信息科技等多个领域。据报道，贾庆林家族持有其股份。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate founded by Wang Jianlin, headquartered in Beijing. Its business interests cover multiple fields including commercial property, culture, finance, and information technology. Reportedly, Jia Qinglin's family holds its shares.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国第二代最高领导人，金日成长子，金平一同父异母兄。他曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记，被追封为“朝鲜劳动党永远的总书记”。任内曾与韩国总统卢武铉举行首脑会谈。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the eldest son of Kim Il-sung, and the half-brother of Kim Pyong-il. He served as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and was posthumously honored as 'Eternal General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea'. During his tenure, he held a summit meeting with South Korean President Roh Moo-hyun.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构，负责国际公共卫生事务，是国际公共卫生领域的领导者。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for international public health.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
en: 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2007年至2012年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2007 to 2012.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
中共第十八届中央委员
en: 18th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，是中国共产党在2012年至2017年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, serving as the highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2012 to 2017.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会于2017年10月24日选举产生的中央委员会，是该党在2017年至2022年间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China on October 24, 2017, served as the party's highest authority from 2017 to 2022.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在中国发生的一起影响深远的食品安全事件，涉及多家奶粉企业的产品被检出含有三聚氰胺。
description.en: A far-reaching food safety incident that occurred in China in 2008, involving the detection of melamine in the products of multiple milk powder companies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后兴建的第一家汽车制造厂。

zh-cn: 东风汽车集团有限公司
中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门，负责全国教育事业和语言文字工作。它主管华中科技大学、厦门大学、清华大学等高校，并于1952年决定创办北京体育大学（时称中央体育学院）。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for overseeing the country's education sector and language-related work. It supervises universities such as Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Xiamen University, and Tsinghua University. In 1952, it also decided to establish Beijing Sport University (then Central Institute of Physical Culture).

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，被称为“马来西亚现代化之父”。慕沙希淡在其第一个任期内担任副首相。他曾是安华的政治导师，后成为其主要政治对手，在1998年将其革职；两人后来在2018年结盟推翻国阵政府，但联盟因2020年政治危机而破裂。其提出的“多媒体超级走廊”启发了马云。他对“一带一路”的态度从初期的批评和重新谈判转变为后期的支持。
description.en: Fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modernization of Malaysia". Musa Hitam served as his Deputy Prime Minister during his first term. He was once Anwar's political mentor before becoming his main political rival, dismissing him in 1998; the two later allied in 2018 to overthrow the Barisan Nasional government, but the alliance collapsed during the 2020 political crisis. His 'Multimedia Super Corridor' initiative inspired Jack Ma. His stance on the 'Belt and Road' initiative evolved from initial criticism and renegotiation to later support.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中共中央军事委员会委员、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领。
中国人民解放军高级将领。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员、高层领导人，中华人民共和国政治人物，一二·九运动的组织和指挥者之一。俞强声之父，范瑾的丈夫。曾任中华人民共和国首任天津市市长、第一任第一机械工业部部长，并曾与江青同居。
description.en: An early member and high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, a politician of the People's Republic of China, and one of the organizers and commanders of the December 9th Movement. He was the father of Yu Qiangsheng and husband of Fan Jin. He served as the first mayor of Tianjin and the first minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building, and once cohabited with Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，是世界一流大学建设高校（A类）、985工程、211工程重点建设高校。该校历史悠久，可追溯至多个前身，且有机构于1951年与之合校。
潜伏于美国中央情报局的中华人民共和国间谍。
中国商人，湖北人，企业家。他是齐桥桥的第二任丈夫，习近平的姐夫，习明泽的姑父。其个人信息曾在“恶俗维基”案中被泄露。
description.en: Chinese businessman and entrepreneur from Hubei. He is the second husband of Qi Qiaoqiao, brother-in-law of Xi Jinping, and uncle of Xi Mingze. His personal information was previously leaked in the 'Esuwiki case'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的省会，下辖的地级市，国家区域中心城市，位于福建省东部的闽江下游。它是福建省的政治、经济、文化、交通中心，也是习明泽和黄贤模的出生地。
description.en: The capital and a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China. It is a national regional central city, located in the lower reaches of the Min River in eastern Fujian Province. It serves as the province's political, economic, cultural, and transportation center, and is also the birthplace of Xi Mingze and Huang Xianmo.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的一所世界顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A world-leading public research university located in London, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共上海市委副书记，上海市人民政府市长、党组书记。曾任夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的常务副省长，山东省省长、杭州市委书记等职。是刘鹤的妹夫。
description.en: A political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee and Mayor of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government. He previously served as Executive Vice Governor when Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, Governor of Shandong, and Secretary of the CPC Hangzhou Municipal Committee, among other positions. He is the brother-in-law of Liu He.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省苏州市
birth_place.en: Suzhou, Jiangsu, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈吉宁的继任北京市市长。
中国政治人物，曾任清华大学党委书记、中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

zh-cn: 柴静雾霾调查：穹顶之下 同呼吸 共命运

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年2月底推出的一部关于中国空气污染的调查纪录片。该片最初在官方媒体平台播出后，引发了社会巨大反响，但很快遭到中共中央宣传部全面封杀。
description.en: An investigative documentary about air pollution in China, released by journalist Chai Jing in late February 2015. After its initial broadcast on official media platforms, it sparked widespread public discussion but was soon completely banned by the Propaganda Department of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、主持人、独立媒体人，也是《穹顶之下》纪录片的制作人、主讲人和调查记者。
description.en: Chinese journalist and media personality, who produced, hosted, and conducted the investigation for the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西左翼政治家，巴西劳工党创始成员，曾于2003年至2010年担任巴西第35任总统，并于2023年起再次担任第39任总统。他是巴西历史上第一位工人出身的总统。2010年，他曾与巴沙尔·阿萨德会面。
description.en: A Brazilian left-wing politician and founding member of the Workers' Party, who served as the 35th President of Brazil from 2003 to 2010 and began his term as the 39th President in 2023. He is the first working-class president in Brazilian history. In 2010, he met with Bashar al-Assad.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉总统。
新加坡政治人物，现任新加坡国务资政。他曾于2004年至2024年担任新加坡总理，并于同期担任人民行动党秘书长。他是何晶的丈夫。
description.en: Singaporean politician, current Senior Minister of Singapore. He served as Prime Minister of Singapore from 2004 to 2024 and concurrently as Secretary-General of the People's Action Party. He is the husband of Ho Ching.

en: Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China
Legislator of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国（台湾）的最高立法机关，由其成员组成。现负责对监察委员人事案行使同意权，并在第十一届立法院中，蓝白两党合作成为主导议事运作的关键力量。此外，它曾通过决议要求中国停止镇压法轮功，并谴责强摘法轮功等良心犯器官的行为。
description.en: The highest legislative body of the Republic of China (Taiwan), functioning as a unicameral legislature composed of its members. It currently holds the power to approve nominations for the Control Yuan, and in the 11th Legislative Yuan, the Blue-White cooperation has become a key force dominating legislative operations. Additionally, it has passed resolutions demanding that China stop the suppression of Falun Gong and condemning the forced organ harvesting from Falun Gong practitioners and other prisoners of conscience.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领、政治人物。曾任中国国民党副主席、行政院院长、国防部部长、参谋总长、中华民国陆军一级上将。李登辉任命其为国防部长，实际上削弱了其军权。他曾在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖国旗。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“楚长青”，描述其与李登辉掌权后的国民党理念不合。
description.en: A military general and political figure of the Republic of China. He served as Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang, Premier of the Executive Yuan, Minister of National Defense, Chief of the General Staff, and a First Class General of the Republic of China Army. Lee Teng-hui appointed him Minister of National Defense, a move that effectively diminished his military power. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the national flag at her funeral. In the TV series 'Island Nation 2', his prototype character 'Chu Chang-qing' is depicted as having ideological differences with the KMT under Lee Teng-hui's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 台湾革命家、政治家和作家，曾任民主进步党主席，被誉为“台湾曼德拉”。他曾于2001年与访问台湾的魏京生会晤，陈明通也曾参加其有关两岸原则的记者会。此外，他还曾指控江鹏坚为调查局卧底，并于2006年发起百万人民反贪倒扁运动。
description.en: A Taiwanese revolutionary, politician, and writer, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, known as 'Taiwan's Mandela'. He met with Wei Jingsheng during his visit to Taiwan in 2001, and Chen Ming-tong also attended his press conference regarding cross-strait principles. Additionally, he once accused Chiang Peng-chien of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau and initiated the 'Million Voices Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go' movement in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席、立法院副院长
中华人民共和国外交官，现任中华人民共和国驻美利坚合众国特命全权大使。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the People's Republic of China to the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。它是夏宝龙、艾跃进、魏鹤龄的出生地，艾跃进和阮士怡的逝世地。张学成在中原大战石友三部失败后曾逃至此地。李瑞环曾在此长期主政。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China. It is the birthplace of Xia Baolong, Ai Yuejin, and Wei Heling, and the place of death of Ai Yuejin and Ruan Shiyi. Zhang Xuecheng fled here after Shi Yousan's forces were defeated in the Central Plains War. Li Ruihuan served as a long-term leader here.

description.zh-cn: 香港凤凰卫视记者、制片人，曾担任「风云对话」节目主持人。
马英九的妻子。
位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、法学学者、教授与律师，民主进步党籍。曾任中华民国第14、15任总统、行政院大陆委员会主任委员、民主进步党主席等职务。在总统任内，她任命萧美琴为国家安全会议咨询委员及驻美代表；并谴责香港民主派初选大搜捕，指出北京当局彻底毁弃了“五十年不变”的承诺。她曾是陈明通在国家安全局、大陆委员会任职期间的上司，并获李登辉公开支持参选。
description.en: A politician, legal scholar, professor, and lawyer from the Republic of China (Taiwan), affiliated with the Democratic Progressive Party. She served as the 14th and 15th President of the Republic of China, Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council, and Chairperson of the Democratic Progressive Party. During her presidency, she appointed Hsiao Bi-khim as an advisor to the National Security Council and Representative to the United States. She also condemned the mass arrests in Hong Kong's pro-democracy primaries, stating that Beijing authorities had completely abandoned their 'fifty years unchanged' promise. She was Chen Ming-tong's superior during his tenure at the National Security Bureau and Mainland Affairs Council, and was publicly endorsed by Lee Teng-hui for her candidacy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。曾任立法院院长、副院长、立法委员、中国国民党副主席等职，是中华民国宪政史上最资深的立法委员，也是国会全面改选后任期最长的立法院院长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. He served as President of the Legislative Yuan, Vice President, Legislator, and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the most senior legislator in the constitutional history of the Republic of China and the longest-serving President of the Legislative Yuan since its full reelection. He also covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the party flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所私立大学。
清朝末期政治人物，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。宣统年间，他担任监国摄政王，此职位是清朝末年为辅佐幼帝宣统帝而设立的。他也是清朝最后的实际统治者之一。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). During the Xuantong era, he served as the Prince-Regent, a position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young Xuantong Emperor. He was also one of the last de facto rulers of the Qing dynasty.

en: Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 这是中国抗日战争时期由汪精卫在日本扶植下成立的亲日傀儡政权，首都设于南京。它被普遍认为是与大日本帝国合作的伪政府。孙殿英投降日军后曾在此政权中任职。该政权曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: Established by Wang Jingwei and fostered by Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War, this pro-Japanese puppet government had its capital in Nanjing. It was widely regarded as a collaborationist regime that cooperated with the Empire of Japan. Sun Dianying held positions in this regime after surrendering to the Japanese army. It famously invited Mei Lanfang to perform, which he refused.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国指1868年至1947年的日本。明治维新后，为扩张势力，它发动牡丹社事件，推行帝国主义扩张。甲午战争击败清朝，割占台湾、澎湖，赢得日俄战争。其关东军支持奉系军阀（有冲突），并于1931年发动九一八事变占领中国东北。作为一战协约国和二战轴心国（偷袭珍珠港），它侵略中国（中日战争主要参战方，参与淞沪会战，扶植汪伪政权及满洲国）、香港与新加坡。为防其复兴，《中苏友好同盟互助条约》曾以此为目标。
description.en: The Empire of Japan refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947. After the Meiji Restoration, to expand its influence, it launched the Taiwan Expedition and pursued imperialist expansion. It defeated the Qing dynasty in the First Sino-Japanese War, annexing Taiwan and Penghu, and won the Russo-Japanese War. Its Kwantung Army supported the Fengtian clique (with conflicts), and in 1931, launched the Mukden Incident to occupy Northeast China. As an Entente Power in WWI and an Axis power in WWII (attacking Pearl Harbor), it invaded China (a major combatant in the Sino-Japanese War, participating in the Battle of Shanghai, and supporting the Wang Jingwei regime and Manchukuo), Hong Kong, and Singapore. To prevent its resurgence, the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance aimed at this goal.

en: Executive Yuan of the Nationalist Government

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。早年是中国共产党早期领导人及中共一大代表，后转为中国国民党官员，抗日战争时期成为汪精卫政权的主要领导人之一。战后被国民政府判处死刑，后减为无期徒刑，病死于狱中。
description.en: Chinese politician. He was an early leader of the Chinese Communist Party and a delegate to the 1st National Congress of the CCP. Later, he became a Kuomintang official and one of the main leaders of the Wang Jingwei regime during the Anti-Japanese War. After the war, he was sentenced to death by the Nationalist Government, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. He died in prison from illness.

en: Hu Dehua (third son of Hu Yaobang)
Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世。他的逝世导致中共党内出现权力真空，是粉碎‘四人帮’事件的直接导火索，也是文化大革命结束的关键事件之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong passed away on September 9, 1976. His death led to a power vacuum within the CCP, serving as a direct catalyst for the downfall of the 'Gang of Four' and one of the key events marking the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国是位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，由越南共产党一党专政。它是1976年南北统一后的越南国名，黎笋是其主要缔造者和领导人之一。该国与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议，并于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a socialist state located at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, under the single-party rule of the Communist Party of Vietnam. It is the official name of Vietnam after the reunification of North and South in 1976, and Lê Duẩn was one of its main founders and leaders. The country has sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands and became a BRICS partner in 2025.

birth_place.zh-cn: 法属印度支那广治省肇丰县
birth_place.en: Triệu Phong District, Quảng Trị Province, French Indochina

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党、越南民主共和国和越南社会主义共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。曾任越共中央总书记、中央军委书记。在胡志明去世后，他成为北越的最高领导人，并主导了越南的统一。其亲苏反华的立场导致了中越关系的紧张。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. He served as the General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam Central Committee and Secretary of the Central Military Commission. After Ho Chi Minh's death, he became the paramount leader of North Vietnam and led the country's reunification. His pro-Soviet and anti-Chinese stance led to tense Sino-Vietnamese relations.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党是越南的执政党。其前身是1951年由印度支那共产党改组成立的越南劳动党。越南劳动党于1951年至1976年间在越南民主共和国（北越）执政。1976年，越南劳动党改名为越南共产党。此后，作为越南唯一的执政党，它直接掌控着越南行政、立法、司法各个部门的机构。
description.en: The Communist Party of Vietnam is the ruling party of Vietnam. Its predecessor was the Workers' Party of Vietnam, formed in 1951 from the reorganization of the Indochinese Communist Party. The Workers' Party of Vietnam ruled the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) from 1951 to 1976. In 1976, it was renamed the Communist Party of Vietnam. Since then, as Vietnam's sole ruling party, it has directly controlled the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of government.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇，德仁天皇的祖父。他是大日本帝国在二战期间的国家元首与军队最高统帅，并在战争末期做出接受《波茨坦宣言》、结束战争的最终决定，通过“玉音放送”向全国宣布投降。他也是田中角荣担任首相时的在位天皇。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan and grandfather of Emperor Naruhito. He reigned as the head of state and supreme commander of the military of the Empire of Japan during World War II, making the final decision to accept the Potsdam Declaration and end the war, and announcing the surrender to the nation via the Gyokuon-hōsō. He also reigned during Kakuei Tanaka's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 此事件标志着中国全面抗日战争的开始。事变后，许涤新得以获释，同时上海的事态日益紧张。该事件也导致阮士怡中断了在北京大学工学院的学业。
description.en: This event marked the beginning of the full-scale Second Sino-Japanese War. After the incident, Xu Dixin was released, and tensions in Shanghai escalated. It also led Ruan Shiyi to abandon his studies at the College of Engineering, Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 爱新觉罗·溥仪，清朝末代皇帝，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝。由慈禧太后临终前指定继位，在张勋复辟事件中被短暂复辟。1924年被冯玉祥逐出紫禁城，后被关东军扶植为满洲国执政与皇帝，成为满洲国唯一一位君主。
description.en: Aisin-Gioro Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing dynasty and the last emperor of China. He was designated by Empress Dowager Cixi on her deathbed and briefly restored to the throne during the Zhang Xun Restoration. He was expelled from the Forbidden City by Feng Yuxiang in 1924, and later installed by the Kwantung Army as the emperor of Manchukuo, becoming its sole monarch.

description.zh-cn: 一场1939年至1945年爆发的全球性军事冲突，主要由轴心国与同盟国之间进行。珍珠港事件是重要转折点，标志太平洋战争全面爆发。美国在罗斯福领导下加入同盟国，艾森豪威尔任盟军欧洲最高指挥官。伯克利实验室和麻省理工学院在军事科研中发挥重要作用，包括原子弹研发。加拿大对德宣战参战。拉脱维亚先后被苏联和纳粹德国占领。期间，日本占领了马来亚。日本投降标志着亚洲战场的结束。战后，香港岛人口剧增，发展加速。
description.en: A global military conflict spanning 1939 to 1945, primarily involving the Axis and Allied powers. The attack on Pearl Harbor was a major turning point, marking the full-scale outbreak of the Pacific War. The United States, led by Roosevelt, joined the Allies, with Eisenhower as the Supreme Commander in Europe. Berkeley Lab and MIT played significant roles in military scientific research, including the atomic bomb project. Canada declared war on Germany and participated. Latvia was successively occupied by the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany. During this period, Japan occupied Malaya. Japan's surrender marked the end of its Asian theatre. Post-war, Hong Kong Island experienced a population surge and accelerated development.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中首场大型会战，也是规模最大、战斗最激烈的战役之一，发生于上海。虹桥机场事件是其导火线之一。战后上海沦陷。
description.en: The first major battle of the Second Sino-Japanese War, and one of its largest and most intense, which took place in Shanghai. It was triggered in part by the Hongqiao Airport Incident. After the battle, Shanghai fell to Japanese forces.

description.zh-cn: 日本中国派遣军总司令官，代表日本在中国战区投降。
标志着第二次世界大战和中国抗日战争的结束。此次事件直接导致了汪精卫国民政府的终结，并使梅兰芳得以重返舞台。
description.en: The event marking the end of World War II and the Second Sino-Japanese War. It directly led to the collapse of the Wang Jingwei regime and enabled Mei Lanfang to return to the stage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，国民革命军陆军二级上将。在枣宜会战中阵亡，是二战中同盟国牺牲的最高级别将领之一。
中国国民党中的一个政治派别，中国农工民主党的早期党员多来自于此。
description.en: A political faction within the Kuomintang, from which many early members of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party came.

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州山景城

description.zh-cn: 总部位于美国加利福尼亚州山景城的跨国科技公司，是Alphabet的子公司，专注于互联网相关服务和产品。其业务涵盖互联网广告、搜索、云计算、软件和硬件等领域。该公司也是谷歌中国的母公司。
description.en: An American multinational technology company headquartered in Mountain View, California. It is a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., specializing in Internet-related services and products, including online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, software, and hardware. It is also the parent company of Google China.

description.zh-cn: Google公司在中华人民共和国的运营实体，曾运营google.cn。其搜索服务于2010年停止运营并转至香港。
description.en: The operating entity of Google in the People's Republic of China. Its search services ceased operations and were redirected to Hong Kong in 2010.

description.zh-cn: Google公司在香港的运营实体及分支机构。自2010年谷歌退出中国大陆后，谷歌中国将其网页搜索等服务重定向至Google香港，由其承接简体中文搜索业务，并为中国大陆用户提供未经审查的搜索服务。
description.en: Google's operating entity and branch in Hong Kong. After Google's withdrawal from mainland China in 2010, Google China redirected its web search and other services to Google Hong Kong, which has since provided uncensored search services to mainland China users.

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。他坚决反对内容审查，支持退出中国市场。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He firmly opposed content censorship and supported withdrawing from the Chinese market.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于北京的中国跨国科技公司，专注于互联网相关服务、产品及人工智能。作为中国主要的搜索引擎公司和科技巨头，它曾是Google在中国的主要竞争对手。其搜索引擎曾将特定词语（如“温云松”）设为敏感词并限制搜索结果。此外，该公司还与奇虎360在不正当竞争、商标侵权、违反Robots协议等领域发生过多次法律诉讼。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company headquartered in Beijing, specializing in Internet-related services and products, and artificial intelligence. As a major search engine and technology giant in China, it was once Google's main competitor. Its search engine once designated specific terms (such as 'Wen Yunsong') as sensitive and restricted search results. Additionally, the company has been involved in multiple legal disputes with Qihoo 360 regarding unfair competition, trademark infringement, and violation of the Robots Exclusion Standard.

en: Federal government of the United States
Government of the United States of America

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家政府，由美国宪法建立并负责管辖美国。作为中央政府，其对台政策以《台湾关系法》、《中美三个联合公报》和《六项保证》等文件为基础，实行“一中政策”。
description.en: The national government of the United States, established by the U.S. Constitution, governs the country. As the central government, its Taiwan policy is based on documents such as the Taiwan Relations Act, the Three Joint Communiqués, and the Six Assurances, implementing a 'One China Policy'.

description.zh-cn: 雅虎公司是美国的一家互联网服务公司，曾是Google的竞争对手，也与其有过合作关系。其在中国的业务分支，曾于2004年由周鸿祎担任总裁。
description.en: Yahoo! Inc. is an American internet service company, a former competitor and partner of Google. Its Chinese business arm was led by Zhou Hongyi as president in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 由马云创立的中国跨国科技公司，专注于电子商务、零售、互联网和技术。该公司是无界传媒的投资方之一，并在事件后提出将无界传媒清盘。此外，它于2013年入股新浪微博，并与新浪有战略合作关系。同时，它还与香港理工大学联合成立了科研中心。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company founded by Jack Ma, specializing in e-commerce, retail, Internet, and technology. It was one of the investors in Wujie Media and proposed to liquidate the company after the incident. In addition, it invested in Sina Weibo in 2013 and has a strategic partnership with Sina. It has also established a joint research center with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国科技公司，是OpenAI的主要投资者之一。该公司曾与朱邦复合作开发中文视窗系统，但合作最终破裂。此外，它还与清华大学及华盛顿大学合作创建了全球创新学院。
description.en: An American multinational technology company, it is a major investor in OpenAI. The company once collaborated with Chu Bong-Foo on developing a Chinese Windows system, though the partnership eventually fell apart. Additionally, it co-founded the Global Innovation eXchange with Tsinghua University and the University of Washington.

location.zh-cn: 中国大陆、台湾海峡、中缅边境
location.en: Mainland China, Taiwan Strait, China–Burma border

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国爆发的规模最大、影响最深远的内战，主要由中国国民党与中国共产党之间展开，分为两个阶段，是中国现代史的重大转折点。
description.en: The largest and most influential civil war in 20th-century China, fought between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Communist Party of China (CPC), divided into two main phases, marking a major turning point in modern Chinese history.

location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿哥伦比亚特区国会山庄
location.en: United States Capitol, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一，为美国的下议院。其席位分配以各州人口数为基准，总数固定为435名投票议员。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress, serving as the lower house. Seats are apportioned among the states by population, with the total number of voting representatives fixed at 435.

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦司法机构的最高级别法院。
美国两大主要政党之一。罗斯福和约翰·F·肯尼迪都曾是其党员，并在夏威夷州具有传统政治优势。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States. Both Roosevelt and John F. Kennedy belonged to it, and it traditionally holds a political advantage in the state of Hawaii.

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland
the empire on which the sun never sets

description.zh-cn: 由英国统治的全球帝国，是历史上最大的帝国，在1921年达到巅峰。它在鸦片战争中作为主要西方列强，与清朝进行了两次战争，其中是发动第二次鸦片战争的主要国家之一。它也是新加坡（1824-1963年）、马来亚、砂拉越和北婆罗洲等地的宗主国。作为第二次世界大战的同盟国之一，汪精卫国民政府于1943年对其宣战。
description.en: A global empire ruled by the United Kingdom, and the largest empire in history, which reached its peak in 1921. It was the main Western power in the Opium Wars, fighting against the Qing dynasty in both conflicts, and was one of the main countries that initiated the Second Opium War. It also served as the sovereign state of Singapore (1824-1963), Malaya, Sarawak, and North Borneo. As one of the Allied powers in World War II, the Wang Jingwei regime declared war against it in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，以美国为首的西方阵营与以苏联为首的东方阵营（及其各自盟友）之间，围绕地缘政治展开的紧张对峙和政治、军事对抗，持续了近半个世纪。美国总统艾森豪威尔的任期是冷战的关键时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension and political and military confrontation lasting nearly half a century after World War II. It primarily occurred between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union and their respective allies. Eisenhower's presidency was a key period of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月11日，基地组织在美国本土发动了一系列自杀式恐怖袭击事件，导致了伊斯兰恐惧症的弥漫。
description.en: A series of four coordinated suicide terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda against the United States on September 11, 2001, which led to the spread of Islamophobia.

description.zh-cn: 美国第16任总统，在美国内战期间领导联邦取得胜利，并颁布《解放黑人奴隶宣言》。
description.en: The 16th President of the United States, who led the Union to victory in the American Civil War and issued the Emancipation Proclamation.

description.zh-cn: 美国于1861年至1865年发生的内战，是美国历史上规模最大、最惨烈的内战。交战双方为北方的联邦阵营与南方的邦联阵营，最终以联邦获胜、奴隶制度被废除告终。
description.en: The American Civil War, fought from 1861 to 1865, was the largest and most devastating civil war in U.S. history. It pitted the northern Union against the southern Confederacy, ultimately resulting in a Union victory and the abolition of slavery.

description.zh-cn: 美国牧师、社会运动家、民权运动领袖。

zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·乌里扬诺夫
弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯共产主义革命家、政治家、政治理论家和思想家，苏维埃俄国和苏联的主要缔造者和首任政府首脑，也是共产国际的创始人。其领导下的红军曾在克里米亚建立塔夫里苏维埃社会主义共和国。其思想影响了中国共产党早期的民族政策。其兄亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫因刺杀沙皇被处决。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, political theorist, and thinker. He was the main founder and first head of government of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union, and the founder of the Communist International. Under his leadership, the Red Army established the Taurida Soviet Socialist Republic in Crimea. His thought influenced the early ethnic policy of the Chinese Communist Party. His brother, Aleksandr Ulyanov, was executed for an assassination attempt on the Tsar.

zh-cn: 乌克兰苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 作为苏联的创始成员国之一，它自1954年起管辖克里米亚州，也是切尔诺贝利核电站的所在地。1991年苏联解体后，该国独立并更名为乌克兰。
description.en: A founding constituent republic of the Soviet Union, it administered the Crimean Oblast from 1954 onwards and was the location of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant. It became the independent state of Ukraine after the dissolution of the Soviet Union in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟解体，指苏联于1990年代初至1991年12月26日期间停止存在并分裂为多个主权国家的过程。最终在1991年12月26日，苏联最高苏维埃宣布苏联停止存在。此事件标志着冷战的结束，并导致列宁主义影响力下降。时任苏共总书记戈尔巴乔夫曾认为，切尔诺贝利事故是苏联解体的原因之一。
description.en: The dissolution of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics refers to the process from the early 1990s to December 26, 1991, when the Soviet Union ceased to exist and split into multiple sovereign states. On December 26, 1991, the Supreme Soviet formally announced the USSR's cessation. This event marked the end of the Cold War and led to a decline in the influence of Leninism. Then-General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev suggested that the Chernobyl disaster was one of the causes of the Soviet Union's collapse.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，勃列日涅夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
苏联政治家，安德罗波夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
英国政治家，曾任英国首相。她曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判；马尔康·芮夫金曾在其内阁中担任苏格兰事务大臣。
description.en: British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. She negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong; Malcolm Rifkind served as Secretary of State for Scotland in her cabinet.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

location.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人尼尔·海伍德于2011年11月13日在重庆南山丽景度假酒店被杀害。尸体于11月14日被发现。后经调查，此为他杀刑事案件，嫌疑人为薄谷开来及薄熙来家庭佣工张晓军（男性）。张晓军系薄家勤务人员，且是谷开来谋杀尼尔·海伍德的同案犯。此案随后进行了对谷开来、张晓军故意杀害尼尔·伍德的司法审判。
description.en: An orderly of the Bo family and an accomplice in Gu Kailai's murder of Neil Heywood.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的社会主义国家，由朝鲜劳动党实行一党专政。该国是朝鲜战争的主要参战方，其军队是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。1953年，该国授予曾泽生一级国旗勋章。近期，该国被指控向俄罗斯提供武器及派遣士兵参与战争。
description.en: A socialist state located in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia, where the Workers' Party of Korea exercises one-party rule. It was a main belligerent in the Korean War, and its army was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement. In 1953, it awarded Zeng Zesheng the First Class Order of the National Flag. Recently, it has been accused of supplying weapons and sending soldiers to participate in the war on Russia's side.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的共和制国家，通称韩国。朝鲜战争主要参战方之一，但因时任总统李承晚的反对，未签署《朝鲜停战协定》。李在明于2025年6月4日就任第21任总统。其多个政府部门、学校及应用商店已屏蔽或下架DeepSeek。
description.en: A republican country located in the southern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia, commonly known as South Korea. It was a main belligerent in the Korean War, but did not sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to the opposition of then-President Syngman Rhee. Lee Jae-myung was inaugurated as its 21st President on June 4, 2025. Several of its government departments, schools, and app stores have blocked or removed DeepSeek.

description.zh-cn: 根据联合国安理会决议成立，由美国领导的多国部队，在朝鲜战争中支援大韩民国并与中国人民志愿军作战。该司令部是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一，并在非军事区南部驻军。
description.en: A multinational military force established under a UN Security Council resolution and led by the United States, supporting South Korea and fighting against the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War. The command is a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement and garrisoned in the southern part of the DMZ.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。他曾因反对以三八线为界停战而拒绝在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
