description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly. He refused to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to his opposition to a ceasefire along the 38th parallel.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统。曾任罗斯福的最后一任副总统，在其逝世后接任总统。他批准对日本使用原子弹并接受其投降。朝鲜战争爆发后，他下令第七舰队进入台湾海峡，实行台湾海峡中立化政策。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States. He served as Roosevelt's final Vice President and succeeded him as President upon Roosevelt's death. He authorized the use of atomic bombs against Japan and accepted its surrender. After the outbreak of the Korean War, he ordered the Seventh Fleet into the Taiwan Strait to implement the Taiwan Strait Neutralization policy.

zh-cn: 德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将、军事家、政治家，亦是美国第34任总统。第二次世界大战期间，他担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。在总统任内，他批准了将赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的文稿披露给媒体的行动，并于1958年签署了阿拉斯加建州法令。
description.en: An American five-star general, military strategist, and statesman, who also served as the 34th President of the United States. During World War II, he was the Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe. As president, he approved the action to disclose the text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech to the media, and in 1958, he signed the Alaska Statehood Act.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方和《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一，并在非军事区北部驻军。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War, a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement, and garrisoned in the northern part of the DMZ.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的战区之一，以日本为首的轴心国和以美国为首的同盟国在太平洋及其周边地区进行的战争。其地理范围涵盖东亚、东南亚、太平洋、印度洋和大洋洲，是二战地理上规模最大的战场。战争期间，日本政府加强了对地方的管制，促成了《东京都制》的实施。第七舰队在此期间成立。
description.en: One of the theaters of World War II, fought in the Pacific and its surrounding areas between the Japan-led Axis powers and the US-led Allied powers. Its geographical scope included East Asia, Southeast Asia, the Pacific Ocean, the Indian Ocean, and Oceania, making it the largest theater of war geographically in WWII. During the war, the Japanese government increased its control over local autonomy, which contributed to the implementation of the Tokyo Metropolis System. The Seventh Fleet was also established during this period.

description.zh-cn: 由美、英、中三国（同盟国）于1945年发表的对日最后通牒，要求日本无条件投降，否则将面临“迅速且完全的毁灭”。这份公告详细规定了日本投降的条款。在后来的《中日联合声明》中，日本政府曾表示坚持遵循该公告第八条的立场。
description.en: An ultimatum (declaration) issued by the United States, United Kingdom, and China (Allied Powers) in 1945, demanding Japan's unconditional surrender under threat of 'prompt and utter destruction'. This declaration detailed the terms for Japan's surrender. Later, in the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué, the Japanese government affirmed its adherence to Article 8 of this declaration.

description.zh-cn: 中、美、英三国元首发表，要求日本归还窃取于中国的领土。
1971年3月，由林立果及其“联合舰队”成员策划撰写的武装政变计划草稿，旨在推翻毛泽东统治并暗杀毛泽东。该计划后被指控为林彪反党集团所为。
description.en: A draft armed coup plan, formulated by Lin Liguo and his 'United Fleet' members in March 1971, aimed at overthrowing and assassinating Mao Zedong. This plan was later alleged to have been masterminded by the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 负责中共中央领导人警卫工作的部队，代号为中共中央警卫团。
林彪的亲信之一，曾任解放军南京军区空军政委，是林立果“联合舰队”成员。
description.en: One of Lin Biao's confidants, he served as Political Commissar of the Nanjing Military Region Air Force of the People's Liberation Army and was a member of Lin Liguo's 'United Fleet'.

zh-cn: 江油未成年人欺凌事件

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市江油市

description.zh-cn: 一宗因未成年人欺凌案及后续警方处理引发大规模警民冲突的群体性事件。
中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省份。
description.en: A province in Southwest China.

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分，由中央军事委员会领导，负责国内安全保卫。在1998年洪灾期间，与解放军一同大量参与了抗洪抢险任务。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China, under the command of the Central Military Commission, responsible for internal security. Along with the People's Liberation Army, it was heavily involved in flood fighting and rescue missions during the 1998 floods.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2009年推出的微博客服务网站，是中国访问量最大的网站之一。该平台曾完全封锁与“温云松”相关的微博。
description.en: A microblogging service launched by Sina in 2009, it is one of the most visited websites in China. The platform once completely blocked posts related to 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师、美国天主教大学访问学者

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国武装力量
en: Armed Forces of the People's Republic of China
Military of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，包括中国人民解放军、中国人民武装警察部队和民兵。
戴笠的继任者，先后掌管军统局、保密局、情报局。
指台湾作家刘宜良在美国遭枪杀的政治谋杀事件，因其笔名为“江南”而得名。此案牵涉到台湾的情报机构，并对蒋氏家族的声誉造成重创。
description.en: Refers to the political assassination of Taiwanese writer Henry Liu in the United States. The case implicated Taiwan's intelligence agencies and severely damaged the reputation of the Chiang family.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首列表
中华人民共和国国家元首
en: List of state representatives of the People's Republic of China
Head of state of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国少年儿童的群众组织，中国共产党领导下的儿童组织。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese children, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功的创始人、精神领袖。其出生日期存在争议：中国政府称其出生于1952年7月7日，而李洪志本人则称实际生日为1951年5月13日，系文革期间错误登记。他于1992年5月首次在中国公开传授法轮功。1998年获得美国永久居民身份，并在1999年法轮功遭中国政府镇压后，定居美国。
description.en: Founder and spiritual leader of Falun Gong. His birth date is disputed: the Chinese government claims he was born on July 7, 1952, while Li Hongzhi himself states his actual birthday is May 13, 1951, due to a registration error during the Cultural Revolution. He first publicly taught Falun Gong in China in May 1992. He obtained permanent residency in the United States in 1998, and after Falun Gong was suppressed by the Chinese government in 1999, he settled in the U.S.

description.zh-cn: 2001年1月23日，中国官方媒体报道有五人在天安门广场自焚，并称他们是法轮功学员。该事件成为中国政府宣传战的转折点，用来在国内外将法轮功描绘成危险的“邪教”，并为镇压提供理由。法轮功方面则指控该事件为政府导演的骗局。
description.en: On January 23, 2001, Chinese state media reported that five people self-immolated on Tiananmen Square, claiming they were Falun Gong practitioners. The incident became a turning point in the Chinese government's propaganda war, used to portray Falun Gong domestically and internationally as a dangerous 'cult' and to justify the suppression. Falun Gong sources have alleged the incident was a staged hoax by the government.

description.zh-cn: 由法轮功学员创办的媒体，是大纪元传媒集团的子公司。因发表《九评共产党》社论而知名，并引发了退党运动。在西方被广泛认为是政治上极右翼的媒体实体。
description.en: A media outlet founded by Falun Gong practitioners, a subsidiary of the Epoch Media Group. It is known for publishing the editorial series 'Nine Commentaries on the Communist Party' and initiating the Tuidang movement. It is widely considered a far-right political media entity in the West.

description.zh-cn: 美国的立法机构，由参议院和众议院组成。曾通过多项决议，要求中国政府停止镇压法轮功，并谴责强摘法轮功学员器官的行为。其议员还曾提出将中国驻华盛顿大使馆外的街道改名为“李文亮广场”。
description.en: The legislature of the United States, composed of the Senate and the House of Representatives. It has passed multiple resolutions calling on the Chinese government to stop the persecution of Falun Gong and condemning the practice of organ harvesting from Falun Gong practitioners. Its members also proposed renaming the street outside the Chinese embassy in Washington to 'Li Wenliang Plaza'.

description.zh-cn: 神韵艺术团是一家2006年在美国纽约成立的表演艺术团体，由海外法轮功学员创办。公司以中国古典舞和传统音乐为特色，旨在复兴中华传统文化。其演出内容常包含对法轮功在中国受迫害的描绘。李洪志担任其艺术总监。
description.en: Shen Yun Performing Arts is a performing arts company established in New York, USA, in 2006, founded by overseas Falun Gong practitioners. The company specializes in classical Chinese dance and traditional music, aiming to revive traditional Chinese culture. Its performances often include depictions of the persecution of Falun Gong in China. Li Hongzhi serves as its Artistic Director.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师
美国政治家，曾任中央情报局局长和国务卿。在其2020年题为《共产中国与自由世界的未来》的演讲中提及魏京生，并对维基解密持敌对态度。2021年，他与时任驻美代表的萧美琴在双橡园会晤。他曾对香港民主派初选大搜捕表示愤慨，并促请当局释放被捕人士。
description.en: An American politician who served as Director of the Central Intelligence Agency and Secretary of State. In his 2020 speech titled 'Communist China and the Free World's Future,' he mentioned Wei Jingsheng and held a hostile stance against WikiLeaks. In 2021, he met with then-Representative Hsiao Bi-khim at Twin Oaks. As Secretary of State, he also expressed outrage at the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests and urged the authorities to release the arrested individuals.

description.zh-cn: 日本第126代天皇，年号为“令和”。为上皇明仁与上皇后美智子的长子，也是石破茂担任内阁总理大臣期间的国家元首。
description.en: The 126th Emperor of Japan, his reign name is 'Reiwa'. He is the eldest son of Emperor Emeritus Akihito and Empress Emerita Michiko, and the head of state during Shigeru Ishiba's tenure as Prime Minister.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日本东京都千代田区皇居宫内厅医院
birth_place.en: Imperial Household Agency Hospital, Tokyo Imperial Palace, Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任第102-103任内阁总理大臣及自由民主党总裁，历任防卫大臣、农林水产大臣、自由民主党干事长等要职。现任日本内阁总理大臣。其领导的内阁在2025年3月表示《中日联合声明》不具有法律约束力。
description.en: Japanese politician who served as the 102nd and 103rd Prime Minister of Japan and President of the Liberal Democratic Party, holding key posts including Minister of Defense, Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries, and LDP Secretary-General. He is the current Prime Minister of Japan, and his cabinet stated in March 2025 that the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué is not legally binding.

description.zh-cn: 日本国会的下议院。安倍晋三自1993年起连续十次当选众议院议员，直至2022年任内去世。
description.en: The lower house of the National Diet of Japan. Shinzo Abe was elected to the House of Representatives for ten consecutive terms from 1993 until his death in office in 2022.

zh-cn: 神日本磐余彦火火出见天皇

description.zh-cn: 传说中日本的初代天皇
镰仓幕府首任征夷大将军
日本战国时代末期、安土桃山时代的武将、战国大名，江户幕府第一代征夷大将军。
description.en: A warlord and daimyō of the late Sengoku and Azuchi-Momoyama periods of Japan, and the first shōgun of the Edo shogunate.

description.zh-cn: 由德川家康建立的日本最后一个幕府，也是日本历史上最后一个武家政权和封建军事政府。其统治中心位于江户，在戊辰战争后被推翻。著名思想家福泽谕吉曾受雇于幕府从事翻译工作，并随其使节团出访欧美。
description.en: Founded by Tokugawa Ieyasu, it was the last shogunate of Japan, and also the last samurai government and feudal military government in Japanese history. Its center of power was located in Edo, and it was overthrown after the Boshin War. The renowned thinker Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the shogunate as a translator and accompanied its missions to Europe and America.

description.zh-cn: 指日本在19世纪后期、幕末至明治时代初期间推行的一系列政治、经济和社会近代化改革运动。旨在使日本现代化，摆脱并终结封建制度，建立现代国家。福泽谕吉是该运动重要的思想推动者之一。维新后武士的失业问题亦成为征韩论的背景之一。
description.en: A series of political, economic, and social modernization reforms implemented in Japan in the late 19th century, from the end of the Edo period to the beginning of the Meiji period. These reforms aimed at modernizing the country, abolishing its feudal system, and establishing a modern state. Fukuzawa Yukichi was a key intellectual promoter of this movement, and the resulting unemployment of the samurai class was one of the background factors for the Seikanron.

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛、辽东半岛、山东、威海、黄海、澎湖

description.zh-cn: 1894年至1895年间清朝与大日本帝国之间因朝鲜问题爆发的一场大规模战争，以清朝惨败告终。此战中，北洋水师全军覆没。中国的惨败极大地刺激了知识分子，促使他们更积极地向西方学习。福泽谕吉曾将其描述为“文野之战”，日本的战争赔款还用于建立京都帝国大学。
description.en: A major war between the Qing dynasty of China and the Empire of Japan, primarily over the issue of Korea, which ended in a decisive defeat for the Qing. The Beiyang Fleet was annihilated during this war. China's defeat was a major catalyst for Chinese intellectuals to more actively learn from the West. Fukuzawa Yukichi described it as a 'war between civilization and barbarism', and the war indemnity was used as one of the funding sources for the establishment of Kyoto Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战时的军事同盟，由德国、意大利、日本等国组成。
1941年12月7日，大日本帝国海军对美国夏威夷领地珍珠港海军基地发动突袭，标志着太平洋战争爆发，美国由此加入第二次世界大战，是二战的重要转折点。
description.en: On December 7, 1941, the Imperial Japanese Navy launched a surprise attack on the U.S. naval base at Pearl Harbor in the Territory of Hawaii. This marked the outbreak of the Pacific War, leading the United States to join World War II, and was a significant turning point in the war.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三是日本自由民主党籍政治人物，曾任第90、96、97、98任内阁总理大臣，是日本宪政史上在任时间最长的首相。他以推行“安倍经济学”、强化美日同盟、主导《跨太平洋伙伴全面进步协定》而闻名。曾于2012年自民党总裁选举中击败石破茂，并任命其为自民党干事长。他也是南加州大学校友。2022年7月8日，他在奈良市进行选举演说时遇刺身亡。
description.en: Shinzo Abe was a Japanese politician of the Liberal Democratic Party, who served as the 90th, 96th, 97th, and 98th Prime Minister of Japan, becoming the longest-serving prime minister in Japanese constitutional history. He was known for his 'Abenomics' economic policies, strengthening the U.S.-Japan alliance, and leading the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership. He defeated Shigeru Ishiba in the 2012 LDP presidential election and later appointed him as LDP Secretary-General. An alumnus of the University of Southern California, he was assassinated on July 8, 2022, while delivering a campaign speech in Nara.

description.zh-cn: 日本国立研究型综合大学
位于日本京都府京都市的国立综合性研究型大学，前身为1897年成立的日本第二所旧制帝国大学——京都帝国大学。作为日本最高学府之一，京都大学以‘自由的学风’著称，是京都学派的发祥地，被誉为‘科学家的摇篮’。汤川秀树、山中伸弥等著名学者曾在此学习和工作。同时，该校也是石井四郎的母校，其医学部曾向731部队派遣多名医学专家，深度参与了非人道研究。
description.en: A national comprehensive research university located in Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan. Its predecessor was Kyoto Imperial University, established in 1897 as the second Imperial University in Japan. As one of Japan's top academic institutions, it is known for its 'spirit of freedom', is the birthplace of the Kyoto School, and is regarded as a 'cradle of scientists'. Notable scholars like Hideki Yukawa and Shinya Yamanaka studied and worked here. Additionally, the university is the alma mater of Shirō Ishii, and its medical faculty dispatched numerous experts to Unit 731, becoming deeply involved in inhumane research.

description.zh-cn: 日本作家，芥川奖得主，诺贝尔文学奖候选人

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设机构，代表国家履行出资人职责，监管中央所属企业的国有资产，包括对中国移动通信集团有限公司的出资人职责。
description.en: A special commission of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, it represents the state in performing investor responsibilities and supervising state-owned assets of centrally-owned enterprises, including its investor responsibilities for China Mobile Communications Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信集团有限公司由其部分资产分拆组建，是中国电信运营商，曾与电讯盈科成立合资公司。
description.en: A Chinese telecommunications operator that formed a joint venture with PCCW.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology
Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街13号
location.en: 13 West Chang'an Avenue, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管工业和信息产业的组成部门，同时也是中国电信业的监管机构。它于2008年3月根据第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过的国务院机构改革方案，在原信息产业部、国防科学技术工业委员会等部门的基础上组建。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for industry and information technology, also serving as the regulatory body for China's telecommunications industry. It was established in March 2008 based on the institutional reform plan of the State Council passed by the first session of the 11th National People's Congress, consolidating the former Ministry of Information Industry, the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and other departments.

description.zh-cn: 奇虎360于2011年3月在此上市，并于2016年7月完成私有化后摘牌。
description.en: Qihoo 360 was listed here in March 2011 and delisted in July 2016 after completing its privatization.

zh-cn: 科大讯飞股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家在深圳证券交易所上市的中国公司，主营业务范围包括语音支撑软件、行业应用产品/系统、信息工程和运维服务。
description.en: A Chinese company listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange, whose main business scope includes voice support software, industry application products/systems, information engineering, and operation and maintenance services.

description.zh-cn: 位于东欧的国家。曾是顿巴斯战争的主要参战方之一，并自2022年2月24日起遭受俄罗斯的全面入侵。根据国际法，对克里米亚半岛拥有主权。是欧盟候选国，同时也是北约伙伴国并寻求加入北约。
description.en: A country located in Eastern Europe. It was one of the main combatants in the War in Donbas, and has been subjected to a full-scale invasion by Russia since February 24, 2022. Under international law, it holds de jure sovereignty over the Crimean Peninsula. It is an EU candidate, a NATO partner, and is seeking to join NATO.

zh-cn: 德米特里·阿纳托利耶维奇·梅德韦杰夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总统、前俄罗斯总理。于2010年与巴沙尔·阿萨德会面。
description.en: Russian politician, former President of Russia and former Prime Minister of Russia. Met with Bashar al-Assad in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 由东斯拉夫人建立的第一个东斯拉夫国家

俄罗斯帝国，存在于1721年至1917年间，是俄罗斯历史上的一个帝国。它曾在北美拥有殖民地（俄属北美），并于1867年将阿拉斯加出售给美国。帝国曾于1783年吞并克里米亚汗国，并参与克里米亚战争及日俄战争（战败）。在第二次鸦片战争中，通过《北京条约》攫取中国北方大片领土。它也参与瓜分波兰立陶宛联邦并长期统治立陶宛，并曾与清朝就伊犁问题进行交涉。林则徐曾警惕其威胁。巴枯宁出生时，作为当时的执政政权，曾没收其财产并对其进行长期监禁和流放。同时，它也是协约国的主要成员国之一，但于1917年退出战争。
description.en: The Russian Empire, an empire in Russian history, existed from 1721 to 1917. It held colonies in North America (Russian America) and sold Alaska to the United States in 1867. The empire annexed the Crimean Khanate in 1783, participated in the Crimean War and the Russo-Japanese War (where it was defeated). During the Second Opium War, it acquired vast territories in northern China through the Convention of Peking. It also participated in the partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth and ruled over Lithuania for a long period. It also negotiated with the Qing Dynasty over the Ili issue. Lin Zexu was wary of its growing threat. As the ruling power during Bakunin's birth, the imperial authorities confiscated his property and subjected him to long-term imprisonment and exile due to his revolutionary activities. It was also one of the main member states of the Entente Powers, but withdrew from the war in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国沙皇，俄罗斯帝国皇帝

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 1904年至1905年间大日本帝国与俄罗斯帝国为争夺中国东北地区和朝鲜的控制权而爆发的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Empire of Japan and the Russian Empire from 1904 to 1905 over rival imperial ambitions in Manchuria and Korea.

location.zh-cn: 中国东北地区、朝鲜、黄海、日本海
location.en: Northeast China, Korea, Yellow Sea, Sea of Japan

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长（龚正的前任）和中共上海市委副书记。现任中华人民共和国最高人民检察院党组书记、检察长。他曾公开表态，强调对符合条件的未成年人严重犯罪要依法追究刑事责任。
description.en: Chinese politician. He previously served as Mayor of Shanghai (Gong Zheng's predecessor) and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. Currently, he is the Party Secretary and Prosecutor General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China. He has publicly stated that minors who commit serious crimes and meet the criteria should be held criminally responsible according to the law.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员、中央军事委员会办公厅原主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Ground Force, who served as Political Commissar of the PLA National Defense University and former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任司法部部长（傅政华的继任），后任江西省政协主席。2024年因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Minister of Justice (succeeding Fu Zhenghua) and later as Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial CPPCC. He was investigated in 2024 for severe disciplinary violations.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯的长子，曾积极推动其父称帝。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's eldest son, who actively encouraged his father to become emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治家，袁世凯的盟友。在中华民国北洋政府时期，曾任国务卿，并于1918年至1922年间担任中华民国大总统。
description.en: A politician in the late Qing and early Republic of China, an ally of Yuan Shikai. During the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, he served as Secretary of State and later as President of the Republic of China from 1918 to 1922.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣、政治家和军事家，满洲正白旗人。他是保守派代表，慈禧太后的心腹。从袁世凯处获悉维新派计划后，协助慈禧发动戊戌政变。他是载沣的岳父，也是溥仪的外祖父。
description.en: A prominent minister, statesman, and military leader in the late Qing dynasty, a Manchu of the Plain White Banner. He was a powerful conservative and a confidant of Empress Dowager Cixi. After learning of the reformists' plans from Yuan Shikai, he assisted Cixi in launching the Wuxu Coup. He was the father-in-law of Zaifeng and the maternal grandfather of Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 晚清维新派领袖、政治家和思想家，梁启超的老师。他是戊戌变法的主要策划者和领导者之一。变法失败后流亡海外，组织保皇会，主张君主立宪。他还曾试图将儒家改造为国教（孔教）。此外，他曾负责为自立军起义募集资金，但最终未能汇出款项，导致起义计划受挫。
description.en: Leader of the late Qing reformists, a politician and thinker, and Liang Qichao's teacher. He was a key planner and leader of the Hundred Days' Reform. After the reform failed, he lived in exile, organized the Baohuang Hui (Protect the Emperor Society), and advocated for a constitutional monarchy. He also attempted to establish Confucianism as the state religion (the Confucian Church). Additionally, he was responsible for fundraising for the Self-Support Army Uprising, but his ultimate failure to remit the funds thwarted the uprising plan.

description.zh-cn: 清末维新派政治家、思想家，戊戌变法核心人物之一，亦是戊戌六君子之一。其思想深远，影响了杨昌济等人。他曾于南京记录下当地父老对湘军暴行的“犹深愤恨”的情形。
description.en: A reformist politician and thinker of the late Qing Dynasty, a key figure in the Hundred Days' Reform, and one of the 'Six Gentlemen of the Wuxu Reform'. His ideas profoundly influenced figures like Yang Changji. He once visited Nanjing and recorded local elders' 'deep hatred' for the atrocities committed by the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家。曾任军政府鄂军都督、大元帅，以及中华民国临时副总统、第一任副总统；后继任第二、三任大总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Vice President and the second and third President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事人物，北洋军阀皖系首领。曾是袁世凯手下重要将领，历任参谋总长、国务总理。在赵秉钧辞职后曾代理国务总理。甲子政变后，被张作霖和冯玉祥推举为中华民国临时执政。他在北洋政府时期发挥重要作用，因在清帝退位、抵制洪宪帝制和讨伐张勋复辟中的贡献，被誉为“三造共和”。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military figure, leader of the Anhui clique. He was an important general under Yuan Shikai, serving as Chief of the General Staff and Premier. He also served as acting Premier after Zhao Bingjun's resignation. After the Beijing Coup, he was installed as the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China by Zhang Zuolin and Feng Yuxiang. He played a significant role during the Beiyang Government period, and is known for his contributions in forcing the Qing emperor's abdication, resisting the Hongxian Monarchy, and suppressing the Manchu Restoration, earning him the moniker 'the three-time creator of the Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治活动家，筹安会发起人，积极推动袁世凯称帝。
description.en: A Chinese politician active in the late Qing and early Republican periods, founder of the Chou'anhui, who actively promoted Yuan Shikai's monarchical ambitions.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的皇后，宣统帝（溥仪）的嗣母。她是清朝最后一位实际掌权者，宣统年间与载沣共同作为最高统治者，拥有重大事件的最终决定权。在宣统帝逊位时垂帘听政，并代表其颁布退位诏书。
description.en: The empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor and adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor. She was the last de facto ruler of the Qing dynasty. During the Xuantong era, she served as co-supreme ruler with Zaifeng, holding the final decision-making power on major events. She also issued the abdication edict on behalf of the emperor.

zh-cn: 中国证券监督管理委员会

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区金融大街19号富凯大厦A座

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，作为金融监管机构，负责证券、期货市场的监督管理。
description.en: A direct institution under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the supervision and management of the securities and futures markets.

description.zh-cn: 国际功夫巨星、动作演员、佛教徒、慈善家、企业家。他与马云联合创办太极禅苑，并共同出演电影《功守道》。
description.en: International kung fu star, action actor, Buddhist, philanthropist, and entrepreneur. He co-founded Taijizen with Jack Ma and co-starred with him in the film 'Gong Shou Dao'.

description.zh-cn: 一家中国电子商务公司，与新浪于2017年签署“京浪计划”战略合作，同时也是阿里巴巴集团在中国电子商务领域的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: A Chinese e-commerce company that signed the 'Jing-Lang Plan' strategic cooperation with Sina in 2017, and is also one of Alibaba Group's main competitors in the Chinese e-commerce sector.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省省会，历史悠久。曾是南宋都城，民族英雄岳飞遇害及安葬于此。唐代诗人白居易曾任刺史，政绩卓著，修筑西湖堤防，疏浚六井。同时，这里也是现代商业巨头马云的出生地，以及阿里巴巴集团的总部所在地。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, China, with a rich history. It once served as the capital of the Southern Song Dynasty and is the site where national hero Yue Fei was martyred and buried. During the Tang Dynasty, the poet Bai Juyi served as its prefect, achieving remarkable success in constructing the West Lake embankment and dredging the Six Wells. Furthermore, it is also the birthplace of modern business magnate Jack Ma and the headquarters of Alibaba Group.

location.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学，成立于1861年，以其在物理科学和工程学的教育和研究而闻名。这里曾是钱学森获得理学硕士学位并任教的地方，宋彬彬也于1989年在此获得地球化学博士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA, founded in 1861, renowned for its education and research in the physical sciences and engineering. Qian Xuesen received his Master of Science degree here and later taught, and Song Binbin obtained her PhD in geochemistry here in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国声乐家，钱学森的夫人。
description.en: Chinese vocalist, wife of Qian Xuesen.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名武侠小说作家、《明报》创办人，与倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他也是倪匡的好友，曾鼓励倪匡创作《卫斯理系列》。在其封笔后，还曾亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿《陆小凤系列》。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong wuxia novelist and founder of Ming Pao. He is known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong' along with Ni Kuang, James Wong and Chua Lam. He was also a close friend of Ni Kuang and encouraged him to create the 'Wisely Series'. After he stopped writing novels, he personally invited Gu Long to write the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series' for his newspaper, Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅的伴侣，鲁迅的学生。
鲁迅与许广平之子。
位于日本仙台的一所国立大学
中国近代思想家、学者，鲁迅的老师。
中国现代作家、学者、翻译家、语言学家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, scholar, translator, and linguist.

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代女作家，曾与萧军同居并共同创作。
description.en: A modern Chinese female writer, who once lived with Xiao Jun and co-authored works.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的直辖市行政建制，特指当时的上海市。这里是四一二事件的主要发生地，也是著名作家倪匡的出生地。
description.en: The administrative establishment of Shanghai City, a direct-administered municipality during the Republic of China mainland period. It was the primary location of the April 12th Incident and also the birthplace of the renowned writer Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家、文学评论家、文化活动家和社会活动家，曾任中国作家协会主席（巴金的前任）。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, literary critic, cultural and social activist, who served as Ba Jin's predecessor as the Chairman of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 企业家，曾任新浪网CEO、董事长。胡海青的丈夫。
description.en: Entrepreneur, former CEO and chairman of Sina.com. Husband of Hu Haiqing.

zh-cn: 四通利方信息技术有限公司
新浪集团控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 四通利方公司（SRSNet）于1993年由四通集团公司、王志东和严援朝在北京中关村共同创办。1998年，该公司与华渊资讯合并，共同组建新浪（Sina）。新浪作为一家服务中国大陆及全球华人社群的中文网络内容提供商，与腾讯、搜狐和网易并称中国四大门户网站之一。2007年，新浪与谷歌达成战略合作关系。
description.en: SRSNet, a Chinese software company, was co-founded in Zhongguancun, Beijing, in 1993 by Stone Group, Wang Zhidong, and Yan Yuanchao. In 1998, it merged with Sinanet to form Sina. Sina became a Chinese online media company serving China and the global Chinese communities, recognized as one of the four major portal websites in China, alongside Tencent, Sohu, and NetEase. In 2007, Sina formed a strategic partnership with Google.

zh-cn: 胡锦涛中共二十大离场事件
胡锦涛二十大离场事件
en: Hu Jintao incident at the 20th CCP National Congress
Hu Jintao's departure from the 20th CCP National Congress

description.zh-cn: 中共二十大闭幕会上，前中共中央总书记胡锦涛被工作人员从主席台带离会场。此事件被外界广泛解读为团派失势的象征性时刻。
description.en: The incident where former CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao was escorted off the rostrum by staff during the closing session of the 20th CPC National Congress. It was widely interpreted as a symbolic moment of the Tuanpai's loss of power.

description.zh-cn: 明朝是中国历史上继元朝之后的大一统王朝，也是最后一个由汉族统治的帝制王朝。由朱元璋建立，马皇后为其首位皇后。其间改行中书省为承宣布政使司。明成祖时期，北京故宫开始建造并作为其后的主要皇宫。嘉靖大地震也发生于该朝代统治期间。李成梁曾为其效力。该王朝最终于1644年被李自成所灭。
description.en: The Ming Dynasty was a unified imperial dynasty in Chinese history, following the Yuan Dynasty, and the last imperial dynasty ruled by Han Chinese. Founded by Zhu Yuanzhang, with Empress Ma as its first empress, it reformed the Central Secretariat into the Provincial Administration Commission. During the reign of the Yongle Emperor, the Forbidden City in Beijing was built and became the main imperial palace. The Jiajing Great Earthquake also occurred during its rule. Li Chengliang once served this regime. The dynasty was eventually overthrown by Li Zicheng in 1644.

description.zh-cn: 由忽必烈建立的中国历史上由蒙古族建立的大一统王朝，追尊蒙哥为宪宗桓肃皇帝。其设立行中书省作为一级地方行政区划，官场上使用空印文书的习惯做法被明朝沿用，并最终引发了空印案。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, and established by the Mongols, which posthumously honored Möngke as Emperor Xianzong Huansu. The bureaucratic practice of using empty-sealed documents, inherited from the Yuan, led to the Empty Seal Case in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的原配妻子和皇后，郭子兴的养女，朱高煦之祖母。她以贤惠、仁慈、节俭著称，在朱元璋早年困难时期给予支持，成为皇后後仍保持简朴。她常劝谏朱元璋，挽救多位大臣性命，同时不干预朝政，限制外戚势力。她深受后人敬仰，死后朱元璋誓言不再立后。
description.en: The primary consort and empress of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor. She was the adoptive daughter of Guo Zixing and grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu. Renowned for her kindness, wisdom, and frugality, she supported Zhu Yuanzhang during his early difficult years and maintained a simple lifestyle even after becoming empress. She often advised the emperor, saving the lives of several ministers. She refrained from interfering in court politics and limiting the power of imperial relatives, earning deep respect from later generations. After her death, the Hongwu Emperor vowed never to create another empress.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的群雄之一，汉政权建立者
明朝开国名将。体貌奇伟，勇力绝伦，猿臂善射，统军有方。官至中书平章军国重事，兼太子少保。曾封郑国公、鄂国公。北伐中原时暴卒军中，追封开平王，谥号忠武。
description.en: Founding general of the Ming Dynasty. Known for his exceptional bravery and military skill. He held high positions such as Grand Marshal and Junior Guardian of the Crown Prince, and was enfeoffed as the Duke of E. He died suddenly during the northern expedition against the Yuan and was posthumously created Prince of Kaiping with the posthumous name Zhongwu.

birth_place.zh-cn: 河南江北等处行中书省安丰路濠州怀远县
birth_place.en: Huaiyuan County, Haozhou, Anfeng Circuit, Henan Jiangbei Xingsheng

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣，韩国公，曾任左丞相。后在胡惟庸案中受牵连被杀。
description.en: A founding father of the Ming dynasty, Duke of Han, and former Left Chancellor. He was later implicated and executed in the Hu Weiyong case.

description.zh-cn: 胡惟庸，明朝初年的宰相，同时也是明朝最后一任中书省丞相。他是胡惟庸案的核心人物，最终被朱元璋以谋反罪名诛杀。
description.en: Hu Weiyong was a chancellor in the early Ming dynasty and the last Chancellor of the Central Secretariat. He was the central figure in the Case of Hu Weiyong and was eventually executed by the Hongwu Emperor on charges of treason.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋嫡长子，洪武元年被立为皇太子，是明朝开国皇太子。他也是建文帝朱允炆之父。正史记载其为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The eldest son and heir apparent of Emperor Taizu, Zhu Yuanzhang, and the first crown prince of the Ming dynasty, designated in the first year of the Hongwu era. He was also the father of Emperor Jianwen, Zhu Yunwen. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝明惠宗朱允炆，朱元璋之孙，年号“建文”。在位期间，于洪武三十一年（1398年）追尊祖母马皇后。后在靖难之役中被其叔朱棣击败。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty, Ming Huizong Zhu Yunwen, a grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang, reigned under the era name 'Jianwen'. During his reign, he honored his grandmother Empress Ma with a posthumous title in the 31st year of the Hongwu era (1398). He was later defeated by his uncle Zhu Di in the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第四子，明朝第三位皇帝，明成祖。原为燕王，通过靖难之役从其侄建文帝手中夺取皇位，年号永乐。他下令编纂《永乐大典》，并恢复加强了锦衣卫的权力。关于其生母，正史记载为马皇后，但有史料称其生母为䂵妃。他是朱高煦之父。
description.en: The fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor and the third Emperor of the Ming Dynasty, known as the Yongle Emperor. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign. He commissioned the compilation of the Yongle Encyclopedia and restored and strengthened the power of the Jinyiwei. His parentage is disputed; while official histories record Empress Ma as his mother, some historical sources claim he was born to Consort Gong. He was the father of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖，小明王

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室
中央外事工作领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission
Foreign Affairs Office of the State Council
Office of the Central Leading Group for National Security Affairs

description.zh-cn: 该机构是中国共产党中央委员会负责统筹外交政策、外事管理和维护海洋权益工作的办事机构，也是中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。其历史可追溯至中华人民共和国国务院下设的外事机构，该机构曾两度设立（1958-1970年；1988-1998年），并于1998年改组为中央外事办公室。此中央外事办公室在2000年9月至2014年期间曾兼任中央国家安全工作领导小组的办事机构，后于2014年更名为中央国家安全委员会办公室。现机构于2018年由中央外事办公室改组而来。
description.en: This body is the administrative office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for coordinating foreign policy, foreign affairs management, and safeguarding maritime rights and interests, and also serves as the office for the Central Foreign Affairs Commission. Its history can be traced back to a foreign affairs body under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was established twice (1958-1970; 1988-1998) and reorganized into the Central Foreign Affairs Office in 1998. This Central Foreign Affairs Office also functioned as the working body of the Central National Security Leading Group from September 2000 to 2014, and was later renamed the Office of the Central National Security Commission in 2014. The current entity was reorganized from the Central Foreign Affairs Office in 2018.

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室
国务院台湾事务办公室
en: Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责处理台湾事务的政府机构。与中共中央台湾工作办公室为“一个机构两块牌子”。曾点名抨击并制裁萧美琴。
description.en: An administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan-related affairs. It shares the same office with the Taiwan Work Office of the CCP Central Committee. The agency has publicly criticized and sanctioned Hsiao Bi-khim.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国前外交官。
该国位于西亚阿拉伯半岛，是一个君主专制国家，政教合一，以石油经济为支柱。其建立由瓦哈比派与绍德家族的联盟促成，并定瓦哈比派为国教。该国曾被邀请加入金砖国家，后暂缓申请。在阿拉伯之春后的地区冲突中扮演重要角色，如军事干预也门，并曾被指控支持阿米尼示威。
description.en: This monarchical absolute state, located on the Arabian Peninsula in Western Asia, integrates religion and politics and relies on an oil-based economy. Its establishment was facilitated by the alliance between the Wahhabi movement and the House of Saud, which it adopted as its state religion. The country was invited to join BRICS but later postponed its application. It has played a significant role in regional conflicts following the Arab Spring, such as its military intervention in Yemen, and was previously accused of supporting the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的政教合一伊斯兰共和国，2024年加入金砖国家。该国被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹，同时也是马赫萨·阿米尼示威的发生地。
description.en: A theocratic Islamic republic in Western Asia that joined BRICS in 2024. The country is accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia and was also the site of the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟外交与安全政策高级代表。
文化大革命期间因反对个人崇拜和“四人帮”而被处决的政治人物。
description.en: A political figure executed during the Cultural Revolution for opposing the personality cult and the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期新疆省的统治者，下令处决了毛泽民、陈潭秋、林基路等人。
description.en: Ruler of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era, who ordered the execution of Mao Zemin, Chen Tanqiu, Lin Jilu, and others.

description.zh-cn: 令计划的妻子。
令狐路线的弟弟，曾将其在汇金立方的股份转给外甥女（令狐路线之女）王玲。
description.en: Younger brother of Linghu Luxian, who transferred his shares in Huijin Lifang to his niece Wang Ling (daughter of Linghu Luxian).

description.zh-cn: 神秘政商联盟组织
前中国中央电视台记者、主播，后因涉郭振玺案被判刑六年，现为投资人。
description.en: Former China Central Television reporter and anchor, later sentenced to six years in prison for his involvement in the Guo Zhenxi case, now an investor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第9位皇帝，也是在位时间最长者，在位44年。他开创了开元盛世，但后期因怠政和用人不当，导致安史之乱爆发，并在战乱中退位为太上皇，使唐朝由盛转衰。他是唐肃宗之父，曾征召李白入京任翰林供奉。于天宝初年下诏追封庄周为“南华真人”，并将其著作《庄子》称为《南华经》。他与杨贵妃的爱情故事是《长恨歌》的主题。此外，他在高适逃难途中对其进行了提拔。
description.en: The 9th and longest-reigning emperor of the Tang Dynasty, ruling for 44 years. He initiated the prosperous Kaiyuan Era, but his later negligence and poor appointments led to the An-Shi Rebellion, during which he abdicated and became Taishang Huang, marking the Tang Dynasty's decline from its peak. He was the father of Emperor Suzong, once summoned Li Bai to the capital to serve as Hanlin academician. In the early Tianbao era, he issued an edict to posthumously honor Zhuang Zhou as 'Nanhua Zhenren' and named his work 'Zhuangzi' as the 'Nanhua Jing'. His love story with Yang Guifei is the theme of the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'. He also promoted Gao Shi while fleeing from the rebels.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，李白的好友与敬慕对象。
唐朝著名宦官，本名冯元一。他深得唐玄宗宠信，官至骠骑大将军，封齐国公。一生对玄宗忠心耿耿。据说曾因被李白冒犯而排挤他。然而，在李辅国掌权后，他被构陷并流放。
description.en: A renowned eunuch during the Tang dynasty, whose original name was Feng Yuanyi. He was deeply trusted by Emperor Xuanzong, rose to the rank of Grand General of Cavalry, and was enfeoffed as Duke of Qi. Throughout his life, he remained loyal to Emperor Xuanzong. It is said that he once ostracized Li Bai for offending him. However, after Li Fuguo came to power, he was framed and exiled.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的贵妃，深受宠爱，是中国古代四大美女之一，也是文学作品《长恨歌》的主角。安史之乱爆发后，她在马嵬驿兵变中被玄宗赐死。有传闻称她曾因高力士中伤而排斥李白。
description.en: A beloved consort of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang, she was one of the Four Beauties of ancient China and a central figure in the literary work 'Song of Everlasting Regret'. After the outbreak of the An-Shi Rebellion, she was forced to commit suicide by Emperor Xuanzong during the Mawei Mutiny. Rumors suggest she rejected Li Bai due to the slanders of Gao Lishi.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名将，在平定安史之乱中做出巨大贡献，是唐肃宗反攻的核心军事将领。传说他曾受李白救助，后为获罪的李白求情。
description.en: A famous general of the Tang Dynasty, he made significant contributions to quelling the An Lushan Rebellion and was a core military commander in Emperor Suzong's counter-offensive. Legend has it that he was once rescued by Li Bai and later interceded for the disgraced poet.

description.zh-cn: 东晋政治家，李白终身仰慕的历史人物之一。
翰林院是中国古代的学术与官僚储备机构。其历史悠久，在唐朝时期曾作为宫廷机构，著名诗人李白在此担任翰林供奉。至清朝，它发展为重要的学术和秘书机构，如年羹尧在康熙三十九年考中进士后曾在此任职。方孝孺也曾担任侍讲、学士等职。该机构也曾长期收藏《永乐大典》副本。
description.en: The Hanlin Academy was an academic and administrative institution in imperial China with a long history. During the Tang Dynasty, it served as a court institution, where the renowned poet Li Bai held the position of Hanlin Academician. In the Qing Dynasty, it evolved into an important academic and secretariat body, with figures like Nian Gengyao serving there after becoming a Jinshi in 1700. Fang Xiaoru also served there as a lecturer and academician. The institution also long housed the duplicate manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 起源于中国的本土民族宗教，以“道”为最高信仰，深受道家思想影响，后将庄周尊为南华真人。历史上有众多信徒，如李白笃信道教，热切向往神仙不死；明世宗亦笃信道教，追求长生不老，为此大兴土木、修设斋醮，耗费巨大。
description.en: An indigenous Chinese religion, deeply influenced by Taoist philosophy, revering 'Tao' as the supreme belief and later Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren. Historically, it attracted numerous followers; for example, Li Bai devoutly believed in Taoism, yearning for immortality, and Emperor Shizong also pursued immortality, which led to extensive construction and elaborate rituals, incurring enormous costs.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人。
由首批入选985工程的九所高校组成的高校联盟。
位于中国南京市的著名高等学府，也是南京工业大学的源头之一。其工学院于1952年参与组建南京工学院。董健曾在此求学、任教并担任副校长。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Nanjing, China, and one of the origins of Nanjing Tech University. Its College of Engineering participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology in 1952. Dong Jian studied, taught, and served as vice president here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性全国重点研究型大学，位于中国上海市。与南加州大学有合作关系，也是慎海雄的母校之一。
description.en: A comprehensive national key research university directly under China's Ministry of Education, located in Shanghai. It maintains a partnership with the University of Southern California and is also one of Shen Haixiong's alma maters.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国西安的著名高等学府，是周鸿祎的母校。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in Xi'an, China, and the alma mater of Zhou Hongyi.

en: Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。作为一所'双一流A类'、原'985工程'和'211工程'重点建设的全国重点大学，该校以航空航天工程和技术为特色，是一所顶尖研究型大学。张庆伟曾在此获得管理学博士学位。
description.en: A public university located in Beijing, China, directly under the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China. As a national key university designated under 'Double First-Class A', former 'Project 985', and 'Project 211' initiatives, it is a top research university specializing in aeronautics and astronautics engineering and technology. Zhang Qingwei obtained his Doctor of Management degree here.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。温云松在此获得工科学位；项昌乐在此获得学士、硕士和博士学位，并曾担任党委常务副书记等职务。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China. Wen Yunsong obtained his engineering degree here; Xiang Changle obtained his bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees here, and previously served as Executive Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名综合性大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，位于中国北京，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。它是北京师范大学的前身之一，其体育系是1953年成立中央体育学院（北京体育大学前身）的基础。徐旭生曾任校长，徐发淦、何毅亭（在此获得历史学学士和硕士学位）是其校友。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive university in Beijing, China, and a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. It is designated as a 'Double First-Class A', 'Project 985', and 'Project 211' university. It is one of the predecessors of Beijing Normal University, and its Department of Physical Education formed the basis for the establishment of the Central Institute of Physical Culture (predecessor of Beijing Sport University) in 1953. Xu Xusheng served as its chancellor, and Xu Fagan and He Yiting (who obtained his bachelor's and master's degrees in history) are alumni.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的著名高等学府，一所以工科为主的综合性大学。阎明复曾在此就读。抗日战争期间，该校为避战火曾内迁至四川三台。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive university with a focus on engineering, located in Shenyang, Liaoning, China. Yan Mingfu was a student here. During the Second Sino-Japanese War, it temporarily relocated to Santai, Sichuan to avoid conflict.

zh-cn: 南京交通高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 该校是南京工业大学的源头之一，于1952年由南京大学工学院、金陵大学工科等组建。其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学，化工系于1958年独立为南京化工学院。作为东南大学的前身，现为中央直管、教育部直属的研究型综合性大学。
description.en: One of the origins of Nanjing Tech University, this institution was formed in 1952 from the College of Engineering of Nanjing University, the engineering department of Ginling University, etc. Its telecommunication engineering-related majors were merged into the newly established University of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 1956, and its Chemical Engineering Department became the independent Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology in 1958. As a predecessor of Southeast University, it is now a research-oriented comprehensive university directly managed by the central government and affiliated with the Ministry of Education.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的中国副部级研究型综合大学，“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。该校也是周本顺的母校之一，他在此获得法学博士学位。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China, it is a key construction university under "Double First-Class A", "Project 985", and "Project 211". It is also one of Zhou Benshun's alma maters, where he obtained a Ph.D. in Law.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省武汉市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。唐良智在此获得本科学位和经济学博士学位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Wuhan, China, where Tang Liangzhi obtained his bachelor's degree and a Ph.D. in Economics.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市

description.zh-cn: 华南理工大学的前身，直属中华人民共和国教育部的公立综合性研究型大学。其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。此外，在1958年至1962年间，曾有一个机构自华南工学院分出，后又重新并入该学院。

en: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省成都市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，以发展航空、航天、航海（三航）为特色，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学，国防七子之一。其历史可追溯至1952年，当时由南京大学、交通大学、浙江大学的航空工程系在南京组建，并于1956年迁至西安。该校曾为西安航空学院，是西北工业大学的前身之一。张庆伟曾在此获得工学硕士学位。
description.en: One of China's top universities, affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China. It specializes in aeronautics, astronautics, and marine engineering (the 'three-aero' fields), and is a key construction university under the 'Double First-Class A', 'Project 985', and 'Project 211' initiatives, also recognized as one of the 'Seven Sons of National Defense'. Its history dates back to 1952 when the aeronautical engineering departments of Nanjing University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, and Zhejiang University were established in Nanjing, then relocated to Xi'an in 1956. This institution was formerly known as Xi'an Aeronautical Institute, a predecessor of Northwestern Polytechnical University. Zhang Qingwei obtained his Master of Engineering degree here.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性大流行病，由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）引起。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省省会。
description.en: The capital of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 世界卫生组织总干事。
一场始于1929年10月29日并持续至1939年的全球性经济大衰退，是第二次世界大战前最严重的全球经济衰退。它对德国造成了尤其深重的危机，为纳粹主义的兴起创造了条件，同时也是罗斯福新政的历史背景。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic depression, starting on October 29, 1929, and lasting until 1939. It was the worst global economic recession before World War II. It created a particularly deep crisis in Germany, setting the stage for the rise of Nazism, and was also the context for Roosevelt's New Deal.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要对外情报机构之一。该组织被指控策划针对阿桑奇的敌对行动，并且张纯如在遗书中曾声称自己被其盯上。此外，该机构曾从以色列情报机构获得秘密报告文稿后，经总统批准将其披露给《纽约时报》。
description.en: One of the principal foreign intelligence agencies of the U.S. federal government. It has been accused of planning hostile actions against Assange, and Iris Chang claimed in her suicide note that she was targeted by this organization. Additionally, it obtained the text of a secret report from Israeli intelligence and disclosed it to The New York Times with presidential approval.

description.zh-cn: 美国企业家和商业巨头，SpaceX、特斯拉公司CEO及首席设计师，PayPal创始人，Solarcity主席，美国政府效率部负责人。宾夕法尼亚大学校友。他对DeepSeek的能力和可持续性持怀疑态度。
description.en: An American entrepreneur and business magnate, CEO and Chief Designer of SpaceX, CEO and Product Architect of Tesla, Inc., founder of PayPal, chairman of SolarCity, and Head of the US Government Efficiency Department. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania. He has expressed skepticism about DeepSeek's capabilities and sustainability.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，呼吸病学专家。
中国人民解放军前少将，曾任陆军第三十八集团军军长。因在六四事件中拒绝执行戒严命令，被撤职并判刑。
description.en: A former Major General of the People's Liberation Army and former Commander of the 38th Group Army. He was dismissed and sentenced for refusing to enforce martial law orders during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件受害者，在六部口被坦克碾压致双腿截肢。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军
中国人民解放军第38集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军
en: 38th Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一支精锐集团军，因在朝鲜战争中的出色表现被誉为“万岁军”。该部队现隶属于中部战区陆军，此前曾隶属北京军区，并作为参与戒严行动的部队之一，在1989年六四事件中由徐勤先指挥。王西欣曾任该集团军军长。
description.en: An elite group army of the PLA Ground Force, acclaimed as the 'Long Live Army' for its outstanding performance in the Korean War. It is currently affiliated with the Central Theater Command Ground Force, having previously been part of the Beijing Military Region. The unit was also involved in martial law operations and was commanded by Xu Qinxian during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. Wang Xixin also served as its corps commander.

zh-cn: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 在1989年天安门学生运动（六四事件）期间，由北京各高校学生组成的自治联合组织。
description.en: An autonomous joint organization formed by students from various universities in Beijing during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests (also known as the June Fourth Incident).

description.zh-cn: 社会运动人士、历史学者、中国持不同政见者，1989年六四事件学生领袖之一。事件后流亡美国，曾称魏京生为“民主斗士”。关于其狱中证词，陈子明曾指其作出不实，但王丹也曾公开称陈子明为友人并关心其病情。
description.en: A social activist, historian, and Chinese dissident, and one of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. After the event, he went into exile in the United States, and once called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'. Regarding his testimony in prison, Chen Ziming accused him of giving false testimony, but Wang Dan also publicly referred to Chen Ziming as a friend and expressed concern for his illness.

description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一，也是天安门广场绝食行动发起人之一。六四事件后，她经“黄雀行动”营救逃离中国大陆。她还是一位人权活动家、企业高管，并是封从德前妻。
description.en: A student leader in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and one of the initiators of the hunger strike in Tiananmen Square. After the June Fourth Incident, she was rescued and escaped from mainland China through 'Operation Yellowbird'. She is also a human rights activist, a business executive, and the ex-wife of Feng Congde.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国作家、社会活动家、文艺评论家、人权活动家、持不同政见者。他曾是77级大学生，参与六四事件，是《零八宪章》主要起草人之一，并于2010年获得诺贝尔和平奖。魏京生曾批评将诺贝尔奖授予他的决定。
description.en: A Chinese writer, social activist, literary critic, human rights activist, and dissident. He was a member of the Class of 1977, participated in the Tiananmen Square protests, was a principal drafter of Charter 08, and was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2010. Wei Jingsheng criticized the decision to award him the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 造反派是文化大革命期间响应毛泽东“造反有理”号召，并向当权派夺权的群众组织的统称。作为文化大革命时期的主要政治派系之一，它与保皇派/保守派对立，是后期红卫兵运动的主流。
description.en: The 'Rebel Faction' (Zaofanpai) was a general term for mass organizations during the Cultural Revolution that responded to Mao Zedong's call 'to rebel is justified' and seized power from the establishment. As one of the main political factions during that period, it opposed the Royalist/conservative factions and became the mainstream of the later Red Guard movement.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间支持各地原有党政军领导的群众组织派别。
中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央办公厅副主任兼秘书局局长，被认为是习近平的贴身秘书。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员
中华人民共和国公务员法
en: Civil Servant Law of the People's Republic of China
Civil servant of the People's Republic of China
Civil servants of the People's Republic of China
Civil service of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家公务员制度，根据《中华人民共和国公务员法》定义，是指依法履行公职、纳入国家行政编制、由国家财政负担工资福利的工作人员。该法是规范公务员管理的主要法律依据。
description.en: The national civil service system of the People's Republic of China, defined by the 'Civil Servant Law of the People's Republic of China', refers to personnel who perform public duties in accordance with the law, are included in the state administrative establishment, and whose salaries and benefits are borne by the state finance. This law serves as the main legal basis for regulating civil service management.

description.zh-cn: 一所位于北京紫禁城内的博物馆，是文化和旅游部直属事业单位，首长高配副部长级。任万平曾在此担任副院长。
description.en: A museum located within Beijing's Forbidden City, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Culture and Tourism. Its highest-ranking official holds a vice-ministerial level, and Ren Wanping previously served as its deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京天安门广场东侧的综合性博物馆，收藏有神舟五号返回舱。它是文化和旅游部直属事业单位，首长高配副部长级。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located on the east side of Tiananmen Square in Beijing, China, which houses the Shenzhou 5 return capsule. It is a directly affiliated institution of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, with its head ranked as a Vice Minister.

description.zh-cn: 与中国烟草总公司实行“一个机构两块牌子”的制度，既承担烟草行业行政管理职能，又承接卷烟生产销售任务，属于中央行政企业。
description.en: Operates under the 'one institution with two names' system with China National Tobacco Corporation, undertaking both administrative management functions for the tobacco industry and production and sales tasks for cigarettes, and is a central administrative enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 中央行政企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

zh-cn: 中国投资有限责任公司
中国国家外汇投资公司
en: China National Foreign Exchange Investment Company

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行于1984年成立，承办了原由中国人民银行承担的工商信贷和储蓄业务。它是一家大型国有商业银行，中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇，同时也是中国工商银行（亚洲）的母公司。
description.en: Established in 1984, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China took over the industrial and commercial credit and savings business originally handled by the People's Bank of China. It is a large state-owned commercial bank and a central financial enterprise enjoying vice-ministerial political and economic treatment. It is also the parent company of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 中国的国有商业银行之一。民国时期曾是主要商业银行，后被国民政府增资控股，成为中央金融企业，享有副部级政治经济待遇。在国家外汇管理局成立初期，曾与其合署办公，同时承担外汇管理和经营职能。高迎欣曾于2015年至2018年担任该行副行长。
description.en: One of the state-owned commercial banks in China. It was a major commercial bank during the Republic of China period, later controlled by the Nationalist Government through increased capital, becoming a central financial enterprise and enjoying vice-ministerial political and economic treatment. In the early days of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, it shared offices with it, concurrently undertaking both foreign exchange management and business functions. Gao Yingxin served as its Vice President from 2015 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

zh-cn: 中国航空工业集团公司
中国航空工业集团有限公司
en: Aviation Industry Corporation of China, Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家主要航空制造公司，也是国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
description.en: A major Chinese aerospace and defense conglomerate.

zh-cn: 中国兵器工业集团有限公司
中国北方工业集团有限公司
en: China North Industries Group Corporation Limited

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一家主要从事军事装备研发、生产、制造的特大型中央企业。作为国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企），它同时也是中国最大的武器装备制造集团。
description.en: A super-large central state-owned enterprise in the People's Republic of China, primarily engaged in the research, development, production, and manufacturing of military equipment. As an important state-owned backbone enterprise (vice-ministerial level central enterprise), it is also China's largest manufacturer of weaponry.

zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有石油和天然气公司，国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企），在《穹顶之下》中被点名批评。其高层工程师随后撰文反驳片中观点。
description.en: A major state-owned oil and gas corporation in China, which was criticized by name in 'Under the Dome'. Its senior engineer later wrote an article refuting the film's claims.

description.zh-cn: 国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。

zh-cn: 中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司
en: China Baowu Steel Group Corporation Limited

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆规模最大的钢铁企业，是国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
description.en: The largest steel producer in mainland China, an important state-owned backbone enterprise (vice-ministerial central enterprise).

zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司
en: Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

location.zh-cn: 中国上海市浦东新区世博大道1919号
location.en: 1919 Expo Avenue, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, China

description.zh-cn: 该公司是中华人民共和国研制大型民航飞机的中央企业，也是国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。作为一家航空航天制造公司，其目标是成为拥有自主知识产权和国际竞争力的大型宽体民用飞机制造商。张庆伟曾担任公司董事长。
description.en: This is a central state-owned enterprise of the People's Republic of China and a key backbone enterprise (vice-ministerial level SOE), dedicated to developing large civil aircraft. As an aerospace manufacturer, its goal is to become a large wide-body civil aircraft manufacturer with independent intellectual property rights and international competitiveness. Zhang Qingwei once served as its Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中央文化企业。
陕西省省会，副省级城市。著名导演张艺谋的出生地。
description.en: The provincial capital and a sub-provincial city of Shaanxi. It is also the birthplace of famous director Zhang Yimou.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省省会、副省级市、国家中心城市，中国西部地区的物流、商贸、金融、科技、文化、教育中心及交通、通信枢纽。历史上，这里曾是东汉时期益州蜀郡的治所，也是张松的家乡。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan Province, a sub-provincial city, and a national central city. It is a logistics, trade, financial, technological, cultural, and educational center, as well as a transportation and communication hub in Western China. Historically, it was the seat of Shu Commandery in Yi Province during the Eastern Han dynasty and Zhang Song's hometown.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的一座副省级城市，也是杜吉洲的家乡。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Liaoning Province, China, and also the hometown of Du Jizhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军1955年至1965年间的校级军官军衔之一，对应正营职。
description.en: One of the field officer ranks in the People's Liberation Army from 1955 to 1965, corresponding to battalion-level.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长（傅政华的前任）、最高人民检察院检察长，现任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长、中华人民共和国首席大法官。
description.en: Chinese political figure, formerly Minister of Justice (predecessor to Fu Zhenghua) and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, currently President of the Supreme People's Court and Chief Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈希的前任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
中国政治人物、团派主要成员。曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长，任内被指涉嫌干预陕西千亿矿权案的审理。现任全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). He served as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China, during which tenure he was accused of interfering in the trial of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'. He currently serves as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物、国家级副职领导人。现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。他曾任香港特别行政区行政会议非官守议员召集人，并于2012年当选香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。他是刘梦熊政治生涯中的关键人物，二人关系由紧密盟友转为公开对立。毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a state-level deputy leader. He is currently the Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC. He was elected as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong in the 2012 election and previously served as the Convenor of the Non-official Members of the Executive Council of Hong Kong. He is a key figure in Lew Mon-hung's political life, with their relationship shifting from close allies to public adversaries. He is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将。他曾任中央军事委员会委员、中国人民解放军总政治部主任、总装备部部长。他还是中国载人航天工程总指挥，并宣布了神舟五号发射成功与任务圆满完成。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a General (Shang Jiang) of the People's Liberation Army. He served as a member of the Central Military Commission, Director of the PLA General Political Department, and Director of the PLA General Armaments Department. He was also Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, announcing the successful launch and completion of the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前上将，曾任中央军委联合参谋部首任参谋长。
description.en: Former General of the PLA, served as the first Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任，后在接受组织谈话期间自杀身亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Director of the PLA General Political Department, who committed suicide during an investigation.

description.zh-cn: 清朝奠基者，后金开国皇帝，后被追尊为清太祖。他是塔克世与宣皇后的长子。他统一女真各部，并在与明朝的战争中屡获胜利。但在宁远之战中被袁崇焕击败并负伤，不久后去世。
description.en: The founder of the Qing dynasty and the Later Jin dynasty, posthumously honored as Emperor Taizu of Qing. He was the eldest son of Taksi and Empress Xuan. He unified the Jurchen tribes and achieved numerous victories in wars against the Ming Dynasty. However, he was defeated and wounded by Yuan Chonghuan at the Battle of Ningyuan, dying shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族首领努尔哈赤于1616年建立的政权，是清朝的前身。在其存续期间，与明朝在辽东地区展开了长期的军事对抗。
description.en: A khanate established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci in 1616, the predecessor to the Qing dynasty. During its existence, it engaged in long-term military conflict with the Ming Dynasty in the Liaodong region.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义军领袖，大顺政权的建立者与大顺皇帝。他率军攻入北京导致明朝灭亡，并曾将锦衣卫改名为龙衣卫。但随后在一片石之战中被清吴联军击败。其军队被认为是焚毁《永乐大典》正本的可能原因之一。
description.en: Leader of the peasant rebellion in the late Ming dynasty, founder and emperor of the Dashun regime. He led his army to capture Beijing, causing the fall of the Ming dynasty, and once renamed the Jinyiwei to Longyiwei (Dragon-Clad Guard). However, he was later defeated by the Qing-Wu allied forces at the Battle of Shanhai Pass. His army is also considered a possible cause for the destruction of the original manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初军事家、政治家。曾任辽东总兵，手握关宁铁骑，于一片石之战中投降多尔衮，引清兵入关，被封为平西王。晚年发动三藩之乱，建立吴周政权，自称皇帝。
description.en: A military general and politician in the late Ming and early Qing dynasties. He served as a late Ming general, commanding the Guan-Ning Army in the Liaodong region. During the Battle of Shanhai Pass, he surrendered to Dorgon, allowing Qing forces to enter the pass, and was subsequently enfeoffed as the Prince of Pacifying the West. In his later years, he initiated the Revolt of the Three Feudatories and established the Wu Zhou dynasty, declaring himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第六位皇帝，年号乾隆，庙号清高宗。他是雍正帝第四子，在位六十年，禅位后又以太上皇身份掌实权近四年，成为中国历史上掌权最长、最长寿的皇帝。其统治期间清朝国力达顶峰，史称“康雍乾盛世”。他曾开四库馆、大规模增改紫禁城，亲临少林寺留下诗词匾额，并为多尔衮平反。然而，晚期他因大兴文字狱及吏治腐败而备受争议。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, known by his reign name Qianlong and temple name Gaozong. He was the fourth son of the Yongzheng Emperor. He reigned for 60 years, and after abdicating, wielded de facto power for nearly four more years as Emperor Emeritus, making him the longest-reigning and longest-living emperor in Chinese history. During his rule, the Qing dynasty reached its zenith, a period known as the 'High Qing era'. He initiated the Siku Quanshu project, extensively renovated and expanded the Forbidden City, personally visited the Shaolin Temple leaving poems and calligraphic plaques, and posthumously rehabilitated Dorgon. However, he is controversial for promoting literary inquisitions and political corruption in his later years.

death_place.en: Hall of Mental Cultivation, Forbidden City

description.zh-cn: 清朝在第一次鸦片战争战败后与英国签订的条约，是中国近代史上第一个不平等条约。条约内容包括割让香港岛、开放五个通商口岸及赔款等。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and the United Kingdom after the Qing's defeat in the First Opium War. It was the first of the unequal treaties in modern Chinese history. Its terms included the cession of Hong Kong Island, the opening of five treaty ports, and reparations.

description.zh-cn: 清末拜上帝会创始人，太平天国运动的领袖及太平天国的建立者和天王。其子为洪天贵福。
description.en: Founder of the God Worshipping Society in the late Qing Dynasty, leader of the Taiping Rebellion, founder and Heavenly King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom. His son was Hong Tianguifu.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国是由洪秀全在清朝后期建立的农民起义政权，与清朝对峙并进行了长达14年的战争。其军事力量在天京城破时，城中守军约有万余人。
description.en: The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom was a rebel state established by Hong Xiuquan during the late Qing Dynasty, which engaged in a 14-year war with the Qing government. Its military force numbered around 10,000 defenders when Tianjing fell.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期政治家、战略家、理学家、文学家，中兴四大名臣之一，湘军的创立者和统帅。他曾向清廷奏报攻克金陵战果时，称杀敌十万余，有学者认为此为夸大战功。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, military general, Confucian scholar, and writer of the late Qing dynasty, and one of the Four Great Ministers of the Restoration. He was the founder and commander of the Xiang Army. In his report to the Qing court on the capture of Jinling, he claimed to have killed over 100,000 enemies, a figure some scholars believe to be an exaggeration.

description.zh-cn: 晚清皇室成员及实际最高统治者，咸丰帝贵妃，同治帝生母，光绪帝名义上的母亲。她与奕䜣在辛酉政变中结盟独揽大权。执政期间，指定溥仪继位并任命载沣为摄政王，1875年创设北洋水师，并迫害维新派致梁启超流亡。在义和团运动期间，受保守派亲王影响起用排外的毓贤，后向多国宣战，引发八国联军之役，其权威在东南互保事件中受到挑战。其陵墓后被孙殿英盗掘。
description.en: A female royal member and the de facto supreme ruler in the late Qing dynasty. She was the noble consort of the Xianfeng Emperor, biological mother of the Tongzhi Emperor, and nominal mother of Emperor Guangxu. She allied with Yixin in the Xinyou Coup, consolidating power. During her rule, she appointed Puyi as successor and Zaifeng as Prince-Regent, established the Beiyang Fleet in 1875, and persecuted reformists, leading to Liang Qichao's exile. During the Boxer Movement, influenced by conservative princes, she reappointed the xenophobic Yuxian, subsequently declaring war on multiple foreign powers, which led to the invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance, and her authority was severely challenged by the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. Her tomb was later looted by Sun Dianying.

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
中央网络安全和信息化领导小组办公室
国家互联网信息办公室
en: Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室，是中共中央委员会的办事机构。它与国家互联网信息办公室一个机构两块牌子，负责中国互联网内容审查和监管。作为中国互联网内容监管机构，曾在2019年指导北京市网信办约谈新浪并责令其整改。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission of the People's Republic of China is the working body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It operates under two names with the Cyberspace Administration of China, and is responsible for internet content censorship and regulation in China. As an internet content regulator in China, it guided the Beijing Cyberspace Administration to summon and order Sina to rectify its practices in 2019.

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署
中央驻港国家安全公署
en: Office for Safeguarding National Security of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 根据《香港国安法》设立的中央人民政府驻港机构，同时也是中共中央委员会的派出机关。负责监督、指导、协调、支持香港特区履行维护国家安全的职责，并可在特定情形下直接行使管辖权。
description.en: A Central People's Government agency established in Hong Kong under the National Security Law, also serving as a dispatch agency of the CPC Central Committee. It is responsible for supervising, guiding, coordinating, and supporting the HKSAR in fulfilling its duties to safeguard national security, and can exercise jurisdiction directly in specific situations.

zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室
en: Hong Kong and Macao Work Office
Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责香港和澳门事务的办事机构，是中共中央港澳工作办公室的加挂牌子。
description.en: The working body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macao affairs, operating concurrently as the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 公务员行政级别。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国少将
en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army
Major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军和武警部队的军衔等级，对应中将军衔和上校军衔之间。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army and People's Armed Police Force, positioned between Major General and Colonel.

zh-cn: 直辖市 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会
中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委
en: Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Communist Party Committee of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region
Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在新疆维吾尔自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个行政级别。国家外汇管理局的行政级别为副部级。
description.en: An administrative rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China. The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is at the vice-ministerial level.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署
en: General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的，负责全国海关工作的正部级直属机构。
description.en: A ministry-level agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for customs administration nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代外交家、法学家，曾代理国务总理，并担任民军议和全权总代表。
description.en: A modern Chinese diplomat and jurist who served as Acting Premier and also as the Plenipotentiary for peace talks between the civil and military forces.

description.zh-cn: 政治家、外交家，官立山东大学堂首任校长。曾任中华民国第一任内阁总理，章宗祥曾作为其随从参加南北议和。后因赵秉钧奉袁世凯之命发起的反唐运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: Politician and diplomat, and the first principal of the Official Shandong University. He served as the first Premier of the Republic of China, and Zhang Zongxiang attended the North-South peace negotiations as his attendant. He was later forced to resign due to the anti-Tang movement initiated by Zhao Bingjun under Yuan Shikai's orders.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清广东省广州府新会县潮居都茶坑乡
birth_place.en: Chakeng, Xinhui, Guangzhou, Guangdong, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国北平协和医院
death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beiping, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家、教育家、史学家、文学家。作为戊戌变法领袖之一，他是清末民初中国知识界与政界领军人物。他曾任自立军副总指挥，负责海外募款。曾倡导君主立宪，后反对袁世凯称帝、张勋复辟。曾是蔡锷的老师和政治盟友。他于1914年在清华演讲中提出“自强不息，厚德载物”，后被定为校训。作为巴黎和会中国代表团顾问，他通报外交困境，是五四运动爆发的信息源头。他还是清华国学研究院四大导师之一，梁思成之父，晚年专注于文化教育与学术研究，对西学东渐贡献巨大。
description.en: A prominent Chinese thinker, politician, educator, historian, and writer. As one of the leaders of the Hundred Days' Reform, he was a leading figure in China's intellectual and political circles during the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic. He served as the deputy commander of the Self-Support Army, responsible for overseas fundraising. He advocated constitutional monarchy, later opposing Yuan Shikai's imperial ambitions and Zhang Xun's restoration attempt. He was Cai E's teacher and political ally. In his 1914 speech at Tsinghua, he proposed the phrase 'Self-discipline and Social Commitment,' which was later adopted as the university motto. As an advisor to the Chinese delegation at the Paris Peace Conference, his report on diplomatic difficulties became the informational source for the May Fourth Movement's outbreak. He was also one of the four great tutors at the Tsinghua Institute of Chinese Studies and the father of Liang Sicheng. In his later years, he focused on cultural education and academic research, making significant contributions to the dissemination of Western knowledge.

description.zh-cn: 因台风暴雨导致的严重水库溃坝灾难，其根本原因与大跃进时期水利工程质量问题有关。
台湾第一位哲学博士，国立台湾大学教授及《民报》社长，在二二八事件后被带走失踪。

death_place.zh-cn: 直隶省顺天府白米斜街
death_place.en: Baimi Xiejie, Shuntian Fu, Zhili Province

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务派和清流派的主要代表人物。他历任山西巡抚、两广总督、湖广总督、军机大臣等职，官至体仁阁大学士。在湖广总督任内，他于1898年选送学生入成城学校学习军事。他倡导“中学为体，西学为用”，创办了汉阳铁厂等一系列近代工业和教育机构。他曾镇压自立军起义，并是东南互保的核心人物之一。他与曾国藩、李鸿章、左宗棠并称“晚清四大名臣”，曾建议慈禧太后给予载沣“摄政王”的封号。
description.en: A prominent official of the late Qing dynasty, a key representative of the Westernization Movement and the Qingliu school. He held various high-ranking positions including Governor of Shanxi, Viceroy of Liangguang, Viceroy of Huguang, and Grand Councilor, eventually rising to the rank of Grand Secretary of the Tiren Cabinet. During his tenure as Viceroy of Huguang, he selected students to study military science at Seijō Gakkō in 1898. Advocating 'Chinese learning as the essence, Western learning for practical use', he founded a series of modern industrial and educational institutions such as the Hanyang Iron Works. He suppressed the Self-Strengthening Army Uprising and was one of the key figures in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. Known as one of the 'Four Great Officials of the Late Qing' alongside Zeng Guofan, Li鸿章, and Zuo Zongtang, he once suggested to Empress Dowager Cixi that Zaifeng be given the title of 'Prince-Regent'.

description.zh-cn: 教育家，曾任武汉大学校长。
中国企业家、软件工程师、天使投资人，小米集团创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，金山软件董事长。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, software engineer, angel investor, founder, chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Inc., and chairman of Kingsoft.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代诗人、学者、民主战士。
description.en: A modern Chinese poet, scholar, and democratic fighter.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部副部长。曾任外交部新闻司司长，是陆慷的继任者。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China. She previously served as Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, succeeding Lu Kang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，中国共产党党员。现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长、外交部发言人。
description.en: A professional diplomat of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He currently serves as the Deputy Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and a spokesperson for the ministry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交家，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官、政治人物，现任中共中央台湾工作办公室、国务院台湾事务办公室主任。
description.en: A diplomat and politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the CCP Central Committee and the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 香港企业家、电影及电视制作人、娱乐业大亨、慈善家，邵维铭的父亲。他也是亚洲影视大亨，功夫片鼻祖，邵玉轩的第六子。
description.en: Hong Kong film and television producer, entertainment mogul, philanthropist, father of Shao Vee-Meng. He was also an an Asian film and television tycoon, progenitor of kung fu films, and the sixth son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 语言学家、音乐家。
清末洋务派代表人物、政治家、企业家和教育家。他曾任天津海关道、铁路大臣，上奏成立北洋大学堂并任首任督办，亦是南洋公学创始人。在八国联军侵华期间，他参与了东南互保，下令地方电信局扣押清廷宣战诏书。后任邮传大臣，是铁路国有政策的主要策划和推行者，成为保路运动中民众反对的主要目标。
description.en: A representative figure of the Self-Strengthening Movement in the late Qing Dynasty, he was a politician, entrepreneur, and educator. He served as the Daotai of Tianjin Customs and Minister of Railways, proposed the establishment of Peiyang University and became its first supervisor, and was also the founder of Nanyang Public School. During the Boxer Rebellion, he participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, ordering local telegraph offices to withhold the Qing court's imperial edict of war. Later, as Minister of Posts and Communications, he was the main planner and implementer of the railway nationalization policy, becoming a primary target of opposition during the Railway Protection Movement.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本(中国)，携程，如家创始人。
中国人民解放军空军现任司令员，空军上将军衔。曾任中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长，并获空军中将军衔。
description.en: Current Commander of the PLA Air Force, holding the rank of Air Force General. He previously served as Deputy Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission, with the rank of Air Force Lieutenant General.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵
en: People's Liberation Army Navy Air Force
People's Liberation Army Naval Air Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的航空兵部队，拥有战斗机、反潜机、预警机、电子战机、直升机等多种机型。2023年改革后，主要转向以舰载机为核心的海上空中力量。
description.en: The naval aviation branch of the People's Liberation Army Navy, operating various types of aircraft such as fighters, anti-submarine aircraft, early warning aircraft, electronic warfare aircraft, and helicopters. After reforms in 2023, it has shifted its focus to become a maritime air power centered on carrier-based aircraft.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区空军
中国人民解放军空降兵军
en: People's Liberation Army Air Force Airborne Corps

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的兵种机关。
曾任中共上海市委常委
曾任中共上海市委副书记
中国政治人物。曾任中共上海市委常委，后接替张庆伟担任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He previously served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, and later succeeded Zhang Qingwei as the Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共上海市委副书记、常委
曾任中共上海市委常委
曾任中共上海市委常委
中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委副书记、常委，现任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共上海市委常委，后被查
位于英国苏格兰的大学，杨昌济曾在此留学并毕业。其解剖学博物馆曾收藏四具在牡丹社事件中被日军带走的排湾族勇士头骨，并于2023年将其归还台湾。
description.en: A university located in Scotland, United Kingdom, where Yang Changji studied and graduated. Its anatomy museum housed the skulls of four Paiwan warriors taken by the Japanese army during the Mudan Incident, and the university returned the remains to Taiwan in 2023.

zh-cn: 伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校
伊利诺伊大学香槟分校

description.zh-cn: 张纯如毕业并获得新闻学位的大学。
description.en: The university where Iris Chang graduated with a degree in journalism.

description.zh-cn: 美国情报机构，据报道曾对西北工业大学发起网络攻击。
清朝第十一位皇帝，也是入关后的第九位。他是奕𫍽第二子，由慈禧太后指定继承咸丰帝之位，于1875年登基。在位期间，他施行新政，主导戊戌变法，并批准创办了山东大学堂和中国近代第一所新式大学北洋大学堂。甲午战争失败后，他下旨撤销了海军衙门和北洋水师的编制。戊戌政变失败后，他被慈禧太后软禁。自立军起义曾以营救他并建立君主立宪制为目标。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the ninth after its entry into Shanhai Pass. He was the second son of Yixuan, designated by Empress Dowager Cixi to succeed Emperor Xianfeng, and ascended the throne in 1875. During his reign, he implemented New Policies, led the Hundred Days' Reform, and approved the establishment of Shandong University and Peiyang University, the first modern university in China. After the defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War, he issued an edict to abolish the Admiralty and the Beiyang Fleet. Following the failure of the Wuxu Coup, he was placed under house arrest by Empress Dowager Cixi. The Self-Support Army Uprising aimed to rescue him and establish a constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，2012年诺贝尔文学奖得主。
description.en: Chinese novelist, winner of the 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省胶州专区高密县

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司，与香港理工大学联合成立科研中心。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company that has established a joint research center with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 中国领先的互联网技术公司，曾与新浪、腾讯和搜狐并称为中国四大门户网站。2000年，该公司与Google签署协议，使用Google作为其默认网络搜索结果提供商。
description.en: A leading Chinese internet technology company, once known as one of the four major portal websites in China alongside Sina, Tencent, and Sohu. In 2000, it signed an agreement with Google to use Google as its default provider for web search results.

description.zh-cn: 电子科技大学校友，山西省省长。

zh-cn: 山西等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。它是令狐路线的出生地，曾是晋系军阀的根据地，明朝时曾受嘉靖大地震影响。在义和团运动期间，时任巡抚毓贤曾在此策动大规模排外屠杀。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China. It is the home province of Linghu Luxian, was formerly the base of the Jin warlord clique, and was affected by the Jiajing Great Earthquake during the Ming dynasty. During the Boxer Rebellion, then-governor Yuxian instigated large-scale xenophobic massacres here.

description.zh-cn: 电子科技大学校友，歌手。
电子科技大学校友，院士。
20世纪初由四所美国及英国基督教教会联合在北京开办的著名教会大学。1952年院系调整时部分社会科学并入中国人民大学。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, that was formed out of the merger of four Christian colleges between the years 1919 and 1952.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省的政府驻地（省会）。
description.en: The seat of government (provincial capital) of Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行行长。
description.en: Former President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 中国最后一个封建王朝的政府。它既是自立军起义的目标及镇压方，也利用美国退还的庚子赔款建立了清华学堂的前身“游美学务处”。
description.en: The government of the last imperial dynasty of China. It was both the target and suppressor of the Self-Support Army Uprising, and used the refunded Boxer Indemnity from the United States to establish the 'Office for Students to the USA', the predecessor of Tsinghua College.
