description.zh-cn: 19世纪末发生于中国清朝的一场以“扶清灭洋”为口号的农民运动，亦指随后导致的八国联军侵华事件。这场武装冲突对孔祥熙的早年生活造成了冲击。事变后，清廷派载沣赴德国为德国公使被杀一事道歉。
description.en: An armed conflict and peasant movement that occurred in late 19th century Qing China, commonly known by the slogan 'Support the Qing, exterminate the foreigners.' It also refers to the subsequent invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance. This conflict significantly impacted H. H. Kung's early life. Following the incident, Zaifeng was dispatched to Germany to apologize for the killing of the German minister.

description.zh-cn: 书画家、国学家
孔子，中国春秋末期鲁国的思想家、政治家、教育家、哲学家，儒家学派的创始人与主要代表人物。传统上被认为撰写了《十翼》（易传），其言行被弟子及再传弟子记录并编纂成《论语》。他曾称赞晏婴，并受到庄子借盗跖之口的批评。其思想和相关文物在“破四旧”中被视为攻击目标。明嘉靖九年（1530年），明世宗将其尊号由“大成至圣文宣王”改为“至圣先师”。
description.en: Confucius, a philosopher, politician, educator, and thinker from the late Spring and Autumn period in the State of Lu, is regarded as the founder and principal representative of the Confucian school of thought. He is traditionally credited with writing the 'Ten Wings' (Yizhuan), and his words and deeds were recorded and compiled into the 'Analects' by his disciples and their successors. He once praised Yan Ying and was criticized by Zhuangzi through the character Robber Zhi. His ideas and related cultural relics were targeted during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement. In the 9th year of Jiajing (1530), Emperor Shizong of the Ming Dynasty changed his honorific title from 'Greatly Accomplished, Ultimate Sage, King of Culture' to 'Ultimate Sage, First Teacher'.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔物理学家。他因提出弱相互作用中宇称不守恒理论而与杨振宁共同获得1957年诺贝尔物理学奖。他曾就读于西南联合大学，并主持创办了中国科学技术大学少年班。
description.en: A Chinese-American physicist. He, along with Chen-Ning Yang, received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1957 for his work on parity non-conservation in weak interaction. He studied at the National Southwestern Associated University and presided over the establishment of the Special Class for the Gifted Young at the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国天体物理学家、异议人士，曾任中国科学技术大学副校长。他的民主思想和演讲对学生产生重要影响，被认为是八六学潮的精神领袖之一。后因此被撤职并开除党籍。
description.en: A Chinese astrophysicist and dissident, he formerly served as Vice President of the University of Science and Technology of China. His democratic ideas and speeches significantly influenced students, making him one of the spiritual leaders of the 1986 student demonstrations. He was subsequently dismissed from his post and expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 英国理论物理学家、宇宙学家及作家。他曾于1985年在中国科学技术大学发表演讲。
description.en: An English theoretical physicist, cosmologist, and author. He gave a speech at the University of Science and Technology of China in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员和中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共黑龙江省委第一书记、国家级副职领导人、中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China and a politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the First Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, a deputy state leader, and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军现任司令员，陆军上将军衔。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的省级军区，同时作为中华人民共和国首都卫戍区的正军级单位。该机构成立于1949年，负责保卫首都北京。自2016年起隶属中国人民解放军陆军总部，并接受中央军事委员会直接指挥。其主要职责是在和平时期保卫首都安全，战时掩护中央机关转移撤离、防御外敌、反恐及镇暴。吴烈曾担任其司令员和政治委员。
description.en: A provincial-level military district of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force, serving as the Capital Garrison of the People's Republic of China and a corps-level unit. Established in 1949, it is responsible for defending the capital Beijing. Since 2016, it has been subordinate to the PLA Ground Force Headquarters and receives direct command from the Central Military Commission. Its main responsibilities include safeguarding the capital's security during peacetime, and during wartime, covering the transfer or evacuation of central government organs, defending against foreign enemies, counter-terrorism, and riot control. Wu Lie served as its commander and political commissar.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军
中国人民解放军第1集团军
en: 1st Group Army of the People's Liberation Army
72nd Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于第一野战军的部队，余秋里曾担任该军的师政治委员和军副政治委员。
description.en: A unit formerly under the First Field Army, where Yu Qiuli served as a division political commissar and deputy political commissar of the corps.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由国立北京大学、国立清华大学和私立南开大学在中国昆明临时合并而成的一所综合性大学，朱自清在此担任中文系主任。
description.en: A comprehensive university formed by the temporary merger of National Peking University, National Tsinghua University, and the private Nankai University in Kunming, China, during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Zhu Ziqing served as the head of the Chinese department here.

description.zh-cn: 华裔数学家，被誉为“微分几何之父”，曾在伯克利任教，并发起了美国国家数学科学研究所的建立。
description.en: Chinese-American mathematician who taught at Berkeley and initiated the establishment of the Mathematical Sciences Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
2023年起，中国人民解放军火箭军及中央军委装备发展部发生大规模腐败案件，涉及多名高级将领的腐败及泄密调查，并牵连相关军工企业和高校。
description.en: Starting in 2023, large-scale corruption cases occurred within the PLA Rocket Force and the CMC Equipment Development Department, involving corruption and leakage investigations of multiple senior generals, and implicating related military industrial enterprises and universities.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
晚清重臣、湘军将领、清末甘陕总督、政治家、军事家、外交家、实业家、改革家、诗人。他曾在林则徐退休返乡途中与其彻夜长谈，深受其关于新疆及俄国威胁的见解影响，后来领导收复新疆。
description.en: A prominent statesman, general, and national hero of the late Qing dynasty. He had a lengthy discussion with Lin Zexu during Lin's retirement journey and was deeply influenced by Lin's views on Xinjiang and the Russian threat, which later guided his campaign to recover Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学历史系教授、著名知识分子。他批判法家，认为中国两千多年来的政治格局是“儒表法里”。同时，他作为一位历史学家，也曾对李泽厚的“告别革命”说提出质疑。
description.en: A professor of history at Tsinghua University and a prominent intellectual. He is critical of Legalism, arguing that China's political structure for over two millennia has been 'Confucian on the outside, Legalist on the inside'. As a historian, he also questioned Li Zehou's theory of 'Farewell to Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国麻萨诸塞州波士顿市的一所大学

death_place.zh-cn: 台北市北投区台北荣民总医院
death_place.en: Taipei Veterans General Hospital, Beitou District, Taipei

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、书法家，中华民国开国元勋之一，国民党元老。曾长期担任监察院院长达34年，被誉为“当代草圣”，也是国立西北农林专科学校创始人之一。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician, calligrapher, and one of the founding fathers of the Republic of China. He served as the President of the Control Yuan for 34 years and is hailed as the 'Contemporary Sage of Cursive Script'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军现任司令员，也是第九任司令员。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的前身，于江苏泰州白马庙乡成立。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军
中国人民解放军海军南海舰队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军南海舰队，原为海军三大舰队之一。现为中国人民解放军南部战区海军。
description.en: The PLA Navy South Sea Fleet, originally one of the three major fleets of the PLA Navy. It is now known as the PLA Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国苗族女高音歌唱家，曾任中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团团长、中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: A Chinese Miao female singer, former head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy, and former vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州古丈县岩头寨镇

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法委员、台湾政治人物、前艺人
欧洲联盟是一个由27个欧洲国家共同建立的政治、经济及司法的超主权实体，总部设在布鲁塞尔。该组织与北约有紧密合作关系。拉脱维亚于2004年加入该联盟。
description.en: The European Union is a political, economic, and judicial supranational entity jointly established by 27 European countries, with its headquarters in Brussels. This organization maintains close cooperative relations with NATO. Latvia joined the union in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 法兰克王国是由日耳曼部落建立的中世纪欧洲王国。其国王丕平献土创立了教宗国。在法国君主腓力二世之前，法国国王一直使用“法兰克国王”头衔。
description.en: The Kingdom of the Franks was a medieval European kingdom established by a Germanic tribe. Its king, Pepin, donated land to establish the Papal States. Before the French monarch Philip II, French kings consistently used the title 'King of the Franks'.

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国是一个自962年建立，延续至1806年的欧洲国家。它以德意志民族为主体，版图横跨中欧与南欧。其皇帝被视为古罗马帝国的合法继承者和西方基督教世界的世俗领袖。作为中世纪欧洲的政治实体，它曾与英格兰结盟在布汶战役中对抗法国。在经历了三十年战争和拿破仑战争的削弱后，帝国于1806年解体。
description.en: The Holy Roman Empire was a European state that existed from 962 to 1806. Predominantly German, its territory spanned Central and Southern Europe. Its emperors were regarded as the legitimate successors to the ancient Roman Empire and the secular leaders of Western Christendom. As a political entity in medieval Europe, it allied with England against France in the Battle of Bouvines. After being weakened by the Thirty Years' War and the Napoleonic Wars, the empire was dissolved in 1806.

description.zh-cn: 法国波旁王朝的最后一任国王。在法国大革命期间，他因八月十日事件被国民立法议会暂停职务，并随后被国民公会审判并处决。
description.en: The last King of France of the House of Bourbon. During the French Revolution, he was suspended from his duties by the Legislative Assembly after the Insurrection of 10 August 1792, and subsequently tried and executed by the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一段深刻社会激进与政治动荡时期，它推翻了法国君主制，建立了共和国，并最终促成了拿破仑·波拿巴的崛起。这场变革对法国历史以及全欧洲都产生了深刻而深远的影响。
description.en: A period of profound social and political upheaval in France that led to the overthrow of the French monarchy, the establishment of a republic, and ultimately culminated in the rise of Napoleon Bonaparte. This transformative period had a lasting and profound impact on French history and on Europe as a whole.

description.zh-cn: 于1792年9月22日由国民公会宣告成立的共和国政体，取代了法兰西王国。
description.en: The republic proclaimed by the National Convention on September 22, 1792, which replaced the Kingdom of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家，法兰西第一帝国的缔造者和皇帝。他在法国大革命中崛起，尤其在葡月13日事件中镇压叛乱，为其政治生涯奠定基础。通过拿破仑战争等军事行动和政治决策，他极大地改变了欧洲政治格局，并直接导致了神圣罗马帝国的解体。
description.en: French military strategist and statesman, founder and emperor of the First French Empire. He rose to prominence during the French Revolution, notably suppressing the 13 Vendémiaire rebellion, which laid the foundation for his political career. Through military campaigns like the Napoleonic Wars and political decisions, he profoundly reshaped the European political landscape and directly led to the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第二共和国的唯一一位总统和法兰西第二帝国的唯一一位皇帝。他曾以“教会的保护者”名义派兵保护罗马，阻止意大利王国占领（即教宗国）。
description.en: The only president of the French Second Republic and the only emperor of the Second French Empire. He protected Rome with French troops in his capacity as 'protector of the Church', preventing its capture by the Kingdom of Italy (i.e., the Papal States).

description.zh-cn: 1870年至1940年间的法国共和政府，是协约国的主要成员国之一。在第二次世界大战中被纳粹德国击败后解体。
description.en: The republican government of France from 1870 to 1940, it was one of the main member states of the Entente Powers. It collapsed after the defeat by Nazi Germany in World War II.

location.zh-cn: 欧洲、亚洲、非洲、大西洋、太平洋

description.zh-cn: 一场1914年至1918年发生的全球性军事冲突，始于欧洲，萨拉热窝事件是其直接导火索。齐默尔曼电报的曝光促使美国于1917年参战。战争导致的民生灾难是德国十一月革命的诱因之一。中国作为战胜国虽参加巴黎和会，但山东问题处理不公引发了五四运动。此战还导致了奥斯曼帝国的瓦解。
description.en: A global military conflict (1914-1918) originating in Europe, directly triggered by the Sarajevo incident. The disclosure of the Zimmermann Telegram prompted the United States to join the war in 1917. The resulting social and economic hardships were a cause of the German November Revolution. Although China participated in the Paris Peace Conference as a victorious nation, the unfair handling of the Shandong Problem led to the May Fourth Movement. This war also led to the collapse of the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月23日在美、英、法三国占领区成立。作为欧盟创始成员国之一，其国家主导的工业发展模式和强权政策曾成为明治日本效仿的对象。近期，德国政府批评伊朗政权镇压示威，并呼吁欧盟对伊朗实施进一步制裁。
description.en: Established on 23 May 1949 in the zones occupied by the United States, the United Kingdom, and France. As one of the founding members of the EU, its state-led industrial development model and strong-arm policies became a model for Meiji Japan. Recently, the German government criticized the Iranian regime for suppressing protests and called on the EU to impose further sanctions on Iran.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事将领、政治家及法国元帅。第一次世界大战中因凡尔登战役的胜利而成为民族英雄，但在第二次世界大战期间领导与纳粹德国合作的维希法国政府，战后被判叛国罪。
description.en: A French general, politician, and Marshal of France. He became a national hero for his victory at the Battle of Verdun in World War I, but led the collaborationist Vichy France regime with Nazi Germany during World War II, for which he was convicted of treason.

location.zh-cn: 维希 (事实), 巴黎 (法定), 西格马林根 (流亡)
location.en: Vichy (de facto), Paris (de jure), Sigmaringen (in exile)

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，由菲利普·贝当领导的法国国家政权。它最初在法国未被德军占领的南部地区成立，名义上中立，但与纳粹德国合作，并于1942年后被德国完全控制。
description.en: During World War II, this French state was led by Philippe Pétain. Initially established in the southern, unoccupied zone of France, it was officially neutral but collaborated with Nazi Germany and became fully controlled by Germany after 1942.

description.zh-cn: 一个由欧洲和北美国家组成的国际军事联盟，旨在实现集体防御和防务合作。它包括2个北美国家和30个欧洲国家，加拿大是其创始国之一，拉脱维亚于2004年加入。俄罗斯对其东扩的担忧是发动战争的宣称理由之一。
description.en: An international military alliance formed by European and North American countries, aiming for collective defense and cooperation. It comprises 2 North American and 30 European states, with Canada as one of its founding members and Latvia joining in 2004. Russia's concerns about its eastward expansion were one of the stated reasons for the war.

description.zh-cn: 法国前总统，任内推动法国重返北约军事指挥结构。
美国及其盟友于2003年3月以伊拉克拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由发动军事行动，推翻了萨达姆政权。这场冲突导致伊拉克什叶派地位持续上升。在此期间，加拿大拒绝加入美方行动，巴沙尔·阿萨德也对此表示坚决反对。
description.en: In March 2003, the United States and its allies launched a military operation, citing Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction, which led to the overthrow of Saddam Hussein's regime. This conflict resulted in the continued rise in status for Shia Muslims in Iraq. During this period, Canada declined to join the U.S. efforts, and Bashar al-Assad also strongly opposed the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪腐，并曾任国立台湾大学校长。
description.en: Chinese historian and educator who exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council and was a former president of National Taiwan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人
清末官员，曾任陕西巡抚、两江总督。后在保路运动激化后，被清廷任命为署理四川总督，率湖北新军入川镇压。他曾是东南互保的支持者，并创办了暨南学堂。1911年11月27日，他在资中县被哗变的部下所杀。
description.en: A late Qing official, who served as Governor of Shaanxi and Governor-General of Liangjiang. Later, after the escalation of the Railway Protection Movement, he was appointed acting Governor-General of Sichuan by the Qing court and led the Hubei New Army into Sichuan for suppression. He was a supporter of the Mutual Protection of Southeast China and founded Jinan School. On November 27, 1911, he was killed by his mutinous subordinates in Zizhong County.

description.zh-cn: 中国儒家经典之一。
儒家重要经典之一，是中国春秋时期的思想家孔子及其弟子言行为主的言论汇编。内容涉及治国理念、人伦关系、个人道德规范等。
description.en: One of the most important classics of Confucianism, a compilation of speeches, sayings, and deeds primarily of the philosopher Confucius and his disciples, from the Spring and Autumn period of China. It covers topics such as governance, human relations, and personal moral standards.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子短跑运动员，暨南大学体育学院院长。
中国田径运动员，奥运会冠军，华东师范大学校友。
中国企业家，华为技术有限公司创始人、集团总裁。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and president of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.

zh-cn: 国立北京大学 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，日伪政府在北京大学原址上成立的大学。
中国政治人物，原北京大学哲学系党总支书记。她因贴出“全国第一张马列主义的大字报”而成为文革时期的风云人物。该大字报被全国播出后，引发了外地造反者奔赴北京的热潮，是全国大串连的缘起之一。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and former Party Secretary of Peking University's Philosophy Department. She rose to prominence during the Cultural Revolution by posting 'the first Marxist-Leninist big-character poster' in China. After her poster was broadcast nationwide, it triggered a wave of rebels heading to Beijing, becoming one of the origins of the Great Networking movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员，青蒿素和双氢青蒿素的发现者，北京大学医学院校友。因其在抗疟药方面的贡献，于2015年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist, lifetime researcher and chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, and the discoverer of artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin. An alumna of Peking University Medical School. She was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2015 for her contributions to antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家、诺贝尔物理学奖得主。因提出弱相互作用中宇称不守恒理论而与李政道共同获得1957年诺贝尔物理学奖。他也是国立西南联合大学校友和中国科学院院士。自1997年6月清华大学高等研究中心成立起即担任名誉主任（后为名誉院长），同时也是该院教员。
description.en: A Chinese physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics. He, along with Tsung-Dao Lee, received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1957 for their work on parity non-conservation in weak interaction. He is also an alumnus of National Southwestern Associated University and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. Since June 1997, he has served as the Honorary Director (later Honorary Dean) of the Institute for Advanced Study at Tsinghua University and is also a faculty member.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，百度公司创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，北京大学校友。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Baidu.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，被誉为“物理学第一夫人”，毕业于伯克利大学。她设计的吴氏实验验证了弱相互作用中的宇称不守恒。
description.en: Chinese-American physicist, known as the 'First Lady of Physics' and an alumna of Berkeley. Her Wu experiment provided experimental proof for parity non-conservation in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 音乐家、美术教育家、书法家、戏剧活动家。
位于美国马里兰州巴尔的摩的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊在此获得哲学博士学位，张纯如在此获得文学硕士学位，张孝骞也曾在此进行研究。
description.en: A private research university in Baltimore, Maryland, where Woodrow Wilson earned his Ph.D., Iris Chang obtained her Master of Arts degree, and Zhang Xiaoqian once conducted research.

description.zh-cn: 文学家、小说家、散文家和考古学专家。
散文家、学者、文学批评家、翻译家。
胚胎学家，中国科学院学部委员，第四届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: Embryologist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、政治经济学家、社会学家、历史学者、记者、革命理论家及革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。他在第一国际中与巴枯宁存在严重分歧，并最终将其开除出协会。
description.en: A German philosopher, political economist, sociologist, historian, journalist, political theorist, and revolutionary socialist. He was also one of the founders of Marxism. He had serious disagreements with Bakunin in the First International and eventually had him expelled from the association.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者、商人、政治思想家和社会主义者。他与马克思共同发展出共产主义理论，是马克思最亲密的朋友和长期合作伙伴。
description.en: German philosopher, social scientist, journalist, businessman, political thinker, and socialist. He co-developed communist theory with Marx and was his closest friend and long-term collaborator.

description.zh-cn: 一种联系人与神祇或超自然、神圣存在的文化体系，或以热情和坚定地信念而坚持信仰的原则或理论体系。
description.en: A cultural system that connects humanity to supernatural or sacred entities, or a system of principles or theories held with ardor and faith.

description.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈城是位于意大利首都罗马市区内的内陆城邦，由天主教会最高权力机构圣座（即罗马教廷）直接统治，为世界领土面积最小的国家。
description.en: An independent city-state and enclave located within Rome, Italy. The Vatican City State is ruled by the Pope, the bishop of Rome and head of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 一种社会经济体系和政治意识形态，列宁主义的目标是通过暴力革命和无产阶级专政来实现。
description.en: A socio-economic system and political ideology.

description.zh-cn: 一种以生产资料私有制为基础的社会经济体系。它是列宁主义革命和马克思异化论所批判的对象，也受到了情境主义国际的系统性批判。
description.en: A socioeconomic system based on private ownership of the means of production. It is the object of Leninist revolution and critique in Marx's theory of alienation, and was also systematically critiqued by the Situationist International.

zh-cn: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

description.zh-cn: 俄国及苏联马克思主义革命家、政治理论家，共产国际的创始人之一，亦是“不断革命论”的主要倡导者。他的建议曾促成了中国各托派组织的统一。
description.en: Russian and Soviet Marxist revolutionary and theorist, one of the founders of the Communist International, and a main advocate of the 'theory of permanent revolution'. His suggestions promoted the unification of Chinese Trotskyist organizations.

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国
南斯拉夫联邦人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 由铁托领导的社会主义国家，因其独特的社会主义自治制度而被苏联和中国指责为修正主义。
description.en: A socialist state led by Tito, accused of revisionism by the Soviet Union and China for its unique system of socialist self-management.

zh-cn: 菲德尔·亚历杭德罗·卡斯特罗·鲁斯

description.zh-cn: 古巴革命家和共产主义领导人，在肯尼迪任期内担任古巴总理，是猪湾事件和古巴导弹危机中的核心人物。
description.en: Cuban revolutionary and communist leader who served as Prime Minister of Cuba during Kennedy's presidency, a central figure in the Bay of Pigs Invasion and the Cuban Missile Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利裔英国哲学家。
奥地利裔英国经济学家、政治哲学家，奥地利经济学派的代表人物。
由弗拉基米尔·列宁领导的俄国社会民主工党的一个派别，后来成为苏联共产党。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party led by Vladimir Lenin, which later became the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治、经济和社会思想体系。五四运动促进了马克思主义在中国的传播，为中国共产党的成立创造了条件。
description.en: A political, economic, and social ideological system. The May Fourth Movement facilitated the spread of Marxism in China, creating conditions for the establishment of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的官方意识形态，由金日成于1955年提出，用以打击延安派和苏联派。
description.en: The official state ideology of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, proposed by Kim Il-sung in 1955 to counter the Yan'an and Soviet factions.

description.zh-cn: 于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
东南亚国家。曾在1961年接受中国的稻种援助。此外，该国警方成功抓获湄公河惨案主犯糯康并将其移交中国，并参与了后续的四国执法安全合作。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country. It received rice seed aid from China in 1961. Its police also successfully apprehended Naw Kham, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre, extradited him to China, and participated in subsequent four-nation law enforcement and security cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州伊萨卡的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Ithaca, New York, USA.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈（元世祖），蒙古帝国第五位大汗、元朝开国皇帝。他是成吉思汗之孙，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的第四子。在位期间统一中国，推行汉化政策并完善官制。他曾下令焚毁《道藏》，追赠丘处机封号，并命令福裕住持少林寺。晚年因对外战争失利及亲人相继去世，为元朝的衰退埋下伏笔。
description.en: Kublai (Emperor Shizu of Yuan), the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founding emperor of the Yuan Dynasty. He was a grandson of Genghis Khan and the fourth son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki. During his reign, he unified China, implemented sinicization policies, and perfected the official system. He ordered the burning of the Daozang, posthumously granted a title to Qiu Chuji, and appointed Fuyu as the abbot of the Shaolin Temple. His later years were marked by failures in foreign military campaigns and the successive deaths of close family members, which laid the groundwork for the decline of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西北郊的清代大型皇家园林，被誉为“万园之园”，咸丰帝出生地，在第二次鸦片战争中被英法联军抢掠并焚毁。
description.en: A large imperial garden complex of the Qing Dynasty in the northwestern suburbs of Beijing, known as the 'Garden of Gardens,' the birthplace of the Xianfeng Emperor, which was looted and burned down by Anglo-French forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 他是梁启超与李蕙仙之子，林徽因的丈夫。作为著名建筑学家、建筑史学家、城市规划师、教育家以及清华大学建筑系教授，他毕业于宾夕法尼亚大学。梁思成一生致力于中国古代建筑和文化遗产的保护与研究，曾任中央研究院院士、中国科学院学部委员，创办了东北大学和清华大学的建筑系，并领导了中华人民共和国国徽的设计工作。
description.en: Son of Liang Qichao and Li Huixian, and husband of Lin Huiyin. He was a renowned Chinese architect, architectural historian, urban planner, and educator, as well as a professor at the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania, Liang Sicheng dedicated his life to the preservation and study of ancient Chinese architecture and cultural heritage. He served as an academician of Academia Sinica and the Chinese Academy of Sciences, founded the architecture departments at Northeastern and Tsinghua Universities, and led the design work of the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 海南是中国设立的经济特区，也是中华人民共和国的省级行政区，也是中国最南端的省级行政区。其部分区域由中华民国、越南、菲律宾和马来西亚实际控制。
description.en: Hainan is a special economic zone established by China and a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, and also its southernmost provincial-level administrative division. Parts of its territory are actually controlled by the Republic of China, Vietnam, the Philippines, and Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的主要男修会之一。在明末清初的西学东渐中扮演关键角色，派遣利玛窦等传教士来华，并于17世纪开始将《易经》引介至欧洲。
description.en: One of the main male religious orders of the Catholic Church. Its members, called Jesuits, played a key role in the first phase of West-to-East knowledge transfer by sending missionaries like Matteo Ricci to China, and began introducing the I Ching to Europe in the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 战国四公子之一。
中华人民共和国的省份，井冈山位于其西南部。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, where the Jinggang Mountains are located in the southwest.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家完全由企业法人持股的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China wholly owned by corporate legal entities.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构，也是中国第一家股份制保险企业，同时也是一个中国综合金融服务集团。郑建源曾通过其控股公司持有该公司大量股份。
description.en: The first commercial insurance institution in the People's Republic of China established by an enterprise, and also the first joint-stock insurance company in China. It is an integrated financial services group, in which Zheng Jianyuan once held a large number of shares through his holding companies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共广东省委副书记，广东省人民政府省长、中共深圳市委书记。中共第二十届中央委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP, Governor of Guangdong Province, and Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP. He is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝是由杨坚建立的中国朝代，历史上承南北朝，下启唐朝。它结束了长期的分裂局面，重新统一了中国，并建立了科举考试体系。该朝代还开始将“省”用于中央政府的一级行政机关。
description.en: The Sui dynasty, founded by Yang Jian, was a Chinese dynasty that succeeded the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceded the Tang dynasty. It ended a long period of division, reunifying China, and established the imperial examination system. This dynasty also began using 'province' as a first-level administrative division of the central government.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝清高宗弘历。其在位期间，“省”作为行政区划名称获得官方认可，年号是清朝使用时间最长的年号，并曾下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定其作为明朝忠臣的功绩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor, the sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty. During his reign, 'province' was officially recognized as an administrative division, his era name was the longest-used in the Qing dynasty, and an imperial edict was issued to posthumously rehabilitate Yuan Chonghuan, affirming his merits as a loyal official of the Ming Dynasty.

zh-cn: 陕西等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区，位于中国中部偏北地区，是内陆省份。为与邻省山西区别，在西方语言中常作“Shaanxi”。历史上，明朝时曾是嘉靖大地震的震中和重灾区。
description.en: An inland provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, located in the north-central part of the country. To distinguish it from the neighboring province of Shanxi in Hanyu Pinyin, its name is often transliterated as 'Shaanxi' in Western languages. Historically, during the Ming dynasty, it was the epicenter and most heavily affected area of the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 商朝帝王
晋公子
秦朝将军
中国古代北方的游牧民族政权，活跃于欧亚草原。他们与西汉长期发生战争，李广利最终投降于此。后来，他们与新朝的关系恶化。
description.en: An ancient nomadic regime from northern China, active across the Eurasian Steppe. They engaged in prolonged conflict with the Western Han, and Li Guangli eventually surrendered to them. Later, their relationship with the Xin Dynasty deteriorated.

description.zh-cn: 与北宋同时期由党项族建立的政权，是宋神宗时期北宋在西部的主要军事对手。该政权后被蒙古所灭。
description.en: A state established by the Tangut people, coexisting with the Northern Song dynasty. It was the primary military adversary of the Northern Song in the west during Emperor Shenzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 宋代名臣
中国远古传说中的部落首领，被道教认为是最早的思想源头。
香港岛是香港三大地域之一，根据《南京条约》，清政府于1842年将其割让给英国。它是香港开埠时最早发展的地区，现为香港的政治、经济、金融和商业中心。岛上最高峰为太平山。
description.en: Hong Kong Island is one of the three main regions of Hong Kong. It was ceded to the United Kingdom by the Qing government in 1842 under the Treaty of Nanking. As the earliest developed area during Hong Kong's founding, it now serves as the city's political, economic, financial, and commercial center. Its highest point is Victoria Peak.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任第六届香港特别行政区行政长官兼国家安全委员会主席及香港理工大学校监。他是香港首位纪律部队出身的行政长官。曾任警务处副处长、保安局副局长、保安局局长及政务司司长等职。任保安局局长期间，他曾形容民主派初选为“歹毒的计划”，并支持警方拘捕行动。因参与镇压反对逃犯条例修订草案运动示威，被美国制裁。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, current Sixth-term Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Chairman of the Committee for Safeguarding National Security, and Chancellor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. He is the first Chief Executive from a disciplined services background in Hong Kong's history. He previously served as Deputy Commissioner of Police, Under Secretary for Security, Secretary for Security, and Chief Secretary for Administration. While Secretary for Security, he described the pro-democracy primaries as a 'vicious plot' and supported police arrest operations. He was sanctioned by the United States for his role in suppressing protests during the anti-extradition bill movement.

description.zh-cn: 最后一任香港总督。

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 前香港的宗主国，也是大英帝国的核心组成部分。
description.en: Former suzerain state of Hong Kong, and the core component of the British Empire.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。它由旧直隶省改称而来，也是河北省工商业联合会的活动范围所在地。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China. It was formerly known as Zhili Province and is also the operational area of the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 已故香港资深影视演员，四朵金花成员之一，担任队长及负责选曲。
description.en: A deceased veteran Hong Kong film and television actress, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, serving as the leader and responsible for song selection.

description.zh-cn: 英语节目主持人。
网红达人。
中华民国国民政府行政院长兼财政部长，亦是银行家及富商，孔子第75代孙。
description.en: A Chinese banker and politician in the Republic of China, he served as Premier and Minister of Finance of the Executive Yuan. He was the 75th generation descendant of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞长期工作和任教的医学院，曾担任副校长等职务。
description.en: The medical school where Zhang Xiaoqian worked and taught for a long time, holding positions such as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 美国另类投资管理公司，于2013年捐助成立清华大学苏世民书院。
description.en: An American alternative investment management company that donated to establish the Schwarzman College at Tsinghua University in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 美国黑石集团董事长
清朝第九位皇帝，道光帝之子，孝钦显皇后之夫，光绪帝的伯父及嗣父，奕䜣的异母兄。他即位后，面对太平天国起事，曾一度想重用林则徐，并罢免了阻挠此事的穆彰阿。作为第二次鸦片战争期间的中国君主，他在英法联军攻入北京后逃往承德避暑山庄，并于次年病逝。他是中国历史上最后一位掌握实际统治权的皇帝。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty, son of the Daoguang Emperor, husband of Empress Xiaocingxian, uncle and adoptive father of the Guangxu Emperor, and Yixin's elder half-brother. After ascending the throne, he faced the Taiping Rebellion and once intended to reinstate Lin Zexu, dismissing Mujaangga who obstructed this decision. As the Chinese monarch during the Second Opium War, he fled to the Chengde Mountain Resort after Anglo-French forces entered Beijing and died there the following year. He was the last emperor in Chinese history to hold actual ruling power.

description.zh-cn: 华人计算机科学家，2000年图灵奖得主，现任清华大学人工智能学院院长、交叉信息研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist, winner of the 2000 Turing Award, and the current Dean of the Institute for Artificial Intelligence and Dean of the Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第六位皇帝，汉武帝之父。他与其父汉文帝共同开创了“文景之治”，并在位期间平定了“七国之乱”。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Western Han dynasty and father of Emperor Wu. He, along with his father Emperor Wen, presided over the 'Rule of Wen and Jing' and suppressed the 'Rebellion of the Seven States' during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝，庙号“世宗”，谥号“孝武皇帝”。在他统治期间批准修建了白渠。他推行“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”，使儒家思想成为官方意识形态，并正式尊《周易》为儒家“五经”之一。在其统治下，征服多个百越王国。因宠幸李夫人而提拔其兄李延年、李广利，后又因李夫人去世及李广利投降而将李氏家族诛灭。晚年多病猜忌，引发巫蛊之祸，错杀太子刘据，逼死皇后卫子夫，后深感后悔。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, with the temple name 'Shizong' and posthumous name 'Xiaowu Emperor'. During his reign, the construction of the Bai Canal was approved. He implemented the policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools of thought and exclusively revering Confucianism', making it the state ideology, and officially revered the I Ching as one of the Confucian 'Five Classics'. Under his reign, he conquered several Baiyue kingdoms. He favored Empress Li and promoted her brothers Li Yannian and Li Guangli, but later had the Li clan exterminated following Empress Li's death and Li Guangli's surrender. In his later years, due to illness and paranoia, he instigated the Witchcraft Delusion, wrongly executing Crown Prince Liu Ju and forcing Empress Wei Zifu to commit suicide, an act he later deeply regretted.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖之一，大西政权的建立者，自称大西皇帝。
description.en: A leader of the peasant rebellions in the late Ming Dynasty and the founder of the Daxi regime.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝嫡长子，卫子夫所生，皇位法定继承人。在巫蛊之祸中，因被江充等人诬陷，无法自辩而被迫起兵，兵败后自缢而死。
description.en: The legitimate eldest son of Emperor Wu of Han and Empress Wei Zifu, and the legal heir to the throne. During the Witchcraft Disaster, he was framed by Jiang Chong and others. Unable to defend himself, he was forced to rebel. After the rebellion failed, he committed suicide by hanging.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝的第二任皇后，太子刘据之母。在巫蛊之祸中支持儿子起兵，兵败后交出皇后玉玺自缢身亡。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Wu of Han and the mother of Crown Prince Liu Ju. She supported her son's rebellion during the Witchcraft Delusion and committed suicide after its failure.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝幼子，巫蛊之祸后，因其他年长皇子或死或不堪，最终被立为太子并继位为汉昭帝，是西汉第八位皇帝。
description.en: The youngest son of Emperor Wu. After the Witchcraft Delusion, with other elder princes either dead or deemed unworthy, he was made Crown Prince and eventually ascended the throne as Emperor Zhao, becoming the eighth emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉权臣，霍去病异母弟。在巫蛊之祸中未受牵连，后成为汉武帝的托孤之臣，辅佐汉昭帝，并在昭帝死后拥立汉宣帝，掌握朝政大权。
description.en: A powerful statesman of the Western Han and half-brother of Huo Qubing. He remained unscathed by the Witchcraft Delusion and became one of the regents appointed by Emperor Wu. He assisted Emperor Zhao and later enthroned Emperor Xuan, holding significant power.

description.zh-cn: 西汉儒家学者，建议“罢黜百家，表彰六经”。
西汉将领，兵败投降匈奴。
中国清朝第三位皇帝，也是清朝入关后的第一位皇帝。他是皇太极第九子，康熙帝之父，孝庄太皇太后之子，多尔衮的侄子。其在位期间，启动了对李自成焚毁的紫禁城的重建工作。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first to rule after entering the Central Plains via Shanhai Pass. He was the ninth son of Hong Taiji, father of Emperor Kangxi, son of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang, and Dorgon's nephew. During his reign, he initiated the reconstruction of the Forbidden City which had been burned by Li Zicheng.

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝妃，康熙帝生母。
清朝初年权臣，康熙帝早期的辅政大臣之一。
description.en: A powerful minister in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents during the early reign of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 德国耶稣会传教士，与顺治帝建立了私人友谊。
清朝将领
由孔子创立的中国古代思想学派，是一个包含哲学、伦理、政治的中国思想体系，强调仁、义、礼、智、信等核心价值观。它以《论语》为核心经典之一。庄子曾对其“以仁义撄人之心”的观点持批评态度。
description.en: A school of thought in ancient China founded by Confucius, it is a Chinese system of philosophical, ethical, and political thought, emphasizing core values like benevolence, righteousness, propriety, wisdom, and trustworthiness. The Analects is one of its core classic texts. Zhuangzi was critical of its concept of 'binding people's hearts with benevolence and righteousness'.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的嫡次子，曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor, he was twice appointed as Crown Prince and later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇贵妃，雍正帝生母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学
中国人民解放军军事政治大学
en: People's Liberation Army National Defense University
National Defense University of PLA China

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府，是中央军委副战区级直属单位。该校于1986年1月15日由军事学院、后勤学院、政治学院合并成立，并于2017年进行了新调整组建。历史上，中国人民解放军曾于1969年由四校合并组建类似机构，但于1977年撤销。王抗平为该校校友，王西欣曾在此学习并获得硕士学位，后担任副校长。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army, a deputy theater-grade unit directly under the Central Military Commission. It was established on January 15, 1986, by merging the Military Academy, Logistics Academy, and Political Academy, and underwent a new restructuring in 2017. Historically, a similar institution was formed in 1969 by the merger of four academies, but it was disbanded in 1977. Wang Kangping is an alumnus, and Wang Xixin studied here, obtained a master's degree, and later served as its vice president.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总后勤部副部长，中将军衔。因贪腐问题被中央军委纪委和中央纪委联合调查。
description.en: Former Deputy Minister of the PLA General Logistics Department, holding the rank of Lieutenant General. He was jointly investigated by the CMC Commission for Discipline Inspection and the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 一份由中国知识分子、维权人士、异见人士等各界人士于2008年发起的宣言，旨在促进中国民主化、改善人权状况，并提出建立中华联邦共和国的构想。
description.en: A declaration initiated in 2008 by Chinese intellectuals, rights activists, dissidents, and others from various sectors, aiming to promote democratization and improve human rights in China, and proposing the establishment of a Federal Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任的第十四世达赖喇嘛，藏传佛教格鲁派的重要领袖，曾于1954年在雍和宫法轮殿讲经。
description.en: The current and 14th Dalai Lama, an important leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who preached in the Hall of the Wheel of the Law at Yonghe Temple in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家及政治犯，因在西单民主墙发表大字报批评邓小平独裁而长期入狱，后流亡美国。
description.en: A Chinese social activist and political prisoner, imprisoned for a long time for criticizing Deng Xiaoping's dictatorship on the Xidan Democracy Wall, and later exiled to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 数学家，曾任清华大学与西南联合大学数学系主任。
杨振宁的原配妻子，杜聿明长女。
杨振宁的第二任妻子。
物理学家。
美国理论物理学家，曾任普林斯顿高等研究院院长，并在伯克利任教期间领导了曼哈顿计划。
description.en: American theoretical physicist who led the Manhattan Project while a professor at Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 一项基础科学原理，指出在弱相互作用中，物理系统在镜像变换下其行为会有所不同。该理论由李政道和杨振宁于1956年提出。
description.en: A fundamental scientific principle stating that the behavior of a physical system can be different from its mirror image in weak interactions. The theory was proposed by Tsung-Dao Lee and Chen-Ning Yang in 1956.

description.zh-cn: 核物理学家，中国原子弹研制的关键人物。
明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子，明宣宗之父，朱高煦之兄。他即位后赦免了建文朝诸臣的家属。
description.en: The fourth Emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of the Yongle Emperor, father of Emperor Xuande, and elder brother of Zhu Gaoxu. After ascending the throne, he pardoned the families of the officials from the Jianwen court.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年，建文帝在位期间，燕王朱棣与建文帝因削藩政策及皇位之争爆发内战。最终，燕王朱棣获胜，夺取皇位，即位为明成祖。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, during the reign of the Jianwen Emperor, a civil war erupted between Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, and the Jianwen Emperor, caused by the policy of reducing the power of imperial princes and a struggle for the throne. Ultimately, Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, emerged victorious, seized the throne, and ascended as the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代最大的类书，由明成祖朱棣下令编纂，收录了明初之前各种学科的文献资料。
description.en: The largest leishu (a type of reference book) in ancient China, commissioned by the Yongle Emperor of the Ming dynasty. It collected a vast amount of literature and knowledge from before the early Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的特务与秘密警察机构，由宦官掌管。魏忠贤在天启年间总督东厂，大肆缉捕迫害异己。
description.en: A spy agency of the Ming dynasty, controlled by eunuchs. Wei Zhongxian commanded the Eastern Depot during the Tianqi era, using it to arrest and persecute his opponents.

birth_place.zh-cn: 元朝江浙等处行中书省台州路宁海县
birth_place.en: Ninghai County, Taizhou Lu, Jiangzhe Province, Yuan Dynasty

death_place.en: Yingtian Prefecture, South Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明代大臣、学者、文学家、儒学大师、思想家。建文帝时期翰林院侍讲、重臣。他参与组织削藩，其著作《叶郑传》和《先府君行状》记载了空印案，并曾请求诛杀李景隆。靖难之变后，因拒绝为朱棣草拟即位诏书并拒绝合作，被处极刑，据传遭诛十族。
description.en: A Ming dynasty minister, scholar, writer, renowned Confucian master, and thinker. He served as a Hanlin Academy lecturer and key advisor to the Jianwen Emperor. He was involved in the policy of reducing the power of imperial princes. His works, 'Biography of Ye and Zheng' and 'Conduct of My Late Father', documented the Empty Seal Case, and he once requested the execution of Li Jinglong. After the Jingnan Campaign, he was executed for refusing to draft the enthronement edict for Zhu Di and for his broader refusal to cooperate, and it is said that his ten degrees of kinship were exterminated.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆，明朝开国功臣李文忠之子，袭封曹国公。作为明朝初期将领，在靖难之役中，初期任建文帝方主帅，后接替耿炳文担任总帅，指挥中央军主力，屡败于燕王朱棣。最终在燕军兵临城下时，于南京打开金川门投降。永乐年间被削爵圈禁，并于永乐末年去世。
description.en: Li Jinglong, son of Li Wenzhong, a founding duke of the Ming Dynasty, inherited the title Duke of Cao. As an early Ming general, during the Jingnan Campaign, he initially served as the chief commander for the Jianwen Emperor's forces. He later took over command from Geng Bingwen, leading the central army's main forces, but suffered repeated defeats against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan. Ultimately, with the Yan army at the city gates, he surrendered in Nanjing by opening the Jinchuan Gate. During the Yongle era, he was stripped of his title, placed under house arrest, and passed away towards the end of the Yongle reign.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣第二子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟。初封高阳王，后晋封汉王。因发动“高煦之乱”谋反失败，被明宣宗废为庶人并以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: The second son of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di of the Ming Dynasty, and brother of the Hongxi Emperor. He was first enfeoffed as the Prince of Gaoyang, and later as the Prince of Han. He was executed by the Xuande Emperor after his failed rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣三子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟，封赵简王。
description.en: Third son of the Yongle Emperor, brother of the Hongxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟，满洲国第二任国务总理大臣。
奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟。
中国政治人物。
中国政治人物。
中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一。事件后遭通缉并流亡海外，先后在法国、美国求学和居住。现为网络“六四档案”、“孙文学校”创办人，柴玲前夫。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China. He became a wanted fugitive after the event and went into exile, studying and residing in France and the United States. He is the founder of the 'June 4th Archive' website and the 'Sun Yat-sen School' online, and the ex-husband of Chai Ling.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市市长，后接替张庆伟担任中共黑龙江省委书记和河北省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Mayor of Shenzhen, and later succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and Governor of Hebei.

zh-cn: 2022年新疆乌鲁木齐高层住宅楼火灾

description.zh-cn: 一起引发公众对防疫政策不满的火灾事件。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
清朝第十位皇帝，孝钦显皇后（慈禧太后）与咸丰帝的独子，光绪帝的堂兄。其年号“同治”意为两宫太后与恭亲王奕䜣共同治理国家。
description.en: The tenth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the only son of Empress Dowager Xiaocin Xian (Cixi) and the Xianfeng Emperor. He was also the cousin of the Guangxu Emperor. His reign title 'Tongzhi' implied joint rule by the two empress dowagers and Prince Gong Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝的皇后，同治年间的两宫皇太后之一。她与慈禧太后一同垂帘听政，是奕䜣的重要政治盟友。
description.en: Empress consort of the Xianfeng Emperor and one of the two empress dowagers during the Tongzhi era. She co-reigned with Empress Dowager Cixi and was an important political ally of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第八子，雍正帝异母弟，也是其政治对手。因参与九子夺嫡，被雍正帝圈禁，改名阿其那，后在禁所病故。人称“八贤王”。他曾获清朝亲王爵位。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor. Due to his involvement in the nine sons' succession struggle, he was imprisoned by the Yongzheng Emperor, forced to change his name to Akina, and later died in confinement. He was known as the 'Eighth Virtuous Prince'. He once held a princely title of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第九子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The ninth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十四子，雍正帝同母弟。
description.en: The fourteenth son of the Kangxi Emperor, a full brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝异母弟、得力助手。他是第一代怡亲王，也是清朝有史以来第九位铁帽子王，第一位因功受封的铁帽子王。雍正帝即位后改名允祥，逝世后获准改回原名，谥号“贤”。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor, and a key assistant to him. He was the first Prince Yi, the 9th iron-cap prince in Qing history, and the first to be granted the title for merit. He changed his name to Yunxiang after the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, and was allowed to revert to his original name posthumously. His posthumous name was 'Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第三子。
康熙帝第十子。
清朝将领，雍正时期重臣，后被雍正帝赐死。
description.en: An important official during the Yongzheng era of the Qing Dynasty, later forced to commit suicide by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正两朝重臣，佟国维之子，康熙帝表弟，孝懿仁皇后之弟，雍正帝舅舅。
description.en: An important official during the Kangxi and Yongzheng eras of the Qing Dynasty, son of Tung-gowei, cousin of the Kangxi Emperor, younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren, and uncle of the Yongzheng Emperor.

en: Succession struggle of the nine princes

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙末年，九位皇子争夺皇位的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event during the late Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty where nine of his sons vied for the throne.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市东城区
location.en: Dongcheng District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于北京中轴线中心的宫殿建筑群，是中国明清两代二十四位皇帝的皇家宫殿。始建于1406年，1420年落成，是世界上现存规模最大、最完整的宫殿建筑。孝庄太皇太后曾在此长期居住并逝世，雍正帝即位后也曾迁入此地。现为故宫博物院所在地。
description.en: The palace complex at the center of Beijing's central axis served as the imperial palace for 24 emperors of the Ming and Qing dynasties. Construction started in 1406 and was completed in 1420, making it the world's largest and most complete palace complex. Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang resided here for a long time and passed away, and the Yongzheng Emperor also moved here after ascending the throne. It now houses the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐高宗李治与武则天之幼子，唐玄宗李隆基之父，李显和安定公主之弟。他曾两次登基、两次禅位，是唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, the youngest son of Emperor Gaozong Li Zhi and Empress Wu Zetian, father of Emperor Xuanzong Li Longji, and younger brother of Li Xian and Princess Anding. He ascended the throne twice and abdicated twice, serving as the fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上唯一获正史承认的女性皇帝，武周开国君主。唐玄宗的祖母，安定公主之母，曾为唐高宗昭仪。她将洛阳命名为“神都”，相传曾因牡丹不从其令而将其贬至洛阳。
description.en: The only female emperor in Chinese history recognized by official history, and the founding monarch of the Wu Zhou dynasty. She was the grandmother of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang, mother of Princess Anding, and once Emperor Gaozong's Zhaoyi. She named Luoyang 'Shendu' (Divine Capital), and legend has it that she exiled the peony to Luoyang for disobeying her command.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，杨贵妃的堂兄。与安禄山不和，是安史之乱的导火索之一，后在马嵬驿兵变中被杀。
description.en: Chancellor of the Tang Dynasty and cousin of Imperial Consort Yang. His conflict with An Lushan was a major catalyst for the rebellion, and he was killed during the Mawei Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主，唐高宗李治与武则天的小女儿，唐玄宗的姑姑，安定公主的同胞妹妹。她与李隆基（即唐玄宗）之间存在政治斗争，在玄宗即位初期权倾朝野。因不满当时身为太子的李隆基，她曾试图劝说其流产子嗣李亨（即后来的唐肃宗）。最终，她在与玄宗的政治斗争中失败被赐死。
description.en: A princess of the Tang dynasty, the youngest daughter of Emperor Gaozong Li Zhi and Empress Wu Zetian, an aunt of Emperor Xuanzong, and a full sister of Princess Anding. She was involved in a political struggle with Li Longji (who later became Emperor Xuanzong), holding immense power during the early years of his reign. Dissatisfied with Li Longji when he was the crown prince, she once attempted to persuade him to abort his son, Li Heng (who later became Emperor Suzong). Ultimately, she was defeated in the political struggle against Xuanzong and was forced to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期宰相，以“口蜜腹剑”的权术著称。他为巩固权位，支持寿王李瑁，与被立为太子的李亨为敌并多次构陷。此外，他还建议重用胡人将领，间接促使安禄山势力坐大，为安史之乱埋下隐患。史载，高适中第后，仅被其授予县尉一职，可见其排挤贤才、专权弄势的手段。
description.en: A chancellor during Emperor Xuanzong's reign, known for his 'sweet words and treacherous heart' (口蜜腹剑). To consolidate his power, he supported Prince Li Mao of Shou, making him an enemy of the designated crown prince Li Heng, whom he repeatedly attempted to frame. Furthermore, he advocated for the heavy use of non-Han generals, which indirectly led to An Lushan's growing influence and laid the groundwork for the An Lushan Rebellion. Historical records show that after Gao Shi passed the examination, he was only appointed to the minor post of county sheriff, demonstrating his methods of sidelining talented individuals and monopolizing power.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝，由李渊建立，是中国历史上的一个重要朝代，被视为黄金时代之一。其初期，涿郡被复名为幽州。此朝代不仅孕育了著名诗人白居易，也是安定公主生活的时代背景。房玄龄在此期间担任宰相等重要职务。唐朝与吐蕃帝国同时期存在，两者间既有战争也有和亲。然而，安史之乱导致其国力由盛转衰，唐昭宗为其晚期皇帝。
description.en: The Tang Dynasty, founded by Li Yuan, was an important period in Chinese history and is considered one of its golden ages. In its early period, Zhuo Commandery was renamed back to You Province. This dynasty not only nurtured the renowned poet Bai Juyi but also served as the historical backdrop for Princess Anding's life. Fang Xuanling held important positions such as chancellor during this era. The Tang Dynasty coexisted with the Tibetan Empire, engaging in both warfare and marriage alliances. However, its national power declined from its peak due to the An Lushan Rebellion, with Emperor Zhaozong being one of its late rulers.

description.zh-cn: 英国首都及最大都市，英格兰首府，也是东京都的姊妹友好都市。由罗马人于公元43年建立，现为世界领先的全球城市之一，在艺术、商业、教育、金融、媒体、旅游和交通方面具有显著地位。这里也是马克思长期流亡、进行研究和最终逝世的地方。
description.en: The capital and largest city of the United Kingdom and England, and a sister city of Tokyo Metropolis. Founded by the Romans in 43 AD, it is now one of the world's leading global cities, with significant influence in arts, commerce, education, finance, media, tourism, and transport. It is also the place where Marx lived in exile for a long time, conducted his research, and eventually died.

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国古典哲学的集大成者。其哲学思想对马克思和巴枯宁产生了深远影响。他曾是路德维希·费尔巴哈在柏林的导师。在其《哲学史讲演录》中，他对孔子及《论语》持负面评价，认为其内容是“毫无出色之处的东西”，是常识道德。
description.en: A German philosopher and a major figure in German classical philosophy. His philosophical ideas profoundly influenced both Marx and Bakunin. He was also Ludwig Feuerbach's teacher in Berlin. In his 'Lectures on the History of Philosophy', he expressed a negative view of Confucius and the Analects, considering its content to be 'something without anything outstanding' and common-sense morality.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪苏格兰古典政治经济学家和哲学家，被誉为“经济学之父”或“资本主义之父”。其自由市场经济理论影响深远，曾启迪福泽谕吉等思想家。
description.en: An 18th-century Scottish classical political economist and philosopher, hailed as 'The Father of Economics' or 'The Father of Capitalism'. His free-market economic theories had a profound influence, inspiring thinkers like Fukuzawa Yukichi.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠养子。
清朝肃亲王，皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位，后遭多尔衮迫害。
description.en: Qing Dynasty Prince Su, the eldest son of Hong Taiji, who contended with Dorgon for the throne and was later persecuted by him.

description.zh-cn: 明朝灭亡后，由明朝宗室在南方建立的抵抗清朝的政权，后被清朝所灭。
description.en: Regimes established by Ming imperial family members in southern China after the fall of the Ming dynasty, resisting the Qing and eventually conquered by them.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举候选人，曾任政务司司长、财政司司长。他是梁振英的主要竞争对手，曾被刘梦熊公开敦促退选。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, candidate in the 2012 Chief Executive election, and Leung Chun-ying's main rival. He previously served as Chief Secretary for Administration and Financial Secretary. Lew Mon-hung publicly urged him to withdraw from the race.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝溥仪的嫡妻和皇后，亦是满洲国皇后。
description.en: The primary consort and empress of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, and also the empress of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝溥仪的淑妃，后与溥仪离婚。她是中国历史上唯一一位担任过教职的皇妃，也曾任第四届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: The Shu Fei (Consort Shu) of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, whom she later divorced. She is the only imperial consort in Chinese history to have worked as a schoolteacher, and also served as a member of the 4th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪的福贵人。
溥仪的堂侄与嗣子。

en: International Military Tribunal for the Far East

description.zh-cn: 二战后审判日本甲级战犯的国际法庭。

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。其前身是美国第一个联邦外交机构，成立于1789年7月21日，至同年9月15日被国务院取代。该部门曾邀请张孝骞赴美考察讲学。
description.en: The federal executive department of the United States responsible for foreign policy and international relations, equivalent to the foreign ministry of other countries. Its predecessor was the first federal foreign affairs agency of the United States, established on July 21, 1789, and superseded by the Department of State on September 15, 1789. This department also invited Zhang Xiaoqian to the United States for an academic tour.

description.zh-cn: 本名倪聪，香港作家、编剧、评论家、演员，与金庸、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他是亦舒的胞兄，也是古龙的莫逆之交。其作品以科幻小说《卫斯理系列》最为人所知，并以其鲜明的反共政治立场而闻名。
description.en: Ni Kuang, born Ni Cong, was a Hong Kong writer, screenwriter, critic, and actor, known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong', alongside Jin Yong, Wong Jim, and Chua Lam. He was the elder brother of Yi Shu and a very close friend of Gu Long. His works are best known for the science fiction series 'Wisely Series', and he was also famous for his outspoken anti-communist political stance.

description.zh-cn: 李连杰的前妻
李连杰的妻子
香港电影导演、编剧、监制及演员，香港电影新浪潮的重要人物之一。施南生的前夫。
description.en: Hong Kong film director, screenwriter, producer, and actor. He is one of the key figures of the Hong Kong New Wave cinema and the ex-husband of Nansun Shi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的桂系军阀派系，由李宗仁、白崇禧等人领导。曾支持鲁涤平，后又将其免职，引发鲁案。
description.en: A Guangxi warlord clique during the Republic of China era, led by Li Zongren, Bai Chongxi, and others. It initially supported Lu Diping but later dismissed him, triggering the Lu Diping Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代画家、美术教育家
中国周朝时期位于今山东省的一个重要诸侯国，以“礼义之邦”著称。其定都曲阜长达八百余年，也是孔子和子路的家乡。
description.en: A major vassal state during the Zhou dynasty of ancient China, located in modern-day Shandong province. It was known as the 'State of Rites and Propriety' and had its capital at Qufu for over 800 years, also being the homeland of Confucius and Zi Lu.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期的思想家，道家学派的创始人，《道德经》的作者。被道教奉为道祖、教主，其思想对庄周产生了深远影响。
description.en: A pre-Qin Chinese thinker and founder of the Taoist school of thought, he authored the 'Tao Te Ching'. Revered by Taoism as the Ancestor of Tao and its patriarch, his ideas profoundly influenced Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国人，孔子最得意的弟子，位列孔门十哲和七十二贤之首，后世尊称为“复圣”。
description.en: A native of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, he was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism and the Seventy-two Disciples. He is posthumously honored as the 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。以其勇武、忠诚、信守承诺而著称。曾任卫国蒲邑宰、大夫孔悝的家臣，在卫国内乱中为救孔悝而殉职。
description.en: A prominent disciple of Confucius and one of the Ten Philosophers of the Confucian school. Known for his bravery, loyalty, and trustworthiness. He served as the governor of Pu in the state of Wei and as a retainer to the grand master Kong Kui, and died during a coup in Wei while trying to save his lord.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈之孙，皇太子真金之子，元朝第二位皇帝。在忽必烈死后，由伯颜等大臣拥立继位。
description.en: Grandson of Kublai Khan and son of Crown Prince Zhenjin, he was the second emperor of the Yuan dynasty. He was enthroned with the support of ministers like Bayan after Kublai's death.

description.zh-cn: 李锐之女，传记作家、机械工程师，斯坦福大学胡佛研究所客座研究员。
description.en: Daughter of Li Rui, a biographer, mechanical engineer, and visiting fellow at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东长子毛岸英的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong's eldest son, Mao Anying.

description.zh-cn: 保安局的前身为1941年4月设立并专责香港防务的机构，1973年5月由防卫科改称而来。现为香港特别行政区政府的决策局之一，负责维持公共秩序、出入境、海关、监狱、禁毒、纪律部队及内部保安等事务。曾提出《逃犯条例》修订草案，并曾点名批评《明报》刊登的评论文章。
description.en: The Security Bureau's predecessor was established in April 1941, responsible for Hong Kong's defense, and was renamed from the Defence Branch in May 1973. It is now one of the policy bureaus of the Hong Kong SAR government, responsible for public order, immigration, customs, prisons, drug control, disciplined services, and internal security. It previously proposed the extradition bill amendment and publicly criticized a commentary published in Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 源自美国的全球最大视频分享网站，于2006年被Google收购，现为Google子公司。
description.en: The world's largest video-sharing website, acquired by Google in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构，同时是其下议院和唯一直接民选机构。该机构曾于1996年授予魏京生萨哈罗夫奖，并在2023年将萨哈罗夫奖追授给玛莎·阿米尼和“女性、生命、自由”运动，同时通过决议谴责伊朗政府。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union, also its lower house and the only directly elected institution. It awarded the Sakharov Prize to Wei Jingsheng in 1996, and posthumously awarded the 2023 Sakharov Prize to Mahsa Amini and the 'Woman, Life, Freedom' movement, while also passing a resolution condemning the Iranian government.

description.zh-cn: 泰国总理
中华人民共和国的国家电视台，2018年并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。崔永元和芮成钢都曾在此工作，该台也播出了王林清的电视认罪画面。
description.en: China's national television broadcaster. In 2018, it was merged into the newly established China Media Group. Cui Yongyuan and Rui Chenggang formerly worked here, and the station also broadcasted Wang Linqing's televised confession.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯国防部长。
清朝第七位皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子，其母为孝仪纯皇后。他也是清军入关后的第五位皇帝。在位期间，他赐死了和珅，并多次对丰绅殷德进行惩罚和任命。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty and the 15th son of the Qianlong Emperor. His mother was Empress Xiaoyichun. He was also the fifth emperor after the Qing conquest. During his reign, he ordered the death of Heshen and repeatedly punished and appointed Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝乾隆帝第二任皇后
清朝康熙、雍正、乾隆三朝重臣，曾任军机大臣、大学士，雍正帝遗命辅政大臣之一。
description.en: A high-ranking official who served the Kangxi, Yongzheng, and Qianlong emperors. He served as a Grand Councillor and Grand Secretary, and was one of the regents appointed by Emperor Yongzheng's will.

description.zh-cn: 清朝中期名将、重臣。
乾隆帝皇长子。
原重庆市公安局常务局长、副局长、司法局局长，在薄熙来发起的“打黑”运动中被查处并判处死刑。
description.en: Former Executive Deputy Director, Deputy Director of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, and Director of the Justice Bureau, who was investigated and sentenced to death during the 'strike black' campaign initiated by Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、经济学者。他曾任中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市人民政府市长，并在薄熙来主政重庆期间长期担任市长一职。他还是全国人大财经委员会副主任委员。在重庆任内，因其在经济发展和房价控制方面的表现而知名，是重庆经济发展的重要人物。
description.en: A Chinese politician and economist. He served as Deputy Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China and Mayor of Chongqing for a long time during Bo Xilai's tenure. He also held the position of Vice Chairman of the Finance and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress. During his time in Chongqing, he was known for his performance in economic development and housing price control, and was a key figure in the city's economic progress.

description.zh-cn: 美国推行的贸易保护主义法案，提高了关税，被认为加剧了全球贸易崩溃和大萧条。
纳粹主义是德国纳粹党的极权主义意识形态，在大萧条和复仇主义情绪的推动下兴起，最终导致了魏玛共和国的倒台。它具体表现为与纳粹党相关的意识形态和实践。
description.en: Nazism is the totalitarian ideology of the Nazi Party in Germany. It emerged, fueled by the Great Depression and revanchist sentiments, leading to the downfall of the Weimar Republic. It was specifically manifested as the ideology and practices associated with the Nazi Party.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是一个位于北美洲北部的联邦制、君主立宪制及议会制国家，亦是英联邦和法语国家及地区国际组织的成员。知名艺人叶蒨文幼时随家人移民并持有其国籍。近期，加拿大政府谴责伊朗镇压示威，并对伊朗道德警察及其他官员实施了制裁。
description.en: Canada is a federal, constitutional monarchy and parliamentary country located in northern North America, and is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie. Famous artist Sally Yeh immigrated here with her family as a child and holds its citizenship. Recently, its government condemned Iran's crackdown on protests and imposed sanctions on Iran's morality police and other officials.

description.zh-cn: 大洋洲国家。其联邦政府于2021年废除了维多利亚州与中国签订的“一带一路”协议。邓亮洪曾在此寻求政治庇护。
description.en: An Oceanian country. Its federal government abolished the "Belt and Road" agreement signed by Victoria with China in 2021. Tang Liang Hong once sought political asylum here.

description.zh-cn: 美国的中央银行系统，在威尔逊总统任内通过《联邦储备法案》而建立。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States, created during the presidency of Woodrow Wilson with the enactment of the Federal Reserve Act.

zh-cn: 国家社会主义德国工人党

description.zh-cn: 美国第31任总统，在大萧条开始时就任，并在1932年选举中被罗斯福击败。
description.en: 31st President of the United States, defeated by Roosevelt in the 1932 election.

description.zh-cn: 英国经济学家，凯恩斯主义的创始人。
奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，1933年至1945年间担任德国总理和元首。作为第二次世界大战的发动者和墨索里尼在二战中的主要盟友，其崛起与大萧条密切相关。1944年盟军接近巴黎时，他曾下令摧毁埃菲尔铁塔及城市。
description.en: Austrian-born German politician and leader of the Nazi Party, who served as Chancellor and Führer of Germany from 1933 to 1945. As the initiator of World War II and Mussolini's main ally, his rise was closely linked to the Great Depression. In 1944, as the Allies approached Paris, he ordered the destruction of the Eiffel Tower and the city.

zh-cn: 玛丽-安东妮‧约瑟芬‧珍妮‧德‧哈布斯堡-洛林
en: Maria Antonia Josepha Johanna von Habsburg-Lothringen

description.zh-cn: 奥地利女大公，路易十六的王后，通过婚姻成为法国和纳瓦拉的末代王后。她在法国大革命期间被推翻，并被革命法庭判处叛国罪，最终被送上断头台。
description.en: Archduchess of Austria who became the last Queen of France and Navarre through her marriage to Louis XVI. She was overthrown during the French Revolution, convicted of high treason by the Revolutionary Tribunal, and executed by guillotine.

description.zh-cn: 统治法国的君主王朝，在法国大革命中被推翻。
中国共产党内部对改革开放持保留或反对态度的政治派别。在八六学潮后，该派系将学潮归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，并成功施压使其下台。
description.en: A political faction within the Communist Party of China. After the 1986 student demonstrations, this faction blamed the protests on Hu Yaobang's leniency and successfully pressured him into resigning.

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家、记者，国家法西斯党领袖，法西斯主义创始人。他于1922年至1943年担任意大利王国首相，期间代表意大利王国签署了《拉特兰条约》，并于1943年至1945年担任意大利社会共和国的国家元首。
description.en: Italian politician and journalist who founded and led the National Fascist Party. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1922 to 1943, during which he signed the Lateran Treaty on behalf of Italy, and Duce of the Italian Social Republic from 1943 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 由协约国与德国签订，正式结束第一次世界大战的和平条约。条约内容不仅包含建立国际联盟和对德国施加的严厉条款，其中关于山东问题的条款也引发了中国的五四运动。
description.en: The most important peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and Germany that officially brought World War I to an end. It included the covenant for the League of Nations, and its clauses concerning the Shandong Problem also triggered the May Fourth Movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙国民军领袖，后成为西班牙独裁者。
1918年至1992年间存在的中欧国家。
description.en: A Central European country that existed from 1918 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 印度是位于南亚印度次大陆上的国家，是世界人口第一大国和世界第五大经济体。该国拥有核武器，并被视为潜在的超级大国之一。印度与中华人民共和国存在边界争议，并因中巴经济走廊穿越其主权争议地区，多次反对“一带一路”倡议。印度也是金砖国家创始成员国。
description.en: India is a country in South Asia on the Indian subcontinent, the world's most populous country and the fifth-largest economy. It is a recognized nuclear-weapon state and considered one of the potential superpowers. India has border disputes with the People's Republic of China and has repeatedly opposed the 'Belt and Road' Initiative due to the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor passing through its disputed territories. India is also a founding member of BRICS.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，欧盟创始成员国之一，梵蒂冈城邦位于其首都罗马市内。曾是七国集团中首个加入“一带一路”倡议的国家，但于2023年宣布退出。
description.en: A European country and an EU founding member, within whose capital, Rome, Vatican City is located. It was the first G7 country to join the 'Belt and Road Initiative', but announced its withdrawal in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议。该国于2023年10月宣布退出“一带一路”倡议。
description.en: A country with sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands. It announced its withdrawal from the 'Belt and Road' initiative in October 2023.

description.zh-cn: 微软公司创始人，曾任董事长，“一带一路”计划的明确支持者，并将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为2015年的好消息之一。
description.en: Founder and former chairman of Microsoft Corporation, a clear supporter of the 'Belt and Road' initiative, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of the good news stories of 2015.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山创立的革命组织，部分成员及力量支持了自立军起义。
description.en: A revolutionary organization founded by Sun Yat-sen, some of whose members and forces supported the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清末大臣，曾任四川总督。在保路运动中，他采取强硬镇压手段，于1911年9月7日诱捕运动领袖并下令开枪，制造“成都血案”，激化了矛盾。
description.en: A late Qing official who served as the Viceroy of Sichuan. During the Railway Protection Movement, he adopted harsh repressive measures, arresting its leaders and ordering troops to fire on protesters on September 7, 1911, creating the 'Chengdu Massacre' and escalating the conflict.

description.zh-cn: 一个由土耳其人建立的帝国，其扩张促进了伊斯兰教的传播，也是最后一个哈里发国。它也是同盟国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: An empire founded by Turkish tribes whose expansion facilitated the spread of Islam and which was the last caliphate. It was also one of the main member states of the Central Powers.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国是一个存在于1867年至1918年间的中欧二元君主国，由奥地利帝国和匈牙利王国组成，也是同盟国的主要成员国之一。弗朗茨·斐迪南是其皇储，梅耶林惨案发生于该国。
description.en: Austria-Hungary was a dual monarchy in Central Europe from 1867 to 1918, consisting of the Austrian Empire and the Kingdom of Hungary, and was one of the main member states of the Central Powers. Franz Ferdinand was its heir presumptive, and the Mayerling incident took place there.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·路德维希大公的长子，在其父放弃继承权后成为奥匈帝国推定继承人，后于萨拉热窝被刺杀，引发第一次世界大战。
description.en: The eldest son of Archduke Karl Ludwig. He became the heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne after his father renounced his rights. His assassination in Sarajevo triggered World War I.

location.zh-cn: 苏联乌克兰苏维埃社会主义共和国普里皮亚特

description.zh-cn: 1986年4月26日发生在苏联乌克兰普里皮亚季市切尔诺贝利核电站的核反应堆破损事故，是历史上最严重的核电事故，被国际核事件分级表评为最高的第七级事件。
description.en: A catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Pripyat, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. It is the worst nuclear power plant accident in history and is one of only two nuclear energy accidents rated at seven—the maximum severity—on the International Nuclear Event Scale.

description.zh-cn: 前苏联加盟共和国，于1990年3月11日率先宣布独立。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十三集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第五十四集团军
en: 54th Group Army of the PLA Ground Force
54th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军中部战区陆军下辖的集团军之一，后改编为第八十三集团军。
description.en: Formerly one of the group armies under the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force, it was later reorganized into the 83rd Group Army.

zh-cn: 约翰·菲茨杰拉德·肯尼迪

description.zh-cn: 第35任美国总统，1961年至1963年任职，任内处理了古巴导弹危机等重大事件，1963年11月22日在达拉斯遇刺身亡。
description.en: The 35th President of the United States, serving from 1961 until his assassination in 1963. His presidency included handling major events like the Cuban Missile Crisis. He was assassinated on November 22, 1963, in Dallas.

birth_place.zh-cn: 布鲁克莱恩 (马萨诸塞州)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国家安全的组成部门，参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of national security, which participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党及其领导的中华人民共和国提出的政治目标与军事行动计划，旨在结束中华民国在台湾的统治，实现中国统一。该计划包含“武力统一”和“和平统一”两种策略。
description.en: A political goal and military action plan proposed by the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, aiming to end the rule of the Republic of China in Taiwan and achieve Chinese unification. The plan includes both 'armed unification' and 'peaceful unification' strategies.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆艺术家、社会活动家及异见人士，诗人艾青之子，活跃于建筑、艺术、影像和社会文化评论领域。他曾因调查川震遇难学生名单，其志愿者屡受地方政府扣留。
description.en: A Chinese contemporary artist, activist, and dissident. He is the son of poet Ai Qing and is active in the fields of architecture, art, film, and social and cultural criticism. He is notable for his investigation into the student casualties of the Sichuan earthquake, a process during which his volunteers were repeatedly detained by local authorities.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜王朝是朝鲜半岛历史上的一个由李成桂建立的统一王朝，也是朝鲜半岛最后一个统一王朝，统治时间为1392年至1897年。它最初亲明，后在丁卯战争中被迫与后金结盟。作为当时朝鲜半岛的统治政权，它名义上是清朝的藩属国，也是战争爆发的核心争端地区。在征韩论时期，它采取锁国政策，并被福泽谕吉在《脱亚论》中视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: The Joseon Dynasty was a unified dynasty in the history of the Korean Peninsula, founded by Yi Seong-gye, and also its last unified dynasty, ruling from 1392 to 1897. It was initially pro-Ming but was forced into an alliance with the Later Jin after the First Manchu invasion of Korea. As the ruling power on the Korean peninsula at that time, it was nominally a vassal state of the Qing dynasty and a core disputed area for the outbreak of war. During the Seikanron debate, it adopted a policy of isolationism and was regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与日本在甲午战争后签订的不平等条约。该条约导致中国割地赔款并丧失多项主权，同时规定重庆成为向日本开放的内陆通商口岸之一。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and Japan after the First Sino-Japanese War. It resulted in China ceding territory, paying indemnities, losing sovereignty, and stipulated that Chongqing would become one of the inland treaty ports opened to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝海军将领，北洋水师提督。在甲午战争威海卫之战中兵败后，为国服鸦片自尽殉国。
description.en: A naval officer of the Qing dynasty and the Admiral of the Beiyang Fleet. After being defeated in the Battle of Weihaiwei during the First Sino-Japanese War, he committed suicide by taking opium.

description.zh-cn: 明治天皇是日本第122代天皇，大日本帝国的第一代大元帅。作为国家元首，他积极推动军事扩张，领导了甲午战争和日俄战争，并见证了日本从一个孤立的封建国家向工业化世界强国的转变。他在1889年2月11日签署并公布了《大日本帝国宪法》，对日本的现代化进程具有深远影响。
description.en: Emperor Meiji, the 122nd Emperor of Japan and the first Grand Marshal of the Empire of Japan. As head of state, he actively promoted military expansion, leading Japan through the First Sino-Japanese War and the Russo-Japanese War, and witnessed its transformation from an isolated feudal state into an industrialized world power. He signed and promulgated the Constitution of the Empire of Japan on February 11, 1889, profoundly impacting Japan's modernization process.

description.zh-cn: 日本近代政治家，明治维新元老，曾四次担任日本内阁总理大臣（亦是首任）。他曾于甲午战争期间担任日本首相，并任首任统监府统监。戊戌政变后，他帮助梁启超成功逃亡至日本。
description.en: Japanese modern politician and Meiji Restoration elder, who served four terms as Prime Minister of Japan (also the first). He served as Prime Minister during the First Sino-Japanese War and was the first Resident-General of Korea. After the Wuxu Coup, he helped Liang Qichao successfully escape to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，官至户部尚书、军机大臣，光绪帝的老师。他曾奏准暂停海军购买外洋枪炮船只，被认为是李鸿章的政敌，并阻挠北洋水师的经费拨款。他反对洋务运动，并与奕䜣一同在甲申易枢中被贬，二人政见不合。
description.en: A prominent statesman in the late Qing dynasty, who served as Minister of Revenue and Grand Councilor, and was a tutor to the Guangxu Emperor. He approved the suspension of navy purchases of foreign cannons and ships, was considered a political rival of Li Hongzhang, and obstructed funding for the Beiyang Fleet. He opposed the Self-Strengthening Movement and was demoted along with Yixin in the Jiashen Purge, which highlighted their political differences.

description.zh-cn: 蔡英文政府首任行政院院长，其内阁上任后撤回对126名占领行政院行动者的刑事告诉。
太平天国早期核心领袖、东王，掌握军政实权，后在天京事变中被杀。
太平天国早期核心领袖，被封为翼王。因天京事变及洪秀全猜忌而出走。

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 1919年至1948年间在朝鲜日治时期于中国上海成立的流亡政府。
description.en: An exile government established in Shanghai, China during the Japanese colonial period, active from 1919 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国前总统，韩国民主运动领袖，金泳三的继任总统。他曾推行“阳光政策”，并与金泳三、金钟泌并称为“三金”，在韩国政坛上既是竞争对手也是合作伙伴。其三个儿子也曾担任国会议员。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and Kim Young-sam's successor as president of the Republic of Korea. He implemented the 'Sunshine Policy'. Along with Kim Young-sam and Kim Jong-pil, he was one of the 'Three Kims,' who were both rivals and partners in South Korean politics. His three sons also served as members of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国史上首位女性总统，因崔顺实事件被弹劾下台。她在任期间，曾与城南市长李在明在政策上多有摩擦。
description.en: First female president in South Korean history. She was impeached and removed from office due to the Choi Soon-sil scandal. During her tenure, she had numerous policy conflicts with Lee Jae-myung when he was Mayor of Seongnam.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大韩民国庆尚北道安东市
birth_place.en: Andong, North Gyeongsang Province, Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国进步派政治人物及律师，现任韩国总统。曾任京畿道知事、城南市市长、共同民主党代表、韩国国会议员。
description.en: A South Korean progressive politician and lawyer, currently serving as the President of South Korea. Formerly served as the Governor of Gyeonggi Province, Mayor of Seongnam, leader of the Democratic Party, and a member of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，金正日之子。现任朝鲜劳动党总书记和国务委员会委员长。曾于2018年与文在寅共同签署《板门店宣言》，并与唐纳德·特朗普举行多次首脑会晤。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son of Kim Jong-il. He currently serves as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the State Affairs Commission. He co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Moon Jae-in in 2018 and held multiple summits with Donald Trump.

en: National Assembly of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的最高立法机关，是韩国三权分立宪政体制中的重要组成部分。在2024年戒严期间，国会议员集会并通过决议，成功废除了戒严令。李在明曾为国会议员。
description.en: The supreme legislative body of the Republic of Korea, an important component of the country's constitutional system of separation of powers. During the 2024 martial law, its members convened and passed a resolution to successfully nullify the martial law decree. Lee Jae-myung was a member of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国宪法裁判机构。
韩国政治人物，现任韩国国会议长。2024年戒严期间，他召集国会会议，并宣布废除戒严令的决议获通过。
description.en: South Korean politician and current Speaker of the National Assembly. During the 2024 martial law, he convened a session of the National Assembly and announced the passage of the resolution to nullify it.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，德国候任总理。
德国政治家、外交家，曾任普鲁士王国首相，德意志帝国首任首相（总理）。因其“铁血政策”被称为“铁血宰相”，通过一系列战争主导了德意志的统一。在位期间，沙皇亚历山大三世对其产生了反感。
description.en: A German statesman and diplomat, Minister President of Prussia, and the first Chancellor of the German Empire. Known as the 'Iron Chancellor' for his 'iron and blood' policy, he orchestrated the unification of Germany through a series of wars. During his tenure, Alexander III developed an aversion towards him.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士国王及德意志帝国第一任皇帝。亚历山大三世对其产生反感。
description.en: King of Prussia and the first German Emperor, towards whom Alexander III developed an aversion.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大的基督教教会，由罗马主教（即教宗）领导。
description.en: The largest Christian church, led by the Bishop of Rome (the Pope).

description.zh-cn: 德国主要政党之一。
德国政党。在十一月革命后成为执政党，领导了魏玛共和国的建立，并镇压了更激进的左翼起义。
description.en: A German political party. It became the ruling party after the November Revolution, led the establishment of the Weimar Republic, and suppressed more radical left-wing uprisings.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃嫔。
光绪帝的妃嫔，珍妃之姐。
清朝第八位皇帝，光绪帝和载沣的祖父，咸丰帝之父。其在位期间爆发了第一次鸦片战争。在鸦片问题上，他最初支持林则徐的严禁政策并下令终止鸦片贸易，但在战争爆发后态度转变，将林则徐革职。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty, grandfather of Guangxu and Zaifeng, and father of Xianfeng. During his reign, the First Opium War broke out. On the opium issue, he initially supported Lin Zexu's strict prohibition policy and ordered him to end the opium trade, but changed his stance after the war's outbreak, leading to Lin's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝，刘禅之父。他被张松视为可以取代刘璋的明主，并在张松的协助下进入益州，最终夺取了该地。
description.en: Founding emperor of Shu Han, father of Liu Shan. He was seen by Zhang Song as a worthy ruler to replace Liu Zhang, and with Zhang Song's assistance, he entered Yi Province and eventually seized control of it.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉是中国历史上三国时期西南方的国家之一，由刘备建立，国号为“汉”。在《三国演义》中，作者以蜀汉为中心，体现了“尊刘反曹”的倾向。
description.en: Shu Han was one of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, located in southwestern China, founded by Liu Bei with the official state name of 'Han'. In 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', the narrative centers on Shu Han, reflecting a pro-Liu, anti-Cao bias.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏后期名将。因建立灭蜀奇功，官至太尉。后遭钟会、卫瓘诬陷谋反而被杀。
description.en: A prominent military general of the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period. He reached the rank of Grand Marshal for his decisive role in the conquest of Shu Han. He was later falsely accused of rebellion by Zhong Hui and Wei Guan and killed.

zh-cn: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，旨在通过教育、科学和文化促进国际合作。巩俐于2000年被任命为该组织的“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations aimed at promoting international cooperation through education, science, and culture. Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第三位皇帝，赵德芳的七世孙。他即位前曾藩封于恭州（今重庆），即位后认为此地是“双重喜庆”之地，遂将其升格并赐名“重庆”。
description.en: The third emperor of the Southern Song dynasty and a seventh-generation descendant of Zhao Defang. Before his accession, he was enfeoffed in Gongzhou (present-day Chongqing). Upon ascending the throne, he viewed it as a 'double celebration', elevating its status and renaming it 'Chongqing'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第二位皇帝，宋高宗养子。他由高宗选为继承人，使宋朝皇位重归太祖一脉，是宋太祖七世孙（赵德芳六世孙）。即位后为岳飞平反，致力于恢复中原，也是宋光宗赵惇之父。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Song dynasty and adopted son of Emperor Gaozong. He was chosen by Gaozong as his successor, thereby returning the imperial throne to Taizu's lineage. He was a seventh-generation descendant of Emperor Taizu (and a sixth-generation descendant of Zhao Defang). After ascending the throne, he rehabilitated Yue Fei, was dedicated to recovering the northern territories, and was also the father of Emperor Guangzong (Zhao Dun).

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国政治家。灭巴国后屯兵江州，修筑江州城，为史载重庆建城之始。
description.en: A politician of the Qin state during the Warring States period. After conquering the state of Ba, he stationed troops in Jiangzhou and built the city wall, marking the recorded beginning of Chongqing's city construction.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期秦国君主，秦朝开国皇帝，中国历史上首位完成华夏大一统并称皇帝的君主，秦昭襄王的曾孙。他统一六国，建立了秦朝。在位期间，他识破郑国疲秦之计后，仍坚持完成郑国渠修建。他曾极为赞赏韩非著作，下令实施“焚书坑儒”，导致《论语》等经典几近失传。他也是荆轲的刺杀目标。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qin during the late Warring States period, the founding emperor of the Qin Dynasty, and the first monarch in Chinese history to complete unification and be titled 'Emperor'. He was the great-grandson of King Zhaoxiang of Qin. He unified the six states and established the Qin Dynasty.
