During his reign, after uncovering Han's plot to exhaust Qin, he still proceeded with and completed the construction of the Zheng Guo Canal. He greatly admired Han Fei's writings and ordered the 'Burning of books and burying of scholars', which nearly led to the loss of classics like the Analects. He was also the target of Jing Ke's assassination attempt.

description.zh-cn: 南越国创建者，原为秦朝将领。
description.en: Founder of the Nanyue kingdom, originally a general of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由秦朝将领赵佗在岭南地区建立的政权，领有今日广东、广西、海南及越南北部。
description.en: A kingdom founded by the Qin general Zhao Tuo in the Lingnan region, covering present-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, and northern Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪中叶，清朝与英国及法国等西方列强之间发生两场冲突，即第一次鸦片战争（1840-1842年）和第二次鸦片战争。其中，第一次鸦片战争是大清帝国与英国之间的战争，直接导致香港岛被割让。清政府战败后，刺激其推行洋务运动，并开启了第二阶段的西学东渐。
description.en: A series of two conflicts occurred between the Qing dynasty and Western powers (primarily Britain and France) in the mid-19th century: the First Opium War (1840-1842) and the Second Opium War. The First Opium War, a conflict between the Qing Empire and the United Kingdom, directly led to the cession of Hong Kong Island. The Qing government's defeat stimulated the launch of the Self-Strengthening Movement, initiating the second phase of the West-to-East knowledge transfer.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的政权之一，位于现广东、广西、海南、香港、澳门以及越南北部，后于971年被北宋所灭。
description.en: One of the states during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, located in modern-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Hong Kong, Macau, and northern Vietnam. It was conquered by the Northern Song dynasty in 971.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明于1945年宣布成立的东南亚社会主义国家，通常被称为“北越”。它于1945年至1976年存在，是越南统一前位于北方的共产主义国家。曾是越南战争中的一方，并向中国请求抗疟药物援助。黎笋是其主要领导人之一。1976年，它与越南南方共和国合并，统一为越南社会主义共和国。
description.en: A socialist state in Southeast Asia proclaimed by Hồ Chí Minh in 1945, commonly known as 'North Vietnam'. It existed from 1945 to 1976 as a communist state in the northern part of Vietnam before reunification. It was a party in the Vietnam War and requested antimalarial drug assistance from China. Lê Duẩn was one of its key leaders. In 1976, it merged with the Republic of South Vietnam to form the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1955年由吴廷琰建立，通称南越。该国于1955年至1975年间存在，在越南战争中与美国结盟，对抗北越。
description.en: Established by Ngô Đình Diệm in 1955, commonly known as South Vietnam. It existed from 1955 to 1975, allied with the United States against North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 前越南共产党中央委员会总书记、越南社会主义共和国主席。
越南阮朝末代皇帝，曾为越南帝国君主，后担任越南国国家元首。
description.en: The last emperor of the Nguyễn dynasty of Vietnam, formerly the monarch of the Empire of Vietnam, later serving as the head of state of the State of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史上最后一个君主制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的创建者及首任皇帝（大汗），后被元朝追尊为元太祖，是蒙哥的祖父。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the grandfather of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典文献之一，古代中国用于推演未来吉凶祸福的卜筮书。自汉代开始被尊奉为“五经”之一，其中心思想是用阴阳符号构成的六十四卦象代表世间万物的运行状态。同时，它也是元朝国号“大元”的出处。
description.en: One of the Chinese classic texts, an ancient Chinese divination text used to predict future fortunes. It has been revered as one of the 'Five Classics' since the Han Dynasty. Its central idea is to use the 64 hexagrams, composed of yin and yang symbols, to represent the state of all things in the world. Additionally, it is the source of the Yuan dynasty's name 'Dayuan'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋是中国历史上的一个朝代，由宋高宗赵构建立，是北宋的延续，也是中国南方的汉人政权。其重要将领有韩世忠。该政权在蒙哥在位期间曾遭受大规模进攻，最终被元朝所灭。
description.en: The Southern Song was a Han Chinese dynasty in southern China, a continuation of the Northern Song, founded by Emperor Gaozong (Zhao Gou). Key general Han Shizhong served this dynasty. It faced large-scale invasions during Möngke's reign and was ultimately conquered by the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝取代后，蒙古皇族退居漠北（蒙古高原）所建立的政权。
description.en: The regime established by the Mongol royal family after they retreated to the Mongolian Plateau following the replacement of the Yuan dynasty by the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族建立的统治中国北方和东北地区的封建王朝，后被蒙古帝国所灭。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Jurchen people that ruled northern and northeastern China.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第四子，蒙哥、元世祖忽必烈、旭烈兀、阿里不哥的父亲。他曾任大蒙古国监国，后被追尊为元睿宗。
description.en: The fourth son of Genghis Khan, and the father of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke. He served as the regent of the Mongol Empire and was posthumously honored as Emperor Ruizong of Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第四任大汗，拖雷长子，忽必烈长兄，元朝追尊为宪宗桓肃皇帝。他在位期间任命忽必烈总领漠南汉地事务，并继续发动对南宋、大理、西亚等地的征服战争。最终在征伐南宋的钓鱼城之战中去世，其逝世引发了帝国的内乱与分裂。
description.en: The fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, the eldest son of Tolui and elder brother of Kublai, posthumously honored as Emperor Xianzong Huansu by the Yuan Dynasty. During his reign, he appointed Kublai to oversee affairs in North China and continued to launch wars of conquest against the Southern Song, Dali, and West Asia. He eventually died during the Battle of Diaoyu Fortress while invading the Southern Song, and his death triggered internal strife and the division of the empire.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古皇族，成吉思汗之孙，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的幼子。在兄长蒙哥汗去世后，与四哥忽必烈争夺汗位，引发拖雷家族内战，最终兵败被俘，不久后去世。
description.en: A Mongol prince, grandson of Genghis Khan, and the youngest son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki. After the death of his brother Möngke Khan, he contended for the throne with his fourth brother Kublai, leading to the Toluid Civil War. He was ultimately defeated, captured, and died shortly after.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第二任大汗，成吉思汗第三子和继承人，蒙哥的养父。
description.en: The second Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, third son and successor of Genghis Khan, and the adoptive father of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 五斗米道的创立者，被尊为天师。

en: Way of the Five Pecks of Rice

description.zh-cn: 早期道教组织，由张道陵创立。
佛教是一种世界性宗教和哲学体系。它对中国古代思想家如皇侃产生了影响，并与道教在中国历史上长期互动论争，唐代宗等帝王也曾笃信佛教。此外，据传在松赞干布时期，佛教通过与泥婆罗（尼泊尔）和唐朝的联姻首次传入吐蕃。
description.en: Buddhism is a world religion and philosophical system. It influenced ancient Chinese thinkers like Huang Kan, engaged in long-term interaction and debate with Taoism in Chinese history, and emperors such as Daizong of Tang also devoutly followed it. Additionally, it is traditionally believed that during the reign of Songtsen Gampo, Buddhism was first introduced to Tibet through his marriages with princesses from Licchavi (Nepal) and the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由汉光武帝刘秀建立的中国朝代，是汉朝的延续，定都洛阳。它是三国的前身。其末期许贡、孙策等人物活跃，周瑜名义上为其臣子，曹昂在此期间生活并被举为孝廉。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), it was a continuation of the Han dynasty with its capital at Luoyang. It was the predecessor of the Three Kingdoms. During its late period, figures like Xu Gong and Sun Ce were active, Zhou Yu was nominally its subject, and Cao Ang lived during this period and was nominated as Xiaolian.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝
唐朝第二位皇帝，在玄武门之变后即位。其为秦王时曾招揽房玄龄为重要谋士。在位期间，他开创了“贞观之治”，使唐朝国力强盛，并被尊为“天可汗”，推崇道教。他最初拒绝了松赞干布的和亲请求，但在松州之战后同意将文成公主嫁给他。他还因少林寺十三棍僧助唐有功而对其进行封赏，是李泰之父。
description.en: The second emperor of the Tang Dynasty, he ascended to the throne after the Xuanwu Gate Incident. As the Prince of Qin, he recruited Fang Xuanling as a key advisor. During his reign, he initiated the 'Reign of Zhenguan', which led to a powerful and prosperous Tang Dynasty. He was honored as the 'Tian Kehan' and promoted Taoism. He initially refused Songtsen Gampo's marriage proposal but later agreed to marry Princess Wencheng to him after the Battle of Songzhou. He also rewarded the Shaolin Temple's thirteen cudgel monks for their assistance and was the father of Li Tai.

description.zh-cn: 全真道掌教，改革道教戒律，曾与成吉思汗会面。
金元时期兴起的道教宗派，由王重阳创立。
北宋第八位皇帝，宋高宗之父。他是一位艺术家，自创“瘦金书”字体。笃信道教，自称“教主道君皇帝”，并追封庄周为微妙元通真君。在位期间，他追封赵元佐为汉王，并将赵德芳的追封爵位由楚王改为秦王。后因靖康之变被俘，客死异乡。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty and father of Emperor Gaozong. He was an artist who created the "Slender Gold" calligraphy style. A devout Daoist, he proclaimed himself "Jiaozhu Daojun Emperor" and posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Weimiao Yuantong Zhenjun. During his reign, he posthumously re-ennobled Zhao Yuanzuo as the Prince of Han and changed Zhao Defang's posthumous title from Prince of Chu to Prince of Qin. He was later captured during the Jingkang incident and died in captivity.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的著名诗人和文学家，曹操与卞氏嫡出之第三子。在其作品《辩道论》中批驳道教神仙说。
description.en: A famous poet and writer of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period, the third son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian.

description.zh-cn: 巴西联邦共和国，南美洲最大的国家，金砖国家创始成员国。
description.en: The Federative Republic of Brazil, the largest country in South America, and a founding member of BRICS.

description.zh-cn: 于2011年加入金砖国家的成员国。
于2024年加入金砖国家的成员国。

zh-cn: 衣索比亚联邦民主共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于非洲之角的主权国家，是全球人口最多的内陆国家，亦为人口第二多的非洲国家。于2024年加入金砖国家。
description.en: A sovereign state in the Horn of Africa, it is the world's most populous landlocked country and the second-most populous country in Africa. It joined BRICS in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 于2024年加入金砖国家的成员国，并于2014年将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义组织名单。
description.en: Joined BRICS in 2024 and listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 曾被邀请加入金砖国家，后撤回申请。
东南亚国家，马来西亚的邻国。在马来西亚成立初期曾因领土问题发生冲突。于2025年成为金砖国家的正式成员。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country neighboring Malaysia. It had conflicts with Malaysia over territorial issues during the latter's early years. It will officially become a member of BRICS in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 该国位于东南亚，是一个联邦制、议会民主制、选举君主制和君主立宪制国家。它由前马来亚联合邦、北婆罗洲、砂拉越及新加坡于1963年9月16日所组成。新加坡曾于1963年至1965年间加入其联邦，成为新加坡州。目前，该国与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议，并预计于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: It is a federal parliamentary elective constitutional monarchy located in Southeast Asia. It was formed on 16 September 1963 by the merger of the existing Federation of Malaya, North Borneo, Sarawak, and Singapore. Singapore was a state within this federation from 1963 to 1965. Currently, the country has sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands, and is expected to become a BRICS partner in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
东欧国家，允许俄罗斯利用其领土对乌克兰发动攻击，被视为俄罗斯的盟友。于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: An Eastern European country that has allowed Russia to use its territory to launch attacks on Ukraine, considered an ally of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
印度现任总理。
伊朗现任总统。
印度尼西亚现任总统。
梵蒂冈城邦的前身，是在756年由“丕平献土”事件后成立的政教合一主权国家，其领土曾广及意大利半岛中部。
description.en: The predecessor to the Vatican City State, a sovereign theocratic state established in 756 after the 'Donation of Pepin', which once controlled large territories in central Italy.

zh-cn: 罗伯特·方济各·普雷沃斯特

description.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈城国国家元首（教宗）。

zh-cn: 伊拉克和沙姆伊斯兰国
伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯兰国
en: Islamic State of Iraq and al-Sham
Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

description.zh-cn: 趁阿拉伯之春造成的地区动荡而崛起的极端恐怖组织，曾控制叙利亚和伊拉克的大片区域。
description.en: An extremist terrorist organization that rose to prominence amid the regional instability caused by the Arab Spring, once controlling large areas of Syria and Iraq.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治家，现任欧洲联盟执行委员会主席。
description.en: A German politician who is the current President of the European Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲西北部的构成国，是荷兰王国的主要组成部分，也是欧盟创始成员国之一。该欧洲国家曾于1641年从葡萄牙手中夺取马六甲。
description.en: A constituent country located in Northwestern Europe, the main component of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, and a founding member of the EU. This European country captured Malacca from the Portuguese in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟创始成员国之一
乌克兰政治家，现任乌克兰总统。他在2022年俄罗斯全面入侵后，领导乌克兰进行抵抗。
description.en: Ukrainian politician and current President of Ukraine. He has led the country's defense against the 2022 full-scale Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 一个欧盟成员国，位于中欧和东南欧的交汇处。
description.en: An EU member state, located at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe.

description.zh-cn: 奥兰治亲王，通过与妻子玛丽二世的婚姻，在1688年光荣革命后成为英格兰、苏格兰及爱尔兰国王。他领导了反法的大同盟战争。
description.en: Prince of Orange who, through his marriage to Mary II, became King of England, Scotland, and Ireland after the Glorious Revolution of 1688. He led the Grand Alliance against France.

description.zh-cn: 英国哲学家，被广泛誉为自由主义之父和早期启蒙运动思想家。
英国博物学家、地质学家和生物学家，以其对进化科学的贡献而闻名。
成吉思汗长子术赤之子，金帐汗国的建立者，是推举蒙哥称汗的关键人物。
description.en: Son of Jochi, the eldest son of Genghis Khan, founder of the Golden Horde, and a key figure in the election of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国早期最重要的军阀势力之一，由袁世凯培植的北洋新军主要将领组成。该军事政治集团在民国初年控制北洋政府。袁世凯死后于1916年分裂为多个派系，形成军阀割据局面。
description.en: A military-political group that controlled the Beiyang government in the early Republic of China. It was one of the most important warlord factions, composed of the main generals of the Beiyang New Army cultivated by Yuan Shikai. After Yuan's death in 1916, it split into several cliques, leading to a period of warlordism.

description.zh-cn: 明朝与瓦剌在土木堡发生的一场战役。此战中明英宗被俘，直接导致朱祁钰被拥立为帝，并成为明朝由盛转衰的转折点之一。
description.en: A military conflict between the Ming Dynasty and the Oirats at Tumu Fortress. Emperor Yingzong was captured in this battle, directly leading to Zhu Qiyu being enthroned, and it is considered a turning point from prosperity to decline for the Ming Dynasty.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
birth_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
death_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗长子，明朝第六位和第八位皇帝，景泰帝的异母兄长，年号正统和天顺。其在位期间，经历土木堡之变被俘，后发动“夺门之变”复辟。并在孙太后去世后，恢复了胡善祥的皇后名号，最终废除了宫妃殉葬制度。
description.en: The Zhengtong and Tianshun Emperor (personal name Zhu Qizhen) was the sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming dynasty, the eldest son of the Xuande Emperor, and the elder half-brother of the Jingtai Emperor. During his reign, he was captured in the Tumu Crisis, later restored to the throne through the Duomen Coup. After the death of Empress Dowager Sun, he posthumously restored Hu Shanxiang's title of Empress, and eventually abolished the system of concubine burial.

description.zh-cn: 明朝宦官，在英宗首次在位期间专权，怂恿英宗亲征导致土木堡之变，并在此役中被杀。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty eunuch who monopolized power during Emperor Yingzong's first reign. He instigated the emperor to personally lead the expedition that resulted in the Tumu Crisis, where he was killed.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族的一支，在土木堡之变中俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: A group of Mongol tribes that captured Emperor Yingzong during the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 瓦剌太师，在土木堡之变中俘虏明英宗，后率军围攻北京并将其送还明朝。
description.en: The Taishi of the Oirats who captured Emperor Yingzong during the Tumu Crisis, later besieged Beijing, and eventually returned him to the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝名臣，官至兵部尚书、太子太傅。在土木堡之变后拥立朱祁钰（景泰帝）为帝，并领导北京保卫战取得胜利。后在夺门之变后被明英宗以谋逆罪杀害。
description.en: A famous official of the Ming dynasty, serving as Minister of War and Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince. He supported Zhu Qiyu (the Jingtai Emperor)'s ascension to the throne after the Tumu Crisis and led the Defense of Beijing to victory. He was later executed for treason by Emperor Yingzong after the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第七位皇帝（1449年-1457年在位），明宣宗朱瞻基次子，明英宗朱祁镇异母弟。因土木堡之变中兄长被俘而即位，后在夺门之变中被复辟的兄长废黜。
description.en: The Jingtai Emperor (personal name Zhu Qiyu) was the seventh emperor of the Ming dynasty, reigning from 1449 to 1457. He was the second son of the Xuande Emperor and the younger half-brother of the Zhengtong Emperor. He ascended the throne after his brother was captured in the Tumu Crisis, and was later deposed by his brother in the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝，明代在位时间最长的皇帝，明光宗之父。其遗骸于1966年8月被红卫兵焚毁。
description.en: The third son of Emperor Muzong of Ming, the 13th and longest-reigning emperor of the Ming Dynasty, and father of Emperor Guangzong of Ming. His remains were burned by Red Guards in August 1966.

description.zh-cn: 中国明朝末期宦官，天启年间权倾朝野，人称“九千岁”。他掌控朝政，与客氏结盟，拉拢齐楚浙党组成阉党，残酷打击东林党人。其党羽曾与袁崇焕在辽东事务上产生摩擦。崇祯帝即位后，他被清算，最终畏罪自杀，尸身被凌迟。
description.en: A Chinese eunuch who lived in the late Ming dynasty. Known as the 'Nine Thousand Years', he held immense power during the Tianqi era and controlled the court. He formed a political alliance with Madam Ke and created the 'Eunuch Party' by aligning with officials from the Qi, Chu, and Zhe factions, brutally persecuting the Donglin Party. His associates clashed with Yuan Chonghuan over Liaodong affairs. He was purged after the Chongzhen Emperor ascended the throne, eventually committing suicide to avoid capture, and his corpse was subjected to lingchi.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年的一个士大夫政治集团，主张开放言路、澄清吏治，在天启年间遭到阉党的残酷打击。
description.en: A political faction of scholar-officials in the late Ming dynasty who advocated for open criticism and clean governance. They were brutally suppressed by the Eunuch Party during the Tianqi era.

description.zh-cn: 根据《凡尔登条约》从法兰克王国分裂出的国家，为神圣罗马帝国的前身。
神圣罗马帝国的主要邦国，哈布斯堡王朝的核心领地。著名的玛丽·安托瓦内特即出身于此。
description.en: A major state within the Holy Roman Empire and the heartland of the Habsburg monarchy, it was Marie Antoinette's country of origin.

zh-cn: 弗朗茨二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡-洛林王朝成员，神圣罗马帝国末任皇帝。为应对拿破仑称帝，他创立奥地利皇位并成为首任奥地利皇帝（弗朗茨一世）。1806年奥斯特里茨战役战败后，他于8月6日宣布解散神圣罗马帝国。
description.en: A member of the House of Habsburg-Lorraine and the last Holy Roman Emperor. In response to Napoleon crowning himself emperor, he founded the Austrian imperial title and became the first Emperor of Austria (as Francis I). After the defeat at the Battle of Austerlitz, he announced the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire on August 6, 1806.

description.zh-cn: 法兰克王国国王，800年被加冕为“罗马人的皇帝”。

zh-cn: 查理五世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡王朝的君主，同时统治神圣罗马帝国和西班牙帝国。
统治伊朗的最后一个王朝。
伊拉克共和国。
前伊拉克总统，曾发动两伊战争，其政权在美国发动的伊拉克战争中被推翻。
description.en: Former President of Iraq, whose regime was overthrown in the U.S.-led Iraq War.

birth_place.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州纽黑文市

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第43任总统。他是芭芭拉·布什与乔治·赫伯特·沃克·布什的儿子，其父也曾担任总统。他在九一一袭击事件后获得了创纪录的90%支持率。有学者认为，其政府解放了伊拉克的什叶派多数，促成了什叶派的复兴。2008年，他曾在白宫会见魏京生等五名中国异议人士。
description.en: American politician and the 43rd President of the United States. He is the son of Barbara Bush and George H. W. Bush, whose father also served as president. He achieved a record 90% approval rating following the September 11 attacks. Some scholars believe his administration liberated the Shia majority in Iraq, contributing to a Shia revival. In 2008, he met with Wei Jingsheng and four other Chinese dissidents at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 以色列国。在军事上与新加坡关系紧密，曾派遣军官指导新加坡军队的建立。同时，伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊曾指责以色列与美国共同策划阿米尼示威，而以色列总理则批评伊朗政权为“杀人政府”。
description.en: Israel. It has close military ties with Singapore, having dispatched officers to guide the establishment of the Singaporean army. Concurrently, Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei accused Israel of co-planning the Amini protests with the United States, while the Israeli Prime Minister criticized the Iranian regime as a 'murderous regime'.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国的武装部队之一，负责维护伊斯兰教义和国内秩序。其总司令侯赛因·萨拉米曾警告示威者，并指控沙特阿拉伯支持示威。
description.en: One of the armed forces of the Islamic Republic of Iran, responsible for maintaining Islamic doctrines and domestic order. Its commander, Hossein Salami, has warned protesters and accused Saudi Arabia of supporting the demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将，时任关东军作战主任参谋，是九一八事变的主要策划者之一。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Imperial Japanese Army who was the Operations Staff Officer of the Kwantung Army and one of the chief masterminds of the Mukden Incident.

description.zh-cn: 沙乌地阿拉伯王储兼首相。
伊斯兰教是一种以《古兰经》为核心，圣训为辅助的亚伯拉罕一神教。它是世界三大宗教之一，也是沙烏地阿拉伯的国教。
description.en: Islam is an Abrahamic monotheistic religion centered on the Quran and supplemented by the Hadith. It is one of the three major world religions and the state religion of Saudi Arabia.

description.zh-cn: 逊尼派伊斯兰教内的伊斯兰复兴主义和原教旨主义运动，由穆罕默德·伊本·阿卜杜勒·瓦哈卜发起。其信徒自称“一神论者”，教义极端保守。该运动是沙特阿拉伯奉行的官方意识形态和国教，属逊尼派一支。
description.en: An Islamic revivalist and fundamentalist movement within Sunni Islam, founded by Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab. Its followers refer to themselves as 'Muwahhidun' (Unitarians) and hold ultraconservative doctrines. It is the official state ideology and state religion adopted by Saudi Arabia, belonging to a branch of Sunni Islam.

description.zh-cn: 沙乌地阿拉伯前王储。
伊斯兰教的第二大教派，与逊尼派并称。其追随者认为穆罕默德的女婿阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜是其正统继承人。该教派占穆斯林总数的10%至20%，被瓦哈比派视为异端，在沙乌地阿拉伯是少数派并受到压制。
description.en: The second-largest branch of Islam, alongside Sunni Islam. Comprising 10% to 20% of all Muslims, its adherents believe that Prophet Muhammad's son-in-law, Ali ibn Abi Talib, was his rightful successor. It is considered heretical by Wahhabism, is a minority in Saudi Arabia, and is suppressed.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的创始地之一，同时也是该组织的反对者，曾参与对其的打击行动。
description.en: One of the founding locations of the Turkistan Islamic Party, and also an opponent of the group, having participated in operations against it.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教中最重要的经典，被认为是真主安拉的启示，通过天使加百列传授给先知穆罕默德。内容涉及伊斯兰教的基本信仰、先知故事、伦理法律、历史事件等。它不仅是伊斯兰教的核心宗教文本，也被沙特阿拉伯等国视为最高宪法。
description.en: The most important scripture in Islam, believed to be a revelation from God (Allah), transmitted through the angel Gabriel to the Prophet Muhammad. Its content covers the fundamental beliefs of Islam, stories of prophets, ethical and legal issues, historical events, and more. It is not only the core religious text of Islam but also regarded as the supreme constitution in countries like Saudi Arabia.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央军委办公室主任。
中国历史上继五代十国之后的朝代，与南宋合称宋朝。其为宋朝的前半期，首都为东京开封府。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history following the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. Together with the Southern Song, it forms the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋开国皇帝，史称宋太祖，是一位杰出的政治家和军事家。他曾任后周殿前都点检，通过陈桥兵变建立宋朝。他策划了“杯酒释兵权”以加强中央集权，并下令征讨南汉。他是宋太宗的兄长，赵德芳与赵德昭的父亲。其驾崩与“烛影斧声”疑案有关。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, known as Emperor Taizu of Song, he was an outstanding statesman and military general. Formerly Supreme Commander of the Palace Guard of Later Zhou, he established the Song dynasty through the Chenqiao Mutiny. He orchestrated the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' to centralize power and ordered the conquest of Southern Han. He was the elder brother of Emperor Taizong and father of Zhao Defang and Zhao Dezhao. His death is associated with the historical mystery of the "candlelight and axe shadow".

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的最后一个朝代。
description.en: The last dynasty of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟，赵元佐与宋真宗之父。其继位因“烛影斧声”疑案而充满争议，被广泛怀疑谋杀兄长篡位，并与侄子赵德昭、赵德芳的早逝有关。在位期间，他结束了五代十国的分裂局面，但两次伐辽均告失败。
description.en: The second emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, younger brother of Emperor Taizu of Song (Zhao Kuangyin), and father of Zhao Yuanzuo and Emperor Zhenzong. His accession to the throne was controversial due to the 'candlelight and axe shadow' mystery, leading to widespread suspicion that he murdered his brother to usurp the throne and was involved in the early deaths of his nephews Zhao Dezhao and Zhao Defang. During his reign, he ended the fragmentation of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, but failed in two campaigns against the Liao dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 金朝攻破北宋首都东京开封府，俘虏宋徽宗、宋钦宗二帝，导致北宋灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in which the Jin dynasty conquered the Northern Song capital, Tokyo, and captured Emperors Huizong and Qinzong, leading to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋开国皇帝，史称宋高宗，是宋徽宗第九子、宋钦宗之弟。他在位三十五年后禅让，成为中国历史上在位时间最长的太上皇。在位期间，曾于苗刘兵变中被逼退位，后由韩世忠等人平乱而复位。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, known historically as Emperor Gaozong, was the ninth son of Emperor Huizong of Song and the brother of Emperor Qinzong of Song. After reigning for 35 years, he abdicated and became the longest-reigning Taishang Huang (retired emperor) in Chinese history. During his reign, he was forced to abdicate during the Miao-Liu Mutiny but was later restored to the throne after the rebellion was quelled by generals including Han Shizhong.

description.zh-cn: 岳飞是南宋抗金名将、民族英雄，中兴四将之一，主战派的代表人物。他在绍兴和议达成前夕，被宋高宗以“莫须有”的罪名处死。
description.en: Yue Fei, a national hero and one of the 'Four Generals of ZTE,' was a distinguished military general of the Southern Song dynasty and a leading figure of the pro-war faction. He famously led forces against the Jin dynasty and was executed by Emperor Gaozong on 'groundless' charges just before the Shaoxing Peace Treaty was finalized.

description.zh-cn: 南宋宰相，宋金和议的主要推动者。他被广泛认为是策划岳飞冤案的主谋，并曾试图陷害韩世忠。
description.en: A chancellor of the Southern Song dynasty who was a major proponent of the peace treaty with the Jin dynasty. He is widely considered the mastermind behind the wrongful execution of Yue Fei and had also attempted to frame Han Shizhong.

description.zh-cn: 南宋最后一位皇帝。
北宋著名政治家、文学家、思想家、改革家，唐宋八大家之一。在宋神宗支持下推行熙宁变法，其思想被称为“荆公新学”。
description.en: A famous politician, writer, thinker, and reformer of the Northern Song dynasty, and one of the Eight Great Prose Masters of the Tang and Song. He implemented the Xining Reforms with the support of Emperor Shenzong, and his thought is known as the 'Jinggong New Learning'.

description.zh-cn: 北宋政治家、史学家。作为守旧派领袖，他激烈反对王安石变法，并对荆轲刺秦的行为持批判态度。
description.en: A politician and historian of the Northern Song dynasty. As the leader of the conservative faction, he vehemently opposed the Wang Anshi Reforms and held a critical view of Jing Ke's assassination attempt.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第六位皇帝，宋徽宗之父。在位期间，因对北宋积贫积弱的状况深感忧心，启用王安石推行熙宁变法，并对外发动熙河开边，意图富国强兵，但变法引发了剧烈的新旧党争，对外军事行动也遭遇永乐城之战的惨败。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, father of Emperor Huizong. During his reign, concerned about the state's poverty and weakness, he appointed Wang Anshi to implement the Xining Reforms and launched the Xihe Expansion campaign, aiming to enrich the state and strengthen its military. However, the reforms triggered intense factional struggles, and his foreign military campaigns suffered a disastrous defeat at the Battle of Yongle City.

zh-cn: 友好合作互助条约组织
en: Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation, and Mutual Assistance

description.zh-cn: 由苏联领导的东方军事联盟，旨在对抗北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: An Eastern military alliance led by the Soviet Union, formed to counter NATO.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾于1511年攻占马六甲，开启了欧洲在马来半岛的殖民统治。
description.en: A European country that captured Malacca in 1511, beginning European colonial rule in the Malay Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 于2017年将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义名单。
description.en: Listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2017.

zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家。在1960年代初中苏交恶期间，接受了中国大量的粮食和经济援助。
description.en: A European country. During the Sino-Soviet split in the early 1960s, it received substantial food and economic aid from China.

location.zh-cn: 美国纽约市联合国总部
location.en: Headquarters of the United Nations, New York City, USA

description.zh-cn: 联合国六个主要机构之一，负有维持国际和平与安全的责任，也是唯一有权采取强制行动的联合国机构。它曾通过决议授权北约采取军事行动，通过第84号决议授权组建联合国军，并于2002年将“东伊运”列入恐怖组织名单。
description.en: One of the six principal organs of the United Nations, charged with ensuring international peace and security. It is also the only UN body with the authority to issue binding resolutions to member states. It has authorized NATO military actions through resolutions, authorized the formation of the United Nations Command through Resolution 84, and listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 利比亚前领导人。2011年北约军事干预导致其政权在第一次利比亚内战中被推翻并被杀，结束了长达42年的统治。
description.en: Former leader of Libya. His regime was overthrown and he was killed during the First Libyan Civil War in 2011, following NATO military intervention, which ended his 42-year rule.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国政治及军事人物，前朝鲜党和国家领导干部，曾一度被视为朝鲜实际上的“二号人物”。他曾任国家体育指导委员会首任委员长，是金正恩的姑父。
description.en: A political and military figure in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a former high-ranking official of the Workers' Party and the state, once considered the de facto 'second-in-command' of North Korea. He served as the first Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and was Kim Jong Un's uncle by marriage.

birth_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国江原道川内郡

death_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国平壤市

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。2011年至2015年担任Google首席执行官。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He served as the CEO of Google from 2011 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: Google于2015年重组后成立的控股母公司，总部位于美国。
description.en: The holding parent company established after Google's restructuring in 2015, headquartered in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 自2015年起担任Google的首席执行官。
description.en: CEO of Google since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 一款由Google主导开发并持续更新的移动设备操作系统，于2005年被Google公司收购。
description.en: A mobile operating system primarily developed and continuously updated by Google, acquired by Google in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府在其管辖互联网内部建立的多套网络审查系统的总称，常被称为“互联网边界审查系统”，用于监控和过滤互联网内容。该系统曾导致“温云松”等词成为网络搜索的敏感词，并多次对Google的服务进行屏蔽。
description.en: The general term for multiple internet censorship systems established by the People's Republic of China within its jurisdiction to monitor and filter internet content. Often referred to as the 'Internet Boundary Censorship System,' the system has made terms like 'Wen Yunsong' sensitive for web searches and has blocked Google's services on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年将领，督师。
明世宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝
description.en: Third son of the Jiajing Emperor, the 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗长子，明朝第十五位皇帝，崇祯帝与明熹宗的父亲。
description.en: Eldest son of Emperor Shenzong, the 15th emperor of the Ming dynasty, and father of the Chongzhen and Tianqi Emperors.

description.zh-cn: 意大利耶稣会传教士、学者，天主教在中国传教的开拓者之一，也是第一位阅读中国文学并对汉字有深入了解的西方人。
description.en: An Italian Jesuit priest and one of the founding figures of the Jesuit China missions. He is considered a Servant of God by the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗第三子，郑贵妃所生，明光宗异母弟，是国本之争的核心人物之一。
日本战国时代末期至安土桃山时代的武将、天下人，发动了侵略朝鲜的战争。
蒙古皇族，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的第六子，蒙哥和忽必烈的弟弟。他建立了伊儿汗国，领导了第三次蒙古西征，并在拖雷家族内战中支持忽必烈。
description.en: A Mongol prince, the sixth son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki, and the younger brother of Möngke and Kublai Khan. He founded the Ilkhanate, led the third Mongol invasion of the West, and supported Kublai during the Toluid Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 香港女星，倪匡的儿媳，亦舒的侄媳，倪震的妻子。
description.en: Hong Kong celebrity, daughter-in-law of Ni Kuang, niece-in-law of Yi Shu, and wife of Joe Nieh.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的胞妹，华裔加拿大籍香港文艺小说作家，原籍浙江镇海。其作品的女主角多为自爱自强的都市女性，影响了众多中文读者。
description.en: Younger sister of Ni Kuang, a Chinese-Canadian Hong Kong romance novelist, with ancestral roots in Zhenhai, Zhejiang. The heroines in her works are mostly self-respecting and strong-willed urban women, influencing numerous Chinese readers.

description.zh-cn: 金庸的武侠小说，倪匡曾为其代笔部分章节。
description.en: A wuxia novel by Jin Yong, for which Ni Kuang ghostwrote several chapters.

description.zh-cn: 原名熊耀华，台湾著名武侠小说家。籍贯江西省南昌市，出生于香港，后定居台湾。他以独特风格开创了武侠小说新时代，创作了《楚留香传奇》、《绝代双骄》、《多情剑客无情剑》等多部脍炙人口的作品，并屡次被改编为影视剧。与倪匡相交甚笃。
description.en: Originally named Xiong Yaohua, he was a renowned Taiwanese wuxia novelist. His ancestral home was Nanchang, Jiangxi; he was born in Hong Kong and later settled in Taiwan. With his unique style, he pioneered a new era for wuxia novels, authoring many popular works such as 'The Legend of Chu Liuxiang', 'Juedai Shuangjiao', and 'Sentimental Swordsman, Ruthless Sword', which have been frequently adapted into films and television series. He was also a very close friend of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 后周开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，由李昪建立，历三主，共三十九年。曾与南汉为友好邻邦。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, founded by Li Bian, lasting three rulers for a total of thirty-nine years. It was once a friendly neighboring state to Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 南唐末代君主，中国历史上首屈一指的词人，后人誉为“千古词帝”。他是小周后与大周后的丈夫。曾受宋太祖之命劝说南汉归降。被北宋俘虏后，曾获封第一个封号，宋太宗即位后改封其爵位。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang, a famous poet, and the husband of Lesser Empress Zhou and Great Empress Zhou. He was instructed by Emperor Taizu of Song to persuade Southern Han to submit. After being captured by the Northern Song, he received an initial title, which was later changed by Emperor Taizong of Song.

description.zh-cn: 曾任浙江省副书记兼省长
中国政治人物，曾任浙江省副书记兼省长、浙江省人大常委会主任，以及孟凡利的继任烟台市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as former Deputy Secretary and Governor of Zhejiang Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress. He was also Meng Fanli's successor as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省委书记、省人大常委会主任，以及江西省人民政府省长。此前，他接替袁家军担任浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who formerly served as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress, and Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government. He previously succeeded Yuan Jiajun as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee.

en: Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress
zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，张庆伟的前任中共湖南省委书记。他出身于航天科技集团。
description.en: A Chinese politician and Zhang Qingwei's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee. He previously worked at China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation (CASC).

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人、电影监制与主持人，是传媒界翘楚，对将港产片推广至国际影坛有重大贡献。同时，她也是著名的电影制片人，以及导演徐克的前妻。
description.en: A prominent Hong Kong media personality, film producer, and host, who has made significant contributions to promoting Hong Kong cinema internationally. She is also known as a film producer and the ex-wife of director Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 中国影视公司
中国导演、摄影师、演员，中国“第五代导演”代表人物之一。作为77级大学生，他曾与巩俐有过长期的电影合作和个人情感关系。
description.en: Chinese director, cinematographer, and actor, and a representative figure of China's 'Fifth Generation directors'. A member of the Class of 1977, he had a long-term professional collaboration and personal relationship with Gong Li.

description.zh-cn: 香港导演，曾执导张国荣主演的电影《英雄本色》。他曾表示在自己落魄时，张国荣总是伸出援手资助他。
description.en: A Hong Kong director who directed Leslie Cheung in the film 'A Better Tomorrow'. He mentioned that when he was down and out, Cheung always extended a helping hand to support him financially.

description.zh-cn: 李讷与徐宁的儿子。
位于中亚的突厥-波斯王朝，后被蒙古所灭。
由契丹人耶律大石建立的位于中亚的王朝，后被蒙古兼并。
蒙古高原的部落之一，与成吉思汗家族有世仇。
一个促进全球警务合作和犯罪控制的国际组织。该组织曾拒绝中国政府就通缉李洪志一事提供合作的请求。
description.en: An international organization that facilitates worldwide police cooperation and crime control. It once rejected the Chinese government's request for cooperation regarding the wanted notice for Li Hongzhi.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、医师。他曾任台北市长、台湾民众党创党人及现任党主席，代表该党参选2024年中华民国总统选举。作为柯美兰的胞兄，他曾就陈水扁的健康问题发表意见，指出陈水扁最初是装病。在医学领域，他曾任台大医院器官移植小组负责人，后因爱滋器官移植事件辞职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician. He served as the Mayor of Taipei and is the founder and current chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, representing the party in the 2024 ROC presidential election. As the elder brother of Ko Mei-lan, he publicly commented on Chen Shui-bian's health issues, stating that Chen was initially feigning illness. In his medical career, he previously served as the head of the organ transplant team at NTU Hospital, resigning after the AIDS organ transplant incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、护理师，台湾民众党籍。她代表民众党参选2024年立委选举，并获得国民党籍台中市长卢秀燕的支持。
description.en: A politician and nurse from the Republic of China, and a member of the Taiwan People's Party (TPP). She ran as a TPP candidate in the 2024 legislative election and received support from KMT's Taichung Mayor Lu Hsiu-yen.

description.zh-cn: 日本创办的第一所现代大学，位于日本东京的国立综合性研究型大学，是公认的日本最高学府。章宗祥曾在此就读法科。作为日本顶尖学府，该校曾向731部队派出了至少6名医学专家。
description.en: The first modern university established in Japan, a national comprehensive research university located in Tokyo, Japan, and widely regarded as the country's most prestigious academic institution. Zhang Zongxiang studied in the Faculty of Law here. As a top Japanese university, it dispatched at least six medical experts to Unit 731.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。他是傅兆林之子，徐榛蔚的丈夫。曾任花莲县县长，因其政治作风被称为“花莲王”，并涉及多起司法案件。在2020年立法委员选举中击败寻求连任的萧美琴。现任花莲县选举区立法委员、中国国民党立法院党团总召集人，并担任中国国民党中央委员会政策委员会执行长。他曾是大罢免运动中罢免泛蓝阵营的指标性人物之一。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the Kuomintang. He is the son of Fu Zhaolin and husband of Hsu Chen-wei. He previously served as Hualien County Magistrate, known as the 'King of Hualien' for his political style, and has been involved in multiple legal cases. He defeated Hsiao Bi-khim in the 2020 legislative election. He currently serves as a legislator for the Hualien County constituency, the caucus convener for the KMT in the Legislative Yuan, and the Executive Director of the KMT Policy Committee. He was also one of the iconic targets of the recall effort against the Pan-Blue camp.

description.zh-cn: 中国明朝第五位皇帝，明仁宗朱高炽长子，明英宗和景泰帝之父，胡善祥的丈夫，朱高煦之侄。他平定了叔父朱高煦的叛乱，并非常器重于谦。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming Dynasty in China, eldest son of the Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi, father of Emperor Yingzong and the Jingtai Emperor, husband of Hu Shanxiang, and nephew of Zhu Gaoxu. He suppressed the rebellion of his uncle Zhu Gaoxu and highly valued Yu Qian.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第七位皇帝，宋神宗的第六子和继任者，宋徽宗之兄。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, the sixth son and successor of Emperor Shenzong, and elder brother of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，宋徽宗时期“六贼”之一，被认为是导致北宋灭亡的奸臣。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty, one of the "Six Traitors" during Emperor Huizong's reign, considered a corrupt official who contributed to the fall of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由契丹族建立的统治中国北方的封建王朝，与北宋长期对峙。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Khitan people that ruled northern China and was a long-term rival of the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉第二位也是最后一位皇帝，刘备之子，通常被称为“后主”。在位期间，由托孤大臣诸葛亮和李严辅佐。
description.en: The second and last emperor of Shu Han, son of Liu Bei, often referred to as the 'Last Ruler'. During his reign, he was assisted by the regents Zhuge Liang and Li Yan.

birth_place.en: Yangdu County, Langya Commandery, Eastern Han

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，刘备的主要辅佐大臣，受刘备托孤辅佐刘禅。他是一位杰出的政治家、军事家、发明家及散文家，也是诸葛瑾之弟，诸葛乔的养父。他曾于228年征集兵丁守护都江堰，并设立专职堰官进行管理。同时，他也是诸葛亮北伐系列战争的发起者和总指挥。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, he served as Liu Bei's chief advisor and regent for Liu Shan as entrusted by Liu Bei. He was an outstanding statesman, military strategist, inventor, and writer, also the younger brother of Zhuge Jin and the adoptive father of Zhuge Qiao. In 228, he conscripted soldiers to guard Dujiangyan and established specialized weir officials for its management. He was also the initiator and supreme commander of the Northern Expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将，刘备的义弟兼主要部将之一。他曾与鲁肃就荆州问题进行谈判。其忠义勇武的形象在《三国演义》中被塑造为威猛刚毅、义重如山，并受后世推崇。他逐渐被神化，尊称为“关公”，被誉为“武圣”，与“文圣”孔子齐名。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han from the late Eastern Han to the Three Kingdoms period, Liu Bei's sworn brother and one of his key commanders. He once negotiated with Lu Su regarding the Jing Province issue. His image of loyalty, righteousness, and martial prowess was depicted in 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms' as mighty, resolute, and unwavering, earning him later generations' reverence. He was gradually deified, honorifically called 'Lord Guan', and acclaimed as the 'Saint of War', on par with Confucius, the 'Saint of Culture'.

birth_place.en: Xie County, Hedong Commandery, Eastern Han

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将，刘备的义弟，刘禅的岳父，五虎上将之一。
description.en: A military general serving under the warlord Liu Bei in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period of China, and the father-in-law of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，官至征南将军。他曾在长坂坡保护刘禅。
description.en: A renowned military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, who held the rank of General Who Conquers the South. He famously protected Liu Shan at Changban.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏政权的奠基者。他曾参与讨伐董卓的关东联军，并在兵败后迎汉献帝至许都，消灭李傕势力。他是孙刘联盟的主要对抗目标，曹昂、曹丕之父，曹叡之祖父。曾因态度傲慢未能招揽张松，也曾被许贡提及孙策对他构成威胁。他曾短暂收留关羽并对其礼遇有加。在《三国演义》中，他被塑造成一位“宁教我负天下人，休教天下人负我”的奸雄。
description.en: A powerful minister of the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founder of the state of Cao Wei. He participated in the coalition against Dong Zhuo, and after being defeated, he welcomed Emperor Xian to Xudu and eliminated Li Jue's faction. He was the primary adversary of the Sun-Liu alliance, father of Cao Ang and Cao Pi, and grandfather of Cao Rui. His arrogant attitude prevented him from recruiting Zhang Song, and Sun Ce viewed him as a threat, as mentioned by Xu Gong. He briefly took Guan Yu into his service and treated him with great respect. In 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', he is portrayed as a cunning and ambitious tyrant who famously declared, 'I would rather betray the world than let the world betray me.'

description.zh-cn: 孙策之弟，三国时期孙吴开国皇帝，六朝开拓者之首。他后期与刘备集团决裂，派军袭取荆州并最终导致关羽败亡。
description.en: Younger brother of Sun Ce, founding emperor of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, and the first pioneer of the Six Dynasties. He later broke his alliance with Liu Bei's faction, dispatched troops to seize Jing Province, ultimately leading to Guan Yu's defeat and death.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将，以武勇著称。原为丁原部将，后被董卓招揽，杀害丁原并成为其义子。后因与董卓侍婢私通且遭其掷戟羞辱，与王允合谋刺杀董卓。刺董后，他被李傕、郭汜联军击败，逃离长安。
description.en: A famous general of the late Eastern Han dynasty, known for his martial prowess. Originally a subordinate of Ding Yuan, he was recruited by Dong Zhuo, whom he then assassinated Ding Yuan and became his adopted son. Later, due to an affair with Dong Zhuo's maid and being humiliated by him, he conspired with Wang Yun to assassinate Dong Zhuo. After the assassination, he was defeated by the allied forces of Li Jue and Guo Si and fled Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，四世三公出身，袁熙之父。因反对董卓废立皇帝而逃离洛阳，后成为关东联军盟主，共同讨伐董卓。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty, from a prestigious family of high-ranking officials, and father of Yuan Xi. He fled Luoyang after opposing Dong Zhuo's decision to depose the emperor and later became the leader of the coalition of warlords that campaigned against Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，势力曾进入扬州，击败割据江东的周氏兄弟。孙策、鲁肃与周瑜都曾短暂效力于其麾下。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty. His forces once entered Yang Province, defeating the Zhou brothers who controlled Jiangdong. Sun Ce, Lu Su, and Zhou Yu all briefly served under him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年荆州牧，其去世引发了曹操南下及赤壁之战，也是李严的早期主君。
description.en: The governor of Jing Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty, whose death triggered Cao Cao's southern campaign and the Battle of Red Cliffs, and was an early lord of Li Yan.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀
蜀汉重臣，与诸葛亮同为刘备的托孤大臣。在第四次北伐时因运粮不力，后又试图推卸责任而被废为庶人。
description.en: A high-ranking official of Shu Han, appointed as a regent by Liu Bei along with Zhuge Liang. He was dismissed from office and demoted to a commoner for failing to deliver supplies during the fourth Northern Expedition and attempting to cover up his mistake.

description.zh-cn: 原为刘璋部下，后与张松一同策划并协助刘备夺取益州，成为刘备的谋士。在取益州和汉中时多有贡献，是蜀汉重要谋士。他曾与李严等人共同制定《蜀科》。
description.en: Originally a subordinate of Liu Zhang, he later conspired with Zhang Song to assist Liu Bei in taking control of Yi Province, becoming Liu Bei's strategist. He made significant contributions during the campaigns to take Yi Province and Hanzhong, and was an important advisor to Shu Han. He also co-authored the 'Code of Shu' with Li Yan and others.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的第九子，嫡三子，李泰的胞弟。李承干被废后，被立为皇太子，后继位为唐高宗，成为唐朝第三位皇帝，也是安定公主的父亲。
description.en: The ninth son of Emperor Taizong Li Shimin and his third legitimate son, full brother of Li Tai. After Li Chengqian's deposition, he was made crown prince and later succeeded the throne as Emperor Gaozong, becoming the third emperor of the Tang dynasty and the father of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治第五子，武则天长子。
唐中宗，唐朝皇子，曾两次在位，是唐朝第四位和第六位皇帝，也是安定公主的同胞弟弟。
description.en: Emperor Zhongzong of Tang, a prince of the Tang dynasty, who reigned twice as the fourth and sixth emperor. He was also a full brother of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 武则天建立的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty established by Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期的著名宰相。
description.en: A famous chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 清朝后期政治家、思想家、文学家和学者，以在广东发起的禁烟运动及虎门销烟而闻名，是第一次鸦片战争中的关键人物。他主张了解和学习西方技术，被认为是中国近代“开眼看世界的第一人”。
description.en: A prominent Chinese scholar and official of the late Qing dynasty, best known for his role in the First Opium War and the destruction of opium at Humen. He was a proponent of learning from Western technology and is considered the 'first person to open his eyes to the world' in modern China.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝开国皇帝，唐太宗李世民之父。隋末时于晋阳起兵，攻入长安，废隋恭帝杨侑后称帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Tang dynasty and the father of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin. He rebelled in Jinyang during the late Sui, captured Chang'an, and proclaimed himself emperor after deposing Emperor Gong Yang You.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊四子，与李建成结盟，在玄武门之变中被李世民所杀。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Gaozu of Tang, allied with Li Jiancheng, and was killed by Li Shimin's forces during the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由时任秦王的李世民在长安太极宫玄武门发动的一场宫廷政变。他通过杀死兄长李建成和四弟李元吉，确立了其皇位继承权。房玄龄是此次事件的重要策划者之一。
description.en: A palace coup launched by Li Shimin, then Prince of Qin, at Xuanwu Gate of the Taiji Palace in Chang'an. He secured his succession to the throne by killing his elder brother Li Jiancheng and younger brother Li Yuanji. Fang Xuanling was a key planner of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，李泰的母亲。她以贤德著称，曾召见房玄龄之妻卢氏，劝其接受太宗为房玄龄所赐的美人，以示贤明。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong Li Shimin and mother of Li Tai. Known for her virtue and wisdom, she once summoned Fang Xuanling's wife, Lady Lu, to persuade her to accept the concubines gifted to Fang Xuanling by Emperor Taizong, demonstrating her sagacity.

description.zh-cn: 隋末唐初的群雄之一。他在洛阳废隋恭帝杨侗自立，建立郑国。虎牢之战后投降唐朝。
description.en: One of the warlords during the late Sui and early Tang dynasties. He deposed Emperor Gong Yang Tong in Luoyang, established himself as emperor, and founded the state of Zheng. After the Battle of Hulao, he surrendered to the Tang.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝作为中亚和北亚各民族的国际同盟之主的称号，始于唐太宗。
description.en: A title for the Tang emperor as the head of an international alliance of various peoples in Central and North Asia, starting with Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年名相、凌烟阁二十四功臣之一，也是唐太宗时期的主要谋士和宰相。他以善于谋略著称，与杜如晦并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A prominent chancellor of the early Tang dynasty and one of the 24 meritorious officials of Lingyan Pavilion. He also served as a key advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong, known for his strategic planning and often mentioned with Du Ruhui as 'Fang's schemes and Du's judgment'.

description.zh-cn: 高句丽末期军事独裁者，其政变及对外扩张行为引发了唐朝的军事干预。
description.en: A military dictator of late Goguryeo whose coup and expansionist policies led to military intervention by the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛北部的古代王国，曾与隋朝和唐朝发生多次大规模战争，亦与新朝关系恶化。
description.en: An ancient kingdom on the Korean Peninsula that engaged in prolonged warfare with the Tang and Sui dynasties, and also had deteriorating relations with the Xin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗第四子，深得宠爱，与太子李承干争夺储位，后被贬。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Taizong, highly favored by his father, who vied for the crown prince position with Li Chengqian and was later demoted.

birth_place.zh-cn: 墨竹工卡亚伦哲堆园降巴明久林
birth_place.en: Jampa Mingyur Ling, in Yarbnön Tötsal, Meldro Gungkar

death_place.en: Zalmo Gang, in Phenpo, Tibetan Empire

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃雅鲁王朝第33任赞普，吐蕃帝国的建立者。在位期间，他大幅扩张版图，定都拉萨，并确立政治、军事、经济及法律制度。通过与泥婆罗和唐朝的联姻，引入先进技术与文化，推动了吐蕃社会的发展。藏传佛教中被认为是观世音菩萨的化身。
description.en: The 33rd Tsenpo of the Yarlung dynasty of Tibet and the founder of the Tibetan Empire. During his reign, he significantly expanded the empire's territory, established the capital at Lhasa, and set up political, military, economic, and legal systems. Through marriage alliances with Licchavi (Nepal) and the Tang Dynasty, he introduced advanced technology and culture, promoting the development of Tibetan society. He is considered an incarnation of Avalokiteshvara in Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宗室之女，松赞干布的妻子。她入藏带来了释迦牟尼像、经书、以及先进的科学、医学和历法知识，极大地促进了唐朝与吐蕃的文化交流。在藏传佛教中被认为是绿度母的化身。
description.en: A member of the Tang Dynasty's imperial clan and a wife of Songtsen Gampo. Her arrival in Tibet brought a statue of Shakyamuni, scriptures, and advanced knowledge in science, medicine, and calendrical systems, greatly promoting cultural exchange between the Tang and Tibet. In Tibetan Buddhism, she is considered an incarnation of Green Tara.

description.zh-cn: 青藏高原上的一个帝国，与唐朝同期，双方时战时和。其趁安史之乱占领了唐朝的西域和河西走廊；唐朝名将高适在任剑南节度使期间曾与其交战。双方也曾通过和亲维持关系。
description.en: An empire on the Tibetan Plateau, contemporary with the Tang Dynasty, which experienced periods of both war and peace with Tang. It took advantage of the An Lushan Rebellion to occupy Tang's Western Regions and Hexi Corridor. The famous Tang general Gao Shi also fought against it during his tenure as military governor of Jiannan. Both sides also maintained relations through marriage alliances.

description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆时期的权臣，丰绅殷德的父亲，后被嘉庆帝赐死。
description.en: A powerful official during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty, father of Fengshen Yinde, who was later forced to commit suicide by the Jiaqing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青的妻子，毛新宇的母亲。中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国军事科学院军事百科研究部副部长、中国摄影家协会主席。
description.en: Wife of Mao Anqing and mother of Mao Xinyu. A major general in the People's Liberation Army, she served as deputy director of the Military Encyclopedia Research Department of the Chinese Academy of Military Sciences and former chairwoman of the China Photographers Association.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东唯一的嫡孙，毛岸青与邵华之子。他是一位中国军事研究员，也是中国人民解放军少将。
description.en: The only known grandson of Mao Zedong, son of Mao Anqing and Shao Hua. He is a Chinese military researcher and a Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

zh-cn: 金山安全软件有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家中国软件公司。曾于2008年与谷歌联合发布免费的《谷歌金山词霸合作版》。该公司还曾因商业诋毁和不正当竞争，与奇虎360及其董事长周鸿祎发生过多次激烈的法律纠纷。
description.en: A Chinese software company. In 2008, it jointly released the free 'Google-Kingsoft PowerWord Cooperative Edition' with Google. The company also had numerous intense legal conflicts with Qihoo 360 and its chairman Zhou Hongyi over commercial defamation and unfair competition.

location.zh-cn: 美国密苏里州克雷夫科尔

description.zh-cn: 一家美国农业生物技术公司，曾是全球转基因种子的领先生产商。2018年被拜耳公司收购。
description.en: An American agricultural biotechnology corporation that was a leading producer of genetically engineered seeds. It was acquired by Bayer in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗朱瞻基的第二位皇后、明英宗的生母。她原为贵妃，在胡善祥被废后成为皇后。在土木堡之变后，她任命当时为郕王的朱祁钰为监国。
description.en: The second empress consort of the Xuande Emperor (Zhu Zhanji) and the birth mother of Emperor Yingzong. She was originally a noble consort and became empress after Hu Shanxiang was deposed. Following the Tumu Crisis, she appointed Zhu Qiyu, then Prince of Cheng, as regent.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明英宗与孝肃皇后之子。他原为太子，曾被景泰帝废黜，后复位并即位为帝。即位后，他恢复了叔叔景泰帝的帝号，并为于谦平反。他亦是明世宗之祖父。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty, son of Emperor Yingzong and Empress Xiaosu. He was originally the crown prince, deposed by the Jingtai Emperor, but later reinstated and ascended the throne. Upon his ascension, he restored his uncle's imperial title and rehabilitated Yu Qian. He was also the grandfather of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国末期卫国商人，后成为秦国相国（丞相）及政治家，对秦始皇亲政前有重要影响，并被秦始皇尊为“仲父”。传说他可能为秦始皇生父，并曾将嫪毐引荐给赵太后。他广招门客编撰《吕氏春秋》，是先秦杂家的代表人物之一，对秦王政统一六国的事业有重大贡献。
description.en: A merchant from the state of Wei during the late Warring States period, who later became the Chancellor and a politician of the state of Qin. He was influential during Qin Shi Huang's early reign and honored as 'Second Father' by him. He is also rumored to be Qin Shi Huang's biological father. He gathered scholars to compile the 'Lüshi Chunqiu' and is a representative figure of the Miscellaneous School of thought, making significant contributions to Qin's unification of the six states.

description.zh-cn: 战国末年秦国人物，秦始皇之母赵姬的面首。后因发动叛乱失败被车裂处死。
description.en: Lover of Queen Dowager Zhao, later executed for rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇长子，原定的皇位继承人。
description.en: The eldest son and original heir of Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇幼子，秦朝第二位皇帝。
description.en: The youngest son of Qin Shi Huang and the second emperor of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相、文学家、书法家，法家代表人物，韩非的同学。在秦始皇焚书坑儒时，他将《周易》列为医术占卜之书，使其免于被毁。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty, a key Legalist figure, a writer, calligrapher, and a fellow student of Han Fei. During Emperor Qin Shi Huang's 'burning of books and burying of scholars', he classified the I Ching as a book of medicine and divination, thus sparing it from destruction.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝宦官，中车府令，与李斯合谋发动沙丘之变，后陷害李斯。
description.en: A powerful eunuch of the Qin dynasty and a key conspirator in the Sand Dune Coup.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，秦灭六国战争中的主要将领之一。
description.en: A leading general of the state of Qin during the wars of unification.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期战国末期韩国法家思想家，法家思想的代表人物与集大成者。他著有《韩非子》一书。曾多次上书韩桓惠王，要求推行法治以图富强。他曾援引《老子》的思想，后为李斯的同学，但最终被李斯所害。
description.en: A representative and synthesizer of Legalist thought from the State of Han during China's pre-Qin period (late Warring States period). He authored 'Han Feizi', and repeatedly submitted memorials to King Huanhui of Han, advocating for the rule of law to strengthen the state. He also cited the ideas of Laozi. A fellow student of Li Si, he was ultimately executed by him.

description.zh-cn: 他是楚考烈王之子，同时也是秦昭襄王的外孙，其母是嫁给楚考烈王的秦国公主。他曾任秦国丞相，并以秦国公子身份奉命平定嫪毐之乱，后叛秦归楚。
description.en: Son of King Kaolie of Chu and grandson of King Zhaoxiang of Qin, his mother was a Qin princess who married King Kaolie. He served as Chancellor of Qin, was honored as a Prince of Qin, and was ordered to suppress the Lao Ai rebellion, before rebelling and returning to Chu.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期刺客，受燕太子丹之托刺杀秦王失败。
description.en: An assassin of the late Warring States period, known for his failed attempt to assassinate Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，出身于韩国贵族，其祖父与父亲曾五代相韩。曾策划博浪沙行刺秦始皇，后为汉初三杰之一。汉初，曾作为大臣为吕后出谋划策，保住太子刘盈的地位。
description.en: A founding father of the Han Dynasty, who came from the nobility of the State of Han, and whose grandfather and father served as chancellors to five generations of Han rulers. He plotted an assassination attempt on Qin Shi Huang at Bolangsha and later became a key strategist for the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统的中央集权制封建王朝。它始置丞相一职。秦朝平定百越后，今天的新界被纳入其版图。
description.en: The first unified, centralized feudal imperial dynasty in Chinese history. It established the position of Chancellor. After the Qin conquered the Baiyue peoples, the area of the modern New Territories was incorporated into its territory.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代的诸侯国，姬姓韩氏，由三家分晋而来。作为战国七雄之一，它是第一个被秦国所灭的国家，也是著名思想家韩非的母国。为消耗秦国国力，延缓其东征步伐，它曾派遣水工郑国赴秦游说修建水渠。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, of the Ji family name and Han clan, originated from the Partition of Jin. As one of the Seven Warring States, it was the first to be conquered by the State of Qin and was the home state of the famous philosopher Han Fei. To drain the resources of the State of Qin and slow its eastward expansion, it once dispatched the hydraulic engineer Zheng Guo to persuade Qin to build a canal.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一，由三家分晋而来。
description.en: A state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States, which originated from the Partition of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 周朝时期位于长江中游地区的诸侯国，也是战国七雄之一。
description.en: A state in the middle Yangtze River region during the Zhou dynasty, and also one of the seven major states of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 古代中国南方和越南北部的各部落的统称。
description.en: A collective term for various tribes inhabiting Southern China and Northern Vietnam in ancient times.

description.zh-cn: 为抵御北方游牧民族而修筑的军事防御工程。
description.en: A series of fortifications built for military defense against northern nomadic peoples.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，被认为是防火长城的首要设计师。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, considered to be the principal designer of the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 美国科技公司，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: An American technology company that was a partner of Unihub.

description.zh-cn: 一种用于匿名通信的自由及开放源代码软件。
description.en: Free and open-source software for enabling anonymous communication.

description.zh-cn: 美国社交媒体集团。
description.en: An American social media conglomerate.

description.zh-cn: 美国社交网络及微博客服务的公司。
description.en: An American social network and microblogging service company.

description.zh-cn: 美国的“红色恐慌”浪潮，又称麦卡锡主义，是20世纪50年代初在美国发生的一系列反共政治迫害行为。它以在缺乏适当证据的情况下，指控支持左派的个人与团体不忠、颠覆或叛国为特点。此运动与台湾的白色恐怖相呼应，著名科学家钱学森是其受害者之一。时任总统艾森豪威尔曾暗中反对麦卡锡主义。
description.en: The "Red Scare" wave in the United States, also known as McCarthyism, was a series of anti-communist political persecutions that occurred in the U.S. in the early 1950s. It was characterized by making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or treason against individuals and groups supportive of the left, often without proper evidence. This movement echoed Taiwan's White Terror, with prominent scientist Qian Xuesen being among its victims. President Eisenhower covertly opposed McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中与赵家骧一同殉职。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action alongside Zhao Jiaxiang during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 淞沪会战末期的一场著名战斗，以八百壮士的英勇抵抗而闻名。
为淞沪会战编组的日军主要作战部队之一。
淞沪会战日军上海派遣军司令官，后任中支那方面军司令。
国军团附，率领八百壮士坚守四行仓库。
上海租界青帮大老、商人、政治人物，与黄金荣、张啸林并称“上海滩三大亨”。作为青帮头目及上海地方领袖，他在四一二事件中组织力量协助国民党清党，并利用其关系配合国军作战计划，在闸北秘密修建掩体。
description.en: Du Yuesheng was a prominent Green Gang boss, businessman, and political figure in the Shanghai International Settlement, known as one of "Shanghai's Big Three" alongside Huang Jinrong and Zhang Xiaolin. As a Green Gang leader and local Shanghai figure, he organized forces to assist the Kuomintang (KMT) in the party purge during the April 12th Incident, and also utilized his connections to cooperate with KMT military plans, secretly constructing bunkers in Zhabei.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共福建省委书记、福建省人大常委会主任、中共二十届中央委员。曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He is the current Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress, and a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP. He previously served as Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省台州专区天台县
birth_place.en: Tiantai County, Taizhou Prefecture, Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 古印度王朝，其君主阿育王大力推广佛教。
上座部佛教，是佛教两大现存分支之一，也是现存最古老的佛教宗派，主要流传于斯里兰卡和东南亚地区。其教义以巴利三藏为基础。
description.en: Theravada Buddhism, one of the two major existing branches of Buddhism and the oldest surviving Buddhist school, is primarily prevalent in Sri Lanka and Southeast Asia, with its teachings based on the Pāli Canon.

description.zh-cn: 大乘佛教是佛教三大主要现存分支之一，指以成佛为目标而修行的菩萨乘。其思想约在公元1世纪开始在印度流行，后成为北传佛教的主体，主要流传于东亚和西藏地区。
description.en: Mahāyāna Buddhism is one of the three main existing branches of Buddhism, referring to the Bodhisattva vehicle practiced by those who aim to achieve Buddhahood. Its teachings began to spread in India around the 1st century CE, later becoming the primary form of Northern Buddhism, predominantly prevalent in East Asia and Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 南北朝时代南梁开国皇帝，庙号高祖。他原为南齐宗室，后篡齐建梁，建立南梁王朝，在位近48年。晚年笃信佛教，大力扶持佛教发展，并推动汉传佛教素食传统。后因侯景之乱被囚禁饿死。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Southern Liang dynasty during the Northern and Southern dynasties period, with the temple name Gaozu. He was originally a member of the Southern Qi imperial clan, later usurped Qi to establish the Southern Liang dynasty, and reigned for nearly 48 years. In his later years, he became a devout Buddhist, vigorously supported the development of Buddhism, and promoted the vegetarian tradition of Chinese Buddhism. He was later imprisoned and starved to death during the Hou Jing Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 印度佛教僧侣，被尊为中国禅宗的初祖，亦是禅宗西天二十八祖。他在少林寺传授禅修，使少林寺成为禅宗祖庭。
description.en: An Indian Buddhist monk, revered as the first patriarch of Zen Buddhism in China and the 28th patriarch of Zen in India. He taught Zen meditation at the Shaolin Temple, establishing it as the ancestral temple of Zen.

description.zh-cn: 汉传佛教的一个主要宗派，由菩提达摩传入中国。
唐代文学家、思想家、政治家，因上《谏迎佛骨表》而著名，持反对佛教立场。
汉朝开国皇帝，史称汉高祖。他击败项羽，统一中国，奠定西汉王朝，并建立了涿郡。他也是刘盈（汉惠帝）、鲁元公主之父，同时是刘秀的九世祖。
description.en: The founder and first emperor of the Han dynasty, known as Emperor Gaozu of Han. He defeated Xiang Yu in the Chu–Han Contention, unifying China, establishing the Western Han dynasty, and founding Zhuo Commandery. He was the father of Liu Ying (Emperor Hui) and Princess Yuan of Lu, and also the ninth-generation ancestor of Liu Xiu.

description.zh-cn: 王莽是西汉末年的政治人物、外戚及权臣。他曾任大司马，后篡夺西汉政权，建立新朝，成为新朝的开国皇帝和唯一一位皇帝。其改革失败导致天下大乱，最终被起义军推翻。
description.en: Wang Mang was a political figure, consort kin, and powerful minister in the late Western Han dynasty. He served as Grand Marshal, later usurped the Western Han regime, established the Xin dynasty, and became its founding and sole emperor. His failed reforms led to widespread chaos, and he was eventually overthrown by rebel forces.

description.zh-cn: 王莽建立的中国朝代，取代西汉，介于西汉与东汉之间。因改革失败及天灾人祸，最终被农民起义推翻。
description.en: A dynasty established by Wang Mang that replaced the Western Han. It was eventually overthrown by peasant uprisings due to failed reforms and natural disasters.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝。他是曹操与卞氏的嫡长子，也是曹昂的异母弟。他接受汉献帝禅让，结束东汉，并在称帝后追尊曹昂为王。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei. He was the eldest son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian, and also the half-brother of Cao Ang. After ascending to the throne, he posthumously honored Cao Ang as a king.

description.zh-cn: 秦末义军领袖之一，西楚霸王，后在楚汉战争中败给刘邦。许贡在给汉献帝的上表中曾将孙策与他相提并论。
description.en: Leader of the anti-Qin rebellion, Hegemon-King of Western Chu. He was later defeated by Liu Bang in the Chu-Han Contention. Xu Gong once compared Sun Ce to him in his memorial to Emperor Xian.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，汉惠帝刘盈和鲁元公主的母亲。刘邦死后，她临朝称制，掌握汉朝实权。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang), and the mother of Emperor Hui (Liu Ying) and Princess Yuan of Lu. After Liu Bang's death, she ruled as empress dowager and regent, holding de facto power over the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第二位皇帝，汉高祖刘邦与皇后吕雉之子，鲁元公主的弟弟。他在位期间，推行黄老学说，注重国家的休养生息和无为而治。
description.en: The second emperor of the Han Dynasty, son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and Empress Lü Zhi, and younger brother of Princess Yuan of Lu. During his reign, he promoted Huang-Lao philosophy, focusing on national recuperation and governance through inaction.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，汉初杰出的军事家，与张良、萧何并称“汉初三杰”，与彭越、英布并称“汉初三大名将”，被后人誉为“兵仙”、“国士无双”。他军事才能卓著，是楚汉战争中的重要将领。后因功高震主被猜忌，先被刘邦用陈平之计擒获，最终被吕后处死。
description.en: A founding general and outstanding military strategist of the Western Han dynasty, he was a key figure and one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han dynasty' during the Chu-Han Contention. Renowned as a 'military immortal' and 'peerless national scholar' for his exceptional military talent, he was later captured by Liu Bang using Chen Ping's strategy and ultimately executed by Empress Lü due to suspicion arising from his great achievements.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第五位皇帝，汉高祖刘邦第四子，鲁元公主异母弟。在诸吕之乱平定后，由陈平、周勃等大臣拥立为帝。他与其子汉景帝共同开创了“文景之治”的盛世。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, fourth son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu. He was enthroned by ministers including Chen Ping and Zhou Bo after the Lü Clan Disturbance was quashed. Along with his son Emperor Jing, he initiated the prosperous 'Rule of Wen and Jing'.

description.zh-cn: 古代连接东西方的商贸路线，以东汉首都洛阳为东方起点。
description.en: An ancient network of trade routes connecting the East and West, with its eastern starting point in Luoyang, the capital of the Eastern Han dynasty.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省湖州市吴兴区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、记者。

birth_place.en: Dangshan County, Song Prefecture, Tang Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期后梁的开国皇帝。原为唐末参与黄巢起事的将领，后归降唐朝，官至宣武军节度使，逐渐控制朝政。907年篡唐自立，建立后梁。后为其子朱友珪所弑。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Later Liang dynasty during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. He was originally a general in the Huang Chao Rebellion in the late Tang dynasty, later surrendering to the Tang and rising to the position of military governor (jiedushi) of the Xuanwu Army, gradually seizing control of the imperial court. In 907, he usurped the Tang throne and established the Later Liang. He was later assassinated by his son, Zhu Yougui.

en: Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 唐朝灭亡后中国历史上的一个时期。
唐朝倒数第二位皇帝，唐懿宗第七子，唐僖宗的弟弟。在位期间，他试图削除藩镇与宦官势力，但后期反被军阀挟制，最终被朱温所杀。
description.en: The second to last emperor of the Tang dynasty, the seventh son of Emperor Yizong and younger brother of Emperor Xizong. During his reign, he attempted to eliminate the power of military governors (fanzhen) and eunuchs, but was later controlled by warlords and ultimately killed by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 莫斯科大公和首位俄罗斯沙皇。
description.en: Grand Prince of Moscow and the first Tsar of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期，对五类“阶级敌人”（地主、富农、反革命分子、坏分子、右派分子）的统称，也是红卫兵运动的主要打击对象。
description.en: A collective term during the Cultural Revolution for five types of "class enemies" (landlords, rich peasants, counter-revolutionaries, bad elements, and rightists), who were also the main targets of the Red Guard movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，北京师范大学女子附属中学党总支书记兼副校长。在1966年“红八月”期间，被该校红卫兵学生批斗殴打致死，是北京市首位在文革中被打死的教育工作者。其丈夫是历史学者王晶垚。
description.en: A Chinese educator, Party Branch Secretary and Vice Principal of the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School. During the 'Red August' of 1966, she was beaten to death by her Red Guard students during a struggle session, becoming the first educator killed in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution. Her husband was historian Wang Jingyao.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国第二位天皇。
日本江户时代的一个藩，位于本州岛最西部。在幕末时期，它与萨摩藩结成萨长同盟，是倒幕运动的核心力量之一。
description.en: A feudal domain of Japan during the Edo period, located at the westernmost tip of Honshu. During the Bakumatsu period, it formed the Satcho Alliance with the Satsuma Domain and was one of the core forces in the movement to overthrow the Tokugawa shogunate.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜独立运动家，因暗杀伊藤博文而闻名。
description.en: A Korean independence activist.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军大将、政治家，第四十任内阁总理大臣，太平洋战争期间担任日本首相，是日本军国主义的代表人物。1943年在东京会见汪精卫。
description.en: A general of the Imperial Japanese Army and politician, he served as the 40th Prime Minister of Japan during the Pacific War and was a representative figure of Japanese militarism. He met with Wang Jingwei in Tokyo in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 上海青帮头目，“上海滩三大亨”之一。
上海青帮头目，“上海滩三大亨”之一，后与日本合作。
京剧老生演员，杜月笙五房太太，曾与梅兰芳有过一段未获家族承认的婚姻关系。
description.en: A Peking Opera Laosheng actress, Du Yuesheng's fifth wife, who had a relationship with Mei Lanfang that was not recognized by his family.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡华人，新加坡前总理李显龙的第二任妻子、前第一夫人。她曾长期担任淡马锡控股的执行董事及首席执行长，该公司是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。现为清华大学经济管理学院顾问委员会委员。
description.en: A Singaporean Chinese businesswoman, the second wife of former Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, and former First Lady of Singapore. She served for many years as the Executive Director and CEO of Temasek Holdings, which is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital. She is currently a member of the advisory board of the Tsinghua University School of Economics and Management.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的岛国和城邦，前英国殖民地。曾于1963年至1965年短暂加入马来西亚联邦，后于1965年独立建国。该地亦是邵维铭的出生地及主要活动地。巩俐于2008年成为其公民。
description.en: An island country and city-state in Southeast Asia. Formerly a British colony, it briefly joined the Federation of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965 before becoming an independent nation in 1965. It is also the birthplace and main place of activity for Shao Vee-Meng. Gong Li became a citizen in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的执政党，由李光耀等人于1954年创立。该党自1959年新加坡自治以来长期掌权，在与马来西亚联邦政府的政治较量中扮演核心角色，并奉行保守主义、经济自由主义和实用主义等意识形态。
description.en: The ruling political party of Singapore, founded in 1954 by Lee Kuan Yew and others. It has been in power since Singapore's self-governance in 1959, played a central role in the political struggle with the Malaysian federal government, and adheres to ideologies such as conservatism, economic liberalism, and pragmatism.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾任新加坡第二任总理，并于1992年至2004年担任人民行动党秘书长。他还在1997年大选后控告邓亮洪诽谤。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the second Prime Minister of Singapore and as the Secretary-General of the People's Action Party from 1992 to 2004. He also sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation after the 1997 general election.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨首相。
description.en: Prime Minister of Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗朱瞻基的原配皇后，后被废为道姑，道号静慈仙师。明英宗时恢复皇后名誉，追谥为恭让诚顺康穆静慈章皇后。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Xuande Emperor of the Ming Dynasty. She was later deposed and forced to become a Daoist nun with the title 'Jingci Xianshi'. Her title of empress was posthumously restored by Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相，因推行绥靖政策而闻名。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, known for his policy of appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 二战时期的英国国王。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 前英国女王，在丘吉尔第二次首相任期内登基。她同时也是前加拿大女王，曾御准《1982年加拿大法令》。此外，她于1960年授予香港赛马会“皇家”称号。
description.en: Former Queen of the United Kingdom, who ascended to the throne during Churchill's second term as Prime Minister. She was also the former Queen of Canada and gave Royal Assent to the Canada Act 1982. Additionally, she granted the 'Royal' title to The Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1960.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的最高行政官职。该职位在胡惟庸案后被朱元璋废除。
description.en: The highest administrative office in ancient China. The position was abolished by the Hongwu Emperor after the Hu Weiyong case.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立，其基础由曹操奠定，后接受了刘禅的投降。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period. It was founded by Cao Pi, with its foundations laid by Cao Cao, and later accepted Liu Shan's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮长子，蜀汉大臣、将领。
description.en: Eldest son of Zhuge Liang, a minister and general of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮好友，曾向刘备举荐诸葛亮。
description.en: Friend of Zhuge Liang, recommended Zhuge Liang to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘备重要谋士，与诸葛亮齐名，号称“凤雏”。
description.en: An important advisor to Liu Bei, as famous as Zhuge Liang, known as the 'Fledgling Phoenix'.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉参军。在街亭之战中因违背诸葛亮部署导致大败，后被诸葛亮处斩。
description.en: A military advisor of Shu Han, executed by Zhuge Liang after his defeat at the Battle of Jieting due to disobeying orders.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的太傅、政治家、军事家、权臣，西晋的奠基人。诸葛亮北伐时的主要对手，高平陵之变后掌控曹魏大权。
description.en: A strategist, politician, and regent of the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period of China, and the founder of the Jin dynasty. He was also the primary adversary of Zhuge Liang during the Northern Expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 一种由天花病毒引起的烈性传染病。
中华人民共和国公务员体系和中国共产党、国家领导人职务级别中的一个等级，仅次于国家级正职。罗豪才曾因担任全国政协副主席而位列其中。陈良宇在担任中共中央政治局委员后也达到此级别。
description.en: A rank in the civil service system and one of the leadership position levels in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, second only to the national-level principal position. Luo Haocai held this rank as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, and Chen Liangyu also reached this level after becoming a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国民间义士，斧头帮领袖。
description.en: A Chinese folk hero and leader of the Axe Gang during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 军统总务处处长
美国女记者。
中国历史上继西周之后的朝代。
description.en: The second half of the Zhou dynasty of ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 道教的最高神祇。
description.en: The highest deities in the Taoist pantheon.

description.zh-cn: 毛新宇的第一任妻子。
美国第28任总统，进步主义时代的领袖人物，其政治理念被称为“威尔逊主义”。他曾是学者、普林斯顿大学校长和新泽西州州长，并任命罗斯福为海军助理部长。他领导美国参加第一次世界大战，并倡导建立国际联盟。
description.en: The 28th President of the United States, a leader of the Progressive Era, whose political philosophy is known as 'Wilsonianism'. He was an academic, President of Princeton University, and Governor of New Jersey, and he appointed Roosevelt as Assistant Secretary of the Navy. He led the United States into World War I and advocated for the formation of the League of Nations.

en: List of presidents of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国国家元首和政府首脑的职位。
description.en: The office of the head of state and head of government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战末期，美、英、苏三国（罗斯福、丘吉尔、斯大林）首脑举行会议，商讨战后世界秩序。会议中，苏联秘密承诺在德国投降后对日作战，同时达成的协议规定了苏联在远东的利益，为1945年《中苏友好同盟条约》的签订奠定了基础。
description.en: A conference held by the heads of government of the US, UK, and Soviet Union (Roosevelt, Churchill, and Stalin) near the end of World War II to discuss the post-war reorganization of the world. During the conference, the USSR secretly committed to entering the war against Japan after Germany's surrender. The agreements also defined Soviet interests in the Far East, laying the groundwork for the 1945 Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学，约翰·F·肯尼迪于1940年毕业于此。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, from which John F. Kennedy graduated in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 南明第一位皇帝。他为建文帝平反并上庙号谥号，追尊景泰帝庙号为代宗。此外，他还追赠方孝孺为太师，谥号“文正”。
description.en: The first emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty. He rehabilitated Emperor Jianwen and granted him temple and posthumous names. He also posthumously honored Emperor Jingtai with the temple name 'Daizong', and granted Fang Xiaoru the title of Grand Preceptor and the posthumous name 'Wenzheng'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任花莲县县长。她是傅崐萁的妻子，傅兆林之儿媳。她与傅崐萁先后领导下的花莲县政府被合称为“傅氏王朝”。
description.en: A Republic of China politician and Kuomintang member, she is the current Hualien County Magistrate. She is the wife of Fu Kun-chi and daughter-in-law of Fu Zhaolin. The Hualien County Government under their successive leadership is collectively referred to as the 'Fu Dynasty'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾商人及前公务员。曾任台湾省政府建设厅工程师及住宅及都市发展局处长，后从商担任凯聚集团、茂凯公司董事长，亦曾任德发慈善基金董事长。其子为政治人物傅崐萁。曾因在1997年亚洲金融风暴期间违反公司法，于2010年被判处缓刑。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman and former civil servant. He served as an engineer in the Department of Construction and a director of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government. He later entered business as the chairman of Kai Chu Group and Mao Kai Company, and also served as chairman of the De Fa Charitable Foundation. His son is the politician Fu Kun-chi. He received a suspended sentence in 2010 for violating company law during the 1997 Asian financial crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任基隆市市长。
科普作家，以学术打假著称。他撰文批评《穹顶之下》，质疑其数据和叙事手法的真实性。
description.en: A popular science writer known for exposing academic misconduct. He wrote an article criticizing 'Under the Dome', questioning the authenticity of its data and narrative.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演、编剧、演员。曾出席在华中师范大学举行的电影《我不是潘金莲》研讨会。
description.en: Chinese film director, screenwriter, and actor. Attended a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、编剧。曾出席在华中师范大学举行的电影《我不是潘金莲》研讨会。
description.en: Chinese writer and screenwriter. Attended a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手、模特儿、制片人，范丞丞的姐姐。她曾因在华中师范大学参加活动时被劝离而引发关注。
description.en: A Chinese actress, singer, model, and producer, and sister of Fan Chengcheng. She once garnered attention after being asked to leave an event at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆著名喜剧演员、影视演员，擅长小品和东北二人转。
中国演员

zh-cn: 中国东方航空5735号班机空难

description.zh-cn: 西汉初年政治家、开国功臣，汉初三杰之一，西汉第一位相国。
description.en: An early Western Han politician and founding minister, one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han Dynasty', and the first chancellor of the Western Han.

description.zh-cn: 西汉初年异姓王，汉初三大名将之一。
西汉初年异姓王，汉初三大名将之一。
西汉初年的开国功臣，汉高祖刘邦的重要谋臣。后任丞相，在吕后逝世后，与周勃等人共同发动了“诛吕安刘”政变。
description.en: A founding minister of the early Western Han Dynasty and an important strategist for Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang. He later served as chancellor and, after the death of Empress Lü, jointly launched the 'Purge of the Lü Clan' coup with Zhou Bo and others.

description.zh-cn: 金日成长女，金正日的妹妹，张成泽的妻子。
唐代文学家、诗人，中唐最具代表性的诗人之一。他文章精切，特别擅长写诗，代表作有《长恨歌》。他倡导新乐府运动，其诗歌作品平易近人，流传甚广。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and poet, and one of the most representative poets of the mid-Tang period. He was known for his incisive prose and exceptional skill in poetry, with 'Song of Everlasting Sorrow' being a representative work. He advocated the New Yuefu movement, and his poetry is known for its accessibility and widespread popularity.

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州圣塔芭rbara

description.zh-cn: 白崇禧第五子，台湾著名作家，中华民国文学家及剧作家。
国防部保密局特务
理查德·尼克松获得法律博士学位的法学院。
description.en: The law school from which Richard Nixon earned his law degree.

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员，理查德·尼克松曾担任此职。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government, an office held by Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职的重大政治丑闻。
description.en: A major political scandal that led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，时任并州刺史，为吕布的旧主。在洛阳与董卓对峙时，被其义子吕布所杀。
description.en: An official of the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as the Inspector of Bing Province and was Lü Bu's original master. During a standoff with Dong Zhuo in Luoyang, he was killed by his adopted son Lü Bu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀及权臣，原为凉州将领，受大将军何进征召率兵入京，趁乱夺取中央政权，废黜汉少帝，另立汉献帝，自封相国，独揽大权。他官至太师，是李傕、郭汜等人的原主帅。其统治残暴，乱政导致许靖等人逃离京城，并引发关东诸侯讨伐。最终被司徒王允和义子吕布合谋刺杀。
description.en: A warlord and powerful minister in the late Eastern Han dynasty. Originally a general from Liang Province, he was summoned to the capital by General-in-Chief He Jin, where he seized central power amidst the chaos, deposing Emperor Shao and installing Emperor Xian, proclaiming himself Chancellor and monopolizing authority. He served as Grand Tutor and was the original commander of figures like Li Jue and Guo Si. His tyrannical rule and misgovernment caused people like Xu Jing to flee the capital and provoked a crusade by a coalition of warlords. He was ultimately assassinated in a plot by Minister over the Masses Wang Yun and his adopted son Lü Bu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，官至司徒。不满董卓专权，设计反间计，联合吕布成功刺杀了董卓。董卓死后，未能妥善处理其凉州旧部，导致李傕、郭汜反攻长安，最终兵败被杀。
description.en: An official of the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as Minister over the Masses.
