Dissatisfied with Dong Zhuo's tyranny, he devised a plot and successfully assassinated Dong Zhuo in collaboration with Lü Bu. After Dong Zhuo's death, his mishandling of Dong's former subordinates led to a counterattack on Chang'an by Li Jue and Guo Si, resulting in his defeat and death.

description.zh-cn: 吕布的主要谋士。
唐朝初年宰相、外戚，长孙皇后之兄。他曾在玄武门之变中与房玄龄等人并功第一，并在储位之争中支持立晋王李治为太子。
description.en: An early Tang dynasty chancellor and imperial relative, brother of Empress Zhangsun. He was ranked first in merit, along with Fang Xuanling and others, for his role in the Xuanwu Gate Incident, and later supported establishing Prince Jin (Li Zhi) as the crown prince during the succession struggle.

description.zh-cn: 西藏流亡政府。
description.en: Tibetan government-in-exile.

en: Seventeen Point Agreement for the Peaceful Liberation of Tibet
zh-cn: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府与西藏地方政府签订的关于西藏和平解放的协议。
description.en: The agreement signed by the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China and the local government of Tibet regarding the peaceful liberation of Tibet.

en: Tunku Abdul Rahman Putra Al-Haj ibni Almarhum Sultan Abdul Hamid Halim Shah
zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼不大拉·聂尼阿鲁马空苏丹阿都哈密·哈林沙

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第一任首相，巫统前领导人。他被尊称为马来西亚“国父”。在其任期内，他下令将新加坡州自马来西亚联邦中除名。他的接班人为敦阿都拉萨。
description.en: First Prime Minister of Malaysia and former leader of UMNO. He is revered as the "Father of Malaysia". During his tenure, he ordered the removal of the State of Singapore from the Federation of Malaysia. He was succeeded by Tun Abdul Razak.

description.zh-cn: 淡马锡控股是一家总部位于新加坡的国际投资公司，曾由何晶主掌。它作为新加坡国有控股公司，也是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: Temasek Holdings is an international investment company headquartered in Singapore, formerly headed by Ho Ching. As a Singaporean state-owned holding company, it is also a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，现任卓荣泰内阁劳动部部长。
description.en: Minister of Labor in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校75年班（中八期）校友。现为台湾政治人物及军事评论员。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the class of 1986 (8th class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School. He is currently a Taiwanese politician and military commentator.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、政治幕僚、政治评论人、节目主持人。
周慧敏的丈夫，亦舒的侄子，作家倪匡之子。
description.en: Yi Shu's nephew, son of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 香港的媒体创作及管理人，曾赏识周慧敏。
台湾歌手及音乐制作人，曾与周慧敏合唱《流言》。
香港歌手及演员，周慧敏的好友，其演唱会创作总监。
中国近现代著名建筑师、作家、诗人、建筑学家，中国历史上第一位女建筑学者。她曾是宾夕法尼亚大学校友，后任清华大学建筑系教授，并担任中华人民共和国国徽设计小组的主要成员。她也是梁思成的第一任妻子。
description.en: Famous modern Chinese architect, writer, poet, and the first female architect in Chinese history. An alumna of the University of Pennsylvania, she later became a professor at the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University and a key member of the design group for the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China. She was also the first wife of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市曼哈顿的世界顶级私立研究型大学。该校曾向流亡美国的魏京生提供支持（后于2001年中止），汤川秀树曾在此担任客座教授。罗豪才曾在此进修，萧美琴在此获得政治学硕士学位。
description.en: A world-class private research university in Manhattan, New York City, United States. It provided support to Wei Jingsheng after his exile to the U.S. (terminated in 2001), and Hideki Yukawa served as a visiting professor. Luo Haocai pursued advanced studies here, and Hsiao Bi-khim earned her Master's degree in Political Science.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，于弘治九年为宋濂平反。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty, who rehabilitated Song Lian in the ninth year of the Hongzhi era.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的宠妃，比宪宗年长17岁。
description.en: The favorite consort of the Chenghua Emperor, 17 years his senior.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗第四子，明世宗的生父，被追尊为“睿宗献皇帝”。
description.en: Fourth son of Emperor Xianzong, biological father of Emperor Shizong, posthumously honored as 'Emperor Ruizong Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的长子，生母为刘夫人，由嫡母丁夫人抚养成人。二十岁时举为孝廉。后在曹操征伐张绣的宛城之战中，为救父亲而阵亡。他是曹丕与曹植的异母兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Cao Cao. His birth mother was Lady Liu, and he was raised by his adoptive mother, Lady Ding. At the age of twenty, he was nominated as Xiaolian. He was killed in the Battle of Wancheng while saving his father during the campaign against Zhang Xiu. He was the half-brother of Cao Pi and Cao Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 魏明帝，曹魏第二位皇帝，曹丕与文昭甄皇后之子，亦是曹昂的侄子。他在位期间（诸葛亮北伐期间）成功防御吴、蜀的多次攻伐，平定公孙渊叛乱，并改谥曹昂为丰愍王。
description.en: Emperor Ming of Wei, the second emperor of Cao Wei, was the son of Cao Pi and Empress Zhen, and the nephew of Cao Ang. During his reign, which coincided with Zhuge Liang's Northern Expeditions, he successfully defended against multiple invasions from Wu and Shu, suppressed Gongsun Yuan's rebellion, and posthumously honored Cao Ang as King Min of Feng.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏文帝曹丕的妻妾，魏明帝曹叡的生母，原为袁熙之妻。
曹魏时期创立的，并成为魏晋南北朝时期主要的官员选拔制度，后被隋文帝废除。
description.en: An official selection system established during the Cao Wei period, which became the primary system for selecting officials during the Wei, Jin, Northern and Southern dynasties, and was later abolished by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，官至大司马、大将军。他受曹丕遗诏辅佐曹叡，并在诸葛亮北伐前期担任曹魏方的总指挥。
description.en: A famous general of the Cao Wei imperial clan, he rose to Grand Marshal and General-in-Chief. Entrusted by Cao Pi's will to assist Cao Rui, he served as the overall commander of the Wei forces during the early stages of Zhuge Liang's Northern Expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，托孤大臣之一。
东汉末年至三国时期曹魏重要将领，曹操的堂弟。因其吝啬曾得罪曹丕，一度被下狱免官，后得卞太后求情赦免。官至骠骑将军，死后谥为恭侯。
description.en: An important general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the Three Kingdoms period, and a cousin of Cao Cao. Due to his stinginess, he offended Cao Pi and was once imprisoned and dismissed from office, but was later pardoned after Empress Dowager Bian interceded. He reached the rank of General of Chariots and Cavalry and was posthumously honored as Marquis Gong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操与卞氏的次子。
description.en: The second son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian.

description.zh-cn: 曹操从弟，曹魏重要将领。
曹魏将领。
东汉末年孙吴势力的重要将领。他接替鲁肃的职务，并提出了袭取荆州的计划，且成功执行。在《三国演义》中，他设计袭取荆州，最终导致关羽败亡。
description.en: An important general serving under Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He succeeded Lu Su's position, proposed and successfully executed the plan to seize Jing Province. In 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', he is depicted as devising the plan to seize Jing Province, ultimately leading to Guan Yu's defeat and death.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代的将领，曾先后效力于刘璋、刘备和曹魏。
description.en: A general during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China, who served successively under Liu Zhang, Liu Bei, and Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉南郡太守，后投降东吴。
中国东汉末年至三国时代曹魏的著名将领。
description.en: A famous general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年孙吴势力的将领、战略家及外交家，为孙权策划了“榻上策”，并接替周瑜掌管军队，积极主张并维护孙刘联盟以共同对抗曹操。
description.en: A general, strategist, and diplomat serving under Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He devised the 'Tashang Ce' strategy for Sun Quan, succeeded Zhou Yu as a military commander, and was a key advocate for the Sun-Liu alliance against Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的伴侣，金正恩之母。
description.en: Partner of Kim Jong-il, mother of Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任第87-89任内阁总理大臣。他是安倍晋三在政坛的重要提携者，曾任命安倍为内阁官房长官，并支持其接任首相。此外，石破茂也在其内阁中首次入阁，担任防卫厅长官。
description.en: A Japanese politician who served as the 87th-89th Prime Minister of Japan. He was a key mentor to Shinzo Abe in politics, appointing him as Chief Cabinet Secretary and supporting him as his successor. Additionally, Shigeru Ishiba first entered his cabinet as Director General of the Defense Agency.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇的皇后，德仁天皇的祖母。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Shōwa, grandmother of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，曾任学习院院长，对裕仁进行教育。
description.en: An Imperial Japanese Army general who served as the director of the Gakushūin Peer's School and educated Hirohito.

description.zh-cn: 日本海军元帅，曾任东宫御学问所总裁，对裕仁进行教育。
description.en: A fleet admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy who served as the president of the Tōgū Gogakumonsho and educated Hirohito.

description.zh-cn: 英国国王，裕仁1921年访欧时曾与其会面。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom, met with Hirohito during his European tour in 1921.

zh-cn: 关东军防疫给水部本部

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军关东军防疫给水部本部的通称号，由石井四郎领导。该部队在抗日战争和第二次世界大战期间，从事生物战、细菌战和人体试验，对包括中国人、苏联人、朝鲜人及同盟国战俘在内的活人进行惨无人道的实验，犯下严重的战争罪和危害人类罪。
description.en: The codename for the headquarters of the Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department of the Kwantung Army of the Imperial Japanese Army, led by Shirō Ishii. During the Second Sino-Japanese War and World War II, this unit engaged in biological warfare, bacteriological warfare, and human experimentation, conducting inhumane experiments on living subjects including Chinese, Soviets, Koreans, and Allied prisoners of war, committing severe war crimes and crimes against humanity.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军中的政治派系，发动了二二六兵变但失败。
description.en: A political faction in the Imperial Japanese Army which launched the failed February 26 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的神社，供奉自明治维新以来为日本战死的军人及军属。
description.en: A Shinto shrine in Tokyo, Japan, dedicated to those who died in service of Japan from the Meiji Restoration.

en: Imperial Rescript on the Termination of the War

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇于1945年8月15日向日本国民广播的停战诏书，由其亲自宣读，宣布日本接受《波茨坦宣言》并结束战争。此次广播被称为“玉音放送”。
description.en: The rescript read by Emperor Hirohito on August 15, 1945, announcing Japan's surrender, its acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration, and the end of the war. The radio broadcast of this rescript is known as the Gyokuon-hōsō.

description.zh-cn: 胡志明是该党的创始人之一。
东汉末年的政治家、战略家，曹操的主要谋臣之一。
曹魏将领，曹操的从兄弟
中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的著名将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China. He held the title of General Who Conquers the West at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的市，位于台湾西北部，为新竹都会区的中心城市。因九降风强盛而被称为“风城”，是全球高科技代工产业的重镇。
description.en: A city in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, located in the northwestern part of Taiwan. It is the central city of the Hsinchu metropolitan area. Known as the "Windy City" due to strong seasonal winds, it is a major hub for the global high-tech contract manufacturing industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任新北市市长，曾代表该党参选2024年中华民国总统选举。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, a member of the Kuomintang (KMT), current Mayor of New Taipei City, who previously represented the party in the 2024 Republic of China presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的妻子。
项羽的主要谋士，被项羽尊为“亚父”。
description.en: A key advisor to Xiang Yu, who honored him as 'Second Father'.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年将领，受命于秦二世，率军镇压陈胜、吴广的起义。后投降项羽，被封为雍王。
description.en: A general at the end of the Qin Dynasty, who was ordered by Qin Er Shi to lead an army to suppress the uprising of Chen Sheng and Wu Guang. He later surrendered to Xiang Yu and was enfeoffed as King Yong.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的宠妃，赵王刘如意之母。刘邦死后，遭吕后残害，被制成“人彘”。
description.en: A favored consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang, and the mother of Liu Ruyi, the Prince of Zhao. After Liu Bang's death, she was brutally mutilated by Empress Lü Zhi and turned into a 'human swine'.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦第三子，其母为戚夫人。他被封为赵王，是鲁元公主和刘盈的异母弟。因刘邦宠爱，曾差点取代太子位，后被吕后毒杀。
description.en: The third son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and Concubine Qi. He was enfeoffed as the King of Zhao and was the half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu and Liu Ying. Due to Liu Bang's favor, he nearly replaced the crown prince, but was later poisoned to death by Empress Lü Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦的妃嫔，汉文帝刘恒之母。
苏联秘密警察头子，被怀疑谋杀了斯大林。
description.en: Head of the Soviet secret police, suspected of murdering Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的政治家、文学家、史学家、大儒，被朱元璋誉为“开国文臣之首”，是方孝孺的老师。他因孙子宋慎牵连进胡惟庸案受株连，虽曾因马皇后求情获赦，最终仍被贬死于四川夔州。
description.en: A politician, writer, historian, and prominent Confucian scholar of the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties, hailed by Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang as the 'head of the founding civil officials', and the teacher of Fang Xiaoru. He was implicated in the Hu Weiyong case due to his grandson Song Shen. Although initially pardoned through Empress Ma's intercession, he was eventually exiled and died in Kuizhou, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 织田信长的家臣，发动本能寺之变。
丰臣秀吉的侧室，丰臣秀赖的生母。
丰臣秀吉的正室。
日本战国时代著名的茶道宗师，后被丰臣秀吉赐死。
台湾政治人物，曾任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as a legislator.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国作家、历史学家、政治评论人、政治人物。
明穆宗之父，明朝第十一位皇帝，年号嘉靖。他下令重录《永乐大典》以制作副本，并于嘉靖十七年（1538年）再次为马皇后追上尊谥。在其统治期间，发生了著名的嘉靖大地震。此外，他还改称子路为“先贤仲子”。在位前期锐意改革，史称“嘉靖中兴”，但后期崇信道教、荒怠朝政，导致严嵩专权、吏治腐败。
description.en: Father of Muzong, the 11th emperor of the Ming dynasty, known as the Jiajing Emperor. He ordered the creation of a duplicate manuscript copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia and, in the 17th year of the Jiajing era (1538), further extended Empress Ma's posthumous title. The devastating Jiajing Great Earthquake occurred during his reign. He also changed Zi Lu's title to 'Former Worthy, Master Zhong'. In his early reign, he was dedicated to reforms, a period known as the 'Jiajing Restoration'. However, in his later years, he became obsessed with Taoism, neglected state affairs, leading to the dominance of Yan Song and widespread corruption.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国沙皇。
description.en: Tsar of the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国新泽西州普林斯顿的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊曾在此就读、任教并担任校长。
description.en: A private research university in Princeton, New Jersey. Woodrow Wilson studied, taught, and served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，天安门母亲运动发起人之一，《零八宪章》的首批签署者之一。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, one of the founders of the Tiananmen Mothers movement, and one of the first signatories of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚复兴党政权下的最后一任叙利亚总统，叙利亚阿拉伯复兴社会党地区领导机构末任书记。其政权在2024年12月被叙利亚反对派推翻后流亡俄罗斯。
description.en: The last President of Syria under the Ba'athist regime and the final regional secretary of the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Syria Region. He went into exile in Russia after his government was overthrown by the Syrian opposition in December 2024.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家、外交家，曾任联合国第八任秘书长。
description.en: A South Korean politician and diplomat who served as the eighth Secretary-General of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，王莽改制的模仿对象。
西汉皇帝，汉元帝之孙，在位6年。其在位期间，试图削弱外戚王氏的势力，王莽曾被免官。他亦因与董贤的同性爱情及“断袖”典故而闻名。
description.en: An emperor of the Western Han dynasty, grandson of Emperor Yuan of Han, who reigned for 6 years. During his reign, he attempted to weaken the power of the Wang clan consort kin, leading to Wang Mang's dismissal from office. He is also known for his same-sex relationship with Dong Xian and the 'cut sleeve' anecdote.

description.zh-cn: 西汉皇帝，汉哀帝的叔父。因自己无子，立侄子刘欣为太子。王莽在其治下开始进入权力中心。
description.en: An emperor of the Western Han dynasty and uncle of Emperor Ai. Lacking an heir of his own, he appointed his nephew Liu Xin as crown prince. Wang Mang began to enter the center of power during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾南部的直辖市。
description.en: A special municipality in southern Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩的二哥。
中华民国作家，以官话白话文的散文和新诗著称。曾任清华大学、国立西南联合大学中国文学系主任。他亦为温州中学校歌作词。
description.en: A writer of the Republic of China, renowned for his prose and modern poetry in Vernacular Chinese. He served as the head of the Chinese Literature Department at Tsinghua University and National Southwest Associated University. He also wrote lyrics for the Wenzhou Middle School song.

description.zh-cn: 由释弘一填词的歌曲。
中华人民共和国政治人物、外交官，现任中共中央对外联络部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Minister of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的最高领导人，中国人民解放军的最高统帅。
description.en: The head of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the supreme commander of the People's Liberation Army.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席

location.zh-cn: 洛杉矶, 加利福尼亚州, 美国

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州洛杉矶的私立研究型大学，是加州最古老的私立研究型大学，以其电影艺术学院、工程学院和庞大的校友网络“特洛伊家族”而闻名。
description.en: A private research university in Los Angeles, California, the oldest private research university in California, known for its School of Cinematic Arts, Viterbi School of Engineering, and its extensive alumni network known as the 'Trojan Family'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任立法院副院长，为蔡壁如在2024年立委选举中的竞争对手。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, serving as the Vice President of the Legislative Yuan, and was Tsai Pi-ru's opponent in the 2024 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党籍政治人物
对中国政府在新疆地区对维吾尔族及其他少数民族进行种族灭绝的指控
中国国民党籍政治人物，在担任第8届立法委员期间成为罢免案的目标。
description.en: A Kuomintang politician who was the target of a recall election during his term as an 8th-term legislator.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝第十二子
皇后，是中国、越南、日本、朝鲜等汉字文化圈国家在帝国时期，给予君主（皇帝）正配的封号。例如，马氏于洪武元年被册封为皇后。
description.en: Empress (皇后) is the title given to the primary consort of an emperor in countries within the Chinese cultural sphere such as China, Vietnam, Japan, and Korea during imperial periods. For instance, Lady Ma was created Empress in the first year of the Hongwu era.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，由皇帝亲自统领的上三旗之首。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty, the head of the Upper Three Banners directly commanded by the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中亚浩罕汗国军事领袖，19世纪入侵并盘踞新疆。
明太祖朱元璋次子，受封秦愍王，是明朝第一任宗人府宗人令。正史记载其为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Hongwu of the Ming Dynasty, he was created Prince Min of Qin and served as the first Zongren Ling of the Zongrenfu in the Ming Dynasty. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 日本第121代天皇，明治天皇的父亲。
江户幕府第15代将军，也是末代将军。
中国在改革开放初期，1980年代成立的一家公司。其部分资产后转入中国华能集团。
description.en: A company established in China in the 1980s, during the early period of reform and opening up. Some of its assets were later transferred to China Huaneng Group.

description.zh-cn: 林立果的未婚妻。
东汉末年将领，曾任长沙太守。孙策与孙权的父亲，追谥孙吴武烈皇帝。
description.en: A military general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, who served as Administrator of Changsha. He was the father of Sun Ce and Sun Quan, and was posthumously honored as Emperor Wulie of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 孙权长兄，东汉末年军阀，为孙吴基业的奠基者之一。他在统一江东过程中与许贡发生冲突并最终处死了许贡，后遭许贡门客刺杀身亡。
description.en: An elder brother of Sun Quan, a warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu. He clashed with Xu Gong during his conquest of Jiangdong, eventually executing him, and was later assassinated by Xu Gong's retainers.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年孙吴阵营杰出的军事家、战略家、政治家与音乐家，孙吴重要将领，赤壁之战的主要指挥官。他也是一位名将，与孙策为总角之交。
description.en: A famous general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, a close friend and key general of Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第七位皇帝，李显第四子。
美国政治人物、外交官，曾任美国驻华大使。
description.en: An American politician and diplomat who served as the United States Ambassador to China.

description.zh-cn: 中国前职业篮球运动员，曾与特雷西·麦克格雷迪在休斯敦火箭队组成“姚麦组合”。
description.en: Chinese former professional basketball player who formed the 'Yao-Mac' duo with Tracy McGrady on the Houston Rockets.

location.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州纽黑文市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员，孔祥熙在此获得矿物学硕士学位。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States where H. H. Kung obtained a master's degree in mineralogy.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，官至太尉、丞相。他与陈平等人发动诛吕安刘政变，拥立汉文帝。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty, who served as Grand Marshal and Chancellor. Along with Chen Ping, he quashed the Lü Clan Disturbance and enthroned Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深电视演员及粤剧演员，四朵金花成员之一，负责编舞。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong television and Cantonese opera actress, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for choreography.

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手、演员，“四大天王”之一。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings'.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，大韩民国临时政府领袖。
description.en: Korean independence activist and a leader of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 任正非长女，任平的胞姊，中国企业家，华为公司副董事长、轮值董事长、首席财务官。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Ren Zhengfei and elder sister of Ren Ping. She is a Chinese entrepreneur and business executive, serving as Huawei's Deputy Chair of the Board, Rotating Chair, and Chief Financial Officer.

description.zh-cn: 任正非次女
明朝第十六位皇帝，明光宗长子，崇祯帝之兄。在位期间，魏忠贤专权，但他启用了孙承宗、袁崇焕等将领在辽东对抗后金。
description.en: The sixteenth emperor of the Ming Dynasty and the elder brother of the Chongzhen Emperor. During his reign, the eunuch Wei Zhongxian wielded great power, but he also appointed commanders like Sun Chengzong and Yuan Chonghuan to counter the Later Jin in Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室，曹叡临终前任命的辅政大臣及权臣，后在高平陵之变中被司马懿铲除。
description.en: A member of the Cao Wei imperial clan, a regent and powerful official appointed by Emperor Cao Rui before his death, who was later eliminated by Sima Yi in the Incident at Gaoping Tombs.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡的养子，曹魏第三位皇帝，后被司马师废黜。
description.en: Adopted son of Cao Rui, the third emperor of Cao Wei, later deposed by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 洛阳，中华人民共和国河南省下辖的地级市，是河洛文化和华夏文明的重要发祥地。历史上曾有十三个正统朝代建都于此，是中国历史上建都最早、朝代最多、历时最长的城市之一。它曾是曹魏与西晋的都城，刘禅投降后居住于此。作为唐朝的东都，白居易晚年多在此居住并最终逝世，唐昭宗曾被朱温强迫迁都至此并最终在此被杀。此外，它还是唐代宗的出生地。
description.en: Luoyang, a prefecture-level city in Henan Province, People's Republic of China, is an important cradle of Heluo culture and Chinese civilization. Historically, thirteen orthodox dynasties established their capital here, making it one of the cities with the earliest, most numerous, and longest-reigning capitals in Chinese history. It served as the capital of Cao Wei and Western Jin, where Liu Shan resided after his surrender. As the Eastern Capital of the Tang dynasty, Bai Juyi spent most of his later years here and eventually passed away, and Emperor Zhaozong was forcibly relocated here by Zhu Wen and ultimately assassinated. Furthermore, it was the birthplace of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民进党新北市议员。
中华民国政治人物，民进党籍立法委员。
中华民国政治人物，曾与郝柏村搭档参选1996年总统选举。

zh-cn: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年大会

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名京剧和昆曲表演艺术家，京剧“四大名旦”之首，梅派艺术创始人。
description.en: A modern Chinese Peking and Kunqu Opera artist, leader of the "Four Great Dan", and founder of the Mei School of artistic style.

description.zh-cn: 东亚君主制国家给予退位皇帝或当朝皇帝在世父亲的头衔。
明朝后期将领，镇守辽东三十年，官至辽东总兵、太傅，封宁远伯。其早期对努尔哈赤和女真采取的政策，深刻影响了后金的崛起。
description.en: A general in the late Ming Dynasty, he guarded Liaodong for thirty years, holding positions such as Liaodong Commander-in-chief and Grand Tutor, and was ennobled as Earl of Ningyuan. His early policies towards Nurhaci and the Jurchens significantly influenced the rise of the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年著名政治及军事人物，官至兵部尚书兼蓟辽督师。他构筑了“关宁锦防线”，在宁远之战、宁锦之战中多次击败后金军队。为自保曾上疏颂扬魏忠贤，但最终仍被其排挤去职。后因己巳之变中护卫不力及擅杀毛文龙等罪名，被崇祯帝以反间计为由判处凌迟，后于清乾隆年间获得平反。
description.en: A renowned political and military figure in the late Ming Dynasty, who served as Minister of War and Viceroy of Jiliao. He constructed the 'Guan-Ning-Jin Defense Line' and repeatedly defeated the Later Jin forces in the battles of Ningyuan and Ningjin. He once praised Wei Zhongxian to protect himself but was eventually dismissed by him. He was later executed by lingchi by the Chongzhen Emperor, who fell for a deception stratagem, on charges including failing to protect the capital during the Jisi Incident and unlawfully executing Mao Wenlong. He was posthumously rehabilitated during the Qianlong era of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤创建的军政合一、兵民合一的社会组织形式。
description.en: A system of military and social organization created by Nurhaci, integrating civil and military functions, and unifying soldiers and civilians.

description.zh-cn: 一个涵盖中国所有民族的政治与国族概念，由梁启超于清末首次提出。该概念对现代中国民族主义的形成产生了深远影响。
description.en: A political and national-ethnic concept encompassing all ethnic groups in China, first proposed by Liang Qichao in the late Qing Dynasty. This concept has had a profound impact on the formation of modern Chinese nationalism.

description.zh-cn: 台湾客运公司
香港企业家，壹传媒创办人。
马来西亚政治人物，曾任马来西亚第六任首相。他在任内设立了马来西亚发展有限公司（1MDB），其后该公司爆发了震惊世界的金融丑闻。
description.en: Malaysian politician and the sixth Prime Minister of Malaysia. He established 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) during his tenure, which later became embroiled in a global financial scandal.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的跨国科技公司，曾与朱邦复合作开发内置仓颉系统的“天龙中文电脑”。
description.en: A Taiwanese multinational technology company that collaborated with Chu Bong-Foo to develop the 'Sky Dragon Chinese Computer' with a built-in Cangjie system.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大的半导体芯片制造商之一，由麻省理工学院校友罗伯特·诺伊斯联合创办。
description.en: One of the world's largest semiconductor chip manufacturers, co-founded by MIT alumnus Robert Noyce.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的董事长。
description.en: Chairman of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家。
台湾作家。
黄花岗七十二烈士之一，林徽因叔父。
梁思成与林徽因之子，中国历史学家、环保活动家。
description.en: Son of Liang Sicheng and Lin Huiyin, historian and environmental activist.

description.zh-cn: 新华社记者，林徽因与梁思成之女。
description.en: Xinhua News Agency journalist, daughter of Lin Huiyin and Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城的世界著名私立研究型大学，是常春藤盟校之一。由本杰明·富兰克林创建于1740年，是美国第五古老的高等教育机构，也是美国第一所从事科学技术和人文教育的现代高等学校。
description.en: A world-renowned private research university located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. It is a member of the Ivy League, founded in 1740 by Benjamin Franklin, and is the fifth-oldest institution of higher education in the United States and the first American university to pursue modern higher education in science, technology, and the humanities.

description.zh-cn: 美国国内的情报与安全机构，据称曾在习明泽留美期间暗中保护她。
description.en: The domestic intelligence and security service of the United States, which allegedly provided covert protection for Xi Mingze during her studies in the US.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。
原为曹魏将领，在第一次北伐时投降蜀汉，深受诸葛亮器重，成为其军事继承人。他是三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，主要活跃于蜀汉后期，多次率军北伐曹魏。
description.en: Originally a general of Cao Wei, he surrendered to Shu Han during the first Northern Expedition and was highly regarded by Zhuge Liang, becoming his military successor. He was a prominent general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, primarily active in its later period, who led multiple northern expeditions against the rival state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，西晋的奠基者。他是司马懿的次子，司马师之弟，司马炎之父。
description.en: A powerful regent in the late Cao Wei period and the founder of the Western Jin dynasty. He was the second son of Sima Yi, younger brother of Sima Shi, and father of Sima Yan.

description.zh-cn: 由司马炎建立的中国朝代，取代曹魏并最终统一三国，结束了长期的战乱。该朝代在永嘉之乱后被前赵所灭。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Sima Yan, which succeeded Cao Wei and ultimately unified the Three Kingdoms, ending a long period of warfare. It was overthrown by the Former Zhao after the Yongjia Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 李敖之子
台湾政治人物，民主进步党党员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 前东吴大学校长，蒋经国私生子
西晋宗室，司马懿第九子，八王之乱中的八王之一，曾篡位称帝。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, the ninth son of Sima Yi, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes who briefly usurped the throne.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在第二次世界大战期间为支援英国军队在缅甸殖民地对抗日本，以及保卫中国西南大后方而建立的出国作战部队。
中华民国陆军二级上将，曾任陆军司令。
清代八旗之一，由皇帝亲自统领的上三旗之首。文绣家族隶属于此旗。雍正元年（1723年），年羹尧曾被抬入汉军镶黄旗。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty, it was the head of the Upper Three Banners directly commanded by the emperor. Wenxiu's family belonged to this banner. In 1723 (Yongzheng's first year), Nian Gengyao was transferred to the Bordered Yellow Banner Han Martial.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝第十一子，书法家。
康熙帝第十二子。
荀彧的堂侄，同时也是曹操的谋士。
description.en: Xun Yu's cousin, and an advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士。
中国男歌手、演员和音乐创作人。
description.en: Chinese male singer, actor, and music creator.

description.zh-cn: 香港创作男歌手及演员，拥有马来西亚、阿拉伯及华裔血统。持有加拿大国籍和香港永久居留权。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer-songwriter and actor of Malay, Arab, and Chinese descent. He holds Canadian citizenship and Hong Kong permanent residency.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞逝世的医院。
description.en: The hospital where Zhang Xiaoqian passed away.

description.zh-cn: 桥公次女，周瑜之妻。
description.en: Younger daughter of Qiao Gong, wife of Zhou Yu.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学史上第一部长篇历史演义章回小说，由罗贯中根据《三国志》及《三国志平话》等史书和话本改编创作，为中国古典四大名著之一。
description.en: The first full-length historical episodic novel in Chinese literature, written by Luo Guanzhong and adapted from historical records like 'Records of the Three Kingdoms' and storybooks like 'Sanguozhi Pinghua'. It is one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初小说家，普遍认为是中国古典小说《三国演义》的作者。
description.en: A novelist from the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties, widely considered the author of the classical Chinese novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms'.

description.zh-cn: 一种亚伯拉罕一神教，其经典和传统与《古兰经》有相似之处。它是世界三大宗教之一。
description.en: An Abrahamic monotheistic religion whose scriptures and traditions have similarities with the Quran. It is one of the world's three major religions.

description.zh-cn: 基督教的中心人物，保罗宣称直接从他获得启示并为其传播福音。
description.en: The central figure of Christianity, from whom Paul claimed to have received his revelation and for whom he spread the gospel.

description.zh-cn: 由朱熹汇编的儒家核心经典，包括《大学》、《中庸》、《论语》、《孟子》。
description.en: The core classics of Confucianism compiled by Zhu Xi, including the Great Learning, the Doctrine of the Mean, the Analects, and Mencius.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国得克萨斯州休斯敦的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Houston, Texas, United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役篮球运动员及评论员。
description.en: American retired basketball player and commentator.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役篮球运动员。
description.en: American retired basketball player.

zh-cn: 小崔西·拉玛尔·麦葛瑞迪

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，司职得分后卫及小前锋，2017年入选奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂。
description.en: American former professional basketball player who played as a shooting guard and small forward, inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，明孝宗之子，明世宗堂兄。他在位期间为宋濂追谥“文宪”。
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, son of Emperor Xiaozong, and cousin of the Jiajing Emperor. During his reign, he granted Song Lian the posthumous title 'Wenxian'.

description.zh-cn: 1955年中华人民共和国授予的军衔等级。
香港男歌手、演员，其演艺生涯始于1980年代，是1990年代香港乐坛“四大天王”之一，亦为动感艺人的代表之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong male singer, dancer, and actor, whose performing career began in the 1980s. He is known as one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings' of the Hong Kong music scene in the 1990s, and a representative of dynamic artists.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市

description.zh-cn: 香港导演、监制、编剧，以文艺爱情片见长，多次夺得香港电影金像奖并四度角逐坎城影展金棕榈奖，是首位拿下坎城影展最佳导演奖的华人导演。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director, producer, and screenwriter, known for his art-house romance films. He is a multiple Hong Kong Film Award winner, a four-time Palme d'Or nominee at the Cannes Film Festival, and the first Chinese director to win the Best Director Award at Cannes.

description.zh-cn: 台湾演员及特技演员，张学友的好友。
description.en: Taiwanese actor and stuntman, a friend of Jacky Cheung.

description.zh-cn: 1992年香港媒体册封的四位最受欢迎男歌手的称号，成员包括张学友、刘德华、郭富城、黎明。
description.en: A title given by Hong Kong media in 1992 to the four most popular male singers, including Jacky Cheung, Andy Lau, Aaron Kwok, and Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 1988年上映的香港电影，是王家卫执导的第一部电影。张学友凭借此片获得香港电影金像奖最佳男配角。
description.en: A 1988 Hong Kong film, the directorial debut of Wong Kar-wai. Jacky Cheung won the Hong Kong Film Award for Best Supporting Actor for this film.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影公司。该公司于1976年将古龙的《流星‧蝴蝶‧剑》和《天涯‧明月‧刀》改编成电影，开创了武侠电影的高峰和古龙的电影时代。
description.en: A Hong Kong film studio. In 1976, its film adaptations of Gu Long's novels 'Meteor, Butterfly, Sword' and 'Tianya, Mingyue, Dao' initiated a peak in wuxia films and marked the beginning of the Gu Long movie era.

description.zh-cn: 香港武打电影演员
description.en: Hong Kong martial arts film actor

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第三位皇帝，宋太宗第三子，赵元佐同母弟，在位25年。其统治前期社会经济繁荣，史称“咸平之治”；后期则热衷于封禅和天书等道教活动，并加封子路为“河内公”。
description.en: The third emperor of the Song Dynasty, the third son of Emperor Taizong, and the full younger brother of Zhao Yuanzuo. He reigned for 25 years, with his early reign seeing a period of prosperity known as the 'Reign of Xianping'. Later, he became devoted to Daoist activities like the Feng and Shan sacrifices and the 'Heavenly Books', and also granted Zi Lu the title 'Duke of Henei'.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的割据政权之一，位于现今江浙地区，后纳土归降北宋。
description.en: One of the separatist regimes during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, located in the modern Jiangsu-Zhejiang area, which later surrendered its territory to the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由契丹族建立的朝代，与北宋长期对峙。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by the Khitan people, which had a long-standing confrontation with the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 南唐末主李煜的第二任皇后，大周后（周娥皇）的妹妹。
description.en: The second empress of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang, and the younger sister of the Great Empress Zhou (Zhou Ehuang).

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央党校党建教研部教授，因严厉批判习近平及中国共产党，被开除党籍并取消退休待遇，成为习近平的著名批评者。她被视为党内的自由派学者，现居美国。
description.en: A former professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department of the Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party, who was expelled from the party and had her retirement benefits canceled for severely criticizing Xi Jinping and the CCP. She is considered a liberal scholar within the party and currently resides in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 自2018年起，由美国总统唐纳德·特朗普发起的，在中华人民共和国与美利坚合众国之间发生的一系列贸易冲突。
description.en: A series of trade conflicts between the People's Republic of China and the United States, initiated by U.S. President Donald Trump starting in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 南明最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年文学家，建安七子之一。
中国古代思想家、哲学家、教育家，战国时期儒家代表人物，与庄周大约同时代。他曾评价晏婴以其君显。
description.en: An ancient Chinese thinker, philosopher, and educator, a representative of Confucianism during the Warring States period, and a contemporary of Zhuang Zhou. He once commented that Yan Ying made his lord illustrious.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国。它是庄周（庄子）的故国和出生地，他曾在此短暂担任漆园吏。同时，这里也是晏婴的祖籍地。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty in China. It was the home state and birthplace of Zhuang Zhou (Zhuangzi), where he briefly served as the Clerk of the Lacquer Garden. It was also the ancestral home of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 道家经典，为庄周及其后学所著，后被唐玄宗封为《南华经》。
description.en: A classic text of Taoism, authored by Zhuang Zhou and his followers, later titled 'Nanhua Jing' by Emperor Xuanzong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 法家是中国历史上提倡以法制国的思想学派，也是中国古代诸子百家之一。其思想起源于春秋战国时期，由韩非集大成，主张以“法”、“术”、“势”治国。庄子曾反对其以法律治国的主张。
description.en: Legalism is a school of thought in Chinese history that advocated for governing by law, and is also one of the Hundred Schools of Thought in ancient China. Its ideas originated during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods, were synthesized by Han Fei, and advocated governing by 'law', 'technique', and 'power'. Its advocacy of rule by law was opposed by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 华语电影女演员，拥有新加坡国籍。被誉为“第五代导演的电影缪斯”，是首位主演影片包揽欧洲三大影展最高奖的女演员，并曾担任多个国际A类电影节的评委会主席。
description.en: A Chinese-born Singaporean actress. Hailed as the 'muse of the Fifth Generation directors', she is the first actress to star in films that have won the top awards at all three major European film festivals and has served as the jury president for several Class-A international film festivals.

description.zh-cn: 日本演员
description.en: Japanese actor

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅警卫局
en: Central Guard Bureau of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 负责保卫党和国家主要领导人安全的机构，在中央军委联合参谋部内设机构中列出。
description.en: An agency responsible for the security of major party and state leaders, listed as an internal department of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年曹操麾下的重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Cao Cao during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将。

zh-cn: 英皇爱德华七世医学院
en: King Edward VII College of Medicine

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学的前身之一。
description.en: A predecessor of the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学是新加坡的第一所高等学府，一所世界级顶尖公立研究型大学。其历史悠久，可追溯至1928年成立的前身机构。1980年，该大学与南洋大学合并，形成现今的新加坡国立大学。知名校友包括邓亮洪。
description.en: The National University of Singapore is Singapore's first institution of higher learning and a world-class top public research university. Its rich history dates back to a predecessor institution founded in 1928. In 1980, it was formed through the merger with Nanyang University. Notable alumni include Tang Liang Hong.

birth_place.zh-cn: 马来亚联邦槟城威南县双溪峇甲
birth_place.en: Sungai Bakap, South Seberang Perai, Penang, Malayan Union

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，现任马来西亚第10任首相兼财政部长。曾任副首相、多届部长及国会反对党领袖。他因与时任首相马哈迪的政治斗争而在1998年被革职，并引发了“烈火莫熄”改革运动。他曾两度因鸡奸案入狱，后在2018年获得特赦，并于2022年领导希望联盟在悬峙议会中组建联合政府，出任首相。
description.en: Malaysian politician, currently the 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia and Minister of Finance. He previously served as Deputy Prime Minister, various ministerial posts, and Leader of the Opposition. His dismissal in 1998 by then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad sparked the "Reformasi" movement. He was imprisoned twice on sodomy charges before receiving a royal pardon in 2018. In 2022, he led the Pakatan Harapan coalition to form a unity government after a hung parliament and became Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 一个由120个发展中国家组成的论坛，它们在冷战期间不正式与任何主要大国集团结盟，也不反对任何主要大国集团。
description.en: A forum of 120 developing world states that are not formally aligned with or against any major power bloc.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，拥立明世宗继位，但在“大礼议”事件中与明世宗发生严重冲突并最终致仕。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty who supported Emperor Shizong's ascension to the throne, but had a major conflict with him during the 'Great Rites Controversy' and was eventually forced to retire.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在明世宗怠政期间专权二十年，以贪赃枉法、残害忠良而闻名。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty who held power for two decades during Emperor Shizong's neglect of state affairs, known for his corruption, abuse of power, and persecution of loyal officials.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，以刚直不阿著称，曾上《治安疏》直谏明世宗，险些被处死。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official known for his integrity and uprightness. He was famous for his direct admonishment of Emperor Shizong through the 'Memorial on Peace and Order', an act which nearly led to his execution.

description.zh-cn: 明朝著名将领，以抗击倭寇闻名。他曾与少林僧人研究武术，并尤其在福建平定倭寇。
description.en: A famous general of the Ming Dynasty, renowned for fighting against Wokou pirates. He collaborated with Shaolin monks to study martial arts, and notably suppressed Wokou in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 倭寇是指元末明初至16世纪，活跃于朝鲜、中国沿海及南洋的武装海商集团的泛称。这些集团从13世纪开始侵扰沿海地区。前期倭寇以日本人为主，后期（又称“假倭”）则以汉人为主，成员构成多元，亦包含朝鲜人、马来人、葡萄牙人等。少林僧人曾参与对抗倭寇的战斗。
description.en: Wokou refers to the general term for armed maritime merchant groups active along the coasts of Korea, China, and the South China Sea from the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties to the 16th century. These groups began raiding coastal areas in the 13th century. Early Wokou were predominantly Japanese, while later Wokou (also known as 'Jiawo' or 'fake Wokou') were mainly Han Chinese, with a diverse composition that also included Koreans, Malays, Portuguese, etc. Shaolin monks participated in battles against the Wokou.

zh-cn: 加夫列尔·加西亚·马尔克斯

description.zh-cn: 日本小说家，1968年诺贝尔文学奖得主，毕业于东京帝国大学。
description.en: A Japanese novelist, winner of the 1968 Nobel Prize in Literature, who graduated from Tokyo Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，《环球时报》前主编。他曾对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案中关于“伤害中华民族感情”的条款提出批评，认为应进行细化。
description.en: Chinese journalist and former editor-in-chief of the Global Times. He criticized the clause about 'hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation' in the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law', suggesting it should be more specific.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家，两弹一星元勋，与钱学森共同创建中国科学院力学研究所。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist, a key contributor to China's 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' project, and co-founder of the Institute of Mechanics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences with Qian Xuesen.

death_place.zh-cn: 加利福尼亚州洛思加图斯

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔历史学家、社会活动家、作家，以其关于南京大屠杀的著作《南京暴行：被遗忘的大屠杀》而闻名。
description.en: A Chinese-American historian, activist, and author, best known for her book 'The Rape of Nanking: The Forgotten Holocaust of World War II'.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的次子，蒋孝章之弟。曾任中华民国驻新加坡及日本代表。因江南案被外放，后于预定接任华视董事长前一日猝逝。
description.en: The second son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Faina Vakhreva (Chiang Fang-liang), and younger brother of Chiang Hsiao-chang. He served as the Republic of China's representative to Singapore and Japan, was posted abroad following the Henry Liu case, and died suddenly the day before he was scheduled to take over as chairman of CTS.

description.zh-cn: 一个由六四事件后流亡海外的民运人士创建的政治组织。
description.en: A political organization founded by pro-democracy activists exiled after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学家、社会活动家，曾与李泽厚一同参与六四事件期间的呼吁。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and social activist who joined Li Zehou in an appeal during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

en: Public Security Police Force of Macau

description.zh-cn: 江绵恒的儿子，博裕资本创办人。
美国跨国投资银行与金融服务公司，曾因温云松身份敏感而拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: An American multinational investment bank and financial services company that once rejected Wen Yunsong's job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 日本的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本明治时代的政治家、企业家，长州五杰之一。
description.en: A statesman and entrepreneur of the Meiji era in Japan, one of the Chōshū Five.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日本萨摩藩鹿儿岛城下

description.zh-cn: 日本武士、明治维新时期的政治家，与西乡隆盛及木户孝允并称维新三杰，也是明治政府的核心领导人。曾任明治政府内务卿。他曾是岩仓使节团成员，归国后反对征韩论。作为全权大臣前往清朝进行交涉，最终签订了《北京专约》。
description.en: A Japanese samurai and statesman of the Meiji Restoration period, one of the Three Great Nobles of the Restoration, and a core leader of the Meiji government. He also served as the Home Minister of the Meiji government. He was a member of the Iwakura Mission, opposing the Seikanron upon his return, and acted as a plenipotentiary ambassador to the Qing court for negotiations, signing the Peking Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期儒家代表人物、大师，韩非与李斯的老师。他提倡性恶论，其学生韩非和李斯后来成为法家重要人物。
description.en: A Confucian master and representative during the Warring States period, and the teacher of Han Fei and Li Si. He advocated the theory of evil human nature, with his students Han Fei and Li Si later becoming important figures in Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 西汉，作为汉朝的前半期，是中国历史上继秦朝之后的一个大一统王朝，与东汉合称两汉。由汉高祖刘邦建立，历经210年。其间，巫蛊之祸是王朝由盛转衰的转折点之一，李延年及其家族在此期间经历了兴衰，最终被王莽篡位所取代。
description.en: The Western Han Dynasty, the earlier period of the Han Dynasty, was a unified dynasty in Chinese history that succeeded the Qin Dynasty. It is collectively known as the Han dynasty along with the Eastern Han. Founded by Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang, it lasted for 210 years. During this period, the Witchcraft Delusion marked one of its turning points from prosperity to decline, and the Li family, including Li Yannian, experienced their rise and fall. The dynasty was ultimately usurped by Wang Mang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉第十二位皇帝。
东汉末年操纵朝政的十二位宦官。
隋朝第二位皇帝，隋文帝杨坚次子。他废黜兄长杨勇后继承皇位。在位期间，下令营建东都洛阳（始于605年），并兴建大运河（开凿永济渠），东征高句丽，还将幽州改名为涿郡。这些举措最终引发隋末民变。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui dynasty and second son of Emperor Wen Yang Jian. He succeeded to the throne after deposing his elder brother Yang Yong. During his reign, he ordered the construction of the eastern capital Luoyang (starting in 605), oversaw the construction of the Grand Canal (including the Yongji Canal), launched eastern expeditions against Goguryeo, and renamed You Province to Zhuo Commandery. These actions ultimately led to widespread rebellions at the end of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的开国皇帝，统一了分裂长达近三百年的中国，开创了开皇之治。他在位期间进行了一系列改革，包括创立五省六部制和科举制度。他还恢复了少林寺并赐予土地，使其发展壮大。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Sui dynasty, who reunified China after nearly three centuries of division and initiated the Kaihuang Era of prosperity. During his reign, he implemented a series of reforms, including the establishment of the Five Departments and Six Ministries system and the imperial examination system. He also restored the Shaolin Temple and granted it land, contributing to its growth.

description.zh-cn: 位于蒙古高原的古代游牧帝国
隋朝将领，在江都发动兵变，弑杀隋炀帝，后自立为帝，国号许。
description.en: A Sui dynasty general who launched a coup in Jiangdu, assassinated Emperor Yang, and later declared himself emperor of the state of Xu.

description.zh-cn: 西魏八大柱国之一
中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国家安全部部长。
根据《洛阳伽蓝记》记载，菩提达摩来自波斯。
中国南北朝时期的南朝第三个朝代，由梁武帝萧衍建立。
description.en: The third of the Southern Dynasties in China during the Northern and Southern dynasties period, founded by Emperor Wu of Liang, Xiao Yan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，现任中央军委办公厅主任。
柬埔寨共产党（红色高棉）总书记，民主柬埔寨最高领导人。他曾访问大寨，并接待了回访柬埔寨的陈永贵。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of Kampuchea (Khmer Rouge) and the paramount leader of Democratic Kampuchea. He visited Dazhai and hosted Chen Yonggui during his return visit to Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，白居易的挚友，二人并称“元白”，共同倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet and a close friend of Bai Juyi. They were collectively known as 'Yuan Bai' and jointly advocated for the New Yuefu Movement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝文学家、哲学家、诗人，白居易晚年在洛阳的挚友。二人唱和甚多，被时人并称为“刘白”。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer, philosopher, and poet, and a close friend of Bai Juyi in his later years in Luoyang. They often exchanged poems and were known as 'Liu Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第十一位皇帝。白居易因直言进谏曾令其不快，后将白居易贬为江州司马。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Tang dynasty. He was displeased by Bai Juyi's direct remonstrations and later demoted him to the position of Sima of Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第十六位皇帝，曾褒奖白居易为“诗仙”。
description.en: The 16th emperor of the Tang dynasty, who praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾演员。1980年，在北投吟松阁因敬酒纠纷引发了吟松阁事件，其友人刺伤古龙，导致古龙健康状况急剧恶化。
description.en: A Taiwanese actor. In 1980, a dispute over a toast at the Yinsong Pavilion in Beitou led to the Yinsong Pavilion Incident, where his associates stabbed Gu Long, causing a severe decline in Gu Long's health.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人和社交媒体名人，王健林之子。
description.en: Chinese businessman and social media personality, son of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 载沣第四子。
description.en: The fourth son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国报纸。它于1956年6月5日首次向全世界公开发表了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的全文。此外，该报在2017年的一篇报道中对科大讯飞的技术提出了潜在的伦理担忧。
description.en: An American newspaper. It first published the full text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech to the world on June 5, 1956. Additionally, in a 2017 report, it raised potential ethical concerns about iFlytek's technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国前国家副主席曾庆红之子。
description.en: Son of former Chinese Vice President Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王之子，秦庄襄王之父。曾短暂担任秦国国君，在位时间极短。
description.en: Son of King Zhaoxiang of Qin and father of King Zhuangxiang of Qin. He briefly served as the king of Qin, but his reign was extremely short.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期秦国国君，秦孝文王之父，在位长达五十六年。他以任用名臣、富国强兵而著称，为秦始皇统一六国奠定了坚实基础。
description.en: King of the state of Qin during the Warring States period of China, father of King Xiaowen of Qin. He reigned for fifty-six years and was known for appointing capable ministers, enriching the state, and strengthening the military, which laid a solid foundation for the unification of China by Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期各种学术流派的总称。
description.en: A collective term for the various academic schools of thought during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods in China.

description.zh-cn: 一种从黄花蒿中提取的倍半萜内酯化合物，由屠呦呦及其团队发现。它具有高效的抗疟作用，是现代抗疟药物的基础，主要用于治疗疟疾。
description.en: A sesquiterpene lactone isolated from Artemisia annua, discovered by Tu Youyou and her team. It possesses potent antimalarial properties, forms the basis for modern antimalarial drugs, and is primarily used to treat malaria.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝嘉庆帝的年号。
description.en: The era name of the Jiaqing Emperor, the seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 孔祥熙与宋霭龄的次女，是“飞狗事件”的核心人物。
description.en: The second daughter of H. H. Kung and Soong Ai-ling, and the central figure in the 'Flying Dog Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 香港及台湾创作男歌手、音乐制作人及演员。1990年代最具影响力的华语歌手之一，有「国民歌王」、「台湾四大天王」、香港「天王杀手」之誉。
description.en: Hong Kong and Taiwanese singer-songwriter, music producer, and actor. One of the most influential Mandopop singers of the 1990s, known as the 'National King of Songs', one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings of Taiwan', and the 'Heavenly King Killer' in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视节目主持人、媒体人、企业家。
description.en: Chinese television host, media personality, and entrepreneur.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州的城市，孔祥熙和宋彬彬的逝世地，也是东京都的姊妹友好都市。
description.en: A city in the U.S. state of New York, where H. H. Kung and Song Binbin passed away, and a sister city of Tokyo Metropolis.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的富商。
description.en: A wealthy businessman in the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 元惠宗的第三任皇后，元朝最后一位皇后。
description.en: The third empress of Emperor Huizong of Yuan and the last empress of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 满族姓氏，位列满族八大姓，因其名列《八旗满洲氏族通谱》首位，有“满族第一大姓氏”、“满洲巨族”的说法。清朝时期，该氏族为官人数众多，素有“关满朝”之称。
description.en: A Manchu clan, listed among the Eight Great Manchu clans. It is considered the 'number one Manchu clan' and a 'great Manchu clan' as it is listed first in the 'Genealogy of the Manchu Clans of the Eight Banners'. During the Qing dynasty, many members of this clan served as officials, earning it the nickname 'the Gūwalgiya court'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任国民革命军第二十九军军长（张自忠的上级）和陕西省政府主席。后任冀察政务委员会委员长，并曾任命孙殿英为察北保安司令和冀北民军司令。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, he served as commander of the 29th Army of the National Revolutionary Army (Zhang Zizhong's superior) and Chairman of the Shaanxi Provincial Government. Later, he became Chairman of the Hebei-Chahar Political Council and appointed Sun Dianying as Chabei Security Commander and Jibei Militia Commander.

description.zh-cn: 清朝名儒，皇太子允礽的老师。
description.en: A renowned Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty and a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省的地级市，也是龚正和佘孟孝的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Gong Zheng and She Mengxiao.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的第50个州，由夏威夷群岛组成，是美国唯一的群岛州，也是唯一位于美洲大陆之外的州。
description.en: The 50th state of the United States of America, composed of the Hawaiian Islands. It is the only U.S. state made up entirely of islands and the only one located outside of the Americas.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义长女，中国共产党地下党员，在北平和平解放过程中起了重要作用。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Fu Zuoyi, an underground member of the Communist Party of China who played an important role in the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐代女官、诗人、皇妃。武则天时期的重要政治人物，在唐隆政变中被李隆基所杀。
description.en: A female official, poet, and imperial consort during the Tang dynasty. A key political figure during Wu Zetian's reign, she was killed by Li Longji in the Tanglong Coup.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的军事家、将领，曾任太尉、丞相。成功平定七国之乱，后遭景帝猜忌下狱绝食而死。
description.en: A military strategist and general of the Western Han dynasty, who served as Grand Marshal and Chancellor. He successfully suppressed the Rebellion of the Seven States but was later imprisoned due to Emperor Jing's suspicion and died on a hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 东汉开国皇帝，汉高祖刘邦的九世孙，汉景帝之子长沙定王刘发的后裔。他在新朝末年的乱世中起兵，经过十余年的征战，最终统一中国，开创了被称为“光武中兴”的治世。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, a ninth-generation descendant of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang, and a descendant of Liu Fa, King Ding of Changsha, who was a son of Emperor Jing. He rose up during the chaotic period at the end of the Xin dynasty and, after more than a decade of warfare, reunified China, initiating a period of prosperity known as the 'Guangwu Restoration'.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1980年2月28日的灭门血案，受害者为时任台湾省议员林义雄的母亲与双胞胎女儿，长女亦受重伤。当时林义雄因美丽岛事件而被羁押。
description.en: A familicide that occurred on February 28, 1980. The victims were the mother and twin daughters of then-Taiwan Provincial Assembly member Lin Yi-hsiung; his eldest daughter was also severely injured. Lin was in custody for the Kaohsiung Incident at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人权律师，曾作为艾未未方法人公司的代理律师处理“发课税案”。
description.en: A Chinese human rights lawyer who represented Ai Weiwei's legal entity company in the 'Fake Tax Case'.

description.zh-cn: 香港立法会议员，曾指控艾未未的作品《透视研究：天安门》违反国安法、侮辱国家尊严。
description.en: A member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council who accused Ai Weiwei's work 'Study of Perspective: Tiananmen' of violating the National Security Law and insulting national dignity.

description.zh-cn: 香港西九文化区的视觉文化博物馆，因收藏并计划展出艾未未的争议性作品而引发政治风波，后决定不在开馆时展出相关作品。
description.en: A museum of visual culture in Hong Kong's West Kowloon Cultural District. Its collection and planned exhibition of Ai Weiwei's controversial works sparked political controversy, leading to the decision not to display them at the museum's opening.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚记者、行动主义者、程式设计师和骇客，于2006年创建揭密网站维基解密。艾未未曾公开抗议将其引渡至美国的司法程序。
description.en: Australian journalist, activist, computer programmer, and hacker who founded the whistleblowing website WikiLeaks in 2006. Ai Weiwei publicly protested the legal proceedings to extradite him to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 清朝特有的世袭罔替的王爵。胤祥是清朝第九位铁帽子王，也是首位因功绩获此恩封的亲王。
description.en: A special hereditary princely rank in the Qing dynasty that could be passed down without demotion. Yinxiang was the 9th iron-cap prince and the first to receive this honor for his merits.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥庶福晋之一。
description.en: One of Yinxiang's concubines.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年武将，初为刘繇部下，后归顺孙策。
description.en: A military general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, initially served under Liu Yao before surrendering to Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、学者，曾任立法委员。曾与李庆华一同退出亲民党。
description.en: A politician and scholar of the Republic of China, and a former member of the Legislative Yuan. He left the People First Party along with Lee Ching-hua.

description.zh-cn: 台湾重金属创作歌手、政治人物，现任中华民国驻芬兰代表。为闪灵乐团创始团员与主唱，曾任中华民国立法委员、时代力量创党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese heavy metal singer-songwriter and politician, currently serving as the Representative of the Republic of China to Finland. He is a founding member and lead vocalist of the band Chthonic, a former member of the Legislative Yuan, and the founding chairman of the New Power Party.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第41任美国总统。其子乔治·沃克·布什后来也担任美国总统。他也是芭芭拉·布什的丈夫。
description.en: American politician, the 41st President of the United States. His son, George W. Bush, later also served as president. He was also the husband of Barbara Bush.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部部长

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的负责人职位。
description.en: The head position of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

en: List of ambassadors of China to the United States

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国派驻美利坚合众国的最高级别外交使节。
description.en: The highest-ranking diplomatic representative of the People's Republic of China to the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 由蔡边村自编自导的纪录片，记录了他寻找20多年未见的生母亦舒的经历。
description.en: A documentary written and directed by Tsai Bian-cun, documenting his search for his birth mother, Yi Shu, whom he had not seen for over 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 在孟加拉管辖区扩大鸦片种植，并通过私人商人向中国走私鸦片，是鸦片贸易的主要推动者之一。
description.en: Expanded opium cultivation in the Bengal Presidency and smuggled it into China via private merchants, being one of the main drivers of the opium trade.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年蒙古族将领，在第二次鸦片战争中负责京津地区的防务，指挥了大沽口和八里桥等重要战役。
description.en: A Mongol general of the late Qing dynasty who was responsible for the defense of the Beijing-Tianjin area during the Second Opium War, commanding key battles such as Taku Forts and Baliqiao.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，原为台湾民众党籍，后退党。曾任新竹市市长，因贪污案一审有罪而被停职，并在大罢免运动中成为罢免对象。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, formerly a member of the Taiwan People's Party before withdrawing. She served as the mayor of Hsinchu City, was suspended from office after being convicted of corruption in the first instance, and became a target of recall during the Great Recall movement.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日本摄津国大坂堂岛新地五丁目中津藩藏屋敷
birth_place.en: Nakatsu Domain Kurayashiki, Dōjima-shinchi 5-chome, Ōsaka, Settsu Province, Japan

death_place.zh-cn: 日本东京府东京市芝区三田二丁目
death_place.en: 2-chōme, Mita, Shiba-ku, Tokyo City, Tokyo Prefecture, Japan

description.zh-cn: 日本明治时期重要的启蒙思想家、教育家，庆应义塾大学创立者，对明治维新运动影响深远。他提出了著名的《脱亚论》，并被誉为“日本近代教育之父”。作为近代思想家，他还对《大日本帝国宪法》的颁布发表评论，指出日本民众尚缺乏精神独立以适应国会制度。
description.en: A prominent Japanese enlightenment thinker and educator of the Meiji era, founder of Keio University, who had a profound impact on the Meiji Restoration. He proposed the famous 'Datsu-A Ron' (Leaving Asia) and is regarded as 'the father of modern Japanese education'. As a modern thinker, he also commented on the promulgation of the Constitution of the Empire of Japan, pointing out that the Japanese populace lacked the spiritual independence necessary for a parliamentary system.

description.zh-cn: 1969年3月发生于乌苏里江珍宝岛的中苏大规模武装冲突，是中苏边界冲突中最著名的事件。
description.en: A large-scale armed conflict between China and the Soviet Union on Zhenbao Island in the Ussuri River in March 1969, the most famous incident in the Sino-Soviet border conflict.

description.zh-cn: 美国第26任总统，就任时是美国历史上最年轻的总统。他曾在日俄战争末期斡旋双方签订《朴茨茅斯条约》。在1912年总统选举中作为进步党候选人参选，导致共和党选票分裂。他强烈批评威尔逊的战时政策，并与富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福是堂兄弟。
description.en: The 26th President of the United States, and the youngest person to become president. He mediated the signing of the Treaty of Portsmouth at the end of the Russo-Japanese War. He ran as a Progressive Party candidate in the 1912 presidential election, splitting the Republican vote. He was a strong critic of Wilson's wartime policies, and a fifth cousin of Franklin D. Roosevelt.

description.zh-cn: 日俄战争期间俄罗斯帝国的沙皇。
description.en: The Tsar of the Russian Empire during the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1901年9月7日，清政府与十一国就义和团事件及八国联军侵华战争签订不平等条约。此条约标志着义和团运动的结束，主要内容包括巨额赔款（庚子赔款）、允许外国驻军、惩处包括毓贤在内的肇事官员，并对发生教案的地区进行惩罚。其条款在1926年被八国用作向北洋政府提出最后通牒的依据。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed on September 7, 1901, between the Qing government and eleven nations regarding the Boxer Incident and the Eight-Nation Alliance's invasion of China. This treaty marked the end of the Boxer Rebellion. Its main provisions included massive indemnities (the Boxer Indemnity), the stationing of foreign troops, punishments for responsible officials including Yuxian, and penalties on regions where anti-Christian incidents occurred. Its terms were later used in 1926 by eight powers as the basis for an ultimatum to the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国武装力量的组成部分，是不脱离生产的群众武装组织。
在四川成都举办的国际体育赛事。江油事件发生在该运动会开幕前夕，给地方官员带来了维持稳定的巨大政治压力，可能影响了他们对事件的处理方式。
description.en: An international sports event held in Chengdu, Sichuan. The Jiangyou incident occurred just before its opening, placing immense political pressure on local officials to maintain stability, which likely influenced their handling of the situation.

zh-cn: 杭州深度求索人工智能基础技术研究有限公司

description.zh-cn: 幻方量化创立的一家中国人工智能与大型语言模型公司，开发了生成式人工智能聊天机器人。在中国传媒研究计划的测试中，该模型未输出江油示威相关信息，反映了审查延伸至AI领域。
description.en: An artificial intelligence and large language model company in China, founded by High-Flyer Quant. It developed a generative AI chatbot. In tests by the China Media Project, the model did not output information about the Jiangyou protests, reflecting the extension of censorship into the AI domain.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省杭州市拱墅区
location.en: Gongshu District, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲市府时期的台北市长办公室主任，因京华城案被控违背职务收受贿赂罪。
description.en: Director of the Taipei City Mayor's Office during Ko Wen-je's administration, accused of accepting bribes against his duties in the Core Pacific City case.

description.zh-cn: 民进党籍政治人物，曾任台北市议员，早期曾指控官员图利京华城。
description.en: Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) politician and former Taipei City Councilor who had previously accused officials of improperly benefiting Core Pacific City.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝之一，由宇文泰建立。其后被杨坚篡位，建立隋朝。
description.en: One of the Northern dynasties during China's Northern and Southern dynasties period, founded by Yuwen Tai. It was later usurped by Yang Jian, who established the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期存在于江陵地区的一个割据政权，后被隋文帝所废。
description.en: A small state that existed in the Jiangling area during the Northern and Southern dynasties period, which was later abolished by Emperor Wen of Sui.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China
zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 清末怪杰，精通多种语言，曾任张之洞幕僚。
description.en: An eccentric scholar in the late Qing dynasty, proficient in multiple languages, who served as an aide to Zhang Zhidong.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as Vice President during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，前英国首相，在伊拉克战争等议题上与布什政府紧密合作。
description.en: British politician and former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom who worked closely with the Bush administration, particularly on the Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家元首、政府首脑和三军统帅。根据1787年通过的《美国宪法》设立，行使宪法赋予的行政权。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces. The office was established by the U.S. Constitution in 1787, exercising executive power.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗的伊斯兰原教旨主义政治和军事组织。曾在2001年被美国领导的联军推翻。在其统治时期，曾支持“东伊运”，并允许其在其境内活动。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist political and military organization in Afghanistan. It was overthrown by a U.S.-led coalition in 2001. During its rule, it previously supported ETIM and allowed the group to operate on its territory.

description.zh-cn: 一个由奥萨玛·本·拉登创立的国际伊斯兰恐怖主义组织，被美国认定为九一一袭击事件的策划者，并曾向“东伊运”提供资金和训练支持。
description.en: An international Islamic terrorist organization founded by Osama bin Laden, identified by the U.S. as the planner of the September 11 attacks, and which provided funding and training support to ETIM.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣，岐阳武靖王，朱元璋外甥，李景隆之父。
description.en: A founding general of the Ming Dynasty, King Wujing of Qiyang, nephew of Zhu Yuanzhang, and father of Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第八位皇帝，唐肃宗李亨长子，原名李俶。他在张皇后与李辅国的权力斗争中被拥立为帝，并在安史之乱中以兵马元帅名义收复两京。即位后，安史之乱虽告结束，但唐朝开始走向衰落，面临藩镇割据、回鹘勒索和吐蕃侵扰等问题。他笃信佛教，曾任命高适代理剑南节度使，后又将其召还京城任职。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Tang Dynasty and the eldest son of Emperor Suzong Li Heng, originally named Li Chu. He was enthroned amidst the power struggle between Empress Zhang and Li Fuguo, and as Marshal, he recovered the two capitals during the An Lushan Rebellion. After his ascension, the rebellion ended, but the Tang Dynasty began to decline, facing issues such as the fanzhen system, extortion from the Uyghur Khaganate, and invasions by the Tibetan Empire. A devout Buddhist, he also appointed Gao Shi as the acting military governor of Jiannan and later recalled him to serve in the capital.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年将领，在辽东皮岛建立东江镇，以牵制后金。因其不受节制、虚报兵饷等行为，最终被袁崇焕以尚方宝剑斩杀。
description.en: A late Ming Dynasty general who established the Dongjiang garrison on Pi Island in Liaodong to harass the Later Jin. He was executed by Yuan Chonghuan with an imperial sword for insubordination, fraudulent reporting of military expenses, and other transgressions.

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国末代皇帝和普鲁士王国末代国王，在十一月革命期间被迫退位。
description.en: The last German Emperor and King of Prussia, who was forced to abdicate during the November Revolution.

zh-cn: 德意志联邦共和国总理
en: Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国、北德意志邦联及普鲁士王国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position for the German Empire, North German Confederation, and Kingdom of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士将军和政治家，曾短暂担任普鲁士首相。
description.en: Prussian general and statesman who briefly served as Minister President of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 1874年，日本以琉球漂流民在台湾被原住民杀害为由，出兵攻打台湾南部原住民部落，并与清朝展开外交折冲。这是日本明治维新以来的首次对外用兵。此次行动中，大久保利通作为全权大臣负责与清朝交涉，而木户孝允则一贯持反对态度，并在政府决定出兵后辞去参议职务以示抗议。
description.en: In 1874, Japan launched a punitive military expedition to southern Taiwan against indigenous Paiwan tribes, citing the murder of Ryukyuan castaways in 1871, and engaged in subsequent diplomatic negotiations with the Qing dynasty. This marked Japan's first overseas military deployment since the Meiji Restoration. During this action, Ōkubo Toshimichi served as plenipotentiary to negotiate with Qing China, while Kido Takayoshi consistently opposed it and resigned from his Sangi post in protest of the government's decision to dispatch troops.

description.zh-cn: 自2010年底开始在阿拉伯世界爆发的一系列以“民主”和“经济”为主题的反政府示威、抗议和武装叛乱的革命浪潮。
description.en: Beginning in late 2010, a series of anti-government demonstrations, protests, and armed rebellions, primarily driven by themes of democracy and economic grievances, erupted across the Arab world, forming a revolutionary wave.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，由支持国民政府的地主和富农等组成的武装组织，对共产党控制区进行反攻倒算。
description.en: Armed groups formed by landlords and rich peasants supporting the Nationalist government during the second Chinese Civil War, conducting counter-attacks and reprisals in areas controlled by the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 美国历史上和现存的奉行白人至上主义的仇恨团体。
description.en: American white supremacist hate groups, past and present.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》是先秦时期法家代表思想家韩非的论著集，作为法家集大成的思想作品，它系统阐发了社会各领域并深度探究了统治技术。此书对后世影响深远，宋神宗为太子时便喜读此书，其思想对其治国理念产生了重要影响。
description.en: Han Feizi is a collection of treatises by Han Fei, a representative Legalist thinker from the pre-Qin period of China. As a comprehensive masterpiece of Legalist thought, it systematically elaborates on various social fields and deeply explores techniques of governance. This book had a profound impact on later generations; Emperor Shenzong, as crown prince, enjoyed reading it, and its ideas significantly influenced his governing philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期法家代表人物，通过在秦国推行变法，使秦国崛起为强国。
description.en: A representative figure of Legalism during the Warring States period, whose reforms in the state of Qin led to its rise as a major power.

description.zh-cn: 印度及其他南亚地区普遍存在的社会分层体系。
description.en: A system of social stratification prevalent in India and other parts of South Asia.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的国家之一。
description.en: One of the historical kingdoms on the Korean Peninsula.

en: Theater Commands of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 2016年军改后设立的中国人民解放军战区级别联合作战指挥机构，取代了原有的七大军区。
description.en: Theater-level joint operations command structures of the PLA established after the 2016 military reform, replacing the original seven military regions.

description.zh-cn: 泰国却克里王朝第九位君主，其外孙蒲美·詹森在2004年印度洋海啸中遇难。
description.en: The ninth monarch of Thailand from the Chakri dynasty, whose grandson Bhumi Jensen died in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 德国一级方程式赛车手，为2004年印度洋海啸的救援工作捐赠了1000万美元。
description.en: A German Formula One racing driver who donated $10 million to the relief efforts for the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 美国位于北美洲西北角的联邦州，是美国面积最大的州，也是人口第3少和最稀疏的州。2004年印度洋大地震甚至在此地触发了远距地震。
description.en: A U.S. state located at the northwest extremity of North America. It is the largest U.S. state by area, the 3rd least populous, and the most sparsely populated among the 50 states. The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake even triggered remote earthquakes in this region.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的最高精神领袖，传统上被认为是观世音菩萨的化身。他曾提出“五点和平计划”并多次发表演讲，同时对《零八宪章》表示支持。
description.en: The supreme spiritual leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, traditionally considered an emanation of Avalokiteśvara. He proposed the 'Five Point Peace Plan', gave several speeches, and expressed support for Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 由世界七个主要发达经济体组成的国际组织，不承认2014年克里米亚公投的合法性。
description.en: An international organization consisting of the world's seven largest advanced economies, which does not recognize the legitimacy of the 2014 Crimean referendum.

zh-cn: 2021年香港立法会议员民主派初选案
串谋颠覆国家政权罪密谋案件
串谋颠覆国家政权罪案
香港民主派初选大搜捕
en: Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests

description.zh-cn: 香港警方国安处对53名参与或组织2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选的人士，以涉嫌违反《港区国安法》中“颠覆国家政权罪”为由，于2021年1月6日进行大规模拘捕。此案最终导致47人被起诉，45人被定罪。
description.en: On January 6, 2021, the Hong Kong Police's National Security Department conducted a large-scale arrest operation against 53 individuals involved in or organizing the 2020 pro-democracy primaries for the Legislative Council election, on suspicion of 'subversion' under the National Security Law. This case ultimately led to 47 prosecutions and 45 convictions.

zh-cn: 纳尔逊·罗利拉拉·曼德拉

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离活动家、政治家，曾任南非总统、非洲人国民大会主席及不结盟运动秘书长，被广泛尊为“南非国父”。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid activist and politician who served as President of South Africa, President of the African National Congress, and Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement. Widely regarded as the 'Father of the Nation' in South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪在南非建立首个欧洲殖民地的荷兰特许公司。
description.en: The Dutch chartered company that established the first European colony in South Africa in the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的上市地点之一，其代理人公司也是工行的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the stock exchanges where ICBC is listed. Its nominee company is also a major shareholder of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国工商银行行长及董事长，也曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former President and Chairman of ICBC, and former Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 日本君主的称号，是日本国及国民团结的象征，也是名义上的国家元首。同时，其负责根据内阁的提名任命最高裁判所长官，并对最高裁判所判事的任命进行确认。
description.en: The title of the monarch of Japan, who is the symbol of the State and of the unity of the people, and is the ceremonial head of state. They are also responsible for appointing the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court as designated by the Cabinet and attesting the appointment of other Justices.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物。在2024年自民党总裁选举中，她与石破茂竞争，并最终接替其成为内阁总理大臣。
description.en: A Japanese politician. She competed with Shigeru Ishiba in the 2024 LDP presidential election and eventually succeeded him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 日本在第二次世界大战后成立的实际上的国家武装力量，根据宪法第九条，其任务是维持日本的自我防卫能力。
description.en: The de facto armed forces of Japan established after World War II. According to Article 9 of the Constitution, its mission is to maintain Japan's self-defense capabilities.

description.zh-cn: 日本的中央行政机关，由内阁总理大臣领导。其作为《中日联合声明》的签署方，对台立场同时受《旧金山和约》的影响。
description.en: The central administrative organ of Japan, led by the Prime Minister. As a signatory to the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué, its stance on Taiwan is also influenced by the Treaty of San Francisco.

description.zh-cn: 由东日本大震灾引发的严重核事故。
description.en: A severe nuclear accident triggered by the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 源于西亚的一神论宗教，基督宗教的思想和信仰实践多源自于此。
description.en: A monotheistic religion originating in Western Asia, from which much of Christian thought and practice is derived.

zh-cn: 君士坦丁一世 (罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 罗马皇帝，于公元313年发布《米兰敕令》，结束了对基督徒的迫害，并使基督教合法化。他还在保罗的殉道地修建了城外圣保禄大殿。
description.en: Roman Emperor who issued the Edict of Milan in 313 AD, ending the persecution of Christians and legalizing Christianity. He also built the Basilica of Saint Paul Outside the Walls at the site of Paul's martyrdom.

description.zh-cn: 基督教的主要分支之一，产生于16世纪的宗教改革运动。
description.en: One of the major branches of Christianity, which emerged from the 16th-century Protestant Reformation.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪欧洲宗教改革的代表人物之一。
description.en: One of the representative figures of the 16th-century European Protestant Reformation.

description.zh-cn: 早期基督教会的关键人物，原为迫害基督徒的犹太教徒，后转变为基督徒，成为向非犹太人传播基督教的主要传教士，并撰写了新约中的多卷书信。
description.en: A key figure in the early Christian church. Originally a Jew who persecuted Christians, he converted to Christianity and became the primary missionary for spreading the faith to non-Jews, authoring several epistles in the New Testament.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军英雄，在上甘岭战役中用身体堵住联合国军机枪眼而牺牲。
description.en: A hero of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army who sacrificed himself by blocking a UN machine gun emplacement with his body during the Battle of Triangle Hill.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军军医，731部队的创始人和首任部队长，对该部队进行的人体实验和细菌战负有主要责任。战后向美国提供研究数据以换取战争罪豁免。
description.en: A Japanese army medical officer, founder and the first commander of Unit 731, primarily responsible for its human experiments and biological warfare activities. He was granted immunity from war crimes prosecution by the United States in exchange for research data after the war.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期七个最强大的诸侯国的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the seven most powerful states during the Warring States period of China.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期由白狄建立的国家，于公元前406年被魏国攻灭。
description.en: A state established by the Baidi people during the Warring States period, which was conquered by the state of Wei in 406 BC.

description.zh-cn: 周朝的诸侯国，春秋时期的大国，后被韩、赵、魏三家瓜分。
description.en: A major vassal state of the Zhou dynasty during the Spring and Autumn period, later partitioned by the families of Han, Zhao, and Wei.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，在长平之战中大败赵军，并坑杀赵国降卒。
description.en: A general of the State of Qin who decisively defeated the Zhao army at the Battle of Changping and executed the surrendered Zhao soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 赵国末期著名将领，战功赫赫，后被赵王迁听信谗言所杀。
description.en: A famous general in the late period of the State of Zhao, known for his military achievements, who was later executed by King Qian of Zhao due to slander.

description.zh-cn: 原为华为旗下的智能手机品牌，后于2020年被出售。
description.en: Formerly a smartphone brand under Huawei, it was sold in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国的跨国电信设备和系统公司，与华为、巨龙通信、大唐电信并称为“巨大中华”。
description.en: A Chinese multinational telecommunications equipment and systems company, known as one of the 'Great Four' along with Huawei, Julong, and Datang.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国电信公司，曾与华为合作生产手机。
description.en: An American multinational telecommunications company that once partnered with Huawei for mobile phone production.

description.zh-cn: 德国高端相机制造商，与华为合作共同设计智能手机摄像头。
description.en: A German premium camera manufacturer that partners with Huawei to co-engineer smartphone cameras.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席
en: Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的领导人职位。
description.en: The leadership position of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市朝阳区、顺义区
location.en: Chaoyang District and Shunyi District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都北京的主要国际机场之一，曾是世界客运吞吐量第二大的机场。
description.en: One of the main international airports serving Beijing, the capital of the People's Republic of China. It was once the world's second busiest airport by passenger traffic.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在斯洛伐克地区成立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Nazi Germany in the Slovak territory.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部原副部长，因严重违纪违法问题被立案审查调查。
description.en: Former Vice Minister of Public Security of the People's Republic of China, investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

zh-cn: 加州州立大学东湾分校

description.zh-cn: 授予张纯如荣誉博士学位的大学。
description.en: A university that awarded an honorary doctorate to Iris Chang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份，陆房战斗的发生地。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, the location of the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的直辖市，战时首都，蒋孝武的出生地。
description.en: A direct-controlled municipality during the mainland period of the Republic of China, the wartime capital, and the birthplace of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 复旦大学国际政治系副教授。
description.en: Associate professor in the Department of International Politics at Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 阿兰泰之子，历任大学士、靖逆将军，击退准噶尔大汗策妄阿拉布坦。
description.en: Son of Alantai, served as a Grand Secretary and General Jingni, repelled the Dzungar Khan Tsewang Rabtan.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海道台，与英国领事巴富尔谈判并公布《上海土地章程》，辟设了上海英租界。
description.en: Served as the Shanghai Daotai, negotiated with British Consul George Balfour and promulgated the 'Shanghai Land Regulations', establishing the Shanghai British Concession.

description.zh-cn: 中国，位于东亚，拥有悠久的历史和文明。在不同语境中，它既指现代的中华人民共和国，也涵盖了元朝和明朝等历史时期。现代中国在毛泽东和周恩来指示下，曾启动523项目研发抗疟新药，并面临着如纪录片《穹顶之下》所关注的空气污染等问题。
description.en: China, a country in East Asia with a long history and civilization. In different contexts, it refers to both the modern People's Republic of China and historical periods such as the Yuan and Ming dynasties. Modern China, under the direction of Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai, initiated Project 523 to develop new antimalarial drugs and faces issues like air pollution, as highlighted in the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新竹市的国立研究型大学。
description.en: A national research university in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中国乒乓球运动员，黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chinese table tennis player, cousin of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的幼子，梅派艺术的传人。
description.en: The youngest son of Mei Lanfang and an heir to the Mei School of Peking Opera.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒙古族，接替布小林出任内蒙古自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Mongol ethnicity, who succeeded Bu Xiaolin as Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳·川普担任美国总统期间的内阁。
description.en: The Cabinet of the United States during the presidency of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个行政级别。
description.en: An administrative rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省齐齐哈尔市下辖的县，金晓昀的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Qiqihar, Heilongjiang province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Jin Xiaoyun.

description.zh-cn: 指一个国家或地区的政治统治权力及其执行机构。
description.en: Refers to the political ruling power and its executive bodies in a country or region.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期巴黎的市政府，在推动革命激进化过程中扮演了重要角色，包括策划了1793年5月31日至6月2日的暴动。在热月政变中，它支持罗伯斯庇尔但最终失败，大量成员被处决。
description.en: The municipal government of Paris during the French Revolution, which played an important role in radicalizing the revolution, including organizing the insurrection of May 31 - June 2, 1793. During the Thermidorian Reaction, it supported Robespierre but was ultimately defeated, with many of its members executed.

en: Computing Center, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔，位于上将之下、少将之上。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, ranking below general and above major general.
