description.en: During a rally for the 2018 Taipei mayoral election, Pasuya Yao implied that Kao Chia-yu left while he was speaking, inciting discontent among his supporters towards her.

description.zh-cn: 吕蒙以“白衣渡江”之计奇袭荆州，最终俘虏并斩杀了关羽。
description.en: Lü Meng used the tactic of 'crossing the river in civilian clothes' to launch a surprise attack on Jing Province, ultimately capturing and executing Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 魏将邓艾偷渡阴平，兵临成都，后主刘禅投降，蜀汉灭亡。其后司马氏篡魏建晋。
description.en: The Wei general Deng Ai crossed Yinping by a treacherous route and appeared before Chengdu. The Shu emperor Liu Shan surrendered, and Shu Han fell. The Sima clan later usurped Wei and established Jin.

description.zh-cn: 三年困难时期的严重后果导致中共中央开始调整经济政策，并于1961年批准“八字方针”，实际上停止了大跃进运动。
description.en: The severe consequences of the Three Years of Difficult Period led the CPC Central Committee to adjust its economic policies, approving the 'Eight-Character Policy' in 1961, which effectively ended the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 因支持“包产到户”，邓子恢在1962年北戴河会议及八届十中全会上遭到毛泽东的严厉批判，并被降职。
description.en: For supporting 'fixing output quotas on a household basis,' Deng Zihui was severely criticized by Mao Zedong at the 1962 Beidaihe Conference and the 8th Plenary Session of the 10th Central Committee, and was subsequently demoted.

description.zh-cn: 在自身发生严重饥荒的情况下，中国于1960年援助阿尔巴尼亚15000吨小麦，并于1961年赠予其五亿卢布及额外的小麦。
description.en: Despite its own severe famine, China provided Albania with 15,000 tons of wheat in 1960, and in 1961, granted it 500 million rubles and additional wheat.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来代表中国政府，拒绝了赫鲁晓夫主动提出的对华援助以缓解饥荒的建议。
description.en: On behalf of the Chinese government, Zhou Enlai rejected Khrushchev's unsolicited offer of aid to alleviate the famine.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝采纳“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”的政策，将《周易》与《诗》、《书》、《礼》、《春秋》并列为《五经》，确立了其官方经典的地位。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Han adopted the policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools and revering only Confucianism,' elevating the I Ching along with the 'Poetry', 'Documents', 'Rites', and 'Spring and Autumn Annals' to the status of the 'Five Classics', thereby establishing its official canonical status.

description.zh-cn: 在秦始皇“焚书坑儒”期间，时任丞相李斯将《周易》归类为医术占卜之书，从而使其免于被焚毁。
description.en: During Qin Shi Huang's 'burning of books and burying of scholars', Chancellor Li Si classified the I Ching as a book of medicine and divination, thus sparing it from being burned.

description.zh-cn: 自17世纪起，耶稣会的传教士开始将《易经》翻译并介绍到西方世界。
description.en: Starting in the 17th century, Jesuit missionaries began to translate and introduce the I Ching to the Western world.

description.zh-cn: 在《中日联合声明》中，日本政府声明其将坚持遵循《波茨坦公告》第八条的立场，该条款涉及日本领土范围。
description.en: In the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué, the Japanese government stated its adherence to the position of Article 8 of the Potsdam Declaration, which relates to the extent of Japanese territory.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在中共十三届一中全会上当选为中央政治局常委。他同时兼任第七届国务院副总理。
description.en: Yao Yilin was elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the First Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the CCP. Concurrently, he served as Vice Premier of the 7th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林长期担任国务院副总理，分管经济工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin served as Vice Premier of the State Council for a long time, in charge of economic work.

description.zh-cn: 1937年左右考入南开大学经济系学习。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Economics at Nankai University around 1937.

description.zh-cn: 服役期间参与了中国抗日战争和第二次国共内战。
description.en: During his service, he participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在文化大革命期间受到严重迫害，直到1973年才复出工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin was severely persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and did not return to work until 1973.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林反对华国锋提出的“两个凡是”方针。
description.en: Yao Yilin opposed the "Two Whatevers" policy proposed by Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林坚决支持对学生运动采取军事镇压，是唯一一位没有与学生对话的政治局常委。
description.en: Yao Yilin firmly supported the military suppression of the student movement and was the only Politburo Standing Committee member who did not engage in dialogue with the students.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央政治局常委期间，江泽民是中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任国家计划委员会主任和国务院副总理期间，李鹏是国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the State Planning Commission and Vice Premier, Li Peng was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任中央办公厅主任、商业部长和国务院副总理期间，华国锋是党主席或国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Minister of Commerce, and Vice Premier, Hua Guofeng was the Party Chairman or Premier.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央办公厅主任期间，胡耀邦是中共中央主席。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Hu Yaobang was the Chairman of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是光绪帝的嫡妻皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the primary empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 因慈禧太后强行指定婚事，光绪帝厌恶孝定景皇后，夫妻关系不睦。
description.en: Due to the marriage being arranged against his will by Empress Dowager Cixi, the Guangxu Emperor disliked Empress Xiaodingjing, leading to a strained marital relationship.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是慈禧太后之弟桂祥的女儿，即慈禧太后的侄女。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the daughter of Guixiang, the younger brother of Empress Dowager Cixi, making her Cixi's niece.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后选定自己的侄女叶赫那拉氏为光绪帝的皇后，以便监视光绪帝。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi selected her niece, the future Empress Xiaodingjing, to be the Guangxu Emperor's empress in order to monitor his actions.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝驾崩后，孝定景皇后成为宣统帝溥仪的养母，并负责抚养他。
description.en: After the death of the Guangxu Emperor, Empress Xiaodingjing became the adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor Puyi and was responsible for raising him.

description.zh-cn: 在宣统帝年幼时，作为皇太后垂帘听政，代行国家最高统治权。
description.en: During the Xuantong Emperor's childhood, she ruled as Empress Dowager regent, exercising supreme state power on his behalf.

description.zh-cn: 隆裕太后逝世后，北洋政府为其举行了高规格的国葬，并通告全国下半旗致哀三日。
description.en: After Empress Dowager Longyu's death, the Beiyang Government held a high-profile state funeral for her and ordered national flags to be flown at half-mast for three days in mourning.

description.zh-cn: 在隆裕太后逝世后，时任副总统黎元洪致唁电称赞其“德至功高，女中尧舜”。
description.en: After the death of Empress Dowager Longyu, then Vice President Li Yuanhong sent a condolence telegram praising her as having 'the virtue of Yao and Shun among women'.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃是光绪帝宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Consort Zhen was a favored consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝厌恶皇后而独宠珍妃，导致皇后与珍妃关系不睦。
description.en: The Guangxu Emperor's dislike for the empress and exclusive favor towards Consort Zhen led to an antagonistic relationship between the two women.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军攻入北京后，孝定景皇后与瑾妃一同随慈禧太后、光绪帝逃往西安。
description.en: After the Eight-Nation Alliance entered Beijing, Empress Xiaodingjing, along with Consort Jin, fled to Xi'an with Empress Dowager Cixi and the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 吉米·卡特是佐治亚理工学院1946届校友。
description.en: Jimmy Carter is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, class of 1946.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗以皇后无子多病为由，废黜了胡善祥的皇后之位。
description.en: The Xuande Emperor deposed Empress Hu Shanxiang on the grounds of her being childless and frequently ill.

description.zh-cn: 当张太皇太后欲处死王振时，年幼的明英宗跪下求情，使其得以幸免。
description.en: When Grand Empress Dowager Zhang intended to execute Wang Zhen, the young Emperor Yingzong knelt and pleaded for him, allowing him to be spared.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长是党和国家领导人之一。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is one of the leaders of the Party and the State.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长由全国人民代表大会选举产生，并向其负责。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is elected by and responsible to the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长的人选根据中共中央的建议进行提名。
description.en: The candidate for the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is nominated based on the recommendation of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长由全国人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is elected by the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法正式设立了全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长一职。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution formally established the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年乔石当选委员长起，该职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since Qiao Shi was elected Chairman in 1993, this position has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 该人物曾担任中共十九届中央政治局常委。根据惯例，全国人大常委会委员长职务自1993年起由中共中央政治局常委担任，该人物亦在此期间担任此职。
description.en: This individual served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee. According to convention, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee since 1993, and this individual also held this position during this period.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国于1972年12月9日成为联合国会员国。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates became a member of the United Nations on December 9, 1972.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书在哈尔滨工业大学获得高级工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Li Zhanshu obtained an Executive Master of Business Administration (EMBA) degree from Harbin Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任无极县委书记的栗战书与邻近的正定县县委书记习近平相识并建立良好关系，后被视为习近平最信任的心腹之一。
description.en: In 1983, Li Zhanshu, then Party Secretary of Wuji County, became acquainted with Xi Jinping, Party Secretary of the neighboring Zhengding County, and established a good relationship. He was later regarded as one of Xi Jinping's most trusted confidants.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，时任中共中央主席的胡耀邦批转了栗战书建议高唱《社会主义好》的信件，该信件随后在《人民日报》发表，使栗战书名声大增。
description.en: In 1982, then-CPC Chairman Hu Yaobang approved Li Zhanshu's letter suggesting the promotion of the song 'Socialism is Good'. The letter was subsequently published in the People's Daily, greatly increasing Li's fame.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书接替令计划，担任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Li Zhanshu succeeded Ling Jihua as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 人民公社化运动是大跃进的重要组成部分和“三面红旗”之一，旨在农村地区建立集工农兵学商为一体的组织。
description.en: The People's Commune Movement was an important component of the Great Leap Forward and one of the 'Three Red Banners', aiming to establish organizations integrating industry, agriculture, military, education, and commerce in rural areas.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争的爆发导致华北高校南迁，最终在昆明组建了国立西南联合大学。
description.en: The outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War led to the southward relocation of universities from North China, eventually resulting in the formation of the National Southwestern Associated University in Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Tsinghua University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: Nankai University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 1937年7月29日，南开大学校园遭到日军轰炸，校舍被付之一炬。
description.en: On July 29, 1937, the Nankai University campus was bombed by the Japanese army and its buildings were destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 两国因西沙群岛主权争议爆发西沙海战。
description.en: The two countries fought the Battle of the Paracel Islands over a sovereignty dispute concerning the islands.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来电话指示叶剑英召集领导小组，到总参谋部指挥作战。
description.en: Zhou Enlai instructed Ye Jianying via telephone to convene a leading group to command the battle from the General Staff Department.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，巴金受到上海作家协会“造反派”批判，被关进“牛棚”，并被《人民日报》点名批评，同时被强迫劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ba Jin was criticized by the 'rebel faction' of the Shanghai Writers Association, confined to a 'cowshed', singled out for criticism in a People's Daily article, and forced into labor.

description.zh-cn: 茅盾曾任中国作家协会主席，巴金于1984年接替其职务，并当选为新一任主席。
description.en: Mao Dun was the chairman of the China Writers Association. Ba Jin succeeded him in 1984, being elected as the new chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上，时任全国政协主席贾庆林代表中共中央专程前往为巴金送别。
description.en: At Ba Jin's funeral, Jia Qinglin, then Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, made a special trip to pay final respects on behalf of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上为其送别。
description.en: Attended Ba Jin's farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上为其送别。
description.en: Attended Ba Jin's farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗是武则天的丈夫。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong was the husband of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵于1990年与齐桥桥相识。
description.en: Deng Jiagui met Qi Qiaoqiao in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操麾下的重要将领，为其效力。
description.en: Cao Hong was an important general under Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Pi became emperor, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Rui ascended the throne, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操的堂弟。
description.en: Cao Hong was Cao Cao's younger paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹魏的开国功臣和重要将领。
description.en: Cao Hong was a founding contributor and important general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 在荥阳之战中，曹操兵败失去坐骑，曹洪将自己的马让给曹操，并说出“天下可无洪，不可无公”的话，救了曹操一命。
description.en: In the Battle of Xingyang, after Cao Cao was defeated and lost his horse, Cao Hong gave his own horse to Cao Cao, saying 'The world can do without Hong, but not without you, my lord,' saving his life.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战中，张郃前来投降时，曹洪心存疑虑，荀攸劝说曹洪接纳了张郃。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, when Zhang He came to surrender, Cao Hong was suspicious. Xun You persuaded Cao Hong to accept Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，借口曹洪的食客犯法，将其收监并准备处死，后虽免死但仍被削爵贬为庶民。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi used the excuse of Cao Hong's retainer breaking the law to imprison him and prepare for his execution. Although spared death, he was stripped of his titles and reduced to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，恢复了曹洪的名誉和爵位。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Cao Rui restored Cao Hong's reputation and titles.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿耻于和曹洪来往，以生病为由拒绝了曹洪的邀请。
description.en: Sima Yi was ashamed to associate with Cao Hong and declined his invitation on the grounds of illness.

description.zh-cn: 因司马懿拒绝与自己来往，曹洪心生怨恨并向曹操告状。
description.en: Because Sima Yi refused to associate with him, Cao Hong became resentful and reported him to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在文化大革命初期担任中央文革小组组长，是运动的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Chen Boda served as the leader of the Central Cultural Revolution Group in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, and was one of the main leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陈伯达作为中央文革小组组长，参与了对时任国家主席刘少奇的批判和迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, as the head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, Chen Boda participated in the criticism and persecution of then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央北方局宣传部部长
position.en: Minister of the Propaganda Department of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 1936年春，时任中共中央北方局书记的刘少奇提名陈伯达担任宣传部部长。
description.en: In the spring of 1936, Liu Shaoqi, then Secretary of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, nominated Chen Boda to be the Minister of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在华北会议上作总结讲话，系统地揭露了陈伯达的罪行。
description.en: Zhou Enlai delivered a concluding speech at the North China Conference, systematically exposing Chen Boda's crimes.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在给毛泽东的信中，将陈伯达与林彪并列为反革命集团，并对其个人品质作出负面评价。
description.en: In a letter to Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping equated Chen Boda with Lin Biao as a counter-revolutionary clique and made negative comments on his personal character.

description.zh-cn: 在该案的审判中，陈伯达被判处有期徒刑18年。
description.en: In the trial of this case, Chen Boda was sentenced to 18 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 在中共六大后，向忠发当选为中央政治局主席兼中央政治局常委会主席，党内习惯称之为“总书记”。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa was elected Chairman of the Central Politburo and its Standing Committee, a position customarily referred to within the party as 'General Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，刘少奇是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Liu Shaoqi was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，李立三是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Li Lisan was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，项英是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Xiang Ying was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来前往苏联期间，向忠发听信李立三的建议，推行了“立三路线”的冒险主义政策。
description.en: While Zhou Enlai was in the Soviet Union, Xiang Zhongfa heeded Li Lisan's advice and implemented the adventurist policies of the 'Lisan Line'.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发在中共六大后接替陈独秀（及其后的瞿秋白），成为中共最高领导人。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa succeeded Chen Duxiu (and his successor Qu Qiubai) to become the top leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 设立中央顾问委员会是为解决干部领导职务终身制问题、实现新老交替而采取的一种过渡性措施。
description.en: The establishment of the Central Advisory Commission was a transitional measure taken to address the issue of lifelong tenure for leading cadres and to achieve the transition from the old to the new generation of leaders.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是设立中央顾问委员会的主要倡导者和推动者，多次提出并最终促成了该机构的建立。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was the main advocate and promoter for the establishment of the Central Advisory Commission, proposing it multiple times and ultimately facilitating its creation.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在1973年曾考虑设立一个以老干部为主的“中央顾问委员会”，提出了该机构的初步设想，尽管当时未能实现。
description.en: In 1973, Mao Zedong considered establishing a 'Central Advisory Committee' mainly composed of veteran cadres, putting forward the initial concept for the body, although it was not realized at the time.

description.zh-cn: 根据党章规定，中央顾问委员会是中央委员会的政治上的助手、参谋，在中央委员会的领导下工作。
description.en: According to the party constitution, the Central Advisory Commission was a political assistant and advisor to the Central Committee and worked under its leadership.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央顾问委员会第一届主任。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the Director of the first Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷于1985年增选为中顾委副主任，并在第二届中连任。
description.en: Song Renqiong was elected as a Vice Director of the Central Advisory Commission in 1985 and was re-elected for the second term.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1989年9月明确提出从中共十四大起不再设立中顾委的设想，并在此后坚持中顾委必须撤销。
description.en: In September 1989, Deng Xiaoping clearly proposed the idea of not establishing the Central Advisory Commission from the 14th National Congress of the CPC onwards, and subsequently insisted that it must be abolished.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆接替李先念担任中华人民共和国第四任主席。
description.en: Yang Shangkun succeeded Li Xiannian as the fourth President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆在任期内担任中国共产党中央军事委员会和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的副主席。
description.en: During his tenure, Yang Shangkun served as Vice Chairman of both the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央军委副主席、秘书长
position.en: Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任中央军委主席期间，杨尚昆担任副主席及秘书长。
description.en: While Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Yang Shangkun served as Vice Chairman and Secretary-General.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民接任中央军委主席后，杨尚昆继续担任副主席。
description.en: After Jiang Zemin took over as Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Yang Shangkun continued to serve as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆长期担任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun served as the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 长征期间，杨尚昆与彭德怀共同率领红三军团。
description.en: During the Long March, Yang Shangkun and Peng Dehuai jointly led the Third Red Army Corps.

description.zh-cn: 在六四天安门事件期间，杨尚昆最终表明坚决支持李鹏、邓小平的决定，支持对事件的武力镇压。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Yang Shangkun ultimately expressed firm support for the decisions of Li Peng and Deng Xiaoping, endorsing the military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 科大讯飞由中国科学技术大学背景的“讯飞信息科技有限公司”整体变更设立，体现了其与该大学的紧密渊源。
description.en: iFlytek was established through the overall transformation of 'Xunfei Information Technology Co., Ltd.', a company with ties to the University of Science and Technology of China, reflecting its close origins with the university.

description.zh-cn: 《纽约时报》于2017年12月5日发文，评价科大讯飞的人工智能技术背后存在反乌托邦可能性，对其公众形象和声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: On December 5, 2017, The New York Times published an article evaluating the dystopian possibilities behind iFlytek's artificial intelligence technology, negatively impacting its public image and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的工作机关。
description.en: The General Office of the CPC Central Committee is a working organ directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的工作机关。
description.en: The Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee is a working organ directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的工作机关。
description.en: The United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee is a working organ directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的事业单位。
description.en: The Party School of the CPC Central Committee is a public institution directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1989年起长期在中央党校工作，曾任副校长（2008-2014），后返回担任常务副校长（2020-2022）。
description.en: Worked at the Central Party School for a long term since 1989, served as Vice President (2008-2014), and later returned as Executive Vice President (2020-2022).

position.en: Vice President of the Central Party School

description.zh-cn: 习近平任中共中央党校校长期间，李书磊任副校长，受到习的赏识，并经常参与起草习近平等高层的重要讲话稿。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was President of the Central Party School, Li Shulei served as Vice President, was appreciated by Xi, and often participated in drafting important speeches for Xi and other senior leaders.

description.zh-cn: 2022年4月任常务副部长，同年10月升任部长。
description.en: Appointed as Executive Deputy Head in April 2022, and promoted to Head in October of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊最敬佩的人是唐代诗人白居易。
description.en: The person Li Shulei admires most is the Tang dynasty poet Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 蔡京于熙宁三年进士及第，在北宋朝廷中任官，先后四次担任宰相，最高至太师。
description.en: Cai Jing passed the imperial examination in 1070 and served in the Northern Song court, serving as prime minister four times and reaching the highest position of Grand Preceptor.

description.zh-cn: 宋孝宗即位后，下诏为已故的蔡京平反昭雪，恢复其官职并追赠鲁国公，此举被视为对其政治遗产的某种程度的重新评价。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Xiaozong of Song issued an edict to posthumously rehabilitate the deceased Cai Jing, restoring his official titles and conferring upon him the title of Duke of Lu. This act is seen as a re-evaluation of his political legacy to some extent.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，金日成是朝鲜劳动党的创建者。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Il-sung is the founder of the party.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在1955年12月28日的演讲中首次提出“主体”概念，创立了主体思想。
description.en: Kim Il-sung first introduced the concept of 'Juche' in a speech on December 28, 1955, thereby creating the Juche Idea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成通过一系列党内清洗巩固权力后，于1974年确立了金正日的接班人地位。
description.en: After consolidating power through a series of internal purges, Kim Il-sung established Kim Jong-il's status as his successor in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是现任朝鲜劳动党总书记，为该党的最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Jong-un is the current General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, serving as its supreme leader.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，朝鲜人民军是该党的革命武装力量。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army is the party's revolutionary armed force.

description.zh-cn: 根据大韩民国的《国家保安法》，朝鲜劳动党被禁止在该国活动。
description.en: According to the National Security Act of the Republic of Korea, the Workers' Party of Korea is banned from operating in the country.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与宋丹丹在央视春晚舞台上多次合作表演小品。
description.en: Zhao Benshan and Song Dandan collaborated on several skits for the CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

description.zh-cn: 在2014年赵本山陷入政治风波时，崔永元公开出面力挺赵本山。
description.en: In 2014, when Zhao Benshan was caught in a political storm, Cui Yongyuan publicly supported him.

description.zh-cn: 2009年，中国航空工业集团的民用喷射机业务被分拆成为中国商用飞机公司。
description.en: In 2009, the civil jet business of AVIC was spun off to become the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 经国务院国资委批复同意，中国航空工业集团完成了公司制改制。
description.en: With the approval of the SASAC, Aviation Industry Corporation of China completed its corporate restructuring.

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法首次设立了中华人民共和国主席职务。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution first established the post of President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇被罢免后，国家主席职位开始长期缺位。
description.en: After Liu Shaoqi was dismissed, the post of President became vacant for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央向全国人大提出了关于修改宪法部分内容的建议，包括取消国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The CCP Central Committee proposed to the NPC suggestions for amending parts of the Constitution, including the removal of term limits for the President.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的限制。
description.en: This amendment removed the restriction that the President and Vice President shall serve no more than two consecutive terms.

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人大一次会议选举习近平为中华人民共和国主席，使其开启第三个任期。
description.en: The first session of the 14th National People's Congress elected Xi Jinping as President of the PRC, beginning his third term.

description.zh-cn: 随着大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国的成立，大不列颠王国作为独立政治实体不复存在。
description.en: With the establishment of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, the Kingdom of Great Britain ceased to exist as an independent political entity.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙王位继承战争中，大不列颠王国与法国和西班牙作战。战后，西班牙向英国割让了直布罗陀和梅诺卡岛。
description.en: During the War of the Spanish Succession, Great Britain fought against France and Spain. After the war, Spain ceded Gibraltar and Menorca to Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 对《开罗宣言》的公报草案文字作了修改，加入了“澎湖”。
description.en: He personally revised the draft of the communiqué for the Cairo Declaration, adding the 'Pescadores'.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱后，吐蕃从唐军手中夺取了对西宁的控制权。
description.en: After the An Lushan Rebellion, the Tibetan Empire seized control of Xining from the Tang army.

description.zh-cn: 金朝于1129年占领了原属北宋的西宁州。
description.en: In 1129, the Jin dynasty occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 西夏于1136年占领了原属金朝的西宁州。
description.en: In 1136, the Western Xia occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗于1227年率蒙古军队攻占西宁州，结束了西夏对此地的统治。
description.en: In 1227, Genghis Khan led the Mongol army to capture Xiningzhou, ending the rule of the Western Xia over the area.

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理在总理负责制下协助总理工作。
description.en: The Vice Premier assists the Premier under the Premier's responsibility system.

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的职务为国家级副职。
description.en: The post of Vice Premier is at the national deputy level.

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理位列党和国家领导人。
description.en: The Vice Premier is ranked among the Party and state leaders.

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的人选由国务院总理提名。
description.en: Candidates for Vice Premier are nominated by the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的人选需经全国人民代表大会表决通过。
description.en: Candidates for Vice Premier must be approved by a vote of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 国家主席根据全国人民代表大会的决定任命国务院副总理。
description.en: The President of the PRC appoints the Vice Premier based on the decision of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在担任第八届国务院副总理期间，为中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee while serving as Vice Premier in the 8th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在担任第九届国务院副总理期间，为中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee while serving as Vice Premier in the 9th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在担任第十届国务院副总理期间，为中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee while serving as Vice Premier in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发促使美国总统杜鲁门宣告台湾海峡中立化。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War prompted U.S. President Truman to declare the neutralization of the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林于1959年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Jia Qinglin joined the Chinese Communist Party in December 1959.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，贾庆林被下放到“一机部”在江西奉新的五七干校劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Jia Qinglin was sent to the May Seventh Cadre School of the First Ministry of Machine Building in Fengxin, Jiangxi for labor.

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在贾庆林担任中共中央政治局常委期间，胡锦涛为中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Jia Qinglin's tenure as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 中共福建省委书记、中共北京市委书记
position.en: Secretary of Fujian Provincial CPC Committee, Secretary of Beijing Municipal CPC Committee

description.zh-cn: 在贾庆林担任福建省委书记和北京市委书记期间，江泽民为中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Jia Qinglin's tenures as Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee and Beijing Municipal Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在远华案争议期间，时任中共中央总书记江泽民曾公开表达对贾庆林的支持，并认为贾庆林能进入政治局完全是江泽民游说的结果。
description.en: During the Yuanhua case controversy, then-General Secretary Jiang Zemin publicly expressed support for Jia Qinglin. Analysts also believed Jia's elevation to the Politburo was entirely due to Jiang's lobbying.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体报道，贾庆林家族持有万达集团的股份，暗示双方存在财务联系。
description.en: According to media reports, Jia Qinglin's family holds shares in Wanda Group, suggesting a financial connection between them.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志担任神韵艺术团的艺术总监。
description.en: Li Hongzhi serves as the Artistic Director of Shen Yun Performing Arts.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志对疫情发表评论，称其为“中共病毒”，旨在淘汰中共及其追随者，并声称中国有数亿人因此死亡。
description.en: Li Hongzhi commented on the pandemic, calling it the 'CCP virus' aimed at eliminating the CCP and its followers, and claimed hundreds of millions had died from it in China.

description.zh-cn: 艾跃进从南开大学获得学士学位后便留校工作，后组建军事教研室。
description.en: After obtaining his bachelor's degree from Nankai University, Ai Yuejin stayed on to work and later established the military teaching and research section.

description.zh-cn: 为应付第二次世界大战爆发后日益紧张的东亚局势，港英政府于1941年4月增设防卫科。
description.en: To cope with the increasingly tense situation in East Asia after the outbreak of World War II, the British Hong Kong Government established the Defence Branch in April 1941.

description.zh-cn: 防卫科于1973年5月改称为保安科。
description.en: The Defence Branch was renamed the Security Branch in May 1973.

description.zh-cn: 盖达组织向突厥斯坦伊斯兰党（东伊运）提供了资金和训练支持。
description.en: Al-Qaeda provided funding and training support to the Turkistan Islamic Party (ETIM).

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党得到了塔利班的支持，并在塔利班统治阿富汗时期在其境内活动。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party was supported by the Taliban and operated in its territory during the Taliban's rule in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会将东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动列为恐怖组织。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council listed the East Turkestan Islamic Movement as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部将东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动列入首批“东突”恐怖组织名单。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the PRC included the East Turkestan Islamic Movement in its first list of 'East Turkestan' terrorist organizations.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义组织名单。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates listed ETIM as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政府将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义名单。
description.en: The Turkish government listed ETIM as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党旨在在中国新疆地区建立独立国家，并策划实施了多起针对中国的恐怖袭击。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party aims to establish an independent state in China's Xinjiang region and has planned and carried out multiple terrorist attacks against China.

description.zh-cn: 瓦哈比派与绍德家族的合作促成了沙特阿拉伯的成立。
description.en: The cooperation between the Wahhabi movement and the House of Saud led to the establishment of Saudi Arabia.

description.zh-cn: 沙特阿拉伯将瓦哈比派定为国教，王室成员必须信奉，并且政府在世界各地推广瓦哈比派信仰，包括每年耗资20至30亿美元资助相关清真寺和伊斯兰学校。
description.en: Saudi Arabia has made Wahhabism the state religion, which royal family members must adhere to. The government also promotes the Wahhabi faith worldwide, including spending $2-3 billion annually to fund related mosques and Islamic schools.

description.zh-cn: 瓦哈比派反对什叶派等其认定的异端行为。
description.en: Wahhabism opposes what it considers heretical practices, such as Shia Islam.

description.zh-cn: 苏联解体后，瓦哈比派分子得以进入俄罗斯的伊奇克里亚车臣共和国扩张势力。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Soviet Union, Wahhabi elements were able to enter the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria in Russia to expand their influence.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国四大门户网站之一，新浪与网易在门户业务等领域存在竞争关系。
description.en: As one of China's four major portal websites, Sina competes with NetEase in the portal business and other areas.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团入股新浪微博18%股份。
description.en: Alibaba Group acquired an 18% stake in Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2009年8月推出微博服务“新浪微博”。
description.en: Sina launched its microblogging service, Sina Weibo, in August 2009.

description.zh-cn: 新浪与京东签署“京浪计划”战略合作。
description.en: Sina and JD.com signed the 'Jing-Lang Plan' for strategic cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 国家网信办指导北京市网信办因新浪网传播违法有害信息等问题约谈新浪负责人，并责令其全面深入整改。
description.en: The Cyberspace Administration of China directed its Beijing office to summon Sina's负责人 over the dissemination of illegal and harmful information, ordering comprehensive rectification.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔于1888年入读哈罗公学。
description.en: Winston Churchill attended Harrow School from 1888.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的爆发使丘吉尔重返内阁，并最终于1940年成为英国首相。
description.en: The outbreak of World War II led to Churchill's return to the cabinet and ultimately his appointment as Prime Minister in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 作为英国战时首相，丘吉尔领导同盟国对抗轴心国。
description.en: As Britain's wartime Prime Minister, Churchill led the Allied effort against the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 尽管丘吉尔是坚定的反共主义者，但在二战期间，他与苏联领导人斯大林结成同盟以对抗纳粹德国。
description.en: Despite being a staunch anti-communist, Churchill formed an alliance with Soviet leader Stalin during World War II to combat Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔发表铁幕演说时，时任美国总统杜鲁门是台下听众之一。
description.en: When Churchill delivered his Iron Curtain speech, then-U.S. President Truman was in the audience.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，丘吉尔明确将苏联视为西方民主世界的主要威胁。
description.en: After World War II, Churchill clearly identified the Soviet Union as the main threat to the Western democratic world.

description.zh-cn: 在拥立雍正帝即位时，两人里应外合，被时人并称为“内有隆科多，外有年羹尧”。
description.en: During the enthronement of Emperor Yongzheng, the two collaborated closely, leading to the contemporary saying, 'Longkodo on the inside, Nian Gengyao on the outside'.

description.zh-cn: 年羹尧于康熙三十九年（1700年）中进士后，入翰林院任职，后累迁至侍讲学士。
description.en: After passing the imperial examination in 1700, Nian Gengyao joined the Hanlin Academy and was later promoted to Expositor-in-waiting.

description.zh-cn: 雍正元年（1723年），为表彰其功绩，雍正帝将年羹尧抬入汉军镶黄旗。
description.en: In 1723, to recognize his merits, the Yongzheng Emperor transferred Nian Gengyao to the Bordered Yellow Banner Han Martial.

description.zh-cn: 在易卜拉欣·莱希担任总统期间，伊朗与沙特阿拉伯在断交七年后，于2023年3月同意恢复外交关系。
description.en: During the presidency of Ebrahim Raisi, Iran and Saudi Arabia agreed to restore diplomatic relations in March 2023, after a seven-year break.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃于1889年入宫成为光绪帝的嫔，后晋封为妃，是光绪帝最宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Consort Zhen entered the palace in 1889 as a concubine of the Guangxu Emperor, later promoted to Consort, and was his most favored consort.

description.zh-cn: 戊戌政变失败后，珍妃因被视为光绪帝的支持者而受到牵连，被慈禧太后下令软禁。
description.en: After the failure of the Wuxu Coup, Consort Zhen was implicated as a supporter of the Guangxu Emperor and was placed under house arrest by order of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃是瑾妃的同胞妹妹。
description.en: Consort Zhen was the biological younger sister of Consort Jin.

description.zh-cn: 瑾妃性情忠厚，与失宠的皇后走得很近，关系较好。
description.en: Consort Jin, being loyal and kind, was close to the out-of-favor Empress and had a good relationship with her.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间的造反派运动可分为早期的红卫兵造反运动以及后期的工人造反运动，红卫兵运动是造反派运动的开端和重要组成部分。
description.en: The rebel movement during the Cultural Revolution can be divided into the early Red Guard rebel movement and the later worker rebel movement; the Red Guard movement was the beginning and an important component of the rebel movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东通过引用“造反有理”、写信支持清华附中红卫兵、八次接见红卫兵等方式，明确支持了造反派运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong explicitly supported the rebel movement by quoting 'rebellion is justified', writing a letter in support of the Tsinghua University High School Red Guards, and receiving Red Guards eight times.

description.zh-cn: 偷袭下邳，俘虏了刘备的妻子。
description.en: Launched a surprise attack on Xiapi and captured Liu Bei's wife.

description.zh-cn: 率军东征，击败刘备，占领徐州。
description.en: Led an eastern campaign, defeated Liu Bei, and seized Xuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会主席。
description.en: Currently serves as the Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 任四川省委第一书记期间，全力执行粮食征购任务，保障了中央及大城市的粮食供给，但导致四川省因缺粮而出现大量民众饿死的情况。
description.en: As the First Secretary of the Sichuan Provincial Committee, he fully implemented the grain procurement tasks, ensuring the grain supply for the central government and major cities, but this led to a large number of deaths from starvation in Sichuan Province due to food shortages.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东看中李井泉，并将其留在红一方面军工作。
description.en: Mao Zedong took a liking to Li Jingquan and kept him to work in the First Front Army of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上紧跟毛泽东批判彭德怀。
description.en: Followed Mao Zedong closely in criticizing Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上保护李井泉，使其免于被追究在大饥荒中的责任。
description.en: Protected Li Jingquan at the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, saving him from being held responsible for his role in the Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 在从武汉到九江的船上，田家英与李井泉谈及饿死人的问题。
description.en: On a boat from Wuhan to Jiujiang, Tian Jiaying spoke with Li Jingquan about people starving to death.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中被打倒，定性为“反党、反社会主义、反毛泽东思想的独立王国”。
description.en: Was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution and labeled as an "independent kingdom opposing the Party, socialism, and Mao Zedong Thought."

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上，周恩来对李井泉上调粮食救急表示赞赏，使其未被追究责任。
description.en: At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, Zhou Enlai praised Li Jingquan for transferring grain for emergency relief, which helped him avoid being held accountable.

description.zh-cn: 由于国共内战，吴宇森的家人于1951年从广州逃难至香港。
description.en: Due to the Chinese Civil War, John Woo's family fled from Guangzhou to Hong Kong in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在吴宇森职业生涯低谷期，徐克力邀他加入新艺城，并支持他执导了其职业生涯的转折点作品《英雄本色》。
description.en: During a low point in John Woo's career, Tsui Hark invited him to join Cinema City and supported him in directing 'A Better Tomorrow', a turning point in his career.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘在另立中央后，宣布开除周恩来等人的党籍。
description.en: After establishing his separate central committee, Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Zhou Enlai and others from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学是中央军委副战区级直属单位。
description.en: The PLA National Defense University is a deputy theater-grade unit directly under the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 国防大学将毛泽东提出的“团结紧张严肃活泼”立为校训。
description.en: The National Defense University adopted 'Unity, Intensity, Seriousness, Liveliness', proposed by Mao Zedong, as its motto.

description.zh-cn: 在新调整组建的国防大学成立大会上向其授军旗、致训词。
description.en: Presented the military flag and delivered a speech at the founding ceremony of the newly restructured National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 在长征期间，反对张国焘的南下路线。
description.en: During the Long March, he opposed Zhang Guotao's southern route.

description.zh-cn: 在李富春的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: Delivered the eulogy at Li Fuchun's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在中共十一届六中全会上接替华国锋，担任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Hu Yaobang succeeded Hua Guofeng as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party at the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在中共十一届六中全会上接替华国锋，担任中共中央军委主席。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping succeeded Hua Guofeng as Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission at the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳于1980年9月接替华国锋担任国务院总理。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang succeeded Hua Guofeng as Premier of the State Council in September 1980.

description.zh-cn: 美国内战的爆发使得麻省理工学院的教学工作延误，直到1865年才正式开班。
description.en: The outbreak of the American Civil War delayed MIT's academic activities, with classes not beginning until 1865.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，麻省理工学院的军事科研活动大幅增加，成立了放射实验室等机构，致力于开发雷达和惯性导航系统等关键技术，这极大地促进了学校的发展。
description.en: During World War II, MIT's military research activities increased significantly. It established institutions like the Radiation Laboratory to develop key technologies such as radar and inertial navigation systems, which greatly spurred the university's growth.

description.zh-cn: 由于美国国内反战者抗议美方参与越战及麻省理工学院继续进行军事研究，学校最终将部分军事研究项目转移并退出了相关实验室的管理。
description.en: Due to protests by anti-war activists in the U.S. against American involvement in the Vietnam War and MIT's ongoing military research, the university eventually transferred some military research projects and divested from related laboratories.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的工作机关，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a working body of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的职能部门，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a functional department of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的职能部门，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a functional department of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央组织部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the Organization Department of the Central Committee during the 19th CPC term.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央党校校长。
description.en: Served as President of the Central Party School during the 19th CPC term.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央政法委书记。
description.en: Served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission during the 19th CPC term.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee during the 19th CPC term.

description.zh-cn: 商鞅是法家学派的代表人物，大力发展了法家思想。
description.en: Shang Yang was a representative figure of the Legalist school and significantly developed Legalist thought.

description.zh-cn: 韩非汇集各家学说，成为法家思想的集大成者。
description.en: Han Fei synthesized various doctrines, becoming the great synthesizer of Legalist thought.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇读了《韩非子》后极为赞赏，一心想要见韩非，促使其入秦。
description.en: After reading the 'Han Feizi', Qin Shi Huang greatly admired it and was eager to meet Han Fei, which led to Han Fei's journey to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 根据钱穆的观点，法家是从儒家发展而来的，许多早期法家人物由儒家培养。
description.en: According to Qian Mu, Legalism developed from Confucianism, as many early Legalist figures were educated by Confucians.

description.zh-cn: 中共江苏省委执行中国共产党中央委员会的指示，并定期向其报告工作。
description.en: The CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee implements the directives of the CPC Central Committee and reports its work to it regularly.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，华东局指定柯庆施主持江苏合并建省筹备工作，并担任重建后的省委第一书记。
description.en: In 1952, the East China Bureau appointed Ke Qingshi to preside over the preparatory work for the merger and establishment of Jiangsu Province, and he served as the first secretary of the re-established provincial committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，1967年1月，中共江苏省委被造反夺权，工作中断，直至1970年12月重组恢复。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, in January 1967, the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee was seized by rebels and its work was interrupted until it was reorganized and restored in December 1970.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺是宋濂的学生。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru was a student of Song Lian.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂在明朝担任官职，累官至翰林学士承旨、知制诰，后于1377年以年老辞官还乡。
description.en: Song Lian held official posts in the Ming Dynasty, eventually rising to Hanlin Academy Scholar-Recitor and Drafter, before retiring in 1377 due to old age.

description.zh-cn: 在胡惟庸案中，朱元璋本欲处死宋濂，后经皇后、太子求情，改判全家流放茂州。
description.en: In the Hu Weiyong case, Zhu Yuanzhang initially intended to execute Song Lian, but after pleas from the Empress and Crown Prince, the sentence was commuted to the exile of his entire family to Maozhou.

description.zh-cn: 刘基称赞宋濂为“当今文章第一”。
description.en: Liu Ji praised Song Lian as 'the foremost in literature of our time'.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗下令为宋濂平反，追复其官职。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor ordered the posthumous rehabilitation of Song Lian, restoring his official titles.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗在正德年间为宋濂追谥“文宪”。
description.en: The Zhengde Emperor granted Song Lian the posthumous title 'Wenxian' during the Zhengde era.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦与邓小平共同主持了《决议》的起草工作。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, along with Deng Xiaoping, co-presided over the drafting of the 'Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木负责《决议》的起草小组。
description.en: Hu Qiaomu was in charge of the drafting group for the 'Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木负责的《决议》起草小组是在邓小平、胡耀邦的主持下进行工作的。
description.en: The drafting group for the 'Resolution', led by Hu Qiaomu, worked under the auspices of Deng Xiaoping and Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 《决议》对毛泽东的功过得失作出了官方评价，认为其功绩是第一位的，错误是第二位的，并指出他应为“文化大革命”负主要责任，这影响了对他的官方历史定位。
description.en: The 'Resolution' made an official evaluation of Mao Zedong's merits and demerits, concluding his merits were primary and his mistakes secondary, and pointed out his primary responsibility for the 'Cultural Revolution,' which influenced his official historical positioning.

description.zh-cn: 《决议》指出，“文化大革命”期间，党、国家和人民遭到建国以来最严重的挫折和损失。
description.en: The 'Resolution' states that during the 'Cultural Revolution,' the Party, the state, and the people suffered the most severe setbacks and losses since the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特与时为法国王太子的路易-奥古斯特结婚，成为法国王太子妃，后成为王后。
description.en: Marie Antoinette married Louis-Auguste, then the Dauphin of France, becoming the Dauphine and later the Queen.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命推翻了君主制，导致玛丽·安托瓦内特被囚禁、审判并最终处决。
description.en: The French Revolution overthrew the monarchy, leading to Marie Antoinette's imprisonment, trial, and eventual execution.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在2017年3月接受《巴黎人报》采访时表示自己是“毛泽东主义者”。
description.en: In a March 2017 interview with Le Parisien, Macron stated he was a 'Maoist'.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在第75届联合国大会上表示，应派出国际调查团前往新疆调查中国维吾尔族人权问题。
description.en: At the 75th UN General Assembly, Macron stated that an international mission should be sent to Xinjiang to investigate the human rights situation of the Uyghurs in China.

description.zh-cn: 学者亚伯拉罕·盖格尔认为，《古兰经》的许多用字、概念及典故参考了犹太教。
description.en: The scholar Abraham Geiger argued that many of the words, concepts, and narratives in the Quran were referenced from Judaism.

description.zh-cn: 为了与金朝议和，宋高宗重用了主和派的秦桧。
description.en: In order to negotiate peace with the Jin dynasty, Emperor Gaozong heavily relied on the pro-peace faction leader Qin Hui.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗以“倦勤”为由，禅让皇位给养子赵昚（宋孝宗）。
description.en: Citing 'weariness of duties', Emperor Gaozong abdicated the throne to his adopted son Zhao Shen (Emperor Xiaozong).

description.zh-cn: 清高宗乾隆帝曾作诗对宋高宗进行批判，认为他偏安一隅、屈膝求和，不配称为“中兴之主”，对其评价极低。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor of the Qing dynasty wrote poetry criticizing Emperor Gaozong, deeming him unworthy of the title 'Restoration Monarch' due to his policy of appeasement and ruling over a partial territory, holding him in very low regard.

description.zh-cn: 老挝依法将湄公河惨案主犯糯康移交中国受审。
description.en: Laos extradited Naw Kham, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre, to China for trial in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，根据“西安事变”中应允的“释放全部政治犯”的协议，陈独秀于1937年8月23日获释出狱。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Chen Duxiu was released from prison on August 23, 1937, in accordance with the agreement made during the 'Xi'an Incident' to 'release all political prisoners'.

description.zh-cn: 在1888年的隆吐山战役中，清朝政府与大英帝国（英属印度）处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Battle of Lung-t'u-shan in 1888, the Qing government and the British Empire (British India) were in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 孔子是儒家学派的创始人。
description.en: Confucius is the founder of the Confucian school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期，鲁国被楚国灭亡。
description.en: At the end of the Warring States period, the State of Lu was conquered by the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时，汉高祖刘邦以祭天的仪式来祭孔子，提升了孔子的地位。
description.en: During the Western Han dynasty, Emperor Gaozu of Han honored Confucius with a ceremony typically reserved for worshipping Heaven, elevating Confucius's status.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与上海交通大学合作，开设海外EMBA课程并共同成立了上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院。
description.en: The University of Southern California partnered with Shanghai Jiao Tong University to offer an overseas EMBA program and jointly establish the USC-SJTU Institute of Cultural and Creative Industry.

description.zh-cn: 前日本首相安倍晋三是南加州大学的校友。
description.en: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is an alumnus of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 纪录片聚焦并深入探讨了中国的空气污染现状、成因及治理困境，引发了全国性的社会反响和政策讨论。
description.en: The documentary focused on and delved into the state, causes, and governance challenges of air pollution in China, triggering a nationwide social response and policy debate.

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》在视频中点名批评了中石油，影片发布后的第一个交易日，其股价下跌。
description.en: 'Under the Dome' criticized CNPC by name in the video. On the first trading day after the film's release, its stock price fell.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲在秦国朝堂上图穷匕见，行刺秦王政，但未能成功。
description.en: In the Qin court, Jing Ke attempted to assassinate King Zheng of Qin when the dagger was revealed from the map scroll, but he failed.

description.zh-cn: 在刺杀失败后，秦王政反击并当场杀死了荆轲。
description.en: After the assassination attempt failed, King Zheng of Qin fought back and killed Jing Ke on the spot.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝的司马光在《资治通鉴》中批评荆轲刺秦是“愚”和“不可谓之义”的行为。
description.en: Sima Guang of the Song dynasty criticized Jing Ke's assassination attempt in his 'Zizhi Tongjian' as 'foolish' and 'not righteous'.

description.zh-cn: 王翦是秦王政手下攻打赵国等地的主要将领之一。
description.en: Wang Jian was one of the main generals under King Zheng of Qin responsible for attacking states like Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 1927年7月，经李世安介绍、周恩来同意，叶剑英秘密加入中国共产党。
description.en: In July 1927, introduced by Li Shi'an and with the approval of Zhou Enlai, Ye Jianying secretly joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 林彪“九一三事件”后，叶剑英重新以军委副主席身份主持军委日常工作，回归权力核心。
description.en: After the 'September 13 Incident' involving Lin Biao, Ye Jianying returned to the core of power, resuming his role as Vice Chairman of the Military Commission and presiding over its daily work.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英担任第五届全国人大常委会委员长，在废除国家主席时期相当于国家元首。
description.en: Ye Jianying served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 5th National People's Congress, equivalent to the head of state during the period when the state presidency was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英于1975年1月至1978年3月担任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: Ye Jianying served as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China from January 1975 to March 1978.

description.zh-cn: 叶选平是叶剑英的长子。
description.en: Ye Xuanping is the eldest son of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 叶选宁是叶剑英的次子。
description.en: Ye Xuanning is the second son of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 2004年6月29日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪被交易至休斯敦火箭队，效力至2010年2月19日。
description.en: On June 29, 2004, Tracy McGrady was traded to the Houston Rockets, where he played until February 19, 2010.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐于2016年至2024年间担任第九、十届中华民国立法委员。
description.en: Freddy Lim served as a member of the 9th and 10th Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China from 2016 to 2024.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰于1984年2月加入中国共产党，2000年4月20日被开除党籍。
description.en: Cheng Kejie joined the Communist Party of China in February 1984 and was expelled on April 20, 2000.

description.zh-cn: 因收受巨额贿赂、非法谋利，成克杰被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: Cheng Kejie was expelled from the Communist Party of China for accepting huge bribes and illegal profiteering.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰担任全国人大常委会副委员长期间，李鹏是委员长。
description.en: While Cheng Kejie served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Li Peng was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰自1998年当选全国人大常委会副委员长起，成为党和国家领导人，直至2000年被撤职。
description.en: Cheng Kejie became a Party and state leader after being elected Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress in March 1998, a position he held until his removal in April 2000.

description.zh-cn: 根据线索对成克杰的腐败问题进行调查。
description.en: Investigated Cheng Kejie for corruption based on leads.

description.zh-cn: 撤销成克杰的全国人大常委会副委员长职务。
description.en: Revoked Cheng Kejie's position as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 决定依法逮捕成克杰。
description.en: Decided to arrest Cheng Kejie in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 裁定核准成克杰死刑，并于9月14日执行。
description.en: Approved the death sentence for Cheng Kejie, which was carried out on September 14.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣于1970年1月加入中国共产党，2015年2月16日被开除党籍。
description.en: Su Rong joined the Communist Party of China in January 1970 and was expelled from the party on February 16, 2015.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣担任中共中央党校常务副校长期间，时任校长是曾庆红。
description.en: When Su Rong served as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CCP, the president was Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 宣布对苏荣因涉嫌严重违纪违法问题进行组织调查，并于2015年2月16日决定给予其开除党籍、开除公职处分。
description.en: Announced an organizational investigation into Su Rong for suspected serious violations of discipline and law, and on February 16, 2015, decided to expel him from the party and public office.

description.zh-cn: 依法决定对苏荣以涉嫌受贿罪立案侦查并采取强制措施。
description.en: Decided to file a case for investigation and take coercive measures against Su Rong on suspicion of bribery in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 苏联解体后，克里米亚成为乌克兰的一个自治共和国。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Soviet Union, Crimea became an autonomous republic within Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 在1854年至1856年的克里米亚战争中，俄罗斯帝国与奥斯曼帝国（及其盟友）是敌对关系。
description.en: In the Crimean War from 1854 to 1856, the Russian Empire was an enemy of the Ottoman Empire (and its allies).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导中华人民共和国，意图将台湾纳入统治范围，以完成其政治目标。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party leads the People's Republic of China with the intention of bringing Taiwan under its rule to achieve its political goals.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国意图将台湾纳入其统治范围，以完成其解决台湾问题和统一中国的政治目标。
description.en: The People's Republic of China intends to bring Taiwan under its rule to complete its political objectives of resolving the Taiwan issue and unifying China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军是执行武力解放台湾任务的军事力量。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army is the military force tasked with carrying out the armed liberation of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争爆发，导致解放军原定的登陆台湾行动被搁置。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War in 1950 caused the PLA's planned landing operation in Taiwan to be postponed.

description.zh-cn: 1979年1月，中华人民共和国国防部宣布金门炮战正式结束。
description.en: In January 1979, the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China announced the official end of the Kinmen Artillery Battle.

description.zh-cn: 1979年1月，邓小平在美国访问时表示不再使用“解放台湾”这个提法，体现了对台政策的转变。
description.en: In January 1979, during his visit to the United States, Deng Xiaoping stated that the term 'liberate Taiwan' would no longer be used, reflecting a shift in policy towards Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 2023年4月，习近平与欧洲联盟执行委员会主席范德赖恩会面。
description.en: In April 2023, Xi Jinping met with European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在会议上坚决反对张国焘停止起义的主张，通过激烈争论迫使张国焘服从多数，确保了起义按计划进行。
description.en: Zhou Enlai resolutely opposed Zhang Guotao's proposal to halt the uprising in a meeting, forcing Zhang to submit to the majority through heated debate and ensuring the uprising proceeded as planned.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦于1933年成为中国共产党正式党员，直至去世。
description.en: Hu Yaobang became a full member of the Chinese Communist Party in 1933 and remained a member until his death.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦是邓小平的亲密盟友和门生，两人的关系始于1930年代。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was a close ally and protégé of Deng Xiaoping, with their relationship dating back to the 1930s.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平策划了胡耀邦的权力崛起，使其成为中国共产党的最高领导人之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping engineered Hu Yaobang's rise to power, positioning him as one of the top leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在文化大革命期间清洗了胡耀邦。
description.en: Mao Zedong purged Hu Yaobang during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦的政治和经济改革使他成为多位反对自由市场和政府改革的党内元老的敌人。
description.en: Hu Yaobang's political and economic reforms made him the enemy of several powerful Party elders who opposed free-market and government reforms.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2005年宣布为胡耀邦平反，并举办了纪念活动，正式恢复了其声誉。
description.en: In 2005, Hu Jintao announced plans to rehabilitate Hu Yaobang, organizing commemorative events and officially restoring his image.

description.zh-cn: 昌平君是秦昭襄王的外孙。
description.en: Lord Changping was the maternal grandson of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 因白起不肯领命出征，加上范雎的进言，秦昭襄王派使者赐剑命白起自刎。
description.en: Due to Bai Qi's refusal to lead a campaign and influenced by Fan Ju's words, King Zhaoxiang sent an envoy with a sword, ordering Bai Qi to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王数十年的统治，通过治军备战和富国强兵，为其曾孙秦始皇最终统一天下奠定了基础。
description.en: King Zhaoxiang's decades-long reign, through military preparation and strengthening the state, laid the foundation for his great-grandson Qin Shi Huang to eventually unify China.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝朱允炆是懿文太子朱标的次子。
description.en: The Jianwen Emperor, Zhu Yunwen, was the second son of Crown Prince Yiwen, Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 朱标是明太祖朱元璋的长子。
description.en: Zhu Biao was the eldest son of the Hongwu Emperor, Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 荀子是儒家的代表人物之一。
description.en: Xunzi is one of the representative figures of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇读到《韩非子》中的《孤愤》、《五蠹》等篇章后，表示了高度的赞赏和重视。
description.en: After reading chapters such as 'Gufen' and 'Wudu' in 'Han Feizi', Qin Shi Huang expressed great admiration and attached high importance to them.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》在《显学》、《奸劫弑臣》等篇章中对儒家思想进行了批判。
description.en: 'Han Feizi' criticizes Confucian thought in chapters such as 'Xian Xue' and 'Jian Jie Shi Chen'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾向秦王上书《存韩》，希望说服秦王保存韩国。
description.en: Han Fei submitted 'Cun Han' (On Preserving Han) to the King of Qin, hoping to persuade him to spare the state of Han.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子·难二》篇否定了孔子对周文王所作的“仁”和“智”的评价。
description.en: The 'Nan Er' chapter of 'Han Feizi' refutes Confucius's evaluation of King Wen of Zhou as being 'benevolent' and 'wise'.

description.zh-cn: 查良镛因对六四事件感到伤心而退出政坛。
description.en: Louis Cha withdrew from politics due to his distress over the Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧是中国农工民主党（及其前身）的创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was one of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party (and its predecessors).

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于2002年11月在中共十六届一中全会上当选为中央政治局委员，直至2006年9月因社保案被停止职务。
description.en: Chen Liangyu was elected as a member of the Politburo at the First Plenary Session of the 16th CPC Central Committee in November 2002, and held the position until he was suspended in September 2006 due to the social security fund case.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇自2002年11月当选中共中央政治局委员后，成为国家级副职领导人，直至2006年9月被停止职务。
description.en: After being elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee in November 2002, Chen Liangyu became a state-level vice leader until he was suspended from his duties in September 2006.

description.zh-cn: 根据张炎夏教授的说法，令计划曾参与策划并操盘整倒陈良宇。
description.en: According to Professor Zhang Yanxia, Ling Jihua participated in planning and orchestrating the downfall of Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 有说法称，薄熙来曾与令计划联手扳倒陈良宇。
description.en: It is alleged that Bo Xilai collaborated with Ling Jihua to bring down Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 1992年初，因陈良宇无意中冲撞了邓小平在上海下榻处的警卫，时任中共上海市委书记吴邦国在电话中训斥了陈良宇。
description.en: In early 1992, after Chen Liangyu inadvertently clashed with the security detail at Deng Xiaoping's residence in Shanghai, then-Shanghai Party Secretary Wu Bangguo reprimanded Chen over the phone.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇被免职后，韩正代理其上海市委书记职务。此前，韩正接替陈良宇出任上海市市长。
description.en: After Chen Liangyu was dismissed, Han Zheng served as acting Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee. Previously, Han had succeeded Chen as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇被免职后，习近平在韩正短暂代理之后，正式接任了上海市委书记职务。
description.en: After Chen Liangyu was dismissed and following Han Zheng's brief acting tenure, Xi Jinping formally took over the position of Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在程骏年发布的录音中，王家卫批评中国共产党处理武汉疫情的方式，并称其为“贪婪的一党制国家”。
description.en: In a recording released by Cheng Junnian, Wong Kar-wai criticized the Communist Party of China's handling of the Wuhan epidemic and referred to it as a 'greedy one-party state'.

description.zh-cn: 在程骏年发布的录音中，王家卫对中国共产党在武汉疫情期间采取的严厉防疫措施表示了批评。
description.en: In a recording released by Cheng Junnian, Wong Kar-wai expressed criticism of the strict anti-epidemic measures taken by the Communist Party of China during the Wuhan epidemic.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝主持召开国务院常务会议，原则批准大型飞机研制重大科技专项正式立项，同意组建大型客机股份公司，从而推动了中国商飞的成立。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao chaired an executive meeting of the State Council, which approved in principle the formal establishment of a major science and technology project for the development of large aircraft and agreed to form a large passenger aircraft joint-stock company, thus promoting the establishment of COMAC.

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国国务院出资60亿元人民币，占股31.58%，参与创立中国商用飞机有限责任公司。
description.en: Representing the State Council of the People's Republic of China, invested 6 billion RMB, accounting for a 31.58% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.zh-cn: 以资产和现金出资50亿元人民币，占股26.32%，参与创立中国商用飞机有限责任公司。
description.en: Invested 5 billion RMB in assets and cash, accounting for a 26.32% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.zh-cn: 以现金出资10亿元人民币，占股5.26%，参与创立中国商用飞机有限责任公司。
description.en: Invested 1 billion RMB in cash, accounting for a 5.26% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府将中国商飞列为中国人民解放军“拥有或控制”的公司，从而禁止任何美国公司或个人对其进行投资。
description.en: The U.S. government listed COMAC as a company "owned or controlled" by the People's Liberation Army, thereby prohibiting any U.S. company or individual from investing in it.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来曾将当时中国的三十个省级行政区名称编成一首七言诗，以便于民众记忆和了解国家的行政区划。
description.en: Zhou Enlai once compiled the names of China's thirty provincial-level administrative divisions at the time into a seven-character poem to help people memorize and understand the country's administrative divisions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与菲律宾在南海诸岛存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and the Philippines have territorial sovereignty disputes over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与马来西亚在南海诸岛存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Malaysia have territorial sovereignty disputes over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与印度在西藏自治区南部存在领土主权争议（中印边界问题）。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and India have a territorial sovereignty dispute in the southern part of the Tibet Autonomous Region (Sino-Indian border dispute).

description.zh-cn: 韩正接替王岐山出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Han Zheng succeeded Wang Qishan as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 丁薛祥接替韩正出任排名第一的国务院副总理。
description.en: Ding Xuexiang succeeded Han Zheng as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 韩正接替俞正声出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Han Zheng succeeded Yu Zhengsheng as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替韩正出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Han Zheng as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 韩正在上海大中华橡胶厂任职期间，时任上海市长朱镕基曾前往考查，并对韩正的工作予以了肯定。
description.en: While Han Zheng was working at the Shanghai Dazhonghua Rubber Factory, then-Mayor of Shanghai Zhu Rongji inspected the factory and affirmed Han Zheng's work.

description.zh-cn: 韩正作为习近平的特别代表出席了英国国王查尔斯三世和卡米拉王后加冕仪式。
description.en: Han Zheng attended the coronation of King Charles III and Queen Camilla as a special representative of Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 中共上海市委代理书记
position.en: Acting Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee

description.zh-cn: 韩正代理上海市委书记期间，胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Han Zheng was the acting Party Secretary of Shanghai, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 佛教宣称众生平等，是为了反对不平等的种姓制度而创立的宗教。
description.en: Buddhism, which proclaims the equality of all living beings, was founded as a religion to oppose the unequal caste system.

description.zh-cn: 台湾《中央日报》的报道称，四五天安门事件加剧了毛泽东的病情，是他的“催命符”。
description.en: According to Taiwan's Central Daily News, the Tiananmen Incident aggravated Mao Zedong's illness and was his 'death warrant'.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在唁电中称毛泽东是“朝鲜人民最亲密的战友”。
description.en: In his condolence message, Kim Il Sung referred to Mao Zedong as 'the closest comrade-in-arms of the Korean people'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东领导中国在朝鲜战争期间发起抗美援朝运动，以鲜血援助了朝鲜。
description.en: Mao Zedong led China to launch the 'Resist America, Aid Korea' campaign during the Korean War, providing crucial support to North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年流亡印度后，建立了藏人行政中央。
description.en: After going into exile in India in 1959, he established the Central Tibetan Administration.

description.zh-cn: 作为最高领导者，直至2011年3月14日致信西藏流亡议会，要求卸下一切政治权力。
description.en: Served as the supreme leader until March 14, 2011, when he wrote to the Tibetan Parliament in Exile requesting to relinquish all political power.

description.zh-cn: 为藏人行政中央提供了总部所在地达兰萨拉，并给予其一些协助。
description.en: Provided Dharamshala as the headquarters for the Central Tibetan Administration and offered some assistance.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗朱祐樘是明宪宗朱见深的第三子。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang was the third son of the Chenghua Emperor Zhu Jianshen.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗朱厚照是明孝宗的长子和继任者。
description.en: The Zhengde Emperor Zhu Houzhao was the eldest son and successor of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 根据记载，万贵妃在明孝宗幼年时曾试图加害于他，导致其需被藏匿抚养。
description.en: According to records, Consort Wan attempted to harm the Hongzhi Emperor during his childhood, forcing him to be raised in hiding.

description.zh-cn: 王莽废黜孺子婴并篡位称帝，终结了西汉211年的统治。
description.en: Wang Mang deposed Ruzi Ying and usurped the throne, ending the 211-year rule of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 王莽将“匈奴单于”的称号贬为“降奴服于”，并试图分裂匈奴，这些外交失策导致匈奴与新朝关系破裂并发动叛乱。
description.en: Wang Mang demoted the title of the Xiongnu Chanyu to 'Xiangnu Fuyu' (Surrendered Slave) and attempted to divide the Xiongnu, these diplomatic blunders led to a breakdown in relations and a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 因王莽的挑衅政策，匈奴与新朝爆发了连年战争，导致边境地区民生凋敝。
description.en: Due to Wang Mang's provocative policies, the Xiongnu and the Xin dynasty engaged in years of warfare, devastating the border regions.

description.zh-cn: 王莽将高句丽国王贬为侯，并改其国名为“下句丽”，引起高句丽不满并最终反叛。
description.en: Wang Mang demoted the king of Goguryeo to a marquis and renamed the country 'Xiagouli' (Lower Goguryeo), causing resentment and eventual rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 王莽强令高句丽出兵讨伐匈奴，导致其反叛，并屡次侵扰新朝东北边境。
description.en: Wang Mang's forcible conscription of Goguryeo troops to attack the Xiongnu led to its rebellion, and it repeatedly raided the northeastern border of the Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席向全国人民代表大会负责，由其选举产生。
description.en: The Vice President of the People's Republic of China is responsible to and elected by the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法首次设立了中华人民共和国副主席的职位。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution first established the post of Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2018年宪法修正案废除了中华人民共和国副主席的连任限制。
description.en: The 2018 constitutional amendment removed the term limits for the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件后，董必武被宣布为唯一的代理主席。
description.en: After the September 13 Incident, Dong Biwu was announced as the sole acting president.

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议选举韩正为中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: The first session of the 14th National People's Congress elected Han Zheng as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁是中国民主建国会成员。
description.en: Rong Yiren was a member of the China National Democratic Construction Association.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚于2024年成为金砖国家正式成员。
description.en: Ethiopia became a full member of BRICS in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛是习近平的第二任妻子。
description.en: Peng Liyuan is the second wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 齐心是习明泽的祖母。
description.en: Qi Xin is the paternal grandmother of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 汶川大地震发生后，时年16岁的习明泽以志愿者的身份前往四川绵竹市的汉旺东汽小学，参与了7天的抢救伤者、心理辅导工作。
description.en: After the Wenchuan earthquake, 16-year-old Xi Mingze went to Hanwang Dongqi Primary School in Mianzhu, Sichuan as a volunteer for 7 days, participating in rescuing the injured and providing psychological counseling.

description.zh-cn: 据称在习明泽于哈佛大学就读期间，美国联邦调查局加派人手对其进行暗中保护。
description.en: It is alleged that during Xi Mingze's studies at Harvard University, the Federal Bureau of Investigation assigned additional personnel to provide her with covert protection.

description.zh-cn: 自2019年起担任乌克兰总统，领导乌克兰应对顿巴斯战争的后期阶段及2022年的全面入侵。
description.en: Serving as President of Ukraine since 2019, leading the country through the later stages of the War in Donbas and the 2022 full-scale invasion.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀建立东汉后，将首都定于洛阳。
description.en: After establishing the Eastern Han dynasty, Liu Xiu made Luoyang the capital.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀是汉高祖刘邦的九世孙。
description.en: Liu Xiu was the ninth-generation descendant of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 当所有总统候选人均未能获得过半数选举人票时，由美国众议院选出总统。
description.en: When no presidential candidate wins a majority of electoral votes, the U.S. House of Representatives elects the president.

description.zh-cn: 总统可以行使否决权，否决任何获国会通过的法案。
description.en: The president can exercise the power of veto to reject any bill passed by Congress.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松是唯一在任内辞职的美国总统。
description.en: Richard Nixon is the only U.S. president to resign from office.

description.zh-cn: 杰拉尔德·福特是美国历史上唯一没有经过选举而产生的总统。
description.en: Gerald Ford is the only person to have served as U.S. president without being elected.

description.zh-cn: 在九一一袭击事件后，时任总统乔治·沃克·布什的支持率一度高达90%。
description.en: Following the September 11 attacks, the approval rating of then-President George W. Bush surged to a high of 90%.

description.zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福与西奥多·罗斯福是堂兄弟关系，二人都曾担任美国总统。
description.en: Franklin D. Roosevelt and Theodore Roosevelt were fifth cousins who both served as President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 比尔·克林顿是美国历史上被众议院弹劾的三位总统之一。
description.en: Bill Clinton is one of the three presidents in U.S. history to have been impeached by the House of Representatives.

description.zh-cn: 警卫局被列为中央军事委员会联合参谋部的内设机构之一。
description.en: The Guard Bureau is listed as one of the internal departments of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 作为OpenAI的大股东，微软就DeepSeek被指控使用知识蒸馏技术复制OpenAI模型一事展开调查。
description.en: As a major shareholder of OpenAI, Microsoft launched an investigation into allegations that DeepSeek used knowledge distillation to replicate OpenAI's models.

description.zh-cn: 自2025年2月起，韩国多个政府部门、学校及应用商店以数据安全为由，相继屏蔽或下架DeepSeek。
description.en: Starting from February 2025, several South Korean government departments, schools, and app stores successively blocked or removed DeepSeek, citing data security concerns.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办主任期间兼任中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: Concurrently served as a secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat while serving as Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办常务副主任期间兼任国家安全部部长。
description.en: Concurrently served as Minister of State Security while serving as Executive Deputy Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在浙江大学物理系学习，后因日军进入贵州而中断学业。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Physics at Zhejiang University, but his studies were interrupted due to the Japanese invasion of Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 转学至西南联合大学成为二年级生，后因抗战结束学校停办而未毕业。
description.en: Transferred to National Southwestern Associated University as a sophomore, but did not graduate as the university was dissolved after the war.

description.zh-cn: 在西南联合大学期间，李政道师从吴大猷。
description.en: During his time at National Southwestern Associated University, Tsung-Dao Lee studied under Ta-You Wu.

description.zh-cn: 李政道访问中国大陆时受到时任国务院总理周恩来的接见。
description.en: During his visit to mainland China, Tsung-Dao Lee was received by then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 李政道再次访问中国大陆时受到时任中共中央主席毛泽东的接见。
description.en: During another visit to mainland China, Tsung-Dao Lee was received by then-CPC Chairman Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 马云出生于浙江省杭州市。
description.en: Jack Ma was born in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 马云是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jack Ma is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，马云辞去公职，创办了阿里巴巴网站。
description.en: In 1999, Jack Ma resigned from his public post and founded the Alibaba website.

description.zh-cn: 马云曾长期担任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席，直至2019年9月10日卸任。
description.en: Jack Ma served as the Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group for a long period until he stepped down on September 10, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 2018年6月，马云访问马来西亚并与时任首相马哈迪会面。
description.en: In June 2018, Jack Ma visited Malaysia and met with then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad.

description.zh-cn: 据《经济学人》报道，时任国务院总理李强说服马云于2023年3月回国。
description.en: According to The Economist, then-Premier Li Qiang persuaded Jack Ma to return to China in March 2023.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，马云在未获董事会通过的情况下，决定终止支付宝与阿里巴巴集团之间的协议控制关系，对集团投资者造成冲击。
description.en: In 2011, without board approval, Jack Ma decided to terminate the VIE control agreement between Alipay and Alibaba Group, which impacted the group's investors.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国参与了对波兰立陶宛联邦的瓜分，吞并了其大部分领土。
description.en: The Russian Empire participated in the partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth, annexing most of its territory.

description.zh-cn: 冰岛是第一个承认立陶宛于1990年恢复独立的国家，为立陶宛的独立提供了国际支持。
description.en: Iceland was the first country to recognize Lithuania's restored independence in 1990, providing international support for its independence.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛于2004年5月1日正式成为欧洲联盟的成员国。
description.en: Lithuania officially became a member state of the European Union on May 1, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛于2004年3月29日正式加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Lithuania officially joined the North Atlantic Treaty Organization on March 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 自2021年起，由于立陶宛采取“亲台疏中”政策，包括允许设立驻立陶宛台湾代表处和认定新疆存在种族灭绝，两国关系急剧恶化。
description.en: Since 2021, due to Lithuania's 'pro-Taiwan, distant-from-China' policy, including allowing the establishment of the Taiwanese Representative Office and recognizing the genocide in Xinjiang, relations between the two countries have deteriorated sharply.

description.zh-cn: 维希法国的成立标志着法兰西第三共和国的正式终结，菲利普·贝当被授予全部权力。
description.en: The establishment of Vichy France marked the official end of the Third Republic, with full powers granted to Philippe Pétain.
