description.zh-cn: 为了孤立德国，法国于1894年与俄罗斯帝国缔结了法俄同盟，这一军事联盟成为法国外交政策的基石。
description.en: To isolate Germany, France entered into the Franco-Russian Alliance with the Russian Empire in 1894, a military alliance that became a cornerstone of French foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 1904年，法国与英国签署了《英法协约》，结束了两国长期的紧张关系，建立了一种非正式的联盟以对抗德国。
description.en: In 1904, France signed the Entente Cordiale with Great Britain, ending a long period of tension and establishing an informal alliance against Germany.

description.zh-cn: 瑾妃是光绪帝的妃嫔。
description.en: Consort Jin was a consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在同治帝去世后，与慈安太后共同决定选择载湉（光绪帝）继位。
description.en: After the death of the Tongzhi Emperor, she and Empress Dowager Ci'an jointly decided to choose Zaitian (the Guangxu Emperor) to succeed the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在同治帝去世后，与慈禧太后共同决定选择载湉（光绪帝）继位。
description.en: After the death of the Tongzhi Emperor, she and Empress Dowager Cixi jointly decided to choose Zaitian (the Guangxu Emperor) to succeed the throne.

description.zh-cn: 戊戌政变后，光绪帝被剥夺实权，并被软禁于中南海瀛台直至去世。
description.en: After the 1898 Coup, the Guangxu Emperor was stripped of real power and placed under house arrest at Yingtai in Zhongnanhai until his death.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法期间，光绪帝起用康有为推行新政。
description.en: During the Hundred Days' Reform, the Guangxu Emperor appointed Kang Youwei to implement new policies.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法期间，光绪帝起用梁启超等维新派人士推行新政。
description.en: During the Hundred Days' Reform, the Guangxu Emperor appointed reformists like Liang Qichao to implement new policies.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法关键时刻，袁世凯向荣禄告密，导致慈禧太后发动政变，光绪帝的变法计划失败。
description.en: At a critical moment during the Hundred Days' Reform, Yuan Shikai informed on the reformers to Ronglu, leading Empress Dowager Cixi to launch a coup and causing the failure of the Guangxu Emperor's reform plans.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨与中国关系密切，奉行亲中外交政策，中国是其最大援助国。
description.en: Cambodia maintains close relations with China, pursues a pro-China foreign policy, and China is its largest aid provider.

description.zh-cn: 洪森奉行亲中的外交政策。
description.en: Hun Sen pursues a pro-China foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 因柏威夏寺主权争议等问题，柬埔寨与泰国的关系紧张，并曾多次爆发小规模战事。
description.en: Due to issues such as the sovereignty dispute over the Preah Vihear Temple, relations between Cambodia and Thailand are tense, and small-scale military conflicts have broken out multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是金正日的小儿子，并在其父去世后成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Jong-un is the youngest son of Kim Jong-il and became the supreme leader of North Korea after his father's death.

degree.zh-cn: 历史学哲学硕士、哲学博士

description.zh-cn: 2005年起在剑桥大学深造，先后取得历史学硕士及博士学位。
description.en: Pursued advanced studies at the University of Cambridge from 2005, obtaining both an MPhil and a PhD in History.

description.zh-cn: 金庸在《新晚报》工作期间与同事梁羽生相识为友。
description.en: Jin Yong befriended his colleague Liang Yusheng while working at the New Evening Post.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，金庸在北京与时任中华人民共和国领导人邓小平会谈，成为首位获邓小平单独接见的香港人。
description.en: In 1981, Jin Yong met with then-PRC leader Deng Xiaoping in Beijing, becoming the first person from Hong Kong to be granted a private audience by Deng.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，金庸访问中国大陆时与时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦会谈。
description.en: In 1984, during his visit to mainland China, Jin Yong met with then-CPC General Secretary Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 1993年两会期间，金庸赴北京访问并获时任中共中央总书记江泽民接见。
description.en: During the Two Sessions in 1993, Jin Yong visited Beijing and was received by then-CPC General Secretary Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 1990年2月13日，江泽民为第二炮兵部队题词：“加强战略导弹部队建设，保卫祖国安全，维护世界和平。”
description.en: On February 13, 1990, Jiang Zemin wrote an inscription for the Second Artillery Corps: 'Strengthen the construction of the strategic missile force, defend the security of the motherland, and maintain world peace.'

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛评价第二炮兵部队是“党中央、中央军委直接使用的战略部队，是我国战略威慑的核心力量”。
description.en: Hu Jintao described the Second Artillery Corps as 'a strategic force directly used by the Party Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and the core force of our country's strategic deterrence'.

description.zh-cn: 因原司令员李玉超在腐败案中落马，王厚斌被任命为新任火箭军司令员。
description.en: Following the downfall of former commander Li Yuchao in the corruption case, Wang Houbin was appointed as the new commander of the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年担任五四运动中学生游行队伍的总指挥。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien served as the general commander of the student parade during the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 发表《这个样子的宋子文非走开不可》等文章，痛批时任行政院长宋子文发国难财，将其逼下台。
description.en: He published articles such as 'This kind of T.V. Soong must go', criticizing then-Premier T. V. Soong for war profiteering and forcing him to resign.

description.zh-cn: 访问延安期间，傅斯年与毛泽东进行了一次单独的长谈。
description.en: During his visit to Yan'an, Fu Ssu-nien had a long, private conversation with Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在延安与毛泽东长谈后，傅斯年认为毛的作风纯粹是专制愚民，是“宋江”之流，这坚定了他反共的立场。
description.en: After a long conversation with Mao Zedong in Yan'an, Fu Ssu-nien concluded that Mao's style was purely autocratic and aimed at keeping the people ignorant, likening him to 'Song Jiang'. This solidified his anti-communist stance.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年是民国时期著名的反共学者，认为中共是“祖传的流寇”，其作风反自由、反民主，并发表多篇文章阐述反共立场。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien was a well-known anti-communist scholar during the Republican era. He considered the CCP to be 'hereditary roving bandits' with an anti-liberal and anti-democratic style, and he published numerous articles explaining his anti-communist position.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年同样反对苏联，认为苏联既没有自由也没有平等，是集人类文明罪恶之大成的国家，主张反共必反苏。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien also opposed the Soviet Union, believing it lacked both freedom and equality and was the epitome of the evils of human civilization. He advocated that anti-communism must also be anti-Soviet.

description.zh-cn: 受蔡元培推荐，傅斯年于1920年出洋留学。
description.en: On the recommendation of Cai Yuanpei, Fu Ssu-nien went abroad to study in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期，傅雷遭受红卫兵的残酷迫害和凌辱，最终导致他与妻子一同自杀。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Fu Lei was subjected to brutal persecution and humiliation by the Red Guards, which ultimately led him and his wife to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵对傅雷进行了连续四天三夜的抄家和批斗，包括罚跪、戴高帽等凌辱，并搜出所谓“反党罪证”，是导致其自杀的直接原因。
description.en: The Red Guards ransacked Fu Lei's home and subjected him to struggle sessions for four days and three nights, including humiliations like forced kneeling and wearing a dunce cap. They found so-called 'anti-Party evidence,' which were the direct cause of his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海最高领导的柯庆施推翻了下级“可划可不划”的意见，拍板将傅雷定为“右派”。
description.en: Ke Qingshi, then the top leader in Shanghai, overruled his subordinates' opinion that Fu Lei was a borderline case and made the final decision to label him a 'Rightist'.

description.zh-cn: 取得内战胜利后，布尔什维克领导的苏维埃俄国与其他苏维埃共和国联合建立了苏联。
description.en: After winning the civil war, the Bolshevik-led Soviet Russia, along with other Soviet republics, established the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1972年，森森曾得到李小龙的截拳道指点，构成了一种非正式的师徒关系。
description.en: In 1972, Sum Sum received instruction in Jeet Kune Do from Bruce Lee, forming an informal student-teacher relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1949年加入中国共产党，后被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1949 and was later expelled.

description.zh-cn: 在反右运动中解救了被批判的戚本禹，并对其后来发表的史学文章大加赞赏，称其为“要接班”的“坚定的人”。
description.en: Rescued the criticized Qi Benyu during the Anti-Rightist Campaign and highly praised his later historical articles, calling him a 'steadfast person' who should 'take over'.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹是《五一六通知》的起草人之一。
description.en: Qi Benyu was one of the drafters of the 'May 16 Notification'.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹发表文章《爱国主义还是卖国主义？——评历史影片〈清宫秘史〉》，开启了对时任国家主席刘少奇的公开不点名批判。
description.en: Qi Benyu published 'Patriotism or National Betrayal? — A Critique of the Historical Film The Secret History of the Qing Court', which initiated public, unnamed criticism of then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 七·二〇事件后，周恩来向毛泽东进言解决王力、关锋、戚本禹的问题，最终导致戚本禹于1968年1月被隔离审查。
description.en: After the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai advised Mao Zedong to address the issue of Wang Li, Guan Feng, and Qi Benyu, which ultimately led to Qi Benyu being placed in isolation for investigation in January 1968.

description.zh-cn: 2014年，戚本禹在接受采访时表达了对中共中央总书记习近平的支持。
description.en: In 2014, Qi Benyu expressed his support for CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping in an interview.

description.zh-cn: 中共第十九届中央纪委书记。
description.en: Secretary of the 19th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 丁汝昌在威海卫之战兵败后自尽。
description.en: Ding Ruchang committed suicide after the defeat in the Battle of Weihaiwei.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变中俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: Captured Emperor Yingzong in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 自1948年苏南交恶开始，斯大林领导下的苏共强烈批判铁托领导下的南斯拉夫为“现代修正主义”。
description.en: Beginning with the Soviet-Yugoslav split in 1948, the CPSU under Stalin's leadership strongly criticized Tito's Yugoslavia as 'modern revisionism'.

description.zh-cn: 龚正接替应勇出任中共上海市委副书记，后任上海市市长。
description.en: Gong Zheng succeeded Ying Yong as Deputy Party Secretary of Shanghai and later as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 龚正卸任山东省省长后，由李干杰接任。
description.en: After Gong Zheng stepped down as Governor of Shandong, Li Ganjie took over the position.

description.zh-cn: 龚正接替黄坤明出任杭州市委书记。
description.en: Gong Zheng succeeded Huang Kunming as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 在职攻读财政学专业博士学位。
description.en: Pursued a doctorate in Finance as an on-the-job student.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗朱厚熜是明朝的第十二位皇帝。
description.en: The Jiajing Emperor Zhu Houcong was the 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗于开元十四年十月十三日（726年11月11日）生于东都洛阳上阳宫。
description.en: Emperor Daizong was born on November 11, 726, at Shangyang Palace in the eastern capital, Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃侵扰唐朝，并于广德元年（763年）占领首都长安十五日。
description.en: The Tibetan Empire harassed the Tang Dynasty and occupied its capital, Chang'an, for fifteen days in 763.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗笃信佛教，曾下令在五台山建造金阁寺，耗资巨大。
description.en: Emperor Daizong was a devout Buddhist and ordered the construction of the Golden Pavilion Temple on Mount Wutai at great expense.

description.zh-cn: 商鞅是法家中“法”派的代表人物。
description.en: Shang Yang is a representative figure of the 'Fa' (law) school within Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 法家是先秦诸子百家中的一个重要流派。
description.en: Legalism is an important school of thought among the pre-Qin Hundred Schools of Thought.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年军委扩大会议上揭发彭德怀身背“血债”。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission in 1959, he accused Peng Dehuai of having a 'blood debt'.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年军委扩大会议上，林彪插话支持对彭德怀的攻击。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission in 1959, Lin Biao interjected to support the attacks on Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 1916年考入国立北京大学预科，1917年升入哲学系，1920年毕业。
description.en: Admitted to the preparatory school of National Peking University in 1916, entered the Department of Philosophy in 1917, and graduated in 1920.

position.zh-cn: 中国文学系教授兼系主任
position.en: Professor and Head of the Department of Chinese Literature

description.zh-cn: 1925年到清华学校任教，后该校改名为国立清华大学。
description.en: Began teaching at Tsinghua School in 1925, which was later renamed National Tsinghua University.

position.en: Head of the Department of Chinese Literature

description.zh-cn: 1938年到昆明，任国立西南联合大学中国文学系主任。
description.en: Went to Kunming in 1938 to serve as the Head of the Department of Chinese Literature at National Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 朱自清在五四运动期间上街游行，并受其影响开始写作新诗。
description.en: During the May Fourth Movement, Zhu Ziqing participated in street demonstrations and was inspired to start writing modern poetry.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩创建和统帅的湘军是平定太平天国运动的主要军事力量。
description.en: The Xiang Army, created and commanded by Zeng Guofan, was the main military force that suppressed the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 自伊拉克战争后，逊尼派国家忧虑什叶派有崛起的迹象，什叶派的地位持续上升。
description.en: Since the Iraq War, Sunni states have been concerned about the rise of Shia influence, and the status of the Shia has continued to rise.

description.zh-cn: 学者瓦利·纳斯尔认为，布什政府解放了伊拉克的什叶派多数，襄助什叶派强势复兴。
description.en: Scholar Vali Nasr argues that the Bush administration liberated the Shia majority in Iraq, aiding a powerful Shia revival.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李鹏的长女。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the eldest daughter of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李小鹏的姐姐。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the elder sister of Li Xiaopeng.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李小勇的姐姐。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the elder sister of Li Xiaoyong.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳曾担任第十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Li Xiaolin served as a member of the 11th and 12th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 唐代大诗人杜甫曾旅居成都，其故居杜甫草堂成为成都重要的文化地标。
description.en: The great Tang Dynasty poet Du Fu once lived in Chengdu, and his former residence, the Du Fu Thatched Cottage, has become an important cultural landmark in the city.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战的巨大开销严重削弱了英国的经济实力，动摇了其维持庞大帝国的财政基础。
description.en: The immense financial cost of World War I severely weakened Britain's economy, undermining the fiscal foundation for maintaining its vast empire.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战导致英国国力严重衰退，加速了大英帝国的瓦解。
description.en: World War II caused a severe decline in British national power, accelerating the dissolution of the British Empire.

description.zh-cn: 伊丽莎白二世是大英帝国存续期间的末代君主，见证了帝国的解体。
description.en: Elizabeth II was the last reigning monarch during the existence of the British Empire and witnessed its dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 元朝对南宋发动了长期的征服战争，最终在1279年的厓山海战后彻底消灭了南宋的抵抗力量，统一了中国。
description.en: The Yuan dynasty launched a long war of conquest against the Southern Song dynasty, ultimately extinguishing its resistance after the Battle of Yamen in 1279 and unifying China.

description.zh-cn: 在美国对古巴实施禁运后，苏联成为古巴的主要经济和军事盟友，并应古巴请求部署了核导弹。
description.en: After the United States imposed an embargo on Cuba, the Soviet Union became its main economic and military ally, deploying nuclear missiles at Cuba's request.

description.zh-cn: 肯尼迪总统于1962年10月22日宣布对古巴实行海军“隔离”（即封锁），以阻止苏联向古巴运送更多进攻性武器。
description.en: President Kennedy announced a naval "quarantine" (blockade) of Cuba on October 22, 1962, to prevent the Soviet Union from delivering more offensive weapons to the island.

description.zh-cn: 胡德华是胡耀邦的三子。
description.en: Hu Dehua is the third son of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 王毅时任中国外交部长。
description.en: Wang Yi was the Chinese Minister of Foreign Affairs at the time.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林将马克思主义和列宁主义系统化，创立了作为苏联官方意识形态的马克思列宁主义。
description.en: Stalin systematized Marxism and Leninism, creating Marxism-Leninism as the official ideology of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗是社会主义古巴的主要缔造者。
description.en: Fidel Castro was a primary founder of socialist Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 在中苏关系恶化时期，菲德尔·卡斯特罗曾公开嘲讽对毛泽东的个人崇拜。
description.en: During the Sino-Soviet split, Fidel Castro publicly mocked the personality cult surrounding Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，王耀武因其历史问题时常被批斗，并于1968年病逝。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, Wang Yaowu was frequently subjected to struggle sessions due to his past, and he passed away from illness in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武被俘后，毛泽东通过罗瑞卿转告他，肯定其抗日功劳并鼓励其改造。
description.en: After Wang Yaowu was captured, Mao Zedong had Luo Ruiqing convey a message to him, affirming his contributions in the Anti-Japanese War and encouraging him to reform.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武在军界长袖善舞，对戴笠更是全力周旋，以维系良好关系。
description.en: Wang Yaowu was skilled at networking in military circles and made great efforts to maintain a good relationship with Dai Li.

description.zh-cn: 经周恩来介绍，王耀武与吴伯伦结婚。
description.en: Through Zhou Enlai's introduction, Wang Yaowu married Wu Bolun.

description.zh-cn: 在得知王耀武被俘后家中并无余财，只有准备退役后回乡耕田用的两台拖拉机时，陈毅感叹唏嘘不已。
description.en: Upon learning that after Wang Yaowu's capture, his home had no surplus wealth except for two tractors intended for farming after retirement, Chen Yi sighed with emotion.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会是联合国的六大主要机构之一。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council is one of the six principal organs of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 李成梁是明朝后期的重要将领。
description.en: Li Chengliang was an important general in the late Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因父亲塔克世在李成梁的战斗中被杀，努尔哈赤视李成梁为不共戴天之仇，此事成为后金叛明“七大恨”之一。
description.en: Due to his father Taksi's death in a battle involving Li Chengliang, Nurhaci considered Li an irreconcilable enemy. This incident became one of the 'Seven Great Grievances' for the Later Jin's rebellion against the Ming.

description.zh-cn: 为进行“蓝白合”总统选举整合进行谈判，但最终破局。
description.en: Met to negotiate a 'Blue-White Coalition' for a joint presidential ticket, but the talks ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 在夺权运动中，中央文革小组支持造反派红卫兵，以打击党内的“走资派”，这些造反派红卫兵在各地乘机膨胀。
description.en: During the Seizure of Power movement, the Central Cultural Revolution Group supported the rebel Red Guards to attack the 'capitalist roaders' within the party, and these factions took the opportunity to expand in various places.

description.zh-cn: 元世祖忽必烈是拖雷的第四子。
description.en: Kublai Khan was the fourth son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是元宪宗蒙哥的弟弟。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the younger brother of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是旭烈兀的弟弟。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the younger brother of Hulagu Khan.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈在内战中击败并俘虏了阿里不哥，阿里不哥于两年后去世，可能被忽必烈毒杀。
description.en: Kublai Khan defeated and captured Ariq Böke in the civil war. Ariq Böke died two years later, possibly poisoned by Kublai.

description.zh-cn: 国务委员的人选，由国务院总理提名。
description.en: Candidates for State Councilor are nominated by the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国务委员的人选，经全国人民代表大会投票决定。
description.en: Candidates for State Councilor are decided by a vote of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 国务委员由国家主席根据全国人大会议的决定任命。
description.en: State Councilors are appointed by the President of the People's Republic of China based on the decision of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福出生于四川省成都市。
description.en: Li Shangfu was born in Chengdu, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 1982年毕业于中国人民解放军国防科技大学。
description.en: Graduated from the National University of Defense Technology in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福接替魏凤和出任国防部部长。
description.en: Li Shangfu succeeded Wei Fenghe as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 在李尚福被免职后，董军接任国防部部长职务。
description.en: After Li Shangfu was removed from office, Dong Jun succeeded him as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 应瑞典要求，以涉嫌性犯罪为由对阿桑奇发出红色通报级别的国际逮捕令。
description.en: At the request of Sweden, issued a Red Notice international arrest warrant for Assange on suspicion of sexual offenses.

description.zh-cn: 在楚汉战争中获胜后，刘邦于前202年2月28日称帝，建立汉朝。
description.en: After winning the Chu-Han Contention, Liu Bang proclaimed himself emperor on February 28, 202 BCE, and established the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡反对与伊朗和解，并指控其支持恐怖主义活动。
description.en: Netanyahu opposes reconciliation with Iran and accuses it of supporting terrorist activities.

description.zh-cn: 彼得大帝将国号改为俄罗斯帝国，结束了俄罗斯沙皇国的历史。
description.en: Peter the Great changed the state's name to the Russian Empire, ending the history of the Tsardom of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 在俄波战争（1654-1667）中，俄罗斯沙皇国击败了波兰。
description.en: The Tsardom of Russia defeated Poland in the Russo-Polish War (1654-1667).

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央统战部副部长期间，获得中国人民大学硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a master's degree from Renmin University of China while serving as Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 于1964年7月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in July 1964.

description.zh-cn: 历任中共中央统战部副秘书长（1991年3月－1991年9月）、副部长（1991年9月－2002年12月）、部长（2002年12月－2007年12月）。
description.en: Served as Deputy Secretary-General (March 1991 - September 1991), Deputy Head (September 1991 - December 2002), and Head (December 2002 - December 2007) of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任第十七届、十八届中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the 17th and 18th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任国务院总理期间，刘延东任其副手。
description.en: While Li Keqiang was Premier of the State Council, Liu Yandong served as his deputy.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，刘延东是其中央政治局的成员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Liu Yandong was a member of its Politburo.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，刘延东是其中央政治局的成员。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Liu Yandong was a member of its Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 在共青团中央工作期间，与时任团中央负责人的胡锦涛、王兆国、宋德福共事。
description.en: During her tenure at the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, she worked with Hu Jintao, Wang Zhaoguo, and Song Defu, who were then leaders of the league.

description.zh-cn: 在共青团中央工作期间，与时任团中央负责人的胡锦涛、王兆国、宋德福共事。后来，刘延东接替王兆国出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: During her tenure at the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, she worked with Hu Jintao, Wang Zhaoguo, and Song Defu. Later, Liu Yandong succeeded Wang Zhaoguo as head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东卸任国务院副总理，由孙春兰等人接任其分管领域。
description.en: Liu Yandong stepped down as Vice Premier of the State Council, and her areas of responsibility were taken over by Sun Chunlan and others.

description.zh-cn: 以“不能匡正建文帝”为由将朱允熥废为庶人，并囚禁于凤阳。
description.en: Deposed Zhu Yuntong to commoner status and imprisoned him in Fengyang on the grounds that he 'failed to correct the Jianwen Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 1004年，辽国军队兵临澶州与北宋交战，战败后求和，双方的敌对状态以《澶渊之盟》的签订而告终。
description.en: In 1004, the Liao army besieged Chanzhou and fought against the Northern Song. After being defeated, they sued for peace, ending the state of hostility with the signing of the Treaty of Chanyuan.

description.zh-cn: 吕布在杀死丁原后，成为董卓的义子和核心将领，直至他与王允合谋刺杀董卓。
description.en: After killing Ding Yuan, Lü Bu became Dong Zhuo's adopted son and key general until he conspired with Wang Yun to assassinate him.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会执行中国共产党中央委员会的指示，并定期向其报告工作。
description.en: The CPC Beijing Municipal Committee implements the directives of the CPC Central Committee and reports its work to it periodically.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月，中共中央决定组建中共北平市委。
description.en: In December 1948, the CPC Central Committee decided to establish the CPC Beiping Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2018年12月起任市委常委，2022年6月起任市委副书记。
description.en: Became a Standing Committee member in December 2018, and Deputy Secretary in June 2022.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔是周永康的第二任妻子，在周永康原配王淑华去世后与他结婚。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye is the second wife of Zhou Yongkang; they married after the death of Zhou's first wife, Wang Shuhua.

description.zh-cn: 周永康曾任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang was a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周永康曾任中央政法委书记。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang once served as the Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争爆发后，徐勤先因年龄不足被拒参军，为此咬破手指写血书要求参军才被接受。
description.en: After the Korean War broke out in 1950, Xu Qinxian was initially rejected for military service due to his age. He was only accepted after writing a pledge in his own blood.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先曾任第38集团军副军长，后升任军长。
description.en: Xu Qinxian served as Deputy Commander and was later promoted to Commander of the 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 1988年被授予少将军衔，1989年5月被开除军籍。
description.en: He was awarded the rank of Major General in 1988 and was expelled from the military in May 1989.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先拒绝执行命令的理由是：军委第一副主席赵紫阳没有签署命令，军令不全、不合法，因此不能执行。
description.en: Xu Qinxian's reason for refusing the order was that Zhao Ziyang, the First Vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission, had not signed it, making the military order incomplete, illegal, and therefore unenforceable.

description.zh-cn: 因其在六四事件中的抗命行为，徐勤先被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: Xu Qinxian was expelled from the Communist Party of China for his insubordination during the Tiananmen Square events.

description.zh-cn: 李锐与徐勤先有深交，并曾赋诗称赞其在六四事件中的行为是“一代豪雄硬脊梁”。
description.en: Li Rui had a deep friendship with Xu Qinxian and wrote a poem praising his actions during the Tiananmen Square events as being the 'strong backbone of a generation's hero'.

description.zh-cn: 在君悦会谈中，侯友宜公开念出他与柯文哲之间的私人简讯内容，此举引发了激烈争执，加剧了双方的不信任，是导致协商破裂的关键事件之一。
description.en: During the Grand Hyatt meeting, Hou Yu-ih publicly read out private text messages between him and Ko Wen-je, an act that sparked a heated dispute, deepened mutual distrust, and was one of the key events leading to the breakdown of negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 1915年11月，在梁启超的帮助下，蔡锷得以从北京潜逃，为发动护国战争做准备。
description.en: In November 1915, with the help of Liang Qichao, Cai E successfully escaped from Beijing to prepare for the launch of the National Protection War.

description.zh-cn: 朱德晚年在回忆录中写到“蔡锷先生影响我整个前半生”。
description.en: In his later years, Zhu De wrote in his memoirs, 'Mr. Cai E influenced the entire first half of my life.'

description.zh-cn: 1962年，马来亚大学位于新加坡的校区独立为新加坡大学。
description.en: In 1962, the Singapore campus of the University of Malaya became independent as the University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学与佐治亚理工学院合作成立了“亚太物流研究中心”，专注于物流领域的研究与教育。
description.en: The National University of Singapore collaborated with the Georgia Institute of Technology to establish 'The Logistics Institute – Asia Pacific', focusing on research and education in the field of logistics.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗是武则天的孙子。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong was the grandson of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 李隆基出生于唐朝的东都洛阳。
description.en: Li Longji was born in Luoyang, the Eastern Capital of the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在国本之争后，因对母亲崇佛干政不满及郑贵妃等影响，明神宗转而支持道教。
description.en: After the succession dispute, dissatisfied with his mother's use of Buddhism to interfere in politics and influenced by figures like Noble Consort Zheng, the Wanli Emperor shifted his support to Taoism.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统文在寅任命尹锡悦出任检察总长。
description.en: Then-President Moon Jae-in appointed Yoon Suk Yeol as Prosecutor General.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年大韩民国总统选举中，尹锡悦以0.73%的微弱优势击败对手李在明。
description.en: In the 2022 South Korean presidential election, Yoon Suk Yeol defeated his opponent Lee Jae-myung by a narrow margin of 0.73%.

description.zh-cn: 在崔顺实干政丑闻调查中，时任调查组组长的尹锡悦完成了对前总统朴槿惠的拘留工作。
description.en: During the investigation of the Choi Soon-sil scandal, Yoon Suk Yeol, then head of the investigation team, carried out the detention of former President Park Geun-hye.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦在美国进行国事访问期间与美国总统乔·拜登会晤，并在美国国会发表演讲。
description.en: During his state visit to the United States, Yoon Suk Yeol met with US President Joe Biden and delivered a speech to the US Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在统治新疆前期，盛世才为巩固权力，采取亲苏政策，向苏联寻求军事和经济援助，并曾多次提出加入苏联共产党及将新疆并入苏联。
description.en: In the early period of his rule in Xinjiang, to consolidate power, Sheng Shicai adopted a pro-Soviet policy, seeking military and economic aid from the Soviet Union. He also repeatedly proposed joining the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and annexing Xinjiang to the USSR.

description.zh-cn: 1933年底，苏联出兵并提供武器援助，帮助盛世才击败了军事对手马仲英和张培元，巩固了其在新疆的统治。
description.en: In late 1933, the Soviet Union sent troops and provided arms to help Sheng Shicai defeat his military rivals Ma Zhongying and Zhang Peiyuan, thereby consolidating his rule in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 在投靠国民政府后，盛世才开始实行反苏政策，驱逐苏联在新疆的人员和军队，并逮捕与苏联有关的人士。
description.en: After aligning with the Nationalist Government, Sheng Shicai implemented an anti-Soviet policy, expelling Soviet personnel and troops from Xinjiang and arresting individuals associated with the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1944年，在盛世才试图再次投靠苏联时，斯大林拒绝了他的要求，并将其请求归顺的电报转交给蒋介石，直接导致盛世才政治生涯的终结。
description.en: In 1944, when Sheng Shicai attempted to defect back to the Soviet Union, Stalin rejected his request and forwarded the telegram to Chiang Kai-shek, directly leading to the end of Sheng's political career.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，孔绍逊在收到习近平的指示后，与另一名工作人员将胡锦涛带离会场。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, Kong Shaoxun, along with another staff member, escorted Hu Jintao out of the venue after receiving instructions from Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，中国官方对相关信息进行了严格的审查，中国大陆媒体未对此事进行报道，社交平台上的讨论也遭到了封杀。
description.en: After the incident, Chinese authorities imposed strict censorship on related information. Mainland Chinese media did not report on the matter, and discussions on social media platforms were blocked.

description.zh-cn: 新华社通过其英文推特账号发布了官方解释，称胡锦涛离场是因“身体不适”，试图影响外界对此事件的看法。
description.en: Xinhua News Agency released the official explanation via its English Twitter account, stating that Hu Jintao left because he was 'not feeling well', in an attempt to influence external perceptions of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛到中国人民解放军总医院为逝世的前总书记江泽民送别，这是他在二十大事件后首次公开露面。
description.en: Hu Jintao went to the PLA General Hospital to pay his last respects to the deceased former General Secretary Jiang Zemin. This was his first public appearance after the incident at the 20th Party Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在七·二〇事件中，周恩来紧急搭救了被围困的谢富治。
description.en: During the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai urgently rescued the besieged Xie Fuzhi.

description.zh-cn: 1940年初，陈再道率冀南军区部队围攻国军石友三部。
description.en: In early 1940, Chen Zaidao led troops from the Southern Hebei Military Region to besiege the KMT troops of Shi Yousan.

description.zh-cn: 与宋任穷共同率领冀南部队参加百团大战。
description.en: Jointly led troops from Southern Hebei to participate in the Hundred Regiments Offensive with Song Renqiong.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅盛赞陈再道为“再道之勇”。
description.en: Chen Yi praised Chen Zaidao for his bravery.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，陈再道在六四事件中反对出动军队实行戒严镇压民众。
description.en: It is reported that Chen Zaidao opposed the use of troops and the imposition of martial law to suppress the populace during the June Fourth Incident.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思是马克思主义理论的创始人。
description.en: Karl Marx is the founder of Marxist theory.

description.zh-cn: 恩格斯与卡尔·马克思共同创立了马克思主义。
description.en: Friedrich Engels co-founded Marxism with Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 现代共产主义运动以卡尔·马克思的理论为基础。
description.en: The modern communist movement is based on the theory of Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动对中国的发展造成严重破坏。
description.en: The Great Leap Forward movement caused severe damage to China's development.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，邓小平对毛泽东的许多政策及思想进行了修正。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Deng Xiaoping revised many of Mao Zedong's policies and ideas.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1947年12月8日出生于中华民国广州市。
description.en: Jimmy Lai was born on December 8, 1947, in Guangzhou, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国官媒《人民日报》将黎智英称为“祸港四人帮”之首，对其进行严厉批评。
description.en: Chinese state media People's Daily labeled Jimmy Lai as the head of the 'Gang of Four who bring disaster to Hong Kong', severely criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1994年7月在《壹周刊》刊登《给王八蛋李鹏的公开信》，严厉批评时任中国总理李鹏。
description.en: In July 1994, Jimmy Lai published 'An Open Letter to the Bastard Li Peng' in Next Magazine, sharply criticizing then-Chinese Premier Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英公开批评中共中央总书记习近平是“毛泽东的化身”及“人类有史以来最极端的独裁者”。
description.en: Jimmy Lai publicly criticized CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping as 'the reincarnation of Mao Zedong' and 'the most extreme dictator in human history'.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英曾与台湾前倒扁红衫军总指挥施明德秘密开会，讨论如何执行占领中环运动。
description.en: Jimmy Lai held a secret meeting with former Taiwanese anti-government protest leader Shih Ming-teh to discuss how to execute the Occupy Central movement.

description.zh-cn: 2019年7月，黎智英与时任美国国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥会面，讨论香港修订逃犯条例的发展。
description.en: In July 2019, Jimmy Lai met with then-U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo to discuss the developments of the proposed extradition bill in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 时任香港保安局局长的李家超首次引用国安法冻结资产的权力，冻结了黎智英持有的公司股份及银行账户财产。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee invoked the power under the National Security Law for the first time to freeze assets, targeting Jimmy Lai's company shares and bank account properties.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1960年移居香港，具有中华人民共和国公民身份。香港及中国政府主张其中国公民身份，不承认其英国国籍带来的领事保护权。
description.en: Jimmy Lai moved to Hong Kong in 1960, holding the status of a citizen of the People's Republic of China. The Hong Kong and Chinese governments assert his Chinese citizenship and do not recognize consular protection rights from his British nationality.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，对曹植备加迫害，多次将其迁徙封地并削夺其权力。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi severely persecuted Cao Zhi, frequently relocating his fiefdom and stripping him of power.

description.zh-cn: 221年，孙权向曹丕称臣，被册封为吴王。后因拒绝送儿子入朝为人质而关系破裂。
description.en: In 221, Sun Quan submitted to Cao Pi as a vassal and was enfeoffed as the King of Wu. The relationship broke down after he refused to send his son to the Wei court as a hostage.

description.zh-cn: 安华两次因鸡奸罪名成立而被监禁。
description.en: Anwar was imprisoned twice on sodomy convictions.

description.zh-cn: 新四军由南方八省的红军和游击队整编而成。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was formed by reorganizing the Red Army and guerrilla units from the eight southern provinces.

description.zh-cn: 文本中明确指出新四军主要由项英创建。
description.en: The text explicitly states that the New Fourth Army was primarily founded by Xiang Ying.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺被任命为新四军军长。
description.en: Ye Ting was appointed as the commander of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 项英被任命为新四军副军长。
description.en: Xiang Ying was appointed as the deputy commander of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅在皖南事变后被任命为新四军代军长。
description.en: Chen Yi was appointed as the acting commander of the New Fourth Army after the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 皖南事变导致新四军军部遭受重大损失，约9000人的部队大部牺牲或被俘。
description.en: The Southern Anhui Incident caused heavy losses to the New Fourth Army headquarters, with most of its approximately 9,000 troops killed or captured.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，沈从文在北京大学作为旁听生学习并练习写作。
description.en: In 1923, Shen Congwen studied and practiced writing as an auditor at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与丁玲早期是友人，共同创办出版社。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Ding Ling were friends in their early years and co-founded a publishing house.

description.zh-cn: 1934年，因沈从文出版《记丁玲》一书，丁玲与他不再友好。
description.en: In 1934, after Shen Congwen published the book 'The Biography of Ding Ling', their friendship ended.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，郭沫若等人对沈从文的批判是导致其宣布封笔、中止文学创作的重要原因。
description.en: In 1948, criticism from Guo Moruo and others was a significant reason for Shen Congwen to announce his retirement from literary creation.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，沈从文受到冲击，其珍贵图书资料被烧毁，并曾被安排打扫女厕所。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Shen Congwen was persecuted, his precious books and materials were burned, and he was once assigned to clean women's toilets.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1950年至1978年在中国历史博物馆任文物研究员。
description.en: From 1950 to 1978, Shen Congwen worked as a cultural relics researcher at the National Museum of Chinese History.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文曾于1987年和1988年入围诺贝尔文学奖最后候选名单，非常接近获奖。
description.en: Shen Congwen was a finalist for the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1987 and 1988, coming very close to winning.

description.zh-cn: 为反击托洛茨基的批评，斯大林指示中国共产党发动包括广州起义在内的一系列武装暴动。
description.en: To counter criticism from Trotsky, Stalin instructed the Chinese Communist Party to launch a series of armed uprisings, including the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在时任总统艾森豪威尔批准下，将秘密报告讲稿披露给《纽约时报》。
description.en: With the approval of then-President Eisenhower, it disclosed the text of the Secret Speech to The New York Times.

description.zh-cn: 批准将秘密报告讲稿披露给媒体，最终由《纽约时报》发表。
description.en: Approved the disclosure of the Secret Speech manuscript to the media, which was ultimately published by The New York Times.

position.en: Acting Chief of the General Staff

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿被打倒后代理总参谋长，后因杨余傅事件被免职，由黄永胜接任军委办事组组长。
description.en: Served as Acting Chief of the General Staff after Luo Ruiqing's downfall, and was later dismissed due to the Yang-Yu-Fu incident. Huang Yongsheng succeeded him as the head of the Military Commission's administrative group.

description.zh-cn: 聂荣臻曾誉杨成武为“模范团政治委员”。
description.en: Nie Rongzhen once praised Yang Chengwu as a 'model regimental political commissar'.

description.zh-cn: 林彪推荐杨成武出任总参第一副总参谋长、中央军委副秘书长。
description.en: Lin Biao recommended Yang Chengwu for the positions of First Deputy Chief of the General Staff and Deputy Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武在罗瑞卿被打倒的过程中，积极参与了对罗瑞卿的揭发和批判。
description.en: During Luo Ruiqing's downfall, Yang Chengwu actively participated in denouncing and criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 在“八·二五事件”中，毛泽东表明了对杨成武的支持，反对王尚荣、雷英夫等人对杨的批评。
description.en: During the 'August 25th Incident', Mao Zedong expressed his support for Yang Chengwu against criticism from individuals like Wang Shangrong and Lei Yingfu.

description.zh-cn: 在“八·二五事件”中，周恩来表明了对杨成武的支持。
description.en: During the 'August 25th Incident', Zhou Enlai expressed his support for Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 以杨成武为首的总参党委将副总参谋长张爱萍停职，并成立专案组审查其“罪行”。
description.en: The General Staff Party Committee, led by Yang Chengwu, suspended Deputy Chief of General Staff Zhang Aiping and set up a special task force to investigate his 'crimes'.

description.zh-cn: 据邱会作回忆，杨成武倒台的关键在于其倒向了江青，引起了林彪的不满。
description.en: According to Qiu Huizuo's memoirs, a key factor in Yang Chengwu's downfall was his alignment with Jiang Qing, which caused dissatisfaction from Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中死亡后，毛泽东开始反思杨余傅事件，为杨成武的复出创造了条件。
description.en: After Lin Biao's death in the Lin Biao incident, Mao Zedong began to reconsider the Yang-Yu-Fu incident, paving the way for Yang Chengwu's political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 江青曾试图提拔复出后的杨成武担任总参谋长。
description.en: Jiang Qing attempted to promote the rehabilitated Yang Chengwu to the position of Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央将杨余傅事件定为“冤案”，为杨成武彻底平反。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee designated the Yang-Yu-Fu incident as a 'wrongful case', completely exonerating Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 任正非是华为公司的创始人。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei is the founder of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任正非担任华为公司的总裁。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei serves as the President of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 倭寇在13至16世纪期间，持续侵扰中国沿海地区。
description.en: The Wokou continuously raided the coastal areas of China from the 13th to the 16th century.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党是中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The Communist Party of China is the founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府承认中华人民共和国是代表“中国”的唯一合法政府。
description.en: The U.S. government recognizes the People's Republic of China as the sole legal government representing 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 根据文中所引用的法轮功方面及部分国际组织的说法，天安门自焚事件是由中国共产党当局策划导演，旨在栽赃法轮功并为镇压制造舆论支持。
description.en: According to Falun Gong sources and some international organizations cited in the text, the Tiananmen Square self-immolation incident was staged and directed by the Chinese Communist Party authorities to frame Falun Gong and create public opinion support for the suppression.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平主导的拨乱反正和改革开放时期，陈永贵的政治路线被否定，并于1980年9月被迫辞去国务院副总理职务。
description.en: During the period of Boluan Fanzheng and Reform and Opening-up led by Deng Xiaoping, Chen Yonggui's political line was repudiated, and he was forced to resign from his position as Vice Premier of the State Council in September 1980.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵于1948年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Chen Yonggui joined the Communist Party of China in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵于中共十届和十一届期间担任中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chen Yonggui served as a member of the Politburo during the 10th and 11th Central Committees of the CPC.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 作为中央政治局委员，陈永贵在党内是时任中共中央主席毛泽东的下属。
description.en: As a member of the Politburo, Chen Yonggui was a subordinate of the then CPC Chairman Mao Zedong within the party.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 作为国务院副总理，陈永贵在政府体系中是时任总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: As Vice Premier of the State Council, Chen Yonggui was a subordinate of the then Premier Zhou Enlai in the government system.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理
position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任国务院总理和中共中央主席期间，陈永贵是其在政府和党内的下属。
description.en: During Hua Guofeng's tenure as Premier of the State Council and Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yonggui was his subordinate in both the government and the party.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦担任中共中央主席期间，陈永贵作为政治局委员是其党内下属。
description.en: During Hu Yaobang's tenure as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yonggui, as a Politburo member, was his subordinate within the party.

description.zh-cn: 纳伦德拉·莫迪是第14任印度总理。
description.en: Narendra Modi is the 14th Prime Minister of India.

description.zh-cn: 自1947年分治独立以来，印度和巴基斯坦因克什米尔领土争端等问题爆发了多次战争，两国关系长期紧张。
description.en: Since their partition and independence in 1947, India and Pakistan have fought several wars over issues including the Kashmir territorial dispute, and their relations have remained tense for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 1959年西藏骚乱后，印度接纳了流亡的十四世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: After the 1959 Tibetan uprising, India granted asylum to the exiled 14th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 印度在1962年的中印边境战争中战败，其扩张态势受挫。
description.en: India was defeated in the 1962 Sino-Indian War, and its expansionist posture was thwarted.

description.zh-cn: 在冷战时期，印度与苏联发展了密切关系，并得到了广泛的军事支持。
description.en: During the Cold War, India developed close relations with the Soviet Union and received extensive military support.

description.zh-cn: 孔子提出了一整套人文和社会思想，经过后来的发展，被称为儒家思想。
description.en: Confucius proposed a comprehensive set of humanistic and social ideas that, after later development, became known as Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 罗斯福在第一次世界大战期间强烈批评伍德罗·威尔逊总统过于软弱的外交政策。
description.en: During World War I, Roosevelt strongly criticized President Woodrow Wilson's foreign policy as being too weak.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央是中国共产党的中央领导机构，直接隶属于中国共产党。
description.en: The Central Committee of the CCP is the central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party and is directly subordinate to it.

description.zh-cn: 971年，北宋军队消灭了南汉政权。
description.en: In 971, the Northern Song army conquered the Southern Han state.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国的成立取代并终结了法兰西第一共和国。
description.en: The establishment of the First French Empire replaced and ended the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 三鹿集团生产并销售了受三聚氰胺污染的婴幼儿奶粉，是引发该事件的直接源头。
description.en: Sanlu Group produced and sold infant formula contaminated with melamine, which was the direct source of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 该事件导致三鹿集团信誉破产，最终于2009年2月12日被法院宣告破产。
description.en: The scandal led to the bankruptcy of Sanlu Group's reputation, and it was declared bankrupt by a court on February 12, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，罗干受到冲击，被下放到“五七”干校劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Luo Gan was politically impacted and sent down to a 'May Seventh' Cadre School for manual labor.

description.zh-cn: 罗干陪同时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳到天安门广场要求学生停止绝食活动。
description.en: Luo Gan accompanied then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Zhao Ziyang to Tiananmen Square to ask students to stop their hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 罗干与时任中共中央办公厅主任温家宝陪同时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳到天安门广场要求学生停止绝食活动。
description.en: Luo Gan, along with then-Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee Wen Jiabao, accompanied then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang to Tiananmen Square to ask students to stop their hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 周永康接替罗干担任中共中央政治局常委和中央政法委书记的职务。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang succeeded Luo Gan as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英的国籍是中华人民共和国。
description.en: Song Zuying's nationality is the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚于2004年3月29日成为北约成员国。
description.en: Bulgaria became a member of NATO on March 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚于2007年1月1日成为欧盟成员国。
description.en: Bulgaria became a member of the European Union on January 1, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中央书记处是中央政治局和它的常务委员会的办事机构；成员由中央政治局常务委员会提名，中央委员会全体会议通过。
description.en: The Secretariat is the working body of the Political Bureau and its Standing Committee; its members are nominated by the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and are subject to endorsement by the Central Committee in plenary session.

description.zh-cn: 党的中央纪律检查委员会在党的中央委员会领导下进行工作。
description.en: The Party's Central Commission for Discipline Inspection functions under the leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

description.zh-cn: 关东军因不满张作霖未能履行对日承诺，策划并执行了皇姑屯事件，将其暗杀。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Zhang Zuolin's failure to fulfill promises to Japan, the Kwantung Army planned and executed the Huanggutun Incident, assassinating him.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖是奉系军阀的最高领袖。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was the supreme leader of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 与张作霖同乘一列专列，在皇姑屯事件中受伤。
description.en: Traveled on the same special train as Zhang Zuolin and was injured in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是叶剑英的三子。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is the third son of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 叶选平是叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: Ye Xuanping is Ye Xuanlian's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶选宁是叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: Ye Xuanning is Ye Xuanlian's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是中国共产党员。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉曾入伍在解放军总政治部担任飞行员。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian enlisted and served as a pilot in the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室是中共中央办事机构，列入中共中央直属机构序列。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission is a working body of the CPC Central Committee, listed in the sequence of institutions directly under the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1927年的国民党清党运动导致中共遭受重大打击，陈独秀因此被共产国际认为负有领导责任而被迫辞职。
description.en: The 1927 Kuomintang purge resulted in significant setbacks for the CCP, leading the Comintern to hold Chen Duxiu responsible and force his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，王明与康生等人领导了对陈独秀的攻击运动，在共产党刊物上指控其为“日特汉奸”。
description.en: In 1938, Wang Ming, along with Kang Sheng and others, led a smear campaign against Chen Duxiu, accusing him of being a 'Japanese spy and traitor' in Communist publications.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，康生与王明等人领导了对陈独秀的攻击运动，在共产党刊物上指控其为“日特汉奸”。
description.en: In 1938, Kang Sheng, along with Wang Ming and others, led a smear campaign against Chen Duxiu, accusing him of being a 'Japanese spy and traitor' in Communist publications.

description.zh-cn: 作为《新青年》的主编，陈独秀多次催促鲁迅进行小说创作，对其成为文学巨匠起到了重要的推动作用。
description.en: As the editor of 'New Youth', Chen Duxiu repeatedly urged Lu Xun to write fiction, playing a significant role in his emergence as a literary giant.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵将“黑五类”及其家属作为主要打击对象，进行了大规模的迫害、批斗甚至屠杀。
description.en: The Red Guards targeted the 'Five Black Categories' and their families for large-scale persecution, struggle sessions, and even massacres.

description.zh-cn: 因红卫兵武斗失控，毛泽东召见红卫兵“五大领袖”进行严厉批评，并决定派工宣队进驻学校，结束了红卫兵作为政治运动中心的历史。
description.en: Due to the out-of-control violent struggles among Red Guards, Mao Zedong summoned their 'Five Great Leaders' for severe criticism and decided to send workers' propaganda teams into schools, ending the Red Guards' history as the center of a political movement.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东和林彪等人的号召下，红卫兵运动得以大规模展开。
description.en: Under the call of Mao Zedong, Lin Biao, and others, the Red Guard movement was launched on a large scale.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成是梁启超的儿子。
description.en: Liang Sicheng is the son of Liang Qichao.

description.zh-cn: 梁从诫是梁思成的儿子。
description.en: Liang Congjie is the son of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 梁再冰是梁思成的女儿。
description.en: Liang Zaibing is the daughter of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法失败后，慈禧太后迫害维新派人士，导致梁启超流亡海外。
description.en: After the failure of the Hundred Days' Reform, Empress Dowager Cixi persecuted reformers, causing Liang Qichao to flee into exile.

description.zh-cn: 1912年辛亥革命后，梁思成随父母从日本回国。
description.en: After the Xinhai Revolution in 1912, Liang Sicheng returned to China from Japan with his parents.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，梁思成为躲避战乱，携全家离开北平，前往西南地区。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liang Sicheng left Beiping with his family and moved to Southwest China to escape the war.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1959年1月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Liang Sicheng joined the Communist Party of China in January 1959.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间是北京师范大学女附中红卫兵领袖。
description.en: Was a Red Guard leader at the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 东汉以雒阳（今洛阳市）为都城。
description.en: The Eastern Han dynasty established its capital at Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 684年9月，武则天将东都洛阳命名为“神都”。
description.en: In September 684, Wu Zetian named the eastern capital Luoyang 'Shendu' (Divine Capital).

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵是中国人民解放军海军的航空兵部队。
description.en: The PLA Naval Air Force is the aviation branch of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 1952年1月8日，时任海军司令员萧劲光向中央军委上报请示报告，正式报请组建航空兵飞行部队。
description.en: On January 8, 1952, then-Navy Commander Xiao Jinguang submitted a report to the Central Military Commission officially requesting the establishment of naval aviation flight units.

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月24日，周恩来总理批示同意海军提出的空军建设方针。
description.en: On August 24, 1952, Premier Zhou Enlai approved the guiding principles for the construction of the naval air force proposed by the Navy.

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月24日，毛泽东批示同意组建海军航空兵。
description.en: On August 24, 1952, Mao Zedong approved the establishment of the Naval Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 担任全总常务副主席，主持总工会的工作。
description.en: Served as the Executive Vice Chairman of the ACFTU, presiding over the work of the federation.

description.zh-cn: 祖父昭和天皇为德仁命名为“浩宫德仁”。
description.en: His grandfather, Emperor Shōwa, named him 'Hironomiya Naruhito'.

description.zh-cn: 与雅子皇后一同出席已故英国女王伊莉莎白二世的国葬。
description.en: Attended the state funeral of the late Queen Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom, alongside Empress Masako.

description.zh-cn: 第二次直奉战争后，张作霖与冯玉祥共同推举段祺瑞担任中华民国临时执政。
description.en: After the Second Zhili-Fengtian War, Zhang Zuolin and Feng Yuxiang jointly endorsed Duan Qirui to serve as the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄的叛乱得到了冯玉祥的支持。
description.en: Guo Songling's rebellion was supported by Feng Yuxiang.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖率部反攻，郭松龄兵败被捕，并于次日被杀害。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin launched a counterattack, leading to Guo Songling's defeat, capture, and execution the next day.

description.zh-cn: 在“讨赤”的背景下，吴佩孚与宿敌张作霖释嫌修好，联合对抗冯玉祥。
description.en: Under the banner of 'anti-Bolshevism', Wu Peifu reconciled with his old adversary Zhang Zuolin to jointly confront Feng Yuxiang.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄曾任张学良为司令的一三联军副司令。
description.en: Guo Songling served as the deputy commander of the 1st-3rd Combined Army, of which Zhang Xueliang was the commander.

description.zh-cn: 曹植是曹操的儿子。
description.en: Cao Zhi is the son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操与袁绍在早年相处甚厚。
description.en: Cao Cao and Yuan Shao were very close in their early years.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在名义上是东汉的臣子，官至丞相，爵至魏王。
description.en: Cao Cao was nominally a subject of the Eastern Han, holding the positions of Chancellor and King of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操为曹魏政权奠定了基础。
description.en: Cao Cao laid the foundation for the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 郭嘉是曹操的谋士。
description.en: Guo Jia was an advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操因不能容忍孔融的言行而将其诛杀。
description.en: Unable to tolerate Kong Rong's words and actions, Cao Cao had him executed.

description.zh-cn: 清零政策及其伴随的封锁措施严重影响了中华人民共和国的经济发展，导致经济衰退和失业率上升。
description.en: The Zero-COVID policy and its accompanying lockdown measures severely impacted the economic development of the People's Republic of China, leading to economic recession and rising unemployment.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗在忽必烈去世后继承其皇位。
description.en: Emperor Chengzong succeeded to the throne after the death of Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗即位后停止了对安南（越南）的征伐。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Chengzong stopped the military campaigns against Annam (Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1925年5月，彭真参加并领导了反对阎锡山强征房屋估价税的斗争。
description.en: In May 1925, Peng Zhen participated in and led the struggle against the house valuation tax imposed by Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 因在四平战役中的军事失败和与林彪等人的分歧，彭真于1946年6月16日被免去中共中央东北局书记职务，由林彪接任。
description.en: Due to military failures in the Siping Campaign and disagreements with Lin Biao and others, Peng Zhen was removed from his post as Secretary of the CCP Northeast Bureau on June 16, 1946, and was succeeded by Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》点名批判彭真，随后其被停止中央书记处书记、撤销北京市委第一书记等职务。
description.en: The 'May 16 Notification' criticized Peng Zhen by name, and he was subsequently suspended from his post as Secretary of the Central Secretariat and removed as First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 彭真任两案审判指导委员会主任，统一领导审判“林彪、江青反革命集团”的工作。
description.en: Peng Zhen served as the director of the trial steering committee, uniformly leading the work of trying the 'Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques'.

description.zh-cn: 彭真被视为邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Peng Zhen is considered one of the Eight Great Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's era.

description.zh-cn: 彭真于1983年至1988年担任第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Peng Zhen served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 6th National People's Congress from 1983 to 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，彭真卸任全国人大常委会委员长，由万里接任。
description.en: In 1988, Peng Zhen stepped down as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee and was succeeded by Wan Li.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，彭真接替叶剑英出任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: In 1983, Peng Zhen succeeded Ye Jianying as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，彭真担任恢复设立后的中央政法委员会首任书记。
description.en: In 1980, Peng Zhen became the first secretary of the re-established Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 白起在秦昭襄王麾下担任将领，为其效力三十余年。
description.en: Bai Qi served as a general under King Zhaoxiang of Qin for over 30 years.

description.zh-cn: 在鄢郢之战中，白起率军攻陷楚国鄢城和都城郢，焚毁其王陵，迫使其迁都。
description.en: In the Battle of Yan-Ying, Bai Qi led his army to capture the Chu city of Yan and its capital Ying, burned down its royal tombs, and forced it to relocate its capital.

description.zh-cn: 允䄉与皇八子胤禩交好，并结成同盟参与了对皇位的争夺。
description.en: Yun'e was on good terms with the eighth prince Yinsi and formed an alliance with him to contend for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 允䄉与皇九子胤禟结成同盟参与了对皇位的争夺。
description.en: Yun'e formed an alliance with the ninth prince Yintang to contend for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 允䄉与皇十四子允禵结成同盟参与了对皇位的争夺。
description.en: Yun'e formed an alliance with the fourteenth prince Yunti to contend for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 康熙晚年，允䄉参与了九子夺嫡事件。
description.en: During the later years of the Kangxi reign, Yun'e participated in the succession struggle of the nine princes.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝即位后命人释放允䄉，并重新封其为辅国公。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Qianlong Emperor ordered the release of Yun'e and re-ennobled him as a Bulwark Duke.

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）曾为华东航空学院（西北工业大学主体）提供办学场所、公共课教学和师资。
description.en: Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) provided campus space, general education courses, and faculty for the East China Aeronautical Institute (the main body of Northwestern Polytechnical University).

description.zh-cn: 决定南京工学院（东南大学前身）无线电工程系主体停迁，得以保留在南京。
description.en: Decided that the main body of the Radio Engineering Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) should not be relocated, allowing it to remain in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 在总参三所从事情报翻译工作。
description.en: Worked as an intelligence translator at the Third Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 在《光明日报》任记者期间，戴晴采访过方励之。
description.en: During her time as a journalist at Guangming Daily, Dai Qing interviewed Fang Lizhi.

description.zh-cn: 在《光明日报》任记者期间，戴晴采访过严家其。
description.en: During her time as a journalist at Guangming Daily, Dai Qing interviewed Yan Jiaqi.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫生下汉武帝长子刘据后，被立为皇后。
description.en: After giving birth to Emperor Wu's eldest son, Liu Ju, Wei Zifu was made Empress.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝在巫蛊之祸中派遣官员收缴卫子夫的皇后印玺，意图废后，此举直接导致了卫子夫的自杀。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Emperor Wu of Han dispatched officials to confiscate Empress Wei Zifu's seal with the intention of deposing her, an act that directly led to her suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在巫蛊之祸中，太子刘据起兵对抗汉武帝的军队。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Crown Prince Liu Ju raised troops to fight against the army of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝临终托孤，任命霍光为大司马大将军，辅佐年幼的汉昭帝。
description.en: On his deathbed, Emperor Wu entrusted his young son to Huo Guang, appointing him Grand Marshal and regent to assist the young Emperor Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝因孝贤皇后的缘故，对傅恒格外恩宠和重用。乾隆曾言：“即大学士公傅恒之加恩，亦由于皇后”。
description.en: Due to his connection to Empress Xiaoxianchun, the Qianlong Emperor showed exceptional favor and trust towards Fuheng. Qianlong once stated, 'The favors bestowed upon Grand Secretary Fuheng are also because of the Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 因在孝贤皇后丧仪上表现不够悲痛，乾隆帝严厉斥责皇长子永璜，并宣称其“断不可承续大统”，剥夺了他的继承资格。
description.en: For not displaying sufficient grief at Empress Xiaoxianchun's funeral, the Qianlong Emperor severely reprimanded his eldest son, Yonghuang, and declared that he 'absolutely cannot inherit the great lineage,' thus stripping him of his succession rights.

description.zh-cn: 因翰林院撰写皇后祭文时使用了“泉台”二字，乾隆帝认为不妥，作为审阅者的大学士张廷玉因“全不留心检点”被罚俸一年。
description.en: Because the Hanlin Academy used the term 'quan tai' (underworld springs) in the Empress's eulogy, which the Qianlong Emperor deemed inappropriate, Grand Secretary Zhang Tingyu, as the reviewer, was fined one year's salary for 'complete inattention to detail'.

description.zh-cn: 587年，隋朝遣军吞并西梁，西梁灭亡。
description.en: In 587, the Sui dynasty dispatched an army to annex the Western Liang, leading to its demise.

description.zh-cn: 西梁是南梁在梁元帝于江陵被杀后残存的政权。
description.en: Western Liang was the remnant state of the Southern Liang dynasty after Emperor Yuan was killed in Jiangling.

description.zh-cn: 担任校长期间，引入了称为“precept”的小组导修课，对普林斯顿大学的本科教育模式进行了重要革新。
description.en: During his presidency, he introduced the preceptorial system, a significant innovation in Princeton's undergraduate educational model.

description.zh-cn: 傅兆林是傅崐萁的父亲。
description.en: Fu Zhaolin is the father of Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁在担任立法委员期间，于广州暨南大学攻读国际关系学院法学博士学位。
description.en: While serving as a legislator, Fu Kun-chi pursued a Doctor of Law degree at the School of International Studies of Jinan University in Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁曾任第5-7届及第10届至今的立法委员。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi served as a member of the Legislative Yuan for the 5th-7th terms and from the 10th term to the present.

description.zh-cn: 尹力接替蔡奇担任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Yin Li succeeded Cai Qi as Party Secretary of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇接替王沪宁担任中共中央书记处排名第一的书记。
description.en: Cai Qi succeeded Wang Huning as the first-ranked Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇接替丁薛祥担任中共中央办公厅主任及中央和国家机关工委书记。
description.en: Cai Qi succeeded Ding Xuexiang as Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Central and State Organs Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为对太原教案等排外事件的惩罚，辛丑条约附件八规定停止山西人士参加科举考试的资格若干年。
description.en: As a punishment for the Taiyuan Massacre and other xenophobic incidents, Annex 8 of the Boxer Protocol suspended the eligibility of people from Shanxi to participate in the imperial civil service examinations for several years.

description.zh-cn: 李长春于1965年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Changchun joined the Chinese Communist Party in September 1965.

description.zh-cn: 朱镕基不希望李长春作为其国务院总理的接班人，并借由2000年汕头地区的走私案件来阻止李长春接任总理。
description.en: Zhu Rongji did not want Li Changchun as his successor for Premier and used a smuggling case in the Shantou area in 2000 to prevent Li from taking over the position.

description.zh-cn: 李长春于2002年11月接替丁关根出任中央精神文明建设指导委员会主任。
description.en: In November 2002, Li Changchun succeeded Ding Guangen as the Director of the Central Guidance Commission on Building Spiritual Civilization.

description.zh-cn: 李长春于2013年1月18日卸任中央精神文明建设指导委员会主任，由刘云山接任。
description.en: Li Changchun stepped down as the Director of the Central Guidance Commission on Building Spiritual Civilization on January 18, 2013, and was succeeded by Liu Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 李长春在广东执政期间，压制和清洗了叶剑英家族在当地的政治势力。
description.en: During his tenure in Guangdong, Li Changchun suppressed and purged the political influence of Ye Jianying's family in the region.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，回良玉曾被下放到五七干校劳动。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, Hui Liangyu was sent to a May Seventh Cadre School for labor.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉于1966年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hui Liangyu joined the Chinese Communist Party in April 1966.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉卸任中共江苏省委书记后，由李源潮接任。
description.en: After Hui Liangyu stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee, Li Yuanchao succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉是中共第十六届、十七届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Hui Liangyu was a member of the Politburo of the 16th and 17th CPC Central Committees.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，回良玉是两届中央政治局委员。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Hui Liangyu was a member of the Politburo for two terms.

description.zh-cn: 根据国务院总理温家宝的提名，回良玉出任国务院副总理。
description.en: Based on the nomination of Premier Wen Jiabao, Hui Liangyu was appointed Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命回良玉为国务院副总理。
description.en: President of the People's Republic of China Hu Jintao issued a presidential decree appointing Hui Liangyu as Vice Premier of the State Council.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理期间，回良玉是两届国务院副总理。
description.en: During Wen Jiabao's tenure as Premier of the State Council, Hui Liangyu served as Vice Premier for two terms.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替温家宝担任国家防汛抗旱总指挥部总指挥。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Wen Jiabao as Commander-in-chief of the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 在第十届国务院中与黄菊同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Huang Ju in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十届国务院中与吴仪同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Wu Yi in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与李克强同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Li Keqiang in the 11th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与张德江同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Zhang Dejiang in the 11th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与王岐山同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Wang Qishan in the 11th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜领导人人选问题上，苏共最终获胜，使得金日成得以掌权。
description.en: On the issue of North Korea's leadership, the CPSU ultimately prevailed, allowing Kim Il-sung to take power.

description.zh-cn: 唐睿宗第一次因敌不过母亲武则天而放弃皇位。
唐睿宗第二次因胞妹太平公主谗言而退位。
李渊立杨侑为帝后，遥尊隋炀帝为太上皇，隋炀帝至死都不知道此事。
明英宗在土木之变中被瓦剌所俘。
明英宗因土木之变被俘，其弟被立为新帝，因此成为太上皇。
在随何的游说下，英布叛离项羽，归顺刘邦。
description.en: Persuaded by Sui He, Ying Bu defected from Xiang Yu and submitted to Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 英布年轻时因触犯秦朝法律而被处以黥刑。
description.en: In his youth, Ying Bu was sentenced to the punishment of tattooing on the face for violating the laws of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因畏惧被清算，英布于前196年起兵反叛汉朝。
description.en: Fearing a purge, Ying Bu launched a rebellion against the Han dynasty in 196 BC.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦御驾亲征，击败了反叛的英布。
description.en: Liu Bang personally led the campaign and defeated the rebellious Ying Bu.

description.zh-cn: 项羽分封十八路诸侯时，因英布战功卓著，立其为九江王。
description.en: When Xiang Yu enfeoffed the Eighteen Princes, he made Ying Bu the King of Jiujiang due to his outstanding military achievements.

description.zh-cn: 英布归汉后，刘邦于前203年七月封其为淮南王。
description.en: After Ying Bu surrendered to Han, Liu Bang enfeoffed him as the King of Huainan in the seventh month of 203 BC.

description.zh-cn: 在诛杀韩信同年，吕后又以谋反罪名处死了梁王彭越，并将其尸体施以醢刑。
description.en: In the same year as Han Xin's execution, Empress Lü also executed Peng Yue, the King of Liang, on charges of treason and had his body pickled.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡担任以色列总理。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu serves as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 埃及参与了1948年、1956年、1967年和1973年对以色列的战争，直至1979年签署和平条约。
description.en: Egypt participated in wars against Israel in 1948, 1956, 1967, and 1973, until the signing of a peace treaty in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军萧劲光部包围长春，发起长春围困战。
description.en: Troops under the command of Xiao Jinguang from the Northeast Field Army besieged Changchun, initiating the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 吕蒙早年受到孙策赏识，成为其左右随从。
description.en: In his early years, Lü Meng was appreciated by Sun Ce and became one of his close attendants.

description.zh-cn: 孙策去世后，吕蒙继续效力于孙权，并成为其麾下核心将领。
description.en: After Sun Ce's death, Lü Meng continued to serve Sun Quan and became a core general under his command.

description.zh-cn: 孙权见吕蒙治军有方，为其增加兵员；并劝其读书学习，促使吕蒙由一员勇将成长为智勇兼备的统帅。
description.en: Sun Quan, seeing Lü Meng's skill in military discipline, increased his troops; he also persuaded him to study, which prompted Lü Meng's transformation from a brave warrior to a wise and valiant commander.

description.zh-cn: 吕蒙作为孙吴将领，多次参与并指挥了抵御曹操军队南侵的战役。
description.en: As a general of Sun Wu, Lü Meng participated in and commanded several battles to defend against Cao Cao's southern invasions.

description.zh-cn: 吕蒙夺取荆州，斩杀关羽，严重打击了刘备的势力，并直接引发了后来的夷陵之战。
description.en: Lü Meng's seizure of Jing Province and execution of Guan Yu dealt a severe blow to Liu Bei's forces and directly triggered the subsequent Battle of Yiling.

description.zh-cn: 鲁肃最初轻视吕蒙，但在一次长谈后对其才略大为惊佩，发出了“非复吴下阿蒙”的感慨，并与吕蒙结为好友。
description.en: Lu Su initially looked down on Lü Meng, but after a long conversation, he was greatly impressed by his strategic acumen, exclaiming that he was 'no longer the Lü Meng of old from Wu,' and the two became close friends.

description.zh-cn: 在赤壁之战及南郡之战等早期战役中，吕蒙在周瑜的指挥下作战。
description.en: In early campaigns such as the Battle of Red Cliffs and the Battle of Nan Commandery, Lü Meng fought under the command of Zhou Yu.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明被推举为中国致公党首任总理。
description.en: Chen Jiongming was elected as the first Premier of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明于1905年加入中国同盟会。
description.en: Chen Jiongming joined the Tongmenghui in 1905.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命爆发后，陈炯明在海陆丰起兵响应，占领惠州。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution, Chen Jiongming raised troops in Haifeng and Lufeng in response and occupied Huizhou.

description.zh-cn: 在二次革命中，袁世凯命令龙济光并收买陈炯明部下苏慎初，最终击败陈炯明。
description.en: During the Second Revolution, Yuan Shikai ordered Long Jiguang and bribed Chen Jiongming's subordinate Su Shenchu, ultimately defeating Chen.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴说服陈炯明起兵反抗袁世凯。
description.en: Huang Xing persuaded Chen Jiongming to take up arms against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 在六一六事变后，蔡和森撰文评价陈炯明为叛徒与军阀。
description.en: After the June 16th Incident, Cai Hesen wrote an article evaluating Chen Jiongming as a traitor and a warlord.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀认为陈炯明在1922年驱逐孙文之后其行动被定性为“反革命”。
description.en: Chen Duxiu believed that after expelling Sun Yat-sen in 1922, Chen Jiongming's actions were characterized as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明与章太炎交情甚笃，章太炎赞誉其“清操绝于时人”。
description.en: Chen Jiongming had a very close friendship with Zhang Taiyan, who praised him for his 'integrity, unparalleled among his contemporaries'.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正是中国共产党党员及高级领导人。
description.en: Wu Guanzheng is a member and senior leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 接替尉健行出任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wei Jianxing as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 在其中央纪委书记任上，查办了时任中共上海市委书记陈良宇。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, he investigated Chen Liangyu, who was then the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 李文宗与柯文哲为高中同学。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung and Ko Wen-je were high school classmates.

description.zh-cn: 老挝人民民主共和国建立后，同越南关系紧密，并在1977年签署《老越友好合作条约》，建立“特殊团结友好关系”。
description.en: After its establishment, the Lao PDR maintained close relations with Vietnam, signing the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in 1977 to establish a "special solidarity and friendship".

description.zh-cn: 因柬越战争及中越战争，老挝站在越南一边，与中国关系恶化，直到1989年才实现关系正常化。
description.en: Due to the Cambodian-Vietnamese War and the Sino-Vietnamese War, Laos sided with Vietnam, leading to a deterioration in relations with China until normalization in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 老挝于2013年加入世界贸易组织。
description.en: Laos joined the World Trade Organization in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅最终决定将该国的中文译名定为“老挝”。
description.en: Chen Yi made the final decision to set the country's Chinese translated name as '老挝' (Lǎowō).

description.zh-cn: 1955年，老挝（当时为老挝王国）加入联合国。1975年12月2日，会员国名称变更为老挝人民民主共和国。
description.en: In 1955, Laos (then the Kingdom of Laos) joined the United Nations. On December 2, 1975, the member state's name was changed to the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在沛县反秦起义前，萧何任主吏，刘邦任亭长，是其下属。
description.en: Before the anti-Qin uprising in Pei County, Xiao He served as a chief clerk, and Liu Bang, as a Pavilion Chief, was his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦在沛县任亭长期间，萧何多次利用职权袒护和包庇他。
description.en: During Liu Bang's tenure as Pavilion Chief in Pei County, Xiao He repeatedly used his authority to shield and cover for him.

description.zh-cn: 自刘邦被推举为沛县反抗军首领后，萧何便成为其重要部下。
description.en: After Liu Bang was chosen as the leader of the rebel army in Pei County, Xiao He became his important subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 萧何辅助刘邦建立汉朝。他接收了秦国府库的律令图书，掌握了全国户口、地理等重要信息，并在楚汉战争期间镇守关中，为刘邦提供稳固的后方和源源不断的兵员粮饷，对汉朝的建立起到了决定性作用。
description.en: Xiao He assisted Liu Bang in establishing the Han dynasty. He took control of the Qin government's legal codes and archives, mastering crucial information on national household registration and geography. During the Chu-Han Contention, he defended the Guanzhong region, providing a stable rear base and a continuous supply of troops and provisions for Liu Bang, playing a decisive role in the founding of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖十二年，刘邦因猜忌萧何收买民心，以其为民请愿开放上林苑为由，将萧何下狱问罪。后经他人劝谏而释放。
description.en: In the twelfth year of Emperor Gaozu of Han's reign (195 BC), Liu Bang, suspicious that Xiao He was winning over the populace, imprisoned and charged him for petitioning to open the imperial Shanglin Park to the common people. Xiao He was later released after others interceded on his behalf.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦去世后，萧何作为相国辅佐汉惠帝。
description.en: After Liu Bang's death, Xiao He served as Chancellor of State, assisting Emperor Hui of Han.

description.zh-cn: 林彪集团的覆灭为邓小平的第三次复出创造了政治契机。
description.en: The downfall of the Lin Biao clique created a political opportunity for Deng Xiaoping's third political comeback.

description.zh-cn: 在长达13年的时间里，邓小平与刘伯承并肩作战，他们的部队被称为“刘邓大军”，共同开辟和领导了晋冀鲁豫根据地，并指挥了淮海战役和渡江战役等重大战役。
description.en: For 13 years, Deng Xiaoping and Liu Bocheng fought side by side, and their troops were known as the "Liu-Deng Army." They jointly established and led the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Base Area and commanded major campaigns such as the Huaihai Campaign and the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1925年第四次全国代表大会上设立了总书记职务。
description.en: The Communist Party of China established the post of General Secretary at its 4th National Congress in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀在1925年中共四大上当选为首任总书记。
description.en: Chen Duxiu was elected as the first General Secretary at the 4th National Congress of the CPC in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责主持中央书记处的工作。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee presides over the work of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责召集中央政治局会议，且中央政治局委员需向总书记述职。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee is responsible for convening Politburo meetings, and Politburo members must report their work to the General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责召集中央政治局常务委员会会议，且常务委员需向总书记述职。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee is responsible for convening Politburo Standing Committee meetings, and Standing Committee members must report their work to the General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1927年7月12日陈独秀被停职后，实际主持中共中央工作的是临时中央政治局常委张国焘。
description.en: After Chen Duxiu was suspended on July 12, 1927, Zhang Guotao, a member of the Provisional Politburo Standing Committee, effectively presided over the work of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫自1954年起，连续担任第一、二、三届国务院副总理。
description.en: Starting from 1954, Ulanhu served consecutively as Vice Premier of the State Council for the first, second, and third terms.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫是中共第八届中央政治局候补委员，第十一、十二届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Ulanhu was an alternate member of the Politburo of the 8th Central Committee, and a member of the Politburo of the 11th and 12th Central Committees.

description.zh-cn: 于1987年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1987.

position.en: Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆担任中共江苏省委书记期间，向以习近平为总书记的党中央负责。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee, Wu Zhenglong was subordinate to the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆被任命为江苏省代理省长，接替石泰峰。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong was appointed as the acting Governor of Jiangsu, succeeding Shi Taifeng.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，中国人民银行于1970年6月与财政部合并，后于1978年3月恢复分设。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the People's Bank of China was merged with the Ministry of Finance in June 1970 and was re-established as a separate entity in March 1978.

description.zh-cn: 蔡廷锴早年参加了同盟会。
description.en: Cai Tingkai joined the Tongmenghui in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 蔡廷锴参加了东征讨伐陈炯明的战役。
description.en: Cai Tingkai participated in the Eastern Expedition campaign against Chen Jiongming.

description.zh-cn: 在向南京进攻期间，蔡廷锴率领的第十师曾归叶挺指挥跟进。
description.en: During the attack on Nanjing, the 10th Division led by Cai Tingkai was placed under the command of Ye Ting to follow up.

description.zh-cn: 蔡廷锴在一·二八事变和抗日战争期间，率领部队与日军作战。
description.en: Cai Tingkai led troops to fight against the Japanese army during the January 28 Incident and the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1964年12月至1968年，蔡廷锴任政协全国委员会副主席。
description.en: From December 1964 to 1968, Cai Tingkai served as Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”期间，蔡廷锴作为周恩来运作保护的民主人士之一而未受冲击。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Cai Tingkai was one of the democratic figures protected by Zhou Enlai and thus avoided persecution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，杨易辰于1967年被中止黑龙江省人民委员会副省长职务。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yang Yichen's tenure as Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Committee was terminated in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要倡议者之一，提议并参与创办中国科学技术大学。
description.en: As one of the main proponents, he proposed and participated in the founding of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 郭沫若担任中国科学技术大学的首任校长。
description.en: Guo Moruo served as the first president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中苏交恶导致的战备疏散要求是中国科学技术大学被迫迁出北京的原因之一，这一搬迁对学校造成了巨大损失。
description.en: The requirement for strategic relocation due to the Sino-Soviet split was one of the reasons for the forced relocation of the University of Science and Technology of China from Beijing, a move that caused immense losses to the university.

description.zh-cn: 李政道于1978年主持创办了中国科学技术大学的少年班。
description.en: Tsung-Dao Lee presided over the establishment of the Special Class for the Gifted Young at the University of Science and Technology of China in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 川端康成毕业于东京帝国大学。
description.en: Yasunari Kawabata graduated from Tokyo Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 在斯皮罗·阿格纽辞职后，杰拉尔德·福特被尼克松提名为副总统。
description.en: Gerald Ford was nominated by Nixon to be Vice President after Spiro Agnew's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松在第二次世界大战期间于美国海军服役。
description.en: Nixon served in the U.S. Navy during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 在1960年美国总统选举中，尼克松以微弱劣势败给肯尼迪。
description.en: Nixon was narrowly defeated by Kennedy in the 1960 United States presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松于1972年对中华人民共和国进行历史性访问，开启了两国外交关系正常化的新篇章。
description.en: Nixon made a historic visit to the People's Republic of China in 1972, opening a new chapter in the normalization of diplomatic relations between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松实施“越南化”政策，逐步撤出美国军队，并最终在1973年签署《巴黎和平协约》，结束了美国的直接军事介入。
description.en: Nixon implemented the policy of "Vietnamization" to gradually withdraw U.S. troops and ultimately signed the Paris Peace Accords in 1973, ending direct U.S. military involvement.

description.zh-cn: 在1973年赎罪日战争期间，尼克松下令对以色列进行大规模空运军事援助，行动代号“五分钱救援行动”，这对于扭转战局至关重要。
description.en: During the 1973 Yom Kippur War, Nixon ordered a massive military airlift to Israel, codenamed Operation Nickel Grass, which was crucial in turning the tide of the war.

description.zh-cn: 福特总统宣布给予尼克松“全面、自由且绝对的赦免”，使其免受因水门事件而可能面临的任何刑事起诉。
description.en: President Ford granted Nixon a "full, free, and absolute pardon," protecting him from any criminal prosecution for his actions in the Watergate scandal.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，尼克松应卡特总统邀请，在白宫参加接待时任中国国务院副总理邓小平的国宴，并与其私下会晤。
description.en: In 1979, at President Carter's invitation, Nixon attended a state dinner at the White House for visiting Chinese Vice Premier Deng Xiaoping and held a private meeting with him.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案删除了宪法中关于中华人民共和国主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定，取消了任期限制。
description.en: The amendment removed the provision in the constitution that the President of the People's Republic of China 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms', thereby abolishing term limits for the office.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案将“习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想”写入宪法序言，确立了其国家指导思想的地位。
description.en: The amendment added 'Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era' to the preamble of the constitution, establishing its status as a national guiding ideology.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案在宪法中增设“监察委员会”一节，为设立国家监察委员会提供了宪法依据。
