description.en: The amendment added a new section on 'Supervisory Commissions' to the constitution, providing the constitutional basis for the establishment of the National Supervisory Commission.

relationships.target: BAIDU:蚂蚁科技集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 马云是蚂蚁集团的创始人。
description.en: Ma Yun is the founder of Ant Group.

relationships.target: BAIDU:蚂蚁科技集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行联合其他金融管理部门对蚂蚁集团进行了多次监管约谈，并督促其进行整改。
description.en: The People's Bank of China, along with other financial regulatory authorities, conducted multiple regulatory talks with Ant Group and urged it to carry out rectification.

relationships.target: BAIDU:蚂蚁科技集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国证监会联合其他金融管理部门对蚂蚁集团进行了多次监管约谈和整改，并于2023年7月7日对其处以71.23亿元人民币的罚款。
description.en: The China Securities Regulatory Commission, along with other financial regulatory authorities, conducted multiple regulatory talks and rectification with Ant Group, and imposed a fine of 7.123 billion RMB on it on July 7, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 江志成是江泽民的孙子。
description.en: Jiang Zhicheng is the grandson of Jiang Zemin.

relationships.source: BAIDU:蚂蚁科技集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 通过调整股东上层结构，蚂蚁集团宣布不再存在任何直接或间接股东单一或共同控制公司的情形，马云因此失去了对公司的实际控制权，投票权降至6.2%。
description.en: By adjusting its upper-level shareholder structure, Ant Group announced that no single or joint direct or indirect shareholder controls the company, resulting in Jack Ma losing actual control and his voting rights being reduced to 6.2%.

description.zh-cn: 为确定民族区域自治制度，毛泽东曾咨询主管民族工作的李维汉。
description.en: To establish the system of regional ethnic autonomy, Mao Zedong consulted with Li Weihan, who was in charge of ethnic affairs.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是韩国的宗室公子。
description.en: Han Fei was a prince of the royal clan of the state of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感联系上的治国理念，主张将人的自利本性作为社会秩序建立的前提。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian idea of governance based on personal emotional connections, arguing that the establishment of social order should be premised on human nature's self-interest.

description.zh-cn: 张阳担任新组建的中央军事委员会政治工作部首任主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the first director of the newly established Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张阳担任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Director of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as a member of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1969年5月加入中国共产党，2018年10月16日被开除党籍。
description.en: Zhang Yang joined the Communist Party of China in May 1969 and was expelled from the party on October 16, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1991年10月进入中国人民解放军国防大学基本系学习，为期一年。
description.en: In October 1991, Zhang Yang began a one-year course of study in the Basic Department of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1996年毕业于中共中央党校行政管理专业。
description.en: Zhang Yang graduated from the Central Party School with a major in Public Administration in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 张阳因涉及徐才厚等案问题线索而被中央军委调查，最终导致其自杀身亡。
description.en: Zhang Yang was investigated by the Central Military Commission for his involvement in cases related to Xu Caihou, which ultimately led to his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 两人同为中央军委委员，于2017年8月几乎同时接受组织调查并从公众视线中消失。
description.en: Both were members of the Central Military Commission and disappeared from public view around the same time in August 2017 after being placed under investigation.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央批准对张阳进行组织谈话并调查，最终于2018年10月16日决定开除其党籍。
description.en: The Central Committee of the CPC approved the investigation into Zhang Yang, and ultimately decided to expel him from the party on October 16, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委决定对张阳进行组织谈话、调查核实其问题线索，并最终开除其军籍、取消其上将军衔。
description.en: The Central Military Commission decided to investigate Zhang Yang, which led to his expulsion from the military and the revocation of his general rank.

description.zh-cn: 王稼祥担任中华人民共和国第一任驻苏联大使。
description.en: Wang Jiaxiang served as the first ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 王稼祥在1932年宁都会议上支持毛泽东，此后在长征途中与毛泽东、张闻天结成同盟，并在遵义会议等关键时刻坚定支持毛泽东。两人的密切关系直到1962年因“三和一少”问题而破裂。
description.en: Wang Jiaxiang supported Mao Zedong at the Ningdu Conference in 1932. Later, during the Long March, he formed an alliance with Mao Zedong and Zhang Wentian, and firmly supported Mao at critical moments such as the Zunyi Conference. Their close relationship lasted until 1962 when it broke down over the 'Three Reconciliations and One Reduction' issue.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，王稼祥因早前提出的“三和一少”路线而被打倒，遭到康生等人长期批斗和审查，身心受到严重摧残。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Jiaxiang was overthrown due to his earlier proposal of the 'Three Reconciliations and One Reduction' line. He was subjected to long-term denunciation and investigation by Kang Sheng and others, suffering severe physical and mental torment.

description.zh-cn: 康生在文化大革命初期到中联部煽动批斗，喊出“打倒刘邓王”的口号，并升级批判王稼祥的“三和一少”为“三降一灭”，是迫害王稼祥的主要人物之一。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Kang Sheng went to the International Liaison Department to incite struggle sessions, shouting the slogan 'Down with Liu, Deng, and Wang.' He escalated the criticism of Wang Jiaxiang's 'Three Reconciliations and One Reduction' to 'Three Surrenders and One Extinction,' and was one of the main figures in Wang Jiaxiang's persecution.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，宋时轮参与指挥部队阻击国民党军对黄百韬兵团的增援，保障了围歼行动的胜利。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, Song Shilun participated in commanding troops to block KMT reinforcements for Huang Baitao's army group, ensuring the victory of the encirclement and annihilation operation.

description.zh-cn: 宋时轮在朝鲜战争中指挥中国人民志愿军第九兵团参与长津湖战役。
description.en: During the Korean War, Song Shilun commanded the 9th Army Group of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Battle of Chosin Reservoir.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年军委扩大会议上，彭德怀批判了宋时轮。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Peng Dehuai criticized Song Shilun.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，宋时轮被造反派批判为“三反分子”。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Song Shilun was criticized by rebels as a "three-anti element".

position.zh-cn: 军事调处执行部中共方面执行处处长
position.en: Chief of the CPC Section of the Beiping Executive Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 在北平军事调处执行部，宋时轮协助中共代表叶剑英进行谈判。
description.en: At the Beiping Executive Headquarters, Song Shilun assisted CPC representative Ye Jianying in negotiations.

position.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军副司令员
position.en: Deputy Commander of the People's Volunteer Army

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，宋时轮担任中国人民志愿军副司令员，在司令员彭德怀领导下作战。
description.en: During the Korean War, Song Shilun served as the Deputy Commander of the People's Volunteer Army, fighting under the command of Commander Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 德国发动的无限制潜艇战以及发送旨在拉拢墨西哥的“齐默尔曼电报”，促使威尔逊总统请求国会对德宣战。
description.en: Germany's unrestricted submarine warfare and the "Zimmermann Telegram" aimed at recruiting Mexico as an ally prompted President Wilson to ask Congress to declare war.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗于1100年至1126年间担任北宋皇帝。
description.en: Emperor Huizong reigned as the emperor of the Northern Song dynasty from 1100 to 1126.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗在位期间，重用蔡京为丞相。
description.en: During his reign, Emperor Huizong appointed and heavily relied on Cai Jing as his chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 蔡京与童贯等人的贪腐和滥权导致宋徽宗朝政治黑暗，民怨沸腾，激起了多次民变，严重削弱了北宋的国力。
description.en: The corruption and abuse of power by Cai Jing, Tong Guan, and others led to a politically dark era under Emperor Huizong, causing widespread public discontent and triggering multiple rebellions, which severely weakened the Northern Song state.

description.zh-cn: 在靖康之变中，宋徽宗被金军俘虏北上，并被金太宗下诏废为庶人。
description.en: During the Jingkang Incident, Emperor Huizong was captured by Jin forces and taken north. Emperor Taizong of Jin later issued an edict demoting him to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 第三国际（共产国际）是由苏联共产党主导的国际组织。
description.en: The Third International (Comintern) was an international organization dominated by the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1931年11月7日，中国共产党在苏联支援下于江西瑞金成立中华苏维埃共和国。
description.en: On November 7, 1931, the Communist Party of China, with the support of the Soviet Union, established the Chinese Soviet Republic in Ruijin, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，国际刑警组织的运作几乎完全停滞，直到战争结束后才得以恢复。
description.en: During World War II, Interpol's operations became almost completely stagnant and were only restored after the war ended.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1984年申请并于1986年正式加入国际刑警组织。
description.en: The People's Republic of China applied in 1984 and officially joined Interpol in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 被指控通过提供巨额捐款来影响国际刑警组织，并成功使其内政部监察长艾哈迈德·纳赛尔·莱西当选为组织主席，引发了对其公正性的担忧。
description.en: Accused of influencing Interpol by providing large donations and successfully getting its Ministry of Interior Inspector General, Ahmed Naser Al-Raisi, elected as the organization's president, raising concerns about its impartiality.

description.zh-cn: 被指控将国际刑警组织的机制武器化，利用逮捕令和吊销护照等手段来骚扰和追捕合法的批评者、反对派人士和记者。
description.en: Accused of weaponizing Interpol's mechanisms, using arrest warrants and passport revocations to harass and pursue legitimate critics, opposition figures, and journalists.

description.zh-cn: 经济史学家的普遍看法是，大萧条以第二次世界大战的爆发而终结，战争相关的政府支出刺激了经济复苏。
description.en: The consensus among economic historians is that the Great Depression ended with the outbreak of World War II, as government spending related to the war stimulated economic recovery.

description.zh-cn: 大萧条对德国威玛共和国造成了毁灭性打击，失业率飙升，社会动荡，为纳粹党等极端主义势力崛起并最终上台创造了条件。
description.en: The Great Depression dealt a devastating blow to Germany's Weimar Republic, causing soaring unemployment and social unrest, which created the conditions for extremist forces like the Nazi Party to rise and eventually take power.

description.zh-cn: 阿道夫·希特勒是纳粹党的领袖。
description.en: Adolf Hitler was the leader of the Nazi Party.

description.zh-cn: 大萧条发生在其总统任内，由于他未能有效应对危机，其政治声望受到严重打击，并导致了民众的广泛不满。
description.en: The Great Depression began during his presidency, and his failure to effectively address the crisis severely damaged his political reputation and led to widespread public discontent.

description.zh-cn: 菩提达摩被尊为将禅宗由印度传入中国的第一位祖师。
description.en: Bodhidharma is revered as the first patriarch who transmitted Zen from India to China.

description.zh-cn: 菩提达摩于刘宋时期抵达中国广州，开始传授禅法。
description.en: Bodhidharma arrived in Guangzhou, China, during the Liu Song dynasty and began teaching Zen.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大上，胡春华未能连任中央政治局委员，彻底失去隔代接班人地位。
description.en: At the 20th CCP National Congress, Hu Chunhua failed to be re-elected as a member of the Politburo, completely losing his status as a potential successor.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗朱翊钧于1572年登基，在位48年，是明朝在位时间最长的皇帝。
description.en: The Wanli Emperor, Zhu Yijun, ascended the throne in 1572 and reigned for 48 years, the longest reign of any Ming Dynasty emperor.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼自2018年3月17日起担任第十三届、第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: Ding Zhongli has served as the Vice Chairperson of the 13th and 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress since March 17, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 在栗战书担任第十三届全国人大常委会委员长期间，丁仲礼任副委员长。
description.en: When Li Zhanshu was the Chairman of the 13th NPCSC, Ding Zhongli served as a Vice Chairperson.

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任第十四届全国人大常委会委员长期间，丁仲礼任副委员长。
description.en: While Zhao Leji serves as the Chairman of the 14th NPCSC, Ding Zhongli is a Vice Chairperson.

description.zh-cn: 因香港问题，美国国务院宣布对包括丁仲礼在内的全部14名第十三届全国人大常委会副委员长实施制裁。
description.en: Due to issues related to Hong Kong, the U.S. Department of State announced sanctions against all 14 vice chairpersons of the 13th NPCSC, including Ding Zhongli.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝是嘉庆帝的次子。
description.en: The Daoguang Emperor was the second son of the Jiaqing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝在驾崩当日降下朱笔谕旨，立皇四子奕𬣞（咸丰帝）为皇太子，继承大统。
description.en: On the day of his death, the Daoguang Emperor issued an imperial edict in his own hand, establishing his fourth son Yizhu (the Xianfeng Emperor) as Crown Prince to succeed to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝是乾隆帝的孙子。
description.en: The Daoguang Emperor was the grandson of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱棣是朱标的弟弟。官方说法中他们是同母兄弟，均为马皇后所生。
description.en: Zhu Di was Zhu Biao's younger brother. According to the official account, they were full brothers, both born to Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教是以《古兰经》为根本基础的宗教。
description.en: Islam is a religion fundamentally based on the Quran.

description.zh-cn: 奥斯曼帝国的扩张使伊斯兰教从麦加向大西洋及太平洋的方向扩散。
description.en: The expansion of the Ottoman Empire caused Islam to spread from Mecca towards the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.

description.zh-cn: 在中国文化大革命期间，许多清真寺被关闭，伊斯兰教的宗教活动被禁止。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution in China, many mosques were closed and Islamic religious activities were banned.

description.zh-cn: 卞仲耘在文化大革命初期，被其学校的红卫兵学生批斗殴打致死。
description.en: Bian Zhongyun was beaten to death by her Red Guard students during a struggle session at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 萧衍迫使南齐和帝禅位，建立南梁，成为开国皇帝。
description.en: Xiao Yan forced Emperor He of Southern Qi to abdicate, established the Liang dynasty, and became its founding emperor.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统吉米·卡特宣布与中华人民共和国建立外交关系。
description.en: U.S. President Jimmy Carter announced the establishment of diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李长春是中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Changchun was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 罗一秀是毛岸青的嫡母。
description.en: Luo Yixiu was Mao Anqing's formal stepmother.

description.zh-cn: 贺子珍是毛岸青的继母。
description.en: He Zizhen was Mao Anqing's stepmother.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛岸青的继母。
description.en: Jiang Qing was Mao Anqing's stepmother.

description.zh-cn: 应董健吾请求，张学良帮助安排将毛岸英、毛岸青兄弟送往苏联学习。
description.en: At the request of Dong Jianwu, Zhang Xueliang helped arrange for the brothers Mao Anying and Mao Anqing to be sent to the Soviet Union to study.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英、毛岸青兄弟在抵达巴黎后，见到了专程前来迎接的中共驻共产国际代表团副团长康生。
description.en: After arriving in Paris, the brothers Mao Anying and Mao Anqing met Kang Sheng, deputy head of the CCP delegation to the Comintern, who had come specifically to welcome them.

position.en: Grand Marshal, General Who Conquers the West, etc.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾是曹魏后期的重要将领和官员。
description.en: Deng Ai was a prominent general and official in the late period of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿赏识邓艾的才能，将其辟为太尉府掾属，并升任尚书郎。
description.en: Sima Yi appreciated Deng Ai's talent, appointing him as an aide in the Grand Marshal's office and promoting him to Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾多年在曹魏西线防御并进攻蜀汉，最终率军灭蜀。
description.en: For many years, Deng Ai defended against and attacked Shu Han on Cao Wei's western front, eventually leading the army that conquered Shu.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾与姜维是长期的军事对手，在多次战役中交锋。
description.en: Deng Ai and Jiang Wei were long-term military adversaries who clashed in multiple battles.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾率军奇袭成都，逼使蜀汉皇帝刘禅投降。
description.en: Deng Ai led a surprise attack on Chengdu, forcing the Shu Han emperor Liu Shan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 司马昭因对邓艾居功自傲产生疑忌，听信钟会诬告后下令收捕邓艾。
description.en: Sima Zhao became suspicious of Deng Ai's arrogance and, believing Zhong Hui's accusations, ordered Deng Ai's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 16岁时受文化大革命影响，黄奇帆被迫辍学进入工厂当工人。
description.en: At the age of 16, affected by the Cultural Revolution, Huang Qifan was forced to drop out of school and become a factory worker.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央任命黄奇帆为中共重庆市委副书记，提名为重庆市市长候选人。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee appointed Huang Qifan as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and nominated him as a candidate for Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在薄熙来担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Bo Xilai was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在张德江担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Zhang Dejiang was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在孙政才担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Sun Zhengcai was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，在黄奇帆辞去市长职务时，其工作得到了时任市委书记孙政才的高度评价。
description.en: Reportedly, when Huang Qifan resigned as mayor, his work was highly praised by then-Party Secretary Sun Zhengcai.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在上海任职期间，吴邦国是中共上海市委书记。
description.en: During Huang Qifan's tenure in Shanghai, Wu Bangguo was the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在上海任职期间，黄菊是中共上海市委书记。
description.en: During Huang Qifan's tenure in Shanghai, Huang Ju was the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陪同中华人民共和国主席习近平访问美国。
description.en: Accompanied President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping on a visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 在梁振英担任行政长官期间，李家超任保安局副局长。
description.en: John Lee served as the Under Secretary for Security during Leung Chun-ying's tenure as Chief Executive.

description.zh-cn: 因应美国的制裁令，Google公司旗下的YouTube平台停用了李家超的个人竞选频道。
description.en: In compliance with U.S. sanctions, Google's YouTube platform terminated John Lee's personal campaign channel.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜在征锦州时屡次击败吴三桂所率领的明军。
description.en: During the campaign for Jinzhou, Oboi repeatedly defeated the Ming forces led by Wu Sangui.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜在征讨大西军时阵斩其首领张献忠。
description.en: During the campaign against the Daxi army, Oboi killed its leader Zhang Xianzhong in battle.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2014年9月19日在纽约证券交易所挂牌上市。
description.en: Alibaba Group was listed on the New York Stock Exchange on September 19, 2014.

description.zh-cn: 禹元植访问中华人民共和国期间与中共中央总书记习近平会面。
禹元植访问中华人民共和国期间与全国人大常委会委员长赵乐际会面。
禹元植访问中国参加活动期间与朝鲜劳动党总书记金正恩进行了简短对话。
伊斯兰国的前身“统一圣战组织”于2004年10月宣布效忠基地组织，成为其伊拉克分支。2014年2月，基地组织宣布与其断绝所有联系。
description.en: The Islamic State's predecessor, 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', pledged allegiance to Al-Qaeda in October 2004, becoming its Iraqi branch. In February 2014, Al-Qaeda announced it was severing all ties with the group.

description.zh-cn: 2014年2月，基地组织因认为伊斯兰国过于极端、残忍，宣布与其切断所有联系，并谴责其恶行。
description.en: In February 2014, Al-Qaeda severed all ties with the Islamic State, deeming it too extreme and brutal, and condemned its actions.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国的领导人声称，2003年发动的伊拉克战争是他们发起对美国圣战的原因。
description.en: Leaders of the Islamic State claimed that the 2003 Iraq War was the reason for them to launch a jihad against the United States.

description.zh-cn: 沙特阿拉伯等海湾逊尼派国家被指对伊斯兰国提供了或明或暗的支持和资助，以对抗什叶派国家。
description.en: Gulf Sunni states like Saudi Arabia have been accused of providing overt or covert support and funding to the Islamic State to counter Shia nations.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国与塔利班相互敌视，巴格达迪曾辱骂塔利班领袖，塔利班则发布教令宣布伊斯兰国为非法组织，双方在阿富汗发生过武装冲突。
description.en: The Islamic State and the Taliban are hostile to each other. Baghdadi insulted the Taliban leader, and the Taliban issued a fatwa declaring the Islamic State an illegal organization. The two sides have engaged in armed conflict in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 王冶坪是江泽民的妻子。
description.en: Wang Yeping is the wife of Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民于1946年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Jiang Zemin joined the Chinese Communist Party in April 1946.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民担任第十三届（四中全会起）、十四届、十五届中共中央总书记。
description.en: Jiang Zemin served as General Secretary of the 13th (from the 4th Plenary Session), 14th, and 15th Central Committees of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平的支持下，江泽民在中共十四大上解除了杨尚昆及其弟杨白冰的军职，巩固了对军队的控制，此事被称为“杨家将事件”。
description.en: With Deng Xiaoping's support, Jiang Zemin removed Yang Shangkun and his brother Yang Baibing from their military posts at the 14th Party Congress, consolidating his control over the army in what became known as the 'Yang Family Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平的支持下，江泽民在中共十四大上解除了杨白冰及其兄杨尚昆的军职，巩固了对军队的控制，此事被称为“杨家将事件”。
description.en: With Deng Xiaoping's support, Jiang Zemin removed Yang Baibing and his brother Yang Shangkun from their military posts at the 14th Party Congress, consolidating his control over the army in what became known as the 'Yang Family Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 江世俊是江泽民的生父。
description.en: Jiang Shijun was Jiang Zemin's biological father.

description.zh-cn: 1941年4月3日，罗瑞卿与郝治平在辽县桐峪镇结婚。
description.en: On April 3, 1941, Luo Ruiqing and Hao Zhiping married in Tongyu Town, Liao County.

description.zh-cn: 1928年10月，经任伯芳介绍在上海转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: In October 1928, through the introduction of Ren Bofang, he became a member of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿在太原战役期间协助徐向前指挥作战。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing assisted Xu Xiangqian in commanding operations during the Taiyuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，叶群作为林彪的同伙，参与了对罗瑞卿的政治攻击。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Ye Qun, as an accomplice of Lin Biao, participated in the political attacks against Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，吴法宪作为林彪的同伙，参与了对罗瑞卿的政治攻击。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Wu Faxian, as an accomplice of Lin Biao, participated in the political attacks against Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，李作鹏作为林彪的同伙，参与了对罗瑞卿的政治攻击。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Li Zuopeng, as an accomplice of Lin Biao, participated in the political attacks against Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 解放战争时期，罗瑞卿与聂荣臻在晋察冀军区共事。
description.en: During the Chinese Civil War, Luo Ruiqing worked with Nie Rongzhen in the Jin-Cha-Ji Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 慈安太后是咸丰帝的正室皇后。
description.en: Empress Dowager Ci'an was the primary consort and empress of the Xianfeng Emperor.

position.zh-cn: 副研究员、副教授、正教授、米海洛·卜平物理学教授
position.en: Associate Research Scientist, Associate Professor, Professor, Michael I. Pupin Professor of Physics

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄自二战结束后一直在哥伦比亚大学任教，直至1981年退休。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu taught at Columbia University from the end of World War II until her retirement in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 通过吴氏实验在实验上首次验证了弱相互作用中的宇称不守恒。
description.en: Experimentally verified parity non-conservation in weak interactions for the first time through the Wu experiment.

description.zh-cn: 关于宇称不守恒的理论工作使李政道（与杨振宁）获得了1957年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: The theoretical work on parity non-conservation led to Tsung-Dao Lee (with Chen-Ning Yang) receiving the 1957 Nobel Prize in Physics.

description.zh-cn: 关于宇称不守恒的理论工作使杨振宁（与李政道）获得了1957年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: The theoretical work on parity non-conservation led to Chen-Ning Yang (with Tsung-Dao Lee) receiving the 1957 Nobel Prize in Physics.

description.zh-cn: 请求吴健雄对宇称不守恒理论进行实验验证。
description.en: Requested Chien-Shiung Wu to perform an experimental test of the parity non-conservation theory.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，吴健雄回国访问时受到周恩来接见，周恩来就其亲人在文革中的遭遇向她致歉。
description.en: In 1973, when Chien-Shiung Wu visited China, she was received by Zhou Enlai, who apologized for the persecution her relatives suffered during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 声明若李朝卿在交保后复职回任县长，将号召人民到南投县政府前抗议。
description.en: Stated that if Li Chao-ching were reinstated as county magistrate after being released on bail, he would call on people to protest in front of the Nantou County Government.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，中央研究院被迫西迁至昆明、桂林、四川李庄等地。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Academia Sinica was forced to relocate westward to places like Kunming, Guilin, and Lizhuang in Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 2020年3月发生院内群聚感染事件，2021年12月一名P3实验室研究助理因违反SOP而染疫。
description.en: A cluster infection occurred within the institution in March 2020, and in December 2021, a research assistant in a P3 laboratory was infected due to an SOP violation.

description.zh-cn: 在马克思主义理论中，社会主义是向共产主义过渡的阶段。
description.en: In Marxist theory, socialism is the transitional stage towards communism.

description.zh-cn: 自习近平开始，新任的中共中央总书记原则上同时接任中共中央军委主席，并相应接任中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Starting with Xi Jinping, the new General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, in principle, concurrently assumes the chairmanship of the CPC Central Military Commission and, accordingly, the chairmanship of the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 胡善祥被废后，孙氏被立为新后。张太后在宫廷宴会上将胡氏的座位安排在孙皇后之上，孙皇后对此怏怏不乐，显示了两人之间的紧张关系。
description.en: After Hu Shanxiang was deposed, Lady Sun was made the new empress. Empress Dowager Zhang placed Hu's seat above Empress Sun's at court banquets, which displeased Empress Sun, indicating the tense relationship between them.

description.zh-cn: 洪武十五年，因吴沉、杨枢举荐，明太祖朱元璋召见了方孝孺。
description.en: In the 15th year of the Hongwu era (1382), upon the recommendation of Wu Chen and Yang Shu, the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang summoned and met with Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝即位后，即召方孝孺入京委以重任，处理国家大事也会征求他的意见。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Jianwen Emperor summoned Fang Xiaoru to the capital and entrusted him with important responsibilities, also consulting him on major state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺在建文朝先后出任翰林侍讲及翰林学士。
description.en: During the Jianwen era, Fang Xiaoru successively served as Expositor-in-waiting and Academician at the Hanlin Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役中，方孝孺为建文帝起草讨伐朱棣的诏书，并在城破后拒绝为其草拟即位诏书，最终被杀。
description.en: During the Jingnan campaign, Fang Xiaoru drafted edicts denouncing Zhu Di for the Jianwen Emperor, and after the capital fell, he refused to draft the accession edict for Zhu Di, which led to his execution.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役期间，为建文帝起草讨伐燕王朱棣的诏书檄文。
description.en: During the Jingnan campaign, he drafted imperial edicts and military proclamations against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, for the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 南明弘光帝追赠方孝孺为太师，谥号“文正”。
description.en: The Hongguang Emperor of the Southern Ming posthumously honored Fang Xiaoru with the title of Grand Preceptor and the posthumous name 'Wenzheng'.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1959年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Ruihuan joined the Communist Party of China in September 1959.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1987年至1989年间担任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as the Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee from 1987 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1987年当选为中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Li Ruihuan was elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环在中共十三届四中全会上被增补为中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Ruihuan was elevated to the Politburo Standing Committee at the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1989年至2002年担任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC from 1989 to 2002.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环和乔石在各自职权范围内合作，尽可能地保护了一些知识分子。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Ruihuan and Qiao Shi cooperated within their respective authorities to protect some intellectuals as much as possible.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环卸任全国政协主席后，由贾庆林接任。
description.en: After Li Ruihuan stepped down as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, he was succeeded by Jia Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 在主政天津期间，李瑞环以务实精神为民众办实事，兴建了引滦入津等一系列民生工程，在民众中取得相当不错的声誉。
description.en: During his tenure governing Tianjin, Li Ruihuan implemented practical projects for the public, including the Luan River Diversion Project, earning a very good reputation among the citizens.

description.zh-cn: 何晶在Facebook上转发了一篇批评习近平外交政策的文章，该文章将习近平的作风比作“黑帮老大”。
description.en: Ho Ching reposted an article on Facebook criticizing Xi Jinping's foreign policy, which likened his style to that of a 'mafia boss'.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三自1993年起担任日本众议院议员，直至在任内去世。
description.en: Shinzo Abe served as a member of the House of Representatives of Japan from 1993 until his death in office.

description.zh-cn: 小泉纯一郎任命安倍晋三为内阁官房长官，并推举其为接班人，为安倍首次担任首相铺平了道路。
description.en: Junichiro Koizumi appointed Shinzo Abe as Chief Cabinet Secretary and endorsed him as his successor, paving the way for Abe's first term as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三与俄罗斯总统普丁多次会谈，两人情谊深厚，致力于解决两国间的领土争端。
description.en: Shinzo Abe and Russian President Vladimir Putin held numerous meetings, developing a strong rapport in their efforts to resolve the territorial dispute between their countries.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝遗诏命张廷玉为辅政大臣，辅佐乾隆帝处理政务。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor's will appointed Zhang Tingyu as a regent to assist the Qianlong Emperor in handling government affairs.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平执政时期曾经出任中国国家主席。
description.en: Served as the President of the People's Republic of China during Deng Xiaoping's administration.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平执政时期曾经出任全国政协主席。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference during Deng Xiaoping's administration.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲是中国人民解放军空军上将。
description.en: Liu Yazhou is a General in the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 苏联支持中国共产党建立中华苏维埃共和国。
description.en: The Soviet Union supported the Communist Party of China in establishing the Chinese Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 第三国际（共产国际）支持中国共产党建立中华苏维埃共和国。
description.en: The Third International (Comintern) supported the Communist Party of China in establishing the Chinese Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变后，中华民国与中华苏维埃共和国停战，为后续国共合作抗日奠定了基础。
description.en: After the Xi'an Incident, the Republic of China and the Chinese Soviet Republic ceased hostilities, laying the foundation for the subsequent KMT-CPC cooperation against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 为争夺朝鲜半岛的控制权，新罗与唐朝爆发了罗唐战争。
description.en: Silla and the Tang dynasty went to war (the Silla-Tang War) for control over the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝设置鸡林州都督府，名义上将新罗纳入其管辖体系，进行羁縻统治。
description.en: The Tang dynasty established the Area Command of Jilin, nominally incorporating Silla into its administrative system under a 'loose-rein' policy.

position.en: Deputy Chief of the General Staff

description.zh-cn: 1954年10月至1962年2月，李克农担任中国人民解放军副总参谋长。
description.en: From October 1954 to February 1962, Li Kenong served as the Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在李克农担任副总参谋长期间，粟裕是其上级总参谋长。
description.en: During Li Kenong's tenure as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Su Yu was his superior, the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 李克农于1926年冬加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Kenong joined the Chinese Communist Party in the winter of 1926.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞获取了顾顺章叛变的情报，并设法通知李克农，使得中共中央机关得以安全转移。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei obtained intelligence about Gu Shunzhang's defection and managed to inform Li Kenong, enabling the safe evacuation of the CCP central organs.

degree.en: Master of Arts, PhD in Aesthetics

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波于1982年考入北京师范大学中文系攻读硕士，1984年获硕士学位；1986年成为该系博士研究生，1988年获博士学位。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo enrolled in the Chinese Department of Beijing Normal University for his master's degree in 1982, receiving it in 1984; he became a doctoral candidate in the same department in 1986 and received his PhD in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波获得博士学位后留校任教，后因参与六四事件于1989年9月被开除公职。
description.en: After receiving his doctorate, Liu Xiaobo remained at the university as a lecturer, but was dismissed from public office in September 1989 for his involvement in the June Fourth Incident.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波积极参与八九学运，并与周舵、高新、侯德健共同发表《六·二绝食宣言》，在天安门广场绝食，被称为“天安门广场四君子”。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo actively participated in the 1989 student movement, co-authoring the 'June Second Hunger Strike Declaration' with Zhou Duo, Gao Xin, and Hou Dejian, and went on a hunger strike in Tiananmen Square, becoming known as one of the 'Four Gentlemen of Tiananmen Square'.

description.zh-cn: 与周舵、高新、侯德健共同发起“六二绝食宣言”，并一同在天安门广场绝食，被称为“天安门广场四君子”。
description.en: Co-initiated the 'June Second Hunger Strike Declaration' with Zhou Duo, Gao Xin, and Hou Dejian, and went on hunger strike together in Tiananmen Square, known as the 'Four Gentlemen of Tiananmen Square'.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·默茨于2025年5月6日接替朔尔茨成为德国总理。
description.en: Friedrich Merz succeeded Scholz as Chancellor of Germany on May 6, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨应时任中国国务院总理李克强的邀请，对中国进行正式访问。
description.en: Scholz paid an official visit to China at the invitation of then-Premier of the State Council of China, Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨在担任总理期间两次访问中国，并与中国国家主席习近平举行会晤。
description.en: During his chancellorship, Scholz visited China twice and met with Chinese President Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨应中国国务院总理李强的邀请，于2024年4月对中国进行访问。
description.en: Scholz visited China in April 2024 at the invitation of Chinese Premier Li Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，梅兰芳加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1959, Mei Lanfang joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳得到中共领导人毛泽东赏识，毛泽东甚至称呼他为“梅老板”。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was appreciated by the CCP leader Mao Zedong, who even called him 'Boss Mei'.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳拒绝为汪精卫国民政府演出，并蓄须明志。
description.en: Mei Lanfang refused to perform for the Wang Jingwei regime and grew a beard to show his determination.

description.zh-cn: 1930年访美期间，南加州大学授予梅兰芳文学荣誉博士学位。
description.en: During his visit to the US in 1930, the University of Southern California awarded Mei Lanfang an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.

description.zh-cn: 东风汽车公司总部位于武汉。
description.en: Dongfeng Motor Corporation is headquartered in Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 元帅彭德怀在文革期间遭到残酷迫害，最终致死。
description.en: Marshal Peng Dehuai was brutally persecuted during the Cultural Revolution, which ultimately led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月8日，苏联对日宣战，并出兵中国东北，迅速击溃了日本关东军，加速了日本的投降。
description.en: On August 8, 1945, the Soviet Union declared war on Japan and dispatched troops to Northeast China, quickly defeating the Kwantung Army and accelerating Japan's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 弘光帝朱由崧是朱常洵的长子。
description.en: The Hongguang Emperor, Zhu Yousong, was the eldest son of Zhu Changxun.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯十四年，李自成攻克洛阳，杀害了福王朱常洵。
description.en: In 1641, Li Zicheng captured Luoyang and killed the Prince of Fu, Zhu Changxun.

description.zh-cn: 在国本之争中，朱常洵与皇长子朱常洛争夺皇太子之位，二人成为政治上的对手。
description.en: During the Struggle for the Succession, Zhu Changxun competed with the emperor's eldest son, Zhu Changluo, for the position of crown prince, making them political rivals.

description.zh-cn: 1644年，朱由崧在南京即位，建立南明弘光政权。
description.en: In 1644, Zhu Yousong ascended the throne in Nanjing, establishing the Hongguang regime of the Southern Ming.

description.zh-cn: 弘光帝即位后，追谥其父朱常洵为孝皇帝。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Hongguang Emperor posthumously honored his father, Zhu Changxun, as Emperor Xiao.

description.zh-cn: 永历帝追封朱常洵庙号为恭宗。
description.en: The Yongli Emperor posthumously granted Zhu Changxun the temple name Gongzong.

description.zh-cn: 曾多次劝诫张飞，指出其刑罚过当、鞭打士卒后却将他们留在身边的行事方式是取祸之道。
description.en: He had repeatedly warned Zhang Fei that his practice of excessively punishing and flogging soldiers, yet keeping them by his side, was a path to disaster.

description.zh-cn: 海伍德死亡案的复查揭示了谷开来的罪行，成为薄熙来案的重要背景和调查内容之一。
description.en: The re-investigation of the Neil Heywood death case revealed Gu Kailai's crime, becoming an important background and part of the investigation in the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 周永康与薄熙来关系密切，据报道他曾抵制中央免去薄熙来职务的决定，并向薄泄露机密信息。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang had close ties to Bo Xilai; he reportedly resisted the central government's decision to remove Bo and leaked confidential information to him.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记江泽民支持免除薄熙来职务的决定，并称薄的问题已突破了人类文明的底线。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Jiang Zemin supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his posts, stating that Bo's issues had broken the bottom line of human civilization.

description.zh-cn: 张德江接替薄熙来出任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Zhang Dejiang succeeded Bo Xilai as the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 受薄熙来案影响，其兄薄熙永（化名李学明）于2012年4月25日辞去中国光大集团执行董事兼副总经理职务。
description.en: Affected by the Bo Xilai case, his elder brother Bo Xiyong (alias Li Xueming) resigned from his positions as Executive Director and Deputy General Manager of China Everbright Group on April 25, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙永是薄熙来的兄长。
description.en: Bo Xiyong is Bo Xilai's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 中央巡视组批评孙政才主政的重庆清除“薄、王”遗毒不够彻底，这成为孙政才后来被查处的原因之一。
description.en: The Central Inspection Group criticized Chongqing under Sun Zhengcai's leadership for inadequately eliminating the 'pernicious influence' of Bo and Wang, which became one of the reasons for Sun's subsequent investigation.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来曾任中共中央政治局委员，直至2012年4月10日被停止职务。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee until he was suspended from the position on April 10, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在位期间采取亲近苏联的立场。
description.en: During his time in power, Lê Duẩn adopted a pro-Soviet stance.

description.zh-cn: 在黎笋的领导下，越南民主共和国（北越）统一了越南共和国（南越）。
description.en: Under the leadership of Lê Duẩn, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) unified the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀是北洋军阀系统的一个主要派系。
description.en: The Fengtian clique was a major faction within the Beiyang warlord system.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖是奉系军阀的创始人。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was the founder of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 张学良在张作霖死后成为奉系军阀的首领。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang became the leader of the Fengtian clique after the death of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 奉系与日本之间也存在冲突。
description.en: There were also conflicts between the Fengtian clique and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次直奉战争中，奉系以五十万大洋重赂冯玉祥，使其倒戈直系。
description.en: During the Second Zhili-Fengtian War, the Fengtian clique heavily bribed Feng Yuxiang with 500,000 silver dollars, causing him to defect from the Zhili clique.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次直奉战争中，张学良指挥奉军包围吴佩孚主力，缴械纳降3万余人。
description.en: During the Second Zhili-Fengtian War, Zhang Xueliang commanded the Fengtian army to surround Wu Peifu's main force, disarming and accepting the surrender of over 30,000 troops.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄作为奉系大学派的代表，后来反叛奉系。
description.en: Guo Songling, as a representative of the 'university faction' within the Fengtian clique, later rebelled against the clique.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚成立后，东姑阿都拉曼继续担任首相。
description.en: After the formation of Malaysia, Tunku Abdul Rahman continued to serve as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 因反对马来西亚成立，印度尼西亚与马来西亚爆发了为期三年的武装冲突，即“马印对抗”。
description.en: Due to its opposition to the formation of Malaysia, Indonesia engaged in a three-year armed conflict with Malaysia known as the "Konfrontasi".

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪·莫哈末曾两度担任马来西亚首相。
description.en: Mahathir Mohamad served as the Prime Minister of Malaysia on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 1641年，荷兰联合柔佛攻下马六甲，结束了葡萄牙对该地的统治。
description.en: In 1641, the Dutch, in alliance with Johor, captured Malacca, ending Portuguese rule over the territory.

description.zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室是中共中央直属机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission is an institution directly under the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月，国务院精简机构，国务院外事办公室被撤销，业务并入外交部。
description.en: In June 1970, as part of the State Council's institutional streamlining, the State Council Foreign Affairs Office was abolished, and its functions were merged into the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1998年8月，中共中央、国务院决定，撤销“国务院外事办公室”，组建“中央外事办公室”。
description.en: In August 1998, the CPC Central Committee and the State Council decided to abolish the 'State Council Foreign Affairs Office' and establish the 'Central Foreign Affairs Office'.

description.zh-cn: 1942年9月，新疆省主席盛世才下令将年幼的毛远新与其母亲朱旦华一同羁押在监狱，直至1946年获释。
description.en: In September 1942, Sheng Shicai, the governor of Xinjiang Province, ordered the infant Mao Yuanxin and his mother Zhu Danhua to be imprisoned until their release in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，毛远新组织造反团，并担任辽宁省革命委员会副主任等要职，成为重要政治人物。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Mao Yuanxin organized rebel groups and held important positions such as vice-chairman of the Liaoning Provincial Revolutionary Committee, becoming a key political figure.

description.zh-cn: 江青扶助毛远新担任了辽宁省革命委员会副主任、沈阳军区政治部副主任、辽宁省军区政委等职务。
description.en: Jiang Qing supported Mao Yuanxin in assuming positions such as Vice-Chairman of the Liaoning Provincial Revolutionary Committee, Deputy Director of the Political Department of the Shenyang Military Region, and Political Commissar of the Liaoning Military District.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，毛远新被毛泽东指定为中央政治局联络员，代表毛泽东发表“最高指示”。
description.en: In 1975, Mao Yuanxin was appointed by Mao Zedong as the liaison for the Central Politburo, conveying Mao's 'supreme instructions'.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，毛远新向毛泽东报告称邓小平否定“文化大革命”，引发了“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动；1976年，毛远新在四五天安门事件后向毛泽东报告“邓小平是天安门事件的总后台”，导致邓小平被撤销一切职务。
description.en: In 1975, Mao Yuanxin reported to Mao Zedong that Deng Xiaoping was negating the 'Cultural Revolution', triggering the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist' movement; in 1976, after the Tiananmen Incident, Mao Yuanxin reported to Mao Zedong that 'Deng Xiaoping was the backstage supporter of the Tiananmen Incident', leading to Deng's dismissal from all posts.

description.zh-cn: 怀仁堂事变后，毛远新被中共中央宣布“保护审查”并遭拘捕。
description.en: After the Huirentang Incident, Mao Yuanxin was placed under 'protective custody' by the CPC Central Committee and arrested.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央批准将毛远新永远开除党籍，并撤销其党内外一切职务。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee approved the permanent expulsion of Mao Yuanxin from the party and the removal of all his positions inside and outside the party.

description.zh-cn: 因任命王芝祥为直隶都督事与袁世凯总统不和而辞职。
description.en: Resigned due to a disagreement with President Yuan Shikai over the appointment of Wang Zhixiang as the Governor of Zhili.

description.zh-cn: 徐世昌因不满袁世凯实行帝制而请辞国务卿。
description.en: Xu Shichang resigned as Secretary of State due to his dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai's implementation of a monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 李在明通过补选当选为第21届国会议员，并连任第22届。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was elected as a member of the 21st National Assembly through a by-election and was re-elected for the 22nd term.

description.zh-cn: 李在明当选为第21任大韩民国总统。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was elected as the 21st President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李在明在担任城南市长期间，因财政和福利政策与时任总统朴槿惠发生严重摩擦。在崔顺实事件后，李在明猛烈抨击朴槿惠，并主张对其进行弹劾。
description.en: During his term as Mayor of Seongnam, Lee Jae-myung had severe friction with then-President Park Geun-hye over fiscal and welfare policies. After the Choi Soon-sil scandal, Lee Jae-myung fiercely criticized Park and advocated for her impeachment.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统朴槿惠通过成立专案调查小组、提案罢免、提交限制地方财政的法案等手段，试图阻碍李在明的市政运作。
description.en: Then-President Park Geun-hye attempted to obstruct Lee Jae-myung's municipal operations by means such as forming a special investigation team, proposing his dismissal, and submitting bills to restrict local finances.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年共同民主党总统候选人党内选举中，文在寅获胜，从而阻止了李在明成为该党候选人。
description.en: In the 2017 Democratic Party presidential primary, Moon Jae-in won, thereby preventing Lee Jae-myung from becoming the party's candidate.

description.zh-cn: 在尹锡悦宣布戒严后，李在明通过社交媒体直播翻墙进入国会，并呼吁民众共同抵抗，对成功阻止戒严起到了关键作用。
description.en: After Yoon Suk Yeol declared martial law, Lee Jae-myung live-streamed himself climbing over the wall into the National Assembly and called on the public to resist, playing a key role in successfully thwarting the martial law.

description.zh-cn: 宋张骏是陕西西安人。
description.en: Song Zhangjun is from Xi'an, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 宋张骏是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Song Zhangjun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 石井四郎提议并领导建立了731部队及其前身，是该部队的核心人物。
description.en: Shirō Ishii proposed and led the establishment of Unit 731 and its predecessors, serving as the central figure of the unit.

description.zh-cn: 金庸称古龙为“相当熟的朋友”，并在自己封笔后亲自为旗下《明报》向古龙邀稿。
description.en: Jin Yong referred to Gu Long as a 'very good friend' and personally invited him to write for his newspaper, Ming Pao, after he had stopped writing.

description.zh-cn: 关羽是刘备的重要亲信，自早期组建军队起便追随刘备，情同手足，为其镇守荆州，是蜀汉集团的核心将领。
description.en: Guan Yu was a key confidant of Liu Bei, following him since the early days of forming his army. They shared a brotherly bond, and Guan Yu defended Jing Province for him, serving as a core general of the Shu Han faction.

description.zh-cn: 在樊城之战中，关羽利用汉水暴涨之机水淹七军，于禁所率军队全军覆没，被迫投降，被关羽俘虏。
description.en: During the Battle of Fancheng, Guan Yu took advantage of the flooding Han River to annihilate the seven armies. The forces led by Yu Jin were completely wiped out, forcing him to surrender and be captured by Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 因与关羽素有嫌隙，在吕蒙偷袭荆州时，时任南郡太守、镇守江陵的麋芳不战而降，导致关羽后方基地失守。
description.en: Due to a long-standing grudge against Guan Yu, Mi Fang, then Administrator of Nanjun and defender of Jiangling, surrendered without a fight when Lü Meng launched his surprise attack on Jing Province, causing Guan Yu to lose his rear base.

description.zh-cn: 苏世民于1985年与彼得·乔治·彼得森共同创建了黑石集团。
description.en: Stephen A. Schwarzman co-founded The Blackstone Group with Peter G. Peterson in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 苏世民担任黑石集团的董事长兼首席执行官。
description.en: Stephen A. Schwarzman serves as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of The Blackstone Group.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典为争夺波罗的海霸权并支持新教，于1630年介入三十年战争，成为反哈布斯堡阵营的主力。
description.en: Sweden intervened in the Thirty Years' War in 1630 to contend for Baltic supremacy and support Protestantism, becoming the main force of the anti-Habsburg camp.

description.zh-cn: 同属哈布斯堡王朝统治，西班牙帝国在三十年战争中是神圣罗马帝国最主要的盟友。
description.en: Both ruled by the House of Habsburg, the Spanish Empire was the most important ally of the Holy Roman Empire during the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 与贺龙、朱德等人在井冈山建立独立的武装，即后来的中国工农红军。
description.en: Together with He Long, Zhu De, and others, established an independent armed force in the Jinggangshan Mountains, which later became the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后，江青才从钓鱼台国宾馆搬到中南海居住。
description.en: Only after Mao Zedong's death did Jiang Qing move from the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse to live in Zhongnanhai.

description.zh-cn: 为遏制苏联在地中海的扩张，土耳其于1952年加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: To curb Soviet expansion in the Mediterranean, Turkey joined the North Atlantic Treaty Organization in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东曾在北京大学担任图书馆助理员。
description.en: Mao Zedong worked as an assistant librarian at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，苏联占领了中国东北，并秘密地将其移交给中国共产党，为毛泽东的军队提供了重要支持。
description.en: After World War II, the Soviet Union occupied northeastern China and secretly gave it to the Chinese communists, providing significant support to Mao's forces.

description.zh-cn: 关羽率军围困了曹仁驻守的樊城。
description.en: Guan Yu led his forces to besiege Cao Ren, who was defending Fancheng.

description.zh-cn: 孙权与曹操结盟，同意从后方袭击关羽的根据地江陵。
description.en: Sun Quan formed an alliance with Cao Cao, agreeing to attack Guan Yu's base in Jiangling from the rear.

description.zh-cn: 共同出席博鳌亚洲论坛2018年年会。
description.en: Attended the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2018 together.

description.zh-cn: 在石破二朗于1981年去世后，其朋友田中角荣劝说石破茂继承父亲遗志，踏入政界。
description.en: After Jirō Ishiba's death in 1981, his friend Kakuei Tanaka persuaded Shigeru Ishiba to follow his father's will and enter politics.

position.en: Director General of the Defense Agency

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在小泉纯一郎内阁中担任防卫厅长官。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Director General of the Defense Agency in the cabinet of Junichiro Koizumi.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年总裁选举后，安倍晋三邀请石破茂出任自由民主党干事长。
description.en: After the 2012 presidential election, Shinzo Abe invited Shigeru Ishiba to serve as Secretary-General of the Liberal Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂与高市早苗是2024年自民党总裁选举第二轮的主要竞争对手。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba and Sanae Takaichi were the main competitors in the second round of the 2024 LDP presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 高市早苗接替石破茂出任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Sanae Takaichi succeeded Shigeru Ishiba as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 卢拉曾担任巴西第35任（2003-2011）和第39任（2023至今）总统。
description.en: Lula has served as the 35th (2003-2011) and 39th (2023-present) President of Brazil.

description.zh-cn: 2023年2月，卢拉在白宫与美国总统乔·拜登会面。
description.en: In February 2023, Lula met with U.S. President Joe Biden at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，卢拉在日本举行的八国集团会议上与时任美国总统乔治·沃克·布什会面。
description.en: In 2008, Lula met with then-U.S. President George W. Bush at the G8 summit in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队由中央军事委员会直接领导。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force is directly led by the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月19日，中央军委决定撤销中国人民解放军战略支援部队番号。
description.en: On April 19, 2024, the Central Military Commission decided to disband the PLA Strategic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 信息支援部队是以原战略支援部队机关及其信息通信保障力量为基础创设的。
description.en: The Information Support Force was created based on the former headquarters and information and communication support elements of the Strategic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 1965年12月，杨成武主持总参谋部工作后，指示研究筹组雷达部，并于1974年回到总参后再次推动加强电子对抗力量建设。
description.en: In December 1965, after taking charge of the General Staff Department, Yang Chengwu instructed to study the formation of a radar department, and after returning to the General Staff in 1974, he again promoted the strengthening of electronic warfare capabilities.

description.zh-cn: 由于受到文化大革命的干扰，总参雷达部的筹组工作被迫中断。
description.en: Due to the interference of the Cultural Revolution, the preparatory work for the General Staff's Radar Department was forced to be suspended.

description.zh-cn: 1975年12月18日，叶剑英向中央和毛泽东呈交报告，建议成立总参四部（即后来的电子对抗、雷达部）。
description.en: On December 18, 1975, Ye Jianying submitted a report to the Central Committee and Mao Zedong, proposing the establishment of the Fourth Department of the General Staff (later the Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department).

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东收到了叶剑英关于成立总参四部的报告，该报告建议加强电子对抗工作。
description.en: Mao Zedong received Ye Jianying's report on the establishment of the Fourth Department of the General Staff, which proposed strengthening electronic warfare work.

description.zh-cn: 总参四部是2016年军队改革中成立的战略支援部队的前身组成部分之一。
description.en: The Fourth Department of the General Staff was one of the predecessor components of the Strategic Support Force established during the 2016 military reform.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾偷渡阴平后，诸葛瞻为国携子战死于绵阳，未能成功阻击邓艾军队。
description.en: After Deng Ai secretly crossed Yinping, Zhuge Zhan fought and died with his son for their country in Mianyang, failing to halt Deng Ai's army.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争爆发后，东北大学内迁至四川省三台县。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Northeastern University relocated to Santai County, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗于天宝初年（约公元742年）将庄子的著作《庄子》命名为《南华经》。
description.en: In the early Tianbao era (around 742 AD), Emperor Xuanzong of Tang named Zhuangzi's work 'Zhuangzi' as the 'Nanhua Jing' (Nanhua Scripture).

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1964年毕业于清华大学水利工程系。
description.en: Hu Jintao graduated from the Water Conservancy Engineering Department at Tsinghua University in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1964年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hu Jintao joined the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) in April 1964.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2002年至2012年担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 2002 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1998年至2003年担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China from 1998 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛被认为是江泽民的指定接班人。
description.en: Hu Jintao was considered the heir apparent to Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，胡锦涛的父亲遭到批斗，这一事件对胡锦涛产生了深刻影响。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Hu Jintao's father was denounced, an event that had a deep effect upon Hu.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，胡锦涛被工作人员从座位上带离会场，未能参加后续的投票。
description.en: At the closing ceremony of the 20th CCP National Congress, Hu Jintao was escorted out of the hall from his seat and was absent from the subsequent votes.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与温家宝共同领导了“胡温体制”时期的中国政府，胡锦涛担任国家主席，温家宝担任国务院总理。
description.en: Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao co-led the Chinese government during the 'Hu-Wen Administration', with Hu as President and Wen as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于洪武元年正月初四登基当日，册封结发之妻马氏为皇后。
description.en: On the day of his accession, the fourth day of the first month of the first year of Hongwu (January 23, 1368), Zhu Yuanzhang created his wife, Lady Ma, as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 在羊山集战斗的关键时刻，刘伯承当面命令纵队司令员陈再道调整部署，坚决歼敌。
description.en: At a critical moment in the Battle of Yangshanji, Liu Bocheng personally ordered column commander Chen Zaidao to adjust deployments and resolutely annihilate the enemy.

description.zh-cn: 在羊山集战斗的关键时刻，刘伯承当面命令纵队司令员陈锡联调整部署，坚决歼敌。
description.en: At a critical moment in the Battle of Yangshanji, Liu Bocheng personally ordered column commander Chen Xilian to adjust deployments and resolutely annihilate the enemy.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在苏联的支持下建立了朝鲜民主主义人民共和国。
description.en: Kim Il-sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the support of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是朝鲜人民军的主要建立者之一。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was one of the main founders of the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东同意了金日成的战争计划，并在战局不利时派遣中国人民志愿军支援朝鲜。
description.en: Mao Zedong agreed to Kim Il-sung's war plan and sent the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to support North Korea when the war situation turned unfavorable.

description.zh-cn: 在中国同意出兵援朝后，中国人民志愿军入朝参战，与朝鲜人民军组成联军对抗联合国军。
description.en: After China agreed to send troops to aid North Korea, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army entered the war and formed a joint force with the Korean People's Army to fight against the UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 金日成于1931年至1945年间为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was a member of the Chinese Communist Party from 1931 to 1945.

position.zh-cn: 师长、方面军指挥、支队长
position.en: Division Commander, Front Commander, Detachment Leader

description.zh-cn: 金日成在东北抗日联军中历任多个指挥职务，领导抗日游击战。
description.en: Kim Il-sung held several command positions in the Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army, leading anti-Japanese guerrilla warfare.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英在2017年3月13日获增选为全国政协副主席。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying was elected as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC on March 13, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件发生后，梁振英在报章刊登声明，强烈谴责中共当权者血腥屠杀中国人民。
description.en: After the 1989 Tiananmen Square massacre, Leung Chun-ying published a statement in newspapers strongly condemning the CCP authorities for the bloody massacre of the Chinese people.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，时任上海市委副书记的朱镕基，找梁振英协助上海进行第一次卖地。
description.en: In 1988, Zhu Rongji, then Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, sought Leung Chun-ying's assistance for Shanghai's first land sale.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇于1975年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Liu Qi joined the Communist Party of China in September 1975.

description.zh-cn: 1999年2月10日至2003年1月19日，刘淇担任北京市市长。
description.en: From February 10, 1999, to January 19, 2003, Liu Qi served as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 2002年10月22日至2012年7月3日，刘淇担任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: From October 22, 2002, to July 3, 2012, Liu Qi served as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇是中共第十六届、十七届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Liu Qi was a member of the 16th and 17th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇接替贾庆林出任北京市市长。
description.en: Liu Qi succeeded Jia Qinglin as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 孟学农接替刘淇出任北京市市长。
description.en: Meng Xuenong succeeded Liu Qi as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑曾在哥廷根大学研习法律。
description.en: Napoleon studied law at the University of Göttingen.

description.zh-cn: 在南斯拉夫总统约瑟普·布罗兹·铁托等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Yugoslav President Josip Broz Tito, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在印度总理贾瓦哈拉尔·尼赫鲁等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Indian Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动的成立是为了在冷战的东西方集团对抗背景下，为发展中国家提供一个独立自主的平台。
description.en: The Non-Aligned Movement was established to provide an independent platform for developing countries amidst the East-West confrontation of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 庞统是刘备的重要谋士，在益州之战中为其献策。
description.en: Pang Tong was an important advisor to Liu Bei and offered him strategies during the Battle of Yizhou.

description.zh-cn: 在益州之战末期，原属张鲁麾下的马超投靠刘备，并领兵进驻成都城北，加速了刘璋的投降。
description.en: In the late stages of the Battle of Yizhou, Ma Chao, who was under Zhang Lu, defected to Liu Bei and stationed his troops north of Chengdu, accelerating Liu Zhang's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 原为刘璋将领，后在绵竹率众向刘备投降。
description.en: Originally a general under Liu Zhang, he later surrendered to Liu Bei with his troops at Mianzhu.

description.zh-cn: 被开除党籍、开除军籍，剥夺上将军衔，判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Expelled from the party, expelled from the military, stripped of the rank of general, and sentenced to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 被开除党籍、开除军籍，剥夺上将军衔。
description.en: Expelled from the party, expelled from the military, and stripped of the rank of general.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在1978年审定《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》时，担任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as the Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee in 1978 when he approved 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

position.zh-cn: 漠南汉地军国庶事总领
position.en: Administrator of military and state affairs in North China

description.zh-cn: 1251年元宪宗即位后，任命忽必烈总领漠南汉地军国庶事。
description.en: After ascending to the throne in 1251, Möngke Khan appointed Kublai Khan to oversee military and state affairs in the Monan Han lands (North China).

description.zh-cn: 菩提达摩来到少林寺传授禅修，使少林寺逐渐成为禅宗祖庭。
description.en: Bodhidharma came to the Shaolin Temple to teach Zen meditation, gradually establishing it as the ancestral temple of Zen.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝恢复了少林寺的名称，并赐予其大量土地和财产，支持了其发展。
description.en: Emperor Wen of Sui restored the name of the Shaolin Temple and supported its development by granting it large amounts of land and property.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年，少林寺十三名武僧因帮助李世民（后来的唐太宗）立下战功而闻名。
description.en: In the early Tang dynasty, thirteen warrior monks from the Shaolin Temple became famous for their military service in helping Li Shimin (later Emperor Taizong).

description.zh-cn: 因少林寺僧人助唐有功，唐太宗对少林寺大加封赏，赐予田地，并允许其拥有僧兵。
description.en: Due to the monks' contribution to the Tang cause, Emperor Taizong greatly rewarded the Shaolin Temple with land grants and permitted it to maintain a force of monk soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 明朝嘉靖年间，少林僧人因抗击倭寇有功而受到政府表彰。
description.en: During the Jiajing reign of the Ming dynasty, Shaolin monks were commended by the government for their meritorious service in fighting against Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝于1750年亲临少林寺，夜宿方丈室，并写下众多诗词与匾额。
description.en: In 1750, the Qianlong Emperor personally visited the Shaolin Temple, stayed overnight in the abbot's quarters, and composed numerous poems and calligraphic plaques.

description.zh-cn: 1928年3月，石友三纵火焚烧少林寺，导致寺内众多殿宇和珍贵文物被毁。
description.en: In March 1928, Shi Yousan set fire to the Shaolin Temple, resulting in the destruction of many halls and precious cultural relics within the monastery.

description.zh-cn: 石友三是冯玉祥的部下。
description.en: Shi Yousan was a subordinate of Feng Yuxiang.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，少林寺遭到严重破坏，僧人被逼还俗，佛像被毁，殿宇坍塌。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Shaolin Temple was severely damaged; monks were forced to return to secular life, statues were destroyed, and temple halls collapsed.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，上百名红卫兵冲进少林寺，毁坏佛像和寺庙建筑。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, over a hundred Red Guards stormed the Shaolin Temple, destroying Buddhist statues and temple buildings.

description.zh-cn: 2005年5月13日，美国前国务卿基辛格拜访少林寺。
description.en: On May 13, 2005, former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger visited the Shaolin Temple.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟于1992年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei joined the Communist Party of China in December 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1978年9月考入西北工业大学飞机系学习，后于1985年9月回到该校攻读硕士学位，1988年3月毕业。
description.en: He was admitted to the Aircraft Department of Northwestern Polytechnical University in September 1978, returned to the university in September 1985 to pursue a master's degree, and graduated in March 1988.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟在北京航空航天大学获得管理科学与工程专业在职研究生学历及管理学博士学位。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei obtained an on-the-job postgraduate education in Management Science and Engineering and a Doctor of Management degree from Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟是中共第十六届至第二十届中央委员。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei is a member of the 16th to 20th Central Committees of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟在担任省级党委书记期间，习近平是其直接上级（中共中央总书记）。
description.en: During Zhang Qingwei's tenure as a provincial party secretary, Xi Jinping was his direct superior (General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee).

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟担任全国人大常委会副委员长，直接向委员长赵乐际负责。
description.en: As Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Zhang Qingwei reports directly to Chairman Zhao Leji.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟担任国防科工委主任期间，向时任国务院总理温家宝汇报工作。
description.en: During his tenure as Director of COSTIND, Zhang Qingwei reported to then-Premier Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟接替许达哲，出任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei succeeded Xu Dazhe as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 沈晓明接替张庆伟，出任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: Shen Xiaoming succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 许勤先后接替张庆伟的河北省省长和中共黑龙江省委书记职务。
description.en: Xu Qin successively succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Governor of Hebei and Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 习近平是中共第五代领导集体的核心。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the core of the fifth generation of CPC leadership.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来邀约并说服梁思成，要求其组织的国徽设计工作中必须包含天安门图案。
description.en: Zhou Enlai met with and persuaded Liang Sicheng, insisting that the national emblem design he was organizing must include the Tiananmen motif.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德坚决反对美国在2003年发动的伊拉克战争。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad firmly opposed the 2003 Iraq War launched by the United States.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2010年与时任俄罗斯总统梅德韦杰夫会面。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad met with then-Russian President Dmitry Medvedev in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2010年与时任巴西总统卢拉会面。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad met with then-Brazilian President Lula in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 松赞干布是吐蕃帝国的建立者。
description.en: Songtsen Gampo was the founder of the Tibetan Empire.

description.zh-cn: 文成公主入藏后，吐蕃与唐朝成为盟国，在松赞干布在位期间和平共处。
description.en: After Princess Wencheng's arrival in Tibet, the Tibetan Empire and the Tang Dynasty became allies and coexisted peacefully for the remainder of Songtsen Gampo's reign.

description.zh-cn: 松赞干布通过与信奉佛教的邻国联姻，并将佛教引入吐蕃，还兴建了大昭寺、小昭寺等寺院，推动了佛教在吐蕃的传播。
description.en: Through marriage alliances with neighboring Buddhist countries, Songtsen Gampo introduced Buddhism to Tibet and built monasteries such as the Jokhang and Ramoche Temples, promoting the spread of Buddhism in Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 林森为行宪前首任立法院副院长。
description.en: Lin Sen was the first Vice President of the Legislative Yuan before the constitution.

description.zh-cn: 1355年（龙凤元年），胡惟庸在和州投奔朱元璋，成为其下属。
description.en: In 1355, Hu Weiyong joined Zhu Yuanzhang in Hezhou, becoming his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 刘基曾向朱元璋指出胡惟庸的缺点，认为任用他好比用劣马驾车，必然会坏事。
description.en: Liu Ji had pointed out Hu Weiyong's shortcomings to Emperor Taizu, comparing his appointment to harnessing a poor horse that would surely wreck the cart.

description.zh-cn: 刘基病重期间，胡惟庸奉命带医生探视，刘基服药后不久去世，时人因此怀疑胡惟庸下毒害死了刘基。
description.en: During Liu Ji's severe illness, Hu Weiyong was ordered to bring a doctor to see him. Liu Ji died shortly after taking the medicine, leading to suspicion that Hu Weiyong had poisoned him.

description.zh-cn: 胡惟庸与李善长为同乡，并结成姻亲，胡惟庸在谋反时曾积极拉拢李善长。
description.en: Hu Weiyong and Li Shanchang were from the same hometown and became relatives by marriage. Hu Weiyong actively tried to win over Li Shanchang for his rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 胡惟庸派元朝旧臣封绩向北元称臣，请求其出兵作为谋反的外应。
description.en: Hu Weiyong sent former Yuan official Feng Ji to pledge allegiance to the Northern Yuan and request troops as external support for his rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏与倪震于2009年1月5日在香港注册结婚。
description.en: Vivian Chow and Joe Nieh registered their marriage in Hong Kong on January 5, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 倪震是作家倪匡的儿子。
description.en: Joe Nieh is the son of writer Ni Kuang.

position.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦首席部长
position.en: Chief Minister of the Federation of Malaya

description.zh-cn: 在马来亚独立前，作为首席部长向英国女王（国家元首）负责。
description.en: As Chief Minister before Malayan independence, he was responsible to the British Monarch (Head of State).

description.zh-cn: 于1961年提出成立马来西亚联邦的计划，并于1963年实现。
description.en: Proposed the plan to form the Federation of Malaysia in 1961, which was realized in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪·莫哈末在1991年国庆日前夕赞扬东姑阿都拉曼成功团结三大民族争取独立。
description.en: On the eve of National Day in 1991, Mahathir Mohamad praised Tunku Abdul Rahman for successfully uniting the three major ethnic groups to fight for independence.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年承认自己年轻时曾多次与江泽民见面，两人关系甚佳。
description.en: Henry Tang admitted to having met Jiang Zemin multiple times in his youth, stating they had a very good relationship.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年自2013年起担任全国政协常务委员。
description.en: Henry Tang has served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee since 2013.

description.zh-cn: 行政长官李家超于2023年再度委任唐英年为西九文化区管理局主席，任期至2025年。
description.en: In 2023, Chief Executive John Lee re-appointed Henry Tang as the Chairman of the West Kowloon Cultural District Authority for a term extending to 2025.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫领导人铁托在世时维持了联邦的统一；其于1980年逝世后，斯洛文尼亚政府开始进行一系列寻求更大自主权的政治经济改革，最终导向独立。
description.en: Yugoslav leader Tito maintained the unity of the federation during his lifetime; after his death in 1980, the Slovenian government began a series of political and economic reforms seeking greater autonomy, which eventually led to independence.

description.zh-cn: 在斯洛文尼亚宣布独立后，南斯拉夫派兵宣战，试图阻止其独立，引发了十日战争。
description.en: After Slovenia declared independence, Yugoslavia sent troops and declared war in an attempt to prevent its secession, triggering the Ten-Day War.

degree.zh-cn: 建筑学学士、管理学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Science in Architecture, Master of Science in Management

description.zh-cn: 1971年获得建筑学学士学位，1973年在斯隆管理学院获得管理学硕士学位。
description.en: He received a BS in architecture in 1971 and an MS in management from the Sloan School of Management in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 时任公安部长赵克志在一场内部讲话中，将扩大拘留设施容量的命令归于总书记习近平，体现了其在治疆政策上的下属和执行者角色。
description.en: Then-Minister of Public Security Zhao Kezhi, in an internal speech, attributed the order to expand detention facility capacity to General Secretary Xi Jinping, reflecting his role as a subordinate and implementer of the Xinjiang policy.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后，杨度成为袁世凯的幕僚。
description.en: After the Wuchang Uprising, Yang Du became an advisor to Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 继任总统后，发布命令惩办帝制祸首，杨度名列第一，被通缉。
description.en: After succeeding as president, he issued an order to punish the masterminds of the monarchy movement, with Yang Du being the first on the wanted list.

description.zh-cn: 1929年秋，杨度在白色恐怖时期秘密加入中国共产党，由潘汉年介绍，周恩来批准。
description.en: In the autumn of 1929, during the White Terror, Yang Du secretly joined the Communist Party of China, introduced by Pan Hannian and approved by Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 介绍杨度加入中国共产党。
description.en: Introduced Yang Du to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 入党后，由周恩来单线联系和直接领导。
description.en: After joining the party, he was in direct contact with and led by Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 因杨度策动洪宪帝制，梁启超与其决裂并公开抨击，成为帝制失败的关键反对者之一。
description.en: Because Yang Du orchestrated the Hongxian Monarchy, Liang Qichao broke with him and publicly criticized him, becoming one of the key opponents who contributed to the monarchy's failure.

description.zh-cn: 杨度将黄兴介绍给孙中山，促成了孙黄合作及中国同盟会的成立。
description.en: Yang Du introduced Huang Xing to Sun Yat-sen, which facilitated the cooperation between Sun and Huang and the establishment of the Tongmenghui.

description.zh-cn: 在北京设法营救李大钊，并在其被害后倾财救助其家人。
description.en: He attempted to rescue Li Dazhao in Beijing and, after Li's execution, provided financial assistance to his family.

description.zh-cn: 与张之洞联合保荐杨度出任宪政编查馆提调。
description.en: Jointly recommended Yang Du with Zhang Zhidong to serve as an officer in the Constitutional Compilation and Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 与袁世凯联合保荐杨度出任宪政编查馆提调。
description.en: Jointly recommended Yang Du with Yuan Shikai to serve as an officer in the Constitutional Compilation and Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 当摄政王载沣要杀袁世凯时，杨度冒死论救，成功保全了袁世凯。
description.en: When Regent Zaifeng intended to execute Yuan Shikai, Yang Du risked his life to argue for Yuan's case, successfully saving him.

description.zh-cn: 留学日本期间，蔡锷与杨度关系最善。蔡锷在遗嘱中还为杨度求情。
description.en: During their studies in Japan, Cai E had the best relationship with Yang Du. In his will, Cai E even pleaded for leniency for Yang Du.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，胡锦涛被工作人员带离会场，引发外界广泛关注。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, Hu Jintao was escorted out of the venue by staff, drawing widespread international attention.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国共产党首任中央委员会主席，自1945年当选直至逝世。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the first Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, serving from his election in 1945 until his death.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋是继毛泽东之后的第二任中共中央主席。
description.en: Hua Guofeng was the second Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, succeeding Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主席领导中共中央政治局的工作。
description.en: The Chairman of the CPC Central Committee led the work of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主席领导中共中央书记处的工作。
description.en: The Chairman of the CPC Central Committee led the work of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1945年6月19日，中共中央举行七届一中全会，毛泽东在会上被选为中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: On June 19, 1945, the CPC Central Committee held the First Plenary Session of the 7th Central Committee, where Mao Zedong was elected Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期，中共中央主席的权力进一步扩大，对国家大小事务拥有最终决定权。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the power of the CPC Central Committee Chairman was further expanded, granting the holder final decision-making authority over all state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 根据《七五宪法》和《七八宪法》，全国武装力量由中国共产党中央委员会主席统率。
description.en: According to the 1975 and 1978 Constitutions, the nation's armed forces were commanded by the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 为了完善集体领导制度，中共十二大决定废除中央委员会主席职务。
description.en: In order to improve the system of collective leadership, the 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to abolish the position of Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，铁路事业受到重创，中共中央和国务院于1967年对铁道部实行军事管制。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the railway industry was severely damaged, and the CPC Central Committee and the State Council imposed military control over the Ministry of Railways in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 李彦宏与徐勇于2000年1月1日在北京中关村共同创立了百度公司。
description.en: Robin Li and Eric Xu co-founded Baidu in Zhongguancun, Beijing on January 1, 2000.

description.zh-cn: 李彦宏担任百度公司的董事长兼首席执行官。
description.en: Robin Li serves as the Chairman and CEO of Baidu.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台于2008年11月15日曝光百度竞价排名黑幕，导致百度股价遭受重挫。
description.en: On November 15, 2008, China Central Television exposed scandals related to Baidu's paid search ranking system, causing a sharp decline in Baidu's stock price.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平和巴西总统迪尔玛·罗塞夫的见证下，百度董事长兼CEO李彦宏宣告巴西葡语搜索引擎正式上线。
description.en: In the presence of Xi Jinping and Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff, Baidu Chairman and CEO Robin Li announced the official launch of Baidu's Portuguese search engine in Brazil.

description.zh-cn: 曾就读于东京帝国大学法学部政治科，1945年肄业。
description.en: Studied in the Political Science Division of the Faculty of Law at Tokyo Imperial University, leaving in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏与作家李敖相识，在彭明敏被特赦后受到特务监视期间，李敖是少数仍敢与他来往的朋友。
description.en: Peng Ming-min was acquainted with writer Li Ao. After Peng's pardon, while under surveillance by secret agents, Li Ao was one of the few friends who dared to maintain contact with him.

description.zh-cn: 2019年1月3日，彭明敏与吴澧培、李远哲、高俊明联名发表公开信，建请时任总统蔡英文放弃竞选连任。
description.en: On January 3, 2019, Peng Ming-min, along with Wu Li-pei, Lee Yuan-tseh, and Kao Chun-ming, published an open letter urging then-President Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 北京理工大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Beijing Institute of Technology is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 西北工业大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Northwestern Polytechnical University is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼于1984年6月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi joined the Communist Party of China in June 1984.

description.zh-cn: 1984年7月，周祖翼毕业于浙江大学地质学系，获理学学士学位。
description.en: In July 1984, Zhou Zuyi graduated from the Department of Geology at Zhejiang University with a Bachelor of Science degree.

description.zh-cn: 1989年10月，周祖翼在同济大学海洋地质与地球物理系获理学博士学位。
description.en: In October 1989, Zhou Zuyi obtained a Doctor of Science degree from the Department of Marine Geology and Geophysics at Tongji University.

position.zh-cn: 上海市委组织部副部长
position.en: Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任上海市委组织部副部长期间，李希是时任部长。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Li Xi was the Head of the department.

position.zh-cn: 部务委员兼干部二局局长、副部长
position.en: Member of the Ministerial Affairs Committee and Director of the Second Bureau for Cadres, Vice Minister

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼于2014年8月任中共中央组织部部务委员兼干部二局局长，2016年10月升任副部长。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi was appointed as a member of the Ministerial Affairs Committee and Director of the Second Bureau for Cadres of the Central Organization Department in August 2014, and was promoted to Vice Minister in October 2016.

position.zh-cn: 人力资源和社会保障部部长
position.en: Minister of Human Resources and Social Security

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任人力资源和社会保障部部长期间，李克强是时任国务院总理。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Minister of Human Resources and Social Security, Li Keqiang was the Premier of the State Council.

position.en: Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任福建省委书记，向以习近平为总书记的党中央负责。
description.en: As Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, Zhou Zuyi is responsible to the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼接替尹力出任中共福建省委书记。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi succeeded Yin Li as Secretary of the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，郭富城与张学友、刘德华、黎明一同被香港电台晋封为“四大天王”。
description.en: In 1992, Aaron Kwok, along with Jacky Cheung, Andy Lau, and Leon Lai, was named one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings' by Radio Television Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中央纪委参与调查了谷俊山案。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection participated in the investigation of the Gu Junshan case.

description.zh-cn: 中央纪委参与了对徐才厚的调查过程。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection participated in the investigation process of Xu Caihou.

description.zh-cn: 梁光烈担任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: Liang Guanglie served as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曹刚川是梁光烈的前任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: Cao Gangchuan was Liang Guanglie's predecessor as Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 梁光烈担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: Liang Guanglie served as the Chief of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在中越战争期间，作为武汉军区作战部副部长，协助昆明军区司令员杨得志指挥作战。
description.en: During the Sino-Vietnamese War, as Deputy Director of the Operations Department of the Wuhan Military Region, he assisted Yang Dezhi, Commander of the Kunming Military Region, in commanding operations.

position.zh-cn: 武汉军区作战部副部长
position.en: Deputy Director of the Operations Department of the Wuhan Military Region

description.zh-cn: 梁光烈在中越战争期间，协助昆明军区司令员杨得志指挥作战。
description.en: During the Sino-Vietnamese War, Liang Guanglie assisted Yang Dezhi, Commander of the Kunming Military Region, in commanding operations.

description.zh-cn: 受中共中央委托，前往八宝山革命公墓为梁光烈送别。
description.en: Entrusted by the CPC Central Committee, went to Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery to bid farewell to Liang Guanglie.

description.zh-cn: 受中共中央委托，前往八宝山革命公墓为梁光烈送别。
description.en: Entrusted by the CPC Central Committee, went to Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery to bid farewell to Liang Guanglie.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康是江泽民的次子。
description.en: Jiang Miankang is the second son of Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康是王冶坪的次子。
description.en: Jiang Miankang is the second son of Wang Yeping.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康于1999年至2006年在华东师范大学获得博士学位。
description.en: Jiang Miankang obtained a PhD from East China Normal University between 1999 and 2006.

description.zh-cn: 时任保安局局长李家超形容初选是“歹毒的计划”，并表示警方的拘捕行动是必要和必需的，以维护国家安全。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee described the primaries as a 'vicious plot' and stated that the police's arrest operation was necessary and essential to safeguard national security.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交部表示支持香港警方依法履职，并反对外部势力干涉。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China expressed support for the Hong Kong police in performing their duties according to the law and opposed interference by external forces.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿蓬佩奥对拘捕行动表示愤慨，并考虑对相关人员实施制裁。
description.en: Then-U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo expressed outrage at the arrests and stated that the U.S. was considering sanctions against those involved.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统蔡英文谴责大搜捕，并呼吁全世界民主阵营伙伴声援香港。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China Tsai Ing-wen condemned the mass arrests and called on democratic partners worldwide to support Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 出狱后，薄一波被派往太原，与山西地方军阀阎锡山达成从事抗日救亡工作的协议。
description.en: After being released from prison, Bo Yibo was sent to Taiyuan and reached an agreement with the local Shanxi warlord Yan Xishan to engage in anti-Japanese national salvation work.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四天安门事件前夕，薄一波向邓小平提出要采取果断措施，并支持对北京实施戒严以恢复社会秩序。
description.en: On the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Bo Yibo proposed to Deng Xiaoping that decisive measures should be taken and supported the implementation of martial law in Beijing to restore social order.

description.zh-cn: 作为中华人民共和国权力金字塔的顶端，中央政治局控制着军队（中央军事委员会）。
description.en: As the apex of the power structure in the People's Republic of China, the Politburo controls the military (Central Military Commission).

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局委员。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.
