description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2017年9月，孙政才被开除党籍，其政治局委员职务自然撤销。
description.en: In September 2017, Sun Zhengcai was expelled from the Party, and his position as a Politburo member was automatically revoked.

description.zh-cn: 1972年至1975年在武汉大学外语系英文专业学习。
description.en: Studied in the English Department of Wuhan University from 1972 to 1975.

description.zh-cn: 1970年11月加入中国共产党，2023年被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1970 and was expelled in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 2023年，刘亚洲被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: In 2023, Liu Yazhou was expelled from the Communist Party of China.

position.zh-cn: 节目策划、主持人、制片人

description.zh-cn: 崔永元于1993年开始参与中央电视台《东方时空》的策划，后成为《实话实说》等节目的主持人和制片人，直至2013年离职。
description.en: Cui Yongyuan began participating in the planning of CCTV's "Oriental Horizon" in 1993, later becoming the host and producer of programs like "Tell It Like It Is" until his resignation in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，在听过崔永元关于大兴安岭火灾的报道后，邓颖超委托秘书打电话表示感谢，并请其将稿子转载到《人民政协报》。
description.en: In 1988, after listening to Cui Yongyuan's report on the Great Khingan Fire, Deng Yingchao asked her secretary to call and express her gratitude, and requested that the article be reprinted in the "CPPCC Daily".

description.zh-cn: 崔永元曝光了涉及范冰冰的“阴阳合同”，直接导致其被国家税务总局调查并处以巨额罚款，演艺事业陷入停滞。
description.en: Cui Yongyuan exposed the "yin-yang contracts" involving Fan Bingbing, which directly led to her being investigated by the State Taxation Administration, fined heavily, and her acting career stagnated.

description.zh-cn: 始于1937年的中日战争是太平洋战争的前奏和重要组成部分。
description.en: The Sino-Japanese War, which began in 1937, was a prelude to and an integral part of the Pacific War.

description.zh-cn: 太平洋战争中盟军的胜利最终导致了日本的无条件投降。
description.en: The Allied victory in the Pacific War ultimately led to the unconditional surrender of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本签署投降书，标志着第二次世界大战的结束。
description.en: Japan's signing of the instrument of surrender marked the end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 作为盟军最高司令，道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟在密苏里号战列舰上接受了日本的正式投降。
description.en: As Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers, Douglas MacArthur accepted the formal surrender of Japan aboard the USS Missouri.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨的红色高棉革命在思想和实践上受到了中国文化大革命的显著影响。
description.en: The Khmer Rouge revolution in Cambodia was significantly influenced by the Chinese Cultural Revolution in both ideology and practice.

description.zh-cn: 封从德出生于中国四川省。
description.en: Feng Congde was born in Sichuan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间当选为北京高校学生自治联合会（北高联）主席。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Square protests, he was elected as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation.

description.zh-cn: 电影《建党伟业》的叙事从辛亥革命开始，暗示其作为中国共产党建党的历史背景和原因之一。
description.en: The narrative of the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival' starts from the Xinhai Revolution, suggesting it as part of the historical background and a reason for the founding of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 蔡和森是毛泽东青年时代的学友和战友。
description.en: Cai Hesen was a schoolmate and comrade-in-arms of Mao Zedong in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，南京大学工学院参与组建南京工学院。
description.en: In 1952, the College of Engineering of Nanjing University participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 周佛海是中国共产党早期成员，1921年加入，1924年退党。
description.en: Zhou Fohai was an early member of the Chinese Communist Party, joining in 1921 and leaving the party in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共早期党员，周佛海接受陈独秀的领导和指派。
description.en: As an early CCP member, Zhou Fohai accepted the leadership and assignments of Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 周佛海毕业于日本京都大学经济系。
description.en: Zhou Fohai graduated from the Department of Economics at Kyoto University in Japan.

position.zh-cn: 行政院副院长、财政部长、中央政治委员会秘书长、中央储备银行总裁、上海市长等
position.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan, Minister of Finance, Secretary-General of the Central Political Committee, Governor of the Central Reserve Bank, Mayor of Shanghai, etc.

description.zh-cn: 周佛海在汪精卫政权中担任了多个核心职务。
description.en: Zhou Fohai held multiple core positions in the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，戴笠吸收周佛海进入军统，使其成为国民党政府在汪精卫政权中的卧底。
description.en: In 1943, Dai Li recruited Zhou Fohai into the Juntong, making him a spy for the Nationalist Government within the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国三年（978年），宋太宗迫使吴越国纳土归降。
description.en: In 978, Emperor Taizong forced the Wuyue Kingdom to surrender its territory.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯将维新派捕杀慈禧的计划告知荣禄，导致戊戌政变发生，维新派失败。
description.en: Yuan Shikai revealed the reformists' plan to capture Cixi to Ronglu, leading to the Wuxu Coup and the failure of the reformists.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗驾崩且无子嗣，导致其堂弟朱厚熜（明世宗）作为旁支宗室得以入继大统。
description.en: The death of Emperor Wuzong without an heir led to his cousin Zhu Houcong (Emperor Shizong) succeeding to the throne as a member of a collateral branch of the imperial family.

description.zh-cn: 在“大礼议”事件中，明世宗因追尊生父问题与杨廷和等朝臣爆发严重冲突，最终迫使杨廷和退休。
description.en: During the 'Great Rites Controversy', Emperor Shizong had a severe conflict with Yang Tinghe and other court officials over the posthumous honoring of his biological father, eventually forcing Yang Tinghe to retire.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗笃信道教，为追求长生不老之术，每年不断修设斋醮，迷信方士，造成巨大靡费。
description.en: Emperor Shizong was a devout follower of Taoism. In his pursuit of immortality, he continuously held religious ceremonies and trusted alchemists, resulting in enormous state expenditure.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗是明孝宗的侄子。
description.en: Emperor Shizong was the nephew of Emperor Xiaozong.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖九年，明世宗将孔子的尊号由“大成至圣文宣王”改为“至圣先师”。
description.en: In the 9th year of the Jiajing era (1530), Emperor Shizong changed the honorific title of Confucius from 'Greatly Accomplished, Ultimate Sage, King of Culture' to 'Ultimate Sage, First Teacher'.

description.zh-cn: 应勇在案发时担任最高人民检察院党组书记、检察长。
description.en: Ying Yong was serving as the Party Secretary and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate at the time of the case.

description.zh-cn: 巴金自1983年起连续五次当选全国政协副主席，直至去世。
description.en: Starting in 1983, Ba Jin was elected Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC for five consecutive terms, a position he held until his death.

description.zh-cn: 巴金因担任全国政协副主席，成为中华人民共和国的党和国家领导人之一。
description.en: By serving as the Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, Ba Jin became one of the party and state leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 叶选平是叶选宁的哥哥。
description.en: Ye Xuanping is Ye Xuaning's older brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶选宁于1984年参军，1988年被授予少将军衔，1997年退役。
description.en: Ye Xuaning joined the army in 1984, was awarded the rank of Major General in 1988, and retired in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 1976年四人帮被逮捕后，叶剑英派叶选宁看望胡耀邦，叶选宁向叶剑英和华国锋转达了胡耀邦的“三句话”建议。
description.en: In 1976, after the arrest of the Gang of Four, Ye Jianying sent Ye Xuaning to visit Hu Yaobang. Ye Xuaning then relayed Hu Yaobang's 'three sentences' of advice to Ye Jianying and Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 叶选宁是第八届全国政协委员、第九届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: Ye Xuaning was a member of the 8th National Committee and a Standing Committee member of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 《论语》是儒家学派的核心经典。
description.en: The Analects is the core classic of the Confucian school.

description.zh-cn: 被朱熹列为“四书”之一，极大地提高了《论语》在儒家经典中的地位。
description.en: Being included as one of the 'Four Books' by Zhu Xi greatly elevated the status of the Analects among Confucian classics.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄是唐朝初年的开国功臣和名相。
description.en: Fang Xuanling was a founding father and prominent chancellor of the early Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄参与策划了玄武门之变，并与杜如晦、长孙无忌、尉迟敬德、侯君集五人并功第一。
description.en: Fang Xuanling participated in planning the Xuanwu Gate Incident and was ranked first in merit along with Du Ruhui, Zhangsun Wuji, Yuchi Jingde, and Hou Junji.

description.zh-cn: 在玄武门之变中，房玄龄与长孙无忌、杜如晦等人并功第一。
description.en: In the Xuanwu Gate Incident, Fang Xuanling, along with Zhangsun Wuji, Du Ruhui, and others, was ranked first in merit.

description.zh-cn: 房遗直是房玄龄的嗣子。
description.en: Fang Yizhi was the heir of Fang Xuanling.

description.zh-cn: 作为清朝皇帝，批准了《南京条约》使其生效。
description.en: As the Emperor of the Qing dynasty, he approved the Treaty of Nanking, putting it into effect.

description.zh-cn: 美国众议院是美国国会的下议院。
description.en: The U.S. House of Representatives is the lower house of the U.S. Congress.

description.zh-cn: 富兰克林·罗斯福的上台开启了民主党自1933年起长期支配众议院的时代。
description.en: Franklin D. Roosevelt's rise to power began an era of long-term Democratic dominance in the House of Representatives starting in 1933.

description.zh-cn: 冷战的爆发以及对苏联在欧洲扩张的担忧是第二次红色恐慌的主要背景。
description.en: The outbreak of the Cold War and fears of Soviet expansion in Europe were the primary context for the Second Red Scare.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争的爆发进一步提升了对共产主义势力扩张的恐惧。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War in 1950 further elevated fears of communist expansion.

description.zh-cn: 麦卡锡主义是在第二次红色恐慌的时代背景下形成的一种政治风潮。
description.en: McCarthyism was a political trend that formed against the backdrop of the Second Red Scare.

description.zh-cn: 与乌克兰总统泽连斯基通话，这是他当选教宗后首次与世俗国家领导人通话。
description.en: Spoke with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy by phone, marking his first conversation with a secular head of state since his election.

description.zh-cn: 伊藤博文于1885年12月22日就任首任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Itō Hirobumi took office as the first Prime Minister of Japan on December 22, 1885.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三是日本宪政史上在任时间最长的内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Shinzo Abe was the longest-serving Prime Minister in the history of constitutional government in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本内阁总理大臣的职位是在1885年明治维新期间随着内阁制度的创立而设立的。
description.en: The position of Prime Minister of Japan was established in 1885 during the Meiji Restoration with the creation of the cabinet system.

description.zh-cn: 内阁总理大臣经国会选出后，由天皇进行象征性的任命。
description.en: After being elected by the National Diet, the Prime Minister is ceremonially appointed by the Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 内阁总理大臣是自卫队的最高领导，执掌最高指挥监督权。
description.en: The Prime Minister is the commander-in-chief of the Japan Self-Defense Forces and holds the highest command and supervision authority over them.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮曾任中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Li Yuanchao formerly served as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Li Yuanchao formerly served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 为躲避日本侵略，故宫博物院于1933年开始将大批文物南迁，此后又因战事西迁，导致藏品长期流离在外。
description.en: To evade the Japanese invasion, the Palace Museum began relocating a large number of artifacts southward in 1933, and later westward due to the war, causing the collection to be displaced for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 因文化大革命，中央命令故宫于1966年至1971年闭馆，以保护其免受破坏。
description.en: Due to the Cultural Revolution, the central government ordered the Palace Museum to close from 1966 to 1971 to protect it from destruction.

description.zh-cn: 尽管法国在第一次世界大战中战胜，但战争损耗极为惨重。
description.en: Although France was victorious in World War I, the war resulted in extremely heavy losses.

description.zh-cn: 作为巴黎和会中国代表团顾问，梁启超从巴黎致电林长民等人，通报外交失败的消息，此举对点燃五四运动起了关键作用。
description.en: As an advisor to the Chinese delegation at the Paris Peace Conference, Liang Qichao sent a telegram from Paris to Lin Changmin and others, reporting the diplomatic failure. This act played a key role in igniting the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在2002年12月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2002.

description.zh-cn: 在2007年10月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in October 2007.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年12月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2012.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年11月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in November 2017.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年6月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in June 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年10月授予总警监警衔时，担任国家安全部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of State Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in October 2022.

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，赵本山与薄熙来、王立军等涉事官员的合照被大量曝光，引发外界对其政治关系的猜测，导致其事业受到负面影响。
description.en: After the incident, photos of Zhao Benshan with involved officials like Bo Xilai and Wang Lijun were widely circulated, sparking speculation about his political connections and negatively impacting his career.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yang Yongxin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 方舟子发文指出，杨永信使用的电击疗法损害记忆和认知功能，并非国际医学界的推荐方法。
description.en: Fang Zhouzi published an article stating that the electroshock therapy used by Yang Yongxin damages memory and cognitive functions and is not a recommended method by the international medical community.
